title: ‚ÄòWorst App Experience I‚Äôve Ever Had‚Äô
review: I‚Äôve never left an app review before but this was the worst app experience I‚Äôve ever had. First it won‚Äôt even let me make an account & password. This wouldn‚Äôt be a BIG problem EXCEPT THAT everytime I get off the app for even 1 second, it completely logs me out. So then I have to go through a whole process of signing up using email, then going to check my email, verifying it, and then leading me back to the app. BUT WAIT- THERE‚ÄôS MORE. I placed an order for pickup and when I got off of the app, it completely erased my order and logged me out. When I logged back on, it had been completely erased- my order was no longer placed and it wasn‚Äôt even in my recents. I then tried to place an order for delivery. Got all the way through, but then on the page where you actually place it for delivery, it just says ‚ÄúCannot open- invalid request‚Äù over & over. I tried to do this THREE TIMES, getting logged out each time, and it happened everytime. This app needs some serious fixes because it‚Äôs legitimately impossible to use.

title: App has hiccups and restaurants aren‚Äôt able to process orders anyway
review: The app has some confusing features, in particular the difficulty in choosing the location at which you want to pick up the order. It keeps defaulting back to the closest location, even after one designates a different one. It stores prior orders in the checkout queue. As a result a priority lunch order suddenly shows up in today‚Äôs breakfast order, and you have to delete the unwanted items.   Worst of all, McD‚Äôs obviously didn‚Äôt think through how restaurants should process orders. There are only 2-3 designated parking spaces for mobile orders, which are full during busy times‚Äîincluding by people who didn‚Äôt place a mobile order but find the spot convenient. If you do park to pick up your order, it seems to take longer to get filled than if you drive up to the pickup window. Clearly mobile orders get second priority to filling orders from those in line. In short, however well the app may function, it doesn‚Äôt make the ordering process any easier or speedier.
developerResponse: {'id': 7425127, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-02-22T22:55:47Z'}

title: Terrible glitches
review:
Not sure what happened to this app. It was working fine but now glitches with available items and location. 
I tried to place an online pickup order today. My location services were on & I double checked it was the correct location. Tried to order my daughter a McNuggets combo at 2:30pm. After submitting my order, it popped up an error saying those items were not available during that time of day so I drove through the drive-thru & placed my order instead. Hours later I received an email confirmation for the mobile app order & it was showing the order was placed in a state on the other side of the country. Checked my mobile banking app & sure enough, I was charged for the mobile app order that supposedly didn‚Äôt go through. The mobile app is still showing the items in my cart & it is in fact showing the correct location I tried to order from. So now I have to deal with the hassle of getting that order refunded. Deleting the app after this issue is eventually resolved.
developerResponse: {'id': 28064651, 'body': "we don't want to lose you, Sheena! help us get to the bottom of this at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-02-15T14:59:30Z'}

title: Forced location makes no sense
review:
The most frustrating thing about the app is that it FORCES you to turn on your location and your order WILL NOT go through unless you are physically at McDonald‚Äôs with your phone. I can‚Äôt just place an order and have someone else pick it up for me if I‚Äôm busy, I would need to physically be there in person with my phone with location services on. No other restaurant app forces you to do that. Mobile ordering and pick up for literally every other restaurant is so easy compared to McDonalds. 

Plus, the app doesn‚Äôt stop tracking you even if you close out of it. And there‚Äôs also no way to really ‚Äúclose out‚Äù your order even after you‚Äôve picked up your food. You have to manually remove all your items out of your cart if you want to start a new order. The app will keep tracking your location regardless and you have to force the app closed in your settings. It makes me wonder what they‚Äôre doing with my location information since they‚Äôre being so forceful about having it on.

title: NEVER WORKS!!!
review: I haven‚Äôt been to a McDonald‚Äôs in over a year since my app stopped working. I had a craving today for a filet o fish and fries so I tried using the app for the deals. Still not working. Completely updated automatically. Doesn‚Äôt work. Can‚Äôt order, it says my location doesn‚Äôt exist (I‚Äôm in the McD‚Äôs parking lot in New Mexico, a state of the US in case you thought I was in Mexico, like most other states do). Try to pull up the menu, blindingly white screen. Deals? Only the coffee is shown. Yeah. So the app doesn‚Äôt work and once again, we‚Äôll be going across the street to Wendy‚Äôs, whose app ALWAYS works. Or Burger King, whose app ALWAYS works. And yes, I‚Äôve reinstalled in 3x in the last hour. Not including all the times I‚Äôve done it in the past. I even submitted a trouble ticket only to be told to reinstall the app. Which I‚Äôd stated in the ticket that I‚Äôd already done that. So apparently your customer service ppl cannot read. And no, I will not purchase food there without using the deals in the app, just as I won‚Äôt go to anywhere else I can‚Äôt utilize their coupons.

title: Table delivery
review:
The only negative comment I have is that on the AP when you select deliver to my table and
Select either a actual table number or from a tent top, about 30% of the stores do not follow the instructions and instead call out your first name
and leave the food sit.   So if you‚Äôre not close by you do not hear them.  If you then ask them, you are told we don‚Äôt have the staffing to bring it.  Once I elevated this to corporate executives visiting a location and I was told they are supposed to bring it to the table.   They instructed the staff and for next couple days that location did comply.  Days later they went back to not doing it. We travel all over the US.  And there are several locations that will not deliver to the tables yet they will run food outside.   My beef is if your not going to do it then remove it as a option on the AP.
developerResponse: {'id': 32673475, 'body': 'we hear you! tell us more here so we can look into this for you: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html', 'modified': '2022-10-19T16:18:53Z'}

title: Can‚Äôt even get started
review: First off, don‚Äôt try using this app on an iPad. Scaling properly is the least of your worries. The app requires you to create an account before you look at the menu for your area, which is annoying. You can create an account with an iPad but if you click on the link in an email you will be told to ‚Äúselect the activation link directly from your phone to complete your registration‚Äù so it‚Äôs not recognizing the iPad as a mobile device. Okay so I pulled out my iPhone to click the link and that worked but Safari couldn‚Äôt complete the request because I didn‚Äôt have the app installed on my phone. After installing the app on my phone I can‚Äôt log in. It says sorry that didn‚Äôt work, confirm your internet connection and try again or restart the app. Restarting the app did not help. I was going to give it 2 stars if it worked but between my two Apple devices I can‚Äôt even set up an account to use the app. Faster just to hit the drive-through and wait. Food still tastes great, but the app developers dropped the ball hard for such a big corporation like McDonalds.
developerResponse: {'id': 14842879, 'body': "We're sorry you are having trouble. We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.", 'modified': '2020-04-22T15:34:06Z'}

title: Worst/Slowest experience I‚Äôve ever had
review:
They list coupons AND menu items that simply aren‚Äôt available, only to have me go through the entire clunky process of ordering to get into the restaurant which, because of the poor training, instead of recognizing they don‚Äôt serve my order and do anything to let me know either through the app or in person, they COMPLETED THE ORDER and ignored it, leaving me standing directly in front of them waiting for 45 minutes on my hour lunch break. This app does not work with the actual restaurant locations. It literally would‚Äôve been FASTER for me to go GROCERY SHOPPING in the time I wasted standing in line, even after alerting them to the problem. So here‚Äôs the deal; Not only do I suggest that you ignore this app, having worked for McDonald‚Äôs in the past, I recommend you forget The Golden Arches altogether, as they‚Äôre cutting corners in every feasible area they can get away with between constantly broken ice cream machine, annoyed and underpaid staff, and laughable software quality when it comes to taking orders online OR in person. On a scale of 10? Literally 
-1/10.

title: Best FF mobile app + deals
review: If you enjoy eating McDonald‚Äôs then you should have this app. It saves you a ton of money even if you just use it occasionally to find whatever deals they have available at the time. Very convenient if you go to a very populated location and you put in your mobile order a few minutes before so waiting for long is never an issue. Follow the warren buffet model order the same things for the he same price and you‚Äôll be satisfied. I rated this 4 stars because my only complaint is that I wish you could stack your reward points on top of a daily deal (of course this should/would come with limitation like once per day)  instead of having to choose one or the other. I have a lot of points that I would spend but end up not because I‚Äôd just choose the deal. And how about more deals or options for reward points
developerResponse: {'id': 32409563, 'body': 'there is a such thing as too much of a good thing! only 1 deal or reward can be redeemed at a time.', 'modified': '2022-10-05T18:11:02Z'}

title: Great App, Poor Process
review: The app is well organized for selecting food and finding local deals. I was initially very impressed. I soon found out that the simplicity of this app does not translate into saving time. After I ordered my food on the App, I arrived at the McDonalds, checked in so that my food could be made. After about 30 minutes I received my food. I asked the employee why it took so long to get my food when ordering through the app. It was explained to me that the App orders do not get first priority. The drive thru gets 1st priority, then the walk-in traffic, then comes the orders from the App. Once I arrived and checked in to have my food made I watched 20-25 other customers, who arrived after me, receive their food before me. McDonalds advertises for people to use the App, but then punished those who do. The App defeats the purpose of fast food. If I wanted to wait 30 minutes for food I would go to a sit down restaurant and enjoy better food. Lesson learned, I will stick to using the drive thru so that McDonalds can live up to its expectation of fast food.

title: New update crashes
review:
This was a great app, but with the most recent update it won‚Äôt even launch and crashes before completely loading. It‚Äôs been like this for at least a week now and it‚Äôs very inconvenient to order at the drive through speaker when the entire menu is no longer displayed and you can‚Äôt get them to understand your customizations due to food allergies. Very, very frustrating. Please fix your app McDonald‚Äôs.

Update: The app is still broken after all this time. It is now November and I can get to the login screen, but I get the technical difficulties excuse. I‚Äôve tried redownloading the app, I‚Äôve upgraded my iOS at least twice now, and nothing makes it work. McDonald‚Äôs you had a great app, but it‚Äôs been useless for months now. I can‚Äôt get the employees to understand the changes I need made to my food, so it‚Äôs dangerous for me to eat there now. There‚Äôs been complaint after complaint letting you know the app is jacked up. This app can be fixed by a developer from their bed if they want. The pandemic is no excuse for this. Handle your business McDonald‚Äôs, this is pathetic.

title: Poor poor service
review:
Went through the drive through at McDonalds in St. Joseph, MI this morning. I was treated very poorly and service was ridiculous. They refunded my money without even offering to rectify the situation. I ordered (or TRIED to order) a bacon egg and cheese biscuit with a round egg rather than the powdered egg and a sweet tea. Initially they wanted to charge me $7.49 I think and when I told them it couldn‚Äôt be that much she told me it was $7.61. I went inside to try to sort it out and the first employee I spoke to said they were out of round eggs. I said okay but I was over charged. At that point someone came from the back of the kitchen and said they were out of round eggs and they were going to refund my money. When I started to object she repeated, ‚ÄúI am refunding your money. Do you understand?‚Äù She handed me my money and walked away. I didn‚Äôt even get the option of ordering anything else. I have worked in food service for over 40 years. I‚Äôd have NEVER treated anybody the way I was treated today. It set the precedent for the rest of my day.  

Linda Peterson
developerResponse: {'id': 32540690, 'body': "service should always be courteous, and that doesn't seem to be the case. we'd like more info regarding your visit, it can be sent here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html", 'modified': '2022-10-12T22:01:53Z'}

title: With the update, a great app
review:
Before some major glitches were fixed, I would‚Äôve given this app 1 star (negative stars if that was possible). The app was so bad, it wouldn‚Äôt even allow me to open it most, if not all, of the time. The sometimes it works/sometimes it doesn‚Äôt work feature of the pre-updated app made me avoid McDonald‚Äôs because it bothered me when the cashier asked me if I had the app.

Rewind to now. The new Disney toys inspired me to return to McDonald‚Äôs because son loves Disney characters. I knew that the app didn‚Äôt work, but I still went there to see which toy(s) were available. When the cashier asked me if I had the app, I told him that I do, but I haven‚Äôt used it in a long time because it doesn‚Äôt let me sign in. He mentioned that there was a huge update to the app, and it might work for me now. (In my mind, was like all right, buddy‚Ä¶ the app doesn‚Äôt work‚Ä¶ but ok). 

I re-downloaded it, and WHAT? It not only works, but the entire user interface was reformed for a more inviting, straightforward experience. It works for me every time I open the app, and I actually enjoy using it. Whatever you guys did‚Äîit‚Äôs about time. Ha. And thank you!

If the app wasn‚Äôt working/opening for you, it might be worth it to try it just one more time.

title: Makes life harder not easier
review: I‚Äôve tried to use this app a dozen times now and there has never been a time when it hasn‚Äôt taken me longer because I used the app. It‚Äôs utterly frustrating with apps like Starbucks making your life so much easier with the ability to order from your phone and pick up without having to wait, when the McDonald‚Äôs app is the opposite. First, you can only put the order thru when you‚Äôre at the McDonald‚Äôs so ordering ahead is a non-starter, then either I‚Äôm forced to go through the drive-thru anyway, which is what the app is supposed to save, or it takes longer to make and I end up waiting in my car longer than if I‚Äôd just gone through the drive-thru. Even the drive-thru pickup often takes longer because of issues with the mobile orders. On top of that it‚Äôs SO BUGGY, that half the time either I can‚Äôt check out at all or the payment fails and I have to wait 10m for a manager to come take my credit card and fix it. It just makes me mad every time I use it!! Do not download.

title: Why is everything closed?
review: I‚Äôd very much appreciate the opportunity to enjoy your fine establishment after the eighth hour of the afternoon, however even if a restaurant is open after 8pm, the app says it‚Äôs closed during the ordering process. But WAIT, the hours listed on the app explicitly says that the restaurant is open until 11:59pm, but I can‚Äôt order through the app after 8pm because mysteriously all your restaurants are closed. Could I go to the drive thru to order?  Yes, but since I work in retail management I refuse to sit there and make a member of your team sit there and listen to my customizations when there are 8 people behind me. Yes, I could NOT make customizations, however I do pay for extras. Since everything is ‚Äúclosed‚Äù I conveniently order easily in the Burger King app that is actually closer to my house!  I don‚Äôt tell my family because I don‚Äôt want to be disowned for visiting Burger King, but what can I do, They‚Äôre open!

title: On line ordering and hours
review:
I was extremely disappointed with the app. I placed an order from home. My wife was driving and we agreed that she‚Äôd pick up the order. When she arrived, I selected ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù but the app asked me to drive closer.  I called the restaurant about 4 times before my call was answered. Although I had the order number, the gentleman who answered the phone said that I had to be in close proximity for him to place the order. I shared my wife was in parking lot in parking space 2. He said I had to be in the parking lot. Even though I tried to provide the order number, he restated that I had to be in the parking lot. Eventually he relented and my wife was able to pickup. He stated next time I need to be there. While this process may work for you it isn‚Äôt user friendly, especially when my order is pre-paid. I can understand that you want to provide food that‚Äôs fresh, however, that should be my burden.
Additionally, I know you have breakfast hours, however, they are not listed on you websites. Just opening and closing hours.

title: I‚Äôve sent request for help several times!!
review:
I‚Äôve sent request for help several times over the past 6 mos with NO REPLY from McDonalds, and you still havent corrected the PAYMENT PROBLEM on the new app‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è if I don‚Äôt hear back from you this time, I‚Äôm through with the McDonald‚Äôs app‚ÄºÔ∏è  

 I cannot place any orders through the app because when I put my payment information in, The app will not let me send payment through! I‚Äôve tried everything I know to do, and nothing works. I‚Äôve also read that others are having the same problem, with no avail!!  I don‚Äôt know if it has to do with the card nickname or what, because I‚Äôve tried to separate cards with no luck‚ÄºÔ∏è

Will you please fix this problem and answer my message?? I have asked and asked at McDonald‚Äôs and not even a manager knows what to do. I‚Äôm sorry, but it‚Äôs pretty ridiculous to have this app that won‚Äôt take payment, but I can‚Äôt get an answer from you that I have sent in several times!!  I hope you get this message through the App Store in the review. Thank you!!

title: Suggestions for mobile order
review:
I use the mobile order every time!  For the most part, I have no problems with it. However, with this last update, all the deals went away!  I hate that because I choose McDonalds often times JUST FOR THE DEALS!  Please add back the deals!

Also, it be would be great if there was a  1/2 sweet AND 1/3 sweet as an option under customization. I was able to call the restaurant and they agreed to have my 1/3 sweet fixed as part of my order. Thankfully, they do offer the ‚Äúno ice‚Äù option. Again, I especially like that you could use coupons in the app with mobile ordering, so I don‚Äôt miss out on any good deals‚Ä¶so that will also be a must have in order for me to rate 5 stars!  I will continue to use the mobile ordering feature. Hopefully a new update will give back the ‚ÄúDEALS‚Äù. Right now none are being offered.

title: 20% off deal never works
review: The app is fine unless you try to use the 20% off deal. When I first got the app, it worked fine, but over the past few months, whenever I try to use the 20% off deal in the drive through, I inevitably get to the window and am told the payment didn‚Äôt go through. I open my credit card app and show them the charge is there and pending, then they look more closely and see that the payment that didn‚Äôt go through is the 20% I am supposed to be getting discounted. That means either I have to pay a second time and get no discount, or they call a manager over, override something, then end up paying out of their own pocket. This is an issue no matter which McDonalds I go to. One of the managers told me this is a constant issue for them, and that it is not just me, but happens anytime someone tries to use the discount at their restaurant. The 20% off should be the apps most valuable feature, but I am reticent to use it at all now.
developerResponse: {'id': 31083862, 'body': "that's a bummer! let's get that fixed asap at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-07-25T15:24:19Z'}

title: So Many Glitches
review:
I‚Äôm so tired of the glitches. I continue to have the problem of deals staying in my cart and can‚Äôt proceed until I remove them. When try to remove them, nothing happens and the deal remains in the order days later.  I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs the restaurant or the app, but the order doesn‚Äôt finalize half the time.  For example, I placed an order two days ago, picked up the order and went on my way.  I still had that order in my bag for checkout.  I went to place a new order but unable to due to the inability to remove the deal from my bag two days ago.  

The lack of customizing happy meals is also an issue.  We still can‚Äôt order a normal cheeseburger happy meal.  The pricing is getting high enough (especially with coffee) that it pays to go to Chick-Fil-A with their very user friendly app.  You get better service, more user friendly app, and more food for your buck. Doesn‚Äôt seem that McDonalds no longer cares to be relevant in this new way of living.

title: Colleen LORITO
review:
Sometimes the app is inaccurate bec it is set corporately and not by the franchisee they tell me at the locations I usually go to on a regular basis .. the managers of the locations have no control whatsoever on the app .. Mostly I‚Äôve been happy .. I was disappointed when the apple pie was removed on the deals .. I‚Äôd prefer the apple pie over the free fries .. either ? / or ??? 
I‚Äôd like to be able to choose between the two on the daily basis ‚Ä¶ 
The stores have really upped the prices I‚Äôve noticed as well ..  the chicken nuggets went from $1.00 for 4 to $1.49 for 4 very recently and now again to $2.19 for 4 .. that‚Äôs quite a jump twice in a few weeks time ‚Ä¶  
I‚Äôve noticed the burgers  chicken and fries have also increased along w the fries .. I get it .. But you can‚Äôt price fast food past your customer base ..

title: What is the point
review: I tried using the app this morning as I didn't have my debit card on me. I do this with chick fil a all the time, but today I happened to be closer to mcdonalds so I thought I would give it a go. Worst experience ever. Would not let me check in because it wouldn't connect to the internet (even though I had successfully logged into mcdonalds wifi and could use the internet on other apps. I went through the drive thru and no one there knew what was going on. Finally a manager came out and played around on my phone for several minutes but also couldn't figure out why it wouldn't let me check in. Meanwhile, they have me pulled up last the drive thru and everyone is honking at me and my car got scraped. Eventually they just got me the hash brown and sweet tea and let me go. I was 20 minutes late to work, the tea tasted bad, and none it was worth all of the drama. I am NEVER using the app again. I used to work at McDonalds so I understand the stress of the job and I don't blame the employees - the app should be making things easier for everyone - not wasting everyone's time.

title: Terrible
review:
It needs a lot of improvement. 99% of the time, I use the mobile app and pay with my passcode but I get to the window and it‚Äôs not paid. The other day, I told them I paid, I repaid them then I saw a credit on my account later for that same amount. Today, I paid by the mobile app, I get to the drive thru speaker and they said they didn‚Äôt have my order. The employee finally saw it after a minute then I asked if I could just pick it up at the drive thru window. They told me I had to come inside to get it, even though it was already, surprisingly, paid for this time. I try to save them the trouble of them having to walk my order out but I guess I will in the future.  I went inside and the lady at the counter said she didn‚Äôt have my order. More walking around trying to find it and it was finally located. 
This app needs a lot of improvements. I love the awesome deals but the McDonald‚Äôs employees need some extra training on it as well.

title: Deleting for good
review: It was a good app, I would use it all the time because there is a McDonalds right next to my job. I had over 4,000 points and one day the app logged me out and wouldn‚Äôt let me sign back in. Every time I hit login it would try to enroll me into a new account and then say my email was already registered and to login. It just kept going around and around in circles. Finally I submitted a contact me and was told to call customer service. So I did, the girl told me that my email was never registered. Weird how I accumulated over 4,000 points without registering an email. She said they would look into what was happening and call me back. It‚Äôs been over a month and I never got a call again. I sent in another request form explaining that I was waiting for some kind of update with my case number and was told to call customer service. Customer service needs to call me since that‚Äôs what they were supposed to do in the first place. No one wants to wait on hold when they weren‚Äôt supposed to in the first place.
developerResponse: {'id': 30022054, 'body': 'we get how upsetting this is! please share more details with us here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-05-28T13:20:36Z'}

title: McDonald‚Äôs app breakfast blunder
review:
So I had a craving for McDonald‚Äôs breakfast. The problem was that I was going to cut it close to 10:30AM( when they stop serving) I figured I could use the app to order ahead so that way I can place the order and still get breakfast even if I don‚Äôt make by 10:30. So place the order at 10:09. As I get there, 10:35AM, it says they are getting my order ready. Ok. So I head through the drive thru and when I pull up they tell me they are no longer serving breakfast. Great

So you can‚Äôt place your order ahead of time, you have to be in the McDonald‚Äôs parking lot for your order to go through. they don‚Äôt warn you that if you arrive later than breakfast you can‚Äôt get your order, and they don‚Äôt cancel the order or notify you if you miss that window.  That‚Äôs some bad design. So thanks for wasting my time McDonalds. At that point I left the drive thru and went to Wendy‚Äôs instead. Not gunna waste my time with McDonald‚Äôs when other places have better working apps.

title: Tries to work...
review:
The application appears on the surface to work better than most that I‚Äôve tried, but the menu is difficult to navigate, and the rewards section is effectively filled with daily deals and other promotions from all he overlords at McDonald‚Äôs corporate.

This next bug is the reason I‚Äôm even writing this review. One of these daily deals was used to order food and pickup through a drive-thru a few days ago (DAYS AGO). My account was charged and the correct food was delivered, but it appears that the order fulfillment was not completed since I can only ‚ÄúReopen‚Äù this order, but the deal is no longer available so I cannot cancel the order. 

I‚Äôve tried restarting the app, removing all items from the bag (the deal cannot be removed), and adding more items and removing those! All of this leave my application stuck in an unfulfillable order and,  therefore, absolutely unusable. Welp, it‚Äôs a sign! Cut corners = mistakes made need to go back to cooking at home anyways.
developerResponse: {'id': 20456757, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that. Let us look into that. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-01-17T22:36:39Z'}

title: Worked until phone was upgraded.
review: I‚Äôm probably really going to miss McDonalds but the App has been a deal breaker for me. Back in the, ‚ÄúGood old Days‚Äù, the App worked flawlessly to the point that I literally forgot how to order the old way. Points and deals were very beneficial, then the first incident occurred. I had ordered and paid(using the App)and proceeded to the first window. The employee at the window told me that the payment window had timed out and she would need another form of payment. I had her look at my phone which displayed payment already approved through Apple Pay. She explained that it had not went through I asked if I would get refunded if I double paid, she said yes, but how would she know. Never received a refund and the management just told me to have a nice day. The worst problem is I recently upgraded my IPhone and to make a long story short I cannot log in to my account anymore. Tried to create a new account, links to verify do not work.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work with Apple
review: I used to use this app multiple times a week to get my coffee all the sudden after an update it will not work it says there are to technical difficulties I called the number and they tell me it‚Äôs my problem that I need to delete the app and reinstall it which I‚Äôve done millions of times it also happened to my wife‚Äôs phone so I finally googled it and found out that there are many of people having the same problem and it‚Äôs all Apple users Apple cannot fix this problem it‚Äôs an application problem not an Apple problem there are many iPhone users and I wish that they would fix the app because before this problem it was a pretty good app it had a couple glitches but worked pretty well but now they‚Äôre losing out on many of customers including me which again I went multiple times a week to get coffee and I have not been in for weeks hopefully if enough people complain they will finally fix the problem this is supposedly been a problem for a year and a half now

title: Worst mobile order app!
review: This is the worst app or is the service associated with it? Every time I place the order, which is outside in the parking lot and completed the order since I‚Äôm at the location. FYI: You can place the order far away but you can‚Äôt  complete the order if you are not at the McD location with your phone present with you.  I go in to pick up the order; the pickup monitor shows my order # now serving. That means the order did complete with payment. But the mobile order for the food is not ready?!! What? You can‚Äôt show them the employees /managers the receipt on the order on the app either.  It just shows the items ordered & if you like to reorder the same items again. It doesn‚Äôt show the actual receipt whether payment was made at what time & for which location. So you have to argue with them to get your order that got processed with payment b/c you can see it got charged on your card online. Why can‚Äôt you be like Starbucks app? Tired of using the app. But you can‚Äôt get the deals unless you use their app. So frustrating for everyone!

title: Horrible Ap!  Sends order to wrong store!
review:
I work out of town.  Before I left work, I placed an order on the Ap for curbside pick up.  The Ap automatically designated the closest store for pick up, but I live an hour away and I wanted the food hot and fresh, so I manually changed the location to my local store. 
 When I got to town, I pulled up to my local McDonalds, punched in my curbside number and waited and waited and waited.  Finally, a half hour later, I went in and asked where my order was.  They said they never received it.  My credit card had already been charged for the order, so I showed them the receipt.  We discovered that the Ap has automatically designated a different store for pickup.  One that has about 20 minutes away from where I was.  Even though I had manually chose the store I wanted, the AP chose a different store.  I was not willing to drive 20 minutes out of my way.  Neither store was willing to rectify the situation, so I went home with no food and a charge to my credit card for food that was not delivered to me!  I was ripped off!  BEWARE!  DO NOT USE THIS AP!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 11291340, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, Patti! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-10-16T17:43:00Z'}

title: Take a cue from Chick-FilA
review: How is it that two fast food apps are so vastly different? One is great, straightforward and easy to coordinate mobile preorder. The other (Mickey D‚Äôs) rolls ahead with option after option and makes you realize‚Äî My God, isn‚Äôt this for Fast Food? Why the heck am I ordering ahead for FAST FOOD when I could just get in line? These are the thoughts in your brain as the map skitters around setting pre-ordered deals at locations miles from the one you want, seemingly wont let you cancel‚Äî doesn‚Äôt even track if you had an order at all...oh Lord. Weird. And it makes me realize even fast food nowadays is complicated AF. Takes something simple and makes it dumb as all get out. This app is trash and makes me realize how stupid mobile ordering for fast food is. I‚Äôm writing this as I sit in line in the drive thru behind other folks who just ordered at the box and didn‚Äôt mess around with the silly app. Guess what? We will all get our food at the same time :))))

title: Good but some annoying flaws....
review: I really like this app and the nice deals it has but sometimes when I use this app, it automatically logs me out and when I try to log in, it says ‚ÄúSorry, that didn‚Äôt work. Confirm your internet connection and retry...‚Äù I refreshed my screen multiple times and it still says the same thing. My internet is also perfectly fine by the ways. I dont really understand why it happens sometimes. Another flaw, (it only happened once to me but I still feel like I should write it down) is that sometimes when I make a payment, it fails to go through. It says something to go to the cashier counter and the cashier will help me out. I went to the cashier and the cashier has literally NO idea what is going on... I think atleast the cashier should be trained/told what to do when these kinds of situations happens....

title: Mmm mmm McCafeüòç
review: Everyone has there habits.. one of mine is I seriously need my daily coffee!! üòÅI have always loved the Mocha Frappes but the last year i have started adding expresso shots in my frappes for an extra boost and then fell in love with the frappe all over again üíúüíúüíú the only downside is my 3-4$ coffee now is 5-6$.. which bring me to the McDonalds App. Now every day I simply scan my phone at the drive thru and after every 5 I buy i get one free!üòÑ it‚Äôs always nice to save money you would be spending either way! The app is super easy to use I‚Äôve also took advantage of other offers that have been available. There are actually some pretty good coupons a lot of buy one get one free on McCafe drinks and shakes which is nice for when I‚Äôm buying for a friend as well. So anyways I think the app is great saves me money for sure and isn‚Äôt a haste to deal with! üòäüíúüíï

title: Good, but in need of some fixes
review:
I have to say, this has been a godsend in a lot of ways. The local McD‚Äôs always has a line around the block, so being able to order, park, and have it brought to my window (skipping the crazy line) is so convenient. 

The app is easy to use and works well (aside from a couple of bugs I have run into). The best part are the deals. There are lots to choose from, and some are new daily. If you‚Äôre planning on stopping there anyways, might as well get a discount, right? You can also earn free McCaf√© drinks (a staple of mine) like a loyalty program, which is a nice bonus. 

The only issue that has happened to me repeatedly is that the app (even in its most recent version) has trouble recognizing what time it is. If a deal offers a discount on a breakfast sandwich, for instance, I will click on it only for the app to give me an error, saying this deal is not available during this time of day (when it IS in fact during the correct time frame). The same issue has occurred for lunch deals too. In fact, I have really only been able to use deals that are applicable all day (despite restarting my phone and deleting/reinstalling the app). 

Otherwise, I would highly recommend this app, and think it improves the overall experience at the restaurant.

title: Give me my money back. Now
review:
Horrible.  Pull in curbside space, app wont check in.  Tried 7 or 8 times.  Got in 20 car long drive thru.  Waited.  Got to window, sat for a long time while the employee tries to get the order to work. She asked for my order again to renter it. To her credit, she said my order would be free because I‚Äôd spent 20 mins trying to pick up my food.  And yet I look and McDonald‚Äôs charged me for the order when I first tried to get it
 So I couldn‚Äôt get my food, but they made sure to get my whopping 4 bucks.  I‚Äôm now reminded why Panera is Panera and McDonalds is McDonalds.  Don‚Äôt waste your time or money here. Tried ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù in app to report problem. App froze up every time in pull down menus.  Consistently horrible experience stayed consistent to the end. Too bad, because if the app worked as it should, I‚Äôd use it.

title: Terrible service! The Escalations department is a joke!
review: It‚Äôs been over a month and they still haven‚Äôt fixed the issue that I‚Äôm having with not  being able to add a payment method. Imagine a scenario where a company has things to sell, a customer wants to buy something, and yet the company doesn‚Äôt have a way to accept payments: this is what I‚Äôm dealing with right now with this incompetent app! And when I call customer service, I get nothing but lip service and non concrete answers. I mean, let‚Äôs be honest, it shouldn‚Äôt take a month to figure out this issue; adding a payment method is such an easy issue to fix. The entire escalations department should be fired for DOING NOTHING. And don‚Äôt bother with responding to my comment McDonalds, I would much rather you guys contact your escalations department and find out why this elementary issue is taking so long to fix. Adding a payment method to the mobile app should not take a month and counting to remedy. I thought the purpose of business was to make money and not to prevent customers from spending money?! McDonalds seems to believe in the latter!

title: This is the worst app in existence
review: Firstly, 0 stars. Secondly, the codes never work when I try to use them. Thirdly, I used the mobile order on a day when I forgot my wallet. I had my boyfriend make the order on his phone; by the way you can't order the "all day" breakfast menu items after 10:30 even when you can order those items at the drive thru and get them. He said the order was placed so I told him to press check in. No, turns out the location on his phone tells the app where he is and he can't check in until his phone is there and if he tries to turn off location the app crashes and says it requires location. Well now my entire 30 lunch is gone and I went to the drive thru window and the lady told me no mobile orders were in since you have to check in first. What kind of idiotic design is this??? What if someone is picking up dinner for their family but they have someone else place the order? At Taco Bell you can place the order and then pick it up without your phone having to be in that location. This whole thing needs a redesign.

title: New update needs work
review: This used to be our favorite of the fast food apps that we have tried. The upgrade that came out 4 days ago has some major flaws. Before this, the food wasn‚Äôt made until you came to pick it up and you weren‚Äôt charged until you came to pick it up. In the new update, your order is put in immediately. So when you arrive to get your food, it is cold. I would rather wait a few minutes for hot food than get cold food immediately. Having to pick drive through or curbside before you arrive means you are guessing which will be best sight unseen. To make it worse today it defaulted to curbside and our slot number from last order pickup which means the restaurant was trying to bring out our food before we arrived which created even colder food. Please fix the issues or go back to the older app.
developerResponse: {'id': 20271968, 'body': "Heya. We're always working on an even better App that you enjoy using. Thanks for helping us out.", 'modified': '2022-06-27T19:41:37Z'}

title: Doesn‚Äôt work properly!!!!!
review:
When to use app on several occasion and both occasion it says to let them know when you arrive to pick up, pulled in to the curbside parking and use the notification app to let them know I was there and three options comes up, curbside closed only til
7, drive thru which there was a very long line, or pick up inside, when to processes payment and there was an error that appeared saying to process again and still it  work that‚Äôs strike 1 , then decided to change my payment card and it still couldn‚Äôt  work, what makes it worst it wouldn‚Äôt save the new card, strike 2, and when I went inside to place an order on the kiosk it went through with no problems, hallelujah !!!! waited for 15-20 minutes for my order.  They forgot my drink cups and my son‚Äôs  happy meal! Strike 3,  the manager there didn‚Äôt know anything about the curbside, he response to that was curbside is open 24 hrs and it shouldn‚Äôt be closed! He was friendly don‚Äôt get me wrong , just not properly trained.  His response was ok I‚Äôm sorry but I‚Äôll let my general manager know üò£

title: Snowball effect
review: I was not notified until I got to the restaurant after placing my mobile order that my credit card information was expired. Alright, i‚Äôll just enter the new info, right? Wrong. The app will not allow me to enter new card information, instead presenting me with a ‚Äúinternal process‚Äù error. Alright, i‚Äôll just talk to the cashier inside the restaurant and place the order through them, right? Also wrong. I tell the cashier my dilemma and that I just want to use the $1 off coupon and she sneers at me telling me they don‚Äôt ‚Äúhave a $1 off button on the register‚Äù. So she was unwilling to help me as well. So, what I just drove out to the restaurant for nothing? That would have been the case had a nice stranger behind me not lent me the coupon from his app. To which the cashier said ‚Äúyou‚Äôre the only one that‚Äôs come in with problems today, maybe it‚Äôs just your phone‚Äù. Lady, I told you the card is expired and it won‚Äôt let me enter new info, were you not listening? I doubt everyone else you‚Äôve seen today also has a credit card that just expired. Highly unlikely.

title: Hit & Miss
review: It would be nice for the option to rate per app experience since sometimes it is hit & miss. For instance... The convince of the app should be avoiding a long line since the order is placed ahead. This evening I got to the McDonald‚Äôs and the mobile ordering lanes were blocked off. I was forced to go Drive-thru and still waited over thirty minutes for cold food and missing sauce. This is not the first time that I had the experience and it‚Äôs really irritating for me. If I wanted to wait I would have just went to the location and ordered through the drive-thru and avoid the app.. Then to get cold food is not acceptable. However, this doesn‚Äôt happen every time and some times I order, pull up, my food is brought out in a good amount of time and everything is there and hot. So it would be nice to be able to rate each order individually since sometimes it works and sometimes it‚Äôs not acceptable.

title: Un-usable
review:
Idk what happened in the past few months with this app, it‚Äôs always been slow but now it‚Äôs so slow it takes 15 minutes for the app just to load on my phone, and that‚Äôs not an exaggeration. The last time I used this I actually tried to order food 3 times, the first being before I even left for the mcdonalds location. Somehow it disappeared after I arrived. The next order was in the parking lot after making a full round thru the drivethru just waiting on the app itself to load. After telling the clerk sorry for holding up the line waiting on the app I parked my car and tried to order a 3rd and final time. 
I tried multiple times resetting the app just to attempt to put the order in and after wasting about a full 20 minutes I couldn‚Äôt get to the final page to do so. I drove thru the drive thru and ordered without the app..
All in all this was about 35 incredibly frustrating minutes. That‚Äôs a lot of wasted time just trying to save a couple bucks. Please fix this broken app

title: Doesn‚Äôt work as expected
review:
App Review

The app does a great job at what it‚Äôs designed to do. It‚Äôs just a flawed concept. 

Failure no.1 When you order food, the order doesn‚Äôt actually get placed until you arrive at the McDonalds. So, it‚Äôs not like you‚Äôre skipping the line. You‚Äôre just skipping speaking your order out loud to the person at the register. 

Failure no. 2 there will be some times when the restaurant doesn‚Äôt have what you ordered. Part of one of my orders was a latte. When I arrived, I was told the latte machine was down and so I was told I could choose another drink instead. The problem is the the price difference. Lattes are the most expensive drinks they sell. So, my total price should have been adjusted down. I contacted the app customer service and they suggested submitting a bank dispute. And really, that‚Äôs just a waste of everyone‚Äôs time for a difference of a couple bucks. My time, McDonald‚Äôs response to the bank, and my bank‚Äôs time. 

Failure no. 3. Glitches. I submitted an order on a different occasion and after the finish and pay screen I was saw a screen that said ‚Äúsomething went wrong on our it end.‚Äù It gave me an order number and said I should go to the counter for help. The people at the restaurant had no idea what to do, and I had to submit a whole new order.

So, overall, the app is good in theory. It just doesn‚Äôt work well in practice. Neither corporate nor the local restaurants know how to deal with orders that go wrong.
developerResponse: {'id': 11336407, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-10-18T21:14:12Z'}

title: Like the concept but still not very convenient.
review: My one and only complaint is that my order does not begin being made until I get to McDonald's. So you are only saving a min or 2 at best by ordering through the app. It needs to have an option where I can choose when I want my order to begin being made. If the order is sitting there when I get there it would be perfect. Not much point of using the app if my order doesn't begin until I'm in the parking lot. There's no time being saved this way if I still am waiting 5-10 min once I walk in. P.s.  In response to the response I received from the developers that stated ‚Äúthe order doesn‚Äôt start until you get there so it‚Äôs hot and fresh.‚Äù I don‚Äôt care about that! Plus I‚Äôm capable of timing my trip so it‚Äôs not waiting for long. It‚Äôs fast food. So I want it fast. I also have to eliminate one more star from my review now due to the ridiculous response the developers just gave me. And for the fact that I can‚Äôt response to there response. This shows me you do not care about our opinions. You are just pretending. Sad!
developerResponse: {'id': 7871172, 'body': "Hey! Sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2019-03-24T14:41:55Z'}

title: Beware placing orders.
review: I placed a curbside order and it said payment failed to process. I reordered and they brought my food. Then I saw I was charged twice for two orders of the same thing. How can I that be if it said payment failed to process? I go in and they wouldn‚Äôt refund me nor offer to fix it anyway. Yes that‚Äôs right after showing them what happened they didn‚Äôt do nothing. Said you have to go through the App. If they accept payments through the App then they have to be held responsible for helping their customers if they didn‚Äôt get something etc. All the other restaurant Apps work just fine but this one doesn‚Äôt seem to always work even if your connected to their WiFi. Just beware that if you use it and have issues the restaurant may not help you.

title: I‚Äôm not Lovin It
review: The app is easy to use BUT the restaurants don‚Äôt seem to be onboard!  Often I will wait longer at curbside than in drive-thru because the app order shows up on a different screen and the staff doesn‚Äôt see it. I‚Äôve tried changing it up and going through the drive-thru, but it‚Äôs confusing for the staff because the order isn‚Äôt in the same queue as the rest of the cars. Although, I pay with the app, the clerk always wants to swipe my card!  And there is no way to post a complaint or review your experience within the app. Usually on receipts there is a phone number to call to rate your experience, but ordering through the app does not give the same opportunity. Often I‚Äôve gotten my order and can tell that my coffees aren‚Äôt even what I ordered. I just ordered 2 coffees and a sausage burrito and waited 15 minutes in curbside for them. Very frustrating. What‚Äôs the point of using it if it‚Äôs not quick and convenient? And clearly the employees do not like it either, seeing as they make it seem as it‚Äôs a hassle to stay on top mobile ordering.
developerResponse: {'id': 3972427, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, Penny!  Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-06-25T17:03:31Z'}

title: All they want is your info
review: Garbage app, every step they take every effort to get all your info and push ads. PLEASE, read all the other negative reviews before downloading! Never seen an app with so much sales pressure. I go on Panda, doesnt ask a thing, place my order and pickup. This app requires your location just to show menu, requires your email to even see prices, asks you a hundred different ways to subscribe, if you want to see deals, they don‚Äôt show you, you HAVE to allow email opt in of daily ads to see the deals. No way around any of it. Canned the app, now going places where its super easy to do business without giving away my privacy or right to not be inundated with ads and emails. This company is now 1000% not a food company, but a marketing company. Experience should be just like in person, see the menu & deals, place the order, pay & go. If you asked me for all this crap at a drive through prior to showing deals, or needed my email to place an order, I‚Äôd drive off!!!

title: It‚Äôs a normal food app‚Ä¶ with one annoying problem
review: The app works fine for ordering. Let‚Äôs you see current deals and offers. It does what it needs to, BUT the location tracking is ridiculous. Constantly asking and trying to track you and forget making an order and having someone pick it up. I‚Äôve placed orders and had friends pick it up or place orders for friends / family so they can pick up. Once they pull into curbside, on the app there‚Äôs a button that says ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here‚Äù. Makes sense to me. Maybe someone is picking up for you. Maybe it‚Äôs an order for someone else you placed. Maybe your phones GPS went bad. So many possibilities why that makes sense. And so I naturally clicked I'm here and was ready to put the curbside number in‚Ä¶ only you can‚Äôt. Unless you have the phone with you there is no way to confirm the order. Really huge oversight especially since every other fast food app that allows for curbside pickup allows you to manually enter you are there and or parking spot number
developerResponse: {'id': 30160828, 'body': 'we never want you to be annoyed, Dan. chat with our mobile app team about ways to improve here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-06-04T16:39:22Z'}

title: Glitchy app.
review:
Most of the time this app works. When I first got it I could never stay logged in but it seems they fixed that issue.

Last night I went to order from the McDonald‚Äôs app and I used one of their deals. It was the buy one get one Big Mac. So I ordered that and 2 small fries and 2 sweet teas and a strawberry shake. For some reason when I went to pick up my food I received 3 small fries and 3 large sweet teas. I told them it wasn‚Äôt my order but actually it was! I was super confused because this wasn‚Äôt what I ordered. So I had to do another order to get what I wanted through the app and they wouldn‚Äôt refund my previous order. So I decided of course just to eat what I got on the first order. The fries were so hard that they cut the roof of my mouth. The sweet tea tasted unsweet and they didn‚Äôt give me straws then gave me attitude when i went back to get straws. 

But of course it‚Äôs McDonald‚Äôs what do you expect.
developerResponse: {'id': 28545703, 'body': "we never want this to happen. let's talk more in detail about your order and the location via the link: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html", 'modified': '2022-03-13T23:35:49Z'}

title: Curbside pick up didn‚Äôt work for the 3rd time
review: Today I placed an order and paid and indicated that I was in curbside pickup spot 2.  I waited over 10 minutes and no one ever came. I had to go through the drive through line and explain what happened.  No apology received, no explanation offered I just was told  pull up to the second window.  I had to explain again to the woman at the second window. Again she didn‚Äôt apologize or offer any explanation.  Only after I asked her why it keeps happening did she say maybe the weather was affecting their wifi and the order was not received by them.  However the weather eas good enough for me to place the order and pay for it.  Better customer service needed and better store response to the app and the customer.

title: Worst online order system
review: I want to start off by saying this app isn‚Äôt terrible for using coupons in the drive thru however it does crash a lot. My main complaint is the way online app ordering works. If McDonalds wants more people to order online then they definitely need to keep up with their competitors. I recently ordered through the app and was going to have my boyfriend pick it up on his way home so he wouldn‚Äôt have to pay for my food. Turns out my phone has to be at the store. So then I had him go in and give them my order number because the app said they could still start the order with the order number. Turns out they can‚Äôt do anything without my phone physically being at the store, so I had to cancel my order so that my boyfriend could reorder the same thing and pay. Awful setup, should be able to order online and confirm when you are there without that specific phone being there. Makes no sense.

title: Clunky and User Hostile
review:
The order interface is needlessly complicated, confusing and annoying. The default sense this app conveys is one of being lost without a map. 

When I order a happy meal:

1.  There are steps. Why are there steps?  I‚Äôm ordering a happy meal, not preparing to launch a nuclear missile! 

2.  Why can‚Äôt I order a 6 pc nugget happy meal?  No ‚Äú+2‚Äù checkbox in the 4 pc meal options. Actually, never mind. You‚Äôd probably add it as yet another step with its own confirmation button. 

3. Why are drink options three levels deep. You got your two default drinks.  Then we have more drinks, no problem there.  Then you have more, more drinks and I‚Äôve forgotten what I was ordering in the first place. 

4. Why are there two ways to reveal more options. There‚Äôs the ‚ÄúView all‚Äù link and the ‚ÄúMore ‚Ä¶‚Äù option.  They both reveal the same stuff. You‚Äôve made this part harder to use and provided exactly zero benefit. 

5. Why does the toy selection view slide up from the bottom?  Just needlessly inconsistent with the food options. 

In general:

Why can‚Äôt I submit an order and have someone else pick it up? The app seems aggressively designed to prevent this. I can‚Äôt share my order without sharing my phone.

This app suggests contempt for the time and mental health of your customers.  It‚Äôs harder than using the drive though and saves no time in the process.  But hey, you gotta be on the App Store amirite?

title: Douglasville GA store
review: Usually I like this store and go here when we travel through. Not today. I ordered and paid in the mobile app. When we walked in an employee (I think the manager in duty) shouted out ‚ÄúUse the kiosk!‚Äù  I said I had ordered and paid on the mobile app. There was no thank you when I picked up the order. I went back to order a large order of fries and wanted soda but there isn‚Äôt a fountain. This time I said thank you to the employee. The store is not clean. It looks like a dirty mop was dragged around a dirty floor. The hand towel dispense in the ladies bathroom does not work. This may be one of the worst McDonalds experiences ever. I am a loyal customer and always respond that McDonalds is my favorite fast food restaurant and a brand I trust. So glad my opinion was not based on the experience today.
developerResponse: {'id': 32957252, 'body': "service should always be courteous and the restaurant clean. we'd like more info about your visit, details can be sent here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html", 'modified': '2022-11-03T16:12:55Z'}

title: Hate this App Now..
review: I have been an avid user of this app forever and loved it.  My favorite part is the curbside pickup option because I hate driving through the drive thru with screaming kids and try to talk to a person at the window that I can't here or understand or them me.  I used the curbside pickup almost every single day for it's convince.  However  a few months ago , I pull into the curbside pickup it to go to pay for my order and get a message that there is a problem with my payment method.  At first I was like ok, maybe it's just a glitch.. but here we are several months later and I still cannot order curbside any longer.  And before y9u think it, the card is good and has funds to cover as it is the same form of payment I hand to the lady to pay after I have to drive through the drive through.  I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app numerous times and nothing fixes the proem.. I even went so far as to create a whole new profile, and it still will not work!   Very frustrating!! Could you please advise how to correct this issue.
developerResponse: {'id': 8096475, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Mary! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-04-07T17:40:45Z'}

title: What‚Äôs the point!?
review:
I actually thought this app was going to be great and would save time but I was so wrong!! First when you place an order you have to take the phone you used to place the order with you to the McDonald‚Äôs and then ‚Äúcheck in‚Äù before they begin making your food! If that‚Äôs the case why not just go through the drive through as always!? It takes less time that way!! Second the last 10 times I‚Äôve used the app Ive gotten all the way through to parking at McDonald‚Äôs and checking in only to get a payment denied error on every payment method I try!! Once again it would take less time to go through the drive through!! Third, so far I have not gotten one single order from them exactly as I ordered it!! Of course this wouldn‚Äôt change going through the drive through though! 
The reason for an app to order ahead is so that the food will be ready and waiting when you get there!! Not so you have to sit and wait just like you did when you ordered at the restaurant in the first place!!! So, what‚Äôs the point!?!?

title: Not bad, needs some work
review:
The app overall is ok. It does need a few enhancements. First, you need a way to add in comments for the order. A common issue I run into is requesting extra sauce for nuggets or condiments. 

The other issue is that it‚Äôs not started until you arrive. There should be a way to either specify an arrival time to have the ability to start the order a few minutes before you arrive. This would be especially helpful when ordering breakfast at night, which take 3-4 minutes to make. You end up just waiting in a parking spot instead of in line, so it‚Äôs a little better than drive thru, but just marginally.

One other feature that would be nice is allowing you to rate your service each time. Right now it‚Äôs very time consuming or difficult to get particular feedback to the managers of the restaurant or a general manger about issues with service. His app could serve as a good communication channel for feedback.

title: Rewards Not Available
review: I would give this app higher reviews for ease of use, but when something goes wrong there appears to be no way to fix it, no help from store employees, no way to contact McDs other than a basic form that it does not appear they even respond to, and no rewards‚Ä¶. I tried to use breakfast rewards at breakfast, but the app tells me they are ‚Äúunavailable at breakfast.‚Äù When you actually click on the item it states ‚Äúnot available during lunch hours.‚Äù  I do understand the difference between breakfast and lunch but my app does not.  I tried to use these rewards around 8:15 am which would clearly be breakfast.  My son sad it‚Äôs some kind of coding error in the app which only Mcd‚Äôs can fix.  Well good luck with that since there is no one to talk to.
developerResponse: {'id': 25911804, 'body': "We're always here to help. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. \r\n", 'modified': '2021-10-26T19:54:07Z'}

title: Good app but needs a few reworks to ordering system
review: I‚Äôd like to say I was really liking the convenience of ordering online and picking up at drive thru with everything already paid. My frustration started when I was on a long drive and ordered a smoothie from a McDonald‚Äôs at the next exit. I missed the exit and didn‚Äôt have another chance to get off and still arrive at my destination on time. I now no longer want to place an order for just a smoothie but I have been blocked out of the app entirely and can‚Äôt make orders until I pick up this smoothie. Just seems senseless as I can still go in and order at the store but the app is seemingly holding me hostage. I would be ordering a smoothie anyway I just wish to add the rest of my lunch to the order. This function is dumb and there should options to chance or cancel order. Especially days later! Will likely just have to delete app.

title: [update] Pretty good. Just a few problems / comments
review:
[update]
Yay! They added an ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here‚Äù button! Makes it much faster when your GPS is being slow, and allows you to let someone else pick up the food if needed!
Because of that, I‚Äôve upped my rating to five stars.
[end update]

Ordering through this app is pretty nice!
There‚Äôs always a coupon you can use, and it saves you time when ordering.
The only problem I really have is that the UI is a bit confusing when you want to add more to your order.

One thing I‚Äôd like added would be the option to have someone pick up your order. For example, my family was coming back from a trip to my cousin‚Äôs house. They asked if I wanted anything, so I ordered though the app. But they couldn‚Äôt pick it up because the app knew I wasn‚Äôt there.

Because of this, to save gas, they are going to order the food from scratch, and till the next time I go to McDonald‚Äôs, my phone‚Äôs GPS will be running. I could also just go to McDonald‚Äôs when they arrive, but then I‚Äôd have two orders worth of food.

Another thing they could add is to have the option to cancel an order. That way if something like this were to happen, someone else won‚Äôt be out some money till they can visit the restaurant again.

title: Stores don‚Äôt service mobile app orders
review:
I have given this app a few tries at different locations. Each time I am stuck waiting curbside outside a closed dining room. Each time either the employees are unaware of a mobile app order or have deprioritized it for the customers in the drive through. Each time it had taken more than 20 minutes to get my order and manual intervention on my part. What is the purpose of a mobile app curbside mobile ordering system if it is Not convenient  Requires manual intervention Not part of the restaurant‚Äôs normal practices Not part of the employee‚Äôs training I will not be using this mobile app. And will reconsider trips to McDonald‚Äôs even though my kids like the food. Fix your system.

UPDATE: the app developer has requested feedback using that link. That was actually the first thing I did. No response. 

In fact this is part of the problem. There is no way recourse to a bad order. You can‚Äôt get a refund from the app developer. Unless you complain in person (remember dining rooms are closed so you can only speak to someone on the drive thru) you are unlikely to get a refund from the franchise/restaurant. 

I called the app help line once. The service rep agreed it was a bad situation and approved a refund. But she couldn‚Äôt do it there. She said someone would be in contact in a couple days. If you miss that call or don‚Äôt answer strange numbers you‚Äôve lost your chance at a refund. 

There‚Äôs no accountability.
developerResponse: {'id': 24986385, 'body': "This isn't what we want for our customers! Let's discuss this further at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-09-08T22:48:02Z'}

title: I just wanted to skip the line. Why must you make it so invasive?
review:
First off, the app requires that you share your precise location - it won‚Äôt accept approximate locations, for some reason McDonald‚Äôs needs to know exactly where you are. Oh wait, they don‚Äôt need to know where I am or how I travel to get to the restaurant - they only need to know when I order and when I arrive, which I could tell them via any competent app.

After sharing my precise location, I was then trapped in a McDonald‚Äôs rewards offer that you couldn‚Äôt decline - like, you have to sign up for their program in order to order food. I don‚Äôt need another 7 emails in my inbox per week. 

McDonald‚Äôs, I don‚Äôt want to be in your rewards program or allow you to track my every step. I simply wanted the ability to order burgers ahead of time. I didn‚Äôt realize you needed to track me and enroll me in your email campaigns to make that happen, McDonalds the burger restaurant. No thanks. How on earth is Taco Bell doing a better job with their app than you?

title: Some problems
review:
I was hesitant to get app as I don‚Äôt really need it. But I liked Travis Scott special. But was told only way to get it was to use app. So I loaded app and orders Travis Scott special and paid for it with Apple Pay. When I got to my local McDonald‚Äôs I told them I was there and got message saying order being prepped but when o went to drive thru they said they could not find order. They asked me to wait. So I came into store. I was asked to try again. I did and now it showed me purchasing two orders. Again I have the store order number and they said they could not process it. I ended up buying it one more time without the app and on my own card. So I‚Äôm out  12+ dollars and I got nothing.  Don‚Äôt pay ahead and just wait to see if they can process it. I contacted online help and provided details and gave phone and email and 24 hours later I have still not heard anything from
mcDonalds. My advice. Assume it won‚Äôt work and never pay ahead. Use it for a discount and then wait to see if they can process it correctly at the store before you pay!!!

title: Mobile Order and Check-in
review: I‚Äôve used this app twice and have had an issue both times. The first time I ordered breakfast and submitted my prefer prior to 10:30am but by the time I got to the restaurant right at 10:30, I was told my order could not be placed because it was after breakfast, yet the app. The second issue I had was with the check-in process. Again, I placed the order using Mobile App and had my son pick up the order however, the app said they could not fill my order because my phone locator showed that I was not at the location. When I contacted the store, they informed me that my order was not on the screen because my phone wasn‚Äôt physically at the location even though my son was. They then instructed me to select ‚Äúpickup at counter‚Äù which I could not find on any of the screens. This is a great inconvenience as I‚Äôm not always around to physically pick up the order. Would be nice if you could find a work around for this...plenty of other restaurants have.

title: Cant have someone else pick up mobile order
review:
It‚Äôs really annoying to me that I can‚Äôt place a mobile order on the app, and have someone pick it up for me. Because the app physically tracks my location of when I get to the restaurant. I tried turning my location off and that didn‚Äôt solve it. So I just wasted someone‚Äôs time asking them to go pick up my order, and when they got there, the order could not be found because I was not there with my phone. I pressed ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù when the person got there to pick up the order. But the app kept saying it looks like you haven‚Äôt made it to the restaurant yet. Even when I turned off location access. 

Also, I‚Äôve had several instances where I‚Äôve picked up a mobile order. And then the next time I go to order, it shows up as if I haven‚Äôt picked up my previous order and they‚Äôre still waiting for me to pick it up.
developerResponse: {'id': 21338891, 'body': "That's not awesome to hear. Let's get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-02-27T18:00:06Z'}

title: SCAM
review: They definitely try to scam you, there is a question that says ‚ÄúWhat if you order something that is unavailable‚Äù and  McDonald‚Äôs says ‚Äúit will tell you if it‚Äôs unavailable before you ordered. THAT WASNT THE QUESTION !!! They rarely tell you when things are unavailable on the app, and once you order it there‚Äôs no way to cancel it, so you go to McDonald‚Äôs find out the ice cream machine is down & McDonald‚Äôs expect you to just take the loss? My bank has disputed over 20 McDonalds charges, and they don‚Äôt give the workers the option to cancel your order either when it‚Äôs curbside. And I‚Äôm willing to bet most people will not wait until their bank processes the McDonald‚Äôs order just to get on and dispute something under $10 and McDonald‚Äôs knows this. So that $3 $4 $5 $7 dollars continues to adds up for you, and how many people does it happen to a day? It‚Äôs ridiculous they don‚Äôt have a way to  cancel an order, or talk to someone, or dispute something on the APP.

title: Bad first experience
review: Had to download the app to be able to order and pay in advance. My daughter was grabbing the pick up order on her way home from practice for my 7 year olds b day dinner (McDonald‚Äôs is his fave) she showed up and they canceled the order because she didn‚Äôt have my phone with her. I called the store and Rosie the manager claimed they could NOT release the food to her without my phone being there. She came all the way home for my phone only to find out the order had canceled (not my doing) and they had no idea what food we ordered. Rosie claimed they are a franchise and couldn‚Äôt accommodate us because they do lot partner with the app. It‚Äôs extremely inconvenient that in 2021 McDonald‚Äôs cannot simply allow their customers to order ahead for a simple pick up order without having the orderers phone on site. It‚Äôs also sad that to be such a booming company they can‚Äôt train Rosie to be kind to a frustrated customer who is just trying to get her son his happy meal that he wanted for his birthday ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Frustrating and Inconvenient
review: I decided to try the app to help my daughter. Between work, family, and various other obligations, she gets less than 30 minutes for lunch most days. I thought this might be a good way to help her out, as waiting in a drive thru line can sometimes take a while, but your app takes complications to new and staggering heights. I realize that not all offers are going to be available in all areas, not will prices be the same from city to city. But this business of requiring the person picking up the order to have the phone from which the order is placed, is ridiculous. I live in a nearby town, she is about 20 minutes away. If she doesn‚Äôt have time to sit in a drive thru line, she isn‚Äôt going to have time to drive to my house, get my phone, get her food, bring my phone back, eat, and get back to work. I realize you made this requirement in an effort to solve or prevent some sort of issue, but in my opinion you missed the boat completely.
developerResponse: {'id': 19559585, 'body': "Heya, Nat!  We're always working on an even better App that you enjoy using. Thanks for helping us out.", 'modified': '2020-12-05T16:50:10Z'}

title: Aggressive Technology!
review:
My wife is a teacher, and she asked me to order McDonald‚Äôs for her class holiday party.I loaded this app because I thought it would be easy.  It was not.   Had to jump all over between categories, and there was a 20 item order limit including condiments.  Because of this, I did not get to order everything I wanted, and had to limit packets of catsup to get under the 20 item limit.  So dumb.   

Deals?  I souls not add the deals of the day to my shopping ‚Äúbag‚Äù, because they required an in-store scan.  How does that even make sense?  Is it a deal that is offered or not?  If it is offered, why can‚Äôt it simply be added?  Maybe could not have added anyway because I was over the 20 item limit and would have had to figure out some way to delete one packet of catsup.

This app does match the new McDonald‚Äôs branding, including the blinding blue light order boards and impersonal contact. So congratulations to the marketing team.  But the whole McDonald‚Äôs experience is really starting to be terrible.

title: Easier to go through drive thru
review: I thought the whole point of an app like this was to make things easier and maybe even faster for the user. Not the case with this one. I downloaded it and used it for the first time the other night, thinking great, I‚Äôm right next door getting gas what could be easier than ordering online and skipping the line at drive thru. It was 7:54 pm and the app told me I only had until 8 to place an order. Weird, my McD‚Äôs is open til 12 but ok, maybe they stop serving the full menu at 8. I placed my order, thinking that they would start getting it ready (like every other food app I use). Nope, they won‚Äôt start preparing it until I get into one of the designated spots and tell them I‚Äôm there. Fine, tell them I‚Äôm there and oops, it‚Äôs 8:01 none of my order is available anymore. Went through the drive through and ordered the exact same stuff plus a side of Mac sauce (which the app doesn‚Äôt let you do). This app is useless.

Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-08-21T15:49:23Z'}

title: FIX IT.
review: This app is absolutely ignorant. I just ordered food through the drive thru & wanted to use one of the deals. It was ‚ÄúBuy a Big Mac, 10 piece McNuggets, QP with cheese, or a fish filet & get one FREE‚Äù so I ordered a Big Mac & a 10 piece McNuggets. I get to the window & click on the deal to use it & it says ‚ÄúYou can only use 1 deal per visit. Please wait 17 minutes to use another deal‚Äù. Ummm, what? I didn‚Äôt use any other deal! I just got to McDonald‚Äôs to order food in the drive thru. I ask the kid at the pay window & he says ‚Äúyou already have that deal on here‚Äù. He repeats the order to me & says that I‚Äôm getting the second item for a dollar. I showed him the deal & how it said the second item is free but it‚Äôs not working. He says ‚ÄúOh, uhhh I don‚Äôt know‚Äù. Oh okay. Well maybe use your customer service skills & call your manager who MAYBE knows how to help out however that seemed to be too much for him to do so I told him just cancel the order. He goes ‚Äúokay great!‚Äù. Fix your app & teach your employees a few customer service skills. I promise it‚Äôll help your business! DO BETTER MCDONALD‚ÄôS!!!
