title: Beware of the app. Nobody will take responsibility for mistakes
review:
Today I placed an order that somehow got doubled. Instead of 2 meals I got 4. At the store the manager said ‚Äú I am sorry ‚Äúmama‚Äù but there‚Äôs nothing I can do. You will have to call them‚Äù. When I asked for a bomber she said she didn‚Äôt have it and walked away. Then since I would not leave she got another person to come and sit there, browsing through the app for over 10 min. while my food sat there getting cold. I was finally the one to find the number and show them where it was.  After 25 min of getting my food I finally left while I was on hold with the app people. Finally after 13 min on hold, the person on the phone told me there was nothing they could do. That if the manager could not do anything, they could not do anything either. They advised me to call my bank and dispute the charge. 

And let‚Äôs not get into using ‚Äúdeals‚Äù I have yet to be able to use a deal. Three times now, when I have tried to use a deal it says it‚Äôs not available. If that‚Äôs the case, why is it eve there! üò°

title: Fix the glitches please
review:
Two days in a row my payment was declined at the window after placing an online order. I place a mobile order at least 5 times a week (coffee for breakfast on the way to work) and never have an issue. 
So, I paid at the window with the exact same card that was declined in the app. It makes NO sense and it takes time out of my commute and holds everyone up behind me in line. 
The other issue is that on the weekends my kids like to enjoy a breakfast sandwich from here, but I can‚Äôt order anything from the ‚ÄúALL DAY BREAKFAST‚Äù menu if it‚Äôs after ‚Äúbreakfast time‚Äù. It makes no sense. I just want a couple of sausage McMuffins. They are available ALL day but I can‚Äôt order them on the app. I hate having to do multiple orders. It holds up the line for other people and quite frankly it confuses the poor employees. Then they end up screwing up both orders because they‚Äôre so confused. Not fun and the people in line behind me get extra irritated (not my responsibility to keep them happy but I still don‚Äôt want people to be inconvenienced).
developerResponse: {'id': 16459802, 'body': "Hey there, Valerie! We're sorry you're having difficulties with your payment. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can assist you with this issue.", 'modified': '2020-07-07T12:18:13Z'}

title: Love the concept!
review: I have read so many reviews not liking how you can‚Äôt technically order until you are within a few feet of the restaurant, however, I totally understand it, and still find this app useful. It eliminates not being able to see the menu until your in front of the speaker, so it takes less time for all those in line. I can sit and play on my phone instead of in a stop and go line, as sometimes there can be a long wait at the drive thru. I have never had an issue with my orders, and I have ordered from at least 3 different locations so far. Earning points is also a perk! :) Also, if one were to order McDonalds much earlier than a few minutes anyway, it wouldn‚Äôt be hot the way, say, a pizza would be..? I‚Äôm lovin‚Äô it! üòÇ

title: Issues when picking up
review: I‚Äôve been stopped twice now by employees thinking that I have not paid based off of their system.  The last time I was stopped the employee yelled across the dining room after I received my food already ‚ÄúHeyyy, you didn‚Äôt pay yet!  You need to come over here.‚Äù  How embarrassing is that?  When I‚Äôve already been charged and I have to stand at the register showing my transaction on my phone to the employee at the register, then the manager and several other employees attempting to help.  Holding up the line just so they can say ‚ÄúOh okay you‚Äôre fine.‚Äù  I‚Äôm not sure how they could give me my food and then say I haven‚Äôt paid...I‚Äôve always been charged as soon as I put down where I‚Äôm picking it up (drive thru/in-store).  Maybe some more training for the employees would be helpful.

title: I do like the app but it needs one improvement to 5star it
review:
I do like the app but it needs one improvement to 5star it‚Ä¶.
The favorite folder should be on the main screen somewhere. Not in a sub folder. The orders and then favorites. I do order quite often and at times it‚Äôs annoying to find what I‚Äôm looking for. But if I favorited the items I could simply click a button and see all my favorites and click away and my order would be done even faster and easier! 

I love the deals and love the no touch payments. 
It just needs a touch of the users personal options to set it to a 5 star all day long. If you update the app please add that favorites to main screen. Maybe even like a favorite order. Chick-fil-A has that favorite meals at the main screen which is so nice when in a rush and ordering for whole family

title: Most confusing APP I‚Äôve ever tried to use
review:
Upon downloading it refused to save my credit card.  After several tries over several days,  I found some online comments saying you had to wait ‚Äú2 weeks‚Äù before it would accept a credit card.  2 weeks from what?  I waited a week, and it finally accepted my credit card.

When I place an order, I expect to see something like ‚ÄúOrder placed‚Äù.  I must be missing that.  Instead I see a window telling me to go to the store and the press ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here‚Äù.  Has the order been placed at that point? Hard to tell.

After 2 days of placing an order successfully, yesterday the app gave me some confusing messages while trying to place the order, but I was able to pick up the order.  Today the app told me that yesterday‚Äôs order was not complete.  Huh?  Seeing no way to cancel the order, I placed it again, and I got the window telling me to go to the store.  When I got there, I pressed the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here‚Äù button, then gave my order number at the drive through window.  They didn‚Äôt have my order.  They asked me if I was using ‚Äúrewards‚Äù?  (Why would that make a difference?)   I told him ‚Äúbeats me - I‚Äôm still trying to figure out the app‚Äù.  He chuckled and said ‚Äúso are we‚Äù.  So, I placed my order and paid for it the old-fashioned way.

I understand that apps like this are complicated pieces of programming, but beyond the dazzle, the user interface is the most important part.

title: Not working properly
review: The app is great except two problems. They need to allow a specific restaurant to turn off certain features if not available at that time. I always order pick up in store and this is not the first time that the inside is not open due to not having enough employees available. This is understandable but the feature needs to not be available. The store I go to always has an extremely long line and I don‚Äôt like to wait in it. I have no problem going in to grab my food. My last issue is that you if something does happen where I need to cancel my order, the app does not give me the option anywhere. I had to go and sit almost 15 min in line because there was no cancel order option. This was after calling and finally getting an answer after the 4th time calling and telling me I have to cancel in my own.
developerResponse: {'id': 28984532, 'body': "we're always looking for ways to improve the app, Tiff. let's talk about this and any other concern via the link: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-04-05T19:02:19Z'}

title: Usability
review: Out of all the fast food apps I have used, McDonald‚Äôs is by far the most difficult. It‚Äôs not user-friendly, it‚Äôs hard to navigate. I had to search for menu items versus just clicking on main menu to create an order. We‚Äôve actually avoided using the app when placing an order because you have to have the phone at the McDonald‚Äôs for it to charge and then we were charged multiple times because it had charge and the restaurant couldn‚Äôt see that on there system. The only reason why I have the app is so that I can get dollar large fries. I have so many points to use because you can only redeem one thing at a time. So I can‚Äôt use multiple deals at the same time. I haven‚Äôt encountered that on any other fast food app. For customizing a hamburger I would suggest having the checkbox for plain at the top so that I don‚Äôt have to click no ketchup no mustard no onions before even getting to the option of plain.

title: app continually crashes
review:
for the last month ive been missing out in deals because my app just won't launch, and it crashes as soon as it opens. now it won't even open it immediately kicks me off. yes i have it updated, yes i've uninstalled and reinstalled and shut my phone off and on again, i don't wanna hear it. it's pretty f**cked. i'm very upset. also just got a new phone yesterday, so it wasn't even just that device. so i really don't know what's going on but i'd love to be able to use the app again. thanks.

UPDATE: app doesn't crash anymore but I HAVENT BEEN ABLE TO LOG IN FOR MONTHS!! i literally lose so much money going to mcdonald's now because im missing out on deals i used to depend on! i cant even use the app to do online orders, it just doesn't let me log in, it says "we're experiencing technical difficulties rn" like for 6 months mfs??? please get it the f fixed im so tired of this and no one can answer me any questions, on the phone or at any stores! i want my coupons! this shouldn't be that hard!

title: Disappointed
review: This app is weak at best, considering that 2 out of the 4 people i was with were not able to utilize its functions. Not only did the cashier not find the two orders on the computers, but they were forced to ignore the orders that were just completed on the app and just order normally at the speaker. That was a frustrating experience for all of us since we spent 20-30 minutes going through the drivethru, trying to figure out why our orders were lost in the online ordering database, and dealing with employees who were just as confused. The codes given to us to confirm our orders were basically tossed out as well. My personal recommendation is to ditch the app and order through the drivethru. Because even though 2 out of the 4 orders were not discarded, it still took way longer for the other 2 orders than it would if you simply just ordered at the drivethru. I thought trying the app might accelerate the ordering process, or at least make things easier, but I am disappointed to say that my experience was the opposite.

title: Mobile App
review: I have used the mobile app previously to order well on my way to work to another city and when I get there my food is ready. Today I placed an order and sent my grandma to pick up food for the kids since I just had surgery thought this would make it easier for her. I sent her with the order #. On the app I got the use your app when you arrive to select pick up options. It didn‚Äôt let me because it says I am not there. Well obviously I can‚Äôt be there. I called the McDonald‚Äôs and they said they don‚Äôt even have my order on there screen. So what is the purpose of the app if 1 i can‚Äôt select I‚Äôm there and 2 You still have to wait when you arrive for your food to be made. I‚Äôve never had to select when I‚Äôm there I just select the time I‚Äôm expected to be there for my food.

title: No coffee rewards card
review: I have had this app for at least a couple years. When they revamped it, my coffee punch card deleted and it now says cafe rewards not available.  My dad has it on his though.  I've not been able to use a reward card for way over a year, maybe two. I've done everything imaginable... deleted, reinstalled, closed app account and opened a new one from my computer, called customer service, contacted app support, emailed, you name it.  Instead of fixing existing problems, they now launch mobile ordering, which appears to have issues as well.  Why would a company this size not look at their app ratings and reviews and work on old problems making it the best app possible, rather than just adding more jacked up features?? Doesn't make sense... are there two year olds running the IT area??? Do the executives not know about this?  So, I take my $5 coffee purchase I make daily elsewhere... add that up over a year!! ;-). A lot of money lost by the company when I'm sure there are others with the same issue.

title: Information vacuum
review:
Why do you need so much info from my phone? Why do you need to track me across apps? Why do you need my precise location, or my location at all? Chill out with all the information gathering. You don‚Äôt need any of this to make a burger.
Update: They responded with a non-answer about location based ‚Äúdeals,‚Äù acknowledging that they have no reason to collect so much information. 
What are you doing with all that information McDonalds? Are you selling it? Is being the most successful burger stand ever not enough? Are times so hard you need to be a aggregator of peoples personal information? You can‚Äôt be trusted to keep ice cream machines running and yet you think you‚Äôre qualified to hold onto the data of millions of people.
I know McDonalds or really any corporation couldn‚Äôt care less about one person no longer giving them money, but hopefully at least one other person reads this and doesn‚Äôt download your incredibly invasive app and chooses not to give you money either.
developerResponse: {'id': 32601186, 'body': 'we need to know your location, so we can make sure to give you the best deals that are actually available in your area, since prices and participation may vary by location.', 'modified': '2022-10-17T08:52:10Z'}

title: Can you change the GPS requirement?
review: I place orders for my kids and sometimes they aren‚Äôt able to pick them up because MY phone has to be there at McDonald‚Äôs? Or what if sprints internet is bad and it won‚Äôt update my location? Can‚Äôt use mobile order then either? Every other app has an option to override that and report that you are at location through the app. I know y‚Äôall don‚Äôt make the food before I get there anyway. I still have to wait 10 minutes in the curbside spot after I complete the order in the app. Y‚Äôall act like you can‚Äôt just look up and complete the order with the order # & receipt. My son had to come home one time and get my phone to take up there. Chick-fil-A has an option to override, say you‚Äôre there & enter the curbside spot #.  I‚Äôm paying for it, I can send whoever I want up there to get it. You don‚Äôt NEED my phone to be there too.

title: McApp
review: The App is ok but the people who put the daily deals in make mistakes regularly and the people at the store say sorry we can‚Äôt help. Contact the app people. Example: An hour ago I opened the app and found a deal for a free medium McCafe with any purchase. I go to the location order dinner and a medium McCafe. They scan the app and their computer won‚Äôt accept the deal. A message comes up that says the deal is good July to November. It‚Äôs not. It‚Äôs a new deal good today. Next, you are forced while in the drive thru to either pay full price or try to get out of the drive thru. Aggravated, I went home without dinner or a medium McCafe to contact corporate. I called and they are closed to customer service. I can still spend money at McDonald‚Äôs but customer service is not available. Really? An hour later no food, no drink, and no service. If you have a lot of time to waste and love aggravation use this app.

title: I‚Äôm not loving it
review:
I can‚Äôt use this app since it never has the options available that you can get driving through. I get a double quarter pounder with cheese, remove ketchup and mustard and add Mac sauce. I do this because I like the fresh patties better, I don‚Äôt want the extra bun or the lettuce of a Big Mac. In person or at a drive through they don‚Äôt even question it, I get it exactly spot on in both the US and Canada. I can‚Äôt add Mac sauce in the app at all, not even on the side in a packet, and yes I‚Äôm fine with the up charge, but it‚Äôs not there at all.
It also never picks the closest location either. I can be sitting outside one in my car and it chooses the one up the highway. I‚Äôve messaged McDonalds about adding more options, including Mac sauce and maybe a way to tell if the ice cream machine is working (which it never is) and I got a message back that basically adding the Mac sauce is too complicated, they are not looking at adding more options at this time. Fail when I can basically get anything via an app.

title: Coulda been 5 stars
review:
A month ago I would‚Äôve given this app 5 stars but recently it‚Äôs been having a lot of problems. I don‚Äôt go to McDonalds a lot but have been going more than usual because of the app coupons (I‚Äôm a sucker for a deal). I‚Äôve beeb using the MCD app a few months now without problem until the past couple weeks. Now every item says ‚Äúthis product is not available at this location‚Äù. Not just one item, 2 items or only coupon items, pretty much 90% of the items say they aren‚Äôt available after I add them to my cart. 

I just tested out 10 random items  and 7 of them say unavailable. The only 3 it let me add was a large Dr Pepper, yogurt parfait and unsweetened tea. The coupons in the app are the only incentive I have to make me want McDonalds, if I can‚Äôt use them I guess I won‚Äôt eat there.

title: It used to be better...
review:
As noted in several other reviews, the deals used to be better and more variety in the options. Now there are only a few deals (3 at the moment) 1 only during breakfast deal and 2 lunch / dinner deals that are really of no interest.

I also continue to have the challenge of the cart not getting cleared out after an order is processed. I have go in and clear it all out before I can place another, sometimes from days earlier. 

This wouldn‚Äôt be so bad, except I also just discovered that an order placed through the app cost was costing me more than ordering in person.

I was in line in the drive thru and it was slow and I didn‚Äôt feel like having the person get my order wrong, so I fired up the app and started getting my order together and was on the order screen. The line start started moving and I was next to order and I didn‚Äôt want to risk paying for the order but them not having it yet (another story), so I just ordered over the speaker. The order on the app was about 7% (.25) higher than I paid at the window. 

I have been QUITE disenchanted with the app since then. 

No real useful deals, and paying more for the food. 

The only real benefit becomes not having to repeat yourself 5 times when there is a diesel truck in front of you.

Overall it‚Äôs been feeling a bit like a bait and switch...

title: Needs a TON of improvement
review: I had the same issue like many others today. First time using app, ordered at home, don‚Äôt really understand the point of ordering ahead if they don‚Äôt have it ready when you get there, but okay. Pulled in and checked in, when I entered my curbside parking spot number, it stated there was a bad internet connection on the app itself, there wasn‚Äôt. Clicked submit again, this time got a message stating one or more of my items in my order was not available, clicked link it provided to review, nothing was missing so clicked Finalize and pay. Received same error message about internet connection. Clicked submit again, this time it went through and received confirmation. After I got home received two separate emails with same order placed 3 seconds apart and was charged twice. Really glitchy app, definitely need to fix this as it sounds like I‚Äôm not the only one losing money. Thanks for taking an extra almost $17. Will NEVER use this app again, would have been much easier to use the drive-thru.

title: Deal issues
review:
The deals are great bet every so often for whatever reason even after I pay and complete my mobile order it shows as incomplete and depending on the time of day for example if I order a breakfast item and this issue happens I cannot use a deal because it‚Äôs ‚Äúunavailable during lunch/ breakfast hours‚Äù and prompts you to remove said item BUT if you try to click to remove item it won‚Äôt let you click on remove item because it‚Äôs not the correct time( lunch/breakfast) so you can‚Äôt use a deal until you are within the hours to remove those items, and if you forget to remove it the next day you have wait another day if you miss timing ‚ò†Ô∏è

TLDR: if you have breakfast items left in your cart and it‚Äôs not breakfast you won‚Äôt be able to use deals for that day üôÉ

title: McDonald‚Äôs, you just lost a customer
review:
I went to my local McDonald‚Äôs and decided to order through this app, WRONG! When I got there on my skateboard I couldn't complete the order because I could not past, ‚ÄùHmm... it doesn't look like you are there yet‚Äù even though I was physically there already. After 15 minutes of troubleshooting (closing the app and reopen it several times until my order goes through) my order finally went through. As I was looking at the restaurant's screen, I realized my order was not there. I looked at the order details and it showed my order was not being made at the McDonald‚Äôs restaurant I was in, but at a DIFFERENT restaurant. I couldn't complete my order for 15 minutes because according to the app, ‚ÄùI was not there yet‚Äù but when my order went through, it SENT my order to a restaurant I WAS NOT IN. What an irony.  I ended up skateboarding for 30 minutes to the other McDonald‚Äôs restaurant to get my order. 
I don't think I'll be a McDonald's customer after this.

title: Not great
review: I‚Äôve been using the McDonald‚Äôs app pretty frequently the past few weeks and while it‚Äôs better than ordering normally there‚Äôs still a lot to improve. Just today I ordered one of the daily deals and a 10 count nugget meal. However my phone locked and when I opened up the app again my order was gone and i couldn‚Äôt use any deals for the next hour. May be just user error but I feel like this would be a common thing to lock your phone when you‚Äôre done ordering and drive to the McDonald‚Äôs. Next, the app compared to other fast food restaurants apps ranks very low in my opinion. The UI isn‚Äôt great and it‚Äôs very clunky at times. If I weren‚Äôt already used to other apps  I could see myself getting very confused on how to use the app as a whole. That being said, the daily deals and points system are alright and I‚Äôm going to continue using it.

title: App has been broken for several months
review:
I have an iPhone 12 Pro Max and for the past several months I have been getting an ‚Äúapplication initialization error‚Äù and am unable to sign in to my account. I have contacted McDonald‚Äôs on multiple occasions but they have yet to reach out to me with a response or an update to the app. Based off some other reviews, people have been having the same error. Super unfortunate because I like McDonald‚Äôs products, but this app error prevents me from ordering how I would like to and using their deals. 

Update: After installing the McDonald‚Äôs app update 6.14.0, the app no longer opens and instantly crashes.

Update 2: After installing update 6.14.1, the app works perfectly again! I have changed my rating to 5 stars

title: Your app literally can‚Äôt tell time
review: Every time I open the stupid app it‚Äôs breakfast time at my nearby McDonald‚Äôs. Only, it‚Äôs absolutely not breakfast time. It‚Äôs not even close. For instance, It‚Äôs 12:08 AM right now. Which is approximately four hours and 52 minutes before breakfast time. But don‚Äôt tell that to your app, because it doesn‚Äôt wanna hear it. It‚Äôs breakfast time. So what I could do is order breakfast. Then, when I get there, they‚Äôll tell me it‚Äôs not breakfast and look at me like an idiot. I‚Äôll say ‚Äúyes it is.‚Äù They‚Äôll say ‚Äúwho told you that?‚Äù And I will say ‚Äúyou did.‚Äù And their eye will start twitching. My nose will begin to bleed. Then I will say ‚Äúhave a good morning‚Äù and I‚Äôll drive across the street to Taco Bell and promise myself that I‚Äôll never ‚Äúgive your app another try‚Äù again. I like your food. I like the deals. I would like to buy your food using the deals the app provides. Super simple stuff. Pull your ******* heads out of your ******* ***** and figure out how to teach your app to tell time. You ******* *****.

title: Not actually ordering ahead
review: So I got this app in the hopes that I could order ahead and just pick up when I get here. It turns out you can‚Äôt actually order ahead. The app will not allow you actually place your order until you are within a certain range of the building. What the heck? What is the purpose of being able to order ahead, if the order it‚Äôs self is not processed until you‚Äôre in the parking lot and in a spot. Literally any other restaurant/fast food joint you can place an order, and by the time you get to said place your food is ready and waiting. All you need to do is tell them what spot you‚Äôre in. Except McDonalds. To top it off, customization isn‚Äôt the greatest either. It‚Äôs not to the level that some other establishments have. All in all very disappointing, not sure that I‚Äôll use this again unless I‚Äôve got 10+ minutes to spare and wait for food to be made and brought out.

title: May as well stick to Drive-Thru
review: This app is pointless other than to remind you of ‚Äúdaily deals.‚Äù Even if you place a mobile order it won‚Äôt accept your order until you‚Äôre within a certain radius of the restaurant. This means that your food will not be ready ahead of time and you will still have to wait. The digital coupons being used within the app will not be added to any mobile orders and they will not scan them at the restaurant if you are doing a pick-up. The app told me that my card would not be charged until I reached the restaurant in case I had coupons or offers which was not the case and my card was charged immediately as soon as the order was submitted. I rejected our $19 order and sent the food back since they were not willing to accept the digital coupon for a BOGO Happy Meal or offer any resolution or compromise. I was told the charge would fall off my debit card within the next 24 hours and it did not. The bank still processed the transaction. I will not be using the app again.

title: I have used it a few times
review:
I have used this app a few times but I was going to put another order through and I really concentrated on my prices because money was tight now. Well I seen the prices were 20 to 30 cents higher on a lot of items than going through the actual drive through at our McDonald‚Äôs in our small town!!!  Now when I go through the drive through I a lot of time sit over on a curb to wait on my food well I‚Äôm doing the same thing when I pull in a spot they have you wait for your food. 
So why is it that I pay more money to wait in there spot than I do if I go through the actual drive through!!! This makes no sense. So on that note I would not recommend this app but I see the prices are the same and they put their actual fees for their app then I might change my review. Right now I would say watch your prices on your app or anything like this again. I will be removing my app because of this because if they are going a fee then just put it on the end of the order and state that!!

title: Beware of multiple charges with buggy app
review: The app decided to randomly tell me my payment method was not accepted while completing an order after using the app for months without problem. I assumed it was a glitch and tried to pay again. Same thing, not accepted, couldn‚Äôt complete it. I closed and reopened the app and tried one last time. Same thing. So, I cancelled the order and sat there trying to Google what the problem was. While sitting there, a McDonald‚Äôs worker came to my window and asked if I‚Äôd meant to order the same meal three times. I was confused because according to the app I hadn‚Äôt completed any orders at all. I checked my bank account and sure enough I was charged three times. Thank goodness I didn‚Äôt try any more times to pay then that. I went ahead and said I‚Äôd take my meal since it went through, and the manager took my card to refund the two extra orders. So far, the money has not been credited back to me. I will not be using or trusting this app again. You should be able to know if an app has charged you or not.

title: Why can‚Äôt I report an incorrect order easily?
review:
I *just* got the food. I should be able to select that order and submit a pic of what they gave me. Instead it is completely burried and finding restaurant feedback button is not easy. You find it and you have to select the location. Then you can order at that location because the unwind is incorrect so it takes you to the wrong spot. So I gave up. Food in trash. Won‚Äôt even ask for the $5 back. 

Who designed this thing? Do users actually want to spend tons of time and energy on points and rewards and deals? Enough to devote entire tabs to them? Or do they just want to order food and receive the food they ordered? Do one thing and do it well. This is a fail. Careers? Your product owner and UX team needs to be checking that out but the rest of the world looks elsewhere for careers. Not in a McDonald‚Äôs app. It should do one thing. One. Right. Not a bunch badly.

title: Great concept, very poor application
review: I love the idea and convenience of mobile ordering but in my experience, over half of the time this app simply does not work. Everything will load fine, I will apply a deal, pay, and check out for mobile pick up but then I will sit outside McDonals for 30-45 minutes (or more) waiting for my order just to finally get frustrated and go in anyway to ask what‚Äôs up. When I do, I get told the mobile order was never received to the store in the first place (despite my card being charged) and there is nothing the store can do but re-place my order and let me fight the bank on the first mobile charge. This is very frustrating and honestly a waste of time. I‚Äôve done software updates on a new model iPhone and uninstalled and re-installed the app, yet I‚Äôve still gone to several different stores and had the same problem. Sometimes it works, usually it doesn‚Äôt. Sad to say, but this  is a complete waste of time and money.

title: Worst fast food app yet
review: Breakfast starts at 5:30 yet cannot be ordered until 6. Orders cannot be placed and paid for ahead of time to avoid driving across town for absolutely nothing. Prices and times are all incorrect. Biscuit with cheese costs more than biscuit with meat. Every time I use app to order, my meal takes 4x longer to prepare (and that‚Äôs if I‚Äôm LUCKY). App forces you to use location AND email app, AND forces you to have an account to order. I hate using apps, especially the email app because it is always FAILING, and I HATE HAVING MY LOCATION ON. I ONLY TURN IT ON FOR MCDONALD‚Äôs AND SHUT IT OFF IMMEDIATELY AFTERWARDS AND THEN I INSTANTLY DELETE THE APP AGAIN. No other app forces allocation of privacy during ENTIRE USE and will not allow coupons without it. Complete and total waste and joke. App shuts down if you do not allow complete invasion of privacy. McDonald‚Äôs should have at least 100K people together on a class action lawsuit by now. No salads, dirty kitchens, slow food. The McDonald‚Äôs I used to work for is NOT THE MCDONALD‚ÄôS THAT EXISTS TODAY!!!!

title: Not as expected but ok!
review: Using the app to order ahead of time is genius! The issue I have with this is that if you do order something and when you arrive to the store they don‚Äôt have it, the store refuses to refund you and tells you to call customer service. When you call customer service you‚Äôre on hold for a very long time which means you‚Äôll probably have to call later in the day when you actually have the time. Ideally, the store should be able to refund you right there and in the moment if they cannot fulfill your order. Also, it would be great if the app is updated every time a specific store does not have what your trying to order before you complete your order. This happened twice already and I just started using this app about two weeks ago.

title: Complaint
review: I‚Äôve tried this plenty of time. This last time I ordered off here was a hassle. Then when I get to the window they didn‚Äôt have my order in the system, so I kept trying and still nothing came up. So the guy said they can refund it and I can order with them at the window. So I just ordered at the window and asked if they excepted Apple Pay which they did. But when I tried Apple Pay it the card reader error. Still nothing. So I had to zelle my little brother and ended up paying with his card. My thing is that I would have never been at that window for 10-12 mins if that curbside bs not only that they didn‚Äôt know what the hell to do. They told me go back in line and try again. Which was 4-6 cars behind me.

title: Waste time
review: Very bad. I havent have Macdonald For a while and want to have Big Mac suddenly. So I download this app and used as my first time. Ok free fries that is great. So I placed my order and drive to the restaurant happily until I saw the destination of mine is closed. Ok, why the restaurant closed and I can successfully place my order and I can only know that until I driver there. Hmm it must be my fault I am thinking. So I placed the order again and drive another restaurant again. This time the restaurant is opened but so many people there? 50 cars is in the queue for driving through due to a power outage nearby. Then I selected pick up in the restaurant and this app give me answer that order has issue and I must go to restaurant and show my number. I did it but the restaurant is not opened at all! Who should I talked to? I don't want to jump into the 50 car queue so I drove back. When I back home I surprised see that my money was deducted from this app! It told me the order has issue and now it ask me to pay for it! It must be my issue again.

title: Technical difficulties?
review:
This app is fine when it‚Äôs working. Don‚Äôt know why, but sometimes the app just doesn‚Äôt work. No app means no app deals. (Probably a blessing in disguise for my health.) Seems to particularly like glitching out on special deal days, though.

For instance, tried to use the app on national french fry day. The app would not allow me to log in because of ‚Äútechnical difficulties‚Äù and couldn‚Äôt find any local stores (yes locations was turned on). A week later, same errors. Uninstalled, restarted phone, reinstalled, still says can‚Äôt login because of TD. Even tried creating a new account with a different email address. App refused to work for several weeks.

UPDATE: Opened the app a few weeks after this review and voila...problem mysteriously resolved. On its own. Which can only mean an app glitch got fixed at some point. This kind of thing has happened before, probably will again. And again.

title: McEmployee Fails
review: This app is great and saves a lot of time. My only complaint is that a lot of the time, the employees don‚Äôt know how to handle the orders properly. For example I ordered a McDouble and a small fry. Roughly about two  dollars worth of food and the woman at the window told me that my card was declined. So I checked my bank account as this does happen sometimes, but with 500 dollars in my account, there‚Äôs no way my card was declined. She did something wrong on here end, and as a result I went hungry for lunch. It‚Äôs safe to say that this app is on its honor use for me. I‚Äôm going to give it one more chance before I delete it. Hopefully the employees don‚Äôt screw it up because in all honesty I enjoy this app when the employees operate it properly. I didn‚Äôt enjoy one of the managers spilling coke all over me when i chose curb side delivery. He did offer me extra napkins, but it definitely spelled the end of me ever using curbside pick up again.

title: Disappointed
review: I love the app because I am able to customize my order without being misheard and think about what I want without stalling the drive tru. I always pick up through drive tru without a problem until now. Recently I have been experiencing this issue where my order doesn‚Äôt appear for the drive tru cashier. After they don‚Äôt see it they tell me to change it to curbside, and then I have to wait at curbside for my order after going trough the drive tru line. I prefer going trough drive tru because every time I have chosen curbside I have experienced a problem or a long wait time. Last week I chose curbside because I knew I was going to experience this problem. I waited over 45mins for 2 happy meals and 1 coffee. I couldn‚Äôt get down for my order because the kids fell asleep while waiting and drive trough was full and I was afraid that if I moved to go through drive tru somebody was gonna come out with my order. I really hope this issues gets resolved soon.

title: Breakfast
review:
Would like it better if they would not put the butter with the hot hashbrowns in the morning Im left with greasy and unusable napkins and greasy plasticware wrappers that I can‚Äôt wipe off because the napkins are covered in melted butter . Who bright idea was that ! It happen to me almost every morning and I ask them to separate every time and sometimes it works and sometimes it don‚Äôt or they leave something out and I have to go back in to get what is missing , more than 75% of the help are Mexican and barely speak or under stand English at the 3 locations that I go to (Bethany,OK.) they‚Äôre courteous and friendly but there is a language barrier store #2634 is one of them I am courteous and friendly to them but it gets old after awhile and there are times I have to raise my voice . and ask for the manager and sometimes it seems that they don‚Äôt care

title: What A Crap Show
review:
I been using this app since 2019 and everything was great! Well, right until this stupid reward system came in and everything was train wreck after. 

Today, I was LOGGED IN and placed an order to go. Everything was great and even gave me the notification for pick up. Okay. Got to the local restaurant and tried to tap on the notification to enter my mobile order parking number and BAM! I am having glitches and app refuses to load. Okay, maybe it‚Äôs just app cache being weird so I closed it and opened it back up. Guess what? I am now LOGGED OUT. Can‚Äôt find my order, can‚Äôt enter my mobile order station number. Restaurant staff couldn‚Äôt help me. So I guess drove out here to breath air and eat dirt then. What‚Äôs the point of this app if it won‚Äôt even retain my order information on the homepage without logging me out? What a piece of junk.

What a crap show this app has been. I guess I might as well just go back and order the old fashion way. Mobile app? More like mobile crap.

title: Not a faster way to get food
review: First time using the app, I downloaded it because we were on a bit of a deadline this morning and I thought it would be faster to place the order on the app and pick it up. When I placed the order it wanted me to go to the parking lot so they could prepare my order. I wasn‚Äôt expecting that, but ok, I drive to the store and park, they tell me it should be five minute wait. This store is always very busy this time of day, and I know the employees are doing the best they can, which is why I was trying to get a head start. Ten minutes later my food arrived, so it really wasn‚Äôt any faster than going through the drive through. The app was easy to use, but I know this is not the way to go if I‚Äôm trying to save some time. Pay your employees a living wage McDonalds, they deserve it.

title: Good app but room for improvement
review: As many have said, I, too, have been coming to McDonald‚Äôs more often than before because of the great deals/coupons available on the app. I have also experienced the inability to connect a few times when at McDonald‚Äôs but not in the last month or so. I‚Äôm assuming one of the updates fixed that. The one thing that could be improved is the customization options. While for most things, the choices and ability to change something is great but there is one flaw concerning the breakfast sandwiches. If ordering any breakfast sandwich at a store, a round egg can be subbed for the folded egg for free. I have not been able to do this on the app. Even when the folded egg is ‚Äúremoved‚Äù, the app wants to charge $1.80 for adding the round egg. Please fix this. Thanks!

title: Many, many flaws
review: My debit card expired. I received a new card - same number just different expiration date. I haven‚Äôt found a way to delete the expired card, nor am I able to add a new card. I have to order on the app and complete the order at the register. Also, oftentimes I receive errors when trying to order an item and the McCafe deal doesn‚Äôt seem to update. I‚Äôve probably purchased enough drinks to qualify for two free McCafe drinks but I‚Äôm stuck on showing I‚Äôve purchased 4. I miss out on deals because when I‚Äôm having issues with the app, no matter what location I use, no one seems to be trained on app issues or rectifying issues. Sometimes I‚Äôm stuck with items in my app order that I can‚Äôt delete too so I can‚Äôt place a new order. I‚Äôve deleted and re-added the app and it hasn‚Äôt helped. There isn‚Äôt a number listed anywhere to call for assistance either. Very poorly designed and developed app and clearly not tested. Way more trouble and time and frustration than any savings are worth. Worst app I‚Äôve ever used!

title: Great - most of the time.
review: The workers at the location in my area seem to have great difficulty about the mobile app. For instance, from time to time the app says it cannot process my payment, sending the counter clerks into frenzy and them saying to me that they have not been trained very much about the app. Also,since the location here rushes the food frequently, resulting in undercooked product (like sausage, which can be very dangerous when undercooked), I like to request that certain things, such as fish, sausage, and chicken nuggets be cooked ‚Äúwell done.‚Äù The app has no provision for a request like that and therefore the fish is presented lightly cooked with gooey batter. Then, again, when everything goes well, it is indeed convenient and appreciated. But the app does need some tweaking and the employees need some training.

title: Updates ruin the app and developers clearly don‚Äôt care.
review: Everytime this app gets an update I have an issue. This time when it updated about 2 wks ago it logged me out and now I cannot log back in. Every single time I try it tells me an error has occured and to restart the app. I‚Äôve changed my password, restarted the app, turned off my phone, deleted the app. Basically anything I can think of it and it STILL does not work. Because of this reason I haven‚Äôt been to mc donalds. If I can‚Äôt mobile order & use deals then I dont bother. But after reading through these reviews of MULTIPLE people having the same issue for OVER a MONTH! It‚Äôs VERY clear whoever is the developer of the app doesn‚Äôt care. Which is cool, i‚Äôll be deleting this app from my phone. It‚Äôs a waste of space at this pont.

title: Painfully slow and buggy
review: The app has been super slow. I use it mostly for 99¬¢ coffee and it used to be good for a free hot coffee but now I can‚Äôt redeem a hot coffee for some dumb reason. It‚Äôs okay because I‚Äôll redeem a Big Mac once in a while but not my preference if I‚Äôm being honest. Anyways, what sparked a review was I had about 8,000 points ready to spend and the app logs me out. I tried to login. It sends me to Facebook.  Facebook recognizes the login and sends me back. McDonald‚Äôs app then says great, welcome back, let‚Äôs sign you up! (No option now to just login like I was doing) So I hit sign up because I have no other option and the app tells me my email is already in use and to go back to logging in with Facebook. It‚Äôs a round Robbin and that never solves itself and now my points are lost to McDonald‚Äôs land where the french fries are already cold and my ice in my coke has already melted.

title: Permanently deleted app will never use again
review:
Delete it out after having to remove the rear becauseMcDonald‚Äôs workers can Not get things right. I do like the idea that is easy to customize your food i.e.No salt no ketchup, etc.  
but unfortunately no matter how much time I give the restaurant the food is never ready I walk in and check in and they have not even started my order no matter how slow or busy they are‚Ä¶
Also select locations never honor the coupons or deals in the app. Now I am constantly getting a problem where I show up to pick up my food and they claim the food has not been paid for I open up the app it shows is paid I open up my bank account and it shows the money has been deducted from my account sometimes they also claim the dollar amount is different than what the app charged me.
If I have to stand at the counter and pay and wait for my food to be made I might as will just pay in order at the counter in the first place.

title: App is useless
review:
So first of all I did this to try and save time however the order isn‚Äôt even placed until you‚Äôre at the restaurant so just go to the drive through. It takes twice as long to do the app. The app also gave the wrong info to McDonald‚Äôs, the order is right on the app receipt but the in store receipt had something different for some reason. title: App setup is terrible!
review:
The concept of having an app to order you for so it‚Äôs ready by the time you get to the restaurant is a great idea. However, the developers have failed such a simple concept. I can‚Äôt confirm my order until I‚Äôm already in the lot...the whole reason I use the app is to not wait around, so being able to confirm it before I get to the location makes more sense. Otherwise, why wouldn‚Äôt I just order it from the employees..? The worst part of the app is that nothing is on a drop down menu. Instead, everything is on a random huge list of everything in that menu. Looking for a McCaf√© item, well you‚Äôll scroll through 30+ items to get to your choice, which is not even organized in any particular order...completely random. 

You would think a multi-billion dollar company could get developers to put everything on a drop down menu on this app. I‚Äôd settle for alphabetical order on a huge list even. It couldn‚Äôt be that difficult considering every other food app functions this way.

title: This app won‚Äôt jump you ahead of the line
review: Not sure what is so wonderful about this app? Use the app, pay for the order and then head to McD‚Äôs to get your food, right? Nope! We arrived at McD‚Äôs and went in to pick up our order only to find that they hadn‚Äôt even started making it! We only ordered a dozen cookies and 2 shakes (but those cookies take forever to bake) and we figured ordering ahead would keep us from having to wait in their lobby. No, we still waited 20 minutes. When we complained to the manager that the purpose of the app was to have the food ready by the time the customer arrived, we were told to leave. This wonderful technology bandwagon they are trying to jump onto isn‚Äôt helping them with their customer service and timely issues. This app isn‚Äôt going to get your food faster, the only thing it will accomplish is give you the opportunity to place your order personally without dealing with a McD‚Äôs employee. It will not put you ahead of others standing at the registers or in the drive-thru.

title: Requires the latest version to use
review: This is a scam you are going to offer me coupons and deals let me rack up points and then one day shut it all off cause apple came out with a new iOS. You don‚Äôt deserve my support or my money. If you were a true business this would not affect you. The fact that you pay technicians to make a viable app to work with all programs but probably don‚Äôt make any profit off of apple or Samsung when they up there programming is going to make you loose over a million dollars in people who won‚Äôt have the money to upgrade this year due to inflation. You are becoming more of the problem by letting them win. Thank you for supporting corrupt businessmen I know where McDonald‚Äôs stands now when it comes to technology upgrades and I hope you see the burden it brings in low income areas where you‚Äôll be shutting more locations down as inflation rises. Good luck not offering your customers coupons outside of an app that doesn‚Äôt work for them

title: Convenient, but bugs are annoying/concerning??
review:
I love the convenience of it, but for the last couple of weeks, I‚Äôve had issues with placing the order ahead of time, only to arrive and and find my order deleted or (as was the case yesterday) changed into something completely different *to a location several states away.*
The deleted orders are mildly annoying, but something that I can deal with just fine, since it only takes a few moments to recreate the order. 
The changed orders placed in another state halfway across the country, however, are concerning since there is no way to cancel those orders AND since the charge is showing as pending on my bank account. I‚Äôm thinking that since I was a) never able to show up to that location and ‚Äúcheck in‚Äù to pick up that order, and b) since one of the menu items is marked as ‚Äúcurrently unavailable,‚Äù I‚Äôm thinking the charge will go away in a few days. Definitely concerning though, so I‚Äôll be keeping an eye on it in the upcoming days. 
Two stars instead of one for the following reasons: 
-The app used to be great, and I‚Äôm thinking the latest issues are bugs related to changes to accommodate the new rewards program.
-Again, the convenience can‚Äôt be understated, especially for an introvert. 
-I like the idea of the rewards program. Can‚Äôt get mad at free stuff.

title: Easy to use but you can‚Äôt place order until in parking lot
review: SUPER frustrating to use an app to order ahead so that the food is ready when I get there. Trying to save time. Downloaded the app so I could order, swing in, and be on my way quickly. Instead the app won‚Äôt even let me place my order until the GPS shows you‚Äôre in the parking lot. And then it wouldn‚Äôt ‚Äúbegin making my order and process payment‚Äù until I‚Äôd put my vehicle in park. So here I sit, I watching all of the drive thru vehicles coming and going while I wait for my food. If I had known this was what was going to happen I would‚Äôve skipped the app all together! I ordered food for 6 people and figured I‚Äôd be backing up the drive thru with my order. I was trying to save myself some time and this was no time saver. The only reason I even give 2 stars is because the app is easy to customize orders. There needs to be an order ahead option!

title: Needs work
review: I tried ordering food a couple days ago and turns out I had 8 dollars in my account and not 10 which was the total. It took the 8 dollars out of my account and forced me to use another payment for the other 2 dollars which I didn‚Äôt have. Upon canceling the order I read it would take 72 hours for the money to be transfer back into my account. I didn‚Äôt get my food. And I still haven‚Äôt got my money back. Also, you‚Äôre better off just going into the drive thru. I‚Äôve come and there‚Äôs been long likes in the drive thru and I think ‚Äúwow I did the smart thing ordering online‚Äù nope. They will go through the whole line before bring you your food. You can expect to wait at least 10 min even if it‚Äôs just for a coffee. (Which apparently they don‚Äôt sell after 10:30 according to the McDonald‚Äôs I go to. McDonald‚Äôs in general is just a 1 star. It has not happened twice where this app has taken my money and not given it back. Don‚Äôt ever use this trash app

title: App is easy to use...
review: ...for deals but Mobile order needs some changes. The actual ordering process is easy enough and has a search option which is nice but when I arrive at McD after having placed my order ahead of time I have to reconfirm my order and payment which means my order was not processed BEFORE I arrived. My order is always ready at Chik-fil-A and Starbucks when I use their mobile orders.  It would be much faster to forgo the McD mobile order and just use the drive-thru as dozens of cars came and received their orders through the drive-thru as I waited. I have been waiting in the curbside mobile order spot 12 min. so far and this is my second try at the mobile order hoping the first time was just user error.  Perhaps it‚Äôs my store that is so slow... however, no more mobile ordering for me! But I will continue using the McD app for the deals- either in the store or drive-thru.

title: Only kind of beneficial
review:
This app is easy to use but my biggest complaint is that I don‚Äôt find it saving me much time. The fact that you can‚Äôt pay or even start your order until you‚Äôre at the restaurant is kind of crazy. What‚Äôs the advantage of ordering on the app? I can order a Starbucks from my house, pay for it and know it‚Äôll be ready when I get there. With this app, I build my order at my house, drive 10 minutes and then it lets me place the order. Then I get to wait for 10 more minutes (no exaggeration) for my food. I‚Äôve looked at cars in the drive thru and have gauged where I‚Äôd be if I had gone that route vs. the app and 9/10 times the drove thru would have been the same speed. 

Why not let the order be placed and paid for regardless of if you‚Äôre at the restaurant. McDonalds still gets paid even if the customer never makes it in. Seems like a simple thing to fix.
developerResponse: {'id': 13208058, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out! Sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2020-01-30T18:59:38Z'}

title: Experience was fine until‚Ä¶
review:
For a year or more, usually a
Couple of times a week, I would get breakfast at the McDonalds does the street from my house. Never any problem. Then, all of a sudden, they put new staff in the store and I submit my order like usual, show up to pick it up, and they tell me my payment did t go through, even though my app is linked to Apple Pay and I have submitted it as I always have. Bottom line, the guy didn‚Äôt know what he was doing, they blamed me off the bat, and when I tried to tell the lady the accused me of not paying about it, she literally walked off while I was talking to her. I guess the days when the term ‚Äúcustomer service‚Äù actually meant something are long gone. RIP Customer Service!

title: Bad experiences
review: Out of the last 3 times I‚Äôve went to McDonald‚Äôs in Eugene Oregon I‚Äôve had bad experiences. Last week I went to the one by Fred Meyer on west 11th and my fries were all soggy and the bread on my quarter pounder was rubbery. I asked for ketchup with my fries but didn‚Äôt get any. I was in a hurry to get to work so I didn‚Äôt have time to go inside. Then tonight I went to the one over by winco off barger. I asked for ketchup and extra napkins when I placed my order at the drive through. I was told to pull forward and wait for my order. It took over 10 minutes to get the order and I left. After leaving my wife was checking the order and we didn‚Äôt get any ketchup or napkins. The reason I usually go through the drive through is because I‚Äôm busy and don‚Äôt have time go inside and eat. Im not the kind of guy to pull back there and go inside and have an issue with people for poor service. I used to love McDonald‚Äôs until now. I really feel like McDonald‚Äôs done me wrong 2 out of the last 3 times I went through the drive through.

title: Frustrating, to say the least.
review: This is only my 3rd time using this app and I am ready to be done with it. It is meant for convince yet every time I‚Äôve had an issue. I just got home from attempting to pick up and order I placed and paid for yet it was never brought out, after 10 mins of waiting outside (because the rest doors are closed due to Covid) I called the restaurant and the employee said there is no record of my order, I told her I could show her it shows paid on the app and my bank and she said that didn‚Äôt matter if it didn‚Äôt show on her end. Also for the record, yes I was at the right McDonald‚Äôs location. Terrible customer service as if one really has time and energy to go scam a restaurant for an order of French Fries  and a mini size McFlurry, come on people.

title: Straight up thieves
review: I‚Äôve written a review in the past about how they steal money from you under the guise of they can‚Äôt refund from the app and it remains true years later. They still haven‚Äôt figured out how to report a problem with your order (like after the employee runs before you can check it, and you realize something‚Äôs missing when you get home). They can‚Äôt refund you if something‚Äôs out of stock. I particularly liked when they had no milkshakes, but offered me a dollar soda and didn‚Äôt offer to refund the $3 difference. Things that are clearly on them can‚Äôt be fixed and I‚Äôm over it. They‚Äôve stolen at least $25-30 from me with their inability to refund app orders or even how hard it is to report a problem with the order. Instead of being able to do it in app, you have to call the restaurant and the manager‚Äôs only response is ‚Äúwe can‚Äôt refund app orders‚Äù. So, great rewards program, but I‚Äôd imagine I saved less than was stolen in the long run.
developerResponse: {'id': 20131200, 'body': 'Getting things right is important. Can you help us improve by providing the location here?https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/.', 'modified': '2022-04-22T20:30:42Z'}

title: Needs a lot of improvements
review: Tonight was another of the too many times I‚Äôve had an issue with this app. 8 out of 10 times I place an order it doesn‚Äôt go through and I have to order and pay again when I arrive at the restaurant. Because of this, I‚Äôm unable to use the deal or I tried to use because they can only be used either once a day or every 60 minutes. Tonight I placed an order in which I used a deal for free fries with a $1 minimum purchase. When I arrived, I had no option but to pay for the supposed free fries because the deal didn‚Äôt go through on the restaurant‚Äôs end. The manager was aware, and even saw the order on my phone clearly including the deal, but apparently nothing could be done. I‚Äôm not going to cry over $3 fries. My frustration stems from the repetition of the app‚Äôs glitches and errors. If the app can‚Äôt properly do and serve what it claims to, then at least don‚Äôt send so many notifications and invites to use it. It‚Äôs absolute trash.

title: Completely disconnected with the actual restaurant
review: Today I placed two orders via the McDonald‚Äôs app to the 840 Atlantic Ave restaurant in Brooklyn and both orders were not found in the restaurant and I wasted a good 30 minutes before the restaurant manager finally got off her phone with the regional manager about my situation (order not found) and only to tell me that I need to contact the Corp. and she said ‚Äúthe franchise has nothing to do with the corporate. you have to contact the Corp to get your money back‚Äù. I was surprised (shocked) by that. Then I asked for the phone number to contact the corporate and she said ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know. You have to Google it yourself‚Äù. If that‚Äôs the answer, why couldn‚Äôt she give me that in the first place so I don‚Äôt need to wait for 30 minutes? Anyway, I will never use this app again. I can‚Äôt believe the orders just disappear even after their system gave me the order numbers. I still need to figure out how to get my money back! What a complete waste of time!!!

title: App is still broken for using deals
review:
For starters, 90% of the time I have tried to use a deal and it‚Äôs saying it‚Äôs unavailable, even though Orenstein‚Äôs, it‚Äôs 7:26 AM and I try to order a breakfast sandwich which stated it was only available during breakfast hours, yet it wouldn‚Äôt let me use the deal saying it was unavailable. Almost every time I try to use the deal this happens.
Another failure with the deals is if you click on one, and youSet your phone down and the screen powers off, when you open it back up again it‚Äôs states you‚Äôve already used the deal when you click on it again. This is happened to me several times where while in line I placed my order, by the time I get to the drive-through window my screen is dark and I unlock my phone only to find that
So if you want to use a deal, wait to you get to the checkout counter and hope that that teal will actually be one that works.
This problem has existed for over a year, which is why I am now finally giving it a bad review.
developerResponse: {'id': 18116887, 'body': "Hi there. We're sorry to hear you're having trouble with the app. To get you back to the deals you love, we‚Äôd like to look into this further. title: Good discounts but needs work
review: I love this app! I use it quite a bit and find it really convenient. But many times my order has got stuck in the shopping cart even after I have completed the order and picked it up. I have had several orders that went through the payment processor and it charged my card correctly but then the employees says that I have to pay still. This has happened seven or eight times and then a few days later I see that my card has been charged. The discounts and the specials are excellent and definitely worth using! And I also appreciate the ability to order in advance and skip the line. If the bugs/issues were fixed I would upgrade the app to a 5 star rating as it‚Äôs definitely worthy if that is fixed. Thank you!

title: Just OK.
review: Not really sure why I‚Äôm using this. Not any fast because you still have to use the drive through.  Pull up to speaker and let them your you have ordered. If you pull into the parking spot you will be there awhile and if you dinning in. Well why not just be a human and say high? Not clearing the previous order out is a problem. Pick up breakfasts on Sat and Sun for co workers and I. Hit repeat order and got double everything from the previous day. Was in a hurry to get to work so I just said fine. Good laugh at work with enough food for an army of nurses. Staff in stores are hit or miss on training. Some tell you. ‚ÄúNope no order‚Äù when I‚Äôm looking at it in my phone.  One just asked me what I wanted all over again and didn‚Äôt charge me. I thought she charged the app. She did not. That‚Äôs not right either. I would stop using it but I drink a lot of coffee and want the coffee credits. Keep working out the bugs.

title: Not even worth 1 star
review: I used to like this app, however, that has changed. I think McDonald‚Äôs is scamming people. I used to be able to look at available deals anywhere and go to McDonald‚Äôs and use that coupon. For 3 weeks now I can still see the coupons away from McDonald‚Äôs but the mi Ute I get near one the coupons disappear. I drive down the road 3 miles and they reappear. The stores will not honor the coupon because it‚Äôs no longer there for them to see which does make sense. What gets me is that the managers don‚Äôt seem to care. This has happened at 4 different locations. I spoke with a manager and she said I‚Äôm sorry but there is nothing I can do, we are not in charge of the app. I would think they would care and notify whomever is in charge. It seems most people are ordering and then getting to the window and pulling up the app and their coupons are gone but because they are in line and have already ordered they pay full price. Not cool McDonald‚Äôs, not cool at all. Also, I have screen shots at McDonald‚Äôs and away
developerResponse: {'id': 4617666, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had! This can happen if you auto connect to the store's Wi-Fi without accepting the terms and conditions. If that doesn't help, please reach out to our Mobile App team, so we can further assist you at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2018-08-11T16:00:44Z'}

title: Used to be better, glitches with sign in process
review: When I first got this app, it worked great. Now, it‚Äôs slow, it‚Äôs forcing me to sign in every time I open the app to access the deals, and it‚Äôs not even letting me sign in anymore. It keeps giving me an error message saying ‚ÄúSorry, that didn‚Äôt work. Confirm your internet connection and and retry. If the issue continues, restart the app‚Äù. I‚Äôve restarted the app, I‚Äôve uninstalled and reinstalled the app, I‚Äôve restarted my phone, I‚Äôve tried on a different day, and it‚Äôs still not working. I had full bars of internet when I was trying to sign in and it still was telling me something was wrong. I hope this gets fixed soon as I won‚Äôt be ordering from McDonalds until it‚Äôs fixed.

title: Why are these apps so terrible?
review:
Tried it again, and it‚Äôs even worse now. This thing never works right. Oh, there‚Äôs a deal? Nope, not available at this location. Find participating locations? Oh it does show this one, but let‚Äôs click on another. Nope, not that either. It works? Nope, you go to the location and they‚Äôre out. Or don‚Äôt even sell that anymore. But they can‚Äôt do anything to help you because it‚Äôs the app, so you have to cancel the order. Good luck with that. Go to order something else? Nope, your old order is still in there and it won‚Äôt let you use another offer. It‚Äôs been over a year since COVID hit, contactless pickup should be better by now.

Edit: today it won‚Äôt even let me login. Says to check my internet connection and try again. My connection is fine. Deleted, reinstalled, says it sent a link to my email to verify it‚Äôs me. After 15m no link, nothing in SPAM, go to try again and it tells me to check my internet. Deleting again.
developerResponse: {'id': 20110965, 'body': "That's not awesome to hear. Let's get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-12-07T16:45:56Z'}

title: Horrible
review:
Every time I open the app, it says I checked out before completing my order, which is wrong. I order, pay and pick up my food with no issues (most of the time).

 The annoying thing is, when you open the app, the app asks if I‚Äôd like  reopen the last order (which was completed, but it thinks it wasn‚Äôt). There is no No or Cancel Previous Order option. If you hit cancel, it closes the option to reopen the last order, but it leaves the old order in your cart/bag still! So, fine you have to go into the bag and remove all the items from your order one by one‚Ä¶but the old coupon you used has an error that it‚Äôs expired and it won‚Äôt delete when you hit the delete button. This means, you can‚Äôt add a new coupon or check out because the old deal is stuck in your bag! 

Get it together McDonald‚Äôs! Train your staff on how to close out an order and fix your buggy app, or add a button to remove your last order that works!

Try uninstalling and reinstalling your app. If that doesn't do it for you reach out to our mobile app team through the link, and we'll be more than happy to look into this for you: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n", 'modified': '2021-12-06T16:55:52Z'}

title: Okay, but could be better
review: I like the ease of ordering and that I can pick up at curbside. However, here are my issues: 1) The app keeps logging me out whenever I pull up another screen, get a phone call or close the app. I get the message, ‚ÄúYou were signed out due to an error. Please log back in and accept our terms and conditions.‚Äù  After a while, it gets annoying having to go to my email just to log in; 2) The app does not allow for anyone else to pickup your order. My daughter got to curbside and told me what spot she was in, but when I attempted to input the spot number, it told me it didn‚Äôt look like I was there (which I wasn‚Äôt. Someone else was); and 3) the menu said a drink was available, but when I got there, it wasn‚Äôt available. I ended up substituting a drink that cost less, and no refund was offered. This happened twice.

title: A work in progress.
review:
For the most part it‚Äôs OK. As long as you don‚Äôt want to customize.
It could be so much better. For example...
If I want to add tomato or leaf lettuce or mayo to a burger many of them don‚Äôt have an option to add that. I would be ok with paying more to add that stuff to a burger. But the app won‚Äôt even let me do that.

The deals aren‚Äôt as good as they used to be when the app was new. Last time I used it I couldn‚Äôt even find a deal that would work with what I wanted to order.

Also, it would be better if I could choose which McD restaurant I wanted to order at. It is not always the one I am closest to when I am putting my order in to the app at the time. Sometimes I am driving by one to plan on going to another one close to home and I want to order at that one instead.
I love the app! And hope that it continues to get better with more updates! I love being able to pass the long drive through lines and park. It‚Äôs great to avoid having the undertrained high school employees messing up my order because they can‚Äôt take the orders correctly and take the cash at the window at the same time. The app has done a great job for making sure the orders get in to the computer correctly!
developerResponse: {'id': 4414093, 'body': "Hello, Travis! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2019-03-17T21:48:14Z'}

title: Works Pretty Well MOST of The Time
review: Working, and ordering food with the app is fairly easy. Must if the time, it works flawlessly. However, there have been a couple of times I have ordered food in advance of arriving at a particular McDonalds location, and after arriving and checking in, then pulling into the drive thru, and them not having my order. I have had a confirmation number, shown it to the employee, then had to pull over, go inside, and place the order all over again. The two times this has happened, I was with my wife so she is not won over by the app. Still needs work, like being able to edit your ‚Äúfavorites‚Äù, when your eating habits have changed. For the most part, I use it fairly regularly, although when it doesn‚Äôt work, there always seems to be a line waiting behind me...ugh!
