title: Phone app
review: You said to write you fine I‚Äôll reach you at I want because your phone app you put it on our phones and say oh it‚Äôs free then you turn around and go OK time to update your phone but to update your phone you got a put a credit card on there or pay something what happens when you don‚Äôt want to credit card on there but you still want to update it because you like eating at McDonald‚Äôs I just can‚Äôt believe this this is out rages I have to pay to put an app that said it was free on my phone and then I get to use it for a little bit and then you turn around and you tell me it‚Äôs not free anymore with all that being said I think y‚Äôall y‚Äôall should meet something like a meal for my entire family and there‚Äôs nine of us thank you and have a blessed day

title: It‚Äôs not faster, you actually get your order slower
review: I got this app thinking it would speed up the process. I order ahead of time but the order is not processed until you get there and tell the app what spit you are in. Ok so much for ordering ahead. I sit there waiting for my meal 10 minutes pass by nothing, 15 minutes pass by nothing and it‚Äôs around 8:00 pm not peak lunch time. I decided to get off my car to ask what‚Äôs going on. My leg is broken so I get in there limping. I asked if there is a problem with my order. They look over at the mobile orders and say oh yeah it came in but we are way to busy, I asked for a refund since after waiting around for so long I don‚Äôt want anything from McDonals. I procede to ask for a refund from the manager and she tells me she can‚Äôt do it because I didn‚Äôt pay in store. So they can‚Äôt refund me or make my food what is the whole point of having this application. There is no spot on the app to request a refund or cancel an order that was never made. Clearly disappointed.
developerResponse: {'id': 5383465, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Cynthia! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-10-06T23:09:23Z'}

title: Useless if you‚Äôre having someone else pick up your order
review: For some reason, McDonald‚Äôs requires you to have location services turned on and have the device at the restaurant in order to check in. Other places allow you to check in from a device anywhere by simply hitting the I‚Äôm here button on the app no matter where the device is at the time. I tried placing an order for my husband to pick up, and he couldn‚Äôt pick it up without my phone being there even after I tried checking in on the app from home. I don‚Äôt have this problem anywhere else (Chick-Fil-A, Taco Bell, Burger King, etc.), so I don‚Äôt understand why McDonald‚Äôs can‚Äôt update theirs. Other than forcing you to bring the device to the restaurant with you, the app itself is decent. Unfortunately, it‚Äôs pretty much useless to me without the ability to check in from home while my husband picks up my order though.
developerResponse: {'id': 33437264, 'body': 'requiring the device the order was placed on to check in at the location is done to protect your account.', 'modified': '2022-11-29T18:20:20Z'}

title: Beyond Frustrating
review:
When app actually works, it‚Äôs quite decent & user friendly. Problem is there are far too many issues with the app, particularly when running on devices that aren‚Äôt brand spanking new. 
Personally, I‚Äôve had it with the app & having to constantly sign back in via Apple, Facebook, Google or Email when I‚Äôm in the parking lot of a McDonald‚Äôs location and JUST WANT TO PLACE AN ORDER!! I basically end up giving up & driving away, so McDonald‚Äôs is losing sales every time the app fails to do what it is intended to do.
And yes, I have uninstalled & reinstalled the McDonald‚Äôs app, and eventually the same hiccups reoccur.
Also, the toll free ‚ÄúCustomer Service‚Äù number and the automated service is an absolute joke and an insult to anyone trying to reach the company. Better get back on the ball McDonald‚Äôs because there are plenty of other options out there and you are losing customers to them every day!
developerResponse: {'id': 27834531, 'body': 'we can see how that would be frustrating. let us look into that for you by getting back to our team here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2022-02-03T18:28:46Z'}

title: Having to go through drive-thru twice?!
review: Why have it so that you cannot use a ‚Äúdeal/coupon‚Äù and redeem your EARNED ‚Äúpoints‚Äù for a free item on the same ticket??? It says only one deal allowed‚Ä¶ That‚Äôs fine, but I‚Äôm not trying to use two deals. My points are not part of a ‚Äúdeal.‚Äù Say you place an order and use a $1 large fry deal. After you drive-thru and pick up that order, you can immediately go into the app and place another order to redeem an item from your points, which tells me again that points are not the same as deals! Because if you try to place an order again and try to use the $1 large fry coupon again, a time limit alert comes up and says you have to wait minimum of 50 mins to use another deal, but not if you redeem something from points. Long story short: Please fix it so you can use a deal and redeem an item using points on the same order so I can quit having to go through the drive-thru twice.
developerResponse: {'id': 26041720, 'body': "We're always looking for ways to improve, Sammy. Get back to us here with all the details you can on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-11-02T18:04:07Z'}

title: Online ordering
review: My experience with the mobile ordering service is that it was effectively useless. I wanted to place a large order, so downloaded the app so it could be prepared while I was on my way. After placing my order, the app notified me that the food would be prepared once I arrived (precisely what I was hoping to avoid). I arrived about 8 minutes later, and no one seemed to have any real experience handling an online order via the window. The first girl asked me for the verification number 3 times. The second girl tried to hand me drinks (which I didn‚Äôt order), and then handed me the wrong order completely. Once she understood that I had placed a large online order, she asked me to pull forward into a spot so they could prepare it. About two minutes later, an employee came out to my car and asked what exactly I had ordered, which she then noted on a clipboard. Suffice it to say this was the furthest thing from a seamless experience one could realistically expect.
developerResponse: {'id': 20910177, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that. Can you help us improve by providing the location here?https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/.", 'modified': '2021-02-07T22:32:14Z'}

title: Causes problems at restaurant
review:
The restaurants frequently have problems with the app.  Multiple times my mobile order has completely stopped the drive thru, and the restaurant says ‚Äúthis always happens with mobile orders, all our screens are frozen.‚Äù  Sometimes they don‚Äôt see the order at all, and you end up having to reorder at the window.  When that happens, the app gets really angry that there is an uncompleted order and it is very difficult to use the app subsequently. 

Whenever there are more than one car waiting for curbside pickup, figure there is a 60% you‚Äôll get the wrong bag. When you do, there is no mechanism to report the problem or get a refund. 

There is no way to place an order and have someone else pick it up for you, because if your phone isn‚Äôt physically at the restaurant, it will not allow the order to go through.  And then you are left with the problem that the app locks up if you have an uncompleted order.
developerResponse: {'id': 20223194, 'body': "We're not happy with that. Let us get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-01-06T17:47:38Z'}

title: App Needs work
review: My whole reasoning for using the app, is to make the wait time less and to avoid the drive thru. Should have a feature that (considering the order has already been paid for) allows you to click a ‚Äòstart order now‚Äô button. By not being able to have the order started until you arrive at the location, IMO, defeats the whole idea of making ordering more convenient or quicker. Had a bit of time between b-ball games, (McDonald‚Äôs is in close proximity of the court) wanted to grab a quick snack and allow for some digestion before hitting the court again....waited almost 20 minutes for our order that was also incorrect when delivered. Doesn‚Äôt help that this particular McDonalds has consistently preformed poorly, but hoped the mobile app might make it a bit more bearable.  Annoying.

title: Do not use!
review: This app is by far the worst of any I have ever used. Your food stays in the cart and at times acts like you haven‚Äôt even finished checking out. And twice now the employee has said the payment showed it declined, the first time I paid again and when I went to the pickup window showed them it charged me twice and they immediately stopped one of the payments. This time I paid with cash since it showed declined and yet when I got to the pickup window my bank showed it going through. The manager wouldn‚Äôt do anything because it was pending and I had to call a different manager now who said I have to bring back the cash receipt and the bank statement showing I paid twice. The manager last night even said the app is constantly telling them the payment didn‚Äôt go through and charging many people twice! I use the app because the employees can‚Äôt get the orders correct but now I will just go elsewhere. Ridiculous to have to go through so much to get refunded when it happens so much!
developerResponse: {'id': 7763834, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, friend! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-03-16T19:23:18Z'}

title: Great app, not so great points restrictions
review:
The app works really well, it‚Äôs super fast and I‚Äôve never had any issues using it all over the USA.  My only gripe is that you can only have a single points purchase OR deal on an order which is annoying.  Should be able to buy whatever as long as you have enough points.

For example, you can only buy one breakfast sandwich with points, no other deals can be included on that ticket.  So if you want two breakfast sandwiches you would pay full price for the second sandwich.  This isn‚Äôt a big deal except there‚Äôs already a deal to get a second breakfast sandwich for $0.01 without spending any points‚Ä¶

The points also expire if you don‚Äôt spend them. Doesn‚Äôt seem to take very long but I‚Äôm not sure what the timeframe is.
developerResponse: {'id': 32448000, 'body': "there can be too much of a good thing! that's why we keep it to only one deal per order. ", 'modified': '2022-10-07T18:31:16Z'}

title: Amazing concept, terrible service and limited feature
review:
I been using the app for awhile now. The app itself is decent, occasionally there are times where the mcdonald near me don‚Äôt show up or showed up as closing when in reality it is still open. 

My only complain is the people working at McDonald‚Äôs are terrible at filling mobile orders. The McDonald‚Äôs I go to often get my mobile orders wrongs or are missing an item. Often times when I place an mobile order, upon picking up I will be informed that the item I wanted is not available and they can‚Äôt do anything including refunding my money. These employees will hastily replace my item with another item in the similar price range, often times it means I lost money because the item they replace it with is a bit cheaper than the item I ordered. Asking for another item you want for replacement and watch they roll their eyes at you. 

If the store don‚Äôt have the item for your mobile order there should be an option where I can get a refund or ask mcdonald for help. The people working there never wants to refund my money and I paid on the app. I literally only want the item I ordered, not the crap they shove to me and expected me to accept it. Not allowing customers to get their money back when the order is wrong or missing item is unacceptable. 

All other delivery apps have a help option or a place to complain about the order. Where is this option on this app?

title: From Mediocre to Terrible
review:
Here‚Äôs a recap:
SLOW!
CRASH!
LOGIN!
LOADING!
SLOW!
LOGIN AGAIN!
LOADING!
CRASH!
RESTART PHONE!

Prior to the latest update (now giving people the option to select rewards, etc.), this app would often crash when I‚Äôd tried to initiate an order. I‚Äôd have to restart my phone for it to work properly.
 
Now, with this new update, even after restarting my phone, or deleting the app and re-downloading, I still can‚Äôt get the order screen to open up. It‚Äôs SO slow! On two occasions, I‚Äôve had to wait in the McDonald‚Äôs parking lot for upwards of 15 minutes while the app loaded (not to mention being repeatedly asked to login AGAINN)! 
I guess the folks over at McDonalds realize that if customers wait long enough, or if their deals can‚Äôt pull up quickly enough while in the drive-thru ‚Äî they‚Äôll just pay full price. Because I can‚Äôt think of another viable explanation as to why, in 2021, a Corp like McDonalds would have such a glitchy, useless app. 
I‚Äôd barely sit around for 15 minutes to get into a restaraunt with actual table cloth. McDonalds will not be getting this level of angst out of me, not for what they‚Äôre serving. Sorry.

title: Works good IF you turn off WiFi before ordering and don‚Äôt close the app
review: I have to turn off Wi-Fi before launching the app and placing an order. If I don‚Äôt after I leave my house and my phone switches to cellular data, completing the order at the store always has issues and gives errors. Things like the deal I used is no longer good or reward points issues. Sometimes the order will actually go through and sometimes it won‚Äôt. I then have to ask to have the first order cancelled if it ends up going through after I place another order. Same types if issues like f I close then relaunch the app between the initial order at home and finalizing the order at the store. Never have any issues if I disable Wi-Fi before launching the app and placing an order and keeping the app running until the order is completed.
developerResponse: {'id': 28613326, 'body': "we're all about improvement. drop us a line here with as much input as you can on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n", 'modified': '2022-03-16T16:22:49Z'}

title: App makes ordering hard
review: This app makes ordering hard when you want someone to help you pick up your order. I placed an order and wanted someone to help me pick it up but it required me to be there. But I couldn‚Äôt be there that is why I had someone to pick my order. The app said that I could mention the order number if you‚Äôre already there. I gave the order number to the person who was helping me to pick up but the staff at the location said they couldn‚Äôt find it. I guess they couldn‚Äôt find it because the app wouldn‚Äôt allow me to go pass the stage and finalize it. I tried turning off the location service and gps but it still didn‚Äôt work. I know that McDonald‚Äôs want to make sure you‚Äôre here before preparing the order to make it fresh. But a customer knows the timing to when to pick it up. Why make it hard for customers to order? McDonald‚Äôs, you don‚Äôt want business?
developerResponse: {'id': 25587508, 'body': "We're constantly looking for ways to improve! Let's talk here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-10-09T15:18:05Z'}

title: Worst APP ever
review: I used to love this app. I used it all the time, loved the deals, loved that I could scan them from my phone. Then about a year ago, it stopped working, would let me login. I researched a little and realized I‚Äôm not the only user with this issue, but the developers don‚Äôt really care and apparently aren‚Äôt willing to fix it. I‚Äôve tried ‚Äúuninstalling, reinstalling, restarting‚Äù, and everything in between and now, since their latest ‚Äúupdate‚Äù, it won‚Äôt even open, just flashes for a second then disappears. So that is my plan...I‚Äôm ‚Äúdisappearing‚Äù my business to somewhere else. I live in a small town, but will gladly take my business to a company that gives a crap about their customers issues rather than supporting one that doesn‚Äôt. Being a mom of three, coupons and deals were a huge incentive for me to buy dinner for our family of 5 from our local McDonalds. You are a multi-billion dollar company, how can you not fix an app? Ridiculous.

title: Convenient but Error-ridden
review: In the past, I had used the app without issue but had deleted it so as to avoid temptation during a diet. A couple days ago, I downloaded the app again and chose a location and placed my order. My office is between two McDonald‚Äôs locations but I do prefer one over the other. When I arrived at the location to pickup my order, it said that I was at the wrong location and to go to the other. I knew I had done everything right but didn‚Äôt make an issue of it. Today, the app did the same thing. I ordered from the location I had picked up from the day before and got the confirmation on the app. I arrived at that location but didn‚Äôt notice my order on the screen. I checked the app again and it said that I should pickup from my preferred location. How did it change AFTER I had received confirmation?! Fortunately, the manager was able to pull my order and promptly fill it. This is definitely an app issue.

title: Barely worth the trouble
review:
For some periods of time, there are great deals, which makes the problems worth it, but recently this has not been the case.

The most prominent issue is the connectivity. I don‚Äôt know how all of my apps can connect to the internet while the McDonalds app continuously gives me error messages telling me to check my internet connection. How does my internet stop working for some functions of only ONE app? I‚Äôve been getting notifications regarding deals, yet they never show up. Ive been trying to play the ‚ÄúPop a deal‚Äù game, only to receive an internet error. Both with WiFi and mobile data, so don‚Äôt suggest that to me as a solution as you have so many reviews before this.

The functions of the app are also inconvenient, and do not follow the features of most phones. On most apps, swiping right moves back a page, for example. The McD app ignoring universal app features just shows how out of touch it is with most users.

The mobile ordering feature is ridiculous‚Äî you have to have your phone continuously be tracking your location to even submit your order. How does this make ordering any faster? Answer: it doesn‚Äôt. Especially since many don‚Äôt have unlimited data, and the WiFi in restaurants is deplorable, it just makes the process more stressful.

The only good thing about this app is the deals, and with constant connectivity issues, these hardly even work, anymore.

title: Lots of issues to look past
review: I‚Äôve had the McDonald‚Äôs app for a year now.  I can say that I  have not seen an app that cannot seem to do the main function as it claims to be able to besides this one.  I mainly use this for the coffee card but it rarely works, you can‚Äôt add it to the mobile orders, or just generally get credit for buying a coffee. The deals on mobile order might be good when they are put on but that is only if the mobile order works.  There are days they get nothing ordered, and there are days that the order doesn‚Äôt clear so then they receive two mobile orders.  The McDonald‚Äôs employees have no idea how it works so they can never help.  It‚Äôs very frustrating not getting to use the coffee card.  I have gone to McDonald‚Äôs less and less as time has gone on due to the problems I have with the app.  I wish for much improvement and credit. Please fix this.
developerResponse: {'id': 3869168, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-06-17T20:15:39Z'}

title: Get it together!
review: I‚Äôve tried to use this app multiple times now and it has NEVER worked properly for me. Multiple times, I couldn‚Äôt log in through Facebook. It led me to believe it was fine and then the little fry thing just spun for forever. I tried to use it tonight and it actually let me log in so I thought I was set. I placed my order through the app, then I drove to the restaurant and tried to check in. It kept telling me that my payment was processing and then there was an error. I tried three different methods (Apple Pay, Visa and MC) and was unsuccessful with any. It would look like it was working and then give me a processing error. I had to go inside to ask for help and he tried to tell me ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt mean to be rude, but your cards are probably declining.‚Äù Seriously? I had to reorder inside and paid with the card that he told me was declining. I came home and had 7 bank notifications that my card had been charged AND refunded every time I had tried to pay. So annoying!!! Get it together!!
developerResponse: {'id': 13923444, 'body': "Hey there! We're sorry you're having difficulties with your payment. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-03-08T21:30:02Z'}

title: Coupons are becoming worthless
review: There used to be deals on buy one get one free sandwiches or mix and match 2 for $5 burgers with no buyer type limitations (I.e double quarter pounder, angus burger, etc). Over time the deals have been reduced to petty French fries and free drinks which we all know are high profit margin items. Now they impose a time limit on the deals to One deal per 60 minutes per person to keep you from using more than one offer. Back in the day with paper coupons, they would just let us use multiple coupons with separate orders but this is worse than that with child-like time outs. It‚Äôs clear you don‚Äôt really want our business with the continuation of watering down deals. Once upon a time there used to be like a free McDouble or 4 piece nuggets without any purchase requirements just because a sports team won or something. Now I don‚Äôt see any real motivation to use the app or even to eat at McDonald‚Äôs. Do yourself a favor and try the Wendy‚Äôs app or Jack in the Box app and you‚Äôll be happier.

title: Oops, they did it again
review:
So, the latest app update broke ordering completely. It will not clear the first (and last) order placed, insisting it is still ‚Äúopen‚Äù. 

This would be a forgiveable oopsie but this isn‚Äôt the first time their $2 dev team has screwed this up.

To be fair, the app is pretty and has a decent ui. But I am absolutely convinced nobody‚Äîbox even the outsourced dev team‚Äîdoes one iota of quality control. These problems have been present for YEARS and still they cannot deliver an ordering app that allows you to‚Ä¶ you know‚Ä¶ ORDER.

I‚Äôve been double charged, mis-charged, had my order disappear, had my order reappear after picking it up, and now this nonsense with the forever order that never goes away.

Staff at the restaurant blames the mobile system, the mobile support offers nothing but platitudes and then silence.

And beyond dumb order flow problems, it still after YEARS insists a simple sausage biscuit meal is ‚Äúunavailable‚Äù but it is. And it also insists there is no such thing as a sausage egg and cheese biscuit. But there is.

Avoid the app unless you want to be their QA team as well as learning about chargebacks with your card company, as well as getting to know the shift manager at whatever unfortunate location you inflict this dumpster fire of an app upon.

The dev team does not care, they do not care your time or money, and I no longer care about McDonald‚Äôs.
developerResponse: {'id': 30670720, 'body': 'we can totally look into this for you. drop us a line anytime here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-07-01T19:07:10Z'}

title: Went from near perfect to almost garbage in a matter of 6 months
review:
Carts that don‚Äôt clear after picking up orders, payments that won‚Äôt process and the window accuses me of not having credit available, showing up to pickup my order and the restaurant having no clue I placed a mobile order. 

Refreshing, closing the app, clicking buttons - nothing seems to work consistently. I‚Äôve had messed up cache several times and removing the app and reinstalling seemed to help for a while. 

My daughters and I share the same McDonalds login so maybe that‚Äôs what‚Äôs throwing things off. I buy coffee and build up the McCafe rewards. They occasionally use the app to redeem for a Frappe. It all used to work perfectly through my Google  login. Maybe that‚Äôs the source of my problems.

title: Do not use app
review: Tonight I placed an order on this app and I paid. When I went to pick up my food there were signs on the door at the McDonald‚Äôs stating that we would be kicked out if we entered even though the lobby was open I waited in the drive-through line for 20 minutes because I had already paid for my food, when I got to the drive-through window I was forced to pay for a second time - the lady stated that my card had been declined. Knowing that I had money in this account I checked my statement after leaving and found that I had actually been billed to my card and that I paid twice. When I called the restaurant I was told this is a corporate problem and not their concern so I paid $27 for a sandwich chicken nuggets fries and two drinks. Thanks!
developerResponse: {'id': 4261343, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, Beth! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-07-16T22:18:36Z'}

title: Nothing but problems now
review: I used to love this app. Besides most of the cashiers in my area not always being knowledgeable about how it worked, I had no issues with it when it first came out. But now it appears as though I tried to place an order a few months ago that has been forever frozen in my account. I can‚Äôt order anything from the lunch menu bc an offer for a 20pc nugget expired and I have to remove it to order anything else, but I can‚Äôt remove it. It‚Äôs grayed  out. I removed all of the other items, so it‚Äôs not like I don‚Äôt know how to do it. I wish there was a ‚ÄúCancel Order‚Äù button that you could just start over completely and not have to remove each item individually. I tried changing stores, ordering off the breakfast menu, and I guess I‚Äôm about to try to delete the app and then download it again. But please, updates are supposed to fix glitches and add things to the app that make it better, not complicate the heck out of it and make it impossible to use.

title: Don‚Äôt use the app!
review: My restaurant (Mission Circle, Santa Rosa CA) has twice now claimed the order isn‚Äôt received on their end despite my having screen shots of my order, the fact that I paid AND the correct location. Further, they refuse to trouble shoot or help us place another order. The manager walked away and said call customer service. I deleted the app and will never order again from this location. Not only do they not know how to process orders from the app, the lack of customer service from a manager was appalling. I had screen shots of everything on the app and a valid order that they acknowledged was their order number. Manager had no interest in placing a new order and pushed it off on customer service. Customer service can‚Äôt get me my food that I ordered for my child who just had surgery and wanted McDonald‚Äôs. You know whose app I never have problems with? BK. The one time they admitted to deleting my order, they helped us place a new order. Maybe your stores could learn from them.

title: Mobile Order needs more work
review: The mobile ordering app needs more work.  I find it extremely inconvenient that I cannot complete my order and pay for the transaction until I am actually onsite at the restaurant.  For example, I want to order my morning coffee because typically I am rushing to get to work. I order my coffee while I am on the road and I have to wait until I arrive at the store before the transaction can be completed.  This doesn‚Äôt help me save time.  I want to complete my mobile order before arriving so that all I have to do is pull up to the store and go in and pick up my coffee.   The current app makes me have to get to the restaurant, open the app, indicate how I want the pick up item, complete the transaction, then wait until my food is prepared, and then I can pick it up.  This doesn‚Äôt save me time.

title: One of the worst fast food apps I‚Äôve used
review:
Instead of using a simple email/password, every time you want to log in, you have to open a link sent to your email that redirects you to the app. 
If you‚Äôre hoping to use this app to save time, you‚Äôre out of luck, because your order doesn‚Äôt actually go through until you check in at the restaurant and sometimes you end up waiting even longer than if you just went to the drive thru only to be given the wrong drink/sauce. 
If you‚Äôre hoping to use your rewards points, hopefully you don‚Äôt want to use one of the local deals because you can only use one per order. 
Lastly, there have been countless times when I add an apple pie to my order, only for them to give me some other gross pie that I don‚Äôt want because they were out and didn‚Äôt want to come out and ask if I wanted a substitution (which I usually don‚Äôt).
developerResponse: {'id': 29057779, 'body': 'we want things to be as easy as possible for you. tell us more about this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2022-04-08T16:47:51Z'}

title: New version desperately needs use testing
review:
The recent update turned an excellent app into a disaster.
Orders are no longer cancel-able for situations when the restaurant is having technical problems (which is happening more frequently). And an order that is left unfulfilled prevents a new order from being placed. I‚Äôve had to uninstall and reinstall now each time I‚Äôve used the app.
The pick up method must now be selected before the order is submitted; whereas previously it was selected upon arrival so the customer could observe the line at the drive through or the vacancies at curb side.
On my most recent order, I selected curbside, and upon arrival was not given a prompt to enter a parking space number. So the runner has no way to identify me.
I normally don‚Äôt go off on reviews like this but it is just an astounding level of incompetence that after previous versions worked so well McDonalds would release this one with so many significant bugs.

title: Half dozen guesses
review:
I have used the McDonald‚Äôs app for about a year with no problems. When the rewards thing came out, it stopped working.   
I tried it at four different stores and went inside to talk to the manager.
I got everything from try another time when the app might be working better. To ‚Ä¶ delete the app and reinstall it.  To ‚Ä¶ emailing customer service and them suggesting I needed less than four credit cards‚Ä¶ But I only have ever had one.  So they told me to delete everything and install one card but it still will not except my form of payment. Yesterday the manager said something was wrong with my phone, but could not tell me what.  
  Today, the guy in the drive-through line told me to click use it in the store, and somehow he was able to make the order work but I still had to pay with my card.   The customer service email said I had to call them, which I did today‚Ä¶ And she told me that my phone is too old.   Nothing ever said there was a problem with an older iPhone‚Ä¶ And it‚Äôs been working fine for over a year.     
It lets me enter my data and a form of payment, but it just will not use the payment to pay for my order.   
My phone works with about 100 apps I use often or occasionally‚Ä¶
It worked today at Taco Bell and Burger King.   It feels like they have no idea what‚Äôs up‚Ä¶ And no one qualified to troubleshoot.
developerResponse: {'id': 26680731, 'body': "We don't like that one bit. Help us get right to the bottom of this by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n", 'modified': '2021-12-07T00:33:18Z'}

title: Worst mobile food app
review: First of all every time you open the app, you have to log in, but it doesn‚Äôt recognize your email until the 3rd or 4th time. Then the menu options are difficult to navigate. It sorts by featured items instead of just being able to go into a meals menu. I should be able to quickly add meal #2 etc. For the life of me could not find a 2 cheeseburger meal?! Not all menu options are available. For example, there was no option for chocolate milk when ordering a Happy Meal, but I know that they carry chocolate milk. Then here‚Äôs the worst part, after you check out, you have to check in, however, the app won‚Äôt recognize that you‚Äôre at the restaurant and you have to physically walk into the store and tell and associate so that they can‚Äôt look up your order and check you in. Complete waste of time. Just go through the drive thru, it‚Äôs way faster and easier! I‚Äôll never use this garbage app again.
developerResponse: {'id': 25489809, 'body': "We're always making improvements! Let's talk more here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-10-04T20:01:16Z'}

title: Useless
review: After ordering and driving to McDonalds, I parked and entered what spot I was in.  It then gave an error and told me to enter the store.  Being a pandemic, I didn‚Äôt want to go in the store which is why I was using the app.  I tried again and it said credit card error so I tried another card.  This time it said I didn‚Äôt have internet.  I was on LTE with four bars.  I tried calling the store which went straight to an error, so I thought maybe they didn‚Äôt have internet.   Went to another store.   Same series of problems.  After calling that store a dozen times, they finally answered and said they could see my order but it showed it wasn‚Äôt paid for.  I logged into my bank account; between the 2 cards I was trying it had charged my account 37 times for a total of $700!   Called their tech support and wasted 20 minutes with them. Told me to delete the app and reinstall.  Did that, same problem.  In the end, I never got my food.

title: Too Many Issues...
review: I‚Äôm not sure how this app is rated so high. I have had so many issues with it. A lot of ‚Äútechnical difficulties....try later‚Äù error messages. Removed and installed many times...I have not been able to login to the application except for once and then app crashed and when I finally went through making up my order and used a coupon it told me I couldn‚Äôt use the coupon but was locked into that coupon for however long...in other words not being able to remove it and add in another one...then it wouldn‚Äôt let me used my payment method and wouldn‚Äôt complete the order and errored out and crashed. So frustrating and extremely buggy application.
developerResponse: {'id': 18924908, 'body': "That's no good. Try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn't help, please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-11-05T17:07:42Z'}

title: APP
review: Every time I want to use the app to apply credit for the coffee i purchase I get a run around. They say I have to tell them before I pay to get the credit and some say if I use the app to get a discount on a sandwich that they can‚Äôt apply the credit of my purchased coffee at the same time. Only one transaction permitted. However at another McDonalds they have no issue at all with giving me my credit for the coffee (to apply to the 5 needed towards a free one) and giving me my discount for my sandwich. I truly wish everyone was on the same page. It is becoming too much trouble to even use your app and at times it is the only reason I go to McDonalds. Please include dos and don't with your app or make sure the employees are aware of how they are to be used.
developerResponse: {'id': 15656841, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this. We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2020-05-29T16:07:36Z'}

title: Payment Glitch needs to be fixed
review: I used the mobile app to place an order online and then drive to the McDonalds location for curbside pickup. After completing the process of checkout through the online app, my credit card company notified me of purchase from McDonalds. A message through the app told me that my order couldn‚Äôt be processed and I needed to come inside for further details. After walking inside, the cashier notified us that the order never went through and we were never charged, despite our credit card company sending a message indicating that payment had occurred. After speaking to the manager for further clarification, she informed us that there was ‚Äúnothing she could do‚Äù and that we would ‚Äúprobably get a refund in the next 2-3 days‚Äù but they had apparently never received our order despite an alert with order numbers being received through the app, and despite our credit card company charging us for an order that had taken place.
developerResponse: {'id': 17709986, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-09-05T21:36:03Z'}

title: All but one thing
review:
I like the fact that you have daily deals on the app, I like the fact that the app is easy to pay through. However it is really annoying that I have to be within a few miles of the restaurant or the app to work why not if I pick what restaurant I want you can‚Äôt load the deals from that restaurant or even load the app at that point. I mean what‚Äôs the point of an app if I have to be at the restaurant before I can use it. That needs to be fixed. I can literally be 15 minutes away from the restaurant and it tell me it can‚Äôt upload the app because it‚Äôs searching for the restaurant. Please fix that and then it would get five stars.
Also is there anyway to clear out your last order!! That is super annoying that my last order is still in my bag and it thinks I‚Äôm reusing a deal üò°

title: Worst App Ever Made
review: I wish I could have rated this a 0 out of 5. This app is the worst app that I have ever used. Because of this app, I don't even want to eat at McDonald's anymore. First of all, why is there no refund function on the app that is linked to the McDonald's stores? I made an order through the app and apparently their machines were down and I couldn't get a refund back. Why is there no function to tell when specific stores are open or closed temporarily for cleaning/health issues? I've stumbled upon a few McDonald's where they just closed without notice for a few hours. Last but not least, why can't I change the location of my order after submitting it to an open McDonald's and charge my card after I change the location? This would all be way more helpful for people who want to utilize the McDonald's rewards and make a lot more people happy. This app just lost me as a customer and lost me money on food I never got.
developerResponse: {'id': 30427428, 'body': 'we want to make the best app we can for you. contact our Mobile App team at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-06-18T15:13:47Z'}

title: McDonalds STOLE Money From Me
review: I have to delete this app and never eat at McDonald‚Äôs again. I‚Äôve had numerous glitches with this app. My rewards points never showed up for weeks and every time I ordered my points would just stay at 0. But I ignored it for so long. More recently however I had a situation where I ordered a meal on the app and it glitched a few times and then when I got to the McDonald‚Äôs the guy tried to give me 3 meals. Due to the glitch I had ordered 3 meals when I meant to order just one. Luckily the manager was kind enough to refund me. But just now I started going over my bank account and budgeting and I noticed that well over a month ago McDonald‚Äôs charged me for FOUR different meals when I only was given one at the store. Because no McDonald‚Äôs employee said anything to me or tried to give me 4 meals, I had no idea. Now it‚Äôs probably way too late for me to do anything and McDonald‚Äôs has just stolen money from me for 3 meals. Do NOT download this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 28296805, 'body': "we get how upsetting this is! let's get that looked into asap at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-02-28T13:26:24Z'}

title: Complete garbage
review:
Don‚Äôt waste your time with this app.  It will not send your order in, all this did was completely screw up the store I attempted to order from. 

First, my order wasn‚Äôt in their system. Second I had to order it at the drive thru and it wasn‚Äôt entered correctly.  I gave them the rewards number from the app so I could get the rewards and somehow that deleted my order from their system again. Third, as I pull to the pay window they don‚Äôt have my order. So, I have to reorder again. And it‚Äôs entered incorrectly again‚Ä¶ Now I get to the receiving window and they have no idea what my order is. Send me to a parking spot to wait, and bring me the wrong order as I asked what they had brought me. Finally, after 30 mins of work and waiting, I got my order. Now I have to check my account to make sure I wasn‚Äôt charged multiple times. I am keeping the app long enough for the review to post them deleting it as fast as I can.

title: Basically unusable
review: This app always gives me trouble. Between the restaurant not being able to pull up the order, the app telling me that the location is closed after I submit the order, and having to track my location all the time, this is BY FAR the WORST food ordering app I‚Äôve ever used. Everywhere else I go, even the mom & pop places that got mobile ordering, I just give them my name when I arrive and they hand me the food. McDonald‚Äôs, on the other hand, never seems to be able to pull up my order. I never know if the app will actually let me pick up my food until I actually arrive. Most of the time, it either glitches out and they can‚Äôt retrieve my order, or the app says they‚Äôre closed even if they‚Äôre not. What‚Äôs the point of tracking my location constantly after submitting the order? You should only need it to help me pick a location. No other food app I‚Äôve used behaves this way. Absolutely ridiculous.

title: Dumbest app ever!
review: This is one of the dumbest apps ever! I was trying to order lunch for my husband who‚Äôs a first responder and during this pandemic, he‚Äôs had to work crazy hours. But I ordered through my phone and it won‚Äôt allow you to pick up the order unless it‚Äôs with the phone that placed the order and they won‚Äôt even start on the order until you get to the location! What a waste of time! And there‚Äôs not even an option to order curbside on the app! This app should be changed so that you can order curbside and is not dependent on you using the actual phone it was ordered through. I‚Äôm also pregnant, so if I had placed an order through the app and wanted someone to pick it up for me, they couldn‚Äôt even do that! Have the app tell you when the order will be ready or schedule a time for when you want to pick it up and then include the make and model of your car for pickup. This isn‚Äôt hard! Panera Bread does it as well as Chipotle and many other restaurants. Fix this app!

title: What happened to this app?
review:
I used earlier versions of the McDonald‚Äôs app for years without any troubles. However, this release has completely blocked me from logging on. I deleted and reinstalled the app a dozen time trying everything like restarting my phone and WiFi. Nothing I do gives me access to the app. The GD thing won‚Äôt even allow me to sign up using a new email.  Their bs reply says for me to download the McDonald‚Äôs Global app so I tried. When I select United Stares a msg saying good news bad news tells me this app isn‚Äôt supported for my selected region. Why was I told to download something that won‚Äôt work for my location?  
Crazy for such a large business to have apps that don‚Äôt work. Looks like I‚Äôll just take my business to other fast food. Funny how every app I have for competitors work just fine. It‚Äôs not me or my phone but rather a McDonald‚Äôs app issue.  I will never walk into a McDonald‚Äôs again cause I‚Äôll be thinking there‚Äôs probably be decent deal on the app but cannot access it.

title: No bueno.
review: You have to have your phone with you to pick up an order. Can‚Äôt have someone else pick up. Crews seem to have a hard time following the orders and don‚Äôt know what to do if something gets missed. Easier just to go through the drive through and order. Deleting this app. Made a large order bc I thought it would create fewer mistakes. Waited for almost 15 minutes in the curbside lot when someone finally brought out the food. Love nearby so I went home and saw that a major item was missing (20 pc) nugget. Went back, got in line at the drive through, finally made it to the window, and the manager hassled me about my complaint stating that they didn‚Äôt have my online order to verify even after I let them see my receipt on my phone. After much back and forth, I was able to get the food and told that it was my fault and that next time, I must bring my entire meal back in order to get an issue fixed. I have chosen to use the drive through from now on.

title: App pick up rules are dumb!
review: I would give the app 5 stars for convenience, but I have decided not to until the pick up option is fixed. I went to pick up my lunch and one for my coworker. We both ordered through the app, and when I got to the restaurant my order was ready. My coworkers order however was not popping up. I told the cashier that it was two orders , and that‚Äôs when he told me her phone had to be close to the restaurant as well. She chose the pay through app action, so it should have been clear for her order to go through. Fix your app so when a order is made, it is able to be picked up without the phone being there, especially since she approved it through her app. You will get 5 stars when you fix that.
developerResponse: {'id': 7186308, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-02-06T23:47:08Z'}

title: Waiting.
review:
What is the point of ordering in advance if the store doesn‚Äôt see it till you are on site. I order on my way to work hoping to pop in and pick it up with no wait. But I can‚Äôt submit till GPS say I have arrived. I go in and wait same as if I had ordered at the counter.

Update
Maybe McDonald‚Äôs should adopt burger king‚Äôs motto of letting us have it our way. It isn‚Äôt your responsibility to decide how hot I want my order. I‚Äôm intelligent enough to know that if I submit my order before I get there I am taking a chance of an unexpected delay resulting in less than optimal results. But when I weigh that against being late for work because I‚Äôm standing in line I will deal with the consequences.  Take a look at Dunkin‚Äô Donuts app. You order for a particular store (that does not change even if you are in the parking lot of another Dunkin‚Äô ) and then at any time you can decide to submit the order and it is processed. Never have to wait there.  Isn‚Äôt the whole point of a mobile app expedited service?
developerResponse: {'id': 8047202, 'body': "Hey! Sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2019-04-04T13:37:21Z'}

title: Difficult
review: I just deleted the app. First of all, it was not user friendly. I had to force it to allow me to order at a location on my way to work instead of one that was closer to me. Next, it wouldn‚Äôt let me place the order‚Ä¶I had to keep going back and forth. I finally paid for my breakfast and headed out. I noticed the app was tracking me‚Ä¶I didn‚Äôt OK it to track me so I cleared my opened apps and it stopped. It also deleted my order. I got to the location and it was 10:32‚Ä¶.I couldn‚Äôt get breakfast. So it took me almost 15 minutes to place the order and I was unable to get what I wanted. This is the third time this happened to me and I decided I could wait in line for 15 minutes or less and actually get my order. So it‚Äôs off of my phone and I will probably visit McDonalds less often because I have limited time to get food during my breaks so I order ahead. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Messed up!
review: Used to love using this app to catch a quick bite or daily deal but recently nothing seems to work right. Today we ordered breakfast on the app at 10:24 (at a restaurant that serves breakfast until 11:00). All was fine till we checked in to say we were there to pick up our order at 10:30, when the app said menu items in our order aren‚Äôt available this time of day since breakfast is only available until 10:29. However, breakfast is served at this location until 11:00?? The manager said she couldn‚Äôt process the order in her system, nor would she honor the app deal and process the order even though they were still serving breakfast. The lobby was full of a line of people with similar issues, some who had been waiting for food for 25 minutes. Total disconnect between app and restaurant, not to mention comeplete lack of customer service ability or attitude in the restaurant. Kind of astounding.

title: Bad operations
review: This app used to be very convenient, but for some reason now each time I try to order something there is a problem with completing the order or the restaurant cannot confirm the order. Recently I tried to use one of the deals promos. Once I got to McDonald‚Äôs the app didn‚Äôt apply the deal to my order so I would‚Äôve ended up paying extra. Then for some odd reason I couldn‚Äôt remove that deal from my order nor could I change anything else. This is all before I was able to confirm that the restaurant received the order. Since the app wouldn‚Äôt allow me to remove items or edit my order I had to cancel the order. So I try reordering with the same deal and the app says I have recently used a deal. What?!?  The app had the entire problems and I just cancelled my order, to which I did not use any deals. So I almost pay extra and I can‚Äôt use any deal options. This app really lacks in functionality.

title: Serious fix!!
review: Look. Get this straight now. Ok tech savvy and understand how internet connections work and all. So I literally never have been able to use this app what so ever. I‚Äôve had two different iPhone X‚Äôs and have had the same problem with both. So I can‚Äôt make an order at all and it always gives me the same error message at the top of my screen when I go to the deals tab ‚ÄúSorry , that didn‚Äôt work, confirm your internet connection‚Äù, when selecting a store it says ‚ÄúSorry, our menus isn‚Äôt available now. try again in a few.‚Äù When I try and place an order ‚ÄúWait, we need you to fill out all of the fields.‚Äù When there are no other fields to fill. Amd before you say oh it might be the stores connection or some thing on the lines of that, my friend uses the app all the time one the exact store I try and he has an iPhone 6, a SIX! Like something is seriously wrong here and as far as I researched I have seen anything on the internet about this problem. Please fix it

title: Lots of issues. Barely functioning app.
review:
So many problems. So I put in my credit card information and then I moved. That means that I need to update my credit card information ... but you can‚Äôt edit the information already entered and you can‚Äôt delete a card once you put it in. So now there‚Äôs no way to use the card I want to use. If I try to enter t as a new card, I just get an error message. If I try to use it, I get an error message. The app is now worthless to me. Many of the ‚Äúdeals‚Äù are tied to making a mobile order, but I can‚Äôt because of the above-described problems. This is basically a non-functioning app that the developers seek to have no intention of actually bringing it to a working order.

Also, the app doesn‚Äôt allow customizations to burgers that you can get in the store. For example, you can‚Äôt add mayo to a McDouble on the app because the option just isn‚Äôt there, but if you walk in the store and order, you can get that option. Again, the app is unusable.

title: Paid Twice
review: The mobile app has so many glitches. The other day, I tried to use it, and it told me to go through the drive-thru and tell them my order number. I didn‚Äôt understand how that was easier than just telling them your order. I then got put at a screen that showed my order number, only for it to disappear immediately. I tried to go back to retrieve the number, and it showed me a different number than the one before! So unfortunately, I figured I had probably sent my meal order in twice. They didn‚Äôt say anything about 2 of the exact same mobile orders going through at the window, but then when I looked at my bank statement, yep, got charged twice. Which means there was also a full meal randomly sitting at the drive thru. The app wasn‚Äôt user-friendly enough for me to find an actual way to contact someone about the situation. Anyway. Just disappointed, that‚Äôs all. I‚Äôll still go to McDonald‚Äôs for my coffee, but I won‚Äôt be using the mobile app to do it. :)

title: Mobile Order and Pay Needs Better Integration
review:
What‚Äôs the point in using mobile order and pay if people that order after you at the drive through get there‚Äôs before you get yours? Half the time it‚Äôs not any faster than the drive through, sometimes even slower... needs better integration. Only thing keeping me from trashing the app is the deals. 

Edit: I‚Äôve been waiting for the improved speed McDonald‚Äôs development team. Where‚Äôs It at? Or was that some automated mumbo jumbo to make me feel better. Just waited 10 minutes at my local McDonald‚Äôs this morning for a McGriddle and a coffee because they either forgot about my order or didn‚Äôt want to bring it out because it was wet outside. It was super slow when I was there and shouldn‚Äôt have taken more than 3-4 minutes. I had to go inside and ask for my order... Reducing my rating from 2 stars to 1 star. If you want mobile order to do great maybe you should educate your employees on the importance of it a little more.

title: Won‚Äôt let me click ask app to Do Not Track!
review: I have tried to tell your darn app not to track me! You now have to have my permission to track me and I don‚Äôt want you to track me. It automatically has the allow tracking clicked in yellow with an arrow and it will NOT allow me to go further without clicking continue! You have got my personal information held hostage as I cannot tell this app not to track me! I can‚Äôt use this app any longer due to your incompetence of this problem! Fix it immediately please! I have 4 McCafe beverages for free I need to redeem and I will not allow any of my apps to track me! Chick-fil-A, Starbucks, Wendy‚Äôs,etc have allowed me to use it without tracking‚Ä¶WHY NOT YOU????!!!!!

title: more technology, worse service
review:
I was in a hurry. It was 108 degrees. Thought I would try out the order-in-advance-pick-up-when-you-arrive service. In the over 30 minutes I was waiting in my car in the drive-through at the restaurant, it was ‚ÄúYou had an order?‚Äù Even though I gave them the Order # and showed the phone. Then they gave me the wrong order. Then I got someone else‚Äôs order (probably the person who seemed to be having the same problem in the car in front of me. I got directed to go park in the pick up area of the parking lot when they told me they did not have any Big Macs (huh?). Finally someone brought the order out to me. But it was incomplete!!! The most ridiculous visit I have had (all to get a #1 combo)...except for the last time I went to a McD‚Äôs and it took longer to order from the new indoor kiosks, then go wait in line pay for the order, then come back and pick up the order than it has ever taken just to order at the counter.

Never again!

title: Listen to Your Customers, Please
review: You are in danger of losing so many customers, as many here have said already. Listen to us, please. The app, itself, is OK. It works without a hitch, for me, about 75% of the time. Now, you‚Äôre punishing drive thru and walk in customers by making most of the app coupons only applicable to mobile orders. You‚Äôre alienating a huge percentage of your customers. In trying to save money on simply properly training your employees, you‚Äôre adding kiosks and mobile pay. You‚Äôre going to find some push-back. People sometimes have to use cash, and you‚Äôre almost forcing customers to pay electronically. Clearly, it‚Äôs all about your bottom line and not your customers or employees. What a shocker. Just like all the other big corporations. Well, your bottom is line is screwed if you scare away all your customers and replace your employees with electronics.

title: App Doesn‚Äôt Have a ‚ÄòPay With Cash‚Äô Option
review:
I am so upset and disappointed with McDonalds company period, with how they have operated during this pandemic. 
They was the first to close their lobbies, the only way you could order food was through the drive through, or by downloading their App (this app) and you have no choice but to give them your bank card information if you want their food without going through the drive through (if you‚Äôre on foot and wait in one of their numbered parking spaces) And they still have not opened their lobbies at most, almost all, of their locations. You can‚Äôt walk up to the window and ask for them to take your order, no they won‚Äôt do it,.. as if this pandemic wasn‚Äôt enough! 
I will not forget the way McDonalds treated their customers when this pandemic is over. It will be a very long time before I go to any McDonalds again‚Ä¶

title: login every 24 hours???
review:
I am proud to say I love McDonald‚Äôs. I‚Äôm not crazy about the McDonald‚Äôs local to me but, in general, when I hear the word ‚ÄúMcDonald‚Äôs‚Äú it brings a smile to my face. 

That said, this app, while it is pretty good, is extremely frustrating because, after about 24 hours you get ‚Äúlogged out‚Äú. Who out there enjoys typing in their email address and password any more than they absolutely have to??? I mean, do they really think it is a security risk if I just stay logged in? It‚Äôs a major failure in one of their updates. I have not had to do this except in the last few months. It is my strong feeling that you should be able to just stay logged in. Call

To the developers, please fix this!

title: Very displeased !
review: Stupidest app ever ! I work in a different town than my wife and i ordered here lunch . Everything was good to go and said my order was placed . My wife drives up and goes in for her order wasting over a 3rd of her lunch only to find no order ready .  When she inquires the guy tells her that when you place an order on the app it charges your card as a pending transaction but doesnt actually charge and they dont start making your food until youre a certain distance from the store . Completely f***ng USELESS ! Whats even the point of ordering ahead of time if youre not guna make it until im close ? And like its unheard of for someone somewhere else yo order you food .  STUPID and wont ever use again
