title: Could be much better
review: I am really disappointed with this app. I like the deals you can get but that‚Äôs literally the only good thing it offers. I loved the punch card you used to offer and I could get free McCafe drinks. So when you got rid of those and came out with the app I assumed they would be easier to track. Wrong! I‚Äôve been using the app for at least a year now and I should be owed about 6 or 8 free drinks at this point. I had no idea that every time you order a drink on the app you have to scan that stupid barcode for it to count. Why wouldn‚Äôt the app track that for you automatically?? It makes no sense. Surely you have smart enough developers to make that work! Speaking on that, why would you NOT have some sort of FAQ that covers that? I searched and searched the Internet and was never able to figure out how it worked; I had to finally ask an employee. At this rate I‚Äôd rather you bring back the punch cards!

title: 60min promo!?!
review: Recent update brings the new feature of only being able to use a promo from the deal section once every 60mins. I am a millennial(group that MCD is targeting to come back) and do not like this change. If you are going to offer the deal then fully offer them no matter what. Limiting the use of coupons limits me coming back even more. I would change it back! What if you are on a road trip and stop for a deal item and then 20mins later change your mind on wanting another deal you just saw. You would show up again and get told no via app or worker. How do you think that will play out in the future?!  That person might say screw MCD they don‚Äôt honor deals. I will go elsewhere. Now MCD is out money and a customer. Run that through your promo department! If you must have a time limit then I would set it to a typical guest stay. What maybe 20mins?!
developerResponse: {'id': 7439349, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-02-24T23:28:46Z'}

title: Good functionality until it comes to the billing
review: This app is fairly easy to use. Not every menu item is listed in the app. You can save your favorite meals or items for quick order later. The biggest issue is with the billing. For instance, if an item is unavailable with your order when you click pay you will get an error message that says you‚Äôre not connected to the Internet, but the transaction will still go to your Credit or debit card and a hold will be placed. The app does not actually tell you what the error is for. If you tap pay again you will get the same error and another hold will be placed for the same dollar amount. Just yesterday I placed a mobile order like normal and everything went through fine, except for the fact that I was double charged for the same order. This app still has many bugs that need to be worked out, especially with the billing.

title: Pointless
review:
The app has no reason to exist. It‚Äôs the same thing as going to the store, waiting in line, and buying it there. It just happens in a different order and assures that no matter how long it actually takes them to get you your order, they get paid either way. The app itself will tell you they don‚Äôt even start your order until you get to the location (which it tries to determines on it‚Äôs own btw). From there you can go inside (wait in line) and get it, go through the drive through (wait in line) and get it, or you can ‚Äúpick it up curbside‚Äù which really means you sit in a parking spot and wait until they get around to bringing your order out. In none of these is your order a priority of any kind. It it‚Äôs still first come, first serve. You just pay for your food before everyone else. The app doesn‚Äôt; 
A) Save you any money. 
B) Save you any time. 
C) Make the process any more convenient. 
Like I said, the app LITERALLY has no reason to exist as it functions currently.
developerResponse: {'id': 3529177, 'body': 'Hi there, Larry! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2018-05-20T20:19:46Z'}

title: FULL SCREEN SPLASH I can‚Äôt close??‚Äôn
review:
So I go to a McDonald‚Äôs and get ready to place the order I didn‚Äôt have a chance to using the McDonald‚Äôs app before hand. However McDonald‚Äôs decides to pop up a full screen splash page about rewards or some thing,  I cannot get rid of.  

This is a MOBILE app McDonald‚Äôs, please stop prioritizing your marketing efforts over use.  

Yo add insultInsult to injury, there is no way in the app to just clothes out of the splash screen, you must go page, after page, after page, and then finally you‚Äôre forced to agree to the reward program. Which gives me the feeling I probably just clicked a box that allowed them to sell more of my user information.  Crappy behavior McD‚Äôs‚Ä¶

title: OKAY BUT NEED IMPROVEMENT
review:
It‚Äôs great for quick orders and getting points, but there‚Äôs one major flaw in the app that happens literally every single time I use it.

Even after I‚Äôve completed an order and picked it up from a restaurant, next time I open the app for an order later on, even days later, it still hung up on the last steps of the previous order and doesn‚Äôt clear it out. So if I try to add things to order that second time, it tells me it‚Äôs adding onto my previous incomplete order, even though that order was most definitely pay for and picked up.

It‚Äôs very annoying, and requires three or four extra steps before making a new order. I either have to ‚Äúcancel‚Äú the previous order even though it‚Äôs already been paid for and picked up, or I quit and reset the app, or both.
developerResponse: {'id': 31683459, 'body': 'a quick delete and redownload should fix this. if not we can totally help out just drop us a line here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-08-26T19:11:55Z'}

title: Fix the sign in or sign up!!!!!
review:
Update: tried uninstalling and reinstalling app.  Same thing happens.  Tried going to the ling I was recommended and it takes me to McDonald‚Äôs website and says ‚Äúerror‚Äù. Really think this issue is something that should be look into.  Who would think to put sign in/ sign up together anyways? Any other company/business has a separate option for the two.  

The app works wonderfully but the only part that is HIGHLY annoying is the fact that if you currently have an account you won‚Äôt be able to log in if your phone accidentally logs you out. Why isn‚Äôt the sign in option different from the sign up option??? I‚Äôve legit put in my gmail, Facebook, email, etc etc etc and it continues to inform me that ‚Äúthis email is already in use‚Äù I KNOW THAT THATS WHY IM TRYING TO SIGN IN DUDE. Wasted 30 mins of my lunch fighting with this app. Don‚Äôt understand why it doesn‚Äôt recognize I‚Äôm trying to SIGN IN not SIGN UP.
developerResponse: {'id': 26567166, 'body': "Try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn't fix it, reach out to us here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-12-01T03:13:37Z'}

title: Unhappy
review:
I really liked this app when I first started to use it; when a friend recommended it to me.  I would use it two or three times a week. 
In the beginning I would have rated it five stars. Now I would give it a rating of two and half to three stars. Most of your deals right now are Mobile order and pay, Exclusive to mobile ordering.  Matter of fact five out of the seven deals offered right now are that way. 
I prefer to walk in use my app and either dine in or leave and not have to use my credit card to get one of the deals. 
I use this app because it was recommended to me.  I have done the same and recommended it to friends and family members. Now the way the deals are offered I don't think so, not right away.

title: Buyer Beware
review:
Flexibility in food choice/preference should be sync‚Äôd between the restaurant and app.  Beware that it‚Äôs possible to order a menu item thru the app only to find out after arrival that the location doesn‚Äôt offer the selection. 

In my case I ordered an Egg McMuffin meal substituting egg whites. Pressing ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù as I walked in the door, I waited seven minutes to have the order expediter come over to tell me ‚Äúwe no longer have egg whites.‚Äù No offer to substitute a regular McMuffin and no offer to refund my purchase.  Just a statement and a blank look. 

So while this was mostly a service issue, the app allowed me to order an item that the restaurant does not carry. That tells me there is no ability for a store to select items that are not stocked so the system and app can prevent their selection/purchase, or store management didn‚Äôt update the inventory properly/at all if the system has that capability. Neither option is good.
developerResponse: {'id': 18219927, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-10-01T16:31:46Z'}

title: Gotten better with time
review:
A solid app. Better specials and promotions than just walking in and ordering. Still can be confusing. Things weirdly appear (and do not appear) in my checkout items, so make sure to go through the list before ordering. I pay with Ô£øPay which works great. Usually use curbside, inside pickup or dine-in but app says it works via drive through too. Just use order transaction number.
Promotion pop-ups can be annoying and 
Also local franchise specials do not appear (free small coffee at my local McDonalds does not show up. And for reason unknown Ice Cream Sunday‚Äôs stopped showing up to order in my app. Just as well üòÑ. App used to be buggy.
Remember to confirm order when you get to McDonald‚Äôs; food preparation does not start till you are there. This is a good thing if you do not was soggy fires.
developerResponse: {'id': 14633522, 'body': "Thanks for sharing, Ben! Please let our Mobile App team know at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html if you need any further help to solve any issues you're having with the McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2020-04-13T14:21:26Z'}

title: Pretty bad app
review:
Terrible app for such a big name in the food industry. Stuck for days. 3 weeks ago I couldn‚Äôt log in and ask for a password reset. The reset email never came. So cannot use app. Finally found my old password today that works on the mcdonalds web site but the app now said ‚ÄúReset password has been initiated on this account and the action has not been completed.‚Äù I asked for another reset and the email came. But using that temp password does not work, same error.

Hey designer, this is not a banking app. Even if password is stolen you still could not buy food without Apple Pays‚Äô finger print security. So to put so much process and bad processes to login is ludicrous. Whats more, I basically cannot do any orders for weeks. No other apps has this level of password pain. Just let people recover and move on.

And also where is the help button? Or even a number on the app that you can call? Nothing. I am so disappointed. Will just have to go somewhere else for food.

title: Good start, needs polishing
review: The app worked well for me but I wasn‚Äôt allowed to have a certain deal through it. To access the deal I had to go inside. What drew me in that day was a soda for $1 and 2 egg McMuffins for $4. Great deal! Once inside the restaurant I was told I couldn‚Äôt have both deals at once. They had to be rung up separately. But I only wanted those three things. The store was great and overrode the system. The app should be updated to allow access to all options through it. The app is the only reason I even tried McDonalds again. For comparison, at Starbucks I can order anything with infinite customizations. Once at the store I walk in and it‚Äôs already paid for and waiting for me. I grab it and go. For Chick-fil-A, it‚Äôs the same except they bring it to my car curbside. I‚Äôd love to do that at McDonalds but not if it forces me inside the store, defeating the reason to use the app.

title: App problem
review: I use this app and it has been very helpful but I did have a problem that was never resolved. Several months ago for some reason the app would not accept my password and I had not changed it. I used ‚Äúforgot password‚Äù and was sent a link but I had bought a new phone since I first registered and when I tried to create a new password I got a message telling me that I had to do so using my phone, which I of course was. I tried over and over and had the same experience. I called customer support. The person I spoke to couldn‚Äôt fix the problem and promised I would be contacted by a another department that would be able to fix it. I was never contacted and finally had to create a whole new account to be able to use the app. I lost my reward points I had accrued.
developerResponse: {'id': 28784458, 'body': "we're here to help resolve any issues you may have. hit us up through the link with more info on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n", 'modified': '2022-03-25T15:36:24Z'}

title: App problems
review:
1) App stops working at 7 PM way before store closes and on some mornings starts working an hour after the store opens
2) why do we need to see menus of stuff your not selling at breakfast or at lunch?
3) why do you let me put things in my shopping bag that are not available?
4) why does my shopping bag from last order stay open till next order?  I have to manually take everything out the bag like changing items from breakfast to lunch, plus if there is expired discount in bag; it also has to be manually deleted.
5) how come I can not use my points on things I like to purchase?
6) why can I not use points on more than one item in a given order?
7) too many non-personal codes.  How come you can‚Äôt use my name on app order and my car type.
Your marketing department needs to focus on what the individual customer likes to buy not the deals that make biggest profit or create most revenue.  You really want customer to come back more often.  You go to your chicken competitor that‚Äôs not open on Sunday, they know my name, what kind of car I drive, and know what I like to order and as I‚Äôm ordering on their app, they suggest 1 or more items I can use my points on.   And then first think I think of about your billion $ companies app is how much frustration it going to give me and your employee to process my order.
developerResponse: {'id': 27497300, 'body': 'we want to make the best Mobile App we can. help us improve on this by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-06-30T01:51:16Z'}

title: Problem when ordering coffee
review: I have two problems when it comes to ordering my coffee. First, when i order my coffee with the creamer and Splenda on the side, 50% off the time, I get sugar instead. That‚Äôs the main reason I don‚Äôt order coffee and let them add the Splenda and creamer because I won‚Äôt be able to tell if they used Spkenda or sugar in it. Second, on the mobile app, when ordering coffee, there‚Äôs no clear option to have the creamer and the Splenda to be on the side. Again, I don‚Äôt trust the staff /crew to put the Splenda and not sugar. I hope the app will be fixed to have a clear option of having the creamer and the Splenda added in the order on the side, but not added in the coffee by the staff/crew

title: Terrible service if I could give it no starts I would
review: Every time I come with my ‚ÄúDeal‚Äù with my app it never works at the restaurant. It must have something to do with their WiFi because they make sure it comes up when your not on their WiFi the moment you walk in the can no longer scan the offer. Today I had my offer ready to scan, lady tells me to scan  and so I did so, she said it didn‚Äôt work try it again, I do so again and again. It didn‚Äôt work again. They weren‚Äôt any help to try to honor the deal online as this MCD has the worst service. Sadly it was  only 1 for a coke and they could do anything, it‚Äôs not the cost it‚Äôs the fact of the service. You offer a deal and don‚Äôt honor it. I call lot false advertising!!
developerResponse: {'id': 4227601, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-07-13T21:55:09Z'}

title: Frequent Problems
review: I like the McDonald's app, but I'm frustrated by problems with frequent logouts and bad handoffs to Uber Eats. First, I've been logged out a few times while making an order, which caused me to start over. The last time it happened when I was checking in at the restaurant. My order was lost, so I had to redo it in the parking lot. Second, I've had a lot of problems with McDelivery. When I press the button to switch to Uber Eats, the Uber app opens without my order, so I go back to the McDonald's app and press the button again. If I'm lucky, the Uber app will have my order the second time, but I'm not always that lucky. Just this morning, I created my order in the McDonald's app, and the cart in the Uber Eats had twelve strawberry packets instead of breakfast sandwiches, so I ordered from Jack in the Box instead.

title: A couple drawbacks
review:
biggest issue is that, though you can prepare your order from home or wherever you happen to be, it won‚Äôt be sent to the kitchen until you arrive on site and connect to the macdonalds wifi. But the time you add up selected everything, adding payment choice, and sending it in... you‚Äôd have already had your food at drive through.

Not just that, but the app does not reflect in store availability or consider the cleaning of machines ect. So all the work to make the order you had to wait to give to them when you got there (instead of just SAYING it to the speaker) often times is for nothing because they don‚Äôt have it or a dozen other reasons.

And here‚Äôs the kicker... they can either cancel the whole order, or you end up paying for whatever they don‚Äôt have, or cant give to you. There is NO REFUND option, whatsoever. 

o my good side is that there are deals if the day that are pretty good, and it keeps track of how many Mocha Frappes you‚Äôve purchased. Every 5th is free. They better be, though, since you end up not getting half of them cuz they‚Äôre ‚Äúcleaning the machine‚Äù at any hour they don‚Äôt feel like doing it.

As i finish writing this, i‚Äôm actually just arriving. i can connect to wifi.... but it has no connection to the internet, so... useless
developerResponse: {'id': 15805718, 'body': "Hey, Scarlet. Sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you.", 'modified': '2021-02-24T01:16:46Z'}

title: BEware- No Refunds with the mobile app
review:
I have used the mobile app a couple of times but the last time was my LAST time!  The McD‚Äôs didn‚Äôt have 3 of the items when I got there, exchanged 1 sandwich which cost $1 less than the one I paid for, and then didn‚Äôt give me a 3rd item I found as I left. The store said they couldn‚Äôt refund bc it wasn‚Äôt their receipt and they only ‚Äúaccept to honor the mobile app order- they‚Äôre private franchises‚Äù, and  the mobile app said they have nothing to do with the money - it goes straight to the store‚Äôs bank- I‚Äôd have to dispute the whole amount- I didn‚Äôt think was the right thing to do but since I‚Äôm still waiting for for gen mgr to return a call- (not holding my breath) I probably should‚Äôve done it. They obviously don‚Äôt care about losing business.
As far as the deals- they seem to get less and less as time goes on.

title: Horrible, do not waste your time
review:
I have only used this app twice and both times it has made me regret my decision to download it. Both times its felt like the McDonald‚Äôs employees have never had a mobile order and dont know what to do when I come in with an order already placed and paid for. I downloaded this app to hopefully expedite the process of ordering so i can be in and out as soon as possible. This has never been the case, as the two times ive used it not only has my order been completely wrong but its also taken atleast 30 mins, which is way more than just simply going to the drive though. On top of that, the app doesn‚Äôt seem to ever be updated, as it is showing seasonal items like the McRib months after its been discontinued. 

In short if you would like like to get your order fresh and as soon as possible, skip the app and just ask for fresh at the drive through, you will have a much better service and wait time than this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 7000901, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had! Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-01-24T22:59:34Z'}

title: They stole my money! Use it at your own risk.
review: I placed a mobile order for in store pick up. The restaurant couldn‚Äô¬ôt find my order on their system. Even though I showed them proof of my purchase and I had paid from the app already, they declined to give me the order nor my money back. The manager indicated that he couldn't¬Ä¬ô do anything about it and that I had to file a dispute with my bank. I called customer service and they couldn‚Äô¬ôt do anything either; they also told me to file a dispute with my bank and that they would let the IT department know about the issue to make the app better :-| . Now I have to deal with my bank to file a dispute for $3 because of a McDonald‚Äôs error that no body is able to fix. I understand that the app can fail, but that is when companies should have appropriate customer service to provide the right support. After this I‚Äôm afraid of using the app again and having to go through the same junk if something goes wrong.

title: Pickup not allowed unless phone is in car
review: So I took a star off because I love Wendy‚Äôs functionality. I can order from my app on my phone and give the order number to my husband to pick up on his way home. He texts and says he‚Äôs in spot #3 and I click I‚Äôm here in spot #3 from my app. Easy peasy. However, on McD it said ‚Äúlooks like you are not at McD, sorry you cannot pick up your order‚Äù. We could not proceed. He went inside showed the order number from my text but still had to replace the whole order live and I had to cancel the order on my app. So now, we‚Äôll be using Wendy‚Äôs so I can place the order while he is driving to pick it up. Wish you guys allowed that option.
developerResponse: {'id': 28594832, 'body': "we totally get it. the device used to place the order must be present in order to check in. let's talk about ways to improve by replying via the link: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-03-15T23:55:39Z'}

title: Don‚Äôt like since it changed
review: I am not a fan. When the app first started, it was great. Now too many of the offers are mobile order and pay. In order to do that, you must have a credit card attached to the account. There is no option to attach a gift card, only credit card (at least nine that I have been able to find.). Also, it used to be that when you buy one, get one free McCafe, the one you purchased and actually paid for went on your card (not sure what it‚Äôs called, but it‚Äôs the counter that keeps track of the number of drinks you buy, and gives you a free one after you purchase 5.) it no longer does that. I used to find this app great and would do multiple transactions and could get several great deals, but I don‚Äôt use it as much anymore.

title: Can‚Äôt Login
review: This app has been stupid for a couple of months now. It will not let me access deals without logging in, but won‚Äôt let me log in. I can‚Äôt use my rewards and I can‚Äôt earn anymore rewards. I have my account linked to Facebook. I go through the process of allowing the app access. It comes back to the McDonald‚Äôs app and says nice to meet you even though I‚Äôve had an account that Facebook recognizes. I agree to the terms and it says I already have an account and need to login. Then it takes me to the same screen and is an endless loop of not being able to login. I even went to the extra settings where it says login. Nothing. I wrote into mobile support. They told me to call. I called, the person said their tech team would call me. That was a big lie. I have deleted the app and downloaded again multiple times. I don‚Äôt know how you expect to have good feedback when people cannot login.
developerResponse: {'id': 29512742, 'body': "let's get you out of this loop! reach out to us here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-05-02T14:12:09Z'}

title: Pretty good but needs work
review: I love using the app for deals, I use it almost daily. I usually would always order for curbside pickup. I added a deal to my order and when I went to pay it said my deal wouldn‚Äôt work and then jt would not let me remove the deal from my cart. At all. It won‚Äôt let me start another order because that will always be on my order. It completely doesn‚Äôt register me clicking to ‚Äúremove‚Äù or ‚Äúedit‚Äù. It also glitches with the ‚Äúfree McCafe after 5..‚Äù sometimes it won‚Äôt count a purchase or as it‚Äôs doing now, it won‚Äôt update after I claimed the free mcCafe so it‚Äôs not counting the ones I‚Äôm getting after to put towards the next free one. The little glitches I get are the ones I use most. I hope these things are fixed because I really enjoy using the app and it‚Äôs features.

title: Convenience and deals offset by failure to refresh between orders
review: What I like: ordering meals and customizing orders through the app is extremely convenient, as are the availability of deals. The biggest issue I have is the app doesn‚Äôt refresh timely once an order is completed: if I order dinner and pick up on day 1, and then return to the app to order breakfast on day 3, the app still shows my day 1 dinner order in my checkout.  This requires me to spend time manually clearing out each item from my previous order before I can place a new order. Restarting the app appears to have no effect. There also have been intermittent issues where a restaurant shows in the app as being closed at 6am (app says restaurant will open at 10am) and I‚Äôm literally standing in the restaurant open for business!
developerResponse: {'id': 7425166, 'body': 'Oh no! Most times this can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give us a call, so we can look into this further at 1-877-334-4332.', 'modified': '2019-02-22T23:05:10Z'}

title: Abuser Interface
review: Exhibits constant connectivity issues while other apps work fine. Deals are now mostly available through mobile ordering. Mobile ordering is uncertain as the process can be initiated by picking a location, a deal or start ordering. The location defaults to the last store visited and choosing another location can affect the order as a deal may not be available there. It requires you to pick a meal time which defaults to one that may be before or after the logical one. An order isn‚Äôt placed until you check in at the location which varies whether you are eating in, picking up or waiting at curbside. It‚Äôs very difficult to delete an order and a duplicate may appear if you had to change location while placing one. The lack of a step-by-step process or verification makes this one of the most difficult apps to use. And just like ordering at the counter, there is no guarantee your order will be correct or complete.

title: Todays app update will not allow me to login!
review:
I had originally signed up with an email (before the app supported facebook login).  Then when the app allowed for Facebook login, I started using that - much quicker than having to type in my email and remember my password!
Today‚Äôs update required me to get logged in again.  I clicked on ‚Äòcontinue with facebook‚Äô, saw the message that I HAD previously used facebook to login in, proceeded thru the facebook verification screens, and was then dumped back to a Mcdonalds screen that said I ORIGINALLY had signed up under an email account and had to go thru email!  WHY???  
I clicked on the button for it to send me an email link where i SUPPOSEDLY would not be required to enter my mcdonalds password to get logged in‚Ä¶
I clicked on the button from the email and it opened up the mcdonalds app window that says ‚Äòwelcome now you can get started ordering the food you love with ease‚Äô, with an orange ‚Äòcontinue‚Äô button at the bottom 
I click on CONTINUE and NOTHING HAPPENS!  NOTHING!
I WASN‚ÄôT trying to get into the app to ORDER FOOD! I wanted to see deals etc
WHY wont you allow me to login under Facebook when I HAVE logged in that way before?
PLEASE bring back the logic to allow facebook login, OR totally remove that option when logging in!
Great job developers - prevent users from getting into the app!
developerResponse: {'id': 29384783, 'body': 'we can totally look into this for you. drop us a line with all the details here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-11-07T17:01:55Z'}

title: Love McDonalds, Hate Franchise Owner Indifference
review: As much as I love McDonalds food (Qpounder + Fries üòé), it is frustrating when a problem occurs, and complaints seem to be utterly disregarded. The dismissive way that employees continue to behave, only supports my supposition. It would be very refreshing if McDonalds corporation became the first large company to actually care about customer service (versus paying lip service in commercials and virtual signaling with charities).  I can‚Äôt be the only person who remembers a time when businesses didn‚Äôt care more about volume than they did customer retention and reputation. Be a pioneer again McDonalds!!!  Earn that 5th star by motivating franchise owners who simply wish to sit home and count their money. Make them care about our business again.

title: Location limits pickup options
review:
While the app is easier to use than most fast food apps and easy to customize orders, not all of the advertised specials are available in the app.
My main complaint is the inability for me to place the order and have someone else pick it up. Since they use your location to track when you arrive it‚Äôs very difficult if you‚Äôre sending someone else in your family for the pick up. There needs to be an option for sending a link (maybe via text) to another device so the McDonald‚Äôs app will then track their location once they tap the link. That would fix the ‚Äòlooks like you‚Äôre still not here‚Äô error message you get when you tap ‚ÄòI‚Äôm already here‚Äô to try to complete the order once the person who is picking up arrives.

title: WiFi and Cellular Data
review:
Cannot order on McDonald‚Äôs free WiFi service because credit card transactions are not secure.  

Then you log on using your cellular data to order but you get an error message when you try to pick up and select delivery method because you are not on McDonalds WiFi

App has other bugs.   If you order a free McCafe drink (after buying five), you can also order and complete a ‚ÄòDeal of the Day‚Äô with coupon, but when the stores system doesn‚Äôt recognize transaction even though credit card transaction has gone through presumably because you are allowed only one free item a day.  That‚Äôs fine, but system allows you to complete transaction getting two. 

Some 24 hour stores close out taking transactions on app after hours (and say store is closed) even though store is open presumably because for safety reasons, the pickup options include curbside pickup which stores don‚Äôt have an option to individually close out. 

Two for $3 items are not disclosed or advertised and you have to order to get discount. 

Don‚Äôt forget to close App out after ordering if you don‚Äôt want McD tracking your location all day.  

Great food value ordering app but still has a few bugs.
developerResponse: {'id': 21295324, 'body': "Sounds like you've had some difficulties with your payment. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can get this looked into for ya. ", 'modified': '2021-02-25T16:49:46Z'}

title: Deals are great.  App needs some work.
review:
Very competitive deals.  I use the app frequently.  As others have mentioned there are several glitches though.

One of the more frequent problems is selecting a deal and being told ‚Äúthis offer isn‚Äôt available this time of day‚Äù when it definitely should be available.  This happens for breakfast and lunch.  Usually I open and close the app several times and it‚Äôll eventually let me select the deal.

There are other weird glitches.  This morning after going through the ‚Äúthis offer isn‚Äôt available this time of day‚Äù thing and finally being able to put my order through, I drive to the McDonald‚Äôs, pull into a curbside pickup spot, select ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here‚Äù and put the parking spot # in there and hit done.  I get an error saying ‚Äúsorry this store appears to be closed‚Äù.  I see people behind me going through drive thru and it is very much open.  I try exiting the app and restarting but it tells me I ‚Äúcan‚Äôt select another offer for another 60 minutes‚Äù.  I just had to leave and go somewhere else.  Luckily it didn‚Äôt charge my card.

App seems very unpolished at times to be owned by such a large corporation.  Again the deals are very good.  I just wish I could use them when I want without issue.
developerResponse: {'id': 17937728, 'body': "Hi there. We're sorry to hear you're having trouble with the app. To get you back to the deals you love, we‚Äôd like to look into this further. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2020-09-17T15:45:03Z'}

title: App mis conveniences
review: I had a problem with this app within the past month and haven‚Äôt had mc Donald‚Äôs ever since, nor will I. I constantly used to app and I won‚Äôt again. The app charged me for an order twice and then the managers at Sierra Lakes in Fontana stated she could not help me with a refund, and since it was a lot of food she was unsure whether I wanted it all so she could just not give it to me after it was already paid for. Then she gave me a number to a customer service that has absolutely no purpose. They can‚Äôt refund you, they can‚Äôt fix the bug either and say it‚Äôs all up to the store. So I ask myself, what is the point of the customer service then. What do they do ? These are questioned I still have no answer to. They also claimed they would call me back the following day so they could perhaps work something out with me, they never called me either. So I‚Äôm still waiting for this call. I suggest you do not use the app because the bug may not be fixed.

title: It is ok
review: I have used this app for months. I would say it worked for me about 80% of the time. Quite a few times it failed and I did not get the food I tried to order. Many times I used the app because of the special offers they are giving on it, but when I arrived at the restaurant and tried to check in, the order failed and I did not get the special offer which was the reason I went there in the first place. My debit card was sometimes charged even when the order failed. When I contacted them they said I would be refunded after several days (I never checked to verify). In summery, this app is good to use occasionally but not on regular basis. Also don't try to contact their customer service unless you have free time and you want to volunteer it to help them debug their app. You will get nothing from contacting them.

title: App used to be great but now a disaster
review: Crashes trying to sign out but doesn‚Äôt actually sign out, and then drains the battery while continuously sending my location to McDonalds. ??? Also, the Deals don‚Äôt show up in the evening. It goes through all the motions asking a bunch of questions and the the cart tells you it wasn‚Äôt added and needs to be manually removed. ??? Plus the app doesn‚Äôt hasn‚Äôt detected when I‚Äôm at McDonalds for the last month or so, same place, different places in other locations around the county. Then they can‚Äôt find the order in the system so please pull forward. ??? Too much hassle to fool with until the app becomes usable again.

title: Terrible app needs bugs and glitches fixed
review: Not sure why this apple is getting more than one star at all or so highly rated. I‚Äôve only had one successful app order and it‚Äôs been crap since then. It won‚Äôt let me order anymore because I can‚Äôt change the deal on it and it‚Äôs been three days I‚Äôve tried to change the deal and select a new one. There‚Äôs NO WHERE ON THE APP TO SEE YOUR CART. I can‚Äôt find the cart anywhere and when I try to start over with a new order it says I already have an order in progress‚Ä¶which was my one and only purchase on the app‚Ä¶I don‚Äôt understand how you can get so much messed up on an app‚Ä¶you‚Äôd be better off using paneras app to order better food anyways. Out of all the apps I‚Äôve used this is the worst for ‚Äúfast food‚Äù. Don‚Äôt bother trying to get the deals people just go through the drive thru and pay the full price or the dollar menu. It‚Äôll save you time and frustration.

title: Convenient But Glitchy and Overcharging
review:
When the McDonald‚Äôs app is working properly, it is great. In particular, the Deals part of the app is very convenient. That is especially so, in an era of contactless dining.

However, when the McDonald‚Äôs app is glitchy, it can be a real letdown. In particular, I‚Äôve experienced ordering and payment glitches in recent weeks that resulted in deals not being applied to my orders, and overcharges of over $4 at a time taking place. While that would be annoying in normal times, it is especially problematic right now, when folks are struggling to get by.

In short, please fix the glitches, so that I and other diners can enjoy the good things about this app. Thanks.
developerResponse: {'id': 14817211, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can assist you with this issue.", 'modified': '2020-04-21T14:33:53Z'}

title: Used to be better
review: This app was better before they added the rewards. Don‚Äôt get me wrong I like the idea of earning rewards but I have tons of points and it only shows me like 4 things I can get for 6000 points and only 1 is breakfast. You can also only redeem one at a time. I would like to see more variety/ choices on the reward options and to be able to cash in multiple like at Chick-fil-A. Also, there‚Äôs a glitch or something with my app because when I go to place and order, it‚Äôs still showing my old order with the button to click that you‚Äôre here.. I have to go click cancel order so the order doesn‚Äôt show in my history anymore and I‚Äôm not sure how that‚Äôs affecting my rewards points either
developerResponse: {'id': 27003585, 'body': 'The only way we can make this the best app possible is by getting all the details we can from you here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2021-12-22T23:34:02Z'}

title: the sad meal
review: I got the bigmac but it was the buy one get one for a dollar so I ordered 2 large fries for me and my cousin, I took a bite out of my bigmac and only tasted bun, lettuce, sauce, and tears but the tears were pickle juice. I've never been more disgusted with mcdonalds, I opened the so called "bigmac" and there were two little flatty patties, there were three buns and it was just chopped up onions in some sauce, the bun was soggy and sad, like a person cried in my bigmac so I cried while eating it, my fries were soggy and salty, some were hard and plain. I've never been so sad of my order, I was starving and this is what they gave me. I thought mc donalds made you happy but it left me depressed, I should of went to burger king. they would of thought about the customer service unlike McDonald's my taste bud are crying as we type. water can't even wash it out, I've brushed my whole mouth over 5 times and I still taste the tears of pickle juice. I hate you McDonald's!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!üò≠

title: App does not allow you to login
review:
Early in 2020, I had an error message pop up, preventing me from logging in. Due to time issues, I just ordered from the drive thru. I eventually deleted and reinstalled the App, hoping that would fix the issue. Nope. I‚Äôve never been able to login since then. I‚Äôve contacted customer support in July 2020, but they were no help, as they wanted me to Call them and provide THIS information:
What date did you register (MM/DD/YY):
When was the last time you successfully logged in (please provide a date or ‚ÄòI have never logged in‚Äô):
Did you register with a social media account (Y/N):
If Yes, which (FB, Google, Apple):
If you registered with a social media account, please advise if you changed the email address you use for your social media account (Y/N):
If you did not register with a social media account, did you finalize your registration by following the link in the activation email sent to your email (Y/N)(if N, you need to do this):
What is the exact error message seen on the app:
Please provide a detailed description of the page you were on when you were stopped from logging in/registering:
Type of Phone (of user experiencing problem):
Device Operating System (iOS/Android + version number):
McD App Version:

It‚Äôs probably been a year now. There‚Äôs no possible way for me to remember any of this.

title: Not registering
review: Several times i have ordered at the drive thru, food including drinks. Cashier scans my phone, But when i go get back to the house i notice it didnt register it because it doesnt show that i even purchased a drink. So i think it sounds like it may be sort of a scam, as to where when u purchase 5 drinks youll get the next free, because your really paying for it. If u dont pay attention to it, it goes unnoticed so it seems normal. But i get coffee every morning from mcdonalds while at work, so i use it frequently and yes i have noticed it does this. The same mcdonalds i go to, are definitely participants of the app, because i have used coupons at these locations before, so its not the Mcdonalds. Please fix, reimburse me, or close the app because some of the coupons you had on here lately are not deals. Dont make me point them out
developerResponse: {'id': 13504894, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.", 'modified': '2020-02-15T16:12:13Z'}

title: A+ for the idea, F- for execution
review:
I have absolutely NO idea how this app is so highly rated given the fact that it does not work....

First of all, I LOVE the idea of Mobile Ordering. It‚Äôs especially great when you have picky eaters in your family that require changes to most sandwiches. I also appreciate the ability to skip the drive-thru line. Unfortunately, while the McD app does a wonderful job of allowing customization of your orders and the like, what‚Äôs the point if it won‚Äôt allow you to pay for your order and you end up having to go through the drive-thru anyway? The app does not allow me to add a credit card. Also, despite initially allowing me to order using Apple Pay, this was similarly declined (I used Apple Pay at the Drive-thru without issue). 

In a world where numerous companies have similar apps (Chick-Fil-A, Dunkin‚Äô Donuts, Starbucks, and Subway are ones I have used within the past 6 months), it‚Äôs astonishing that McD cannot get theirs to function properly.
developerResponse: {'id': 13449775, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can assist you with this issue. ", 'modified': '2020-02-12T21:19:32Z'}

title: Not as good as it could be.
review:
The app works fine for the most part. It doesn‚Äôt seem to be able to find some locations, but other than that it always works. 

The reason I give it two stars is because it skips the entire purpose of these mobile apps by not sending the order through until you are physically in the location. Which means you are still waiting just as long. 

It fails on the second main reason to use the app, which is offers. The offers are almost universally terrible. $1 off hot cakes. I have worked at McDonalds, I could go three days without selling hot cakes by themselves.  20 percent off that mcfrappe stuff that no one orders and the franchise owners hate.  A mild discount on that second order of fries for people who for some reason order multiple loose orders of fries.  Meanwhile, Burger King always has a dozen good coupons and Wendy‚Äôs always has at least something meaningful

title: No longer works correctly after update
review:
I used to like this app and use if almost daily for breakfast, but ever since updating the app has been incredibly buggy. First it logged me out and wouldn‚Äôt let me log back in through Facebook (kept taking me to the final sign-up screen and saying I‚Äôve already got an account), so I made a new account, and now the app won‚Äôt let me add a new card because it won‚Äôt recognize the card nickname. I‚Äôve tried every combination for a nickname - all letters, no spaces, six letters, eight letters, etc. - and it still leaves the ‚Äúsubmit‚Äù box grayed-out and asks me to add a nickname. I‚Äôve tried uninstalling and reinstalling twice, to no avail. 
I‚Äôve experienced more frustration with this mobile ordering app than any other of its kind; the app layout is friendly enough, but the bugs make it virtually unusable. Until those are worked out, I can not recommend it.

title: Errors
review: The app is riddled with errors. It won‚Äôt load full menu. It won‚Äôt let me order. But Taco Bell‚Äôs does. I tried reinstalling. It tells me my email that I sign in and receive emails from is wrong. This is the third time I‚Äôve gone somewhere else because I refuse to pay full price because your app won‚Äôt let me pay and use mobile deals which is ironically the only deals that are good. Go figure, I don‚Äôt know it won‚Äôt let me applepay or use card. I‚Äôve been waiting close to a month for this to be fixed. Never been so disappointed in wasting my time trying to make an app work. Taco Bell‚Äôs app worked and let me pay, on the way now. One of the biggest company in fast food should be able to afford proper app development and implementation across the nation. Clearly it saves them money for these features don‚Äôt work, but I will choose capitalism. Update: we are still running the same version three weeks later. Who develops this app?Do they not read app feedback?

title: No Safari Support
review: With updates, this app no longer allows for email/password login. It requires and email be sent with a link for authentication. My default browser is Safari and when that link is selected it goes to a site on Safari indicating it still needs to be authenticated. Brought this up to McD app support and they indicated it should work on Chrome and that I should copy/paste the link or make Chrome my default browser. With so many iPhone users and Safari being the native browser, I asked when a fix for this issue might be deployed. The agent indicated no fix was planned as it works with Chrome. Would‚Äôve given 0 stars if I could because with such a large installed base of iPhone users and with Safari being the native browser, they are clearly ignoring a large customer demographic. Will gladly update this if Safari issue gets resolved as the app is wonderful otherwise.

title: Best app for food
review: I was really hesitant to download another food app especially being vegetarian lol but the truth of the matter is this app gives you so many deals that it is worth the download. There are certain deals you get once a day that you can cash in on. Also there are certain deals you get because of your team winning like every Monday that the Georgia Bulldogs score, there‚Äôs a free fry and drink of any size with any purchase. There‚Äôs deals for NASCAR, there‚Äôs deals for the Braves and I‚Äôm pretty sure this is happening in every city . This is a really good app if you‚Äôre trying to save money or trying to grab breakfast quick on the run and you can even customize your order!
developerResponse: {'id': 32305699, 'body': 'deals and saving you money is what the app is all about!', 'modified': '2022-09-29T17:29:59Z'}

title: Back end problems
review: App says restaurants are closed and won‚Äôt let you order when, in fact, the restaurant is open, says restaurants are open when they are closed for renovation. Restaurant staff is clueless about mobile orders, claim that order was never received even when you show them the emailed receipt with the restaurant‚Äôs address & the order, staff tries to get you to pay again after app has already charged your credit card. Tired of arguing with the staff every time a mobile order has been placed and they don‚Äôt know what to do. Clearly, staff hasn‚Äôt been trained on the mobile app procedures. Also, it‚Äôs useless to submit constructive feedback online to McDonald‚Äôs website customer service because the response is always a canned response that shows the customer service rep never took the time to read the feedback about problems with the app. Their suggested solution is always the same - delete app & reinstall, never changes anything.

title: Why part 2
review:
I do not understand how this is one

of the only apps for a fast food

restaurant that you can not order

on one phone and go pick up with

another. My wife is home before

me and if she wants McDonald's

we either have to use another

account with my phone or I have to

go home and get her phone and

then take it back to the restaurant

to use it. HOW/WHY is this even a

problem. Every single other fast

food or order app period she can

order through her app and I can

check in and pick up through mine.

I can't believe this app has as

many stars as it does

Developer Response

9h ago

in order to protect your rewards,

the phone that placed the order is

needed at the time of pickup for

verification.

So the above response to my last review is incorrect. And I say incorrect because no one, and I repeat no one has ever verified the phone unless it only verifies when you come close to the restaurant then it will automatically check you in, but how do all the other apps work with rewards on multiple phones (never had a problem with the rewards). The explanation for your rewards program is subpar and whomever designed it probably should go back and redesign it to fit peoples lives better. Isn‚Äôt that what the app is for, convenience? Having the app this way is more of an inconvenience.
developerResponse: {'id': 32487153, 'body': 'in order to protect your rewards, the phone that placed the order is needed at the time of pickup for verification. ', 'modified': '2022-10-11T00:35:03Z'}

title: App unable to open/email verification issues/FIX
review:
After almost 2 years of not being able to open my app & several futile attempts dealing with so called IT specialists, I finally have success thanks to a Canadian poster. 
If you have this issue, you know what I‚Äôm talking about; if you don‚Äôt, ignore this. When you try to activate your email & a link is sent to your email (do this on the device you plan on using), instead of pressing the bar that says verify device, there is a small print line that says ‚Äúview in browser‚Äù. Press/hold/copy & use another browser. Apparently using Safari & Google is the problem. I used ‚ÄúOpera‚Äù & it worked as intended.
APP DEVELOPERS/McD‚Äôs IT: please inform people of this since making a fix isn‚Äôt happening. I spent way too much time reaching out to you, being on the phone with you, deleting/reinstalling app, etc.
developerResponse: {'id': 30974392, 'body': "let's see if we can turn that luck around! reach out to us here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-08-20T01:35:08Z'}

title: Problems when offers are used
review: On two different occasions I selected an offer, placed order, picked up order, and payment processed. However, when I tried to use app to place a new order several days later, that order is still on my app and telling me to head to McD to pick up order, except the offer is now expired and I need to delete the expired offer. Unfortunately, there is no way to remove the expired offer, no way to remove or edit the order( which I paid for and ate days ago) and no way to place a new order. I am not certain if this is an app issue or an employee training issue (teaching them how to properly close out a mobile order.) I showed the app to several other people, and they couldn‚Äôt figure out how to fix either. I keep deleting the app and signing in as a new user, but I lose all my points.

First, try uninstalling then reinstalling your app. If that doesn't fix it, reach out to our mobile app team through the link, so we can look into this for you: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n", 'modified': '2021-12-22T23:29:33Z'}

title: An app designed with corporate in mind, and no one else
review: Placed my order on the app and had my husband go pick it up, only to have him get there and they told him he had to have the phone that the order was placed on (mine) in order to get it. So I had to cancel our order in the app so he could replace the order. I‚Äôve never had this issue with ANY other restaurant app so I‚Äôm not sure what McD‚Äôs thought this would achieve. Seems like a scam to make multiple people in a household download their app to artificially boost their numbers, but hey, that‚Äôs just a guess. And I know I can‚Äôt be the first person to deal with this and it makes me feel bad for the employees who have to take the brunt of the inevitable screaming customers who don‚Äôt have the brainpower to realize this is a problem with the company, not the hard working employees working the counter. Once again, a corporation putting themselves ahead of employees. Shocker.
developerResponse: {'id': 30975741, 'body': "we're always looking for ways to improve. get back to us here with all the details you can on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-07-19T14:39:34Z'}

title: Timing out
review:
Due to the application logging me out, I had to reorder twice after I arrived on location due to it timing out. It‚Äôs extremely inconvenient to lose the entirety of the order because it sat for a couple minutes while I drove down the road. 

Preordering food is supposed to help me avoid complex orders or interruptions from the toddler in the back seat. It makes me be able take time to decide on what my family wants. Logging out after the time to decide and put an order in just to need to order it again or even just verbally give the order is not ideal.

Less developed apps manage to use a system to stay logged in. I also don‚Äôt care for the email log in system. I would prefer to use faceID to log in if it‚Äôs necessary to log out between uses. The inconvenience does make me reconsider using the app and going to McDonald‚Äôs in general.
developerResponse: {'id': 26042480, 'body': 'We aim to make the best Mobile App we can for you. Get back to our team with as much info as you can here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html \r\n', 'modified': '2021-11-02T19:10:52Z'}

title: No point in using this app
review: What is the point in being able to do a mobile order if you can‚Äôt place the order AHEAD of time. They start making your food when you get there and you sit there waiting in the drive-through forever;Yes I do know that I have the option of doing pick up and parking but it is the third time that I‚Äôve shown up to the restaurant and they have forgotten about the fact that I was waiting for my food at curbside pick up‚Ä¶ or they send me to park in one of the curb side pick up spots and forget they sent me there to wait, then I have to physically go into the store and remind them of my food and they have the audacity to act like we are an inconvenience. This ‚Äòfast-food‚Äô is neither fast nor cheap anymore, that‚Äôs why in the app we should be able to order ahead of time Just like other fast food apps and stores.
developerResponse: {'id': 24986634, 'body': "We want better for our customers! Let's discuss this further at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-09-08T17:15:15Z'}

title: 3 straight orders botched
review: The last three times I used the app for a mobile order I did it for drive-through. All three times I got to the drive-through and they could not find my order. I had to go inside and each time, and after fumbling around for 5 to 10 minutes they were eventually able to find the order. It did not save time, it actually took up much more time to use the app versus not using the app. I do not have this problem with any other restaurants I mobile order from. Mobile order is much more convenient elsewhere. Hopefully McDonald‚Äôs is able to fix this issue because I would like to be able to use this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 20715626, 'body': "That's definitely not cool at all. Let us look into that for ya. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-01-28T18:21:57Z'}

title: Needs improvement
review: I use the McDonald‚Äôs App all the time because the closest location‚Äôs drive-thru is always so busy. My only real complaint is the ‚Äúdeals‚Äù tab is constantly buggy. I‚Äôll go to use a deal and it will tell me it‚Äôs the wrong time of day. It‚Äôs like excuse me, it‚Äôs breakfast time. I‚Äôm gonna use one of the breakfast deals. One thing I wish McDonald‚Äôs would change is the app‚Äôs ‚Äúreward‚Äù system. I don‚Äôt drink coffee so buying 5 of something I don‚Äôt drink just to get one free item I won‚Äôt drink is pointless. McDonald‚Äôs needs to get with the program and follow other apps like Chick-Fil-A. Chick-Fil-A‚Äôs rewards system on the app is perfect. Earn points based on how much you spend. Save the points until you have enough to get an item of your choosing.

title: Rip off
review: I just came from there and I order through the mobile app and I order a biscuit a burrito and a milkshake they had trouble with my location after that they said they don‚Äôt have milkshakes I wanted one because in the app there was a deal for 50% off so it came out to $1.75 I told her if I could get a soda instead which sodas are $1 she did that and I still had to wait cause they were barely making my order I though it was faster through the app but naw I have to go to work and y‚Äôall waste my time so I went in there with a deal and came out paying more and you could expect them to atleast throw something extra to compensate the .75 but naw I paid the same for something I didn‚Äôt even want but thank you

title: Can‚Äôt connect, multiple frustrating issues
review: I used to use this app all the time. I came back after many months to order again but it said my account is locked. So I requested an email to reset multiple times and received nothing. So I tried to log in with Facebook and it says ‚Äúthis record does not exist‚Äù so I go to sign up with Facebook and it says ‚Äúthis account already exists, sign in below‚Äù but there is nothing below so I go back to the login and once again it says ‚Äúthis record does not exist. ‚Äù So I went to the drive through to order the old fashioned way but this is an easy way to avoid falling back into the McDonald‚Äôs habit because other fast food places have apps that consistently work.
developerResponse: {'id': 12346610, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had. Since we want your experience to be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We'll make sure to let the appropriate team know. Thanks!\r", 'modified': '2019-12-11T22:08:33Z'}

title: Login Cancelled, App Installation Error
review: I have had this McDonald‚Äôs app for years, and have never had an issue with it until recently. Every time I try to log in (no matter Facebook, Google, Apple, or Email) it always says ‚ÄúLogin Cancelled‚Äù every time I try. Even when the app initially boots up, it brings up a message across the top of the screen that reads ‚ÄúApplication Initialization critical error occured. Please restart the App.‚Äù I have tried every possible way I can to see if I can fix this issue (deleting and reinstalling the app, turning my phone off and back on, turning everything off and deleting the app, then turning everything back on and reinstalling the app) and I still get these same messages, and I am unable to use the features on this app. This has been an ongoing issue since at least March 2020. Please fix this app!!!

title: McCrappy Appy
review: Okay, I do not understand all these glowing raves about how great and wonderful the app is. Frankly, it is poorly synchronized with the franchise locations. Sometimes it works fine but most of the time the app says I‚Äôm not actually at the restaurant when I‚Äôm literally parked in the pickup spot. The other fast food apps (Whataburger always works) know as soon as I pull through the drive through. The excuse I get from the franchise manager is ‚Äúwell, we stopped taking mobile order‚Äôs because it doesn‚Äôt work!‚Äù Oh, thanks for not saving me any time at all Crapdonnalds! Anyway if you are going to rate an app high because you like the franchise is one thing. It is truly a reflection of your personal opinion not on any basis of app integration and performance. It has to work without a high degree of frustration and be consistently working 95% of the time. The rest of you are just not honest or the franchise‚Äôs in Seguin, TX are poorly managed. Either way this reflects on the total corporation.

title: Loving it, but needs improvement
review: For curb side: At my local McDonalds there are only 2 parking spots for curb side. People often park in the spots and go inside and are not using the app. There needs to be more spots. Instead of having 2, why not give each spot in the parking lot a number?  I‚Äôve also noticed that delivery of my purchases, via the curb side, seems to be given bottom priority. I‚Äôm using the app that your company is pushing and I would think that once the order is paid and generated to the restaurant, it should be placed next in line of the order process. I‚Äôve watched vehicles in the drive thru line (that when I parked had not even ordered) order, pay, and receive there items and I still had not received mine.
developerResponse: {'id': 5299022, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-09-30T22:57:50Z'}

title: This App has issues
review:
I would use this app more often, but overall it doesn‚Äôt work well.  Number one issue, is the app waits to put the order in until I arrive, if the food was ready and waiting when I arrive I would be in and out in seconds.  I realize you factored in food being cold and people not showing up, but when I order food I want to eat, so I would arrive in a timely matter for my benefit.  The other issue I have with this app is payment, multiple times I have arrived, and the cashier will say I have not paid, when I know that I paid through the app.  It results in awkward moments, which makes them and myself uncomfortable.  Not a good experience.  Also, I would to have some condiments with my meal, I like salsa with my big breakfast because your eggs are bland.  I also like ketchup with my hash browns.  Can you add a request for condiments somewhere on the app.

Thanks,

Jess Salcido
developerResponse: {'id': 11336482, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, Jess! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-10-18T21:24:16Z'}

title: What happen to the customization option?!?
review: Love the app and use it pretty frequent but I noticed just recently the option to customize your burger has changed. There was a mustard and ketchup option but where did the ketchup option go?! Still comes on the burger and I HATE ketchup, so I always opt out of the ketchup on the app. Very disappointed I can‚Äôt use the customization, so really I can‚Äôt use the app at all and have to go through the drive-thru just to order. I hope it was just an error somewhere and it can be updated back on. Please fix soon... also McDonalds employees need to be trained for this app because certain situations some up and they don‚Äôt know what to do. Most don‚Äôt even know you pay through the app so they try to double charge you at the window.

title: App and Support Page BADLY IN NEED OF UPDATE!!!
review:
While on two separate occasions, I tried using my app to order ahead and your app kept saying ‚Äúconnectivity issues‚Äù. Now, while I must admit, for the most part, I got the app to work dozens of other times, for some reason on these two separate occasions, it kept giving me the ‚Äúconnectivity issues‚Äù. (I even restarted the app / uninstalled and reinstalled, to no avail) (also my phone works perfectly fine).

Now, I tried going to the support page to put in a inquiry as to the problem with the app and even the support page isn‚Äôt working correctly.

I did not want to leave this in the review, but seeing how the support page isn‚Äôt working, this is my only resort. The app is fantastic and super convenient. Please fix ASAP. I have a free McCafe beverage coupon I would like to use before it expires. Thanks!
developerResponse: {'id': 8596917, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Gabe! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.", 'modified': '2019-05-09T18:51:08Z'}

title: Only one complaint
review:
I've used this app several times. It's great for road trips! It will find and direct me to the closest drive-thru, I can have my passenger page our order and get us back on the road much quicker. 

That said, the app doesn't seem to recognize when the dining room opens at my local restaurant. I show up at 6:30, in kind of a hurry to have time to sit and eat bfast before work, which is why I pre-order, but the app won't let me check in to the dining room stating that it reopens at 6:00, which was clearly a half hour ago.  it ends up taking even longer than if I had just gone in and ordered in person because of the confusion every single time. I continue to use the app even tho it's inconvenient because of the deals offered only on the app
developerResponse: {'id': 6605726, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Katt! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2018-12-29T23:10:48Z'}

title: Functional
review: Gets the job done. But beware if it gives an error message and says you have to wait 15 min to use anything else. I tried to use a buy one Happy Meal and get one for $1. It does not say it is only for McDelivery until you try to use it and the kiosk in the restaurant gave me the error message about the restriction. Fine, I‚Äôll use something else. Now I had to wait 15 min because the app thinks I used an offer even though it was rejected by the kiosk. I ended up leaving the restaurant and went elsewhere for that, waste of time. Major corporation with an app that just works most of the time when other lesser restaurants have more streamlined and stable apps, I don‚Äôt know what McDonald‚Äôs deal is. I guess gotta cut costs somehow.
developerResponse: {'id': 30811802, 'body': "we want better for our customers! let's discuss this further at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-07-10T17:38:22Z'}

title: Charged multiple times
review: I‚Äôve used the app 4 times. When it works, it is cool. Picks up when I am there and service is very prompt. Great time saver and easy to select from menu. BUT...half the time it charges my credit card multiple times and doesn‚Äôt complete the order. I have to show them my phone, show them the charges going through to AMEX and then the manager comes, asks about the problem, disappears for ten minutes, comes back, then tells staff to do my order and tells me to check to see if the charges are straightened out the next day. Since the order isn‚Äôt showing up in the food assembly area, they have to run back and forth to the register and usually get it wrong. Net result, takes 5 times as long to get served and I‚Äôm charged 5 times as much. If that happens every other time, it certainly isn‚Äôt worth it.

title: upsetting
review: i‚Äôve never had a problem with this app until i made my first mobile order. i chose a mcdonald‚Äôs location near my workplace and started my order. so far so good, right? at the end of putting things into my cart, i get the receipt and it has the correct address of the mcdonald‚Äôs i‚Äôm planning to go to so i pay and start my drive there. as soon as i do, i notice that a different address is displayed at the top of my mobile order and i was already in a rush so i just think maybe it was my error (which i know now wasn‚Äôt me) and start driving to the new address displayed BUT YET AGAIN MCDONALD‚ÄôS HAS SCAMMED ME BECAUSE THE LOCATION ON THE RECEIPT WASN‚ÄôT EVEN THE RIGHT ONE. i had to make a trip to the nearest mcdonald‚Äôs which was shown on the mini map under the receipt. everything about this trip bummed me out and the only good thing about it was the nice lady who completed my order and sympathized with me. all in all, i probably won‚Äôt be using this app again except for coupons ):

title: Customization
review: The app should be able to give you more customizing choices just like you would get at a restaurant also they need to fix this because when you try to substitute round egg for folded eg The app should be able to give you more customizing choices just like you would get at a restaurant also they need to fix this because when you try toSubstitute pulled an egg for round egg they tried to charge you on the app doing it in store there is no charge also removing items on an order is a problem like ordering a Mc double with no cheese or Mc double with no mustard no pickle on the app it has no customization options needs to be fixed should have the same experience doing things on the app as you would in store making mobile orders easier
developerResponse: {'id': 15524117, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this. Try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn't help, please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-09-12T13:16:19Z'}

title: Still slow & not enough reward options.
review: I like this app when it works and doesn‚Äôt make me log in, which it does every few days it seems.  I don‚Äôt have time to park and re-log in at every McDonalds.  What is the deal with that?  I‚Äôve earned plenty of points, but reward options are so limited that I haven‚Äôt redeemed any. Deal are what I use mostly, but sometimes are limited also. For example, this morning, I parked in the McDonald's parking lot,  re-logged in again, b/c the app logged me out, only to find two deals for ice cream and frappes.  Usually the deals are great, but this morning I really just wasted my time.  I am grateful for the deals, but it still feels like a lot of work to save a little.  I like the app just not the bugs.  With some polishing it would be fantastic.  Thank you!
developerResponse: {'id': 25911173, 'body': 'We want your Mobile Ordering to be quick and reliable. Help our Mobile App team get to the bottom of this by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n', 'modified': '2021-10-26T19:09:28Z'}

title: Really no point in using it
review: The app is easy to use but there are things you can‚Äôt make into meals, like the 20 piece nugget and not all menu items are in here. Also there is no point in using it as the location you choose does not start making it until you get there... and you have to go through the drive thru to let them know you are there. When I asked about that, I was told that the only way to avoid going though the drive thru was to wait to order until your parked in a mobile order spot in front of the store and then they‚Äôll run it out to you. What?! How does that make sense at all?! A person should be able to order from home, drive to their location, park and select their spot and have the order brought out. That‚Äôs kind of the point of having an app and mobile ordering available. McDonalds could learn a lot from how Starbucks app works.

title: Need to Delete Credit Card
review:
Update!! 
Thank you for sending me the phone # to customer service. I called. To delete a card, simple touch it and swipe left like Tinder. Lol

I have been trying since March 2019 to delete my credit card information. In March, I ordered and it placed but then the payment didn‚Äôt take. On my bank acct, you can see where it took the money out and then see where it immediately credited it back into my bank account. Since that day I haven‚Äôt been able to use my credit card since. I tried to delete it but there is no way I can go into it to edit it. I received a new credit card in May. It is the same numbers but a different CVS #s. I enter it but it doesn‚Äôt seem recognize it. I would like to be able to use my card. Please help!!

Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-07-17T15:51:31Z'}

title: Deceptive
review:
I feel like the app is really deceptive. I feel like the app is just lying to me so that I'll go to the restaurant. Every time I've used it so far, I only find out that my order can't be completed as expected once I try to check in at the store.

The other night, I placed an order for an item that was only available in the mornings. The app didn't tell me that the item was not available until I arrived at the store--and even then, it just said that "my order could not be completed." I had to go into the store to figure out what was wrong. The cashier rolled her eyes and acted like I was stupid because I didn't know that it wouldn't be available until after 4 AM. I was so embarrassed that I just bought something else, even though it wasn't what I actually wanted (and there wasn't a coupon for it). 

If something isn't available when I place my order, the app should tell me that up front. I shouldn't have to drive to the store just to find out that I can't have what I ordered. 

And I want to get a meaningful error message/warning--don't throw a vague "your order could not be completed" error that leaves me wondering if there's something wrong with my phone or my credit card or if the app is down. I'd rather get a more informative message like "Item X is only available between 4 and 10 AM" when I first try to submit my order.
developerResponse: {'id': 14291877, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-03-27T17:19:51Z'}

title: Updates
review: I pretty much only use this app for coffees because there isn‚Äôt much at McDs I can eat. I love the buy 5 get 1 free because I basically live off the stuff, but every time it updates, it removes all of the previous punches. I went through the drive thru yesterday and clicked to get the free one and it said it had to update because it apparently won‚Äôt update automatically. I updated and was going to go through again today to get the free one and it had removed everything again. This wouldn‚Äôt be so annoying if it didn‚Äôt happen every single time it needs an update but I‚Äôve had it happen about three times, each on the free punch. It‚Äôs pretty annoying. The only reason it‚Äôs a 3 star for me if because the coffee is decent and I know other people who can eat at McDs find the app quite useful- otherwise it‚Äôd be lower.

title: It‚Äôs ok
review: It has different deals and it‚Äôs easy for me to sit and order at my convenience. Also been able to by pass the point system by ordering near McDonald‚Äôs and then going through drive through. When your old cart hasn‚Äôt closed and need a to be reopened just deleted the item that you redeem with points and you can get them back even after I used them. But I got screwed over the first time I did that incidentally and had to pay instead of getting my item. it took my money and points. But then next time the order didn‚Äôt close I was able to recoup the points. Not sure if I payed for it but I‚Äôm pretty sure I did t FYI McDonald‚Äôs app dev team.

title: Don‚Äôt even bother trying to order online
review:
First time using this app, didn‚Äôt want to leave my dog outside for long, so took the time to order and pay, but when I got there they had no idea what I was talking about.  Showed them the confirmation, and even let the cashier scroll through this stupid app. 
He didn‚Äôt disagree that I placed an order, he was just baffled by the fact that they never received it.  So not only did I lose money but it was also a pointless waste of time.
Idiotically, I have tried again. My Order is NEVER right, though the receipt on the bag clearly States what it should be. And because I usually walk with my dog there, I don‚Äôt have the time to show them what‚Äôs wrong and wait for them to redo it while she waits outside worried about where I am, thus negating the entire point and utility of having an online app. 
I guess this is an object lesson in getting what you pay for.
