title: Mobile order worked perfectly
review: I drove over to my neighborhood McDonald‚Äôs thinking I would get a large coffee and an Egg McMuffin for breakfast, but upon entering thought to check the ‚ÄúDeals‚Äù on my iPhone app‚Äîwhich showed that an any size coffee cake with a free order of donut sticks. Not only was I able to take advantage of this freebie, but I was able to order and pay with Apple Pay right there in the app, and less than 30 seconds later my order appeared on the mobile order screen at the counter. My order was prepared in about another 60 seconds and delivered to me at the counter by a polite and responsive employee. This is the way it‚Äôs supposed to work, and I told the counter person how much I appreciated it.

title: Feedback
review: It is ridiculous that you cannot easily leave feedback on your order each time. The McDonalds by my house has messed up my order multiple times, and the only way to correct the errors is to go inside or drive back through the drive thru. I had missing meat on double quarter pounders multiple times so I quit adding the extra meat to make it easier on them. Then, just today, we were almost late to my grandmothers funeral waiting over 20 minutes for our curbside order that was just breakfast sandwiches‚Ä¶no special requests. I had to show them my phone because they couldn‚Äôt find the order on their end. I left with only part of my order so that I could just let my kids eat something on the way. Now, I‚Äôm hungry/cranky on the way to the funeral because I can‚Äôt leave feedback to at least know I could have a coupon for the missing food for next time.
developerResponse: {'id': 27611370, 'body': 'we never want your experience to end up this way. leave a few details about your order and the location here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html', 'modified': '2022-01-23T23:31:59Z'}

title: Restaurant Location maps need to be updated. I
review: I‚Äôve had problems at three different locations where, when I get in the drive-thru and tap ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here,‚Äù the app does not recognize me being in that location. Yes, my location services are turned on for use with this app. I‚Äôve used this app several times, and this has happened multiple times now at Senatobia, MS and both Batesville, MS locations. When that doesn‚Äôt work, I pull into a curbside slot, the app charges my debit card, then I waited 20 minutes. I finally went into the store (yes, COVID season, but they left the front door unlocked), and asked for my order. They said they didn‚Äôt get an order. I held my phone up to show them the order had been placed on the app, then I pulled up my banking app to show them that it had already been charged to my card. So it ended up taking me 30 minutes to get a cup of coffee and an apple fritter that I had paid for. Very disappointed.

title: minor problems
review: If I mess up & or change my mind & want to totally clear the order.. I can‚Äôt figure out how to do that an easy fast way.. instead I had to go into each item & change to zero/delete... oh & why when I order through app are all the sauces/condiments free but order in person & they wanna charge $ .25 !? 1 more thing .. should be able to FULLY customize anything anyway I want through app but can‚Äôt! I like tartar sauce on my burger or & to dip frys in but tartar sauce isn‚Äôt a condiment option.. I also like the slivered onions instead of the tiny onions on my sandwiches but can‚Äôt do that either.. there should be a place to add special instructions via text box or something .. please update your app for me! Thank you

title: Thoroughly disappointed
review: I have tried to use this app several times to no avail. It is extremely frustrating you place your order, arrive and then you get an error message saying that they‚Äôre having issues connecting and you need to come in. The entire point of using the app is to either go through drive-through or curbside and avoid interactions inside the restaurant. This is now happened several times and I‚Äôm officially done won‚Äôt be ever going back. On top of the connection issues I also was billed for an order that was $28 more than my order. Disputed it with my credit card but very disappointed in the system

title: Used to be fantastic
review:
Your deals used to be wonderful. Buy one get one for $1 sandwiches, $1 crispy chickens, very decent deals that give you lots of bang for your buck. Nowadays the deals will save you MAYBE a whole 60¬¢. Buy a premium sandwich, get $1 off large fry? Please. That‚Äôs literally $7 to save $1. You can‚Äôt beat savings, but Wendy‚Äôs, Burger King, and most other mobile apps have way way better deals nowadays. Burger King has buy one get one free for sandwiches, Wendy‚Äôs has free Dave‚Äôs singles just for making a mobile order, free fries and a drink for ordering a sandwich. Tons of deals that save you loads of money. I‚Äôd rather have deals that I can only use once a week, but save me a few bucks than a bunch of deals that save me $1 or less that I can use daily.

Not a bad app, great for skipping the lines, but if you‚Äôre looking to save money and get deals, use Wendy‚Äôs, Burger King, or Taco Bell app. Their deals are far above and beyond.

title: Reinstalled, same old song and dance. Smh.
review: Every time I‚Äôve tried to use this app within the last 6 months, it‚Äôs consistently given me errors when I try to pay. It will charge my credit card but say there was an error. In an effort to try and fix the issue, I ended up charging my account 9 times, none of which went through. The end result was a lot of frustration and wasted time, and I had to order at the counter regardless. Luckily the employees are already aware of the issue, and were comforting and informative about it. Pretty sad when even the employees say not to use the app. Smh. Get it together McD. A fix needs to be applied so this is no longer an issue. *also does not let me add my debit card or any other payment types >:( I know I‚Äôm putting my info in correctly. It also says I‚Äôm experiencing connectivity issues which I am not >:( I took a screen shot in hopes of uploading it here, but there is no options for that apparently.

title: Bugged.. Lots of charges
review:
I downloaded this app and gave it a shot. The first time I had to put two different payment options in because I had payment issues apparently.. not too big a deal. However, the second time I used it I guess I choose an item the store I went to didn‚Äôt have, so not only does the app say payment issues and not send your order through, it charges you every time you click pay. Most banks are smart enough to catch this and you are refunded from The store from what I seen to a degree. Still I had unexplained charges that were not refunded, as well as the waiting for the available funds to be refunded in the first place.. So much time and trouble, I should be the one getting paid for my meal.

From a programmers perspective, If these bugs are fixed it could be a great app, the concept is good, and the look and feel is great.. just don‚Äôt charge someone before the app is completed through its error checks..

title: The App is Okay
review: The App is fine...however, some of the employees leave a lot to be desired.  I placed an order utilizing the App and when I arrived at the McDonald‚Äôs, I clicked on the parking space number to await the arrival of  my order.  As it turns out my order was delivered to the wrong car and when the employee brought my ‚Äòorder‚Äô to me...it was WRONG.  When I apprised him of this, he dropped the order on my lap and then turned to me and said...well, are you coming in?  Needless to say everything went downhill from there with employees laughing at me and the situation...plus, coming from the back to stare.  The drive through employee came out and stared giving me dirty looks.  Therefore, I‚Äôve told my friends to bypass McDonald‚Äôs since you can get a burger ANYWHERE.  A customer should under NO circumstances be belittled or disparaged.  If I didn‚Äôt have friends waiting for me, I wouldn‚Äôt have become angry and upset.
developerResponse: {'id': 3546186, 'body': "That's great to hear, Caren! Swing by for your faves anytime the craving hits!", 'modified': '2018-06-15T02:36:46Z'}

title: Never get it right
review: I used this app 3 times, and never have I got the correct order. First time it submitted, but the store never got my order, so I had to wait. Second, I ordered a chicken sandwich with no mayo. When I got home, mayo was the only thing on it. Third, everything seemed fine. I ordered, got my confirmation and selected my curbside spot to wait for them to bring out my food. I watched the drive thru empty and still no food. After 10 minuets I went inside to check and my order was sitting on a try. I took almost 5 minuets to get someone‚Äôs attention. I asked if it was my order and she said ‚Äúyes‚Äù. I told her I was waiting in my car and she told me there is a car symbol but I did not select a number. I told her I received a confirmation to wait in spot 3 (and it doesn‚Äôt save that screen so I can use it for proof), yet she still argued with me. Never offered to help bring my food out or replace cold fries or fill my drink I requested on the app. Complete waste of time.

title: Shame
review: Nearly every other convenience food app puts mc Donald‚Äôs to shame.  You have the most confusing and unintuitive app interface and rewards program I‚Äôve ever experienced.  Starbucks, Panera, jimmy johns, papa John‚Äôs are incredibly superior , to name a few.  If I can‚Äôt use an offer or reward, please don‚Äôt provide it as an option.  If something is unavailable as a menu option, please don‚Äôt let me believe it is.  I have no idea how to redeem the many points I‚Äôve earned because you have opaque and unintuitive rules that prohibit common sense redemption practices provided by your competitors.  How you have managed to trick your many users to lead to greater than two star ratings escapes me.  For such a successful and omnipresent brand, this app experience is surprisingly disappointing.  God bless the many devoted employees who make up for such a terrible app with their professionalism and friendliness when I visit your locations.

title: Go back to the old way!
review:
I don‚Äôt understand why you guys would take off pre pay off the 
mobile app. Makes it so much harder to order. We only have one car so the fact that I have to bring my phone to register the orders is dumb. We go to other places now since it makes ordering orders way easier so others can pick up. Also sometimes my phone loses service so I end up having wait. Honestly not worth it the hassle. Come on McDonald‚Äôs it‚Äôs the little things that count. Honestly would give 0. Had to pull out of line because of no service. Honestly what‚Äôs the point of mobile order now if I have to wait till I get there?

title: Serious app issues.
review: This app is fine if you just want to look at the menu, but I have had issues with actually placing an order starting the second time I used it. I have yet to have the app allow me to pick up curbside, every time there has been an error, and I have to use the drive through. Not a problem, except it says the payment didn‚Äôt go through and I have to pay at the window. Again not a problem, except it then also pushed through a charge through the app at the same time. This happened twice, I noticed the second time and spoke to the manager, who said there was nothing she could do about it except suggest I use the curbside pickup to avoid this. Which would be what I chose from the start of the app would let me. So. Frustrated. I‚Äôve tried deleting the card on file to add it again, and it won‚Äôt let me edit the cards on file.

title: Love/hate relationship
review: I love the deals and coupons I can get on the app. It‚Äôs normally convenient also. I‚Äôm in a small town so I can order while I am at work and pickup curbside with little wait time.  Exception: I hate the fact that it shows me options not available at my local McDonalds. And it lets me order it!! I don‚Äôt know the item I ordered is not available until I get to said McDonalds and the app just spins and spins. Then I am parked in a curbside pickup spot and I have to go in just for them to tell me they don‚Äôt offer that particular sandwich. Then I have to order something else and wait 10 min for it to be ready while drive thru people come and go. If the app can track when I get there, why can‚Äôt it track what sandwiches are currently available? That‚Äôs my one small issue with this app. Other than that I use it a lot.
developerResponse: {'id': 4261534, 'body': "We hear ya, Amber! It's a bummer when your experience with Mobile Order & Pay is not an awesome one! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-07-16T23:12:20Z'}

title: I was happy with the app, until today!
review: The new upgrade to the app is serving as a deterrent for me to order from McDonald‚Äôs. The app now wants me to sign up for a rewards program, with no option to opt out. Requiring access to more information from my phone, So they can market to me or whoever is in my contact. Not cool, loved the app before this, trying to force me to agree to additional stuff in order to get rewards which I don‚Äôt really care about. I just open my app to place an order, which I have done for the past few years without a problem, but now you are trying to force me to do something I don‚Äôt want to agree to. So this is goodbye for me.

title: Disappointing for coffee
review: The app is good for food. The app is great for earning points. But it is disappointing for redeeming points. You used to be able to buy 5 coffees and then get one free. With this app, you can only get a frappe or ice coffee. I don‚Äôt like either. I just like the regular coffee or latte. So I have tons of points because I continue to buy coffee but I can‚Äôt redeem them for what I actually drink. It would be nice if the option existed ‚Äîlike choose  ice coffee or hot coffee. And potentially other points would let you choose A frappe or latte. I do request this consideration and possibly a change.   For point of clarification, I‚Äôm aware of the $1.50 off coupon for a latte and am thankful to use that. However- it still would be nice to use points for a hot coffee and/or a hot latte.  Couldn‚Äôt there be an option like in the past to use points toward a ‚ÄúMcCafe drink?‚Äù
developerResponse: {'id': 29434679, 'body': "we're always looking for ways to improve your experience. chat with our mobile app team about ways to make things better by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-04-27T17:48:43Z'}

title: Update schupdate
review: I wish I could write a more specific review on this app but it will no longer allow me to sign in without going through a ten step process. Frankly I‚Äôm over it. Had the old app for a number of years and it seemed like anytime I actually felt like using it (twice per month) they wanted me to download the latest version and sign in all over again. I spent half my time with this app just verifying that it‚Äôs me and trying to keep any ‚Äúpoints‚Äù from expiring. Not worth anyone‚Äôs time. I don‚Äôt work for McDonalds and therefore do not care to read the saga of how the ‚Äúnew rewards‚Äù are going to be better than the old ones. Much like they likely don‚Äôt care to read about one persons experience using their app. I just feel like shouting into the void today. This app (and all fast food apps) can kindly go away now. Just give me my occasional dollar off coupon like the old days.
developerResponse: {'id': 27747616, 'body': "we're always listening and ready to help. uninstall and reinstall the app. if that doesn't help chat with our mobile app team here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-01-30T17:22:49Z'}

title: Crazy how it prompts me to login every time I‚Äôm in the drivethru
review:
It‚Äôs fine when it works, & that‚Äôs occasionally at best.  I can open this app just about anywhere away from a McDonald‚Äôs (which is kind of hard to do when you live in an area of close to 7 million people) and I‚Äôm logged in.  The moment I‚Äôm in the drive thru, the login screen appears.  How convenient.  If I am lucky enough to be logged in and try to use a deal, the laser scanner works about 10% of the time...click click click ‚Äúsorry ma‚Äôam this doesn‚Äôt seem to be working.‚Äù  
Right.  Again.  How convenient.  Just fix it McDonald‚Äôs.  My one free coffee every 100 trips to your multi-billion dollar global corporation is not costing you a thing.  Your deal offers are actually pretty great‚Äî-if we could actually use them üòï

title: Service appreciated
review: I have to say that Coloma McDonalds is fantastic. They are like a well oiled machine over there. From placing my order at the drive thru to paying and receiving my order. Less than a couple minutes tops. Other McDonalds establishments (Hartford) need to take some lessons from Coloma. At Hartford you sit for at least 15-20 minimum when you go through their drive thru. And they don‚Äôt pay attention to the order you put in and a-lot of times you don‚Äôt even get what you've ordered. That place is just a hot mess. They are so unorganized and it shows. I‚Äôd rather drive the few extra minutes to go to Coloma than to watch and put up with the chaos at Hartford. Hats off to Coloma you guys rock!!!! Much appreciated ü§ìüòò
developerResponse: {'id': 12395991, 'body': "That's great to hear! Swing by for your faves anytime the craving hits!", 'modified': '2019-12-14T22:20:26Z'}

title: So close to being the best
review:
There are things this app does that other mobile order apps still struggle with. Customizing orders, saving orders, locating nearby restaurants. There are times when I can crank out a McDonald‚Äôs order through this app so quickly and painlessly.

However, there are bugs and glitches that significantly reduce it‚Äôs usability, for instance:

- I got to a nearby McDonald‚Äôs at 11:05. The app insisted, however, that breakfast was still being served. I could not order lunch items, nor use any coupons for lunch food, because the app insisted it was the wrong time of day. No amounts of restarting the app seemed to help it recognize that the menu had changed.

- I constantly find my account logged out, thus forcing me to sign in a lot.

- my order was wrong recently. I tried to contact McDonald‚Äôs via the app, but it wouldn‚Äôt work. I could not use the map integration to find ANY McDonald‚Äôs locations, let alone my local one. Without that information, I could not continue with my feedback.

-  recent orders do not refresh/update quickly.

These small quality of life failures are particularly frustrating when you REALLY need them to work. I hope they are fixed soon

title: Issue with mobile ordering
review: I order McDonald‚Äôs a lot and I love the coupons but paying through mobile ordering is terrible. I recently tried to use a coupon that was mobile order only and once I submitted my order it said there was a problem with my card and the order did not go through. However my card was still charged. I tried a different card maybe thinking it was an issue with my bank but no it still charged that card as well and was still showing their was an issue processing payment and my order did not go through. After being charged multiple times on two different cards I still ended up having to pay cash once I went inside and spoke to the manager. I am very dissatisfied and I would not recommend paying through the mobile app.

Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can further assist you.", 'modified': '2020-09-03T16:02:57Z'}

title: ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüò°
review: A few weeks ago my boyfriend and me had a bad experience. After we place our order with the app, we have two cards saved to pay, so he clicked one of them and it said cannot process the payment, so he try with the other one and the same happened, so he try two more time, one with each card. Since it said the same, I told him to go inside. When we went inside the lady that was there ask us if was a mobile order, and we answered yes, but we haven‚Äôt pay because in the app said it cannot process the payment, and she said, it‚Äôs paid. We were confuse and when we went to check our card apps it show to transaction for each card. I call my bank, and the lady told me that she will put the second transaction as duplicated, but if not then there is an error on McDonald‚Äôs network. Still both of our cards still charged for 4 transaction, two in each card, when we only take one of those

title: Constantly Having to Log In
review: I really do enjoy using the McDonald‚Äôs mobile app. As of late I have been required to login with my email every time I use the app. For some reason, as of late, I do not stay logged in after I close the app. I do, according to the App Store, have the latest version of the app. I have also rebooted my phone numerous times thinking that may help. So far nothing has worked. I would just like to open the app and order and close the app and then have it open again when I‚Äôm ready to order next time. Logging in and out with my email and responding to the generated email it gives is getting a bit annoying.

title: Needs improvement
review:
Mobile order & pay would work flawlessly if it were able to integrate with, you know, ordering and paying. Unfortunately, that doesn‚Äôt seem to be the case. Much like other previous reviews, I have had endless issues with the app causing mass confusion amongst McDonald‚Äôs employees, double charging me by withdrawing the purchase price from my debit card& then  forcing me to pay cash when the employees can‚Äôt run price adjustments/process refunds. 

For example; today I ordered 2 McGriddles, buy one @ full price & get one for $.01. Subtotal should be $4.50. However, despite being an active line on my order, the deal didn‚Äôt process and my card was charged $9.68. What‚Äôs more, once I get to the drive thru window, the worker tells me I haven‚Äôt paid yet and I owe her *another* $9.68. I even show her the order& payment confirmation to no avail. I spent a total of $20. Two $2.25 McGriddles had now turned into two $10 McGriddles. Not happy.
developerResponse: {'id': 8462899, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, friend! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-05-01T14:37:33Z'}

title: Mobile ordering
review:
Trying to figure this out. What‚Äôs the main goal for McDonalds with mobile ordering? What does it offer that the drive thru doesn‚Äôt? Is it speed, etc.? How do the employees fit in or feel about curbside pickup?  When placing a mobile order and later driving up to see a long line, my thought is that I should get my order faster than the person that pulled up after me. Therefore I don‚Äôt see a time advantage when that happens.  Also I‚Äôve noticed on several occasions, when receiving my order at curbside, the employee that brings the order to my car, is not very friendly.  
Lastly, I‚Äôve experienced challenges trying to order deals offered at a particular store with the mobile app. Just a few things that make me say hmmmmü§îüôÑ

title: App never lets you log in which renders it useless.
review: I was only able to log in once when I first downloaded the app and now I can never log in again. I‚Äôve tried using Facebook, google, and my account info to log in and none of it works. Facebook always errors out telling me to check my internet connection and to restart the app. I follow their instructions but it doesn‚Äôt work. Using google to log in just prompts it to say that I already have an account with my email and tells me to log in using that, but when I try to do that it says my account is locked and I need to reset my password. When I follow the link to reset my password, the app says password services are down and tells me to log into my Facebook or google account to change it... maybe it is just my account that has the problem but they‚Äôve given me no way to fix the problem.

title: The App is useless. Unless you have money to throw away!!
review: So far 0/4 of my orders have arrived at the restaurant when I did and have been correct. 1st order, I ordered an Apple Pie. It was on the final receipt and has now disappeared from my order. 2nd time, they didn‚Äôt have Chicken Nuggets, gave me two Chicken Tenders instead. 3rd time, ordered a Sausage McMuffin, they gave me a Sausage, Egg & Cheese McMuffin. 4th and final time, ordered a Sausage McMuffin and Chicken Tenders. I was given a Sausage Biscuit with cheese added (I could have committed murder with the biscuit it was THAT hard). Out of Chicken Tenders? Let‚Äôs give her a $1 Chicken Sandwich!  She won‚Äôt know the difference. And of course they want proof and need to see my phone every time I order because my order doesn‚Äôt show up for 5 minutes and they want me to just order and pay for my food, again!  There is no way to cancel an order or edit an order so you aren‚Äôt charged for something you aren‚Äôt getting. The app is a big joke!

title: Bad customer service
review:
This is more about their customer service although the app played a part. Placed a mobile order for curbside pickup.  Arrived at the location and parked in the proper spot and tried to complete the order by selecting curbside and entering 3 for the appt I was parked.  Didn‚Äôt go through so I did these steps a total of four times.  Finally went inside and asked to meet with the manager because I was concerned that they charged me four times for the meal.  Manager said that I checked in for in store which I didn‚Äôt or I wouldn‚Äôt have had to enter the parking spot which I explained to her.  I showed her that my credit card was dinged four times.  She said that was not her problem and it was mine to deal with. So I paid over $30 for a double quarter pounder with cheese and a soft drink.  And I‚Äôll have to go track down their issues to get the charges reversed.  

The app screwed up and then the issue was exacerbated by really bad customer service.

title: Charged my card 6 times
review:
The app is usually ok, a bit buggy sometimes. However, yesterday it had an error when I went to pay and it kept saying please try again, which I did. It would not go through. So I checked my bank to be sure it didn‚Äôt go through, and it had actually charged my card 6 TIMES!!! I went to the drive through window and the manager gave me a number to call. I then had to PAY WITH MY CARD AT THE WINDOW because apparently all 6 charges didn‚Äôt actually go through and pay for the food. I am still waiting for my money to be returned to me. I have contacted both McDonald‚Äôs and my bank. NOT happy.

Update:
DOUBLE CHARGED ME AGAIN. I got to the restaurant to pick my order up, and the payment kept having an error. So I paid with my card, it went through. All was fine. Then AN HOUR later I got a second confirmation email. Checked my bank, they took the transaction out a second time. Never using this app again.

title: Unable to log into the app
review: I upgraded my iPhone and down loaded my app. The will not allow me to log into my account on the new phone. When I open the app I am prompted to sigh in with Apple ID, then continue to terms and conditions/‚ÄúWelcome to myMcDonalds‚Äù. Once the name box is filled in and boxes checked, the next page is ‚ÄúJoin McDonalds Rewards and Deals‚Äù. Opt in for point and finish registration is completed. I then received a ‚Äú! This email address already has a McDonalds Account. Please sign in‚Äù. I‚Äôve even been through this process multiple times and tried to sign in other ways. The other sign in‚Äôs such as facebook, email, and Google all say that my email is connected to Apple ID. I‚Äôm not sure what else to do?
developerResponse: {'id': 32408975, 'body': "we're here to help, Jules! tell us more here so we can look into this for you: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-05T17:05:54Z'}

title: Apple Pay is broken
review:
How is this still broken after weeks? The app UX is terrible, but at least it‚Äôs worked for years. But lately Apple Pay checkout gets consistently stuck and the app hangs. You‚Äôd assume they‚Äôre monitoring and hurrying to fix an issue with taking payments but apparently McDs corporate or whoever they outsourced this hot mess to is too lazy to care

Update - still broken.  Also recent mobile order mechanics are a hot mess. Every time I arrive the app quickly exits the screen where I should enter my parking space number. I have to get out and go inside and help with the mass confusion of ‚Äúwhose order is this?‚Äù Then, next time I order it still thinks that order is active and can‚Äôt place another without logging out/logging in.  Hey McD engineering - maybe instead of continually tweaking the rewards garbage in complicated ways, you should work on fundamentals and basic reliability.

title: App is fine. Restaurant follow thru is lacking.
review:
Edit: The app is slowly getting better but a major oversight is allowing users to order when the restaurant is closed. 

Although the app seems unnecessarily complicated at times, it‚Äôs good and getting better. Where it fails in my experience is at the restaurants. After I‚Äôm in the pickup spot, and have submitted my order, I can often spend enough time waiting to see 10 or more cars order in the drive thru and leave before I get my order. About 1 out of 10 times I have to leave my spot and ask about the status of the order in the drive thru. By that time the food is cold. I like the deals in the app but actually use it more b/c I have hearing loss and it can be difficult for me to understand the drive thru audio.

title: Always have to reinstall
review: This app worked great for a while. For a couple months now I always have to delete and reinstall the app to be able to order something. When I open the app, the previous order is always in my cart still even though I checked out and picked up. If I try to go ahead and order it asks if I want to reopen that order. I say yes and just try to delete the items so I can add a current order. It will let me delete all but the deal I used in my last visit. I can‚Äôt delete that and so cannot complete my new order because the checkout payment button is unavailable due to that. In the end I have to remove the app from my phone and reinstall every time. Annoying glitch I wish they would fix. Great app otherwise.

title: App looses my login over and over
review:
I enjoy the 
McDonald‚Äôs app but On several occasions and it has logged me out. When I try to log back in using my Google media, it just keeps waiting and waiting and waiting to log me in. When I try to login using my Gmail account I‚Äôm told that I need to login using Google social media. This is happened four or five times and I found the only way to resolve it is to wait on hold to talk to customer service for a long time, and then have them tell me that I need to speak to somebody else, so they can remove my account and I can start a new account.

I have tried removing the app and reinstalling it but it doesn‚Äôt help.

title: Curbside Works Freat
review: I‚Äôve ordered curbside probably a dozen times now and yet to have a single issue. Saves me the hassle of waiting in the drive thru, orders are always correct, and food is hot fresh. I order and pay on the run at a red light or when I‚Äôm leaving home or somewhere else and when I pull in, a couple minutes later my food is delivered to my car window. The app also is nice in that you can customize your order, use the app deals, and there is zero miscommunication between myself and the drive thru ordering system. If it‚Äôs wrong, it‚Äôs almost always going to be the party placing the order, not making the order. Pretty handy system to add in conjunction to drive thru and using the lobby.
developerResponse: {'id': 12938637, 'body': "We couldn't agree more! In fact, we think the McDonald's Mobile App is the best thing that could have happened to your phone!", 'modified': '2020-01-15T22:56:31Z'}

title: Difficult to navigate
review: Went to my local McDonald‚Äôs today on my lunch break, only to learn that you can‚Äôt even go inside to order. There‚Äôs just a sign out front that says use the drive through or mobile app. Well, my work truck doesn‚Äôt fit in a drive through, nor does it easily fit in one of the ‚Äúpredefined‚Äù pickup spaces. The app doesn‚Äôt give the option for hand off or other for my situation, so I made due and squeezed into one of the spots. Then it was time to try to order with the app, and what a letdown that was. I couldn‚Äôt figure out how to make a sandwich into a meal, so after about 5 minutes of trying to figure it out, I gave up and just got a burger and fries separately, and skipped the drink. I don‚Äôt know why they have to make it so difficult to get food anymore. This was the first and last time I‚Äôll be using this app.

title: Refuses to work properly ALL the time!
review:
This app would be so great if it only WORKED the way it‚Äôs supposed to!

First and foremost, it stubbornly refuses to acknowledge when you are at the restaurant you ordered at! I, as well as everyone else I know despite whatever phone they‚Äôve got, have had serious issues with this app refusing to recognize when you get there. Pushing the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here‚Äù while you‚Äôre standing RIGHT AT THE REGISTER always pulls up, ‚ÄúOops! It looks like you aren‚Äôt here yet!‚Äù and leads to the embarrassing act of having to not only walk out and back in, but even AROUND THE PARKING LOT, trying to get it to recognize that you are there! (One time it even decided all by itself that we were ‚Äúthere‚Äù even though we were ACROSS THE STREET ON THE OPPOSITE CORNER STILL WAITING FOR THE LIGHT TO CHANGE SO WE COULD CROSS.

The second issue is that it HATES letting you use your ‚Äúdeals‚Äù! We‚Äôve learned that over the past year of having this app that the only way you can get it to work is to first set your ‚Äúordering restaurant‚Äù for a McDonald‚Äôs all the way across town (!) before you do anything, place your order with said ‚Äúdeal‚Äù in place, and THEN correct your address to the proper McDonald‚Äôs you‚Äôre going to before paying. Ridiculous.

McDonald‚Äôs staff also acknowledges that the above sort of nonsense happens all the time. This all seriously needs to be corrected!
developerResponse: {'id': 12938384, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-01-15T22:28:14Z'}

title: I‚Äôve wasted time using this app
review: I‚Äôve used this app 3 times. First time it worked great. The second time I went through the drive thru and the employee gave me attitude about me not paying, even though I‚Äôve paid on the app. She then tried to blame me for not telling the person on the intercom that I had a mobile order, but I did. The third time, I parked in a spot, said which spot I was in, then the app said I couldn‚Äôt use the coupon I had in the cart, so I tried to delete my order, but my card had already been charged. I went inside to see what was wrong, and they said they received my order. This app has made coming to McDonald‚Äôs inconvenient and confusing. I deleted the app right after the third time. Not worth my time, would much rather wait in the drive thru line and order like a normal person. Also this has made me realize I will probably not go to that particular McDonald‚Äôs ever again, the employees were rude and degrading.
developerResponse: {'id': 7406571, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-02-21T22:12:21Z'}

title: Can not get a refund
review: I go through the drive thru with a mobile order. I get to the window and they edit my order which is very obvious on my receipt where they removed all my food and replaced it with random items. They read off the random items asked if that was my order I said no and they said they can‚Äôt pull up my order. They asked me to pull up and submit it as curbside pick up which I did and I got my food. I checked my email later and found that I got charged for both orders (one random order and my order) and there is no easy way to go about getting a refund. The store cannot help and the app support is terrible.

title: From an employee standpoint
review: Want to start out by saying I‚Äôm loving the app.  I use it myself.  However, I‚Äôve noticed in drive-through that there are times when our guests are unable to retrieve coupons from the app even though they retrieve said coupons on their device at home.  Some of that may be from an automatic connection our Wi-Fi, as you have to pass through a walled garden (internet term). Others are unable to change out their card information for mobile orders, so they have no choice but to pay on site.  Still others can give valid card information and mobile orders will not work properly. Is there a number that I can give to my guests that are having issues with the app? And if so, what are the operating hours?

title: Here‚Äôs why you shouldn‚Äôt use the app.
review: Such a nightmare. I ordered and paid using my McDonald‚Äôs app. It took longer waiting in my prepaid spot then it would have going to the drive-through. When the McDonald‚Äôs employee came to my car they informed me that they were out of two of the items that I purchased. He then asked me if I wanted to replace it with another item or if I wanted money back. I opted to get my money back and then had to wait for him to go inside and get my money. When I got home I realized they didn‚Äôt give me everything I ordered. I called the number for the app and after spending much time explaining everything that happened, they told me that they were unable to help me but could forward the information onto the store. When I call the store directly, they didn‚Äôt know How to refund me. I‚Äôm still waiting to get my money back‚Ä¶ Stay away from the app, it‚Äôs not worth the trouble he can cause you If they make a mistake.

title: App doesn‚Äôt work if the store does not monitor their front cash register
review:
Waited in car for 30 minutes after app order was made and processed. Finally went into store and front desk had a sign to use kiosk. After finally asking an employee about my order, it was then when they finally printed out and started preparing my order. I get people are understaffed but if thats the case turn app orders off!!! Worst experience with this app and it is the last time I use it. App should not process orders if the order does not get automatically added to the cooks que.

App should not accept orders if restaurant does not first acknowledge them or automatically have the order appear for them to prepare. If your store doesn‚Äôt put someone at the front desk to monitor app orders you are basically out of luck and will be sitting there for 30-60 minute before realizing you need to enter the store.
developerResponse: {'id': 32335316, 'body': "something is definitely off here and we'd like more info to look into it. you can share your order details here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html", 'modified': '2022-10-01T17:32:19Z'}

title: Order to delivery serious flaws
review:
I placed an order for delivery on the McDonald‚Äôs app.   It did not state that I would be using Uber eats to complete the order until I hit ‚Äúsubmit‚Äù.   I was then prompted to open Ubereats.   Once in my Uber eats , the order did not appear to have come over from the McDonald‚Äôs app.  There was nothing in ‚Äúmy orders‚Äù on ubereats to reflect this and no where for me to complete the Uber eats transaction.  So I started the order over again in Uber eats.  This alone was annoying.  Why even start at McDonald‚Äôs app if I could have just started at ubereats!   (Other apps take you directly to Uber eats right after selecting delivery )
I place the order again on ubereats and complete the order.   THE ORDER WAS DOUBLED!   but nothing in the my order section reflected this.  I ensured every item was qty 1.  I did not realize it was doubled until the order arrived.   I paid for the double.   I am very frustrated.

title: 24 hr restaurant closed
review:
This is the first time I have used this app. Needless to say I‚Äôm not a fan of it. I ordered my food and drove to location that it automatically found, which is fine because that‚Äôs the only one in the city I was in. Clicked curbside, entered number, and an error popped up and said that the 24 hr restaurant was closed. Really... closed!!! Yet the line was around the building which is why I used the app. So I try to call inside but guess what?? No answer. I understand they‚Äôre busy but someone can take a minute to answer the phone. That is bad customer service. So no phone answering, app says restaurant is closed but it‚Äôs 24 hrs, I took my business elsewhere. This particular location is always busy but the app won‚Äôt work and says it‚Äôs closed! Someone needs to fix this or hire more people if that‚Äôs the issue. 
I also shouldn‚Äôt be forced to give a star rating when it‚Äôs not deserved.

title: Mobile order is broken
review:
I‚Äôve discovered (the hard way) that the mobile ordering system is broken. 

Two times, I‚Äôve tried placing a mobile order and when trying to attempt to pickup at my selected restaurant, the drive thru attendant told me that they ‚Äúcan‚Äôt locate my order in the computer‚Äù. From my experience, it appears that if you place an order and arrive at the restaurant ‚Äútoo quickly‚Äù, this is when the problems occur, almost as if the system needs some time to internally ‚Äúprocess‚Äù the order. However, I can‚Äôt full confirm if this is the root cause. 

More than an app problem, this definitely seems to be an infrastructure issue and should be addressed ASAP. I consider myself fairly technically savvy, but the general public is not, nor do they have the patience to put up with broken systems. Customers will simply get frustrated and just go to a competitor.
developerResponse: {'id': 19704463, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that, Onur. Let us look into that. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-02-25T00:08:28Z'}

title: One of the best FF apps!
review:
One of the best fast food apps and I wasn‚Äôt even crazy about McDonald's before; (I feel like I grew out of it after HS lol) but the rewards point system is decent, deals are awesome, and there are few if any technical issues (I‚Äôm looking at you Dunkin‚Äô Donuts app üò°) 

These days it goes without saying you should have an app for every fast food and/or supermarket you frequent often. The reason being you will SAVE a lot of money! If you just roll up and order you will pay the highest possible retail price, where as you could probably get the same thing and then some utilizing the establishment‚Äôs app. Plenty of incentive! Download it now.

title: Poor service
review:
I went to the Northern Lights location on Cleveland Ave, which is supposed to be a 24 hours store.
I did a mobile order on 7/20 and the girl at the window said they were closed at 3:30 am. She stated they were on change over, and they were closed until 5am. 
Today I just went to the same location, and there was a lady at the window that didn‚Äôt know how to use the app for coupons. The manager, John came to assist her. I asked her to add an extra side of Mac sauce, and she said she couldn‚Äôt do it and to ask at the next window. I get to the second window and ask the guy for a side of Mac sauce. He informs that it will be .75. I felt like after dealing employees that aren‚Äôt properly trained, they should have given me the sauce. I told the gentleman to please go get John because I had just told him about me coming to the store and it being closed. 
McDonalds should be BETTER!
Very disappointed with this location. THEY ARE NOT TRULY A 24 HOUR STORE!

title: App good, deals slipping
review: The app works fine, and the deals used to be great, which is the reason I downloaded this app. Because of the deals that were on here, my family would visit sometimes up to three times a week or more. Now it is hardly worth it. It seems like a lot of work has gone into developing the look and usability of the app, but for my family, we are more interested in the affordability. My McDonald‚Äôs in Guthrie Oklahoma used to look like a McDonald‚Äôs, and now it looks more like a copy of Starbucks, with prices to match. This is OK I guess, as long as the app had deals on the frappe‚Äòs, which it hasn‚Äôt had in a long time. So now I very rarely visit my Mc Starbucks. People like myself are not even interested in doing mobile pay, and you could find a McDonald‚Äôs anywhere, so I‚Äôm not really interested in store locator. The deals are what need to improve! Then we might come back. I guarantee that I am not the only one who feels this way.

title: Good deals, poor service
review: The deals are good but expect confusion if you try to pick up your order via the drive through or significantly slower service when using the curbside pickup option. The fastest that I‚Äôve gotten an order is 7 minutes. Not too bad. Not too great either. My most recent order entailed a 15 minute wait in a mobile order curbside spot before frustration set in and I drove up to the pickup window to see what happened to the order. They couldn‚Äôt find it in the system. They asked if I had paid (always get this question with a mobile order) and realized it was the food that had been sitting there ‚Äúunclaimed‚Äù the entire wait time. 17 minutes.  It would‚Äôve been much more if I hadn‚Äôt been proactive. Too bad. The app has potential but I‚Äôd recommend that you stay away from it unless you‚Äôve got plenty of time to wait on your hands.
developerResponse: {'id': 7970495, 'body': 'Time waits for no-one! Give us another chance to speed up your next Mobile App order.', 'modified': '2019-03-29T15:44:51Z'}

title: Can‚Äôt have someone else pick up
review:
I was in a hurry and ordered food and asked my husband to grab it. They wouldn‚Äôt let him pick it up even though I sent him the order confirmation info AND screenshots. SO... I had him log in to my account on his phone but it wouldn‚Äôt show the open order that I‚Äôd already paid for. I had to go back in and cancel everything and give him all my ordering information so he could do it all over again. FINALLY a half hour later the order was put in to be made.

They won‚Äôt make the food or let you pick it up unless your gps is turned on to allow them to access your location and you have to physically be there. No one else can get it even if they have the confirmation number. Kind of destroys the convenience factor if you ask me.

Won‚Äôt be using mobile ordering again unless they fix these issues. Doesn‚Äôt save time considering that standing in line would take the same amount of time as searching through the app menu. The only convenient thing to me would be ordering so someone else could pick it up for me on their way home.

That being said, the app worked how it was supposed to. The coupons loaded and the menus were clear. I don‚Äôt like having NO CHOICE to deny access to sharing my location. üëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëé

title: Store refusing to accept app payments
review: I used the mobile app today (5 Jun 2018 at 1230) , I went inside and verified my order. The cashier put the order and a payment notice showed on phone telling that the mobile app debited the charge ($6.09) from my account. I waiting in the store for more than 15 minutes before I asked the assistant manager where was my food. She replied it√¢¬Ä¬ôs sitting in the warmer but I am not allowed to give it because her boss does not want to take Mobile orders anymore because he does not get mobile app payments in a timely manner. I showed her my bank app showing the debit but she still refused to give me my food. I asked for a refund, she also refused. I left the store with now food, refund or an apology for the waiting and poor customer service. I will never eat at your stores again and will post this on all available social media sites. Thanks you for ruining my lunch and my confidence in a cherished American company!

title: Cleared my bank before the store found my order.
review: I use mobile ordering for everything‚Ä¶ rarely do I stand in line at Walmart, Publix, Sam‚Äôs Club, Chick-fil-A, or anywhere else for that matter. This morning after placing my mobile order, I literally sat in the drive-through showing the manager my order and showing her that it had already cleared my bank and yet she spent more time debating with me instead of providing me the items in my order.  This was my first attempt to use mobile ordering at the specific location but I have used it elsewhere and generally speaking, the staff have no clue how it works. They need better education and your app needs clearer functionality.  I go to this specific McDonald‚Äôs virtually every morning for coffee and to get some breakfast for one or more of my children. Needless to say I will return but I probably won‚Äôt use the mobile ordering application.  The manager could also use a lesson in customer service.

title: Horrible service
review: I have been going to McDonald‚Äôs for many decades. I know since covid that people don‚Äôt want to work, so its hard to get folks to do so. Unfortunately a lot of the folks you have working in many different stores don‚Äôt even seem to acknowledge the front counter. I have waited at the counter on several occasions and get ignored for several minutes. Finally someone will come and take my order and act like its a burden. They only have a job because of customers, but don‚Äôt seem to realize that. Most of them are just rude. It saddens me because I used to work at McDonald‚Äôs and realize it must be tough on owner/operators because they cant keep control over every single crew member and a the multiple restaurants they own. I know that the owners must be frustrated as well. I know I was. For the most part it doesn‚Äôt seem to matter which store I visit, its the same  result.

title: It‚Äôs really just a scam
review:
The ‚Äúrewards‚Äù are merely an effort to upsale customers. You‚Äôre limited to one item per visit and visits have to be at least 15 minutes apart. Redemption for an item also cannot be combined with any specials. 

Further, the app itself has issues. At times it will not let you order ‚Äúbreakfast‚Äù items at 6:00 am because apparently the app does not always read the time on your phone and thinks it is outside the breakfast window (or vice versa, it only allows breakfast items to be ordered well after McDonalds has stopped serving them for the day.)

The app will also say no Internet connection although my other apps are accessing and using the Internet. When I get to a store the little French fries just keep jumping around like some kids in one of those 90s music videos and never moves beyond that until it finally crashes or I switch it off.
developerResponse: {'id': 31085111, 'body': 'a quick delete and redownload should fix most of these issues. if not we can totally help out just drop us a line here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n', 'modified': '2022-07-25T16:26:04Z'}

title: Good til night time
review: The app is good and I use it when I‚Äôm on my lunch breaks. But tonight got me a little down. On the app it doesn‚Äôt tell you when they stop doing pick up. I got off work late and I thought I could do a curbside pickup since the line in drivethu is always packed at night, only to arrive at the McDonald‚Äôs location to find out that curbside and pick up were closed. It doesn‚Äôt tell you when they close only when it reopens. I think it were be best to include what time they stop doing curbside and pickup so some people (like myself) could see when they stop so they don‚Äôt waste coupons and time etc. the app is great but tonight it let me down.

title: Location concerns
review: This app mostly works as it should but it requires location services (and precise location) in order to show you deals for your restaurant or to check you in when you get there. I use other food apps and none of these need precise location to redeem my deals or to verify I have arrived when I say I have. If I don‚Äôt have location services on, they can‚Äôt find my order in the drive thru. If i have location on but not precise, it won‚Äôt let me check in for curbside. I really don‚Äôt like having to turn it on to see deals for a specific restaurant - they shouldn‚Äôt have to know where I am; only the restaurant id like to visit. I‚Äôm not sure why McDonald‚Äôs is so obsessed with tracking my phone so closely when no one else seems to need to.
developerResponse: {'id': 29671935, 'body': 'we just want to make sure you can redeem your rewards and your order at the location nearest you. ü§ó ', 'modified': '2022-05-10T21:00:56Z'}

title: Five Stars when it stops logging me out
review:
UPDATE2/6/22: it STILL won‚Äôt let me sign in!!!! It only has the option to sign up. It says I already have an account with the email(s) and then proceeds to not let it sign me in!!! What is going on? 
UPDATE: NOW it logs me out, and I can‚Äôt log in anymore! I signed up with Facebook when I first got the app and now it tells me I can‚Äôt ‚Äúsign-up‚Äù because the email is already associated with an account. Yes, I‚Äôm not trying to sign up I‚Äôm trying to sign in!!!! What is happeningüò© Almost every time I go to McDonald‚Äôs and open my app, it‚Äôs logged me out. That‚Äôs one thing, but then once I try to log in, it‚Äôs just a loading screen and I can‚Äôt use my rewards! This has happened before the latest update as well so PLEASE do something to fix this. Will change to five stars when this is no longer an issue because getting rewards at McDonald‚Äôs is a dream come true.

title: Horrible to use
review:
To order anything it takes about 5 steps. Very difficult to use. And if the restaurant does not have what you ordered you do not know until you get to the window, and you cannot get your payment credited back. You must go to your bank or to get refunded by disputing the transaction. If you use the preloaded card, you will not get refunded. 
When you attempt to order-first you must search, then the description comes up, with no option to select. You must go to another screen to select. Or, the app tries to sell you something else that you do not want. Recent purchase lists are horrible too because you can‚Äôt see what the recent purchase is until you select  them individually. And the points are horrible because you can‚Äôt use them on what you prefer. They are only for things I would never order or MCD is trying to market.

title: Won‚Äôt let me add a credit payment
review: Horrible! I‚Äôve had the app for a while now and for quite some time now when I go to check out, it asks me to add a payment as I click ‚Äúnew credit card‚Äù it says ‚Äúsorry, there was a payment error. If the issue continues please restart the app and try again‚Äù I literally started it, deleted the app and downloaded it again, I even restarted my phone and still this issue continues! How the heck does this app not let me add my card to pay? Isn‚Äôt the whole point of it to PURCHASE a meal? So why is this st*pid app not allowing me add my credit card when I want to check out? title: Convenient but not accurate
review: This app is great if the restaurant is not busy and allows for curbside delivery or in store pick up, otherwise you‚Äôre sitting in a line waiting forever for an order that‚Äôs ready before everybody else‚Äôs in line. The prices also change with the second to last version. If you have order a meal because of a special and go to check out, it will either tell you it‚Äôs unavailable or charge you a different price. At least that‚Äôs what happened with me, my order was more than double the advertised price. Still waiting to hear back from my inquiry after it happened.

title: Don‚Äôt waste your time
review: This app is truly awful. Actually, it isn‚Äôt the app that is awful, it is the stores‚Äô support of the app that is awful. The purpose of ordering ahead is so that the food is ready when you arrive. However, using this app, you have to check in when you arrive (and uses GPS to confirm) and that‚Äôs when they start your food. If the store is backed up in orders, you don‚Äôt go to the front. Instead, your order is added to the queue as if you had just ordered. How can the fast food giant not get an app correct while so many smaller places do it well?  Tonight I ordered food to pick up on the way home. Granted, it was late (midnight) but instead of being able to pick up from somewhere that was quick, I had to sit for 20 minutes in the drive thru. Even though they had not started my food, I could not cancel my order either. I won‚Äôt be using this anymore. It is anything but convenient.

title: Buggy Login, Poor Wayfinding
review: Pros: * When it works, it‚Äôs nice being able to have food brought out to car during pandemic + Apple Pay integration is helpful. Cons: * Poorly programmed: am repeatedly asked to verify my email. When clicking on link to verify email address am repeatedly directed to a page displaying ‚ÄúCan‚Äôt Open Page.‚Äù Can‚Äôt place order as a result! Perhaps this is because I asked not to be tracked?? * Much more difficult to find menu items than it should be - items are not logically grouped (ex. Burgers, chicken, desert, drinks‚Ä¶etc.). They appear to be randomly grouped. Chaotic. * Can‚Äôt place an order for someone else to pick up as the phone used to place the order needs to physically be at the McDonald‚Äôs during pick up (geolocation used). Need to physically be in McDonald‚Äôs parking lot to click ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù to have items brought out (I‚Äôm ordering fast food, not a diamond necklace).

title: Only keeping it for the offers
review: I‚Äôm not a fan of how my local McDonald‚Äôs always has issues with changing the menu during certain times of the day. More than half the time the app doesn‚Äôt recognize it‚Äôs lunch at 10:30 am and will stay breakfast for too long. Another issue is that it‚Äôll sometimes not even be available to use when the drive thru is still open. Also I have issues with being able to pick it up inside at night, gives me the option and the stores unlocked and all they do is shrug on why the app isn‚Äôt work for me and tell me to go thru the drive thru. Honestly I only keep the app at this point when I want certain offers and deals. Plus the convenience of being able to pick up curbside.

title: WOULD NOT HONOR MY ORDER
review:
I ordered online through this useless app that doesn‚Äôt track your order being made. The app allowed me to place my order for pickup, but the store was locked with people still inside! People were getting inside only when someone left the restaurant. It was the weirdest thing. Ok, whatever, right? So the restaurant is locked on all three sides so we go to the drive through. I tell them we have an order of French fries and filet of fish. That‚Äôs it. I show them proof of purchase and order through the app. 

THE PERSON AT THE DRIVE THROUGH REFUSED MY ORDER! what is the point of the app if you can take my money just fine but cannot honor my order despite showing the receipt, date, proof of purchase, everything through your app??!! 

I want my money back! And I‚Äôm telling everyone to stay away from McDonalds during the pandemic if this is how they treat paying customers.

title: Curbside nightmare
review: I placed an order on the app for curbside pick up before breakfast time was over knowing I wouldn‚Äôt make it in time driving there and placing it myself in person. It asked for form of payment and all so I assumed it was accepted and being worked on as I headed there. But once I arrived and indicated what spot I was parked in for order pick up the app just told me the items in my order where unavailable at that time of the day (after bfast hours). What‚Äôs the point of using the app and providing payment info then if the order isn‚Äôt accepted and placed until you‚Äôre parked in the location?! No where during the checkout process did it say I would have to be at the restaurant before 10:30am in order for my order to be honored. So annoying and inconvenient esp if you‚Äôre 9 months pregnant and really craving a McMuffin and expecting it to be ready for you. Fix this!! Now I
developerResponse: {'id': 24717009, 'body': "We totally get how this can be annoying! Let's discuss this at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-08-25T16:25:51Z'}

title: I can only give it one star.
review:
I love the customization options. Having all of the different ways you can make whatever you want being available at your fingertips is wonderful.

Waiting twenty minutes for your order to come out and it not coming out is a huge flaw. Twice now, I ordered via the app and waited in vain, because the store I was at never actually got the order.

What the heck is the point of a mobile app that takes your money but doesn‚Äôt submit your order? Theft. I almost left instead of going in, and I can‚Äôt be the only one. It seems as though McDonalds wants us to just leave after paying without actually getting what we ordered.

title: Slow
review:
It‚Äôs my first time to try the app and it already takes so long to even place one order. I‚Äôm better off just waiting in the long drive through line than ordering via the app. Just gonna delete it in 5 minutes.

Update: it‚Äôs faster at letting me order but it really should be clearer about what I can‚Äôt and can order. just want the breakfast sandwich for dinner...but what‚Äôs the point of downloading the app if I can‚Äôt get that. I‚Äôll just do it the old fashioned way. Sorry McDonald‚Äôs but you weren‚Äôt completely better the second time round. I have better luck with the drive through.

Well I‚Äôm adding to this yet again. The app malfunctioned on me when I tried making a payment at the curb. Customer service wasn‚Äôt the best so I‚Äôm just gonna use drive through. Does the same job only better somehow. I legit got no reason as to why it malfunctioned and didn‚Äôt let me complete my order. I officially just deleted the app.

title: Decent
review: The app is pretty good, it‚Äôs nice to know that my order is being put in correctly, I wish it could keep the employees from messing it up too!   It‚Äôd be really helpful if the orders always cleared out of your bag every time so that you don‚Äôt have to empty your bag from your previous order.  I also wish that stores didn‚Äôt have the option of shutting off curbside (numbered parking spot) pick up. The location in Niles Michigan never has a line that doesn‚Äôt require a fifteen minute wait (I‚Äôm seriously not exaggerating, if anything I‚Äôm being generous) and they‚Äôve started ignoring or disallowing curbside pickup so that you have to wait in the super long line. Another issue is that the app won‚Äôt let me place lunch orders until 10 minutes after lunch starts.

title: Refund and Customer service issues.
review: I love the app and use it all the time, I work at a Walmart that conveniently has a McDonald's in it's location.  So I use the app to have my food ready when I go to lunch.  Issue with the app is that if a location is out of something, there's no way to know until you get there.  I believe this would be even more frustration for the pick up people who drive to a location.  I went to the counter then they told me to cancel the order, but once you've checked in and been charged there's no way to cancel or refund the transaction.  I was told to call customer service (which I did). They're solution to the problem was to mail me coupons and to call my bank to dispute the transaction to get a refund.  My situation was I ordered the double quarter meal- large which is the most expensive meal you can get.  Even if you do an exchange there's no way to get the difference refunded to you.

title: App Crash Defect
review: If you place an order for pickup and reboot your iPhone before you have a chance to go to restaurant and finish processing the pending ApplePay order transaction, the app will not ever start again until it‚Äôs uninstalled and reinstalled.  It crashes each time you try and start it.  I‚Äôve reported this before to you guys and you STILL haven‚Äôt fixed it!!!!  FIX IT!!!!  This is easy to duplicate.  Start app, place and order to pickup at restaurant and do the ApplePay authorization.  The app will now tell you to go to restaurant to pick up order.  Reboot your iPhone.  Now try to start the app to complete that order pickup.  It‚Äôll crash each time you start it.  FYI, make sure you‚Äôre not within GPS range of the restaurant when placing the order so that you don‚Äôt try and fully process it as you authorize ApplePay payment.  This is an important step in duplicating this defect!
developerResponse: {'id': 33593819, 'body': "let's get the app back up and running! if you're still having the same problem after reinstalling the app, please contact us here: https://www.McDonalds.com/us/en-us/feedback.html", 'modified': '2022-12-07T16:59:28Z'}

title: AWFUL!!!
review: EVERYTIME I order through this app, they use 3rd party delivery drivers(which is fine) but they don‚Äôt transfer all of your information to the drivers. Several time has it happens where my apartment number and drop instructions never transfer over where the drivers have to contact me to get my apartment number and drop off directions. Tonight, however, was the WORST experience I have ever had using this app. Due to the lack of information transferring over to the drivers, the driver made the very poor choice of just picking a spot in my complex to drop my food and then tell me where they left it. Which turned out to be the OTHER SIDE of the complex, so I as a young female had no choice but to go SEARCHING for my food at 11PM ALONE. Technology is WAY to advanced in 2022 for this to have EVER been an issue. McDonald‚Äôs App Creators, get it together. This was completely unacceptable.

I told the manager about it and she said there nothing she can, asked if i could get a couple more things that added up to those points, she straight up said NO we can‚Äôt do that! title: Lackluster Optimization
review:
Personally, I feel that the app is seriously lacking in the critical conjecture of optimizing gratuity. I can not tell you how many times I‚Äôve been left asking myself why do I even try to incorporate the rewards & deals; other than the fact that McDonald‚Äôs will always be comfort food for me. 

What should be utilized is a opportunity to ‚ÄúSTACK‚Äù together the different bundles offered via the app. I mean, McDonald‚Äôs receives subsidies for each coupon voucher utilized by a customer; not to mention how much they could also receive in the limitless amounts of patron publicity.

It is as if the app just purposefully decided that being able to stack up the value was not worth while. And trust me, right now I‚Äôm on public assistance, so every dollar I spend that could have been stretched a little further definitely matters.

title: Great app, just needs this one feature...
review:
I have used this app every chance that I get, and I enjoy using some of the discounts offered to me through it. My only complaint is that it doesn't have a feature where you can redeem gift cards and I have no idea why that's the case. With other fast food apps I have, you can do so with ease (one app even gives you bonus points if you pay with a gift card)! This app really helps me save money on things I couldn't save on before, and I'd really appreciate it if I could also save some time and effort of going to the restaurant just to use up my gift cards. 
(Also, if this feature does get added, my review will change to 5 stars.)
developerResponse: {'id': 27955269, 'body': "there's always room for improvement. let's talk here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-02-10T00:43:42Z'}

title: Works ok most of the time. Has some glitches.
review: Currently trying to use my points for a happy meal, and it won‚Äôt let me choose fries instead of apple slices. It acknowledges I clicked on it, but won‚Äôt move past that step. Also, there needs to be the option to order a cup of Mac sauce in the app. Honestly lol. That simple thing would make me so happy. And the ability to use a reward and a deal in the same transaction. A deal is a coupon, and a reward is something I‚Äôve earned. There‚Äôs no harm in letting me use both in one transaction. But it‚Äôs almost always cheaper to use a deal vs my points, unless I‚Äôm getting a happy meal (which the app isn‚Äôt working properly for anyways so it doesn‚Äôt matter).
developerResponse: {'id': 29130242, 'body': "we're all about improvement. drop us a line here with as much input as you can on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n", 'modified': '2022-04-12T15:38:35Z'}

title: Unusable without location services
review:
While it‚Äôs disappointing that this app fundamentally needs to know where I am to function at a base level, I‚Äôm not their boss and they can do what they want. I can‚Äôt use this app if I don‚Äôt want to share that. Your competitors accommodate me but whatever. Life goes on.
What is VERY disappointing is that this app goes on functioning as if it didn‚Äôt need it. It‚Äôs bug-riddled and almost unusable but it does let me get all the way to checkout, only to nag me repeatedly for my location. Only at the end does it come out that it wants to confirm I‚Äôm close to the restaurant. At least I could cancel the order.
At the very least, you should just up front communicate to users that it‚Äôs fruitless to even try to use the app without locating you and not have us minority users waste our time.
Two stars though because otherwise a decent app.
developerResponse: {'id': 9158495, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-06-13T21:11:05Z'}

title: Incredibly slow
review:
I never write reviews, but since I frequently visit this location for breakfast, I need to say something.  The service in the Crystal Lake location is becoming slower and slower, and my average wait for my food can be up to 15 minutes.  To try and mitigate this issue, Ive been utilizing the app to see if this would speed things up by using the mobil order.  To no avail, the wait time still remained the same.  Sometimes up to the point I end up walking inside because it feels like I was forgotten.  Coming from the corporate world, I started watching the staff, and noticed many inefficiencies due to lack of proper management. I won‚Äôt go into it, you have one employee that roams around speaking with the customers while lightly cleaning up after tables, all during peak hours. All I‚Äôm asking is please audit this place, especially during their peak hours.  

Thank you for listening to an obnoxious customer vent.

title: Emulate chik fil a
review:
First time user and not impressed. The connection to gps and also the using of deals tied to orders needs work. I can‚Äôt order in my phone and send my husband or father so that I use my favorites and can get the points without a severe hassle in them finding the order because the app wants my phone present - which would leave me without any way to be contacted if someone needs me. Some other brands have perfected this much better in their apps and should be studied for improvement. 

The deals are not intuitive to the ordering page and forces starting over if not applicable which is a significant inconvenience. 

I don‚Äôt want my cc # stored - I want to use Apple Pay but had to cancel the screen and hope there was a way to add later - which there was but it was NOT obvious and should have been available on the main entry rather than hidden.

title: Best app on my phone
review: I kept saying over and over again that McDonald‚Äôs needed a rewards app and the day I got the alert that they did. I immediately downloaded it and it is one of the best decisions I have made. I earn rewards and points so easily. This app is amazing especially since I am a broke college student who craves McDonald‚Äôs at least twice a week. If you were contemplating getting it, get it! The only problem the app used to have was you have to wait an hour to use another reward but now it is I think 15 minutes which isn‚Äôt bad since I am usually still in the restaurant. Would give 10 stars if I could!

title: Buggy Application
review:
It‚Äôs better than most fast food applications as formally stated above, but McDonald‚Äôs app for awhile has been very buggy with accepting new terms of service policies. Before, after & during you‚Äôre bound to experience at least one of these logout messages which can make it very hard to complete your order or register for curbside/in store pickup. 

Moving on towards payment, during checkout they claim to accept all payment methods between; Apple Pay/Visa/Debit but in most cases it won‚Äôt accept a card and will once again log you out. Moblie orders done through curbside typically exceeds the suggested ‚Äú5 minute wait‚Äù, it wouldn‚Äôt be an issue waiting a little longer but they also don‚Äôt provide you with an ETA or status (completed/on the way) of your order after your purchase.
developerResponse: {'id': 24986300, 'body': "That's not awesome to hear! Let's get that looked into here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-09-08T16:53:04Z'}

title: Terrible App
review: Restaurant apps are supposed to make your experience easier and better. With other restaurant apps, I can order ahead for one of my family members to pick up on their way home. They usually will let the drive-thru employee know the receipt or name of the order and they would then start preparing the order that‚Äôs already been paid for on the app. This McDonald‚Äôs app will only work if you have your phone (that you ordered on) with you at the physical location or they‚Äôll just refund the order on the app and make you order the whole thing in person. What a backwards way to do business. I initially contacted customer service for why my order was refunded, they would email you and then if you need to reply, you can only call. As a customer service employee, companies that make it difficult to contact customer service usually do not care for their customers to begin with.

title: Meh
review: I use to be able to use this app without a problem and loved it. It helped me avoid long lines and it was very convenient. However, recently if I go through the drive thru to edit my order by switching drinks to waters since that isn‚Äôt an option during my ordering process, I‚Äôm always told they don‚Äôt have any mobile orders and make me reorder. They have stated they have a lot of issues with it and don‚Äôt get the orders like they should in store. I feel like I waste time by ordering in the app then having to do everything over again. I‚Äôve also had many people come out to curb side to ask what I‚Äôve ordered because they can‚Äôt find it. My app says it‚Äôs tracking properly and knows I‚Äôm here so it‚Äôs just a little frustrating. Hopefully the bugs are fixed, it‚Äôs a great concept!
developerResponse: {'id': 13184782, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-01-29T16:54:41Z'}

title: Cool app; mobile ordering is worthless
review: I will never use mobile order again. After placing, confirming, and paying for my order, I sat at the designated pickup spot for over 10 minutes waiting for my food to arrive (2 McDoubles, 2 cokes). Probably a dozen cars came and went in the drive-through line but the restaurant was not busy inside. After 10 minutes, the app still didn‚Äôt show me any indication of when my food would arrive. After 15 minutes, I walked inside and asked the lady at the counter. She pointed to the screen to begin asking other the employees. Turns out, my food was not even made but the the drinks had been sitting on the counter long enough for the ice to melt. I had to wait about 5 more minutes for them to make my food. It took me over 20 minutes to get the food everyone else got in the drive-through in 3-4 minutes. No apology either. Why would anyone ever use Mobile Ordering? I won‚Äôt.

title: Terrible app...
review: This app is worse than simply walking in the store and buying your food. The restaurant doesn't start preparing your food until you arrive at the McDonald's you wish to pick up your order from. WHY WOULD I USE THIS APP THEN? I was hoping to walk in and simply pick up my prepared food... That would be the only reason I'd use this app. I pay online and then pick up my food. Worst experience ever, app said my payment method doesn't work, yet the restaurant said they received my payment. I authorized the same transaction through the app three times. There is almost no point to using this. Please rethink your methodology on the reasons why someone would use this. Let me order from any location and choose a pick up time. This way I can avoid the lines. Again, terrible, terrible, experience. Oh yeah, did I forget to mention the app and the experience are terrible? One more suggestion, make this not terrible.

title: One of the buggiest apps around
review: Frankly, McDonald‚Äôs should be ashamed to have this app representing them. There isn‚Äôt a time I have used this app that there hasn‚Äôt been an issue. For example, just about every time I want to place an order I have to ‚Äúreopen‚Äù my precious order and clear it out as it is still showing the items I ordered before that I have already paid for and picked up. Then there is the almost constant errors for location or a store showing as closed when it‚Äôs not. Another fun one is items showing as unavailable for breakfast or lunch DURING breakfast or lunch hours. There is one McDonald‚Äôs location where my payment never goes through properly. Honestly, this has limited my use of the app and McDonald‚Äôs tremendously.

title: Please stop giving the ‚Äúavailable‚Äù option of curbside
review: Many times that I have used the app, the only broken thing that I have dealt with, truly has to be with the ‚Äúavailable‚Äù options that it gives you only to have curbside be closed and the drive thru is the only thing open, PLEASE remove that as an option if it‚Äôs not available! Stop giving the option and saying that they are closed after having an option to pick up.
