title: Lilscorpio30
review: When the app works it good but lately I have been having issues with order pickup and delivery. When I go to do delivery the app says ‚Äúsorry we cannot connect to our delivery service provider right now try again in a few minutes or switch to pickup‚Äù and when I go to do pickup it says ‚Äúsorry having issues with payment can‚Äôt complete your order‚Äù so it‚Äôs like what gives and like I said before when the app works the way it should it‚Äôs good but lately I have been having a issue with the app and no matter how many times I uninstall and reinstall it, it comes up with the same issues...

title: Worst food app
review: This is the worse food app I‚Äôve downloaded. They don‚Äôt start making the food until you get there, which kind of defeats the purpose of ordering it & paying for it ahead of time. Next to the last time we used this app, we got there & waited for well over 10 minutes for our food to come out. The last time we used it, it kept telling us that we weren‚Äôt there yet when we tried to tell it what spot number we were in. No number on the sign to call inside the store. Finally had to go in, they couldn‚Äôt find the order & we had to reorder, then it was 100% messed up when we got it home. Literally, not one meal was made to our specs. I‚Äôve deleted the app & I won‚Äôt download it again. All the other food apps I use have the food ready when we get there, quick & no problems. Giving it one star is literally too much.

review:
After getting the app for a .63 cent egg Mc muffin. 
I asked a few co workers if they all wanted one.
I took a ride to our local Mac Donald‚Äôs in Lake Mills, WI.
I. First I parked and was going into to order.
    Just to find out their inside service was NOT 
    open,  why ?

2. I explained I had the app and wanted 5 egg       Mc muffins for the .63 cent deal Along with some other things. No problem here is your 
total is  $
After getting to the window I was told I could only get 1 for that price, your new total was $$
I asked where in the add did it say limit 1 per customer? The response was sorry !

3. Please pull ahead and wait for your order.

Putting out a low price to get people to down load your app. Is a good idea, next time print all your disclosures under the coupon.

If you can‚Äôt open your doors for inside dinning, 
Just build drive throughs 

I understand company‚Äôs are having a hard time finding good help. These problems goes above  the normal employees abilities.

Mac Donald‚Äôs get your act together before you become history!
Mr Ensweiler

title: Broken Now
review: Loyalty program update broke mobile ordering. I liked that McD didn't do points or rewards and instead used rotating deals. At first there were obviously issues with all stores not understanding the process but it got better and certain locations as usual were better than others. Now the order will process but a minute or two after it sends the order it disappears. I've tried to recreate but if you use a deal it will remember you DID use one "already" and locks that out for an hour, so you have to spend more money to get your order when you resubmit it. Also, let people use their rewards points AND a deal on the same order, not one or the other. Literally every other fast food app lets you claim a reward from spending money + a default whatever deal.

title: Never works for 3 years straight .
review:
I been having trouble with this App for years. I can never sign in. I go and get a new password. It always says ‚Äú technical issues.‚Äù I thought it was my phone. I got a new IPhone . Same issues . I would delete the app and redownload. Same issues . This haven‚Äôt been something that is new. I would think it is Omaha or Nebraska. When i travel out of state . The same issue occurs. I wished i could screen shot the problem. This been going on for almost 2 years. I still haven‚Äôt ne able to do anything on the app.  I used to use this app so often and it is disappointing. That i am using Burger King app that never had this issue a lot more.

They said it is the update . I updated my phone . Got a new phone , used my daughters new iPhone 12, used my new IPad , and still i can‚Äôt upload and use this app. A total Waste of space and time.

title: Never will use this app again
review: I live in Georgia. I purchased two bacon egg and cheese biscuits via the app.  The total was about $4. On my way home I get an email from McDonalds for about $10 for the same two items and the location was Massachusetts. I never got a receipt for my food a purchased in Georgia. I called McDonald‚Äôs customer service and explained what happened.  They did not assure me the app was safe. They also did not explain how that happened. They offered me some free items from their menu which I declined. The rep said it must be a glitch and she was reporting it to the technical team. She said she cannot refund me the charges in Massachusetts and they should fall off after the pending stage. Well I‚Äôm after the pending stage now and the charges did not fall off. Now I have to call my bank for a refund. This is ridiculous. I have never been to Massachusetts in my life!

title: USELESS BUG-RIDDEN APP
review: This app has all the features you would want except for the fact that it doesn‚Äôt work. Once you place the order you still have to go on site to be verified so it doesn‚Äôt work with the drive-in. I go into the location and the application does not indicate that I‚Äôm actually in front of the point of sale for the pick up line. I checked all my connectivity settings Bluetooth Wi-Fi it does not work. The staff doesn‚Äôt even know how to respond to this application I had to tell them there was an order number which they had no idea about. They looked up the water and then they have to prepare it so basically even if this app did work it‚Äôs easier and faster to use the drive-in which is what I should‚Äôve done in the first place and what I‚Äôve done in the past with this particular location. Basically I deleted the app from my phone.

title: Getting buggier as time goes on
review:
Bugs are showing up frequently. I‚Äôve had several cases where I get a message that something went wrong when submitting a payment.  Recently I got that message and submitted the order again and both processed. Local restaurant was useless in resolving the issue and calls go customer service wasn‚Äôt much help either. Ended up having to dispute the second charge to get my money back. 

Also had several occasions where it said a deal wasn‚Äôt available at that time of day, but they were deals for the correct time period, like not letting me use a breakfast deal in the middle of the breakfast period. 

Another common issue is not being able to complete the order because it doesn‚Äôt think you‚Äôre at the restaurant, even while standing inside.

title: App completely stopped working.
review: I‚Äôve ordered using the app dozens of times without issue. But, for the past month, I haven‚Äôt been able to get anything to load. The whole app will work, then when I click to view menu and place an order, it says ‚Äúloading local menu‚Äù and won‚Äôt stop, to the point it crashes my app. I‚Äôve tried deleting and re-downloading the app seven times, logging in and out, and nothing has helped, if not exacerbated the issue. I sat with the ‚Äúloading local menu‚Äù for thirty two minutes today attempting to order lunch since I have no cash on me, and no other way to eat at the moment. If that could be an issue that could be looked into, if others are having it, would be great, otherwise I‚Äôm forced to delete the app and discontinue my use.

title: Needs Improvement!!!
review: The Deals Are Not Deals At all! I only went to get food for my family Bc of the deals. Then I get there and they only allow me to use 1. And then I was told from the app I have to Wait 60 minutes before I can use a different coupon! Which is miss leading on so many levels! Then to add insults to injury the location I was at was just as confused as me then they wouldn‚Äôt allow me to move forward with the order they all ready told me I could. They also said if I use a different card or cash it would go through on a 2nd order; which it didn‚Äôt! And why should I have to use 2 different cards to pay for my order. I would love for someone to actually get back with me about this. It took 15 minutes to order my food and to only be able to use one deal when there is no guideline for such is inconvenient.

title: Account Hacked
review:
Update: I called the McDonald‚Äôs app team to deactivate my account and talk about a joke. I didn‚Äôt even get an ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry‚Äù or ‚Äúcan we refund your money,‚Äù etc. The guy deleted my account and said thanks for bringing this to our attention. Now I have to wait for my new card to come in the mail, then I‚Äôll have to change over all of my automatic payments all because some app can‚Äôt secure information properly. Thank goodness my bank is awesome! 

Not sure how someone could hack into my account and order food, but it happened. I received a confirmation email regarding an order I placed over 100 miles away, which  shocked me since I hadn‚Äôt ordered anything and I was no where near the restaurant in question. So I logged into the app and right there under recent orders was the order in question and of course since my payment information is stored in the app, my card was charged. Yey me, an even bigger headache!

title: Mobile ordering is awful
review: McDonalds aggressively markets using mobile ordering.i tried to place a mobile order 7 times. It looked like my order went through and then I received a ‚Äúsorry‚Äù message and that I needed to refresh the app. I did-7 times and I turned my phone off and on and I input another credit card. I had to go back to work without lunch. I even tried to reopen the order and wasted gas driving to a second location and it told me my order was ready at the first location. I drove back and tried to complete my order and received the ‚Äúsorry‚Äù message again. What a waste of time and money. Will never use mobile ordering again. Booo

title: Flaws galore
review: I have several fast food and beverage establishment apps and this one is the worst. The coupons and offers used to be somewhat decent and switched up often, but they‚Äôve really gone downhill and become repetitious. My biggest gripe, though, is that you have to take your phone with you to utilize the mobile ordering so they can ‚Äútrack‚Äù when you‚Äôre at the restaurant. I much prefer apps like Dunkin‚Äô and several others where I can place my order and my husband can pick it up for me by using just my name, especially as a mom with a newborn who prefers to stay home WITH my phone. Not to mention that half the time we‚Äôve used the mobile ordering it has crashed or ended up with us going into the restaurant, defeating the purpose of mobile ordering in the first place. Overall, I become more and more unimpressed with this app and find myself using it less and less. Not impressed whatsoever.

title: Bait and switch
review:
The app bate was buy 1 Big Mac got 1 for 50 cents BUT if you order another meal with that, you have to pay full price for that 50 cent Big Mac because you can‚Äôt combine the bait deal with any other discount, they call a value meal a discount which it is but it‚Äôs not a, poster in the window, temporary discount. Now I wouldn‚Äôt expect the Big Mac deal with a window poster 2 breakfast sandwiches for 4 bucks but I do expect a permanent menu item to not mix my deal. 

So what I did was cancel everything but the Big Macs to get the deal and on the way home stopped at Burger King for the other 4/5ths of the purchase. I saw that Burger King has an app and told them how McDonalds app works, they said theirs worked like I expected, get the deal plus anything else. I got home, downloaded their app and learned I could have gotten a free Wopper plus the rest of my order and all in one stop. Guess whose app I deleted? Guess where I‚Äôm going from now on?

title: Worked great...until it didn‚Äôt. üòí
review: We had used the app for several months with great success. That all came to a screeching halt recently. The first bad experience occurred when the app allowed me to check in at the restaurant and then notified me there was an issued and I‚Äôd have to go inside or go to the drive thru, no big deal until the staff at McDonalds couldn‚Äôt find my order. The second time the app decided to break was when it allowed me to order something the restaurant no longer serves. Then the restaurant tells me the can‚Äôt/won‚Äôt give me a refund...nor can they give me something on the menus for equal value. Let‚Äôs just say mad doesn‚Äôt describe how I felt. After 10-15 minutes...sitting in the drive thru...I FINALLY got my refund. I immediately deleted the app after I almost couldn‚Äôt get a refund.

title: West Columbia Texas
review: We have been digital hacked! My husband, my teenage son, and me! We have always been in Sweeny Texas! We were targeted by the group of hackers!  My husband own a small electrical company he stated Kotrla Electrical Service‚Äôs, LLC in 2018 all my his self! On Feb 2020 he hired his first 2 employees here in Sweeny Texas! We have been paying California Prices! Washington DC Cyber Detectives are getting leads from our Apple devices! Every single app!! It‚Äôs time stamp on our I phones and Apple Watches! Computers! Thank you West Columbia Texas McDonald‚Äôs for letting me still have the app deals, because we have to pay with cash for now on! Small electrical company Kotrla Electrical Service‚Äôs, LLC owner is Bob Kotrla he was targeted!

title: Love it!
review: After reading several bad reviews I didn‚Äôt really want to try the app. But one day on a whim I downloaded and ordered food. Now I am addicted to this app. It has always worked great for me and is super quick to use in the morning or at lunch when I am short on time and need to get to work. I have never been charged before I arrive at the restaurant like some people complained about. I even ordered at the wrong location once and was able to change without any problems. So I guess all the previous bugs in the app have been fixed because it works and does exactly what I expect and need from an app.

title: Log In Glitches
review: I used to use this app with zero problems but now it can‚Äôt even function. The issues started a month ago and so I deleted the app and waited a bit to redownload, but it‚Äôs still glitchy, if not worse. Basically, when I open the app it always logs me out, so then I log in (using Google) and I‚Äôm asked to accept terms. Then it loads like I‚Äôm logged in, but IMMEDIATELY an error message pops up at the top saying I‚Äôve been logged out and need to log in and accept terms again. And it does this over and over and over. I cannot properly log in no matter what. Every time I open the app it does this so it‚Äôs completely nonfunctional. I don‚Äôt know what to do anymore. If deleting and downloading doesn‚Äôt work then I don‚Äôt know what would. Worst of all is that I have about 6000+ points under this account so it‚Äôs not like I can make another one.
developerResponse: {'id': 30923263, 'body': "we'd like to fix those glitches asap! reach out to us here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-07-16T15:30:43Z'}

title: What‚Äôs the point?
review: I ordered myself breakfast for pickup at 10:10 which is 20 minutes before they stop serving breakfast. I arrived at McDonald‚Äôs at 10:32 and the app tells me that all the items I ordered are no longer available after I already drove 20 minutes to get there. I had to cancel my order and drive another 20 minutes home still with no food. The app‚Äôs interface is also horrible to use and bugs out at times making it necessary to restart the app. The points system is a joke as the deals they offer only knock off a dollar or two off the order at best and you can only use one deal per order (or every 15 minutes) so you can‚Äôt rack up points and get an entire order for free or at a discounted price. This whole experience makes me not want to eat from this fast food chain ever again, and I‚Äôm sure my colon will thank me.
developerResponse: {'id': 29261774, 'body': "we want better for our customers! let's discuss this further at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-04-19T13:17:47Z'}

title: Horrible and slow!
review: I don‚Äôt normally leave reviews, but I felt the need on this one. I download this McDonald‚Äôs app, so I could order food for my son when he got out for for lunch break from school. So far, I‚Äôve been able to feed him zero times! This is the slowest and most useless app I‚Äôve ever installed. I have to stare at the Golden Arches for at least 3-minutes before I even get a menu and specials. However, once I do get a menu, I cannot order anything and I am lucky if I can even scroll through!  I ended up downloading the app for a local business near my son‚Äôs college, which costs me about $30 bucks a day to feed one person, so thanks a lot McDonald‚Äôs!  I only kept this app, so I could leave a review, and now that I‚Äôve done that, I will uninstall it since. Especially, since I have no use for it and cannot order anything!  Very disappointing app experience.

title: A glitch that needs to be fix.
review: I have used the McDonald‚Äôs app several times and most of the time it works fine but here lately I noticed that if you go to a side item such as fries or cookies and put the quantity that want say 3 or more and then continue on with the order before you submit it it was show up as 3 but once you submit and receive your order. The item you requested the quantity of on the items page you will only receive one and still be charged for the 3. This glitch needs to be fix because if it happening to me I know it‚Äôs got to be happening to others. I do enjoy using the app it‚Äôs convenient when it works correctly but it makes not not want to use it because of this reason.

title: The wait
review: The app itself is easy to use and navigate through however going through the drive thru takes less time and you would think that the curbside would be faster as it is advertised. This morning I waited over 20 minutes for a gravy biscuit meal which caused me to be late for work because I have also learned that this app does not issue refunds so I couldn‚Äôt just say ‚Äúnevermind‚Äù. Every time I have used it the staff member walks to each car in the curbside line up asking if the order is theirs‚Ä¶the app asks you what spot you‚Äôre in and I‚Äôve received the wrong order before and had someone take my order by accident as well. The staff member always appears confused.  Ive given it multiple chances as it is right down the road from my job however the wait time is ridiculous.

title: Inconsistent, but mostly good
review: I use this app religiously and most of the time, its great. Lately the app has been crashing after i place my order, but before im able to check in at the restaurant. When it crashes, the order is lost and i have to reorder everything. Your food isnt prepared until after you say checkin "im here" in the app. Yesterday, this happened and i just reordered everything, but when I checked in via drive thru, the app didnt give me an order number(which the workers need to retrieve your order). Since there was no order number, the workers couldn't see my order. They had to manually put the order in for me at the drive thru. Generally, the app has been awesome, but lately its been buggy. Hopefully, they fix it.

title: I don‚Äôt understand this app.
review: Ok so I‚Äôve had a lot of good come out of this app. The deals are cool and the mc caffe deal is sweet. There‚Äôs too many problems with this app though that don‚Äôt make it consistent enough. I hate that it has to know your location so it can actually let you order. It should just let me because I wouldn‚Äôt be using the app and selecting the location if I wasn‚Äôt at the location or straight up driving there and they have to confirm your order anyways so it‚Äôs just like pointless for the app to know your location. A lot of the times what will happen is they say ‚Äúoh you‚Äôre this order‚Äù and then when I get to the window they‚Äôll be like ‚Äúthe payment didn‚Äôt go through‚Äù this app only seems to work at night I swear.

title: No responsibility
review:
The App makes it clear in its terms and conditions that refunds and modifications are the responsibility of the stores. The stores claim that you have to get refunds and order modifications through the app. Stores will also choose not to fulfill the app orders as they like. I waited 45 minutes for a curbside order. Since I had checked in, I had been charged for the order. I called the store, and they told me to come through the drive through-another 45 minute wait, because they had nobody to bring out my order. The store agreed to refund my money but never did. The next day, they told me that all refunds must go through the app.

A week later, different store, the good ‚Äòol McCafe machine was broken-again, sorry, no refund, but we can offer you a $1 slushie to replace your $4 frap.

This app is simply a fraud as stores take no responsibility for app transactions.

title: Scan problems
review:
I always present my app to be scanned on my visits before my payment. 
However, on my last 3 visits they have not been recorded. I‚Äôve mentioned to the cashier and they just say sorry. They say that I have to give them phone to scan previous to running my payment, which is what I always do. 
Also, why can‚Äôt I get my coffee scanned plus use a coupon. I AM purchasing my coffee. I believe a purchase is a purchase and that‚Äôs separate from the rest of my order. It‚Äôs usually a BOGO or $1 off. 
What‚Äôs the point of having a an app that keeps track of your coffee visits but you can only use that or the other coupon. 
My children are very frustrated. ü•∫üëé

title: Need a way to reverse payment when order not fulfilled
review: This has happened to us twice now.  We place an order for curbside pick-up and don‚Äôt receive the full order.  In one case we had ordered two cafe drinks (really the bulk of our order) and when they brought the other drink out informed us that their cafe machine was broken and they had no way to reverse the charges on our order.  Both times I had to follow-up with the manager after the fact and wait for re-imbursment.   Both times required repeated calls to the store because they don‚Äôt often answer their phone (perhaps a commentary on the actual store).  Regardless - the fact that the store can‚Äôt revers the charges when an order can‚Äôt be fulfilled is an issue.

title: MOST FRUSTRATING APP
review:
1. The store doesnt always recognize my order.  It cant see it and then if i also dont have my cc on me that day, i dont get breakfast. 

2. I use the sam MCDS every day. The one closest to my work. However, when i leave the house its not the closest one to my house and every morning I have to go in and change my Mcds location. Its 2020. Is there a reason theres no way to set a default location? Also changing locations should be quick. Not a four step process. 

3. The ap set up is not user-friendly. If youre not used to where everything is it can be frustrating. Ive been using this app for over a year now and it still frustrates me. Whats with all the small blue words to click on and the horrible menu setup. Just use buttons. Easy buttons. 

4. All the menu choices at the store are not on the menu choices on the app. Why cant i buy just a mcmuffin if i wanted? I can buy just a biscuit. Why isnt a bacon egg and cheese mcmuffin on the menu? Theres a lot of things that you have to request when you get to the window. 

Its like a 60 year old designed this app. Nothing wrong at all with 60 year olds its just the layout designs that were used twenty years ago are inconvenient. You need a huge update to the looks and design of this app.

title: Never accepts my saved card info
review:
I‚Äôve been using this app for about 2 years. The only real reason to use it is for the app only deals. The stores don‚Äôt start making your food until you arrive anyway which is fine.

My biggest annoyance is that although I have a valid card saved to pay from, they always need to run my card when I get there. Last time I went, I was double charged two different amounts, clearly this is part of the app malfunctioning. I‚Äôm still waiting to hear back from the store for a refund.

I find it strange that an international company has an app with issues. Starbucks, never a problem. Maybe they need to go the route of letting us add money to the account and paying from that? Clearly charging the card on file doesn‚Äôt seem to work.

title: 3rd party app
review: This app is a 3rd party app. The gps on my phone chose the wrong location even though I tapped the McDonald‚Äôs I wanted to order from. When I got to the McDonald‚Äôs I wanted to go to I found out it went to the other McDonald‚Äôs. The location said they couldn‚Äôt help me because it was a 3rd party app and I had to call the app. I called the app and they said they can‚Äôt do anything but I can use my emailed receipt and go back to where the order was sent and ask for a refund . I called the location where the order went to and they actually apologized which was nice and said unfortunately they can‚Äôt issue a refund but they can put my name down and I can get a free order when I‚Äôm able to go in to that location . Long review... but please be careful when placing your order and make sure the address is the address you want because if it‚Äôs not it‚Äôs a hassle . They should make a policy to help with this .
developerResponse: {'id': 7284244, 'body': 'Hi there, Corrynne! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-02-13T19:28:13Z'}

title: Horrible
review: I attempted to purchase from your app and continued to get an error message saying my payment could not be processed. I tried multiple times not understanding why because there was plenty of money in my bank account. Tried to enter my card again thinking my card was entered wrong. Nope. Continued to get an error message. Then I get a call from my bank concerned about all these sudden charges. Look at my bank account and the payments the app claimed didn‚Äôt go through most certainly had gone through and there were ELEVEN charges totaling almost $500. Called McDonald‚Äôs customer service to let them know and see about a refund only to be told they don‚Äôt do refunds and I would have to dispute the charges with my bank. YOUR app took my money. I never received my food. And now I have to take time out of MY day to drive to my bank and dispute the charges because you don‚Äôt do refunds for your mistakes.

title: Great experience
review:
Although some stores are unfamiliar with customers walking in to pick up food ordered from the app, it is great to order exactly what you want and skip the lines.  I usually use the app to order food before I leave for the McDonalds I want to eat at.  When I arrive I choose the option to ‚Äòeat in‚Äô and the order is ready very quickly. 

You get a variety of deals available only to mobile app users, but I assume that is to increase app usage and will diminish over time.  

My only suggestion is that the app include a feedback capability like the paper receipts offer where you get a special offer for providing feedback on the experience and food.

title: A few things need to be fixed
review: For such a huge company I would expect more from this app. First, when I complete an order it‚Äôs still there the next time I open the app I have to delete that order and then start a new one. Secondly there has to be a way to shut off mobile ordering or prevent us from ordering an item if they are out. Too many times I‚Äôve placed a mobile order and then got there only to be told they can‚Äôt complete my order. It‚Äôs annoying and a waste of my time. Third, if I‚Äôm charged and there‚Äôs a problem there should be a way for the store to be able to refund my money without having to call and jump through hoops to get my refund. Get your IT people on it and get this updated.

title: Need to add to the app
review:
While the app works well, the only issue I have is that every time I use it, I don‚Äôt want a paper receipt as I do automatically get receipts sent to me in my email. Instead of wasting paper to print the receipts at payment drive thru window, why can there be something in the app asking if you want the paper receipt or sent to your email? I have to tell the cashier every time - no receipt & it‚Äôs such a waste of time! It would be easier to select ‚Äî‚Äî yes paper receipt. ‚Äî‚Äî no paper receipt OR in the account profile we can set it up there for it & also check to have receipts sent to email. Simple. 
The whole point is why I get automatic email if received and be given paper receipts?? I hope that this can be set up.

title: Great to ok
review:
The app was really great with all the amazing deals you guys had and then it had the polls going on to choose a good deal for the next day, it was really nice as a bonus but once it switched over to where you only choose deals for the next day and only have 2 deals going on for the day (which is usually the only 2 same deals that I‚Äôve been seeing for months) it really down graded the app.
 I don‚Äôt really use it anymore and don‚Äôt go to McDonald‚Äôs anymore cause of that switch over. The ‚Äúdeal of the day‚Äù isn‚Äôt really a deal like how they used to be when you guys had options to choose to before hand. It‚Äôs not really a deal to choose with only 2 options now.
 I think you guys should have all the options on deals that you used to have before you switch over.

title: Y‚Äôall Robbed Me
review: DON‚ÄôT use the mobile app ‚õîÔ∏è I placed a order on  May 14th, got to the window they didn‚Äôt have what I wanted so I CANCELED the ordered in the app as instructed by the MCDONALDS MANAGER! The app took the money for the order from my bank account without the order even being processed which it NEVER does, I am not charged until the cashier processes the mobile order. Not this time, well the money processed in my bank account today. I emailed help through app and was instructed to call customer service. title: Trash App
review:
McDonald‚Äôs, I expect more. Lately when I try to order food, during regular hours of operation, I‚Äôm told that the location I want to order from is closed. It‚Äôs 8pm, it‚Äôs open. I‚Äôm unable to order where it‚Äôs convenient, which is the entire purpose of using the app. I‚Äôve had this happen for multiple locations, and then the app suggests I leave for a farther location that has subpar service.

I find the lack of sauce options on burgers to be sad. I‚Äôm a big fan of the Mac Sauce. When you order at McDonald‚Äôs, you can add it to any burger. On the app, i get a basic offering without any real options for customization. Please add this feature. If I want Mac Sauce on my Hot & Spicy, that‚Äôs for me to decide. This should be an option. Other burger places allow this kind of customization.

It seems like McDonald‚Äôs is behind times, why not give your customers more options?

title: Won‚Äôt let me enter my name to pay
review:
I‚Äôve got a hyphen in my last name. The input field for names explicitly disallows the ‚Äú-‚Äú character and any variant, when attempting to enter my credit card payment details. It‚Äôll SHOW the character, but it throws it away in input. So I‚Äôm stopped cold at the first step when attempting to pay. No way to bypass or clear the form, no way to complete the order without name input first. It‚Äôs literally the first field to proceed. 
One star: app unusable for intended purpose. I was going to go back into a McD‚Äôs for the first time after nearly 2 years away, but this stopped me cold when attempting to pre-Order for pickup. 
I went to a local ramen restaurant instead, and supported a local business, rather than a large chain. 
This app also wants access to too much tracking and personal data for my preferences: I‚Äôll stay away, and eat healthier for it.

title: Used to be a good app, not anymore
review:
I used to use this app daily without any problems. The only issue I had with the old app was that iced coffee could not be customized for  "lite" sugar and cream, only for more sugar or cream. So I would have to go through drive-thru for that.

But since they completely redesigned the app and rewards program, it's awful. It loads sooo slowly and has to refresh itself 3-4 times before you can even begin scrolling. There are way too many graphics that make it harder to easily navigate. The "buy 5 McCafe drinks/get one free" is completely gone. And even with the new point system, you can't redeem points for a McCafe, only for food and soda.

Very disappointed with this change. Why do companies always feel like they have to fix something even when it's not broke? You had a good thing, McDonald's, but I'm giving up on this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 9884009, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Mich! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2021-07-24T17:27:37Z'}

title: Store don‚Äôt receive the order
review: Im pretty disappointed, you guys just lost a loyalty costumer. I just left my job and I was starving. We stopped by and I made the order by app. When I passed in drive thru, I gave my order number and she told me to go to the second window.  arriving there, she said that there was nothing in my name, that she didn't receive my order and that she couldn't cancel. So I asked to make a new order and she didn't let me either, she said we would have to pick up the entire line (which was huge) again.  I left there starving and I'll never come back.  and I want my money back, because on top of that they charged my card.  shame on this company! Why do you have an app if it doesnt work? Why do you allow make an order in the app if the store will not gonna receive it? It just give me a big headache and I stayed without my food!

title: Waste of gas and time
review:
In all fairness, we didn‚Äôt get the food. I downloaded app. I am familiar with Whataburger app and LOVE it! I ordered snd had my husband pick up but seeing the order number I told him the order number instead of giving another person my phone. Are you kidding? So my husband wasted much gas and time and waited 15 minutes in the store to be told there‚Äôs nothing they can do without the phone even though I‚Äôm listening to this conversation on my
Phone while at home. You guys need to learn from chick filet that there needs to be a remedy so ppl can send kids n spouses or you can order food for them to pick up while they are out. It‚Äôs ABSURD that that particular phone must be there. If chick filet can tweak then surely you can. I cancelled my order and until this is fixed you won‚Äôt have our business. Too bad cuz we like fast food. Please fix it thx!

title: Stick to the kiosks
review: The app is no more an a store‚Äôs kiosk in the palm of your hand. The phone has to be present to get your order. I placed an order with the intention of someone else picking it up on their way home. I couldn‚Äôt check in for curbside when they arrived, because my location is tracked and ‚ÄúI‚Äôm too far away‚Äù. The app proceeded to instruct me to check in when I‚Äôm closer. Since check in was a failure, curbside delivery wouldn‚Äôt work and my pickup person went in to get the order. Finding the order was a big to-do because the phone wasn‚Äôt present and the order number wasn‚Äôt enough. Once the prepaid order was figured out, we still had to wait for it to be put together. Orders aren‚Äôt prepped for any particular time, and they only prep it after you check in. What‚Äôs the point of ordering ahead if it‚Äôs exactly, if not slower, than walking into the place and ordering it ‚Äúthe old fashioned way‚Äù?

title: The app is trash
review: I ordered a simple mcchicken and fries to be picked up. I‚Äôm at work so I was hoping my boyfriend could get it but you guys require us to PHYSICALLY pull up to the restaurant before you even START my food. What‚Äôs the purpose of that? If I placed it for pick up OBVIOUSLY I have somewhere to be. In the same amount of time I took doing all that ordering I could‚Äôve actually physically gone to the restaurant. Horrible, terrible, service. I will be deleting the app. It serves no purpose if I can‚Äôt even have my food READY for me to pickup especially when Covid has closed ALL in-eating restaurants. How is the app supposed to help your workers if they are swamped with pick up orders all at once as opposed to when the food was actually ordered? I ordered my food at 3:15 and it‚Äôs now 4:30. My boyfriend had to commute already a long way to now have to wait IN DRIVE THRU when we placed our order for pick up TO AVOID THE WAIT. Ridiculous app.

title: Unhappy
review: On Augusta 10 on the way home from the doctors office from a scan my husband had to get because he has cancer stop at the on 71 outside of AustinMcDonald‚Äôsgoing towards Bastrop when he got home the whole order was wrong I called and talk to the manager her name is Yolanda she said she would replace the whole order when I went there and talk to her she made me feel like I was lying about the order made me feel very embarrassed I‚Äôm a 64-year-old woman and I‚Äôm getting sick and tired of spending our hard earned money at a fast food restaurant and getting home and the order is wrong Besides that getting questioned about the order from your line to several different times as it on my liar I will never visit that McDonald‚Äôs or any other one anymore we spent close to $30 that‚Äôs a lot of money in today‚Äôs times your Nana needs to go back to manager school

title: Started off better has gone downhill
review: Have been using this app for a couple of years and while it‚Äôs never been fantastic I appreciated the convenience of ordering ahead without having to deal with some clueless minimum wage worker on the phone.  I had been very pleased with app since our local McDonald‚Äôs went drive through/curbside only due to covid-19.  Over the last couple of weeks the app has been glitchy and logs me out repeatedly.  I usually log in through Facebook and the app won‚Äôt move past the log-in page.  If I try to use email to sign in it says social media must use app to log in.  I do NOT wish to use a different email since I already get tons of spammy email from McDonald‚Äôs.  Hate to leave a band rating because I do appreciate the app but come on, y‚Äôall are literally the biggest good chain in the world. You can do better.

title: Don‚Äôt use this app, cheats you out of money!
review: So excited to be able to pay and order ahead of time, safe and convenient. My tally on the app was $6.49, when I gave my order number at the drive through the display showed $6.49. When I checked the bank they had charged me over $9.87. Went back through the drive through and they said there was nothing they could do about it since it was through the app. I thought it was a glitch, wasted too much time talking to customer service, they sent a coupon but didn‚Äôt refund me. Today it happened again! Fool me twice! I deleted the app, don‚Äôt use it, it gives the wrong total and the store won‚Äôt refund you unless you go in with a bank statement (that‚Äôs what I was told at the drive through). I got better things to do than call the rude, uncaring cs people or bring a statement to a store, they should of just given me a refund, mc d doesn‚Äôt care...

title: App Fail 3.0
review: Try to give feedback on the app.  It won‚Äôt allow you to do so.  The only feedback can be completed on the Apple App Store.  The latest version for iOS 13.3.1, version 6.4.0 will fail at launch.  You need to force quit the app and reload so it can open.  The programmers will provide excuses about the versions but then realize it‚Äôs the latest version.  Once you reload the app it will open correctly.  You also need to have WiFi on to select the option you have arrived, if not the program will get buggy.  Here the programmers will blame the versions again then realize once again it‚Äôs the latest versions for both the app and the ios. Your order will end ‚Äúhung up‚Äù so you‚Äôll need to order the traditional way but the program did get you to the location and got you to order and wait in line.  The programmers will blame the user and simply not address the programming failure.

title: Dumbest app ever
review:
What a disappointment, whoever designed this should be fired. I live 5 minutes from a McDonalds. You would think I could order with the app from home, jump in my car and the food would be ready when I pull into the drive thru, right? Wrong, they don‚Äôt process your order until you arrive at the store (also creepy that they track your location). What‚Äôs the point, might as well order when you get there, it‚Äôs actually faster. You‚Äôve got my credit card, I‚Äôm not gonna stiff you and not pickup the order, what on earth could be the explanation for such lousy customer service?  An incredible missed opportunity.

Totally inadequate canned response from McDonalds. I‚Äôve been a McDs fan for over 30 years, conservatively spend over $1000 a year there. This app complaint response has made me boycott, I‚Äôll take my money to a company that cares about its customers from now on. Goodbye Mickey D.

title: App is utter garbage.

This is stupid, but tried to login with FB but it showed my brothers account and literally nothing on the screen to allow me to change the account to mine. So of course when I click to continue as my brother, it tells me the account isn‚Äôt found. So I tried to ‚Äúsign up‚Äù using my email but it won‚Äôt let me because my email is associated to a social media account. So in had to do to the desktop version of FB to log off my brother me account and login into mine. Then I tried the whole process again only to now be told my account is inactive. Get your crap together McD. Burger King is killing you in app functionality, ease of use, and overall performance. None of these problems should have ever been a thing.

title: ‚ÄúFixes and Improvements‚Äù
review:
Apparently the app requires you can only use one offer per *visit* whereas previously it was one offer per *purchase*.

Given that a particular offer has always been for one use only, there was never an issue of using one offer repeatedly. No, what I did was usually the following: get large fries for $1, complete that purchase, then get an offer for BOGO on a burger or sandwich, or for a free drink with purchase of a burger.

Now, I am effectively forced to choose which *one* offer I wish to use that day (since my visits don‚Äôt last a whole hour, and I don‚Äôt visit more than once per day.

The only offer that makes sense for me now is the punchcard for the McCafe.

Perhaps McDonalds figured out that they were losing money...but I doubt it. Given the cost, it‚Äôs more likely that they weren‚Äôt making *additional* money. 

I‚Äôm sure that those people that have enough money won‚Äôt mind not being restricted to one coupon per ‚Äúvisit‚Äù. But for those like myself without a lot of money, it means we won‚Äôt be purchasing as much per visit, or we won‚Äôt be visiting as much, if at all.

So, um, ‚Äòyay‚Äô McDonald‚Äôs? Mission accomplished, I guess?

Will delete the app if the policy remains one offer per visit (instead of one offer per purchase). üëé

title: Needs some improvements
review: The app is pretty great. I only use the app to order. It‚Äôs faster and more accurate than a person but it lacks in a few areas that are important. One it crashes a lot or says something is wrong with payment but once you run it a few more times it accepts it don‚Äôt know what the issue is but it can be frustrating. The next thing is the customize your sandwich option it needs to have all the options available to add to the sandwich not just a couple. For example I love the McMuffin but I want to add the breakfast sauce to it but there is no option for it it doesn‚Äôt let me add any sauces it makes no sense. I should be able to add whatever I want to it or like for lettuce I only want shredded never the leaf stuff but I don‚Äôt get that option a lot of times.

review: This app works just like it should! I absolutely love it because  designed to minimize errors. Unfortunately the kids prepping the meals don‚Äôt give two cents! title: Good at first now now it‚Äôs a dice role...
review: After an update 4-5 months ago, this app decides when it wants to work or not. I‚Äôve had problems where it wouldn‚Äôt take my cards to pay before and return my money, which is ok. But now twice has my order gone through and the location tries to tell me the order isn‚Äôt there, then the app says thank you for your order and I still haven‚Äôt received anything (And my bank account was already charged!) and I had to show the manager my receipt from my phone 2-3 times before they just give me the food.  Many times have I tried to uninstall and reinstall and only fixes the issue temporarily. Giving 3 stars just because I know I have saved time and money from past orders, but it is still upsetting when things go wrong.

title: Hit and miss
review: The app and curbside pickup is convenient when it works. Twice now I have had the app error and says the order did not go through but immediately received a text from my bank card that i was charged. Both times I have had to go into the store to resolve which defeats the purpose of mobile obviously. When this happens there should be compensation like the order free and charge removed. Now I have to use the contact us because when the manager duplicated my mobile order it charged me again but the manager said she only sees one charge. I checked my bank and sure enough two charges. If they can get the error worked out it would be a great service but if I‚Äôm running late and have to deal with errors and overcharges then it‚Äôs not worth using mobile.

title: Deals never work for the last 2 weeks!
review:
The app is not working at all when people place orders and use the deals. I go to McDonald‚Äôs every morning for a 99¬¢ iced coffee. The deal has not been working, and sometimes they don‚Äôt even get my order at the restaurant, and I am ordering at the correct restaurant. I know it‚Äôs an issue for everyone, because I hear people complaining in the drive thru and in the store. If you care about your employees, fix this app, because every day I see them getting harassed over your app not working. I won‚Äôt be going for the next few weeks until I see the issue fixed.

update: the developers are daft c***s. The problem isn‚Äôt deleting and redownloading the app. Tried it and I just walked out of a mcdonald‚Äôs empty-handed because i only walked in with enough money for the deal. I don‚Äôt know why you refuse to fix your app

title: Hard to tell when I‚Äôve actually ordered
review: It‚Äôs not intuitive at all. No matter what options I try, it seems to only process my order when I pull into the parking lot, completely defeating the purpose of ordering ahead. So I can either use the ‚Äúalready here‚Äù option, guess a parking spot that may or may not be occupied and get cold food when I actually arrive OR I have to wait ages for my food to come. Not to mention the ‚Äúdeals‚Äù are rarely actually available at any given restaurant, and are really hard to redeem in the app (see non-intuitive interface above). Perhaps this is Silicon Valley‚Äôs backhanded way of getting us to eat better??? I hope so, otherwise this represents the best effort of a multi-billion dollar company, which doesn‚Äôt speak well for the state of humanity at the moment.

title: Garbage app
review: Bummer I have to even give this one star.  Downloaded the app fine, but then I went to add a payment method other than ApplePay and it wouldn‚Äôt allow me to. So I went with ApplePay, which it wouldn‚Äôt let me do either. So I tried submitting it a few times and it gave me an order number and asked which curbside number I was at. Then I was told to cancel the order and resubmit it, so I tried to. Same problem, so I gave up and went through the drive-through. So, what should have been a ten minute trip ended up being 45 minutes (the restaurant is literally 2 minutes away from home). title: Lame Customer Service
review:
The application is buggy and provides no way for the restaurant to look up order. I was charged and when I got to the restaurant, I was given a mobile order number. The restaurant couldn‚Äôt see the order in their system or look it up and made me drive around the line, during rush hour, twice before finally telling me that there wasn‚Äôt anything that could be done. My only real option was to place the order thru the drive thru and made to pay again. 

I wasn‚Äôt too pleased but didn‚Äôt think I‚Äôd be charged thru the app since I never got the food. WRONG! I was double charged and then I contacted the customer service from the application. I was sent a very generic thank you for contacting us that I should watch out for ‚Äúfraudsters‚Äù. If anyone had cared to read my complaint they would have known that I placed both orders, charged twice, and got only one of the orders.

title: App wasn‚Äôt working
review:
We submitted an order for
Curbside pickup which we do frequently. Arrived at the location, entered our curbside spot as usual. but the app wouldn‚Äôt let the order go through. Error message kept saying to check internet/WiFi connection and  reinstall the app if needed. I did that and it still didn‚Äôt work. Got home and checked bank account and there were over a dozen pending entries for our order that wouldn‚Äôt go through. Not sure if they were all reversed but am waiting to hear back from bank. 
We were on foot so couldn‚Äôt use the drive through and couldn‚Äôt go inside to ask for help. We‚Äôve used the app plenty of times in the past, this is the first problem. We had to walk on the heat to get to McDonald‚Äôs. Would be nice if there was an indication that there would be a problem before we made the walk, but you don‚Äôt check in until you actually arrive.

title: Get a bad feeling about this app
review:
I just downloaded and activated the McDonalds app.  It wants to know my location.  I set it to ‚Äúlocate when using the app‚Äù but then it keeps giving me a message to allow location tracking then it can let me ‚Äúorder from my mobile device.‚Äù  Ordering from mobile is the whole reason I‚Äôm trying this app. But I don‚Äôt let any app track me when I‚Äôm not using it.  That would be stupid of me and it‚Äôs an aggressive phishing scheme from McDonalds.  The app already has my email address  so next I tried to contact them through the app and guess what?  The contact form requires full name and address before you can send them any comment or question.  

Ask yourself, ‚Äúwhy does a fast food company need to know your personal information and why does it need to track where you go all the time?‚Äù  If your OK with this, enjoy the app and it‚Äôs deals/bribes.   I‚Äôm deleting it.

title: App is very flawed in behavior
review:
Tonight I didn‚Äôt get the chance to select curbside pickup or drive. While I suspect an inadvertent of in store pickup. App provided no way to correct before payment. 

They rely totally on gps location to select store. So when leaving a meeting at 7:45 can‚Äôt prepare order in parking lot and drive to a close to home location. Wendy‚Äôs lets you chose a home store. Nothing ever get improved. And if you try to give feed back they ask for system information that app should pick up. Such as app version as required field for feedback.

I took it off my phone last year and then with new iPhone added it back in September. I‚Äôm going to stick with Wendy‚Äôs app even though they lack curbside delivery option.

title: No Service
review:
McDonalds does not have security enabled on the WiFi ..and so, my iPhone reports insecure connection and will not override to connect and Safari browser will not connect either.

I have spoken to the Manager.

They refuse to enable the WiFi security. 

I have WiFi at my home.

It is a simple matter of selecting security, WPA or whatever.

They refuse.

It is not a matter of accepting McDonalds terms. 

I always had WiFi at that McDonalds before more security was added by Apple and by the Safari browser.

I get a notice on each the connection is insecure.

The notice actually blocks access.

I cannot use the WiFi at McDonalds.

This is the local McDonalds.

I have not tried elsewhere, since internet and computer device security including cell phones has become a nationwide issue of importance, and our Apple device security has the update security upgrade.

It seems to me there is no excuse for McDonalds refusal to enable security on their WiFi.

The two grocery stores, here, the deli, the restaurants, the public library have enabled their WiFi security.

McDonalds WiFi security should be enabled for customer‚Äôs protection.

It is the standard of WiFi protection.

..and so, I cannot use McDonalds WiFi or McDonalds app with my Apple iPhone, iPad, or iPod Touch.

..and so, I cannot use the WiFi or the McDonalds app at McDonalds.

title: Coffee deals eliminated ??!!!!!!!
review:
Last I checked, the coffee grounds you sell in stores is called ‚ÄúMcCaf√©‚Äù. Why then when you have a McCafe deal on your app do you not honor it on normal cups of coffee?  Is this false advertising?  Since you have eliminated the coffee (real, plain coffee) deals, I have cut my visits to my nearby McDonalds restaurant to 1/3 the times I would normally go, which was EVERY SINGLE DAY. Now I go only twice a week because I do not appreciate you took away the dollar coffee deal. Now, I will survive without coffee. McDonalds was my preferred coffee. You‚Äôve lost a good customer unless you bring back the coffee deal. I‚Äôll keep checking each day for a while to determine if I go out of my way for your coffee, otherwise my employer gets that time. But I won‚Äôt keep checking forever. 

And the response time on your app is too slow. Please speed it up. And that‚Äôs on LTE signal.

title: Major flaw, no way to refund missing items!
review: I talked to the employees at the restaurant, they said they could not issue a refund since it was a mobile order. So I reach out to McDonald‚Äôs customer service via the online form, and they say the exact same thing from their end! They actually advised me to dispute the charge with my bank because no one is able to issue a refund for the missing items! This is absolutely awful! Things are missing or no longer available all the time, how could there be such a massive oversight on this app?? It makes it unusable at that point!

title: Odd glitches.
review: For some reason, if I go through the drive-through to pick up my mobile order, the next time I use the app I have to delete the last order. It doesn‚Äôt seem to finish the way it does when I pick up curbside. Last week, I placed an order for my local McDonald‚Äôs, in Michigan. When I got to the store, on the screen that says I am here, and asked where I wanted to pick it up, when I picked drive-through nothing happened. No order number came up. Anthony I am here screen the pick up address showed my local store. I wasn‚Äôt able to go back and find the order that I had placed. When I got home, I found the email telling me that I had placed an order in some small town in Georgia. That‚Äôs a very big Oopsie.

title: I don‚Äôt understand
review: The entire reason I download a food app is so that when I get to the restaurant my food is ready to go and I don‚Äôt have to wait for when I‚Äôm in a hurry. I downloaded this app just so I could purchase blueberry cream pies to take to work for my coworkers and me. So I ordered 14 pies. I was about 10 to 15 minutes from the restaurant when I ordered them. Everyone knows that the pies take 12 minutes to cook, that‚Äôs why I ordered ahead of time. I show up to the restaurant and they let me know now that I‚Äôm here they are going to put the pies in the oven, so now I have to wait 12 minutes and I‚Äôm going to be late to work. What is the point of ordering ahead if the order is not actually processed until I am here? Seems like the app is a huge waste of time and trouble if it doesn‚Äôt actually do any good once you arrive at the location.

title: Used to be good
review: Used to love the app and now I can‚Äôt even use it after this last update. Every time I try to sign in it wants to send me an email with a link so I don‚Äôt have to enter a password. The first two times today I never got any email (focused, junk, or spam boxes). Tried again tonight and this time I got the email but when I click the link it says ‚Äúcan‚Äôt open the page. page isn‚Äôt loading. Try again later‚Äù.  It‚Äôd have been a heck of a lot faster and easier to just use a password!! I liked the app bc it was convenient and I loved getting a regular coffee with the McCafe rewards, and now I can‚Äôt use the app or get a regular coffee as a reward! title: Doesn‚Äôt work anymore
review: I have downloaded removed and downloaded this app several times for the past year. I just downloaded it again and try to order and the screen won‚Äôt even come up. Not quite sure how other people ordering but it sure isn‚Äôt working for me I even tried to get rid of my wireless, hooked up to your wireless and I still cannot place an order. title: Awesome, simple app
review:
I‚Äôve been using this app for the past couple weeks and have to say it‚Äôs really well-designed. The interface is intuitive and smooth to use. McDonald‚Äôs always has deals on the app and they even automatically populate deals on when you order the requisite items on your own. You can customize your items and (so far) I‚Äôve never had them gotten my order wrong which is great.

Sometimes the UberEats prices change from the McDonald‚Äôs app and the deals aren‚Äôt the same, I hope they continue to fix this up in the future.

Overall, solid app that I like using regularly.

title: Privacy is a huge issu
review:
This app requires precise location just to see deals at the selected restaurant you are about to order from. The fact that you are not able to see deals from the restaurant you selected, even though you are still able to place an order without your precise location doesn‚Äôt make sense. With so many people being concerned about privacy and location tracking, this app shouldn‚Äôt force precise location tracking. 

Another issue is even when you arrive and click, at the store, the order will not process because your exact location is off. Unlike other restaurant apps, such Taco Bell for example, your exact location is not needed to pick up your order. I highly recommend this privacy issue gets addressed in an app update!

title: Horrible Email Login
review:
I was very excited for the new McDonald‚Äôs app.  I downloaded the app and set up my account with the email option to login.  Don‚Äôt do that!!!
When I open the app I have to enter my email address and then it is supposed to open my email.  It doesn‚Äôt.  I ALWAYS have to close the app, reopen it, enter my email address again, and THEN it opens my email.  Then I have to go into the email and click to open the app.  Then I have to go thru 2 or 3 app prompts before getting to the main content. 
I wanted to change my login preferences but apparently you can‚Äôt change your login info.
VERY, VERY ANNOYING!!!!!!

title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
review:
You‚Äôre better off downloading one of the apps from their competitors. The app itself works okay. However, there is NO PLACE to review specific orders. So if the restaurant gets the order wrong or gives it to the wrong customer, there‚Äôs NO RECOURSE. In this particular instance, I placed a curbside pickup order, checked in and waited 15 minutes before FINALLY pulling into the drive thru line to wait for another 10 minutes only to be told my order had been given away. The managers at the restaurant take no responsibility for their screw up. Each of these franchises represents the McDonald‚Äôs corporation and it‚Äôs clear that MCD is not interested in how they are viewed by individual customers.

WILL BE DELETING. DO NOT RECOMMEND.

title: Have to physically be there - can‚Äôt have someone else pick up
review: So I was home sick and my husband was out running errands. I asked him to stop and pick up lunch for the kids and myself, so I put the order in on the app thinking he could swing through, let me know which spot he pulled into and grab it to bring home. Nope - the person who orders it has to physically be there with the phone it was ordered on. I called the restaurant and was treated very rudely and told that I ‚Äújust didn‚Äôt understand how it worked.‚Äù Since the money was already taken out of my account, I had to get dressed and drive to the restaurant just to check in, wave at my husband sitting in the pick up spot, and then go home. Absolutely stupid way for an app to work - every other restaurant app allows someone else to pick it up.

title: You need to fix Version 7.6.1
review: OK, it has been over 3 weeks this app has been broken for many of your users (Look at all your recent reviews).  The problem is no points anymore and no deals.  It doesn‚Äôt recognize my location.  Could not check in at store. I have followed the advice you have given others to fix this.  I deleted the app and reloaded.  At that point I ran into the other complaint- it no longer recognized my arches login or password.  I had to reverify my account so it would recognize my ‚Äúnew device‚Äù.  Still would not let me login.  Had to crash out of the app and re-login twice more with one more reverify.  It now works.  Most people are not going to go through all this trouble, they will go next door to Wendy‚Äôs.   How much business have your franchises lost in the last three weeks.
developerResponse: {'id': 32623925, 'body': "we've got a quick fix! let's talk about it here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-17T15:55:28Z'}

title: Cold Food
review: So disappointed in this app! This is my second time trying it. First time I never could get it to work so finally just went through the drive thru. No big deal. Thought I would give it another try tonight and got it to work. Pull up to the store, enter my info in the app and it says they will be out shortly. I waited 30 minutes!! Finally went inside, she asked me if I had the online order. I told her yes and then she walked right over to the food area, picked up my bags and handed them to me. I asked her if the pull-up part was working and she said I don‚Äôt know. I then told her we had been waiting for 30 minutes and she tells me well I guess it‚Äôs not working! Now ALL the food is cold! Can‚Äôt even eat the fries because they are already gross! Not happy with this app at all!
developerResponse: {'id': 30930160, 'body': "we totally understand the disappointment! let's talk more about this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-07-17T14:00:13Z'}

title: Pretty good but still slow
review: It‚Äôs a ‚ÄúOK‚Äù app, and they increase the speed of opening and clicking on different windows, but it‚Äôs still slow as molasses! ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîAlso it‚Äôs very frustrating that the radius of the restaurant I go to isn‚Äôt big enough to extend across the entire parking lot, I have to hold my phone in the backseat to tell it that I‚Äôm actually at the restaurant. If it‚Äôs in the front seat it‚Äôs too far away from the restaurant and says it ‚ÄúHmmm, doesn‚Äôt look like you‚Äôre here yet‚Äù. This is made extra frustrating because I live in Kentucky and there‚Äôs nothing around this McDonald except empty fields. So unless I‚Äôm in the grassy meadow picking flowers my only other option is McDonald‚Äôs. Please extend the radius of this app it‚Äôs incredibly frustrating that it does not recognize that I‚Äôm in the parking lot.

title: Pointless app and terrible rewards program
review: When I place an order, the app should complete the payment and the restaurant should start prepping the order. Multiple times Ive placed an order and due to long drive thru lines or broken speakers, Ive missed the breakfast window. Today I sat in the drive through line for 15 mins before getting to the window because of a broken speaker. Going past the breakfast window period. Ive already accepted the payment to be processed, just do it. I only like the breakfast menu and have no desire for anything else. The app is pointless in its current form. Also the rewards program is terrible as its more akin to a coupon program. Its more irritating than anything as I have 33k points that Im not interested in redeeming because of all the limitations. Going elsewhere until these two issues are addressed.
developerResponse: {'id': 29891519, 'body': "we're always looking for ways to improve. get back to us here with all the details you can on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-05-22T16:47:43Z'}

title: Glitches!!!
review: Again today I placed my coffee and breakfast sandwich order - as always‚Ä¶ every day. Got to McDonalds and they don‚Äôt have the order, though the app clearly shows my order and yes at the right location. The ladies rush to place my order. So I have to pay‚Ä¶again. This total is $3.00 more than in the app. So why bother? I can go elsewhere for my iced coffee if I‚Äôm paying full price. This happens at least 2 days a week. So aggravating.  The app overall is ok but not great. When it works, and the order is picked up, the app often shows the the order is still open though I‚Äôve been charged etc. it‚Äôs odd. I‚Äôd think McD could afford the very best developers that could fix the glitches and keep it online more than it is.
developerResponse: {'id': 27319685, 'body': 'we never want your mobile app experience to end up like this. chat more about your visit and the location here so we can address this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html', 'modified': '2022-01-09T00:52:40Z'}

title: Inconsistent, unreliable incredibly frustrating!
review: Have had the app since it first came out. Then all of a sudden I could not sign on! Tried deleting and reloading, hard reset on my phone.. nothing. Then after several months I was allowed to sign in again, great! After a couple of weeks was asked to join the rewards program. I did and was very happy with the rewards and I accumulated 6970 in reward points. Used 6000 on a happy meal for my daughter. Also received 2800 for my purchase. This morning I go to use my app and I was signed out. Signed back in and all my reward points were GONE! So sick of this app!

title: Good app but still needs work
review: I‚Äôve used the app a few time but didn‚Äôt have issues until today. Thank his morning I had to change the menu to breakfast to order even though some breakfast items are available all day. The items I was choosing are by the way. The second issue is I thought it sent your order to the restaurant closest to you because the app does use your location   So when I ordered my lunch (I had to change back to the lunch menu from when I used it for breakfast) I had to drive 15 mins in the opposite direction I was headed because it automatically selected my ‚Äúhome‚Äù restaurant. I was literally 2mins from another location. Besides these 2 issues the app is pretty good.

title: New version- HORRIBLE
review:
I absolutely HATE the new app. I used to use it all the time for my coffee and the rewards. Now they limit you to a few things you can get and it‚Äôs never what you want. I‚Äôve tried to use it a few times and it was for an iced coffee not a hot coffee. So I couldn‚Äôt use any of the points. Then this last time I tried using it thinking maybe it was for what I wanted. Of course turns out it wasn‚Äôt and the guy informed me that he couldn‚Äôt cancel it. I just pulled out of the drive through. I also hate that you have to tell them the number before you even order. No one has the app ready for that, most people are driving.. it used to be at the window where you pay. I hate this app and will NEVER use it again. 

They need to change it back how it was or include the whole menu with the points you can use in the tiers.

title: Good App But One Big Problem
review:
Hello,

I personally think the app is very good. I just have one issue. When I order pick up, and go through the drive-thru, I do not have the ability to say my order was complete. That isn‚Äôt normally an issue, but if I come back a week later the app still instructs me to pick up my order from last week (even though payment already processed). The only way to make a new order after picking up a drive thru mobile is to go into the app, select every item from your cart from your previous drive thru order and remove them, and then start a new order. I am not sure if this is a solely ‚Äúme‚Äù issue by using the app wrong, but I so far have not been able to find a solution.
userName: Refund Me or Send the Packages

title: Privacy issues with employees
review: I started to notice my orders were getting made wrong intentionally. The employees at certain locations abuse the information you share with this app and stalk you. Once I hid my name and email I noticed my orders were being made wrong on purpose. Turned out to be a good thing cause I was ordering coffee with sugar (always got it with hazelnut) but I‚Äôd always be served a plain latte. Now that I ordered it without sugar they just don‚Äôt add the espresso shots. I was approached by a angry employee who was rude and told me to connect to the WiFi. No thank you, I‚Äôll just order in person and protect my digital identity. Do yourself a favor and don‚Äôt share your email or name because these employees are looking up your social media. Mind you I love coffee, so I order it often but I will not be using this app because these employees are very invasive of your privacy.

title: Not Family Friendly or Convenient
review: So you want to surprise the family with breakfast. You place an order and tell a family member to pick it up on his way home. They can‚Äôt, even with the order number, they don‚Äôt start making the food until your there anyway so you still get to wait. Because your phone has to be in the McDonalds parking lot before things get moving. Confused employees can‚Äôt seem to find the order, more waiting, this will take a few minutes, like 20 minutes. What is the point of the app, the drive through does the same thing only faster with, ahem, somewhat less confusion. The only reason for the app to exist seems to be to send you notifications, scrap this and start over, order online>pay online>supply order number>pick up food. Maybe the ability to pre order and pay to pick up at a designated time. It‚Äôs not that hard.

title: OK, but needs improvement
review: Overall use the app and it is decent most of the time. Today had a strange issue that was really disappointing. It was a buy one get one for 1 penny for an Egg McMuffin.  Didn‚Äôt work in drive through. Thought it strange but then crew person said offer was not valid. Strange!  It turns out, the offer was only good though 10:30 am. So that‚Äôs dumb on two fronts. First, there is a thing called all day breakfast. Sooo, 10:30 am?  Interesting choice, McD. Even more ridiculous, that the offer even showed up on the app at all beyond 10:30 am. Yep, allowed me to click on it and present to the crew and everything. Didn‚Äôt McD just spend hundreds of millions on some tech company. Appears they overspent. C‚Äômon - get it together!

title: Concerns
review: I was a big fan of punch cards for McCaf√© drinks. Until store would run out of them. The app was what McDonald‚Äôs was going to. But two things. I go to McDonald‚Äôs 365 a year for my coffee. And in drive through there isn‚Äôt a guarantee that you‚Äôll get credit for drink purchase, which goes towards free coffee. And the other is if I use my app to get credit towards McCaf√© coffee and pay for it I‚Äôm not allowed to use app for coupons for food items. Why? If I had a punch card, I could use punch card for my credit towards free coffee and still use coupon for the food. I think if I do my due diligence in using your app it should me as seem less as possible. Don‚Äôt get me wrong. I enjoy the app. And as I said I come every day. Thanks for your time.

title: Works but annoying issues
review: Works fairly well BUT. It fails to clear the last order most of the time. There needs to be an option to force completed orders it's a pain to delete the last order and start a new one especially if you are changing restaurant locations. You don‚Äôt know if the selected restaurant will honor the deals until you try to check out. It should have an option to find the nearest restaurant that accepts the deals. Restaurants vary widely timely completing the order. I‚Äôve had to wait way too long to receive my order inside, curbside and having to pull over in the drive through. Some posted specials don‚Äôt show up until after you place the order like 2 for $5 filet o fish. It‚Äôs better than nothing but needs procedure cleanup.

title: App is OK, but execution has flaws
review:
I can successfully use the app to do almost anything, and I especially like being able to add equal packets and ketchup packets to an order.

Where this falls down, is there‚Äôs no way to contact the restaurant when the wrong food gets brought out curbside. If an item is missing, or they bring the wrong drink, there‚Äôs no way to fix it without going inside and standing in line (which defeats the convenience of curbside). 

I realize checking the order before the employee walks away would be an ideal way to handle this. However, frequently they handoff the food and run or don‚Äôt speak the same language as I do. I‚Äôve taken to making them wait by the car until I unwrapped and check the toppings on every sandwich, but that slows down everybody.

title: Useless app
review:
This mobile app lacks the ability for its purpose. It does not let me order made ahead of others. Once the order is placed on your phone, it just saves your order and it actually gets processed when you‚Äôre right in front of the store you‚Äôre picking up from. I actually need to WAIT just like others. I purposely place the order at the time I know when it should be ready, so I don‚Äôt have to wait at the restaurant. 

This means it also does not let someone else pick up the order for you. The store would never receive the order unless ‚ÄúI‚Äù(my phone) show(s) up. 

All the other mobile orders from brands such as starbucks, chipotle, dunkin donuts etc. they make the order when it‚Äôs placed, not when you‚Äôre at the restaurant. What‚Äôs the point of mobile order? So you can order with your phone right in front of the restaurant before you step in? This app is worthless.

title: Need Work
review:
It's a decent app, but there are two glaring issues:

1. The keyboard cannot be dismissed on the curbside space-number input screen, preventing the continue button from being pressed. I ended up having to walk in to get my order.

2. It has an option for "I'm already here" that says to give an order number to an associate, in case the app doesn't detect you as close, but at the very least at one location they said they absolutely cannot pull up a mobile order unless the GPS detects you, period. Either better training needs to be implemented, or this feature needs removed.

3. Add the option to check in when not in proximity anyways, why don't ya? #2 became an issue because i sent someone else to pick up the order. But calling in to verify they couldn't get it to work ("recalling" the order number didn't work, and the staff member familiar with the mobile order system on site at the time said that there is no way to pull up an order if the app won't let you check in or says you're not present). Part of the benefit of mobile order is the ability to have someone pick it up for you; not everyone has uber eats in their town or wants to pay a fee for delivery when free alternatives exist!

title: Great app‚Ä¶.when it works
review: For the past 2 weeks or so, I have had problems telling the app I am here. I just get bouncing fries. It took me 10 minutes in the restaurant to reopen my order and check out. I noticed that my account had ZERO Reward points when I actually have over 13,000. When the app works, it‚Äôs amazing. Right now I will keep waiting 10 minutes and opening and closing the app until I can checkout. By the way, the app also has a problem with location. I placed a $32 order and got no rewards because the app would not open. So frustrating. Please please fix the bugs

title: DO NOT USE THE APP; ORDER INSIDE!!!
review: Like all other food ordering apps, McDonalds is using this process to rip off their customers. ALL apps like this do exactly the same thing: you order your food through the app, you pay, then you get shorted food‚Äîusually shorted a lot. In my case, they shorted me a 20pc check McNugget, and last time it was a large fries. Every company will tell you this is a big huge accident, but all of these food apps do exactly the same thing? I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a bug; it‚Äôs a feature. If you go inside and order with a person, you can then review your order when they give it to you and not have to deal with being told the app doesn‚Äôt send the complete order to them. I‚Äôm keeping records of each time this thing happens so I can turn over the evidence to the government for investigation, and I suggest everyone else do the same.

title: Unusable because promo for rewards won‚Äôt go away
review: I have been charged 60 bucks twice for a cheeseburger and coke. They put in the wrong number and charge you for someone else‚Äôs food. People at the restaurant are the ones who make the mistake, but then say there is nothing they can do to change it. They say someone will call and get it fixed. Never heard a word from anyone after either occasion. Now to top it off, the App can not be used to order food anymore. They have a pop up add that won‚Äôt go away. There is no way to get to a screen to order. Contacted them and got a form email that was of no help. This has been going on all summer. No sense in getting the app if you can‚Äôt order food on it. Taco Bell and little Caesar‚Äôs have apps that work much better, so we eat everywhere except McDonald‚Äôs now and are likely better off for it.
