title: Always tell me my card not go thur when I am at the restaurant pick up
review: Always tell me my card didn‚Äôt go thur then I have to hand them my card in person. What‚Äôs the point using the app? Then I worried they charged me twice . 3 times already , I applied the deal to my cart, but when they tell me my card not go thur I have to pay them in person , then they removed my deal in my order without letting me know. So I over charged 3 times and didn‚Äôt know until I go home. My card has money so I don‚Äôt know why they keep saying my card didn‚Äôt go thur and don‚Äôt know why the workers removed my McDonald‚Äôs Deal every time.

title: Extremely frustrating!!!
review: So I make my order, use one of the deals which you can only use once an hour, then use Apple Pay and head to McDonald‚Äôs. Then I get there and I can‚Äôt pull up my order which I‚Äôve completed, and they have no record of it, so apparently if you aren‚Äôt AT McDonald‚Äôs when you order, the order just disappears as if you never placed it. The deal timer is still going so now I‚Äôve lost my deal, I have to pull over and re order and wait all over again. This is the second time it‚Äôs happened and I‚Äôm extremely frustrated. The pick up option just disappears if your phone screen even turns off. Completely defeats the purpose of the app and ordering ahead. I know it‚Äôs just $2 but that $2 on top of billions in McDonald‚Äôs pocket because apparently they can‚Äôt afford to pay someone to make the app work right ü§îüò§

title: New drinks
review:
Dear McDonald, 
 I think you should start a new drink boba milk tea because most of our population likes boba and it would be a great thing for McDonald to earn more money and more people will buy your drinks and I got this idea from a restaurant tv saying that McDonald mcafe is creating new boba drinks and that would be amazing here in California and a lot of people would buy a drink of bob from McDonald I think you  should consider this as advice to upgrade a fast food place into a popular place to eat fast food with better drinks instead of the same thing in the mcafe menu and I think it should be the same price like a small Carmel frappe for 2 dollars and I hope you make this come true because more people will buy food from McDonald

title: Application Error
review: I have used this app for a while now. Over the years, I have found myself saving lots of money by using the app. All was great up until the app wouldn‚Äôt let me log in to my account anymore. I‚Äôve tried it all to fix the problem. I have deleted the app and re-installed it and still ran into the same exact problem. I have tried creating a new account and that also did not work. I have the feeling that this app will never work for me again which is really upsetting. This was the one fast-food app that I used the most up until this happened. I have contacted the McDonald‚Äôs mobile app team and they were not able to solve my issue either. I will keep this two star review until McDonald‚Äôs finds a way to fix this issue that I am having.

title: MISSING AN IMPORTANT PIECE OF INFORMATION
review: The app it‚Äôs self and ease-of-use are great. But it is missing one super important piece of information when doing mobile orders. A lot of food places allow you to do an order and then just pick it up off the shelf, but McDonald‚Äôs requires you to use the phone as a geo-fence so they know when to start making your order. This is smart, but without your phone, the restaurant cannot locate your order. There needs to be a big splash screen telling you that you have to take your actual phone to the restaurant, as well as a big ‚ÄúAGREE‚Äù button so that people understand this. Also, I can imagine for the not so techy people have no idea how to turn their location on. Some more clarity on these ‚Äúlocation‚Äù issues would be super helpful.

title: What this app needs
review: This app needs a user comment section to interact with management. For example I just now visited and was parked in a numbered stall waiting for my order. I then received a thank you from the app for my order yet I received no food and 20 minutes had passed. I walk into the store which I had already not planed on doing and the employee screen that displays orders that need to be expedited did not have my order. I waited a few minutes to get helped from an employee. Once I did she looked confused as to why my order was not on her screen. She went ahead and fixed my order gave me my food and went on her way. No apologies no thank you no nothing... Also where is the how was your visit section for these app users, I did not get a typical receipt. How does one inform their local McDs on a job done poorly?

title: Works pretty well, but has some issues
review:
The thing I like most about it is getting to use curbside when there are super long lines. What I wish they would fix is that there is no way to ask for water. Not the bottled Dasani water, but the free cup of water. I am not a huge soda drinker, but I usually want water with my order. If you‚Äôre going through the drive through you can ask, but not for curbside unless you want them to walk all the way back which feels incredibly rude to me.

There is also often app issues between it and the store. The stores have zero control over is and I have been overcharged when coupons haven‚Äôt processed.
developerResponse: {'id': 31753148, 'body': "there's always room for improvement, Jessie! tell us more here so we can look into this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-08-30T21:31:30Z'}

title: McDonald‚Äôs should be ashamed
review:
Two thirds of the time it does not work.  It‚Äôs a bit tedious to order but the convenience, specials and time savings should be worth the effort.  Wrong.  Twice I‚Äôve pulled into the parking space at the restaurant, sent the arrived signal and received a there‚Äôs a problem, come inside message.  Once inside wait in line, tell the counter person, wait for the manager, show them your phone, wait while they play hunt and peck then start over with your order loosing any specials, discounts or time savings.  It seems like a good idea, too bad the employees are not interested.

It‚Äôs getting worse instead of better. I tried again only to receive a different error message when I arrived at the store.  This time there was some internal problem and my order was lost an electronic heaven. However they still managed to charge my credit card. Do yourself a favor and skip it.

title: Crashes every time it‚Äôs launched
review:
V6.0.0 will crash within 1 or 2 seconds of launching. Every single time. It‚Äôs unusable. I‚Äôm on iOS 12.4 using an iPhone X.

[UPDATE] Changed from 1 star to 3 stars, since deleting and reinstalling the app fixed the crash problem. 

Still need to fix the persistence of old orders. When I pick up an order, it should remove the items from my cart, so I‚Äôm not forced to delete them before my next order.  Fix this and stop throwing up ‚Äúsuggestions‚Äù (or let me opt out). The goal is to REDUCE the number of steps required to complete an order, not pile on extra steps.  For example, let me select a default location for all my orders, rather than making me follow 7 steps to change from the closest McDonald‚Äôs to the one next to my work location.

title: Total Disconnect from Store
review: Initially I thought the McDonald‚Äôs app was awesome, until they screwed up my order. The app shows that they had items available on their menu that they did not, and the store was unable to refund or change my order. They acted like they had fixed it, but I was still charged incorrectly on my card. You can‚Äôt file a complaint through the app, so you have to send an email -Which gets lost in the system and refers you to a call center - which cannot do anything but tell you to talk to the local store - which can‚Äôt do anything but tell you to dispute it with YOUR bank even though they screwed it up multiple times. The store manager actually told me they do not work with the app at all, before hanging up on me. This app does not work with the stores and it‚Äôs obvious when they could not handle a simple order change. Not worth the hassle.
developerResponse: {'id': 7843528, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-03-21T18:20:11Z'}

title: Would be good if they didn't botch password handling
review:
This *would* be a nice app if they hadn't botched password handling. On the screens to enter your initial password when making an account, and on the screen where you enter you existing and new passwords to change you password, they block pasting.

This means that you cannot use a password generator like 1Password to generate and store a good strong password and paste it. If you want to use a good strong password, you are going to have to end up typing it yourself tediously on the tiny onscreen keyboard.

When entering a new password, it does offer the option to select an entry from the passwords stored in "App & Website Passwords" under "Accounts & Passwords" in Settings. You can make an entry there and give that a strong password, and then fill it that way in the McDonalds password screens, but it tends to mess up overwrite the existing password field when you are trying to enter the new password.

With sufficient fiddling you can get this to work. But it is annoying and tedious and there is no good reason to have to do this whatsoever. Just let is paste. Almost everything else allows paste in password fields, including all Apple apps that I can think of. Heck, even BANKING apps allow it.
developerResponse: {'id': 4693999, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. title: App doesn‚Äôt work on phones with older operating systems
review: I recently wrote a review Oct 14 about how the last update on your app requires ISO 14 but my phone cannot go beyond ISO 13 because it‚Äôs old. Your recommendation to me was to uninstall the app and reinstall which seems like your response to every other reviewer with problems. Now the app just wants me to sign in over and over but never works. It‚Äôs very frustrating for people with older phones who can‚Äôt afford new phones to not be able to access the app anymore and I also lost all my points. Maybe next time McDonald‚Äôs could afford a better company that designs apps that work on multiple iOS systems and not just the latest ones. Frustrated cause after I read your responses to many reviews I know that nothing will happen. Please don‚Äôt tell me to uninstall and reinstall again!
developerResponse: {'id': 32599696, 'body': "we aim to make the best app possible! try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. if this doesn't fix the issue, drop us a chat here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-23T06:57:57Z'}

title: Rarely can use discounts and constantly overcharged
review:
Probably one of the worst apps I have. Inventory is constantly out of stock and only a handful of stores actually detail that in the app. Instead, you pay for your food and are generally greeted by a poorly trained worker who tells you they can‚Äôt fill your order because X, Y, Z. Then you are asked if you would accept a substitute, always of lesser value. At this point, why not just go through a drive-thru and be charged accurately. This app is honestly a waste, it should be scrapped until McDonalds can do business truthfully and legitimately; or alternatively train their staff.

Oh and you also do not get a receipt or any sort of feedback system in the app, so it‚Äôs literally less effective than going in the store. Can‚Äôt recommend this, it‚Äôs poorly thought out and even more poorly executed.

title: Works well some of the time
review: The app is easier to use than some restaurant apps, however, the location settings are exceptionally annoying. For example, if you‚Äôre out running errands and decide to order through the app don‚Äôt drive by a different McDonalds after you‚Äôve placed your order. The app will automatically update your pickup location. I have a specific McDonald‚Äôs location I like to use mainly based on location so it‚Äôs the last stop on the way home. I really don‚Äôt like having to choose the payment every time the app chooses to make a change. I‚Äôve even favorited the location I use and choose it when I initially place the order. The app shouldn‚Äôt update pickup locations without asking me.

title: Needs a lot of work
review:
The current version of this app forces you to allow them to always see your location in order to use deals, even if you put in a restaurant location for an order first. This is ridiculous, I don‚Äôt want your app tracking me. Also, every time I try to use the app I have to login, and it always wants me to send an email to login without a password, which is more trouble than it would be to just put a password in.
I recommend never storing any of your payment information in the app. I contacted them a couple years ago because I had problems with someone somehow accessing my bank card information I had stored in the app and making purchases on my card. I contacted them and reported it to them and no one ever even bother to contact me back. This app is more trouble than it‚Äôs worth
developerResponse: {'id': 30670280, 'body': 'our goal is to make the best app possible. the permissions help us get the best functionality with both present and future app features. \r\n', 'modified': '2022-07-01T18:30:03Z'}

title: Deals do not charge correctly
review: Twice in the last week I have used a deal, applied the deal, and clicked the final ‚Äúorder‚Äù button with the total cost reflecting the deal price, only to get emailed a receipt and get charged for the full price.  I notified the store, who directed me to contact the app team.  I contacted them, they were not surprised and acknowledged some are having this issue.  The kicker?  No refunds of the overcharge.  They said my only option was to dispute the charge with my credit card.  Is it not fraudulent to say a certain amount will be charged, and then charge more than that?  I have a hard time believing that McDonald‚Äôs has no way to refund the overcharge.  The worst part is they keep the deals in the app knowing this is happening.  Use at your own risk, and be prepared to have your card charged more than you authorized.

title: I had to wait for my order 40 minutes
review: I ordered some breakfast thru the app for a curb side pick up. I waited 30 minutes in my car during those minutes I called them several times and they never answered. So I decided to go drive thru and see who I can talk to because the waiting time was ridiculous. The manager their she gave me an excuse that it wasn‚Äôt her fault so there was nothing she could do and she gave me my order. I don‚Äôt know who this lady works for cause that was her excuse I really don‚Äôt know what she is doing at that restaurant then. Well she said it was the app that had a glitch or something like that. I don‚Äôt usually go to McDonald‚Äôs if it‚Äôs not only for their Fries but I started ordering thru this app and the deals they have I‚Äôve been using them cause I thought they were really good. But now that this happened and how this manager behaved I‚Äôm not going back. No thank you!!
developerResponse: {'id': 18925490, 'body': "Sounds like your visit wasn't too quick. Let's get this looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-11-05T17:32:47Z'}

title: Review
review:
I really like the app. Because my autistic son loves coming to McDonald‚Äôs. And the app with all the coupons all helps a lot. Thank you. It would be nice if maybe there was a few more options for a few more coupons. I am grateful that you took off the coupons that had to use mobile pay period because I don‚Äôt do mobile pay. And half the ones that you had on there I couldn‚Äôt use them because I don‚Äôt use it if that makes sense. LOL thanks and it would be nice if you guys could add a few more healthy options to your menu. Since you took off the wraps.  Thanks for the chicken sandwiches. Or the option to make it with chicken. 
Sincerely Becca

title: Great app but..
review: Awesome app - allows payment by Apple Pay, the deals can be excellent, and points accumulate fast.  However - menus are not updated to the newest deals (2 for 6s biggest culprit), points are on individual items instead of general discounts- can‚Äôt use them on meals for example, and it‚Äôs hard to see which deal will give best bang for buck.  Oh, and they changed the ‚Äòcheckout‚Äô so that you choose how before checking out, instead of before when you were at the restaurant - I didn‚Äôt use the drive through for a few weeks because I didn‚Äôt check out correctly.
developerResponse: {'id': 33481431, 'body': 'the deals and promotions that show in the app are up to the franchise owner. you only have to choose a payment if using the "Order Ahead" feature. if just providing your deal/rewards code, you can choose the payment method at the restaurant.', 'modified': '2022-12-01T17:55:48Z'}

title: Incorrect refund & wrongful charge
First and last mobile order!
review: I placed an order for curbside pickup, and when I went to pick it up I waited 10 minutes In the curbside designated spot before just going through the drive thru to pick it up. Once I got to speaker, he vaguely explained they didn‚Äôt have the order and pls pull up to the first window for assistance. I pull up to the window, and they have no idea why he told me to pull up to the widow and instead I need to go inside. I go inside, and the manager has no idea why they sent me inside because there is no record of my order ever being placed. I even showed her the app and the completed order. Instead of offering a solution, she just stares blankly at me. So I tell her I either need my money back or the food. She then goes and gets the food, because they can‚Äôt refund an order they never received. Overall, it took me 45+ to get my food. Needless to say, app deleted. üò°

title: Mobile order curbside
review: I am glad I can order on my app. It usually takes more than 5 minutes to get one happy meal, but I think it is still faster than waiting in the 14 car line. With a shortage of workers due to COVID, it takes even longer. I try to go inside to pick it up, but I never know if the inside is open that day,  until I go to the door to see if it opens. I wonder when the inside will consistently be open to pick up orders inside or even to eat inside. I hate to have all these cars idling long in line when that is so not good on the environment and gas prices are so high.

title: Horrible system
review: This is the worst, and most horrible thing I‚Äôve ever seen in my life to take away points when I already have them because I used the money to pay for those points feels like a backhanded theft. If I am being reimbursed, technically, with the rewards for buying a product those points that I‚Äôm using should not be taken from me. I don‚Äôt understand for how long this system was in place and now points can expire and we were not given any warning that this was gonna happen. You just started taking this from people, I Home to thousand points earlier today and I go to look back and I am down to 500. I literally don‚Äôt even see the point to having this app anymore especially after it takes away deals that I‚Äôve had earlier in the day that I can no longer use at later hours.
developerResponse: {'id': 33092909, 'body': "Kate, we don't want you to miss out, so points don't expire for 6 months, however, it sounds like you've got more going on. drop us some details via the link below so we can look into it. https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-11-10T17:58:20Z'}

title: Works good, could be better
review: App is pretty straight forward like other restaurant apps, the huge issue I have with the app is that you can‚Äôt choose to have the food prepared in advance to you arriving at the McDonald‚Äôs, this is a huge inconvenience. I think most of not all other apps allow you to choose to ‚Äúprepare order now‚Äù or something similar, so when you arrive at the location your food is ready or near ready. This app uses your geolocation to see that you are within I am guessing about 100 feet of the McDonald‚Äôs be it will allow you to select to have them to start making food. This needs to be fixed, I paid in advance so I should be rewarded with you to start preparing my order in advance.

title: Can‚Äôt get a refund if they screw up your order!
review: Did a mobile pick up and 1 item was missing and our drink lid wasn‚Äôt secure so when we got home and picked it up to get out of the car it spilled everywhere. I went to report our missing item in the app but you can‚Äôt the only way to get a refund is to dispute the full charge with your bank or credit card so now I have to spend my time with my bank to get a $6 refund? I used this app all the time but now finding this out why would I waste my money knowing if I don‚Äôt get what I ordered I won‚Äôt get my money or my item back.
developerResponse: {'id': 28936572, 'body': "we want to address this asap! let's talk here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-04-02T15:04:20Z'}

title: I,too, have had multiple problems
review: It‚Äôs rare for me to leave a negative comment.  However, I have had problems with the app ever since I have tried it use it. Part of the problem is payment collector problems.  I have an order in the app that won‚Äôt go away, even after I have received it.  And paid for it. It totally gums up the app prevents me from using the app at all.  Today, two cashiers were unable to process the two dollar daily discount from the app. I had verbally entered the order at the drive thru, because I could not order using the stock order entry process. Your app is clearly using the customer ordering experience to debug your software.  You might end up sorry that you did that.

title: Still unfriendly app
review: I became so angry at prior app I quit going to store but finally cooled off and skipped the app and returned because I believe in supporting my community and neighbors working there. But I did order less and less frequently. Still not as eager since I used a ‚Äúdeal‚Äù through my bank to -day to reopen new app with 5% discount for a few weeks. It did not honor the loading of the app, not recognizing my local address. Whether because my iPhoner was bought online or whether the bank is located  elsewhere and we are a rural area.  I have been to the store 3 times  in past 5 days.  The app still created hostility that it does not function efficiently for me. Maybe it just doesn‚Äôt like my  skill level and  older age.

title: Terrible app.
review: I have used the McDonald‚Äôs app for YEARS. However, I upgraded my phone and it went down hill from there. The app was working fine for the first few months and then all the sudden I kept getting App Initialization Critical Error. I‚Äôve read online that this happens when someone jailbreaks an iPhone. However, I don‚Äôt have a jailbroken iPhone and haven‚Äôt got a clue how to do that. It was totally random when this error popped up. I‚Äôve restarted the app, deleted it, restarted my phone. Reset my settings. Anything I can think of. If this is a security measure. It is terribly flawed. Only reason I get McDonald‚Äôs is when I need a quick meal for cheap... since McDonald‚Äôs has started to get expensive, I relied on the coupons and deals. Without the coupons and deals, there is no point to get McDonald‚Äôs. Come on, almost $5 for a fry? You‚Äôre joking.

title: App doesn‚Äôt work
review: I usually use the mcdonald‚Äôs app to get deals like $1 large fries or stuff like that but for the past month or so, the McDonald‚Äôs wasn‚Äôt working for me. I tried deleting and reinstalling and even restarting my phone but it does the same thing when i try to log in which is an alert saying ‚ÄúApplication Initialization critical error occurred. Please restart the app‚Äù and ‚ÄúWe are experiencing technical difficulties right now, please try again later‚Äù. I tried to contact McDonalds support but i didn‚Äôt get a reply. I even tried searching it up on different websites but it never worked. None of my friends have this problem and i don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs because of the phone because we all have the iPhone XR. i recently updated my software to iOS 14 to see if it would fix the app but it still doesn‚Äôt work.

title: Okay but was much better before
review: The deals on here are okay a lot of them are repetitive and each week is the same. This can be good or bad depending on what you like. The app definitely used to be better, before you could use more than one deal when you visit but now they have an hour in between each deal. The deals used to be better as well, I remember when new users made an account they would be rewarded with a free sandwich with a purchase, however now they don‚Äôt do that. Also there used to be free fries with purchase on Fridays and one dollar fries I miss those deals. The updated app has some ‚Äúdeals‚Äù that aren‚Äôt really deals for example the 20 piece chicken nuggets are advertised as $4.99 but the regular price is $4.99. I wished the app had more diverse deals then just repeating the deals for weeks on end.

title: Good. But could be better.
review:
It ultimately gets you what you want, but there are a few things that are annoying. 

1.  I'm ordering ahead and I have a favorite location saved, I still have to click through 4 screens to order at the location I want. Everytime. 

The app should allow you to pick a default location to order from. 

2. The one I go to is busy, but the app doesn't let you submit your mobile order until you're practically at the door, so you still have to wait a while to get your order. 

The app should allow you to dictate when you want your order to get in queue, sometimes speed is more important than immediately off the grill, us hitting "Please start my order now" or something will let you know what's important to us. The method they use still doesn't matter since it can sit a while before they even grab your food to give to you when busy.

3. This is more for McDonald's rather than me. The app won't allow me to order a breakfast burrito without picking a salsa packet. I throw it away everytime. You all could save money by making it optional.
developerResponse: {'id': 6666101, 'body': 'Hi there, Bernard! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-01-03T23:58:41Z'}

title: What‚Äôs the point?
review: Apps for online ordering should be a time saver. Every other restaurant that has app ordering, you can order, pay, run errands, and the. 10-15 minutes later you can arrive at the restaurant - walk right in and your order is done!!! Not Mcds! You have to park, and then submit the number of the curbside that you are parked in, and the the order is placed. I received the email at 7:06 that the order was placed. Well at least we didn‚Äôt have to wait in the long drive through line!! 15 minutes later, no order, and everyone who went through the drive brought line prior to my arrival had left, including the people who got in line at the same time I arrived! I walked into the restaurant, and they told me they only received my order 7 minutes ago. That is poor technology!!! Noodles, potbelly, subway, and dominoes all have better ordering apps than this. Fix it McDonald‚Äôs

title: Used to be a four star app but now zero.
review: I‚Äôve had this app for about a year and it was pretty darn good. I loved the specials and deals that you could get and it made me use McDonald‚Äôs way more than I was. Which might not be a good thing. But the airport. Then it forced me to update the app and once I did the app now claims all the time that there are no rewards and deals in my area. It won‚Äôt let me use the points that I have accumulated so they are expiring without me being able to use them. I have tried multiple times to contact the developer and no luck. The local restaurant of course those nothing about how the app works. I‚Äôve also tried to redo my location settings and nothing works. It would be nice if someone would reach out to me to try to actually fix it but until then the app is absolutely worthless to me.

title: Loved the app until‚Ä¶
review:
Thank you for fixing the points, rewards and deals. Free Friday Fries aren‚Äôt there but maybe that was changed.  

I absolutely loved the app and using curbside. Then last month I noticed my ‚ÄòDeals‚Äô and ‚ÄòRewards‚Äô just disappeared. I get a message ‚Äòthere are no new rewards, deals for your area‚Äô. I had almost 5,000 points saved. I can‚Äôt even use the Free Friday Fries deal that showed up when I noticed my points disappeared but clicking on the box did nothing. Then that disappeared. Really disappointed!! Why should I use the app or order from mcDonalds if this will happen after starting all over. My card info disappeared as well.
developerResponse: {'id': 32623857, 'body': "you've got problems and we've got answers! let's talk it up here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-18T06:56:20Z'}

title: A little frustrated
review: I decided to download the app to check out the offers. I think the offers are nice, but I was not happy with the limited customization. I love adding mac sauce to my sandwiches, but unfortunately, that was not an option in the app. I get to the store to pick up my order and ask about adding it. The young lady sharply expressed that she was not able to do anything as the payment had already been finalized. Just a suggestion, it would be nice to have the option to change the order if needed at the time of pick up as you do at other establishments. Also, there are too many options available in the fast-food industry. No one has to deal with poor customer service.

title: Somewhat broke but not ice machine broke (YET)
review:
So I used the app and it still has the deal I previously used locked in it! Even after updating AND logging out and logging back in. They don‚Äôt make it easy in the event you want breakfast since they want to push the lock. The old way didn‚Äôt have this problem. It‚Äôs very annoying to use an app that won‚Äôt clear out a deal you ALREADY used! Come on Mickey D‚Äôs get it together! Let‚Äôs not have another thing breaking like your ice cream machines!!
Another thing to note: they restrict WHEN you use your own rewards! What kind of nonsense is this?!? Then again it‚Äôs McDonalds so they‚Äôre always doing something stupid. Look no further then this new app update!
McDonald‚Äôs this is my response to your ‚Äúupdating‚Äù rewards app because you cheap! üôÑüôÑüò°üò°

title: Light option while mobile ordering
review: Everything runs smoothly for the most part. However, one small thing that would make my life a whole lot easier would be to add an option for light onions, light lettuce, light condiments etc. I can‚Äôt stand when it when I get to the restaurant and the employees act annoyed that I need to make changes to my order. One employee argued with me, stating that she worked there for 30 years and that they are not supposed to change anything that was already been paid for. I could understand if the correction was going to cost more money but my only substitute was to get light sauce and light lettuce. So please make my life easier and add easy option for changes to menu items so I don‚Äôt have to talk to these rude employees. Thanks!
developerResponse: {'id': 26878514, 'body': 'Your input is what helps us improve. Get back to us in more details here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    ', 'modified': '2021-12-16T17:11:14Z'}

title: This app is crap!
review: I loved it when it first came out worked perfect. It was really nice when you‚Äôre traveling it was so easy putting your order in without having to go into the window and ask what everybody wants. First I was having problems with paying and there was nothing wrong with my debit card never had a problem before ( that was going on for about three weeks). Now you can‚Äôt even use the app. and they can‚Äôt even the scan the coupons or barcode for the buy five frappe‚Äôs and get one free...I would‚Äôve had a free one by now! We don‚Äôt go a whole lot to McDonald‚Äôs but it was nice having it. I‚Äôm about to delete app. Thanks!

title: Cannot log in
review: I use this app all the time. Last year there were glitches and the app logged me off and I tried everything but couldn‚Äôt log back in. It said check internet, restart app but nothing worked. I called Apple and they checked and said call MxDonalds. It suddenly started working. About a week ago it logged me out again and O haven‚Äôt been able to log in. I tried signing up again and it just says I already have account. So, I ask a McDonald‚Äôs employee if anyone else has complained. She said yes all the time lately. I would say this is a McDonalds issue. I think when someone uses so many coupons they may knock you off app???

title: Crashes Every Time I Open It
review: For about 3-4 weeks now the app hasn‚Äôt had zero functionality for me. I‚Äôve updated my iOS.  I‚Äôve updated the app. I‚Äôve uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Before this last time I installed it I could get to the menu sometimes, vary rarely and it wouldn‚Äôt let me passed the login screen. There was a different error message for each different login option. Eventually it was say technical difficulties, etc. but after the most recent update the app open, show the Golden Arches, and then crashes. It‚Äôs impossible to tell for me because I don‚Äôt know anything in depth regarding apps or operating systems, but I would say it‚Äôs safe to say that it crashes hard. Like...You can almost hear it crashing. That‚Äôs how hard. All jokes aside, I love the app when it‚Äôs functional. One of the Best of its kind. Please fix!

title: Need option for someone else to pick up
review:
This app is mostly user friendly but really needs a way to say you are at the restaurant even if you aren‚Äôt. I order food for my 8 person family on my app so that my spouse can just pick up on the way home. Most food apps recognize the phone that ordered won‚Äôt always be present and have a work around for this. McDonalds has no way to fill an order unless the phone that placed the order is present. My spouse even tried logging into her app with my info and it still wouldn‚Äôt work. I get this is probably a security feature, but there needs to be a work around.

Also you have to drill down into the menu too much to choose the drinks you actually want or change the sides on a kids meal.
developerResponse: {'id': 16078747, 'body': "Hi there. We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2020-06-18T17:28:44Z'}

title: Good deals bad computer system
review: Really it is annoying to have the app say it is not processing your payment,  when in reality it is. It is super annoying to have to than dispute the additional charge, because you have to send an email to the ceo. After a week of waiting for a response I just disputed it with my bank. That‚Äôs if you even get the receipt for your order. I didn‚Äôt even get the receipt from my order the second time this happened. I‚Äôve used the app with mostly success but the two to three times I have been charged extra it has been hell to try to get the employees to understand the error. Usually I‚Äôm meet with a condescending attitude as if I have no idea what I‚Äôm talking about only to have the employees eventually say yes the app doesn‚Äôt work. Often you don‚Äôt get an order number, or the order number is wrong. The deals however are good deals.
developerResponse: {'id': 12711340, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332,so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-01-03T16:26:00Z'}

title: Like most similar apps, started strong then sucked
review:
It had good deals at first, but I knew it was too good to be true, just to get you used to checking it, then later making it really bad.

I had no idea how bad they would make it. Now many or most deals - especially the halfway decent ones - are only available if you do mobile ordering. They want you to do mobile ordering. I mean they REALLY want you to do mobile ordering. Why? To collect data? It‚Äôs very much a red flag when all these companies want you to order online when it‚Äôs a nuisance to everyone involved. It‚Äôs becoming this decade‚Äôs version of grocery store loyalty cards.

Update: Now they want you to register your email address or log in with SM so they can spam you or track you or do whatever these Silicon Valley jerks do with all your personal information. Time to delete it and stop going to this garbage factory.
developerResponse: {'id': 11153877, 'body': "Hello! We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2019-10-09T18:05:39Z'}

title: Good deals but it‚Äôs buggy.
review:
Old orders always stay in cart even though I‚Äôve already picked them up. CONSTANTLY! 
Had to reinstall app because I couldn‚Äôt get the last item out of the cart (that I already picked up) 

I don‚Äôt know about any of the other McDonald‚Äôs but the one I always go to if you‚Äôre going to order with the mobile app (which I love because of the deals) just pick it up through the drive-through or go inside because they will have you waiting outside for 15 to 20 minutes. I don‚Äôt know if they feel like since you‚Äôre waiting outside you could wait longer or something. this is not the first time I‚Äôve waited this long that‚Äôs why I started going through the drive-through but the drive-through was long so I figured I‚Äôd sit curbside. It‚Äôs been 15 minutes and all I‚Äôm getting is 2 mccaf√© drinks.
developerResponse: {'id': 5374240, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-06-17T18:29:54Z'}

title: Expired milk
review: I bought a happy meal for my son and they gave me expired milk. The girl at the register( don‚Äôt know her name, she had a jacket on) told her manager and the manager said give her another one. She did and that one was expired also. They all were expired in the fridge and her manager laughs and goes in the back. She comes back out and says they don‚Äôt have anymore white milk and that I could have chocolate or apple juice. My son doesn‚Äôt like either but I took the choc because I only had two options and I paid for it. Which doesn‚Äôt even matter really. I was just annoyed at the fact that she was laughing because the milk was expired and no compensation was made

title: Excellent App, now to get stores on board.
review: I will start by saying that I live the app. The app makes it amazingly simple to pick what you want and customize before getting to the restaurant. I‚Äôve never had any issues with the app, the restaurants are a different story. I‚Äôve only used the app about a half dozen times so far, and my local McD‚Äôs is horrible. They bring the wrong food, forget my drink, and I still end up having to go inside to resolve. Which basically defeats the purpose of using the app. Maybe prevents having to stand in line and place the order. But not a time saver. If you can get the restaurants on board and maybe some additional training these experience will surely generate additional revenue.

title: Mobile Pay is always a nightmare
review: This has been my experience when using the app. 1. I place the order 2. Drive thru worker sees my order, and confirms my name, and everything is fine, then tells me to go to the next window. 3. Drive thru, who 1 minute ago saw my order in the system now can‚Äôt pull it up at all. After several minutes gets frustrated and tells me to go to the last window. 4. The workers tell me they can‚Äôt find my order, if I can repeat the order to them, if I can hit ‚Äúreopen order‚Äù in the app, and depending on the worker there will tell me I need to order it again, or just pay in person, which means I would get double charged. 5. This has been my experience using the app EVERY SINGLE TIME. Never using it again. Don‚Äôt make an app and push people hard to order from it if it‚Äôs this bad.
developerResponse: {'id': 26567654, 'body': 'Your mobile ordering should be as easygoing as possible. The best way for us to improve on this is by getting all the details we can from you here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2021-11-30T20:42:11Z'}

title: Read before you order
review:
First time using the app.  A friend recommended it, saying it was just as good as chipotle. I placed a order, walked half a mile to pick it up and returned home, only to discover that you left out one of the items.  The biggest problem is that there is no way to report an issue with your order without going back to the store. There are a ton of FAQs but not a single place to say ‚Äúwas something wrong with your order‚Äù. Really? That‚Äôs customer success 101. Yeah, your food is cheap, yeah most people won‚Äôt spend the time to walk back to a store for a $3 purchase, but that‚Äôs crap customer support to not ask ‚Äúhow was your order‚Äù or ‚Äúwas everything right with your purchase today‚Äù. 

I haven‚Äôt been to McDonald‚Äôs in years and I have no plans to return after this incident. You just lost another customer.
developerResponse: {'id': 25890464, 'body': 'We aim to make the best Mobile App we can for you. Get back to our team with as much info as you can here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html \r\n', 'modified': '2021-10-25T23:59:43Z'}

title: Terrible Tech
review: I only continue to use the app because of the deals which save me money. Every time they fix one problem another comes up. Currently it won‚Äôt delegate an order after you pick it up. Therefore the last order remains in the basket and you have to delete each item to start a new order. Today I can‚Äôt get the cart to remove the final item so again they are losing a sale that I planned to purchase. They have lost several sales from me because of frustration. If they get the app to work it might be a winner. Hint for those using the app. The deals will change in the same session if you open deals from different hyperlinks in the app. Hopefully that will stay it‚Äôs sort of fun thinking you got something on a deal that others don‚Äôt.
developerResponse: {'id': 8200924, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2021-10-01T10:32:17Z'}

title: No ones on the same page
review: Fairly easy to use like others on the market but you can‚Äôt change your pick up options after picking one. And they still ask if you want to pick up in store when the doors at most locations are locked. Is there a way to turn that feature off if the inside is closed? Would function better if employees turned features off they weren‚Äôt allowing at the moment or food items that are unavailable instead of still having to pay for that item. Not all locations care if what you ordered gets replaced with something of equal value. I‚Äôd also like a ‚Äúhow was your experience‚Äù survey after transactions on the app, I love to praise when things are good and help the whole process run smoother.

title: Update Issues
review:
There are some issues with the latest design that have come up recently that I hope will be fixed soon. 

1. You cannot place an order in advance. The order literally does not process until you are in the restaurant. That means you have to wait in the restaurant for your meal to be made even if you created the order well ahead of time.

2. You have to make sure to bring the same device to the restaurant after setting up the order. Then, you have to have location services enabled or else you get an error when you try to place it. If your device doesn‚Äôt have data then you need to log on to the wifi at the restaurant (luckily most McDonald‚Äôs have wifi). This process feels overcomplicated and led to several snags as I tried to get my order in the system.

I can see why these updates may have felt like a good idea (food not getting cold, not accidentally ordering at the wrong location), but there should be an option to place the order for immediate pickup so it‚Äôs ready when you arrive and doesn‚Äôt require location sharing. As I said, the updates seem fairly new and will hopefully be ironed out.

title: It okay.
review:
The app is faster than all other options, but it does not allow for a pickup time. The food does not get prepared until you are on the premises. It‚Äôs just a faster way to order than the drive through or going inside and waiting in line. Still good, but it would be nice if you could order, and they would just have it ready for you.

A developer has commented back saying they do this to make sure the order is fresh. However, if you are in a hurry in the mornings like I am, and want breakfast, maybe it would be smarter to get DoorDash or Grubhub and order pickup from the restaurant. Then it would be waiting for you. 

Seems like you are just encouraging some people to use other apps.
developerResponse: {'id': 20535065, 'body': "Hey there, Morgan. Your order isn't finished up and prepared until you check-in at the store. That way it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2021-01-21T17:28:04Z'}

title: Inconsistent
review:
It‚Äôs kind of nice being able to order without having to deal with the drive thru speaker. Plus, there‚Äôs coupons sometimes. BUT! You never know when the coupons are going to actually work, which is super annoying. I‚Äôll get charged the full price despite the coupon, and the only way to fix it is to go inside, which, ain‚Äôt nobody got time for dat. 

I‚Äôd have probably given it 3 stars for that. But, any app that sends ads as notifications loses all stars, and in the last couple weeks they‚Äôve been sending ads as notifications ever more regularly. I‚Äôve gotten 5 ‚Äúwouldn‚Äôt you love to eat a delicious quarter pounder!‚Äù Or similar notifications in the past week, with no coupon or anything attached to the ad. So now I can‚Äôt have notifications on for actual things I want, and thus the app is uninstalled.
developerResponse: {'id': 13339603, 'body': "\rWe're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.\n\n", 'modified': '2020-02-06T22:10:07Z'}

title: Won‚Äôt use app unless mobile deals change
review: It‚Äôs okay just want to see different deals instead of the mobile order and pay it‚Äôs getting annoying and I usually go in to get food when I‚Äôm not in a rush. I‚Äôd give the app more stars but maybe 0 if you don‚Äôt pull it together and change the deals every week the same deal is every week and it‚Äôs getting really frustrating/annoying. Just fix it already it always freezes when I try to do Mobile order and pay I‚Äôve uninstalled reinstalled almost 150 times still to nothing it does let me use the deals in store though but their kiosks doing it also has issues. Getting really annoyed plus some of the menu items have prices that‚Äôs different from the app so I‚Äôm paying twice as much I‚Äôm not impressed get your act together or I‚Äôm just going to use the app for the $ 1-4 dollar off purchases.
developerResponse: {'id': 4599987, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-01-30T15:57:03Z'}

title: Location services is a pain
review:
The requirement for your phone to show you at the restaurant before they begin your order is ridiculous. Some locations are in places with terrible cell service. The point of ordering is to either get your food faster, not to have to get out of the card, or let someone else grab food for you without having to pay them back because it‚Äôs already paid for. 

I‚Äôd like to order for my teenage daughter but can‚Äôt unless I give her the app password and let her do it. 

If someone‚Äôs food is cold because they hit order too soon, that‚Äôs on them. Get the fries ready when they arrive like the quintet burger guys do for online orders, so they‚Äôre fresh. Have a pop up that says the estimated time before it‚Äôs ready and the drive time and make people confirm, like the big green coffee company‚Äôs app. This really isn‚Äôt difficult, to let us use the app to order without having to rely on dubious location targeting if the parking spaces are under trees or in spotty coverage areas.

And can we please get the option to add Mac sauce to burgers under ‚Äúadditional condiments‚Äù? Bacon makes the cut but an actual condiment doesn‚Äôt. Weird.

title: Great app, almost perfect.
review:
Here are the following improvements I would like to see; 1-Followup Quick Service Survey/Reward Points Program. 2-Hassles option to use paper coupons. 3-Option to order a cup of water, it‚Äôs rare but every now and then I just want to drink water and the water of the province works fine for me. 4-Option to add a tip for table and curb side service, I would really like to see that!!!

Revised, would like to add an option for users to provide feedback within the app. In addition, too much navigation to get to My Recents & Faves, place start icon on Home page next to dropdown menu icon or give users the option to display star icon there. Finally, app needs to be more intuitive.
developerResponse: {'id': 4709329, 'body': "Hello! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2018-10-30T14:46:55Z'}

title: Love the Deals, but are they worth the glitches?
review:
I always want to use the app because the rewards program is great and there are some awesome combos and deals on there that you don‚Äôt get in person.

But, the app glitches every single time I use it- no exaggeration. I have to delete and re download the app every time I want to use it. This is because it always says that I already have an order pending (there never actually is), and if I click details or anything about it, the app freezes and closes down. When I re-open, it does the same thing. The only way I‚Äôve found to fix it is to delete the app and download again. I report the bug every time and rate the app experience every time, and nothing changes. Very disappointing :(
developerResponse: {'id': 32558411, 'body': "we're here to help you out. hit our team up through the link, so we can get to the bottom of this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n", 'modified': '2022-10-13T15:49:59Z'}

title: Disappointment
review: This app was so awesome and I looked forward to ordering in advance and especially getting deals. Now I hesitate to go to McDonald‚Äôs because I‚Äôm so ticked off that I don‚Äôt have access to the deals anymore due to the app no longer functioning for me. I am so tired of seeing ‚ÄúApplication initialization critical error occurred. Please restart app,‚Äù and  ‚ÄúWe are experiencing technical difficulties right now. Please try again later.‚ÄùI‚Äôve restarted the app many times with no luck, I‚Äôve googled for various solutions - none of which worked, and I‚Äôve ‚Äútry it again later‚Äù too many times to count.

title: Delete this app if you care about your privacy
review:
This is the most invasive app I have ever seen. When you download it you are giving permission for the app to do the following:
  
**Identity**  
find accounts on the device  
add or remove accounts  
  
**Contacts**  
find accounts on the device 
  
**Location**  
approximate location (network-based)  
precise location (GPS and network-based)  
access extra location provider commands 
   
**Phone**  
read phone status and identity   

**Photos/Media/Files**  
read the contents of your USB storage  
modify or delete the contents of your USB storage

**Storage**  
read the contents of your USB storage  
modify or delete the contents of your USB storage

**Camera**  
take pictures and videos
  
**Wi-Fi connection information**  
view Wi-Fi connections  

**Device ID & call information**  
read phone status and identity  

**Other**  
read sync statistics  
receive data from Internet  
view network connections  
create accounts and set passwords  
connect and disconnect from Wi-Fi  
full network access  
draw over other apps  
use accounts on the device  
prevent device from sleeping  
toggle sync on and off  
set an alarm 

Deleted it immediately once I saw this.

title: Ended up paying the discount in my order
review:
I‚Äôve had pretty good luck when it comes to being able to redeem rewards on this app but hadn‚Äôt tried their deals yet. Yesterday I tried one out and it was fine until I went to the cashier window to collect a receipt. They told me there was a communication error and that I had to pay. 

My order total was $12 and the discount brought it down to $10. Therefore, I thought I would pay the discounted price. I get the receipt back and I had paid the extra $2. When I explained what happened, I was told that the app was at fault for the discount not going through. 

It‚Äôs just $2 but I‚Äôm very annoyed because the deals SHOULD work and I shouldn‚Äôt have to pay the difference (ultimately paying full price for the order). I‚Äôd delete the app if the free stuff didn‚Äôt work.
developerResponse: {'id': 31312123, 'body': "the deals should always work for you! try to uninstall and reinstall the app. if that doesn't fix the issue, let's talk more about it here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-08-06T14:48:54Z'}

title: Always a new problem
review: On the original version of this app you offered buy five McCafe drinks and earn a free one, every morning I would get myself a macchiato and enjoy the drive to work, on the new app macchiato is not even an option( even though I have had balances of well over 10,000 points) I don‚Äôt like the frappe so the only reason I downloaded this app has been eliminated. I do use the app mostly for breakfast before work, but the last several days I log on and during breakfast hours all my breakfast ‚Äúdeals‚Äù are unavailable and during lunch hours all my lunch/dinner deals are unavailable. It‚Äôs great that you took away the only drink I‚Äôm interested in and all the deals are conveniently unavailable at the specified times. The new version of this app is a sad replacement for something that worked just fine.
developerResponse: {'id': 25534173, 'body': 'We aim to make the best Mobile App we can for you. Get back to our team with as much info as you can here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html ', 'modified': '2021-10-06T18:44:23Z'}

title: Newest update
review: The last update has messed everything up. I tried to use a deal one day and it told me I had already used one and needed to wait 15 minutes. I hadn‚Äôt even opened the app yet that day. Then when I used it later I found that the item I wanted wasn‚Äôt available at that McDonald‚Äôs, so I canceled the order and tried to use another deal. The canceled order caused it to make me wait another hour AGAIN. So I just didn‚Äôt get anything. Very frustrating, and nothing the employees could have done to help me. If it doesn‚Äôt get fixed then I won‚Äôt bother. I only buy for the convenience anyway, without the convenience it‚Äôs not worth it.

title: Log in not working
review:
I have not been able to use the app in quite some time. At least all of 2020 I was unable to use the app, and maybe back in 2019 a bit, too. Every time I try to login via Facebook, it keeps telling me the login in didn‚Äôt work and to check my internet connection. My internet is always connected, however.

This has been a problem for me for over a year by now most likely. I even switched phones because my last phone stopped charging, but same app and new phone, doesn‚Äôt matter apparently because the app still won‚Äôt work for me. My wife and I like to go there at least once a week or so but there are certain deals that we cannot get because the app will not work for me. I refuse to give this app any higher ratings until this problem is resolved. Please advise.

title: This is getting RIDICULOUS
review: This has been happening for MONTHS and McDonalds is well aware of it based on the HUNDREDS of reviews in the app store about the same problem. The app on the iPhone does not work! The screen says ‚ÄúApplication Initialization Critical Error‚Äù and it is impossible to log in and use deals/order through mobile. It has been months and McDonalds has made NO EFFORT to fix this other than telling people to contact their support. Spoiler alert: contacting support DOES NOTHING! Don‚Äôt even try and reply to my review telling me to contact support. This literally makes no sense as to why they can‚Äôt fix this. They have lost so much business from me because every time I want McDonalds, I check the app and see that it is still broken, so I change my mind. This is actually such a shame. I wish I could review with 0 stars.

title: Unable to use app
review: I‚Äôve sent in tickets on the website. With no response of course. For some reason the only way to create an account is to ‚Äúauthenticate‚Äù it through an email that has to be done ON the mobile app. Which I‚Äôve been unsuccessful repeatedly. The email (while on my phone) just bounces back to the app login and it doesn‚Äôt authenticate. Attempting to do it on the website states this must be done in the mobile app. So now I can‚Äôt use the app since I can‚Äôt make an account. BECAUSE there is no way to authenticate or at least no workaround which seems like poor development/coding. Maybe it‚Äôs lazy coding. Maybe it‚Äôs ignorance. Who knows.
developerResponse: {'id': 7738831, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out, friend! The account validation email and the password reset email must be retrieved and opened on the device where the McDonald's Mobile app resides. The links should work correctly once you access the emails and take the necessary action from that mobile device.", 'modified': '2019-03-14T20:29:46Z'}

title: Problems
review: I had a few issues over the last month with the app.  The first one - I was charged for 2 orders but I only ordered one.  The second one - I placed an order, received the order but was never charged for the order.  The third one - I placed the order, chose to pick it up in the drive thru, when I got to the window they didn‚Äôt know anything about my order.  They seemed flustered.  My last complaint has bothering do with the app but with the food.  It seems that breakfast orders are fine but picking up lunch or dinner the fries are never completely cooked, the sodas are flat and syrupy, and half the time the sandwiches aren‚Äôt hot.  These things have been consistent for about 2 months.  It‚Äôs disappointing since you guys are known for your consistency.
developerResponse: {'id': 17028004, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-08-02T17:29:45Z'}

title: So slow
review:
This app over a year and it‚Äôs frustrating how slow it is it ask you to triple confirm everything even if you just do a re-order which is one click allegedly
My coffee rewards did not count few times so the free coffee was delayed or I just never got it until the next cycle and I emailed them through the app and they said I have to provide receipts for those purchases which I guess is OK but I‚Äôm not even that I‚Äôm going to my email for a freaking dollar Coffee. At the corporation like you multibillion one is asking the customer to provide a receipt or a dollar in order to get a reward it‚Äôs so embarrassing. Beyond embarrassing. If you just take a look at my account you will see that I‚Äôve been giving You moMoney for the past like a month every single morning and often afternoon as well and now I‚Äôm asked to provide a receipt for a dollar come on ...

title: Pathetically lacking
review:
I worked at McDonald‚Äôs for awhile and seen many different types of orders. So far on this app I have yet to see how to add something unusual to a sandwich such as Big Mac sauce to a plain double cheeseburger. There‚Äôs an option for mayonnaise, but that‚Äôs it. You can‚Äôt order anything ‚Äúmade to order‚Äù which means they don‚Äôt give you precooked food but food they prepare fresh. There‚Äôs no option for an extra sausage and extra piece of cheese on a sausage McMuffin. This app is not worth downloading OR using until their in store options are available to the app. It seems this app is only there to accomplish a few things for the company.

1) cut cost of people

2) cut the options that stores offer to SUBSTITUTE items (such as tarter sauce instead of mayonnaise) FORCING you to pay for that while not getting a discount on the sand which for items you remove

3) to cut out any possibility to truly customize your order, and force you to routine choices that are convenient to what they readily prepare.

Customers Be Damned, McDonalds is there for quick food AND to take EVERY penny they can from you. If you do something that saves them money then that‚Äôs on you, they will still go after your loose change.

This app is Garbage

title: I used to like the app
review: The app is now broken for me. It wasn‚Äôt perfect before, but it did save time. I was also able to get all of my kids orders into the app (they like to customize things) and that saved me a lot of time in ordering. Now I can‚Äôt even use the app. I put my whole order in and then it asks for payment info. I had a card in there before but when it updated last week, my card was gone. I have tried over and over to load a card on. It just says ‚Äòcard not saved‚Äô after I have spent a bunch of time putting all of the info in. I was over charged this last time because I couldn‚Äôt use my coupon since it was already saved in my order.

title: App charges twice!
review:
I wouldn‚Äôt use this app until the bugs are fixed or they update their refund policy. The app gives an option to buy a bag or not, the price of the bag is 5 cents. I don‚Äôt mind getting the bag but for today I didn‚Äôt need it, but the whole ‚ÄúNo bag‚Äù option is a sham. The option is just a picture from what I can tell, you can‚Äôt click it but you can click anywhere near the get bag option and it‚Äôll process that. 

The whole thing went south when the app was ‚Äúexperiencing issues‚Äù right when I paid. I paid with Apple Pay so I know the payment went through, funny enough I get to the store and they can‚Äôt find my order. I bring up the order and it pops up again with the do you want a bag option, so again I can‚Äôt click ‚ÄúNo bag,‚Äù and again I‚Äôm asked to pay. But this time the payment was a few cents more. 

To add to this frustration, your refund policy is garbage. I‚Äôve never used a food app where their solution is to tell you to go to your bank and fight the charge. Rethink that and you‚Äôll probably be able to compete with the Dunkin Dounuts app, or Postmates. 

For now, if anyone wants to order McDonalds from an app, Uber Eats or Post Mates is the way to go. At least there if they mess up, your guaranteed money back instantly.

title: Gets worse
review: My family was originally loving this app but with every update it gets worse. The app fails due to constant WiFi issues and decreasing savings for the customer. I understood not reusing coupons on the same day but now there is no use of the app but once an HOUR. No meal and soft drink followed by a McCafe beverage. Nothing extra until an hour has passed. The coupons have become less valuable also. Why have it if with every update they make the app more restrictive. I used to recommend this app to friends when we stopped for a snack after church. I used to...Think about this before you waste the time and effort.ü§î
developerResponse: {'id': 3817305, 'body': 'Thanks for the love! Nothing makes us happier than delicious deals delivered!', 'modified': '2019-03-07T21:43:31Z'}

title: App is so convenient
review:
App is so convenient and easy to use. And the rewards are cool.

But, I hate when I order stuff and pay with my phone, just to get to the store and they don‚Äôt have what I already paid for. It‚Äôs annoying because I already paid for it. Then they substitute some other thing, and I can‚Äôt help but wonder if I ended up paying more for whatever the substitute was. And it annoys me because I think I got skimped on a large frappe and end up with a large shake or something. I don‚Äôt know if I paid more or less. 

I just wanted to say that. Other than that. I love this app. It‚Äôs great. That‚Äôs probably the only bad thing I‚Äôve got to say
developerResponse: {'id': 31084584, 'body': 'we aim to make the best app we can for you. help us get there by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  ', 'modified': '2022-07-25T15:54:10Z'}

title: Hard to use not commercial ready
review: App is not ready for use at all, it work for the most part but some stores doesn‚Äôt offer what the app is selling You on. Example breakfast items are not available at some times the app freeze it doesn‚Äôt let you check out the item and it doesn‚Äôt tell you what‚Äôs wrong. Also the app is hard to use the point of mobile order is to make it quick. It‚Äôs faster to order drive through them mobile order. Learn from Chick-fil-A app. Because they‚Äôre perfect. Easy to customize easy to order not just a scroll down paper. It take me 3 minute to find my sweet tea. They have them labeled as S,M,L not sure why they don‚Äôt just place the drink family and add modifiers.. any way hope this help improving the app.

title: Issues with payment
review:
The deals are good. But there are constant problems/errors with payment with either using a credit card or with Apple Pay. There have been times when the App reports error with payment, and therefore multiple attempts are made at trying to pay with either a credit card or Apple Pay, and this resulted in multiple payments taken for the same order. 
And then the restaurant says to contact the App, and then the App representative says talk to the restaurant. So it‚Äôs a frustrating circle. And you have to talk to the credit card company to hold the duplicate payments in case it goes through. 
I have even followed interruptions from the App company to try to resolve the issue but it continues intermittently.  Not sure it is worth the time to keep trouble shooting the problem.

title: Can improve
review: I would give this app more stars, but it can improve . So I like the deals and offers it has. But what I‚Äôm not impressed with is the fact that you need to arrive to the location for your order to be placed. What is the point of ordering on the app if you‚Äôre going to arrive and the order still not going to be ready. I arrived today and my coffee wasn‚Äôt ready! Unlike other coffee shops apps you can place your order get to the location and just pick it up , there‚Äôs no waiting. Also sometimes I want to order and have my wife pick it up, but that‚Äôs not possible because the phone that ordered has to be at the location. Again what‚Äôs the point of the app (besides the deals) if the drive thru is going to go by faster
developerResponse: {'id': 5860793, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2018-11-08T14:35:15Z'}

title: Just order in person or drive thru.
review:
The current version of the app is clunky, unresponsive, and features that are supposed to make it more convenient actively work against the user and make the experience worse. 

First, the app is clunky; going through every menu you have to go through to order what you want is exhausting. Want a small Diet Coke? Fine. Click this button. Want it large? Click through various menus to get to it. There isn‚Äôt an easy size changing button. Going menu to menu it also becomes obvious how slow the app is. It‚Äôs asking too much of the phone. It isn‚Äôt optimized. 

Second, the app isn‚Äôt really aware of what you want as far as stores. You set the store you want to pick up from, but for various reasons the store will change, usually because there is one closer, but not the one I picked. 

Third, the Apple Maps integration is broken. Anytime I hit the navigation button it says that turn by turn directions are unavailable. The solution is to just put the address in. I feel like it‚Äôs really hard to mess up the Apple Maps integration, but they did. 

Overall, 0/5. Just order in person. This app isn‚Äôt user friendly in its current iteration.

title: What‚Äôs the point?
review: With all the other fast food apps, you can order and then pick up.  However, for McDonalds, you have to be sitting in the parking lot to get it to go through.  I‚Äôm often still having to wait 20 mins for food, and I can‚Äôt submit the order for my nanny to pick up when she has the kids because if my phone isn‚Äôt at the restaurant, they won‚Äôt process my order, causing me to have to send my kids to a different restaurant that will accept online orders remotely.  Lastly, when I type in something and add to my cart, I have to then go back to the search bar and clear the contents to type in the next item.  I can only use one reward at a time, so my points are always expiring before I even use them, and it‚Äôs just so cumbersome to get things added in the cart.  I hate this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 31876593, 'body': "hi Braxton! we hear you, but we want your order to be as hot and fresh as possible when you get it, and we also don't want to risk giving it out to just anybody. that's why we wait for your phone to be at the store to start on your order. ", 'modified': '2022-09-06T19:51:25Z'}

title: What happened?
review:
This app is easy to use and I really have no issues with it. But I just deleted it this morning, and for the reason many are unhappy...the deals are gone! The deals used to be good. Such as buy one get on free, etc. 
But! For the last 2 months the deals have become laughable. 20% off a quarter pounder? Big deal! Even at half price it‚Äôs barely worth the price compared to other fast food burgers.
So, saving a dollar on an $8 order is a deal?  No, not good enough for me. There‚Äôs too many others offering better deals. I like them all- Carl‚Äôs, BK, Jack, & Wendy‚Äôs. So the best deal gets my business. McDonalds has quit competing with the rest.

title: Why
review: I seen on TV that there was an app for McDonald‚Äôs that you can get a free fry with the purchase of a dollar and I was trying to make the purchase and place the order and it wouldn‚Äôt let me pay for it unless I had a card but I went down and make it easy to see if I can try to pay through it because I have cash to pay for it and then you treat me like I was stupid and like I should‚Äôve known better and then as a process went on and they were acting like they were better than me just because I didn‚Äôt have a card for payment method and it was aggravating it was a bad experience and I wasted riding my bike up for a couple miles for no reason and the heat I liked you but that was just wrong of you and you should‚Äôve explained it in the app so I didn‚Äôt waste my time and make a fool of myself
developerResponse: {'id': 30561031, 'body': "we're never want to waste anyone's time, Rusty. all of the information you are looking for is currently in the More tab section of the app. it was also in the Terms and Conditions before you clicked to join. here is a little more information for your review: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/terms-and-conditions.html#rewards-anchor", 'modified': '2022-06-26T17:58:39Z'}

title: What‚Äôs the Point?
review:
Normally, with other restaurants, I order online so it‚Äôs ready right when I get there. I only order online in time sensitive situations.

Why is it, when you order pickup on the mcdonald‚Äôs app, they don‚Äôt start making it/puttingthe meal together until you‚Äôre at the location?

There‚Äôs no point to it. No time is saved. It‚Äôs frustrating, we don‚Äôt go to McDonalds anymore on the way to work. Yet any other restaurant I go to has it ready for me by the time I arrive.

edit: I get it should be hot and ready, but every other fast food establishment I go to can pull this off.

It just seems pointless. I place my order when I leave my house, heading to the store. It should be warm enough when I get there ~10 mins. There‚Äôs ways to keep the food warm, it‚Äôs not new technology, or even a new process. Several other chains have this system down.

I‚Äôve also noticed the location I go to fails to put any kind of label on the bag, so I‚Äôm either sorting through someone else‚Äôs food trying to figure out if it‚Äôs mine, or some stranger has to poke their hands through my food to figure out if it‚Äôs theirs. Not a very covid friendly process.
developerResponse: {'id': 26678386, 'body': 'The reason we wait until you get here to start preparing your meal is that we want your order to be as hot and fresh as possible.\r\n', 'modified': '2021-12-07T04:41:27Z'}

title: Can‚Äôt login
review:
App won‚Äôt let me log in with my email, Facebook, etc for a few months now. No matter if I delete the app and reinstall it still doesn‚Äôt let me log in saying there‚Äôs an error to close the application and try again. Did that multiple times and still get the same response. I haven‚Äôt been able to use the app this year not even once. Please fix this ASAP as this problem you are having stopped me from even going into McDonald‚Äôs. I used to love using the coupons and deals all the time and now since I can‚Äôt do that anymore I rarely go into a McDonald‚Äôs. Can‚Äôt even get deals anymore since the app stopped working you still haven‚Äôt fixed it and it‚Äôs been at least 10 months since this has been going on. Hope you can fix this ASAP as it saddens me Not being able to go and enjoy savings at McDonald‚Äôs anymore. 
Thank you, 
Denise

title: Incomplete Menu
review:
The apps UI is well built, and it flows really well. Customization is flexible and you can even order a half-cut tea if you want! But for the best experience, stick to basics.

My biggest issue is when it comes to ordering breakfast after 10 AM, it becomes impossible. When you order off the breakfast menu it says the item is unavailable, and the lunch/dinner menus don‚Äôt have any breakfast items despite being sold all day.

Plus when it does come to that half-cut tea, whenever I do happen to order it the poor store seems to have a panic when I check in and they have to switch it for a regular tea in order to check it in.

The app is supposed to be convenient, but it‚Äôs only convenient if your order happens to be ‚ÄúNumber 1 with a Dr. Pepper‚Äù and that‚Äôs it. If your order happens to have a non-popular item or isn‚Äôt from that part of the day, you may as well just ignore this app.

McDonald‚Äôs, please fix this cause the app can be amazing...when it works!

edit 10/3: still not fixed. Good luck, everyone.

It‚Äôs also really counterproductive to respond to reviews by telling them to go somewhere else and rewrite it. Maybe just have the dev team review them weekly maybe?

title: Don‚Äôt use this app! It doesn‚Äôt work
review: I used this app one time and will never use it again! I placed an order for pickup and was told there was an issue with my order and to show the cashier an order number. I went through the drive through because during quarantine I didn‚Äôt want to go inside (even if I could) and they had no idea what I was talking about and seemed unfamiliar with the app. My order did not go through and It charged my credit card twice!  So I went through and ordered through the drive through like normal and was in and out in 6 minutes with my food. I wasted 25 minutes trying to order with this app and it charges my card for an order I didn‚Äôt even get! Hopefully the payment does not process or I‚Äôll have to call my bank. Don‚Äôt use this app! Just do it the old fashioned way. Technology is not always better.

title: Consistently screwed around.
review:
I used to live within less than a 5 minute walk from a McDonalds. The GPS would intermittently see that I was in their parking lot at all. But, I had my phone WITH me so they‚Äôd end up going through with my order, tracking me as ‚Äòpresent‚Äô to their location or not.
I‚Äôve moved states since then, and it‚Äôs been similar here with the touch and go GPS. However, I have a new phone (same provider), and haven‚Äôt had a single issue with any other location determinations.
But I‚Äôve SUDDENLY been told that they since my phone doesn‚Äôt check in, OH WELL. I can‚Äôt get my order. After the first few times at one McDonalds, we tried a new one. It didn‚Äôt work. We gave it a second try, but because the phone was always deemed SO UNIMPORTANT in these cases, I wasn‚Äôt paying attention and my phone died en route. Now maybe it would have linked up, maybe not. But my husband had screenshots  of every single screen regarding the order, and they still wouldn‚Äôt put it through, and said it‚Äôs corporate policy with the APP. You have to have the phone. Well, I did, jackA$$es. 

And btw, I‚Äôve looked, and do not believe the words (must have phone to retrieve order) are listed.

So tired of this.
