title: Needs Prepare Now option
review:
Update: Devs say it‚Äôs to ensure ‚Äúquality‚Äù, which I expected to be the corporate response (see comment below in original review). McD... you‚Äôre missing the point. If you think it makes such a difference, leave it to the consumer to decide. Give us the Botha options on the app, and see which is more popular. A little experiment:
- ‚Äúprepare now, ready to pick up at arrival‚Äù, or...
- ‚Äúpartially place order now, drive to McD, check in, them complete order, select parking stall number, and then sit and watch people who arrive at drive thru after you get their food faster‚Äù option. 

Track the traffic on those two options and see which is preferred. People don‚Äôt use mobile ordering to ensure ‚Äúhot and fresh‚Äù. We use mobile ordering because we‚Äôre in hurry. Understand this, people who use mobile ordering prioritize ready-to-pickup over all else. 

*Original*
The app is fine. The problem is lack of options to make food immediately when placing order. The whole purpose of a mobile app is for food to be ready when I get there. It‚Äôs not so I can check in and then wait in queue. Ever other app makes food immediately. It‚Äôs McDonalds... my grease feast sitting a bag an extra 5 minutes isn‚Äôt gonna change the way it tastes.

title: Only use while in store
review:
I had an awful experience using the mobile order feature. Only half of my order was received and when I went to ask for my order they said that they never received it and refused to give me my order. The terrible customer service was one thing but having to call the number they gave me only to find out that it was only a number to file complaints and they couldn‚Äôt resend my order or refund me was more disappointing.

title: Great, technical glitch a couple times being a frequent user
review: The ordering app is great.  Very convenient and I prefer over the kiosks.  Fast to order, walk-in and go, or to eat in.  The only problem I have had a couple times is something happened with the service not responding and my order being in limbo (charge automatically refunded.  The problem is the problem order persists and I haven‚Äôt figured it out a way to manually clear out for the next time I want to use the mobile service.  Deleting and reinstalling the app works but this is something that could be more clear or improved in the App.

title: McDonalds stole my money.
review:
I ordered thru this app, didn‚Äôt get my food because the people at the restaurant said they didn‚Äôt frappes, they still charged me, I ask for a refund since they didn‚Äôt give me anything, they can‚Äôt issue refunds even for food I did not received. :) great scam McDonalds. Never again.

I order thru the mobile app to save some time, went into the restaurant and did the check in, they told me they didn‚Äôt make what I ordered, I was like ‚ÄúOk, I‚Äôll just get a refund‚Äù, they apparently can‚Äôt cancel the order inside the restaurant even if they can‚Äôt make it, I call customer service and they told me they can‚Äôt do a refund and my best option is to talk to my bank. So a $2 transaction turned into a 1 hour of me talking back and forward with my bank and McDonalds. 10/10 would waste my time again :) only because they didn‚Äôt implement a cancel order function.

title: Good rewards program if the Internet works
review:
Some locations of McDonald‚Äôs have issues with nearby cellphone towers and internet providers. Other locations are great.

Also, there are hidden ways to get free food outside of the app (I‚Äôm not sharing the secret details in full for the safety of the employees, which is a smart move on my part). But, telling McDonald‚Äôs on the phone number on your soda what happened at McDonald‚Äôs is a good idea if anything big happens. 

I‚Äôll make up a situation that is fake to explain:
You: My girlfriend wants some food but she can‚Äôt have milk in it.
Staff: ok, no problem sir. We have give 1, 2, or 3 instead. What would be best?

30 minutes later:
You: hey McDonald‚Äôs! This staff member was awesome! Blah blah blah
McDonald‚Äôs: great! He‚Äôs getting an extra dollar an hour now and you and your girlfriend get a milk-free food! (Or something like that)

So yeah, rewards program is good and if app doesn‚Äôt work, call the company. Time, date, location, what happened.

Good to add that number on your cellphone if you eat here a lot! That number is a friend!

title: RONALD, GET YOUR ACT TOGETHER!
review:
This app was working perfectly for about a month when I first downloaded it. McDonald's has the best deals of any fast food restaurants, but they've really dropped the ball as far as access to these deals because this app is now "clogged"
with an order I made WEEKS ago. It shows that I have four items in my bag but I did not complete the order or pay for it or pick it up. I cannot erase/delete/empty this long-ago order and thus cannot use this app to order anything at all. McD employees and managers have tried to correct this flaw but can't, so managers have just told employees to honor any deal that shows up! 
I've tried to contact McDs but ran afoul just using  their "contact us" app - it would not allow me to complete my comments or submit any information whatsoever. RONALD, get your act together!

title: When an item is unavailable
review:
When you order through the app and the item is unavailable, the store won‚Äôt give you a refund and there‚Äôs no option on the app the cancel the order or request a refund. You have to call customer care then they‚Äôll transfer you 3 times until an agent informs you they don‚Äôt issue refunds either. They call the franchise‚Äôs owner to request the refund. It‚Äôs ludicrous how hard it is to get a refund. I won‚Äôt be using the app any longer until they fix the refund issue.

Update: the developer reached out with a link to a complaint form that I had to fill out explaining what had happened ( again ). 
A few days later I‚Äôve received a message apologizing for my experience. They still didn‚Äôt issue the refund. At this point Mc Donald‚Äôs flat out stole my money.

title: Handy
review: I like the deals and it‚Äôs handy for collecting an order from family members before we get to the drive through. I would give it 5 stars but I‚Äôve experienced a glitch a couple times now where I have to reinstall the app to clear an old deal, and then have to renter my payment data. ‚Äî glitch occurs when I complete a purchase but the app doesn‚Äôt record that I picked up the order. So then my old order is still in the bag. (Is this a training error with cashier?) If the deal I used on the old order is still valid there‚Äôs no problem. But if that deal is expired I can‚Äôt delete it and it won‚Äôt let me check out.

title: Classic McDonald‚Äôs, Terrible Mobile Order
review: I pulled up to the McDonald‚Äôs to see the drive-thru line super long. So, I decided to mobile order to help minimize waiting time. I went through the whole process, put in the payment, and only after paying did I get to choose my pickup option. Turns out: the only way to pickup my mobile order available two hours before it closed was: through the drive-thru. The entire time I could‚Äôve been waiting in line that I then had to wait in. They should show the pickup options available prior to paying in order to not waste time. Had I not paid I would‚Äôve just went inside to order. Only major problem I have with the app.

title: And geolocation proves your smart.
review: The point of using an app to order is not to wait in the store or the drive thru for half an hour. I‚Äôm stuck waiting for them to prep the food either way. Oh. And finding a full meal instead of a sandwich is baffling in the navigation. Is that on purpose?. Your ‚Äòsmartness‚Äô of geolocation is nothing more than development to develop. You have hindered your apps usefulness.

The reason behind my ;-star rating is because I‚Äôm a big fan of the filet-o-fish sandwich; however, I‚Äôm even a bigger fan of the DOUBLE filet-o-fish sandwich‚Ä¶BUT though the app I am unable to order a double FoF sandwich. title: Sign me out every time, can‚Äôt sign in

title: Worst mobile ordering app!
review: If I could give them zero stars I would! I have ordered from the app 4 times. Each time I order I triple check the order. title: Great App, one suggestion
review:
I‚Äôm very happy with the app but have a suggestion. 

Currently, I place my order and drive to pick it up. As I arrive, there is a busy intersection, followed by a loop, then McDonalds. I prefer to use the drive through and eat after I return home. Excellent food.

But I forgot a step.

As I passed the intersection and started the loop, the app sensed that I was near McDonalds and ‚Äúunlocked‚Äù the ability to select ‚Äúpick up at drive through‚Äù. 

One time I didn‚Äôt make this selection until I arrived at the window. This delayed something as the drive through attendant and I waited for the app to tell them I was, in fact, at the drive through.

The next time I wanted to make this selection early. I‚Äôm ashamed to say that I lied and said I was at McDonalds, while standing in my living room. This was an obvious lie and App caught me right away. I believe the error message said, ‚ÄúAsk me again in the car as you exit the intersection‚Äù 

My suggestion is to let me make this selection at home. Or you make a selection, whatever, just don‚Äôt get me killed at the intersection!

title: Not working no deals on my location
review: My app always worked well. I had the app on my iPhone for more than two years . One month ago I wanted to scan my deals for my mcafe and there was a grey box . With a message saying something about there are no deals based on my location to try again later.. I have been living in the same area for a long time. My friends had the same problem with their app.. we waited a few days and theirs is working fine now.. mine hasn‚Äôt been working for one month.. I can place a mobile order but there are no deals available and I cannot scan them mcafe.. I already called the McDonald‚Äôs app tech support they told me to wait at least 72 hours for someone to contact me back by email. I am still waiting. I deleted and reinstalled the app on my phone more than ten times on different days.. it‚Äôs still the same

title: Mixed Feelings
review: Some McDonalds have this down well. It‚Äôs quick, easy, and painless. I feel I pay much less than Burger King or others with the app using deals. That part is great. So now the negative....My family loves the sausage egg mcmuffin but deals never include that particular sandwich not sure why. There is a buy two for a special price though so maybe just a minor complaint. Never works with the buy a breakfast sandwich get one free. Second complaint, the Mcdonald‚Äôs I regularly visit is ether awesome or they seem to forget about the curbside order as if they didn‚Äôt know it existed or as if it‚Äôs the dreaded way they don‚Äôt want people to use. Sometimes it‚Äôs painfully slow. I‚Äôll keep using because others have it down and it makes it so much easier.

title: When it works‚Ä¶
review: When the app works like it‚Äôs supposed to, it‚Äôs great. But I have yet to successfully complete an order at my local McDonald‚Äôs. For the longest time, it showed that my McDonald‚Äôs was closed when clearly it was during business hours. Twice I ordered something on the app waited in the appointed spot and never got it delivered. When I went in the store to inquire about it, they said, ‚ÄúWe aren‚Äôt using the app.‚Äù Today, I went through the drive-through to pick it up. They could see my order but they wanted me to pay again. I don‚Äôt know if this is an app problem or a training issue, but I‚Äôm not using this app again.

title: I‚Äôm lovin it
review: At its first releases this app was buggy and pretty useless, but now, after a few tweaks it‚Äôs bomb! The seamless payment system which automatically earns you rewards for each purchase is brilliant, the redeeming section is great, and the ordering is so easy and customizable that it gives me pleasure to use it. Ever since I found the updated app I let go of these drive-thru, my order comes faster and I don‚Äôt have to deal with lines, not to mention that I can wait for my order jamming to great music! Thanks McDonalds, and please go give a lesson on making apps to everyone else!

title: Denied my order
review: App is unable to hold changes made to store location and has little to no retainment for order access numbers or ease of use. Ordered a meal for myself and my partner and drove down the road to pick it up. Due to the location closing everything but the drive through early I was unable to pick up my food in the restaurant and had to go through the drive through. Once there I had to repeat my order number dozens of times and was ultimately, after a half hour of attempting to explain the situation and use the app to get any meaningful help, forced to leave without any food and down my entire meal‚Äôs cost. The app also has no way to readily dispute such instances because regardless of cell service or internet connection I‚Äôve been unable to contact anyone through the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 32675039, 'body': "that's not the kind of service we want for you! tell us more here so we can get this looked into: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-19T18:14:41Z'}

title: DELIVERY OPTION NEEDS IMPROVEMENT
review: We all know it‚Äôs not if, but when your order will be incorrect. In my area there‚Äôs approximately additional $10 in fees added onto the price of your order for delivery. Today the main portion of my order was incorrect.  The only option given to me to rectify the situation is to either a come to the store myself )which defeats the purpose of the delivery which I paid extra for), or the next time I come to the restaurant they will replace the incorrect item. Which for me would be no time soon.  I called the 1-800 number for McDonalds Customer service and she said to process a credit request would over a week. If multiple fees are attached to each Oder - they should make sure the order is correct and have an option to either redeliver the item or refund immediately.
developerResponse: {'id': 31107065, 'body': "we're all about improvement. drop us a line here with as much input as you can on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n", 'modified': '2022-07-26T14:11:05Z'}

title: Tiffany
review: Had the option in mobile order to pickup.  Lobby entry not available.  This should‚Äôve been made known to guests before placing/paying for order!  Jeffersonville‚Äôs E. 10th street location was called, in attempt to inquire for advisement in resolution to retrieve order.  No answer!  Would like to be contacted by unit RGM, at the correspondence left with team member!  An associate was taking an incorrect(she took it back inside) to a waiting drive-thru guest, informed me that I store pickup was not available.  I could only retrieve thru the extremely long drive thru, which was what I was avoiding doing, hence my attempt to pickup!

title: My Recents & Faves GONE
review:
Since the last up date My Recents & faves won‚Äôt load. It says check internet connectivity. Communicated this problem to McDonalds via their App feedback form. Their response was the same that it‚Äôs because of my internet connection. Obviously it isn‚Äôt because A LOT of people are having the same issues. McDonalds, fix your app and push an update out. 

Also contacted them because I can no longer select to pick up my order at the drive through. That option is not in the mobile app for me. Only inside and curbside. Was told to reload the app. I have 3 times. The above problems are still present. Again, McDonalds, fix the app and push an update out.
developerResponse: {'id': 30148227, 'body': "we're here to help resolve any issues you may have. hit us up through the link with more info on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n", 'modified': '2022-06-03T15:42:43Z'}

title: Refund Nightmare (Think twice before ordering)
review:
Let me start by saying, the app is sleek. It looks nice, it‚Äôs easy to use, and makes ordering a breeze. If it weren‚Äôt for my seven month dispute with McDonalds, this app would have at least four stars. 
The problem arises when you order something with the app from a particular location and they don‚Äôt have it available. Often you are still charged for it and won‚Äôt find out they don‚Äôt have the item until pickup. 
If you ask for a refund, originally they told you to dispute the charge with your bank or card company, because they won‚Äôt do it. 
Now, you are told to call McDonalds corporate, and file a refund request with the location‚Äôs owner. This has happened to me twice. Seven months later, I‚Äôm still waiting for my refund, I call corporate a couple times a month to see if I can get my money back. I‚Äôm pretty sure I will never see that money again. 
The reason I rate the app so low for this issue is because it ONLY happens when using the app. 
This needs to be fixed ASAP!! 
Until then, I will not use the app. I don‚Äôt need McDonalds stealing more of my money.

title: Not worth your time ..
review:
.. you have to be in the parking lot to order using the app even if they have your credit card information on file .. because McDonald‚Äôs can‚Äôt function even when trying to create an app and their developer team will come on here and tell me what‚Äôs wrong with my review but it won‚Äôt change the fact that the reason for an app is so you don‚Äôt have to wait .. that‚Äôs why people would get the app in the first place .. but the app development team is going to tell you why it makes sense to get the app so that you can still wait in line because everybody loves waiting at McDonald‚Äôs because that‚Äôs really fun .. right developers??

‚Ä¶updated.. as expected a person did not respond but a McDonald‚Äôs BOT did.. McDonald‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt care about quality .. they care about how to get YOUR money
developerResponse: {'id': 28829598, 'body': "your order isn't finished up and prepared until you check-in at the store. that way it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2022-03-29T08:43:15Z'}

title: Ugh!
review: Super frustrated with this app. Was in line and was told needed to update my app well after updating nothing would work and it kept force closing then would tell me that McDonald‚Äôs wasn‚Äôt part of the program?! I‚Äôve used it multiple times at this same one before.. also just tried contacting you through the app. Wrote my spiel and it force closes making me do it again.. finally got it done went to submit, more scrolling then got a ‚Äúpage not found‚Äù really wish this was an app like other restaurants where u scan the receipt after so if you are having problems with service or the app you can just upload it that way to get points. Even the employees can‚Äôt offer help or pull up points for you.. annoying.

title: Not mad, just disappointed
review: First, my McDonald‚Äôs where I live, whenever I would try to mobile order, it was only breakfast, I tried to change the menu but breakfast was the only option, and they don‚Äôt have breakfast after 10:30. I‚Äôve been racking up points with no way to use them. I tried to delete the app and re-download it, and it wouldn‚Äôt let me back in my account, it would say sign in, and then it would say add first and last name to create your account then I would do it, and it would go back to the sign in screen saying ‚Äúemail has already been used‚Äù. It‚Äôs very irritating, I‚Äôve been trying to fix it for an hour and nothing has worked now I can‚Äôt get back into my account even if they did fix the menu.

title: Not a dependable way to order food
review:
I recently attempted to use this app at a McDonald‚Äôs in Ann Arbor Michigan (Stadium Road).   Despite being charged for the order with email confirmation, no one came out with the food.  Multiple calls to the restaurant were unsuccessful.  After 20 minutes I left and called McDonald‚Äôs complaint line but was told that they do not issue refunds on unfilled orders (offered to provide receipt and video footage showing the order was not filled). I ended up having to dispute the charge with American Express. 

I would not recommend using this app in a McDonald‚Äôs that you are not familiar with as the restaurants seem very inconsistent in how their compliance/familiarity with online ordering.  The McDonald‚Äôs corporation is also not willing to take any ownership of the problem (or at least not willing to issue a refund).

title: Horrible
review: The sole reason I mobile order food is to speed up the process. I am a mom and always on the go, so It is convenient to order ahead to avoid lines and wait time. That is not the case with McDonalds app. Despite ‚Äúcompleting‚Äù and paying for it, the order does not submit until the phone you ordered from is located there. So it‚Äôs not ready when you get there (in fact- they do not even see you have an order until you get there)AND you cannot send someone else to pick up the food without your phone present. So what exactly is the point of the app? This needs to be revised. At this point, I‚Äôm so aggravated that I ordered 15 mins in advance, sent my husband to pick only to be told that they do not have an order for me, that I may never eat there again. Prepare the food when it‚Äôs paid for!

title: App needs work and more/better deals.
review: This app USED to be great. I could click the app, go straight to deals and find something that sounded good, order/customize & pay, easy peasy! NOW I click the app, click on deals and have to log in EVERYTIME! The app won‚Äôt even ‚Äúremember‚Äù my user name/email! As for the deals...they are the same every time I look at them. Nothing new, nothing exciting, nothing that sparks interest. Why would I want to use a deal for a $0.79 drink when all drinks are $1.00?! It takes more time to pull up the deal than that deal is worth! $1.00 for a large fry, awesome!, until you get them and they are old, greasy and cold. I do like the ability to customize my non-deal items, but the downside is definitely outweighing the good anymore.
developerResponse: {'id': 20839594, 'body': "We're not happy with that. Let us get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-02-03T17:24:23Z'}

title: Lack of customization
review: Each item only gives you a choice of what to add to an item (ie 4 options to a quarter pounder: lettuce, tomatoes, bacon, Mayo) instead of listing other available things to add. Like you can‚Äôt add Big Mac sauce to ANY item, except to the Big Mac (requesting more since it‚Äôs a standard ingredient on said item), or swapping slivered onions for the diced onions, etc. I downloaded the app awhile back and deleted it so I just went to download it again for the TBT deals that are happening, but now I remembered why I deleted it and why i will be deleting it again. The developers need to realize that if making substitutions at the drive through is possible, maybe, JUST MAYBE, those options should also be available in the app y‚Äôall are pushing customers to use.
developerResponse: {'id': 20715021, 'body': "Heya, Kate. We're always working on an even better App that you enjoy using. Thanks for helping us out.", 'modified': '2021-01-28T17:20:56Z'}

title: DOESN‚ÄôT WORK ANYMORE
review: Ever since the new update about a month or so ago I have not been able to use this app. It logged me out and when I tried to log back in it says ‚Äúapp error, restart app‚Äù or ‚Äúcheck your internet connection‚Äù which I have done multiple times and it still doesn‚Äôt work. It won‚Äôt even let me create a new account either because it says ‚Äúsystem error try again later‚Äù. I mostly use this app for a deals and you cannot access them without signing in/creating an account so I‚Äôm pretty frustrated. This has been going on for a while with no improvements to the app. I‚Äôve tried deleting and reinstalling it multiple times and that doesn‚Äôt work either. I‚Äôm very disappointed, I used to use this app on a daily basis until it logged me out and won‚Äôt let me log back in.

title: Guest Thoughts
review:
Please be sure to keep all employees as safe as possible as well us. Keep everything very clean please. Please use plenty of surgical masks or N295 model masks with plenty of plastic gloves and hand sanitizer with also cleaners that kill 99.9% bacteria on all surfaces at least twice per shift and as needed. Keep teams encouraged and give safety bonuses quarterly especially now during this timeframe while we all are dealing with Corona Virus 19. Food has been good and I really appreciate you giving us the options of using curbside and mobile ordering app. God bless all of you at Mc Donald‚Äôs world wide in Jesus Christ‚Äôs Holy Name I pray, AMEN. 

Truly, Joshua

title: Waste of time and app makes u FAT
review:
Ugh. What a waste. Useless deals that save you .29 cents. App ‚Äúdeals‚Äù remain the same indefinitely until you buy something off of it. Add to that when i just opened the app and tapped one of the deals, it asked me if I already took a deal and had to wait for 51 minutes for some unknown reason. Last time i opened the McD app was 2 days ago. 

This app lures dumb people in by promising savings that don‚Äôt exist.  If you eat this really unhealthy food enough that a .29 cent savings on dbl chzbrgr and and .89 cent savings on 20 piece nuggets save you from financial despair then ENJOY but this app will dupe most into THINKING you will get deal only to have your appetite sparked from looking at the food while searching for lame savings. PASS!

Do yourself and your health and body a favour and skip this and most ghetto fast food apps.

title: Sham Customizations
review:
If it‚Äôs in the kitchen it should be an option.  I don‚Äôt like slivered onion, love Love LOVE the dehydrated stuff.  But that‚Äôs not an option on any burger but the tiny burgers.   Mayo on your burger?  No sir, not on the Big Mac.  Go EZ on the lettuce? Take the whole head or two but not just a bit!   

What is the use of being able go order mobile or kiosk if I can‚Äôt order what I can from the counter or the clown‚Äôs mouth?   Don‚Äôt get me started on the ‚Äúno nearby location‚Äù.   Your search interface needs to have more automation.   You make me work too hard ordering with this version of your app.  When I‚Äôm hangry, that‚Äôs too tall an ask.  Let me know when I can order what I want how I want it and I‚Äôll reconsider.  But the cost of what‚Äôs on the menu is too high for taking what you give me the way you want to give it to me and making me do all but cook it to get it to me.

title: Usually love except when stuck on login step
review:
Every now and then the app gets "stuck" on making me login. I enter my login info and then it stays on the "jumping French fry" loading screen forever until I have to close out. So basically I can't use it. Sometimes I go back another day and it's fine, sometimes I have to delete the app and redownload. Would be great if developers could figure out how to stop this glitch.

Update - dropped it down another star because the app no longer recognizes my location has all-day breakfast. So I can't use it if we want any breakfast item after 10:29 am. Please fix!!

title: Scolded for ordering an Item on the online menu
review:
This is the second time we have been Brusquely talked to by the Manager Rubin who told me as he walked on of our Oreo McFlurrey‚Äôs out ‚ÄúWe only make the Oreo & M&M McFlurrey‚Äôs‚Äù we have a limited menu. I replied well the Shamrock McFlurrey was on the online menu as I was able to ORDER it!!!! 
I asked The Manager his name as I said this was his second sharp exchange with us the last when ordered our meal with Chocolate Shakes that came out 90% vanilla he sharply told ‚ÄúWe are having problems with the shake machine‚Äù on of the reasons we switched to McFlurreys 
Rubin needs serious retraining and as a McDonalds Stockholder I really hope this is not his normal way of talking to customers as it will cause us to travel to Mt. Olive or Washington as that‚Äôs the last straw 
Before these two exchanges I would have rated the online order a 10 but these orders made it a true negative

title: The worst experience ever
review:
this is my second time using the app, i have made an order and went to pick it up. The front window lady did not mention that they were out of the stuff i ordered, i was charged full amount while i was in the drive-thru.
The second window, guy told me we ran out of ur items, and they can‚Äôt make a refund or cancel mobile orders. So I need to call the mobile app customer service and wait for 30 minutes till they pick up. 
Finally they did, and after all the irrelevant questions they asked me, at the end of this useless time wasting call, they said i need to contact my bank because they cnt refund mobile orders. THEN WHY DID YOU MAKE ME CALL!!

They have made me wait in the drive thru, when they knew they were out (and i was not charged at that time) they made me wait on the phone for 30 minutes, and they did not even give me a penny back! I even asked if i can get a credit, and they said they cnt!!!  the customer service guy saw how frustrated i was to get the refund., he did not mention anything about not being able to.. and kept collecting irrelevant information instead of telling me to call my bank right away. 

I will never eat at McDonald‚Äôs again, neither will my kids and family.

title: NEVER TRY THIS FOR MOBILE ORDERING!
review: This app is totally useless for mobile and/or curbside ordering and pickup when Mcdonald‚Äôs employees have no idea how it works. We tried this Mobile ordering feature a few times and were disappointed that the restaurant couldn‚Äôt bring out our order because it wasn‚Äôt in their system or b/c they claim that mobile orders are too complicated and get overlooked.  Often times, i would wait for 20-30 minutes for them to bring out our food once we arrived and that was after going in to ask why they haven‚Äôt yet acknowledged our arrival. Clicking the link that we arrived doesn‚Äôt seem to let the restaurant know that we are here and waiting. It‚Äôs no wonder the mobile service hasn‚Äôt caught on and the Mobile lanes are almost never used.  It just doesn‚Äôt work when it‚Äôs more of a hassle and wait than a convenience.

title: Sign up with email failed
review:
Previous and latest iOS (3.2.2) versions failed to allow sign up via email. Error message says something about checking internet connection and restarting app. Internet is fine. Tried force quit, delete/reinstall several times but nothing worked.

Update: I also reported this on McD website and received an email response in less than 24 hrs. They saw I already had signed up from my email address. Would have been good if the app error message would have indicated this...anyway, I then went to sign in and chose ‚Äúforgot password‚Äù, got temp password, chose a new password, and now I can log in. Added a few stars for speedy reply from devs. I‚Äôll add more if after using the app it earns them.
developerResponse: {'id': 11882416, 'body': "We're sorry you had any issues while trying to connect to the app! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-11-17T03:26:02Z'}

title: Amazing app
review: I‚Äôve been using the McDonald‚Äôs app for years now and I‚Äôve always loved the deals and promotions the app gives to me and it has honestly made me a consistent customer at McDonald‚Äôs. I have had a couple of issues from the app having errors with my credit/debit card, glitches were it doesn‚Äôt show any coupons, and small things like it freezing up and closing the whole application. But all and all I do recommend this app and I have showed my friends and family about the amazing deals McDonald‚Äôs mobile app has to offer and the easy  online ordering which makes everything a breeze when I need to pick up on the go. I do recommend downloading this app.

title: Poor service
review:
We stood at the counter waiting for some one to acknowledge we were trying to order for 5 minutes. There were no other costumers in the restaurant and no one working the front counter and the woman on back counter walked by 3-4 times without saying anything. After giving our order we waited 15 minutes to get very basic orders, but only after we asked when we would receive our order. The manager blamed the back workers for not getting the order, then they filled our order. They were working on getting drive through orders filled but not ours. 

At this same restaurant I have sat in drive through for 15 minutes before driving off without my meal. 

The service at all of this restaurant has gone downhill severally. I have taken my kids here for almost 5 years and the last 6 months has been the worst I have seen.

title: Setup is atrocious
review:
I haven‚Äôt even tried using the app to order food but the setup really is bad. First the password policy is only 8-12 characters so I‚Äôm not going to store my credit card on the app. Then since I use long complex passwords I copy and paste the password. Nope not here, you cannot paste a password in the field. I had to enter my password about 5 times because it took forever to get the confirmation email. Then it wants to find your favorite McDonalds but the filter for distance is way too short because it couldn‚Äôt find one close to me. So I had to manually enter a different town. Lastly when I tried to ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù through the app it wanted a lot of information like the app version? Really?!? You can‚Äôt have the app version uploaded with the contact question?

Poorly written but I might give the app one more star if ordering goes smoothly.
developerResponse: {'id': 11073105, 'body': "Hello, Carl! We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile app that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2019-10-05T21:35:26Z'}

title: Worked once
review: Unable to change payment information after using the app for the first time. When I tried to change payment information and tap save it will state ‚Äúcard not added‚Äù or the save button will be greyed out. I‚Äôve tried  reinstalling the app, restarting my phone, clearing the memory, tried multiple cards, and nothing works to save new payment information. I see the developer usually responds to bad reviews stating that they would like help and to contact them. I‚Äôm not going to contact you so that you can have me do everything that I‚Äôve already done before you agree there‚Äôs a problem with your app. From the reviews I read there are tons of issues with this app, but somehow it still has a four and a half stars rating?  A huge corporation like McDonald‚Äôs can‚Äôt even get a small app to work correctly? Ridiculous.
developerResponse: {'id': 7955400, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, friend! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.", 'modified': '2019-04-17T10:49:19Z'}

title: Super convenient but...
review:
I love this app and how easy it is to get good deals in favorites and chances to get new things without having to wait too long
My main issue lies with connection issues‚Äîdespite having a valid card, it will suddenly say there was an error (there‚Äôs never an event where there‚Äôs not enough in my balance or a change in card it just randomly does it) from that point I‚Äôm stuck with an order that won‚Äôt cancel out and demands to know if I‚Äôll be eating in or pickup‚Äîit makes it impossible to restart an order and I‚Äôm left with no choice not to delete and reinstall the app for the enth time‚ÄîI‚Äôm having to do it all over again after a few orders.

title: Chanced out
review: McDonalds on Airport in Manteca in my experiences it‚Äôs always bad however tonight around 12:20 am on way home from work decided to give em another chance but the bad never seems to disappoint a car ordered and drove up to the window I pull up ready to order but no one even asked for my order at all as I‚Äôm waiting the car at the window starts honking a lot no one cane to collect the money and after a good 20 plus minutes I backed out and left. I have yet to be able to get a ice cream cone or shake anytime after 7 pm the machine is always broken down. Fries are always cold employees are usually rude. But after tonight never will I go back I don‚Äôt know what happen however with prior issues I‚Äôm done spending my hard earned money and not getting what I pay for fresh and hot not cold or not available. I‚Äôd say good luck but it needs more a overhaul. I ain‚Äôt going back.

title: Just barely okay for delivery
review: When things go well the app is okay but when you have a McDonald‚Äôs that seems to always make mistakes on your order it can be a nightmare. There‚Äôs no way to contact customer support from the app, you have to call a third party on the phone to talk to a customer service rep and then you only have a 50/50 chance they‚Äôll actually fix the issue. If they don‚Äôt, don‚Äôt bother contacting McDonald‚Äôs directly because they‚Äôll just dodge the issue and tell you to contact whoever delivered your food again. If you must get McDonald‚Äôs delivered skip McDelivery and order directly with DoorDash, UberEats, GrubHub or whatever, chances are they actually care about their customers.

title: I don‚Äôt get what the purpose of this app is.
review: I downloaded this app because I thought it would be faster to pre-order my food. I pulled up and parked in the designated area for Curbside Pick-Up or whatever it‚Äôs called. I kept trying to check-in but it kept saying I had issues with my internet. Everything else seemed to be working fine so I know there wasn‚Äôt anything wrong with my internet. After trying for several minutes, I had to go through the drive-thru line and explain that I had an issue with checking in. Now what would‚Äôve normally took about 15 minutes to just come to McDonalds normally and order through the drive-thru, took almost 45 minutes to get my order. I don‚Äôt understand why I preordered through the app if it took longer for me to pick-up my food. App has been deleted because it makes no sense to even use it.

title: App Shutdown
review: There was an update for the app and since then, I can't sign in and my points are gone. I was enjoying the app until just recently. I gave feedback and was told that someone would look into the situation but so far nothing. I used to love this app but now I have been locked out of it since the update as well as my 4500 points. I'm beyond frustrated! Is anyone going to take any responsibility for this app. If not, please send out a message letting me know that henceforth I no longer be able to access the new updated app. Once you do that I will know that you have at least tried but then failed to fix the problem. The problem being that it must not be compatible with the iPhone update. I don‚Äôt understand why it won‚Äôt ask for my password instead of only an email.
developerResponse: {'id': 33521240, 'body': "we're here to help resolve any issues you may have. hit us up through the link with more info on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\u2006 \u2006 ", 'modified': '2022-12-04T15:28:30Z'}

title: Nice, when it works
review: Had the app installed for maybe 8 months now. I‚Äôd say 3 out of 4 times I try to use it there is some kind of issue. Vast majority of time the app says the restaurant I‚Äôve selected to order food from is serving a different menu than the current time. For example, it‚Äôs 9:50pm as I type this. Checked 4 different McDonald‚Äôs near me, all show they‚Äôre serving breakfast and I can only order breakfast items. Uninstalled and reinstalled 2x to try and remedy this before. Didn‚Äôt help. Idk what the issue is, because tying the application‚Äôs interpretation of time shouldn‚Äôt be difficult as it should be able to see the device‚Äôs current time or even the network‚Äôs current time. I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs fringe unusable at this point. Install at your own risk.

title: Over charged
review:
Twice I have been overcharged on a mobile order when going through the drive through. One of my orders was for $1 for a Coke. When I got to the pay window they couldn‚Äôt find my order. They just sent me to the pick up window. But then I was charged for someone else‚Äôs $20 order. I have talked to the manager and they said call McDonalds. I have called McDonalds several times and no one has responded. My advice is go inside to pick up your order.

Update to my review- 
Mc Donald‚Äôs reached out to me and said they could help me. They sent me the same form I have already completed, several times. I have called and was told someone would call me back - no one has. Why would I fill out the same form that no one has yet to respond to?
developerResponse: {'id': 28116252, 'body': 'we can totally look into this for you. drop us a line with all the details here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-02-18T11:01:29Z'}

title: App is trying to do too much
review:
App prompts login verification every time it is opened. Frustrating if you‚Äôre on the go or away from stable signal.

It also won‚Äôt allow the employees to see your order unless you enable location. It will not show on their screen until your gps shows that you‚Äôre at the restaurant.

Lastly, I‚Äôve run into an issue where a previous order is preventing me from adding food to my basket. It states there is an order in progress that must be picked up before a new one can be done. That order was completed and paid for a week ago.

It would be more efficient to simply send the order and they can push it to processing once you arrive. Especially since two of your locations in my town are in cell dead zones. If you cannot get the app to load in the drive thru you cannot receive the order you already paid for.

Also, you do not need to claw at all of my data to provide app functionality. Not allowing you to track me across other apps or read my stored data should not prevent me from placing and paying for an order. What this does is have me question why I am supporting your business every time I encounter issues from it.
developerResponse: {'id': 30932298, 'body': "we totally understand your frustration! let's get this sorted out here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-07-17T19:28:58Z'}

title: LOVE ITTTTT
review:
Came to mcdonald‚Äôs downtown norwich with my baes, amazing time love the mobile table service!!!!!!! Absolutely an amazing app, now the first time i used this app today, there was a glitch with the bag, however this is a small road bump i can accept, i was able to have the pleasure of pressing that GORGEOUS confirm order button, our drinks just got here, they‚Äôre so good oh here‚Äôs our food now, loving the display they took great effort in making this food. absolutely 10/10 only 5/5 stars because i cant add more. i love you ronald, ash m loves you ronald m 
everyone go now, i guess you could say i‚Äôm lovin it.

title: This Ap is a joke
review: This app is a joke! Ordered food and sent my husband to pick it up because we live about 20 minutes away from the closest McDonalds. It let me order and pay but when it‚Äôs time to pick up it refuses to let you unless your location is on!  I tried to have him log in as me on the ap and it still would not let him because it said I log in through google even though that is my log in info. The app said if you‚Äôre here ask a crew member and show them this order #. The crew member in Taylorville, IL  said I‚Äôm going to stop you now, there is nothing we can do unless the phone you ordered off of is 30 ft away. Complete waste of time and gas! Be up front that you cannot order off another device and it tracks your location which is a complete invasion on privacy! So upset!

title: Works but frustrating
review: I‚Äôve used the app two times and had the same problem. I completed my order at home but nothing happens when I touch Order Now. So I drive to McD and explain my problem to the drive in speaker and ask how the app is supposed to work. They don‚Äôt know and only suggest I order again by telling them what I want. And then half way to the first window the app now gives me an order number. Very frustrating. It seems when I order at home that I should get some feedback when I touch Order Now. And it also seems I should be given the order number before I drive up to the speaker, not after. Should be some instructions.

title: Horrible, want a refund
review: Ordered, paid, went to the location for pick up. Tapped in to say I‚Äôd arrived. Over 10 times it said I wasn‚Äôt at the location as I was literally 10 feet from the store. It recommended I talk to someone. Go thru drive thru. They say I have to come inside. Manager inside knows nothing about it, has me call local supervisor. They don‚Äôt know. It‚Äôs now been 30 minutes since I ordered. I try to cancel the order and just order at the counter but it won‚Äôt let me. I finally try again, saying I‚Äôm there, order goes through but now they have to substitute because they were done serving breakfast. I ordered at 10am. It was now 10:40. I took the substitute because I really wanted breakfast and I was now in the store and had 3 different people touch my phone during the virus pandemic. It took 45 minutes to get my food. What a waste of time.
developerResponse: {'id': 14736079, 'body': 'It can be a bummer when your experience is not an awesome one. Please provide some more info in this link https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/ so we can address this. Thanks.', 'modified': '2020-04-17T15:18:43Z'}

title: Ridiculous
review: Your phone has to actually be at the location for them to start working on your order. You can‚Äôt just submit an order and have someone else pick it up for you like other food apps. Usually, I‚Äôm able to tap ‚ÄúI am here‚Äù in fast food apps and the restaurant will start making my food, but McDonalds doesn‚Äôt do that. My mom went to McDonald‚Äôs while I worked through my lunch break (we work at the same company). I used the app so that I could get $1 off a Large Fry, but the cashier wouldn‚Äôt take the mobile order because my actual device wasn‚Äôt at their location, never mind that my mom had a screenshot and proof of my paid order. She ended up having to pay for the order at the location and I didn‚Äôt get my $1 discount. I know it‚Äôs only $1, but I honestly would‚Äôve gotten a Medium if I had known I wasn‚Äôt going to get my discount.
developerResponse: {'id': 13069851, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out! We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-01-22T22:39:47Z'}

title: iPhone 11 app works great
review:
I‚Äôve updated my review.  When I had an iPhone 6 it would not process but now I have an iPhone 11.  It works great and as intended.  Immediate and convenient.  Glad to have it now especially with 3 kids.  Easy ordering from the table!

Previous 1 Star.  Two times in a row now I get the whole way through and it charges then fails and says go to the counter.  The stores on both occasions couldn‚Äôt pull up the order through but could see it.  They were both nice and gave me the food, but this app clearly isn‚Äôt ready for release.  Its a shame because it is a good idea but it unfortunately makes the experience longer instead of quicker.
developerResponse: {'id': 11217707, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-12-21T21:37:47Z'}

title: Worst Restaurant App
review: This app does not allow you to put an order through unless you are 500ft from the store you want to order from.   This makes no sense at all. Outback, Panera, and Starbucks allow you to pick the time you want your food to be ready.  Of course they do because this is the main reason you would want to use the app to order food in advance. I‚Äôve complained to customer service about this 3x and every time they tell me the reason is to guarantee your food is hot when you pick it up, which is ridiculous.  Let me pick the time that is convenient for me and if it ready at the time I asked for and I‚Äôm late I totally understand that it could be not as warm and that would be my fault.   Outback, Panera, and all the others realize that their customers are not stupid and will understand this simple concept.  Fix this worthless app!
developerResponse: {'id': 4261460, 'body': "Hey, Mark! We're sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2019-08-09T18:01:34Z'}

title: Terrible
review:
Did not realize when you order using the app you must pick up with the same phone that ordered the app. My husband was coming home late and I decided to help by ordering it ahead of time. He got there and the order was not in the system. After awhile of them trying to figure out how to work this system, my husband called to say I needed to drive to McDonald‚Äôs. 

When I pulled in the app aloud me to complete the order and pick up. I walked in and re-explained the situation. Two separate employees came to me asking what happened and said basically oh ok. All I got in customer service was sorry for the delay. 

25 mins after I arrived - I was given the order.  When I got home and sat down to eat with my family- realized the container marked artisan grilled chicken sand that I had ordered was a fried chicken sandwich. Which I now can‚Äôt eat due to diet restrictions. 

So an hour later - I still have not had dinner and need to make myself something at home. 

Very disappointed is this app. Terribly disappointed is the service and the wait and even more disappointed in the customer service at the restaurant. They filled multiple orders while I waited, ran out of fries and I waited longer for them and all they said was sorry for the wait.
developerResponse: {'id': 7657205, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Mike! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-03-10T20:05:41Z'}

title: Great Purpose App with Major Flaws
review:
My love to McD may be as big as everyone can imagine. Getting food exactly as expected literally any time, day and night. That is just great.

Even better if you can order on your way from an app! I use the app frequently, especially if there are (used to be) good deals.

Unfortunately the app has major flaws that should be far above improvements such as  ‚Äúbutton design feel‚Äù. Since the app feedback is useless, allow me to mention some of them here:

‚Äî Simplify your feedback process! Who asks for app version number and the OS??? Automize it and let users get to their point!

‚Äî Let users edit their account information, or update it from Facebook at least time to time. Some people change names and email addresses.

‚Äî Make the app less data-intense. Use caching and other means (such as PWA) instead of complaining about internet connection.

This will do for starters. The rest will come if you simplify the feedback ;-)

You may also consider training your staff before (!) enabling a new feature such as drive-thru pickup (great feature by the way).

Thank you and good luck!
George
developerResponse: {'id': 7186347, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-02-06T23:52:42Z'}

title: It‚Äôs a good app, but needs some fine tuning
review:
I recently placed a mobile order and when I went to pick it up, the manager at the window said one of the items (a cherry limeade slushie) I ordered was no longer being served. I also ordered a plain biscuit and added in a folded egg. The manager also asked about that, because on their end, they saw ‚Äúbiscuit, no butter, no patty‚Äù. They did not see the add-on of the folded egg. I did not make a fuss about it. The manager was nice enough to substitute the limeade for a shake or whatever i wanted and got the biscuit (with the egg) for only $1. 
Not sure if the app is concurrent with the restaurant in particular or in general, but it surely needs more fine tuning. I am sure the restaurants get a lot of these kinds of issues with mobile orders.
developerResponse: {'id': 6690162, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2019-01-06T00:24:44Z'}

title: Great, right up until it stopped accepting payment
review: It‚Äôs a great shame to me that he first app review I have written will be one of extreme negativity. For the last month, I have been unable to pay for any and all items through the app. I just dismissed it as a fluke initially. Recently, however, it has come to my attention that I can‚Äôt even ADD new payment methods to the app. I just get the same BS message saying ‚ÄúCard not added‚Äù. I do not understand how the app could go so badly wrong in so little time, because it has worked fine for the entire time I have had it, but it is unusable at this point in time. If I could, I would give this app zero stars in a heartbeat. I do not tolerate fundamental errors like the ones I keep getting. I would advise McDonald‚Äôs that they get to work on an update ASAP, because I‚Äôve absolutely had it with this worthless excuse for an app.
developerResponse: {'id': 6078600, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-11-23T17:18:48Z'}

title: Horrible integration with the store
review: Not only is the app not very intuitive - the stores don‚Äôt know how it works and often ruin the experience. I paid via the app and then when I got to the store they didn‚Äôt bring my food - I went in and asked for my food - they said I would have to pay - I showed my mobile receipt and pending transaction in credit card and they still didn‚Äôt care - they said that wouldn‚Äôt go through - so I called McDonalds customer call center and after 30 minutes they said it would go through and I would have to go back to the store for my refund which I explained would be hard because the manager there said i couldn‚Äôt get my food or refund - they suggested working with my credit card company to get the charge back - they did offer me 1 free breakfast to make up for it what a deal (I already paid for it)

title: What a waste
review: The app is useless when it comes to ordering your food and paying through the app.  I placed my order on the app, paid for it and it told me to head to McDonalds.  I arrived at McDonalds and my app said ‚Äúwe see you are here your order is being processed‚Äù.  I looked at the board and my order number was not up there.  I waited about 3 minutes and approached the counter where the manager told me that it is not processed because I did not pay.  I told her I paid through the app and she pushed a few buttons on her register and said ‚Äú it will be a few minutes your order just want in‚Äù.  I waited and watched people coming in, ordering and leaving with their food while I still stood waiting.  I stood in that place for well over 12 minutes waiting for my ‚Äúconvenient, order ahead of time meal‚Äù.  Never again.  Deleting the app now.  GET IT TOGETHER MCDONALDS!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 4893087, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, Stacey! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-08-31T21:10:46Z'}

title: Great deals
review:
I‚Äôve only been using this app for about a month but so far I‚Äôm pretty happy with it. The deals are really good. We don‚Äôt eat at McDonald‚Äôs too often but it makes it a lot easier when we do. I love that I can just pull up out front and have my order brought out. 

However, I really wish that there was a way to link account or share an order. For example, if my boyfriend is on his way home and I ask him to stop at McDonald‚Äôs. I can‚Äôt place an order from my phone at home that he can pick up. It doesn‚Äôt give you the option to say your at the store if you‚Äôre not- which I understand, but it would be really nice if there was a way to share an order!
developerResponse: {'id': 4618784, 'body': "Hello! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2018-08-11T22:28:51Z'}

title: Quarter Pound Big Mac Troubles!!!
review: I got this app and used it successfully about four occasions. Over last two to three weeks, it magically created orders for food I didn‚Äôt order! I didn‚Äôt get the food in the first place, and I didn‚Äôt order the amounts it tried to charge me for. As if that‚Äôs not bad enough, it made several duplicate charges for legitimate orders for food I did order and get. I‚Äôm an honest man and I don‚Äôt have any problem paying for what I get, but I‚Äôll be damned if I‚Äôll pay twice for one order! I had to spend the time with my credit card disputing the erroneous charges to resolve the charges, which defeats any convenience or purpose of using this app. My advice from experience of using it: DO NOT INSTALL IT! Unless you like paying double for things you get, and double charged for things you never even ordered, this is NOT a trustworthy or viable solution!!!!

title: The app can‚Äôt tell when something is unavailable at a store
review:
For example, the ice cream and Frozen Coke machines frequently break down, but the app says want ‚Äúknow‚Äù that.  If I order those things, someone be has to tell me they aren‚Äôt available after I get to the store and try to remedy the situation, either with a substitution or a refund, weather of which wastes an employee‚Äôs time.  In some cases, I drive to the store only to learn that what I came for isn‚Äôt available.  

The stores should be able to tell the app that certain items are currently not available.

Otherwise, it is intuitive and convenient convenient.
developerResponse: {'id': 32304943, 'body': 'we need to look into this more, the next time it happens, drop us a line here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-09-29T16:27:20Z'}

title: Horrible service
review: This McDonald‚Äôs is horrible there is no sense of urgency when there is a line of cars or lobby full especially on the weekends. I am still trying to understand the point of ordering ahead on the mobile app when I still have to wait 20min when I get there and most times it‚Äôs just for iced coffee. I go almost everyday before work just for the $1 deal on the iced coffee and end up late waiting, it‚Äôs ridiculous and now that the coffee is no longer a dollar I am sure I won‚Äôt return I will pay the higher price at Starbucks and get better service. I will say there is one manager there during the week that when she sees me she usually gets me in and out and I appreciate her I wish I knew her name, but she is fighting an uphill battle with the rest of her staff. Thank you for listening.
developerResponse: {'id': 25534840, 'body': 'We aim to be as quick as we can with your order. Get back to us with more details on this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html\r\n', 'modified': '2021-10-06T19:47:03Z'}

title: Major Account Security Concern
review: I received an email thanking me for my mobile order visit at a McDonald‚Äôs location in West Lafayette, Indiana, 124 E State ST. I live in Florida. Someone was able to get into my McDonald‚Äôs app account somehow and purchase their food using my card on file in the App. How is it someone logged into my account? Why is there no login security at all? I called the customer care and all they did was get me in touch with the McDonald‚Äôs in Indiana, what is that going to do me? Customer service and the McDonald‚Äôs location in question both said to just contact my bank to get my money back. It was $9, I don‚Äôt care about that. What I care about is the lack of concern someone was able to do this, and for nobody from McDonald‚Äôs seeming to care. That‚Äôs disturbing, and I refuse to use this app anymore and recommend nobody else either.

title: Forced update not good
review: Hello so I have been using this app for the longest time. Recently McDonald‚Äôs has started a new rewards program and I have managed to earn over 6,000 points. Right when I pull up the app I was forced signed out. When attempting to sign in no matter what option I was forced to be redirected through Facebook as my email used was signed in there. When I attempt to sign in through Facebook I encounter the same glitch where the email is already used and please make an account. I am frustrated because no matter what problem solving techniques I used I was locked out of my account without acknowledgment and given no way through the app to sign back in. Not broken don‚Äôt fix it I‚Äôll happily try to make a new account but I have to add in my card information all over again

title: App won‚Äôt let me in, not worth the hassle
review: The app kicked me out a few weeks ago and wouldn‚Äôt allow me to sign back in. It said to check my internet connection and try again. I was connected and could do everything else on my phone except sign in to the McDonald‚Äôs app. I finally uninstalled and reinstalled the app. It then said I was using a new device and I had to verify it again. I was not using a new device. I went through that process and it finally let me sign back in. Now a week later it has kicked me out again and won‚Äôt let me sign back in, giving me the same error message as before telling me to make sure I‚Äôm connected to the internet and to restart my app. I‚Äôm obviously connected to the internet because everything else on my phone works except this one app.

title: Good app but limited paying options
review:
I really like this app. It‚Äôs been awesome to have my morning drink ready when I get there and the deals are actually real deals. 

My only complain or wish is to be able to add a gift card to the payment options. Maybe you can and I just haven‚Äôt figured it out. But I would prefer to be able to load money into my gift card account and use that versus regular small credit cards charges. The Starbucks app lets you do that and I find it‚Äôs easier to keep track of my spending. 

Overall this is a great app.
developerResponse: {'id': 19704274, 'body': "Heya. We're always working on an even better App that you enjoy using. Thanks for helping us out", 'modified': '2020-12-11T19:30:04Z'}

title: ‚Äú!Application Initialization critical error occurred. Please restart the App.‚Äù
review: What is going on with your app. I have not been able to use the app in almost a full 2 months. I used it for years with minimal problems, now for the past two months when I open the app it reads at the top of the app ‚Äú!Application Initialization critical error occurred. Please restart the App.‚Äù I have restarted, I have deleted and reinstalled multiple times. When I reinstall it will ask for my log in and then when I do it gives the same error message at the top. I would order through the app at least once a week, I literally have ordered now one time in the last 2 months. Can you fix this issue. I‚Äôm on a iPhone 11 that I bought from the Apple Store.

title: Payment method, etc.
review:
I have been very frustrated with attempting to add a new payment method to my profile. I have tried submitting my card info multiple times, and have even deleted and re-downloaded the app itself multiple times. Every attempt has failed and I have given up.

I also noticed that at least one of the locations (Hillsborough NC) lists the hours as 4 AM to 2 AM, so I drove to the location and discovered  that the location doesn‚Äôt open till 11 AM. I understand when google lists erroneous information but when the source is the app of the company itself, I expect more accuracy.

title: Log-in issues
review: This app is pretty good, even though they don‚Äôt have that great of deals anymore. The set up is really nice, and it‚Äôs super easy to customize orders. The issue I‚Äôm having that‚Äôs so annoying is no matter how often I use the app, it‚Äôll log me out half the time and when I go to log in, it says my password is wrong, even if I literally JUST CHANGED it not too long ago so I know for sure what the password is. Today, I went to go place an order, and whenever I log in and click on deals, it says I‚Äôm logged out still. Even though it literally JUST LET ME LOG IN!!! Like what?!?! And I did this multiple times. The app is pretty nice, but gosh it drives me crazy sometimes because of all the minor issues it has that just add up
developerResponse: {'id': 19352157, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that. Let us look into that. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. ", 'modified': '2020-11-25T18:26:00Z'}

title: First time using. What a waste of my time.
review: First time user. I arrived and hit the arrive button. Went through the drive through after 5-6 cars. Gave my four digit order number. Was asked to approach the second window. I was greeting with a confused stare and asked to park at the other side and wait. 15 mins later, a manager approaches and says they have my order but it hasn‚Äôt been paid. I‚Äôm showing it has been. After explaining to me she can take my card in and process the payment, I may have to return to request a refund if I am billed twice. 50 mins after I placed my order and two $22 charges later, I got my food. The whole purpose of installing this app was to save time and avoid human interaction. I live with immunocompromised people. What a serious waste of my precious time. The manager was very friendly and kind but this app is some serious BS.

title: What‚Äôs the point?
review: I order before breakfast is over (15-20 mins),  I get there and press the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here button‚Äù while I‚Äôm waiting in the drive thru (which is understandably long because of COVID) and breakfast still hasn‚Äôt stopped being served. Once I get to the speaker and tell them my number they say they can‚Äôt make it because breakfast is over, even though I pressed the button before it was? I don‚Äôt get it, what‚Äôs the point on ordering through mobile if they won‚Äôt make it until you actually get to the speak? Might as well just order through the speaker from the start, they also don‚Äôt care when you voice your complaint to them. ‚ÄúBreakfast is over, there‚Äôs nothing we can do‚Äù is all I got. Only gave it two stars because they do have some good coupons.
developerResponse: {'id': 14919459, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-04-26T15:36:08Z'}

title: Kind of buggy
review: I used to use the app all of the time and it was quick and reliable. But now there seem to be a lot of things that need to get edited, just recently I was trying to order something quick for a family snack to get in and get out but the app kept crashing and took forever to load, I had created my whole order and was about to pay but it just kept loading and showing those hoping fries. Soon after it crashed so I had to go into the store and order there. I even had a coupon for 10% off a mobile order of 10$ or more but was unable to redeem it because I was no longer in the app. In all honesty, I really liked this app but it‚Äôs become such a hassle that I‚Äôd rather not use it or take my business somewhere else overall.
developerResponse: {'id': 11336427, 'body': 'Oh no! Most times this can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give us a call, so we can look into this further at 1-877-334-4332. \r\n', 'modified': '2019-10-18T21:16:28Z'}

title: As crappy as the service
review:
1.The deals are there so u can see but ‚Äúnetwork is not available‚Äù when u actually try to use them. Has been this way since I downloaded the app
2.You can‚Äôt place the order until u are in a McDonald‚Äôs parking lot. So no different than going through drive through in my opinion. I mean if I have to pay for my food to place the order then what‚Äôs the deal?
3.in my opinion this app is as good as the service in the area I live in. I don‚Äôt care how bad my kids want CN if it means a 10 minute wait we going to BK or Wendy‚Äôs. PERIOD

One month later and they still can‚Äôt manage to fix the issue with the ‚Äúdeals‚Äù on their app. Machines are always broken it takes 10 minutes to get 3 coffees and an orange juice. I seriously can‚Äôt with this place. Starbucks is more pricey but at least I get coffees at a reasonable time frame.ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
