title: Not reliable
review:
While I love using the app when it works, there‚Äôs roughly a 50/50 shot at it not working. Too often, it says ‚ÄúSorry, that didn‚Äôt work. Confirm your internet connection and retry. If issue continues, restart the App.‚Äù
Each time I will disconnect and reconnect the WiFi, even switch to data, and when desperate, I‚Äôll delete and redownload the entire app. Once it‚Äôs down, though, it‚Äôs gone for the day, no matter what you do. This is normal for everyone I know, too. Hopefully it‚Äôll be more reliable and I can use it without having to worry if it‚Äôll work. It‚Äôs convenient and great time saver when it‚Äôs working!

title: Completely horrible
review: You messed my whole life with those juicy crispy tender chicken sandwiches because 24/8 I‚Äôm thinking bout those juicy chicken Patty‚Äôs and my brain becomes fried because of how much I dream of those chicken borgers and I swear my bank balance is dropping faster than my grades because everyday at school I think of those chicken burgers and those soft soft buns and I want to sandwich them between my face and fall asleep and eat those chicken mcfriggin burgers cuz my manager fired me because I keep thinking about those tender meat of the chicken burgers and I don‚Äôt do my work and my brain is rotting plz send help

title: Pretty Good
review: They have some awesome deals and the app is definitely worth having. I do have 3 complaints. First is many times after making a mobile order I go to pick it up and they tell me that they don‚Äôt have the specific item that I ordered. Not a huge deal just annoying that you have to pick something else and no other money is exchanged so don‚Äôt get something cheaper. Second issue is the 6th drink free. If they forget to scan the upc first they will not fix it. Your out of luck for it counting towards the 6th free. Last complaint the scans are not always accurate. I scanned it 5 times and it went back to zero before I had a chance to get my 6th free. Other than those few things it does say a bunch of money.
developerResponse: {'id': 3206130, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2018-04-20T19:54:11Z'}

title: My Latte
review: I have lost money with this app.   It is great when it works but half the time it doesn‚Äôt.    I get my order sometimes quick but most of the time have to go in.   A few days ago they couldn‚Äôt make my order and they didn‚Äôt give me a refund   I got McDonalds from the app like they said but still haven‚Äôt got a response.    Other times my order was cold like the machine just put cold milk in my latte.   I am a traveler so I get to the next McDonald‚Äôs and they won‚Äôt replace my order.  I am so tired of spending money on lattes that are cold or not made at all.   They don‚Äôt make it easy to get a refund.  I am going to buy a small coffee pot and a small cooler so I can make it on the road.   Sick of making them money when I get nothing or wrong made products.    Plus, my points are disappearing all the time.

title: Good Program, Terrible App
review: The McDonald‚Äôs Rewards / Deals program is great, but the app itself is terrible. It‚Äôs the slowest and buggiest app I‚Äôve ever experienced. It takes forever to load, and then it will randomly freeze when you‚Äôre trying to order, so you have to close the app out and start the entire process over again. Once you eventually place and receive your order, you have to make sure you close everything out in the right order, or else the next time you try to use the app it will still be on the previous order, and then you have to figure out how to back out of that to begin a new order. It‚Äôs so frustrating that this is from such a huge organization that is known for fast and efficient customer experiences. You can do better, McDonald‚Äôs.
developerResponse: {'id': 33572338, 'body': "the issues you're describing can usually be fixed with an uninstall and reinstall of the app. give that a try, and if you still have issues, let us know here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-12-06T17:59:50Z'}

title: I tap the email‚Äôs link to sign in, but it never signs me in
review: I have had this app for well over a year and the few times that I decide to try to use it to maybe get through the line quicker I am unable to even sign in‚Ä¶ I tap sign in and put in my email that I used way back when, and it shows I have an account. It registers my email just fine. I get an email to my email, tap the yellow button to sign, and it takes me back to the app, but it never shows that I‚Äôve signed in. I tap sign in in the app again and it does the whole process again and again, and again, and again‚Ä¶ I am never ever able to sign in. What is happening? I see I‚Äôm not the only one with this exact same issue as other ‚Äòcritical ratings‚Äô show. And your developer responses did not help them at all.
developerResponse: {'id': 32236723, 'body': "let's get you logged back in, Jacob! try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. if this doesn't fix the issue, drop us a line here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-09-26T13:55:13Z'}

title: Your app but bad experience
review: I appreciate the ease of use for the McDonald‚Äôs app but when I arrive at a store, the app notices, and asks how I‚Äôm picking up, I expect the current order to be removed when it is processed at the store. Practically every time, the next time I use the app, the old order is still in the bag. This is particularly problematic when I came remove the order because a deal or offer is no longer valid. Like another review, the app choice be changed to remove stale orders after a period of time - I suggest 4 hours. 24 hours is too long. Or just have a button to kill the order.  I even was awarded points and thanked for the order.  Don‚Äôt make this another ice cream machine farce.
developerResponse: {'id': 26589353, 'body': "We'd be happy to look into this! Let's talk here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-12-01T20:01:42Z'}

title: Needs improvement
review: I‚Äôve tried to use the app several times and encountered glitches each time.  First, it says the McDonalds location nearest me is closed; it is not.  The app continues to process the order, despite stating the location is closed.  Second, on most occasions, the app fails to give me a confirmation number to ease pickup, but accepts the charge.  The local folks worked with me once I get there, but they and I are pretty tired of this silliness.  Finally, I have some question about what information the local McD is getting in terms of orders through the app, because, not once has my order been right.  I honestly don‚Äôt believe the problem lies with my local McD as I‚Äôve placed plenty of orders there pre-app, and not had a problem.

title: Will this one make it to print???
review: My previous review got deleted apparently.  Shocking, it went into specific details about the bull crap corporate has been pulling. That's ok, because this app is complete dog crap.  Used to be able to get a free coffee after 5 purchases.  Buy 5, get a 6th on them. Not anymore!!  It takes 1400 points to get a coffee, so if they're $2 coffees, it now takes 7. (2.00 = 200 points) HOWEVER, McDonald's coffees aren't $2, they're like a $1 to a $1.5; so now, you have to buy FOURTEEN coffees to get a free one. I had a free one when they "updated" their app and Voila!!!  No more free coffee. Guess they were losing too much money, and God knows, that's all important.  Likely be deleting this app because it's not worth it anymore. I don't eat any of the garbage they peddle as food. And can't get a free coffee anymore, so....c'est la vie!!

title: Easy to use but no better than the stores you have to go to ultimately.
review: Like the title says this app is very easy to use. It‚Äôs basically idiot proof. Unfortunately, the app doesn‚Äôt let you place your order before you‚Äôre actually in the parking lot at the store, which would have actually made it very useful. I‚Äôve personally watched the entire drive-through line order their food get served, and leave the area twice over before I received my food. The only way this app makes sense to continue using is if they let you actually order food before you‚Äôre at the store, otherwise you‚Äôre going to get served faster through the drive-through or just by walking in. I just got through waiting 25 minutes for my order to be filled through using this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 19096664, 'body': "Sounds like your visit wasn't too quick. Let's get this looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2020-11-13T17:41:44Z'}

title: Double Charged
review: I‚Äôve been using this so for some time and this is my fault for not noticing sooner, but the app double charges me.  I order the same thing everyday my total is $4.40. I‚Äôve been double dipped all month. I noticed when I check out it, click the I‚Äôm here button, get my order number, then click the X to exit it leaves my order in my bag in the bottom right corner.  I click it open and it says do you want to reopen order I click cancel, they stay in my bag and is still there when I go back the next day.  If I click the reopen order I can clear out my cart. Do I expect MCdonalds to reimburse me for all the extra charges, no I don‚Äôt they have money to make and it my fault fir using the app and not noticing earlier.   I did call McDonald‚Äôs and was told I obviously ordered twice and got it.  Ok. Using this app is a risk.  I advise against it.

title: Almost as useless as our local McDonald‚Äôs employees.
review: Combine an app that doesn‚Äôt submit your order to the store with the morons who work there, and you‚Äôve got a recipe for going to any other restaurant. I placed a mobile order, checked in at the drive thru, have them my mobile order number and they told me I didn‚Äôt make a mobile order. I confirmed the address and store information on the order and they told me I hadn‚Äôt placed any order. I tried to pull up to the window to show them my screen, but they didn‚Äôt care. As I drive away, my phone alerts me that my card has been charged at McDonald‚Äôs. So, I was charged for an order I supposedly didn‚Äôt make, and I didn‚Äôt even get anything. Ended up driving down the road to Whataburger where I was greeted by friendly people who didn‚Äôt treat me like crap then steal money from me like the jackals at McDonald‚Äôs.

title: Major Concern with Information Security
review: It‚Äôs been a hit or miss if the app would work but the last time I used it someone tried to use 2 of the debit/credit card numbers I had saved on the app in New York.....I am from TEXAS!!!!! So it‚Äôs not like they just happen to get my numbers somewhere close by me. And it happened the same day I tried to use my app...like that evening I got notified from my banks that someone had tried using my card.  I advise anyone thinking of using this app DO NOT USE IT!! Your information is not secure. Terrible for a company this large to have an app this bad.

title: Worst - McDonalds manager advise NOT to use it
review:
This happened two times now on my first two attempts; after the app places order when you arrive the McDonalds location, it gives you option of parking in curb side with 5 min wait or go thru drive thru. It‚Äôs NEVER 5 min., it takes 10-15 min waiting in the spot, even long drive thru lines cleared up while I was still waiting.
I spoke to manager both times and they said they had to do something special to unblock my order request and advised NOT to use the app because it DOES NOT work in TIMELY fashion; they said they themselves don‚Äôt use it because of the problems.

title: Sonic Drive Thru and Little Ceasars are superior.
review: The first time I went to use the app ordering items was just fine but why you need to actually register is more than I can figure out. So the government knows what your eating?? lol. üòÜ Sonic drive inn and little Ceasars pizza do not require registration and are by far easier to use. After I placed my order on the app I showed up at the McDonald‚Äôs and location service could not detect I was there. So I had to get out of the car and go into my location so they could find my order on the computer which was really inconvenient because the whole reason I ordered mobile is so I wouldn‚Äôt have to go in or get out of the car. Again Sonic Drive in and Little Ceasars apps are far superior.
developerResponse: {'id': 13115705, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-01-25T16:38:20Z'}

title: What is the purpose of this app?
review: You have to be in the parking lot before it sends your order to be made. Then you have to wait for it to be made along with everyone else‚Äôs order placed before you. You can‚Äôt order ahead and have your food ready when you get there. Taco Bell‚Äôs app starts your order as soon as you place it. The app then gives you info on the status of your order. This app requires you to check in with the cashier before getting your food while Taco Bell‚Äôs has you go directly to pick up. I imagine McD‚Äôs excuse is they don‚Äôt want the customer to complain about cold food even though Taco Bell doesn‚Äôt have a problem with this. Well, put a pop up warning right before the place order button comes up stating once the food is made, there is no refund.
developerResponse: {'id': 11980565, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out! We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2019-11-21T17:51:34Z'}

title: Awesome ! But only 1 complaint.
review:
I love the app. And all the deals, I do wish some of them lasted longer but i have gotten so many great deals with it and it is very convenient ! Especially when I am low on money and can get everything I want anyways. 
My only complaint is that I wish that the deals of 
3$ off a $10 purchase and the $3 off a $15 purchase were still available. 

I also go to the McDonald‚Äôs on East Main Street in Meriden Connecticut and I wish that they would have more pies! Every time I ask for a strawberry and cream pie or pumpkin pie they are always out. (I ask for whatever pie they are serving for the season)
developerResponse: {'id': 6086436, 'body': "Thanks for the love, friend! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2018-11-24T18:50:04Z'}

title: Annoying to use
review: The app disables third party keyboards for no good reason. I wish Apple would remove that "feature" from the API. It's not McDonald's business what keyboard I want to use. Also, an annoying "you've added an item, do you want to check out" box repeatedly pops up over the search box; to search for another item, I have to click Check Out and then Back after each item to make the search field visible again. Payment is flaky at times, particularly with Apple Pay. I've had charges hit my card only to have the restaurant claim I didn't pay. Curbside is hit or miss at some locations, particularly when busy; I've waited over 30 minutes for cold food while dozens go through the drive-thru because taking the orders out is such a low priority to the staff.

title: I always redownload it when I go to mcdonalds
review: The deals are freaking awesome, massive money saver on pretty much anything on the menu. I love mobile ordering especially when I feel so lazy to even go through the drive thru and I‚Äôll just go to a pick up spot and have them literally drop off the food to my car as I‚Äôm parked outside. Sometimes though when I do that the wait is a lot longer than if I just went through the drive thru because they won‚Äôt have something on the menu. The app is glitchy as well but again, this is probably the best fast food app. Only reason I keep choosing McDonalds over other fast food joints if I decide to have junk food.

title: word of warning
review: Deals are good, place your order, pay, get a confirmation number. Convenient right? Give the drive thru your confirmation and no order. Go inside show them the confirmation, they get the manager. He looks starts tapping (no data connection). He goes back in his office so I connect to wifi. He comes back out after a minute or two and starts tapping. Oh here‚Äôs the problem you used to be able to give the confirmation number but they changed the app, now you have to continue on after the confirmation to another couple of screens to get a new confirmation number to ‚Äòcheck in‚Äô. Why the first confirmation number you ask? Nobody knows. There‚Äôs your order. Ten minutes after here is your food. Manager was not rude but also a bit condescending and doesn‚Äôt care about the wait. Good luck to you, never again for me.
developerResponse: {'id': 6307543, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-12-10T00:12:08Z'}

title: Horrible Service When You use the App.
review:
Horrible service.  My wife placed the order on her phone while I went to pick it up. The app wouldn‚Äôt let them know I was there to pick it because her GPS said she wasn‚Äôt at that location.

I stood there at the mobile sign for five minutes while all the staff ignored me before I called to someone who was leaning on the rail waiting for an order to be filled. She very rudely told me to wait, and proceeded to ignore me and not follow up on my order for ten minutes. After I had been at this location for 15 minutes she finely asked a manager to look into my order who very politely told me there wasn‚Äôt anything she could do for me without my wife there to click I‚Äôm here.

It is both unacceptable that the app requires the phone to be present at the location to pick up or even view the order at the location, and it was terrible to be treated like a burden because I was a mobile user and didn‚Äôt order there in store.

Will never use the app again.
developerResponse: {'id': 5447834, 'body': 'Hi there, Patty! We always expect your service to be stellar. Having our staff trained and knowledgeable about our Mobile App is important to us. Please provide some more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can address this.', 'modified': '2018-10-10T22:31:33Z'}

title: So Sweet!
review: I love coming here! Maybe bias since I live nearby. After the upgrade of the dinning room, it just feels so special. The energy is good and the employees are always HAPPY! One last and most important part is they always make my coffee SWEET! just the way I like it! Every other location do not put enough love in the coffee. If I pay for it to be sweet, please; by all means give me my sugar rush so I can make it through the day! Better this than the after effects of a red-bull. So thanks and continue to keep curbside, especially during this over kill of the pandemic. *hugs!*‚Äî Happy Holidays

title: Didn‚Äôt Help
review: My son ordered for me on his phone and I went to pick up the food. We went to the slowest McDonalds on the planet- Laie, HI. We hoped this would help speed up service.  I was so frustrated to find out I had to check-in AND the GPS had to show we were there. (My son couldn‚Äôt just check-in for me as he was still at home.) After downloading the app, I couldn‚Äôt get the login to work. I had to turn around, drive home, pick up my son, and drive back to McDonald‚Äôs. I would have liked to just cancel the order but we had already paid for the food. We finally checked in but STILL had to wait forever....cars were going through the drive-thru faster, and that‚Äôs saying a lot. We hate going to this McDonalds because it is soooooooo slow. This app didn‚Äôt solve anything and only added more time onto an already long trip! So annoying!
developerResponse: {'id': 4198471, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2018-07-11T19:43:44Z'}

title: The Visitors from Outer Space
review:
I‚Äôm sitting here in my friends house sitting back having a chill. We decided to have a blast from the past and watch The Wacky Adventures of Ronald Macdonald The Visitors From Outer Space, as I‚Äôm sitting here watching the space ship get blasted with Alien Creamy Marshmallow my mouth burst with saliva. That was it, that was the breaking point, the amazing scene of that Alien mess had me so hungry, I had to place an order on my Macdonald App. So I praise Macdonald and their awesome marketing for giving me the best happy meal I‚Äôd ever eaten. At 25 years old, and at 3am a happy meal had never tasted better. 
And with that I give Ronald Macdonald a 5*

title: Acceptable
review:
Ive used the app for a year and go to MCD 3-4 times a week  it has good things and bad

Pros:
Great deals on food

Points add up quickly

Great reward items

Cons:
Sluggish doesn‚Äôt work seamlessly like previous versions  takes awhile to select how you want to get the order.

Deals and points cannot be combined in same order even if you‚Äôre buying other stuff. Have to do separate order. Does not make sense 

Took away where you can select im here to get order processed. now it‚Äôs automatic which causes problems if you order ahead and it starts your order when you‚Äôve close to McDonald‚Äôs. if you‚Äôre close and stuck at light then you‚Äôre order will be made.

Please add more deals seems to be same ones all time only adding a few new ones mixed in

It Defaults to nearby McDonald‚Äôs not your favorite 

Cannot order lunch items ahead of time if they serving breakfast the app will not allow you to add lunch items  to your bag which is dumb and makes you wait until they are serving lunch to order these items  should add preorder functionality
developerResponse: {'id': 32073017, 'body': "we can totally get this looked into, Brian! there's always room for improvement. ", 'modified': '2022-11-18T14:33:17Z'}

title: Pointless to mobile order/curbside pick up
review: The ONLY reason I would ever want to use mobile order is to skip the lines. So I do my first mobile order thinking it will be done by the time I get there. But no, the app won‚Äôt even send the order to be prepared until your in the lot! So I pull in the the curbside pick up and it finally lets them prepare the order. Now I‚Äôm waiting at curbside as 13 cars in the drive through and two other curbside pick ups have been completed before me! I could understand if they prepared it when you were on the way and all you had to do was let them know when you arrived. I will never use mobile order again‚Ä¶.POINTLESS. Quicker just to order in restaurant or drive through.

title: Deals and rewards accrued vanished
review:
The app has improved over the years. It used to be you could accrue points for rewards, however they were sort of worthless. For example if you accrued 20,000 points over 9 months you could redeem a free bacon egg biscuit for something like 5,000 points.  The points take a long time to accrue and any redemption takes a lot of them. 

Recently McDonalds took all my points away. They vanished, 73,000 points. They also removed any Deals available on the mobile app. It used to be you could get deals using the app you could not get ordering directly. Now its the other way around. If you use the app you pay the highest price and any deals are only available by ordering in person. 

I dont know if its a play on greed or what but it was not very cool.
developerResponse: {'id': 32491134, 'body': "you've got problems and we've got answers! let's talk it up here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-10T17:38:24Z'}

title: Easy to navigate, buuuut...
review: When it comes to using points and deals, this app can be a bit confusing and maybe frustrating because I can't use points and deals in the same order which is the frustrating part because I have almost 10,000 points and a chunk will soon expire. Deals are not the same as using points that I have essentially paid to earn, right. Overslept I do like the convenience and its easy navigation, and the features that keep a running total of your reward points and notification of when they'll be expiring. Free McDonalds fries are the tastiest! I recommend this app simply for the convenience of it. Enjoy!
developerResponse: {'id': 31998961, 'body': "we don't want you to overindulge! one deal/reward at a time. ", 'modified': '2022-09-13T16:14:16Z'}

title: App never works now
review: So I‚Äôve been using the app for a few months and it‚Äôs been good. But lately, it always says they have ‚Äúserver issues‚Äù or something and to go order at the counter, I thought it was a one time thing but it kept happening, I thought maybe it was because I haven‚Äôt updated my app so I updated it, the problem continued to persist, I then deleted the app and reinstalled it but it‚Äôs still continuing with the same problem. This wouldn‚Äôt upset me if it happened to everyone but there‚Äôs people who are ordering through their app and are receiving them in curbside so I‚Äôm wondering why it‚Äôs only happening to me. Please fix this problem, it‚Äôs disappointing.

title: Terrible service
review: I placed an order through this app and I went to pick this up after 15 minutes . The order was ready cause I could see this from across the counter , I waited for 10 minutes once I got into the store and I was ignored . I tried to get the attention of one of the employees since all she has to do was hand me my order , I left with no food ( my points were taken for this order) and late for work . Honestly, I wish every person being given poor costumer service decided to just stop buying from you , the world would be a much better place . I‚Äôll be back when all the employees get replaced by a robot/machine cause yo do hire some terrible people . Install  lockers so we can pick up our food and not deal with such a miserable bunch ‚Ä¶ do something about this

title: Awful
review: This app is awful. My phone and the app are up to date. The app gets stuck in this endless loop of trying to get my to join McCafe rewards or some crap. I keep clicking next, next and join and it just starts all over again. I have to try to click super fast to get off it. Sometimes it works- most of the time it doesn‚Äôt. I have deleted and redownload the app and it still does this. I‚Äôve ordered 3 or 4 times though this app now- I have earned ZERO points/rewards. I now discover it looks like I have to go to a specific place to place an order if I want to earn points for my order?? My other orders don‚Äôt count?? This is ridiculous. One of my orders- I added the free medium fry. Checked out. Got to restaurant, and the free fry was gone from my order! Why did it disappear? So annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 31149504, 'body': 'we can totally get to the bottom of this. drop us a line with all the details here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-07-28T16:37:25Z'}

title: Useless
review:
Update: while I appreciate a developer response, the hours of operation of any particular store aren‚Äôt the problem. The problem is that the app let me order something and then, after traveling to the store, I was told it‚Äôs not available. While I‚Äôm sure there‚Äôs a reason the app is designed this way, it alienates consumers like myself.

App lets you order but doesn‚Äôt place the order until you‚Äôre on the premises. So you can order breakfast at 10:25, arrive at 10:35, and have your order cancelled because they stop serving breakfast at 10:30. The staff also just ignore the order sometimes, depending on which McD‚Äôs you go to. Long story short: it‚Äôs an awful app and service. Multiple bad experiences. McD‚Äôs mobile order system is nowhere close to Dunkin‚Äôs or Starbucks. Erasing the app now.

title: Slowest service in Richmond County
review: If it wasn‚Äôt for my kids I‚Äôd never shop here, every time I come to this restaurant the line is backed up. I came through the line one night and overheard the supervisor and the cook fussing about the cook holding up the line outside. The cook felt like it wasn‚Äôt him holding up the line when indeed it was because people were waiting on their food for long periods of time. I even order through the app to pick up my food to go and still wait long periods of time for a small kids meal when this is supposed to be a whole lot quicker!

title: This app works less than their ice cream machine
review:
It started with me getting a ‚Äúcritical error‚Äù message and not letting me in and now it won‚Äôt even open on my phone. My phone is up to date and everywhere I‚Äôve looked, it‚Äôs an issue with the app, not the phone. I was working towards a free McCaf√© before this.

Update: it fixed itself after over a year; however, I‚Äôd like to keep the 1* I gave! I started doing a McDelivery order because the price was so outrageous on Door Dash and Uber Eats. I built my order and it was even more expensive than the other apps and wouldn‚Äôt let me use rewards or deals. It was absolutely outrageous. I know it‚Äôs the company‚Äôs policies and not the app but I thought I‚Äôd add that. It also has glitches when I try to change stores and is annoying to order from sometimes.
developerResponse: {'id': 28296593, 'body': "we totally get how this can be annoying! let's discuss this at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-02-28T13:16:58Z'}

title: The McDonalds app is a leader in the instant food ordering field
review: I really like how you can order and switch the restaurant seamlessly and that every information is available and easy to find in the app. It almost takes away the need to reach out to a lousy representative. I also really like how it is really innovative to compare to some other experiences. For instance, when you add a free item in your order from the rewards section, it is automatically added to the cart. No need to add the paid item from menu and having the free rewards applied. All in all, the value of the application is worth the McDonald‚Äôs massive brand.

title: Ok Experience
review:
Overall, I‚Äôm a fan of this app, the rewards program and the deals. Recently however, my wife was coming back from an appointment, so I told her I‚Äôd put an order thru from home. She got to the location, but when I tried to hit ‚ÄòI‚Äôm already Here‚Äô, it said that I wasn‚Äôt, and wouldn‚Äôt let me put in her parking space. I could this to be very inconvenient - we are always putting orders in for each other when one of us is driving - Starbucks is a great example of an app that lets you do this‚Ä¶not sure why McDonald‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt. 

Long story short, she had to get in the very long drive-thru line all because the app wouldn‚Äôt let me trigger the order - seems unnecessary

title: It is Final Getting Better Too Little Too Late
review: As someone who has used the app for the last 4 plus years this app is so behind on the competition. The fact that you can‚Äôt even add BBQ sauces to a burger yet still blows my mind. Also, why can‚Äôt you pay with a gift card on the app (unless it was added without me catching it). This app is part of the reason why McDonalds is seeing worse numbers each year and they really need to play catch up. The fact that Taco Bell can release an app and in record time beat McDonalds that had a few year advantage is just sad. The development team either needs to be re-worked or needs better leadership. Besides from that, decent app.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work anymore
review:
I‚Äôve used the app since it first came out. Then one day it wanted me to log in and it said they were having difficulty and to try later. I‚Äôve tried later for 3 months. The App has been deleted and downloaded many times. The tech team has been contacted 3 times with no success of fixing.  I have the most recent app on my phone and the McD‚Äôs app. Still no success. Very frustrating. I‚Äôm missed a lot of good deals! They need to fix this issue now!
****Months later and still not working. I contacted support AGAIN ( don‚Äôt know how many times now) and asked them to delete my account from their end and I‚Äôd try to download it again. So, they said they did. Still can‚Äôt connecting! This is a big problem. I‚Äôm very disappointed that support can‚Äôt fix this issue!

title: App quit working
review: I used to love the McDonalds app. It was great. I would pull into a mobile order spot, place my order and it would be delivered to my car. All without having to wait in the AWFUL drive-thru line, which is a WHOLE other ordeal. Two lines is not working for y‚Äôall! Getting stuck in the inside line and realizing you will not make it back to work on time is not an option for me, so I just avoid McDonalds altogether, unless of course there is no line. Anyway, the app has not worked in over a year. It won‚Äôt let me log in or create a new account.

title: Not always convenient, but still better than the drive thru
review:
Out of six restaurants that I‚Äôve used this mobile order with, only one didn‚Äôt have any  designated parking for picking up my order and I used the drive thru. I‚Äôm not sure if that restaurant is ever going to have a designated parking spot for pick up but I think every McDonalds that allows for this service should. 

This service is most convenient for me because I can sit and decide what I want to order ahead of time and pay when I‚Äôm ready to pick up. Most importantly, I don‚Äôt have to get out of my car!üòç It‚Äôs much more convenient that going in the drive thru and getting stuck in a slow moving line.

title: Too Many Glitches
review: I just want to begin by saying that I have had this app for a very long time, and granted being a fast food app, it was all very simple and easy to use. But over time their deals are getting worst and their app is becoming more complex to use for no reason. If I had written this review a while ago I would have given it 4-5 stars, but now it‚Äôs a solid 2, and here‚Äôs why, for example: when you open a coupon you‚Äôd like to use but at the end you don‚Äôt use it, you can‚Äôt open another coupon for an hour, EVEN IF YOU DIDNT USE IT! I think they should fix the glitch where you can‚Äôt use another coupon until the coupon has actually SCANNED. As well as, mobile ordering is just so difficult to use.

title: No improvement on drive through
review:
The problem with the app is that once the order is placed and paid for, they don‚Äôt assemble your order until you arrive. I was in the pick up area watching car after car come through, take the usual steps of placing the order, pay, and pick up while I sat, waiting to receive the same food that I had already paid for. This is an unnecessary step for most instances, and you would be better served driving through.

Update: changing from 2 stars to 1.  I should have read the reviews before trying this app, as so many others have already said what I did about the order not being ready when you arrive. This is the opposite of convenience and efficiency. It is an absolutely unnecessary app which delays your order instead of speeding up service. Deleting it now.

title: Not met my expectations
review: I was downloading the app and while it was downloading, I was reading some of the reviews. There were mostly bad reviews and how it used to be so much better. I didn‚Äôt really believe them. When I decided to use the app for the first time, it wasn‚Äôt good. It was really laggy and the menus were different than when I go in the store or drive through to order. Then it keeps on saying that there‚Äôs an error and wouldn‚Äôt let me pay. It was also really slow and took me thirty minutes just to place two items. It made it worse when it is really slow and you have to wait a long time. To use again, it would be a no. I hope you can see this and fix it. That would be great.

title: Changes to payment information
review: My previously stored info had expired and I was directed to delete it and add a new payment info. There is no option anywhere to delete the expired information. I tried adding another method of payment and the app would not accept it.   I ended up going in to go in to the store (which defeats the purpose of the mobile app). Somehow my food was ready. I asked for a receipt and when the manager attempted to provide me with it, she told me that it wasn‚Äôt paid for and the message on the register was that the app had told me to go inside to pay (which it did not).  It‚Äôs a good thing that I‚Äôm honest bc most people would have taken the food and left. I‚Äôve deleted and reinstalled the app with no luck. Seems to me that McDonald‚Äôs is a big enough entity that IT would not allow this to happen.  Thanks for your time.

title: Maybe it‚Äôs me, but
review:
I don‚Äôt mind the app at all. UI is pretty decent and straight forward until it comes time to pay.
The very first time I used this app, I did mobile ordering with no hiccups; even got a free item. Days later tried to order a meal and after adding meal to bag I have no clue how to see and confirm my order. The help section didn‚Äôt help much beyond that I have to check in before I pay. I don‚Äôt even see the option for checking in either whilst parked outside the restaurant. I don‚Äôt really understand why there wouldn‚Äôt be a section located in the app to confirm what you ordered even if I still had to a check in. This makes using the app frustrating.

title: Use to be great, aspects broken in newest update?
review: Use to use this all the time to go pick up mobile orders. However, ever since the update that introduced reward points, I can‚Äôt seem to do the mobile pick-up option anymore. I‚Äôll create the order, submit it, and then when I pull up to the restaurant, it says I‚Äôm not there yet. This has been a common issue in the past, but typically I can get around this by completely closing out of the app and then re-opening it. However, whenever I do that since the update, it makes it seem like the entire order never existed.  I‚Äôve tried this multiple times so it is not just a one off flick either.

title: Pure stupidity holds this app back
review: The fact that when you want to submit feedback within the app, it asks you to choose the app version, and no current versions are even included, should tell you what a lack of attention the developers put into this app! Navigation has improved some but is still a pain. The app frequently has problems with ordering, such as claiming that Big Macs and Chicken McNuggets are "items not available for purchase," (WHAT!?!?!) forcing me to wait for service inside. Last month the app said that the coupon I chose had expired (untrue and how would I have been able to select it then??). The best is when the restaurant is closed and yet still lets you order food. Genius idea.

title: Let me use a gosh-darn password
review: My phone will not let me re-install app - this is key - I cannot access McDonald‚Äôs app on phone because it will not install. so I thought I could just access the app w/ iPad. App installed but will not let me login because it will not let me enter my password. And no option to just use my password!! So tired of all this‚Ä¶. went back & forth w/ McDonald‚Äôs tech support about phone problem for several months - not going thru that again, worst support I have ever experienced. I AM DONE!!!!! title: Poor Navigation
review: Compared to other fast food / restaurant apps, this one has a really unintuitive design, poor navigation features, and seems to jump to different pages often without prompting. Multiple times while trying to order and browse the menu it jumped to the page where you scan for points and the screen gets brighter for that page so it was spontaneously blinding me for no apparent reason. I did like how if you ordered things that were valid for an ongoing promotion that it would apply them to the promotion without you having to have selected anything (got a BOGO for $1 deal I didn‚Äôt even know about when ordering). Still too hard of an app to use for me to want to bother with it again.

title: Bugs, Glitches and Useless
review: The app launches too slow. When an order is fulfilled, the app stays on the page with the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here‚Äù button as if the order wasn‚Äôt fulfilled days after making the order and you have to go to Order Details to Cancel the Order before making a new order. Sometimes the app makes it seem as if the order wasn‚Äôt processed when it was processed as the money went out of the bank account. There‚Äôs no button to clear items in the basket. Everyone has made similar complaints. This app doesn‚Äôt deserve it‚Äôs 4.5 out of 5 rating and the UI is too much of a mess. It seems as if there was no user testing involved and no UX designer involved because it has severe useability problems.

title: Giving up
review: I give up on this app and on McD itself. For the second time random stuff is added to my order and I am charged for more than what I initially ordered. The worst part is that your receipt is altered as well so you can‚Äôt even prove you didn‚Äôt order whatever they claim you did. The app doesn‚Äôt even have a dispute section where I can try to solve things remotely. The first time it took me about an hour to solve the issue. Today, I had to go back and since the store is closed, I‚Äôm sitting here on the drive through hoping that they will believe me and solve the issue. It‚Äôs been 10 minutes since I got to the store and waiting to solve my problem. I haven‚Äôt even passed the order here microphone so I assume it will be a long day. Long story short, avoid this app like the plague.

title: Mobile orders disappear on McDonald‚Äôs end
review: The app is easy to use and I love the deals, but my orders aren‚Äôt always findable by the McDonald‚Äôs staff. This happened today. I waited in a realllly long line and got to the speaker, told them my mobile order#, and she said they couldn‚Äôt find it. I asked what to do because I already paid, and she said pull to the first window and it‚Äôll probably show up. So I do, and the employee sees that I did everything right, but it doesn‚Äôt show on his end. Okay, technology can be tough. But then he tells me I can‚Äôt order through him and would have to GET BACK IN LINE AND RE-PLACE MY ORDER. This is after I took the time to place the order in the app and waited in a line that was about 12 cars long. To me, that‚Äôs just unacceptable, and such a headache. So we went to the fast food restaurant next door. Just really disappointing.

title: Used to love it, now I HATE IT
review: When I first downloaded this app a few years ago it was great. Amazing discounts in the deals section and it offered such convenience of being able to order ahead. But for the past couple of years I haven‚Äôt been able to use it at all, to order ahead I mean. It won‚Äôt add my credit cards even though I know they are correct.  I‚Äôve tried several cards many times and they never ever work. Quite frankly I‚Äôm sick of it and I think most other customers are too. I‚Äôm not really sure how in the world this app has a five star rating. But I‚Äôm very unhappy with it!

title: Needs Improving
review: I have had the app for a while.  On more than one occasion, I would set up my order, either electing to pay with my added credit card or Apple Pay.  The app would say there was a problem, but not close out the order, so I would click to apply it to my payment options again.  I found repetitive withdrawal requests from my online bank which would then in a day show the reverse debit put back in my account.  I notified two stores of the problem but employees showed no concern.  Highly recommend a big fix.  Aside from that, the ability to advance order and select the store as well as where you would like to pick up is fantastic, as well as the coupons.

title: My review  ‚Ä¶ the same as my other family members views
review: Actually I love the deals but sometimes I don‚Äôt love the app. It‚Äôs reset my information it‚Äôs told me that I didn‚Äôt sign up one way and I had to sign up a different way because of it and then another time it went ahead and went allow me to go see my email it made me go through now Facebook which I did not sign up for to begin with I use my email. It‚Äôs a mixed up mess how it works but it does have good deals. I just wish it would get my information correct and stop screwing with me.

title: What is considered a deal?
review:
Honestly, this app used to be pretty good, but the deals have become useless to anyone who wants to use it. Having a buy one get one free allowed me to save enough money for it I would ever need it but what is the point of making it a buy one get one for a penny and then quickly raising it to 50 cents. 

Along with those deals you have the others where it‚Äôs $3 for a large cafe drink and you only save 26 cents or buying medium to large fries for a drink for 50 cents. That‚Äôs in no means a DEAL. It‚Äôs scamming people out of their money. 

The app is completely useless unless you want to ‚Äúskip the wait‚Äù buy using their app to order you will still have to wait as long as anyone else who ordered after or before you as they usually have incompetent staff who are usually idling or not even by the register to take orders. It‚Äôs sad.

title: Charges go through on my card, but not in McD‚Äôs system
review:
I‚Äôve had so much trouble with using the app at the McDonald‚Äôs closest to my workplace. I was charged twice for the same order once; when I registered this complaint with the app feedback option, all I was told was that I‚Äôd have to dispute the extra charge with my bank.

Yesterday, I completed an order, was shown the confirmation page that I‚Äôd paid on the app, but when I went in to get my food, the manager said she couldn‚Äôt see it in her system, so I was SOL. Even after showing her the confirmation and that I‚Äôd been charged on my online banking app.

I‚Äôll never use the app again; the coupons aren‚Äôt worth the risk of paying for food I‚Äôll never receive. And I‚Äôll probably never visit that store location again, despite it being convenient when I forget my lunch at home.

title: Buns limited choice
review: I allergies to sesame bread bun want switch to potato bun or artisan bun whatever they have. not on app lists I try one day no bun but turn out I got plate look like salad with beef without breads. want collect rewards and easy for me to order on app because I am deaf always have trouble with cashier about buns and drive Thur. so app should be easy for me to assemble I did call headquarters about that issues I always go to McDonald‚Äôs than others to add the choices different buns that was couples months ago last year ago so don‚Äôt see it updates yet. is it taking forever?  Want choice buns on apps. Definitely will use app more

title: Mask police
review: I used the mobile order app and couldn‚Äôt park in the pick up space because I was driving a truck and trailer. I went inside to let the person at the counter know I was going to be outside the door and was immediately yelled at because I didn‚Äôt have a mask on. I tried to explain that I can‚Äôt wear one and the manager shoved a box of them in my face! As I tried to explain that I‚Äôd be outside, she asked me to leave, which was my intention. She needs to lighten up! Other than this, I‚Äôve always had good experiences using the mobile app! I won‚Äôt be hindered!

title: This app is total waste of time.  Keep ur free what evers I'm going to Chick Fil A
review: This app is toral waste of time.  I used it once on waited forever and ever and ever for my food while I saw car after car after car oder drive around and drive off.  The 2nd time I went to use my free big mac reward and they charged me for it and brought out coke and fries.  3rd noone eve brought my food.  I think they do this on purpose to try to get younin to buy more stuff.  This apps is terrible guys.  Just check how many parking spots they have for mobile orders!  There is two at both my locations and people sit and eat there.  McDonalds has bombed this mobile app order and park.  Start from scratch mcdonalds.  I'll tell you what. title: Ridiculous!
review:
The ease of use of the app is great and ordering is easy as well as making your payment much like other restaurant apps. 

I mainly have one complaint and that is that I should be able to use my rewards points as I wish! why am I limited to certain items I can use my points on? and why can‚Äôt I use all my points at once?  It makes no sense. I understand limiting your deals to one per order but it makes no sense to block users from freely using the rewards points as they may please. 

I feel this should change and hope it does as now I am resorting to making one item orders and driving through two or three times as I can only use my reward points once per order!!! Yet they will let me make three orders within minutes of each other ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. 

Aside from that this app is a good tool to get your food quicker when you are in a rush and a good way to build reward points where you would other wise just be spending money with no rewards.

title: Can‚Äôt login after version update
review:
Until this error popped up I would have given 5 stars, but due to this login error I‚Äôm only giving 3 as it has caused me quite a bit of frustration! I‚Äôve used the app almost daily for quite some time but after a recent update the app will no longer allow me to login. It continuously says to check my internet connection and try again. I‚Äôve tried my Google login as well but that presents a dcs error. I‚Äôve tried to login daily every day this past week with no success so I‚Äôve lost all of the rewards points I would have earned. I tried updating to v7.1.2 but that didn‚Äôt help and I am still unable to login
R/
Mark J
developerResponse: {'id': 28410157, 'body': "uninstall and reinstall the app. if it doesn't help let's talk more in detail here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-03-06T23:48:09Z'}

title: Can‚Äôt login
review:
Update: So, I received a reply email when I submitted a request to McDonald‚Äôs for help logging in. Basically, they told me to do everything I already have tried to get logged in. I click the link in the email ON THE DEVICE THE APP IS LOADED ON (which is what the email told me to do) and am directed to the exact same page where there is no additional link to click on to log in. I would prefer if they would just go back to having you put in a password.

I have been trying to login for 15 minutes. I put in my email & McDonald‚Äôs sends me a link. When I click on the login link in the email, it opens a page on the internet that tells me I‚Äôm ‚Äú almost there‚Äù and to click the login button on my phone. Problem is, there is no login in button! Very frustrating.

title: Geo location restrictions a pain
review: My senior, predominantly Spanish speaking parents have the hardest time understanding how this app works and try to ask me to order for them but there is absolutely no way to do that since it has to be their phone and you have to press a bunch of options once you get to the location just to start the process. Other fast food apps make it much easier. Not sure how McD‚Äôs thinks they are being ‚Äúsafe‚Äù or protecting customers with this feature. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs solely to prevent customers from sharing accounts and accumulating rewards or something. Often have to wait 10 minutes even when I get to a location when I‚Äôve ordered and checked in so it only saves the time of waiting in the drive thru or not getting out of the car.

title: It was great‚Ä¶ For the first two weeks‚Ä¶
review: If I'm being honest the app matches perfectly with the quality and service I get from one of my local McDonald‚Äôs...NONE! When I first got it was AMAZING!! Especially since it allowed me to avoid dealing with the rude employees and ensure I could order the food we want without the customary "We're ALL out" or "Machines broken"! My family actually started going to McDs often again! And then the app started not allowing me to order breakfast in the am or lunch/dinner in pm. Time I try to order or use a reward dad and dad as far as I know Headstart and serving breakfast options all day! Insurance updated uninstalled yes and now can‚Äôt even use the drive-through which is why I finally decided to write it please fix!!

title: Such Potential‚Ä¶..
review: It has such potential to be great if it would actually work. It‚Äôs extremely annoying when you click the app and have to enter your email so it could send you a link for you to click on for the app. Such foolishness. The link sent to your email for you to log in to the app that‚Äôs already on your electronic NEVER works!!!!!!!! Unnecessary steps.. There‚Äôs NO way to add a receipt later and absolutely nothing the location can do. On top of that, you‚Äôre trying to do all this while cars are in front of you, behind you, and you‚Äôre at the window ordering! All I wanna do is effortlessly open the app that‚Äôs saved on my phone, select the deals, give the location the 4 digit number, collect points, redeem deals, and enjoy my food! Please correct the problem‚Ä¶.

title: Moderately good app, before/during COVID
review: The biggest plus for the McD app is the ability to customise, reducing single point of failure to any staff who prep the food.  The card save and Apple/Google Pay options are a good set in the nice-to-have category.  The biggest minus is the auto-tracking in the app:  location reset upon opening (even if you want to order from the most recent restaurant visited); override to ignore locations with all-day breakfast menus; and power drain, even after closing the app (resulting in persistent need to power-cycle the device).  Still, overall, this app is better than most offered from fast food competitors, IMHO.

title: By far the worst experience I‚Äôve had at McDonald‚Äôs.
review: I did a mobile order before I came in to the restaurant.  My number was 1647.  I came in ordered some more food when I got in the restaurant order number 149.  I got order 149 before I got order number 1647.  Normally this wouldn‚Äôt have me disappointed, but I sat there for another 5-10 minutes waiting for my mobile order and didn‚Äôt get it till I walked back to the counter & told them that I was still waiting on my order.  The young lady turned around & put my items in a bag rather quickly.
developerResponse: {'id': 13650801, 'body': "We're really sorry you were disappointed! Can you provide some more info in this link https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/ so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-02-23T16:12:21Z'}

title: Napkins and Ketchup
review:
I REALLY wish the app had the option to add ketchup or extra ketchup and the option to get napkins or extra napkins. 

I just ordered and got 1 single napkin. I had a chicken sandwich and fries. One napkin isn‚Äôt enough! 

AND. When ordering fries there is NO option to ask for ketchup with it! 

With my sand which, there was no way to ask for ketchup on the side to add on the sandwich myself or to use with my fries.

When my order was brought to me via curbside pickup, the girl did NOT ask if I needed extra ketchup or napkins or even wait and ask if everything was ok or if I needed anything else!

I went into the store and everyone had their backs turn and I ended up having to raise my voice to get the workers‚Äô attention to even ask for more ketchup and napkins! This happens every single time I get curbside pickup and it‚Äôs super frustrating.

Please, add the option to ask for extra condiments and napkins to the order through the app. I can‚Äôt be the only one with this experience and frustration.
developerResponse: {'id': 16146396, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Erin. We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks.", 'modified': '2020-06-22T14:08:49Z'}

title: App faulty, Cashier doesn‚Äôt care to honor deals anyways.
review:
The McDonalds app opens fine and I connected an account to use for a deal, but not only did the deal pop up without working for the time (the terms mentioned no specific times), it also auto-ran the voucher for one deal per 60 minutes and timed out the coupon.

Cashier at West Washington location in LA does not care if you get food at a fair price, they don‚Äôt wear gloves, and they will not help with deciphering the broken app. I should have recognized from the 1st moment that McD‚Äôs wants to scam and price gouge by taking screenshots, but I‚Äôll probably just never come back nor use the app until desperation strikes again. Terrible app, experience, and location altogether. Gave no extra ice, and only gave one grape jelly for a giant biscuit with no sauce offerings/alternatives. The chicken biscuit was as expected though.
developerResponse: {'id': 15576593, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had, [NAME]. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-05-26T15:12:10Z'}

title: Mc Donald‚Äôs Customer Service is the WORST!!!
review: I‚Äôve been a loyal customer all my life. My app haven‚Äôt worked for months since doing an update. Support continue to defuse to help me. To the point I‚Äôve even took a trip to the headquarters in Chicago, still no help. I was told at one point my account was locked out by one rep. The app support supervisor was absolutely horrible to me on the phone. I‚Äôve been told multiple times my issue will be addressed and still nothing. I have no faith in this company doing right by their customers. Just as sure I know this complaint will fall on deaf ears. I would rate this app 0 stars if I could.

title: Completely useless for me
review:
Every time I try to place a mobile order, the app always has connectivity issues and by the time it connects I‚Äôm already at the drive-thru and end up ordering the traditional way. 

If by the off chance it does connect early enough, it tells me that my McDonald‚Äôs location won‚Äôt receive the order until I check in; this completely defeats the purpose of a mobile order. You can‚Äôt check-in until you‚Äôre physically at the location, therefore, you can‚Äôt order early and have the food ready and waiting for you to walk in, pick it up, and walk out. I don‚Äôt want to order from my phone, walk into the restaurant and still wait. 

The advantage of a mobile order is the ability to skip the line when ordered early enough. Other fast food restaurants do this with ease.

title: Please fix location switch
review:
Love the app, and ordering breakfast from home. The problem comes when I pass other McD‚Äôs on the way to work. The app switches the order to the mid commute location and even though I still arrive and pay at the intended location the order gets lost, app sends Thanks email, card gets charged and it shows my order has been delivered......but I get no breakfast, and the restaurant has no record of the order. 

The drive-through pickup option will hang/freeze the app as well.

So far my solution is to not finalize my order until I am in the parking lot.

title: Worst Experience EVER
review:
I could not be more displeased with this service. The app gives zero explanation of what happens next, upon submitting order. When I would toggle between different features within the app - I would see that my order had been submitted or had no been submitted. Then, it did not pick up that I was nearby, so I had to use the ‚Äúalready here‚Äù button. I entered my curbside number, only to wait 24 minutes. NOT KIDDING. 

I finally got a notification. thanking me for ordering, stating my order had been collected 8 minutes prior. Alas, I hauled my family of 5 into the restaurant, only to wait in line and see them packing our meal as we waited. A total of 28 minutes elapsed. Either don‚Äôt give this feature to stores that cannot handle it, or figure out how to make the process seamless. I will not be giving this another shot.
developerResponse: {'id': 9519486, 'body': "That's not what we like to hear, friend! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-07-05T18:46:58Z'}

title: Commendation
review:
I cannot express my gratitude to all the employees at the South Riding, VA., and the Purcellville, VA. locations. The food is consistently great, and the service is sincere and respectful. I especially enjoy going to the South Riding location. üòÑüòÑ
The only thing I would suggest is that all McDonald‚Äôs Nationwide have foot door plates( to pull doors open instead of having to use the handle that all original doors are installed with. The foot plate‚Äôs are much more sanitary moving forward; especially in the restaurant industry. Thanks so much for taking the time to ask the opinions of your customers. Sincerest thanks, Laura M. Patton, Aldie, VA.

title: Would Give 0 Stars if Possible
review:
I am trying to download this app onto an iPad and cannot set up my account. It keeps telling me to confirm my email address, but when I click the link in the email, nothing happens. I cannot log in and take advantage of the coupons available. I do not own a smartphone, and if this app only works on phones, then that is obscenely ridiculous.
Moreover, the whole thing is so glitchy that it comes across as sketchy. Is our information even safe on this app?
Why can‚Äôt you set up an account through a browser like at Chick-Fil-A or Starbucks? I do not need a mobile device to get deals. I can print them out the old fashioned way.
Please make this app more accessible and more functional. As this app stands, you are ignoring part of your consumer base, when the solution cannot be terribly hard to implement.

title: This app is almost pointless now..
review: This app used to be amazing! The deals were great, the changing variety of deals were consistent. They used to always have $1-2 off your meal coupons if you spent 7 or 8 dollars. Now, it‚Äôs sad. While offering a second sandwich for 50 cents is a deal, I never have a need for a second Big Mac. The deals pretty much never change. On top of this again the prices have raised because McDonalds wanted to try and glam themselves up and pretend as if they are this upscale food joint. I don‚Äôt like paying for overpriced fast food that is mediocre, only to have it made wrong practically every single time and to be cross examined when I confronting a worker about their mistake. I miss the good old days when McDonald‚Äôs was simple, and wasn‚Äôt trying to rebrand themselves when so many loved them for who they were originally.

title: Worst Fast Food App
review:
I hate using this app. Firstly, the search is terrible. You must type everything perfectly, or it won‚Äôt find what you want. If you put in ‚Äúchicken nugget‚Äù, it won‚Äôt find any results. You must type ‚ÄúMcNugget‚Äù. ‚ÄúHashbrown‚Äù doesn‚Äôt work, but ‚Äúhash brown‚Äù does. It‚Äôs not at all intuitive.

Then, once you add an item to your order, a yellow ribbon offering to take you to checkout covers the search bar. You can‚Äôt swipe it away, because if you touch it at all, it takes you to checkout. And it‚Äôs actually faster to go to checkout and hit the back arrow than it is to wait for the yellow ribbon to disappear. It takes a long time to just go away. 

Lastly, the app has technical difficulties all the time. I get McDonald‚Äôs maybe twice a month, and the frequency of these issues bothers me. On my most recent trip, I selected payment, told the app I was ‚Äúhere‚Äù, entered my curbside order, and was told it was having issues and to go in and show the cashier my order number. Very frustrating with kids and a dog in the car. I had to wait in a long line only for them to tell me they couldn‚Äôt see my order or tell me if my card was charged. 

Please, please review other restaurants‚Äô apps and make some changes.
developerResponse: {'id': 5797267, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2018-11-04T23:21:19Z'}

title: Mobile App Makes Life Hard
review: I‚Äôve been a mobile app user for awhile because of the coupons. Now, most useful coupons are available only if you order and pay with the mobile app. That would be fine except the mobile order function and the coupon function are not very compatible. The menu is scattered and you have to toggle between menu categories if you‚Äôre not ordering Meal Deals. After putting all menu items in your bag it‚Äôs difficult to get the coupon applied. At least it was for me. Makes me feel foolish for working so hard and spending so much time for a $2.00 discount. On top of the long wait, they didn‚Äôt give me the fries. When I did get them, they were under cooked and cold. I‚Äôm done with the app. It makes me feel silly and cheap.

title: Bring back the non-mobile order deals and I‚Äôll bring back 5 Stars.
review: The app works fine enough but frankly it‚Äôs ridiculous that McDonalds has essentially forced you to do mobile ordering to get al of the deals anymore that used to be so great. I used to go to McDs at least once a week cause of the good deals but I won‚Äôt use the mobile ordering as I‚Äôve tried to do it three times and all three times my order was wrong. If they do not bring back the standard deals, I‚Äôll be deleting this app. The only reason why this is not a 1-Star review is because the app still is functional for everything else, but I still feel like this became a bait and switch.

title: Not working on iOS 12.5.5
review:
Hi! I had been using the McDonald‚Äôs app just fine on my iPhone 6 with iOS 12.5.5 installed (which is the latest OS available for iPhone 6).

The app then started to ask to upgrade it which made the app almost unusable but at least I still could retrieve 4-digit codes to scan at the mobile kiosks.

However, starting from the mid-October 2022, the app now says: ‚ÄúPlease, check your Internet connection‚Äù, when in fact the Internet connection is perfectly fine: both, the cellular and the Wi-Fi. Feels like someone from the app development team made the app permanently offline.

Could you fix this please? It‚Äôs a food order app: there‚Äôs nothing in its functionality and technology that an iPhone 6 couldn‚Äôt deal with: no intense 3D graphics, no machine learning, no Face ID required to make McDonald‚Äôs customers keep using the app.

UPD: On October 18th, 2022 you suggested to uninstall and reinstall the app. Uninstalled and reinstalled the app ‚Äì and that didn‚Äôt work unfortunately. Every time I try to Sign In, after entering the email and clicking ‚ÄòContinue‚Äô the app says: ‚ÄòSorry, that didn‚Äôt work. Confirm your Internet connection and retry.‚Äô

Thanks!

title: Awful Lynn ma location
review: I ordered online for pickup through the app and they still got order wrong because they were to lazy to grab 1 sauce on the app it told me to choose 3 sauces I chose 1 bbq 2 sweet and sour and on the order and on receipt it says 10pc under that 1 bbq under that 2 swt sour so they had to read over the barbecue to see that it said sweet and sour barbecue wasn‚Äôt at bottom of list they read it , know what they did have me 3 sweet and sour and I know they weren‚Äôt out of anything they‚Äôd be out of sweet and sour no one uses barbecue they just didn‚Äôt want to take one extra step and reach into the box over and grab one sauce , I know it‚Äôs just a sauce but why why he so lazy for like 15$ an hour and it probably has nothing to do with it but the whole staff and kitchen don‚Äôt speak English they were all foreign

title: Add this Feature please
review: App is great but they don‚Äôt let you use it to its full potential. The great thing about mobile ordering is that friends can place orders, pay for themselves and have one person pick them all up. But McDonalds likes to see your location at the restaurant before making it. These makes the process of picking up orders not made on your phone just take too long. So maybe add a button that says someone else is picking it up and not track that phone but have them say the person Is there ready to get it to make the process smoother. Hope to see this fixed.

title: Horrible app!
review:
Firstly, this app won‚Äôt let you order in advance. This app track your location, You can‚Äôt actually submit the order until you are physically in Macdonald, that is just stupid! Why even create this app if we can‚Äôt order a head of time.

Secondly, the recent update broken Apple Pay. My apple play orders won‚Äôt go through anymore? Had to use another payment method to work around. This was caused by recent update. The worst part is the app required me to update after I submit the order half way, why not tell me before I submit the order initially??? 

Menu is always a mess, hard to find things,

Reorder your last order won‚Äôt include the deals last time, you would have to add your deals all over again‚Ä¶ what‚Äôs the point for reorder‚Ä¶..

Deal and your reward points cannot be use together. So your saved up points are like just a gimmick.

After all, I really hate this app. It‚Äôs the worst fast food app I have ever use. Buggy and serious design issue‚Ä¶ 

Wherever design this app needs to rethink from a customer‚Äôs perspective. We try using apps to save time, not wasting more time to use the app in Macdonald parking lot.  Absolutely hate it!

title: Waste of time
review: Don‚Äôt waste your time with this app. After repeatably being asked by the drive thru order taker if I had the app I downloaded it. Supposedly I can get .99 cent coffee once a day thru 2022. Never the case and it varies by store. You will get a message not available at this store. I have accumulated over 10k in points in just a little over a month and they are worthless. It is always the points not available for the item during peak times such as breakfast I can‚Äôt use the points for a breakfast item. Bottom line all you are doing is taking someone‚Äôs job by placing your own orders without any benefits for you. Hey McDonalds Let someone use their points whenever they want and make deals available at every location the same. Take some clues from the Eat-Mor-Chikin place.
developerResponse: {'id': 29057038, 'body': 'we aim to make the best app we can for you. help us get there by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-04-08T15:54:06Z'}

title: Used to be good
review:
App was simple and offered great deals years ago, but now is complicated, signs you out periodically, and then makes it difficult to sign in.

I clicked sign in with email, entered my email address, then went to my computer to check my mail and click the ‚ÄúLog In‚Äù button. It took me to a page that said to go back to my app, which i did, but it hadn‚Äôt logged me in. Instead I get a recursive process of being asked for my email address again. What a stupid system when it could just have me enter a password like every other app, or at least work when I click ‚Äúlog in‚Äù from the email that was sent.

Eventually I figured out you MUST use the same phone the app is on to open your email and click ‚ÄúLog In‚Äù. That isn‚Äôt explained at all.
