title: APP STOLE MY MONEY. THIS APP IS GARBAGE
review: I ordered as i drove in to the parking lot, the app said ‚Äúweve got your order‚Äù but the drive thru was blocked by a shipment truck, and all the curbside stalls were blocked by cones indicating they didnt want anyone to park there. So i got out of my car and all the doors were locked even tho there were people inside. The next day i check my bank and i was charged for food i didnt get. So i used the app and sent an email and it said ‚Äúwe got your email someone will get back to you‚Äù or something like that. I waited 10 days and no response from mcdonalds app guys. 33 billion dollar company been doing the same thing for 67 years and couldnt even get it right. What are you guys doing with the money youre making and havent you learned the process of taking an order and making the food?
developerResponse: {'id': 27520122, 'body': "that's never how we want your visit with us to go. let's get right to the bottom of this by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html   \r\n", 'modified': '2022-01-18T18:51:08Z'}

title: Won‚Äôt let me order breakfast?
review: I haven‚Äôt had any issues out of the app other than the fact that it will not let me order breakfast, my significant other was able to order breakfast.  it could be WELL before 10 o‚Äôclock and it would show that it‚Äôs serving lunch. And then if I change it to the breakfast menu , it would say ‚Äúuntil 10:29‚Äù but I could be placing the order at 8-9 am? Once I pick all the items and ready to check out it says my whole order is ‚Äúunavailable at this time‚Äù and I‚Äôve ordered breakfast before it‚Äôs been updated a few times before. It‚Äôs just odd that I can pull up to the restaurant and the breakfast menu still up and I‚Äôm unable to order breakfast on the app like I used to. At 9 am.

title: Horrible update.
review:
I used to like using this app. But a couple months ago they updated it. Not only is everything impossible to find and they are literally continuously move everything around, but load times are a joke.
So imagine trying to use this app in line or drive thru and every time you open this app it‚Äôs different. And then you try to actually load a deal and it takes so long and you end up just paying full price. Even though you‚Äôre on the Macdonald‚Äôs WiFi standing right in front of register. 
The frustration with this app has actually made me essentially stop going to McDonald‚Äôs. That and the wait times are always ridiculous at every single location. 
Terrible app. Embarrassing how much they are pushing it, and how badly is does not work.

title: App has a deadly loop
review: Since the new rewards program splash sequence debuted, the app is stuck in a deadly loop. I have to swipe the program closed and try multiple times to click a menu button at the bottom QUICKLY before the splash screen takes over and I have no way to escape. I‚Äôve tried deleting and reinstalling. Despite multiple orders a week, I still have no rewards points. I have reported this glitch at least twice, and I would think a company as large as McD would have a programmer who would test a product before it‚Äôs released (this is a BIG GLITCH) and surely could fix it quickly when it‚Äôs reported by MANY people? Seriously, we deserve rewards having to do the programmers‚Äô work and for dealing with this glitchy app and still staying loyal as a customer.

title: Breakfast mobile ordering doesn‚Äôt ever work and gives incorrect error messages
review:
Every time you select breakfast items, it says all of the items are ‚Äúunavailable at this time of day‚Äù even when you‚Äôre within the frame of time shown at the top of the screen for breakfast. This morning I tried to order breakfast stuff at 9:29am. The app said breakfast lasts until 10:30am, so why am I getting the ‚Äúunavailable at this time of day‚Äù error? This has been an issue for months that I thought would get fixed eventually. No amount of signing out and signing back in or deleting and reinstalling the app has fixed it. This is an issue on the developers‚Äô end that I can‚Äôt fix. 

The most bizarre thing is that it ONLY happens with breakfast. Lunch or dinner works totally fine.

title: App Stopped Working
review: I used this app for a long time, until about a month ago when it did an update and now it will no longer work. I keep getting a message saying ‚ÄúApplication Initialization critical error occurred. Please restart the app.‚Äù  I‚Äôve restarted it too many times to count. I‚Äôve deleted the app multiple times. I reached out to mobile support through the website, described the issue, how I‚Äôve deleted the app multiple times and still get the same message, only to receive a response from mobile development telling me to delete the app and try again. I don‚Äôt know if whatever update they did has caused this or if the mobile development team doesn‚Äôt know how to fix it, but it‚Äôs deterring me from going to any McDonald's. They really need to figure this out.

title: Impatient
review: This app is so annoying!  It needs to update all the time. Monday at home I opened it to see the deals. It had one I liked. I drive to the restaurant. Opened the app again while waiting on line to order at the drive thru. It forced me to update!  Duh!  I ordered and paid by the time the update completed and missed the deal. Now only a little over 24 hrs later I went to the App Store to leave the feedback. It has another update! McD‚Äôs come on!  You don‚Äôt need to update the app to change the deals. My weather apps don‚Äôt force me to update the app when the forecast changes. What are you doing????
developerResponse: {'id': 8065033, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-04-04T18:56:30Z'}

title: App malfunction
review: I have been trying for months to make an account on this app and it will not let me!! I have called the customer support over and over and they pass it on to the next person and never resolve my problem. I have deleted and re-downloaded it so many times! I‚Äôve deleted my back up and wiped the apps data and it still will not let me even sign up to make an account. How hard is it to get a stupid McDonald‚Äôs app to work!! Beyond frustrated. App always says installation initialization critical error. Login cancelled. Technical difficulties, try back later. Well it‚Äôs been like an entire year and I STILL DO NOT HAVE AN ACCOUNT!! Like can McDonald‚Äôs get it together? I know this app works perfectly for everyone else I know!! Am I seriously the only one with this problem? So disappointing.

title: The Problem Isn‚Äôt The App
review: The technical side of the app is fine. It‚Äôs easy to navigate and order. What I‚Äôve discovered is the app is only as good as the franchise you visit.  At the location closest to work I quickly discovered that the curbside option meant - we will get out if and when the spirit moves us.  The drive thru pick up option went horribly awry at two different locations.  I was strictly a pick up inside guy but a recent trip resulted in the manager insisting my order didn‚Äôt exist.  My credit card statement said otherwise. I should say that I had more positive experiences than bad but there have been enough bad ones that I‚Äôve given up.  This may not be a nationwide issue. Perhaps it‚Äôs a Miami issue but I‚Äôm done.
developerResponse: {'id': 20760167, 'body': "We're not happy with that. Let us get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-01-31T16:50:17Z'}

title: Simplify order completion
review: It‚Äôs ridiculous that McDonald‚Äôs breakfast is cut off at 10:30am sharp, sometimes minutes early. The convenience of a mobile app would help greatly, but the checkout/completion of the order makes no sense. WHY WOULD THE ORDER NOT BE COMPLETED OR PLACED UNTIL I ARRIVE AT THE RESTAURANT?? It defeats the purpose of the app, frustrates and disappointed customers. Then of course, NO employee will try to accommodate or help with the matter. The employee saw my order had been placed, but no one made the food and then after 10:30am came around I was told the items are no longer available and invalid. EVEN THOUGH I ORDERED BEFORE 10:30AM! This makes ZERO SENSE McDonald‚Äôs.
developerResponse: {'id': 19096093, 'body': "That's not awesome to hear. Let's get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2020-11-13T16:48:42Z'}

title: Reward and Deals
review: I tried to use the App last week and I received the message that I could not use the App and that I will need update the App. I updated the App and after the update finish installing, I lost my three McCafe Rewards that I had on the app prior to the update, which I am not happy about. I also now is having trouble trying to use the Deals on the App. I keep getting the message that I will have to wait 59 minutes to use the deal and to come back after 59 minutes. Please explain to me why I am getting this message I have not used the Deals on the App. I did not start having these issues until I installed the update last week.

title: Allows for customization but doesn‚Äôt have standard menu items
review: I love ordering from apps, especially from McDonald‚Äôs as I don‚Äôt typically like their ‚Äústyle.‚Äù I don‚Äôt want ketchup or mustard and prefer lettuce and tomato, so finally I am able to customize it through the app without shouting through the mic 10 times only to have the person get it wrong anyway (<- take note this is an extra step that deters me from going to your restaurant more often). I also have kids so I need to be able to order for the whole family. So why do you only have 4 piece chicken nugget and HAMBURGER (without the option of adding cheese)? Unfortunately my hangry children only eat cheeseburgers or 6 piece nugget happy meals. So my love for this app turned into genuine hate. Why give a mom such false hope?
developerResponse: {'id': 10114189, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out! Please contact our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so they can help you answer any questions you're having with the McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2019-08-11T22:35:42Z'}

title: Review
review:
The app is nice, I use it every day to mobile order a chocolate chip frappe!! So I love getting one free after 5 purchases because they are delicious!!! 
However sometimes the app won‚Äôt load deals and I have connectivity issues! The staff at my local McDonald‚Äôs say that it happens with a lot of their customers. So I assume it is not just me. 

Also in regards to a mobile order, I don‚Äôt like that I have to check in to the location in order for them to even start making my meal and/or frappe. 
I understand that there is probably a reason that the order can not be made until I am on site, but the whole reason I use the mobile order option is because I don‚Äôt want to wait in line. Often times I So when I do a mobile order, I still have to wait as long as I do if I was actually in the drive through or in the store. 
I would really like it if the order was ready when I got there. 
Other than that. I enjoy the app! And I love the coupons!!! 
I hope that this feedback helps make any improvements! 

Thanks

title: Glitchy
review:
This app has always been glitchy, and each update offers a different variety of glitches. The current glitch does not recognize that you‚Äôve already picked up your order, so the next time you go to place a mobile order, the screen is still stuck on your last order. Force closing does not fix it. 

Certain items can‚Äôt be found on the app, like the 2 for $5 deals. You have to know what‚Äôs on the 2 for $5 list and put it in the cart, and then it will calculate the discount. 

It‚Äôs just clunky and annoying. Sometimes it‚Äôs convenient to use the app. Also considering the fact that the mobile ‚Äúdeals‚Äù aren‚Äôt as spectacular as they used to be, I‚Äôm not so impressed.
developerResponse: {'id': 3775718, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-07-01T23:25:07Z'}

title: Good start, needs a few considerations to get better
review:
Deals are great.  App is nicely made out and if you want to pay by card you have it made.  However a few problems leave me from rating this better then mediocre.

1.  I went to McDonald‚Äôs after ordering one day and it wouldn‚Äôt let me check in.  The app kept saying I wasn‚Äôt at the McDonald‚Äôs and I had locations services on and everything.  I went to order details and checked what McDonald‚Äôs I chose and it was correct.  Google maps had me
Right at that McDonald‚Äôs.  40 minutes later even with order number they couldn‚Äôt find it.   Finally out of no where all of a sudden I could check in. Spent 40 minutes fighting for an order and not even a thank you. You should give an option to force a order into check in so these kinds of problems don‚Äôt happen.  

2. For drive through or going in is it really that hard to let people pay cash??  Not ever body has a bank and or credit card.  Taco Bell lets you do I don‚Äôt see why you guys can‚Äôt.  

These two options being added would make it a 5 star app for me.

title: Best Segue into ad ever
review:
so i was at this mcdonald‚Äôs right, and there this guy named paul. already you‚Äôre thinking ‚Äúpaul what a cool guy.‚Äù but wait there more. so i got fries and frappe right and a punch card fell out of my wallet okay and then paul, very sneakily, was like ‚ÄúOH BOI i see you have a punch card there.... BUT DID YOU KNOW that if you download the mcdonald‚Äôs app you get your very own punch card.‚Äù and i was like wow what commitment paul has into manning me download this app. and so i did only because paul is wonderful at advertising. any questions? nah i didn‚Äôt think so. so good on you paul for making me download the app...
i‚Äôm impressed. 

side note: i have never opened the app

title: App issues
review: I have not used this app more than 1 month and having some issues with it. It is not tracking the last 3 frappes that I‚Äôve ordered and wanted to put towards my 5 frappes to a free Frappe. I already would‚Äôve had 5 frappes purchased and it still hasn‚Äôt recorded my last two frappes. So it says I still have 2 more to purchase even though I already should be to my free Frappe now. I have the receipts for proof of purchase and I‚Äôve tried contacting the app team through the app two times. No one has contacted me as of this point. And nothing has been fixed or credited. I‚Äôm disappointed in this. I truly hope someone will fix this issue for me so that I can give a better rating and be a happy customer.
developerResponse: {'id': 7937083, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-03-27T18:56:11Z'}

title: App works but stores don‚Äôt
review:
Okay so I have been to McDonalds at some point or another all of my life and when I heard about the app, i was excited.

The app works for the most part, I have never experienced any problems with it at all, in fact I do like they have options to customize where ordering it at the location, employees get annoyed 9 times out of 10. But then you get to the actual stores need to get their act together with this when it comes to customer pick up. Biggest problem I‚Äôve found is curbside pick up. 

There are three stores near me in a ten mile radius. Two out of three stores either don‚Äôt know how it works or they need more training. The store by my work does fine. but the other two don‚Äôt, I had one store double charge me with no promise of a return (which I took up with the manager), the second I ordered from twice, both times it was over fifteen minutes before I walked in and wondered what happened. 

So my advice to McDonalds would be to retrain stores or, maybe add a tracker like Dominos where you can track progress of your order while you wait.

title: Save tons of $
review: I typically love this app, as I take advantage of all the great deals that they TYPICALLY HAVE. Emphasis on typically. Recently they decided to do a reward/game thing where you only have a 1 in 3 chance of getting the best reward of that day, and the rest are the normal, basics deals that don‚Äôt stand out. This game has ruined the deals. Now all the deals are less than sub par and even when you win the game for the best deal of the day, it‚Äôs still not a good deal. Today I won the poppable game and the reward was the same as the deal already in the app... 1$ off a large mcafe. Bring back the buy any biscuitget a mcafe free or the truly good deals. I haven‚Äôt been going to McDonald‚Äôs much at all this month because of the way the deals are lacking .

Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2018-12-03T18:16:49Z'}

title: Your app is a joke
review: Your app is terrible ! There is no way to use coupons that I‚Äôve earned outside of the app, I can‚Äôt ‚Äú preorder‚Äù because I‚Äôve got to be in the proximity of the store and also I buy the frappes with your app and for some reason I can‚Äôt redeem my free one ? I can‚Äôt even find it. It‚Äôs like it doesn‚Äôt exist. The people you hire are a joke too. I freaking hate McDonald‚Äôs. I wait longer in my pick up  spot than I would in the drive thru. I‚Äôd rather go to Chic Fil A. Also in the ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù part of the app it is IMPOSSIBLE to actually fill it out because you can‚Äôt click anything. I took screenshots of my phone highlighting where I‚Äôm clicking but your app failing to select the option. Ridiculous. Deleting immediately. It‚Äôs really stingy of you all to only accept credit cards as a form of payment too for the app. That was strike one with me.

title: Great app, but could use improvements
review:
I use the McDonalds app frequently and I genuinely enjoy the experience. I‚Äôve had a few rare occasions where there is a disconnect between the app and the store. I was once charged more than what my total showed up on the app and staff couldn‚Äôt explain why. I was then blamed for using the app instead of coming inside and ordering.

It would also be nice if McDonalds allowed me to order and have my food ready when I showed up. McDonalds is the only food app that makes you check in when you arrive before they make your food. I use Taco Bell, Burger King and KFC and they all prepare my food as soon as I place my mobile order.
developerResponse: {'id': 32695673, 'body': "if there's every a price discrepancy, it's possible it can be either an app issue or a restaurant issue, but we'd need more info to look into it. you can send it to us here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-20T17:19:51Z'}

title: clueless manager
review: Ordered and paid online with app, received email from McD‚Äôs thanking me for order at 7:40. I questioned employee delivering food to car that arrived after me but not my order. I waited until until 7:58 to call inside, received no answer. I called a second time, spoke to mgr. Brandon, told him how long I had been waiting. Someone brought my order to me then. Sauces that I requested were left out of bag. Called store the third time, requested sauces again. Lady brought sauces to me. As I was waiting for sauces, I looked at my food again and saw that 20 nuggets ($5) were left out of my bag. I called the store for the fourth time and requested the nuggets that I ordered and paid for. I received all of my food at 8:03, 23 minutes after receiving the Thank You email from McDonald‚Äôs.  I‚Äôll never use the app again.  Brandon should not be left alone as manager.

title: Took my money but didn‚Äôt give me food or a refund
review:
McDonalds took my money and did not give me my food.  

I used the Mobile Order app for the first time, and ordered a meal for my family.  When I showed up, the doors at McDonals were locked, but drive through was opened.  I showed the drive through employee my order number, but they said they didn't have the order.  They confirmed it was the correct store (7337 Wooster Pike), but said the mobile system in the store is glitchy.  I have a receipt on my email verifying the store and order number, and that my credit card was charged.  I looked on the app for what to do to request a refund, and the app says to go to the store.  I asked the store for a refund, and they said there is nothing they can do, I have to use the app to contact someone, but they app tells me to go to the store, and does not have any other contact method.

I've been robbed.  McDonalds charged my credit card for a meal for my family they never provided, and even though I have a receipt they refuse to give me either the food, or a refund.

I don't know if the problem is with this specific McDonalds store, or the app as a whole.

title: It‚Äôs ok, but could be a lot better!
review: It‚Äôs nice that u can earn points, then redeem them for free items. The problem is, u can only get one free item, per order. Also, if u decide to use ur points to redeem a free item, u can‚Äôt take advantage of any other promotions in the app. It‚Äôs kinda frugal, on McDonald‚Äôs part. The Burger King app, is so much better. U can take use all the promotions codes u want, in a single order. I have used 6 or 7 deal codes in a single order, numerous times, without having any problems. As opposed to the McDonald‚Äôs app, where as soon as u add a single promotion to ur order, or u use ur reward points towards an item, they will automatically lock u out of using ur points, as well as every other promotion for 60 minutes.
developerResponse: {'id': 30428186, 'body': "that'd be insane...but we haven't put that trick into play! ü§ó ", 'modified': '2022-06-18T16:50:00Z'}

title: If you want your food, don‚Äôt get this app
review: Literally the worst food ordering app I have ever used. I have NEVER been able to successfully place an order with it. - It never accurately or correctly displays what method of ordering each restaurant has available. - It doesn‚Äôt tell you if you‚Äôre at the wrong location. - There is no way of notifying the user if the location cannot accept or will not honor mobile order (e.g. the restaurant cannot do electronic transactions) - If you place orders before the cut off time for breakfast/lunch/dinner there is no hard stop to tell you their worker drones won‚Äôt honor the order. - You are charged before any of the above is verified. Oh, and good lucking getting customer support. It‚Äôs not made easy at all. They need to do better. 1/5 stars. Would not recommend.
developerResponse: {'id': 31263369, 'body': "oh no, that shouldn't happen! try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. if this doesn't fix the issues, please contact us to talk about it here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-08-03T19:27:08Z'}

title: Was loving it‚Ä¶ now not so much.
review: I was originally very much liking the new app and being able to place and pay for my orders by my mobile. Until they essentially stole from me. I had placed an order but had not checked in yet because I was not at the location yet. Once I arrived the restaurant was closed, just after 9 pm. So I did not check in. However I was still charged for a meal that I never received. Now it seems I have no recourse or actions that I can take besides disputing this with my bank!  McDonald‚Äôs stole from me and because of the shady terms and conditions I agreed to in using said app. They not only are likely going to get away with it, they basically legally covered their own a**es so they are free to do it to anyone. Beware the hamburgler is real and wearing the app as a disguise!
developerResponse: {'id': 28043336, 'body': "we don't like that one bit. help us look into this by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n", 'modified': '2022-02-14T17:20:24Z'}

title: No longer ‚Äòloving it‚Äô
review: Used to use the app all the time, ever since the new redeem points update came out it‚Äôs unusable. I open the app and it looks normal, then BAM here is the new rewards system. Great so I cycle through the 3 or 4 screens that explain the program and click the box that says ‚ÄòI agree, blah, blah, blah‚Äô and it just sits there. Try to swipe up, swipe down, swipe right (just goes through the program again). Uninstall, reinstall, same story I have an iPhone 7+ because I like holding big things in my hand. Why did you have to mess with a good thing??

title: Has good deals but not a great app
review: I have two issues with the app besides the fact that it seems to be buggy and I end up having to reinstall it sometime to work right. 1) it won‚Äôt allow you to use a gift card as a payment method -almost every other restaurant allows you to do that in their app. 2) it won‚Äôt allow me to pick up food unless I am the one with my phone. If my wife is out and about and willing to pick up the food she can‚Äôt do so because it won‚Äôt allow me to check in for her to pick up my food.

title: App won‚Äôt work
review: I have had this app for a couple years. Then recently I had to do the update and ever since than I can not access the app and I miss out on the free fries Friday or when they brought back the original prices for a short time. I‚Äôve contacted McDonald‚Äôs and got not answer. This is very frustrating. My aunt is having the same issue. I thought maybe it was my Apple ID but she tried it on her iPad and it works fine. I have deleted and redone loaded several times and I always get system error. Now when I just downloaded it the app won‚Äôt even open for me. This is soo frustrating especially when I get the email to click here to get this amazing deal and it brings me to download the app. Please fix the app. I‚Äôm not sure why it works for some and not others.

title: Unstable App
review: App crashes all the time. Tonight, I placed a mobile order, went to pick it up at the drive-thru, and when I tried to check in through the app it kept saying there was an error. Both the cashier and the manager said they didn‚Äôt have my order number. They wouldn‚Äôt let me order then and there, so I had to drive back around and get back in line. Tried deleting the app, reinstalling it, logging in and out, but nothing worked. Ended up having to pay for everything full price (I had a coupon before in the app) and I also didn‚Äôt earn a reward for the caf√© order either. What‚Äôs the point of enticing people to use the app because of exclusive coupons if we can‚Äôt even use them? Worst part was that they even messed up my new order and I didn‚Äôt realize until I got home. Deleted.

title: Deals hardly ever load
review:
This app once worked great, but since about Jan  2018 I rarely ever get access to deals. Either it fails to load or it try‚Äôs to say that their re to any deals based on my location which is grossly incorrect as I have multiple free McCafe‚Äôs waiting form me to use since I purchase  so many between Nov & Dec 2017.
It allowed me to access deals just last week and no it ma not. So frustrating. You would think with the amount of money McDonalds has they would ensure their apps work or at least provide the proper resources.
Very disappointing that this has gone on for sooooooo long!

title: The app for a multi-billion company should consistently work
review:
This app is not really intuitive in general, but the real frustration is how often it doesn't work. And then we have to go in and re-order.

Update:
Dear developer: Thanks for responding but it's too late. I gave it another try this weekend. Once again, it did not work. Kept claiming my payment would not go through, despite trying more than one and the same payments being accepted in the store afterwards. Worse, even though I closed the app down by swiping up, I kept seeing a creepy note at the top of my phone telling me the app was still tracking my location. I even changed the settings so the app couldn't track my location at all. Notification still kept appearing. Guess what? App deleted. Just not worth it. Can't believe how bad this app is.

title: App is TRASH
review:
On October 20 I ordered for the very 1st TIME from the app. Paid through Apple Pay. So I get to the restaurant and Im standing there waiting for my food. Im standing there for 10 minutes wondering whats taken so long. Finally an employee was like thats her with the quarter pounder orders. At that point I was told that the grill was not working. Since there was nothing else I wanted I asked for my money back. They responded I had to go through you, the app, to get a refund. So I would like my money refunded as I did not get the order and something for the inconvenience. And also that location didn't have a working soda machine.  
UPDATE: Called app and they can‚Äôt refund my money. Told me to call my bank and dispute the charges. And that the location should have refunded my money. ABSOLUTE TRASHY CUSTOMER SERVICE AND TRASHY APP AND TRASHY MCDONALD‚Äôs ALL THE WAY AROUND!!!! NEVER ORDERING THROUGH APP AGAIN!!!!!

title: This App has gone downhill fast!
review: I never used to have problems with this app but now nothing works on it for me and removing it and redownloading it has done nothing to fix the issues. The location closest to me has ‚Äúcurrently unavailable‚Äù on most of their iced McCaf√© items on the app even though you can purchase them inside or at the drive-thru, and neither the store or the developer knows how to fix it when I reported it. When I tried to use my debit card to pay for my mobile order it kept saying to check my internet connection when it was fine. And the latest attempt at another store said there was an error on their end when I attempted to pay. Add to that the fact that their ‚Äúdeals‚Äù are nothing special anymore and this app has become a huge waste of time. I have almost given up.

title: Clean app but payment is a dud
review: I have used the app for mobile ordering before with no problems. I tried again today with the same payment information as last time and it said that the payment couldn‚Äôt be processed and to try again. So without thinking, I just tried again. Same error message. Then I thought to check my payment information and it‚Äôs correct so I try again, as it really doesn‚Äôt look like it‚Äôs going through at all. And then I get the bank notification that I‚Äôve been charged 6 times ! Which is a hoot because it didn‚Äôt appear to go through at all. And now I have to wait for the bank to refund and possibly dispute all those charges for something I didnt get because of the inept payment process on this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 8506634, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, friend! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-05-04T16:52:55Z'}

title: Payment Options Are Terrible - Can‚Äôt Use App
review:
I don‚Äôt know how many times I have eaten somewhere other than McDonalds because the payment has not worked. Here are the issues I have found:
1) Payment will not connect for some reason. There will be money in my account and all the info will be inputed correctly and it just doesn‚Äôt work. 
2) I cannot add more than one card. Whenever I try to add a second card it always says ‚Äúcard not added‚Äù which is so frustrating when I try to do it over and over again! Nothing is wrong with my card, it works everywhere else, there is something wrong with the McDonalds app. 
3) I cannot delete previously used cards. When you first download the app it lets you input one card just fine. After that I cannot delete this card, and as I stated before, cannot add another. 
4) Deleting the app and redowloading it does not work because you have to log in with an account. Therefore, the only way to fix this payment problem is to make an entirely new account. 

I am unable to use the app until this problem is fixed. PLEASE FIX THIS. It has been happening for months now with no change. I‚Äôll change my rating when the problem is solved.
developerResponse: {'id': 7540169, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-03-02T23:05:34Z'}

title: Abysmal
review:
Much of what‚Äôs bad here is process rather than app, but the app is pretty bad too. Sending a feedback message or rating an order is not allowed. Contacting corporate or the store is a ridiculously tedious form on a web page loaded from within the app. Navigation and ordering are not intuitive. There is no status update on order progress (but there is an electronic display showing exactly that within the store!) so if you‚Äôre waiting outside you get no info. 

Regarding the process, It‚Äôs not clear from ordering that they won‚Äôt make your food until you get there. Waiting area for curbside is minimal and they won‚Äôt come find you anywhere else. At my store the waiting area is usually blocked by cars in the drive through lane. That forces you to go inside where the situation is often much worse. 

Needs a lot of work.
developerResponse: {'id': 4715014, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2018-08-18T22:43:57Z'}

title: Trash update
review:
!! Update to review below !!

After a period of 24 hours or so, the app began to work correctly. I‚Äôve upgraded my rating from 1 to 5 stars. 

Updated the app as recommended by the app. Now I am unable to order off of the menu, I am only presented with rewards and deals. I chose from the rewards and deals, the app states that the items are unavailable at chosen location. Also, there is no access to previous orders. The app worked well before the update, but now it is only an advertisement for what is available. Shop Wendy‚Äôs!
developerResponse: {'id': 25622083, 'body': "That's not awesome to hear. Let's get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.\r\n", 'modified': '2021-10-11T23:07:27Z'}

title: Awesome, when it works.
review: The deals are nice, the convenience not only to you but to the staff is great...when it works. Every so often the orders don‚Äôt make it to the location, even when the app knows you‚Äôre there. Sometimes you can‚Äôt see the deals or forgets your selected location. If my Mobil order can‚Äôt be found it‚Äôs just not worth it without the deals; once my order ‚Äúcouldn‚Äôt be found‚Äù but the location still knew what was in my order and charged me anyway, I went in and it was a mess. They were having trouble with 2 otherMobil orders, one of which was mine that they couldn‚Äôt figure out after telling them my order number. The design in general is pretty nice, just needs a real good update.

title: App hasn‚Äôt worked all week
review:
The app only works intermittently.... and now, Every day for a week when I click on the app and hit ‚Äúdeals‚Äù or ‚Äústart mobile order‚Äù all that happens is the ‚ÄúFrench fries‚Äù jump on the page and it never opens. This happens whether I use MY Wi-if, MY LTE or McDonald‚Äôs wi-if. And when I ask the personnel why or what‚Äôs up, all I get for an answer is ‚ÄúI dont know‚Äù. Management is NOT helpful at all. Why doesn‚Äôt management know what‚Äôs going on when I know I can‚Äôt be the only one who has mentioned it? I feel like the company is doing it on purpose because maybe too many people are getting their FREE coffees(?). 
Anyway, I‚Äôm deleting the app now. I can‚Äôt use it and their competition‚Äôs applications work just fine.

title: Overwhelmed
review: Overwhelmed crew, had had a power outage and we‚Äôre playing catch up, concerned only for drive thru. I rang the door dash bell as it said for service ring bell , someone finally came up and explained we would have to wait until they caught up, well ok someone left and we waited a few minutes and then ordered had to ask for one of the drinks after our food was delivered, sat here and watched while we ate and other people waited for their food but outside deliveries were quick, so the message I get is order online or go thru drive thru otherwise don‚Äôt come at lunch time! Also why have a kiosk to order from and not have it up and ready?
developerResponse: {'id': 33252297, 'body': "that's not the service we expect for you! send us a chat here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html ", 'modified': '2022-11-19T16:16:32Z'}

title: Have to remove and download each time.
review:
This is normally a great app, but in the last few months, every time I go to order a new order it says I already have one in the system, and will not let me order again. At that point, I have to delete the app, then re-download the app, and make a new order. This is super frustrating. Can you please fix this? 
**update** 
I wrote the a month ago, but apparently it didn‚Äôt actually post. Not only do I still have to delete the app, redownload it each order, but now the ‚Äúcurbside‚Äù selection tool has like 3 unnecessary steps. Why did this get changed? It was working so well before, with like, 1step‚Ä¶ now it‚Äôs so much more confusing and time consuming.
developerResponse: {'id': 32408769, 'body': 'usually a full uninstall and reinstall will fix that issue, but it seems there may be more going on. drop us some details via the link below so we can look into it. https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-11-16T20:59:20Z'}

title: The rewards systems needs MORE THOUGHT!
review:
So, the app works perfectly. Fast & Efficient.
The only problem I have with the app, is that you can‚Äôt use your rewards and deals together. You also can‚Äôt use your points on more that one item. How do you give deals and we earn the points by choosing to spend OUR money at McDonalds, then you dictate how it‚Äôs used?!? Unfair!!! This is the reason why I choose to go to Chick-fil-A which is a half a mile away versus McDonald, right across the street.(walking)  Chick-fil-A let‚Äôs you use your points on a whole meal not just ONE item. Also if they offer you deals, you can add on more with your points and not wait 15 min üôÑ Chick-fil-A saved me on days when I had no money, account in the negative‚Ä¶I wish McDonald‚Äôs could do the same‚Ä¶.McDonald‚Äôs please DO BETTER‚ÄºÔ∏è
developerResponse: {'id': 32558659, 'body': "that's a trick we haven't put into play yet.", 'modified': '2022-10-13T16:03:28Z'}

title: CANNOT LOGIN AT ALL!!
review: I began having issues with the app saying there where no rewards or deals in my area which I knew wasn‚Äôt true as I had used the app everyday before that and have over 12,000 earned points. I decided maybe it was a glitch and to log out and log back in. However after logging out I am not able to login at ALL. It is so frustrating as I have points I want to earn and use my rewards and cannot. When trying to login since sign up and sign in are on the same page, it tries signing you up instead of logging in. I was using Facebook to sign in but it won‚Äôt work. I have deleted and reinstalled the app multiple times and it will not work regardless. I contacted support but have not heard back from anyone. Super frustrating.

title: Can‚Äôt Login Into App
review: The App automatically logged me out. When I try to log back in and receive my email I have to click on to access the app and log back in. The link is corrupt it says ‚ÄúCan‚Äôt Open Page‚Äù The page isn‚Äôt loading right now. Please Try Again Later. Except‚Äî it NEVER works ever!! Ive been trying to get in for weeks. 20+ attempts, I‚Äôve uninstalled the app and re-installed the app. I‚Äôm soooo irritated! I have 1,000‚Äôs of point I want to access and can‚Äôt use or access any deals I contacted them regarding this and crickets‚Ä¶ no response. It‚Äôs absolute garbage app!!! Wish I could give it NO STARS! Sounds like it‚Äôs a known issue with IPhone users‚Äî well you‚Äôd think the developers would fix it by know the issue has been going on for months from what I have read online!

title: Very dissatisfied with app
review:
Gave 1 star as no option to give 0. This is an awful app that makes you sign in every time you want to use it, and when you try to do that it sends you in circles, ending up back where you started, NOT SIGNED IN and NOT able to order. 

Tried to use email sign in. Message in app says to go to email to verify. Clicked on email link, taken back to same place in app which asks how I want my order delivered. Don‚Äôt want it delivered, I‚Äôm here at the store - but no option to do that and no work around to place an order. What? 

Tried to start over multiple times, all ended the same. Screw this- McDonald‚Äôs, get your act together and fix app. Many, many others have the same sign in issue and I see no interest in acknowledging and fixing it.

title: Great!
review: I love this app so much! Saves time, and helps prevent mistakes in my order since I can customize everything. I love the rewards too!  The only issue I have is that sometimes, not often, after I place my order, before tapping ‚ÄúIm already here‚Äù it times out or something and erases everything. It won‚Äôt actually charge my card since I dont ever get to check in but it will act like I never placed an order. So I‚Äôll get to the restaurant and go to tap ‚ÄúIm already here‚Äù and it refreshes and starts back at the main menu like nothing ever happened.

title: Business-killing bug
review:
I added a large fry to my cart but never checked out. it is the morning now and it says the item is no longer available right now. understandable. i try to click remove and nothing happens. i click the edit button to see if i can somehow remove it that way and nothing happens. adding another item and removing it from my cart works, but i‚Äôm not able purchase anything because the large fry is stuck in my cart.

this isn‚Äôt the first time this has happened. if a deal is no longer available and it‚Äôs in my cart, i‚Äôm stuck with it in my cart until i reset my entire app. i was hoping it would be fixed by now. i literally can‚Äôt order online because an item is stuck in my cart and i can‚Äôt remove it.

title: Worthless app
review: I can‚Äôt even create an account to use it! I‚Äôve tried numerous times to delete and the reinstall it. I try to use Apple, Google, and every single other one of my email address to create an account, and I ALWAYS receive the same message: ‚Äúplease use a valid email address.‚Äù I‚Äôve contacted them a couple of times, and they told me to delete the app and reinstall it, and then they told me to change the font size of my phone because that sometimes causes the issue. You would think that with the size of their corporation that they would have this sort of thing figured out. By the way, this has been going on for over a month. I‚Äôve tried a couple of times a week, hoping that it will be fixed, but no. I give up‚Ä¶
developerResponse: {'id': 24830366, 'body': "That's not cool! Let's get that looked into at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-08-31T14:46:43Z'}

title: Waste of time
review: What a waste of time! I made an order for a large group of people and sent my wife to pick it up on the way to our location. I told her to call me when she arrived so I could put the parking space number in as a check in. Well, you can‚Äôt do that anymore. The app tracks your location through your phone and won‚Äôt let you enter a parking space number as a check in. She had to completely reorder everything at the counter. Not to mention the restaurant was completely out of soft drinks when she got there. McDonalds quality just continues to decline.

title: Why???
review: I place an order via my app, I pull up my app shows I am here, I then pull into a spot and tell the app what spot I am in. I wait 25 minutes and the call the store and they say that they don‚Äôt see it in their system. At that point my order processed on the app and no longer said we will see you in spot 4 but that I had already picked up. The woman came out and said that we had to place the order again which I had already paid for, and got charged another $37. She said she was trying to help me like I did something wrong when they obviously showed I picked it up. 45 minutes later I get my food but they have to bring my card in to give me a refund. What was supposed to be a quicker more convenient way to get dinner, took longer than if i had cooked!!!

title: Please move favorites and show details in recents.
review:
I use this app often and have several favorites set, such as customized coffees, iced, hot, latte etc.  it really makes no sense to have to dig for my favored items three screens in.  Put the favorites in the shortcuts or at the very least on the home page PLEASE!

Also, we like the same burger in this house, but not the same things on them - my favorited item looks just like the other favorited item because it only shows the name and then ‚Äúcustomized‚Äù so I have to open that to see which one it is.

When you show previous transactions for reorder purposes, it shows one main item and then says ‚Äú2 other items‚Äù instead of just listing the items in the order. Very often the one item shown is the drink, so you have to open that to see if it‚Äôs the previous order you want to reorder.

This app has the potential to be a really good app and for a company the size of McDonalds, I‚Äôm surprised it is still as clunky as it is in many respects. 

Please consider these changes...
developerResponse: {'id': 20910121, 'body': "Heya. We're always working on an even better App that you enjoy using. Thanks for helping us out.", 'modified': '2021-02-07T22:26:57Z'}

title: Families can look elsewhere for pickup
review: I ordered food for the family and ask for my wife to pick it up on curbside on her way home but because I was the one who ordered the food on my phone she wasn‚Äôt allowed to pick it up.  The app said I needed to contact a crew member and I did.  All the crew member said was I don‚Äôt know how to help you and I don‚Äôt know how to activate your order, it has to be done by the app.  Well since I wasn‚Äôt feet away from the McDonald‚Äôs, I could not activate my order so I asked my wife to just go somewhere else since the app won‚Äôt let me say she is there for pickup.  The other option was to wait in the really long line and say my order number but that defeats the whole point of ordering online.  On the bright side, my order wasn‚Äôt charged until I claimed it.

title: They took my money but no food
review: Was using this app (too) frequently until yesterday. Ordered $27 of food for the family but when I got there my order had been ‚Äúfulfilled‚Äù at a totally different McDonald‚Äôs. How? I thought they didn‚Äôt start making the food until you‚Äôre (your phone, more specifically) in the geofence of the restaurant?! The place where I was at had no idea, of course. The e-mail had the number of the other location, but they seemed to know less! They said use the app to call customer service. After explaining to the rep, I was told they really appreciate my business and want me to feel confident when using the app but they don‚Äôt have the ability to refund. I called my bank and disputed the charge then deleted the app from my phone. I‚Äôm confident my bank will get the money back for me.

title: Application initialization critical error resp9nse
review: I have had this error for a year now and not even McDonald‚Äôs support was able to assist. I have rewards to be claimed and unable to retrieve them from my deals since it won‚Äôt log me in my account due to an error and always says google login cancelled. I attempted to use my kids apple Xr and it worked. But when I upgrade to the new iPhone 12 pro Max it worked for one day and then went back to the silly error. I‚Äôm done trying and attempting to troubleshoot, since the app has horrible support and has not work due to an I know error. And yes, I have restarted and reinstalled and update my phone and still nothing has changed with the app except fristrarion on using. I‚Äôm done doing business with McDonald, selecting other options for fast food when I‚Äôm hungry for food or a snack.

title: Very glitchy
review:
This app is extremely lacking‚Ä¶ It often won‚Äôt let me order my food because it says the restaurant is closed, but I‚Äôm sitting in the parking lot & it‚Äôs **very obviously** open and doing business. 
For the same reason, the app thinks the breakfast menu is available when it‚Äôs clearly not breakfast hours, & also vice-versa. I‚Äôm currently trying to add fries to my order at 7 PM in the evening, & the app won‚Äôt let me because it thinks it‚Äôs breakfast menu right now. 
‚ÄúThis offer is not available at this time of day‚Äù ... even after I reboot my phone several times, the stupid app still cannot realize what time it *actually* is!
In fact, I‚Äôm aborting my order right now because the app does not recognize with the current time is.‚Ä¶ So it won‚Äôt let me order.

It‚Äôs amazing to me how a large restaurant like McDonald‚Äôs team could have such a poorly written app that doesn‚Äôt understand hours of operation or even where certain locations might be. 
There‚Äôs also the problem of ghosting/residual information when I open the app. Sometimes I have to shut my entire phone down & reboot the entire thing before it will discard the previously completed order from trying to refresh again.

title: Disappointed with app & service.
review: Today while at the house I placed an order through the app. Once order was processed the next step was to inform the store of your arrival. My wife went to the store to pick it up so since the order was from my phone the announcement tab was on my phone so I asked her to call me when she was close so that I could click the tab. Well, guess what when I clicked the tab from home the app didn‚Äôt recognize me as being close to the store and gave me an error message, but it also said that if I was in fact at the store to see a crew member and give them my order ni with some additional digits. She tried to do that and was refused service. When she insisted and I sent her a screenshot of the number the cashier was so rude that my wife just left the store without getting the meal.

title: horrible
review: after recommendations after contacting mcdonald's app help to delete and reload the app, turn on notifications, use data instead of wifi, sign out then back in, shut off phone and reboot, (i've deleted the app at least 10 times (i am not exaggerating)  the app still will not load my deals, apparently i lost my mcafey rewards and every si gle location i go to is listed as closed even though they are open.  No one in these restaurants or mcdonald's application help is able to fix it.  my iphone is a 6s and there is no reason this application shouldn't work

title: McDonalds Rochester NY
review: I also agree that the app does not work when you are on Wi-Fi inside McDonald‚Äôs. If anything, that‚Äôs the one place that should work. Right?!  When the app first came out, the deals were amazing but over the last couple weeks, to save $.20 or one dollar here and there really isn‚Äôt worth messing with the app. Mobile ordering is pretty cool but it would be better if you could set a time for your food to be ready. I‚Äôve had to wait 15 min after arriving to the store with curbside pickup.  I‚Äôve had to pay full price quite a few times over the past few weeks because the app doesn‚Äôt scan right inside the store.

title: Worst app, so difficult to use & gets lost in translation at store
review: This app is so annoying!!! It freezes up while loading and you have to shut down and re-load. Then trying to place an order there is no easy way to add expected sides like fries & Coke without exiting the sandwich section and scrolling through to find the fries, etc. For whatever reason, it is also convinced my card has expired (it hasn‚Äôt), and tells me to delete the card (which it doesn‚Äôt have a button to do) and add a new card (which it won‚Äôt accept). Going to the window to pay is fine, but any order more complicated than a black coffee is misunderstood by the staff and the wrong order is delivered! I should just delete the app and order the old fashioned way. I‚Äôll at least have a 50/50 chance of getting what I asked for.
developerResponse: {'id': 13882253, 'body': "Hey there! We're sorry you're having difficulties with your payment. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.", 'modified': '2020-03-05T22:36:08Z'}

title: App continues to get worse
review:
I‚Äôve been using the app for over a year now and in the past three months I‚Äôve had more issues that since I began. My issues always happen in the morning and only with making the payment and only in my home city. It seems to happen when I‚Äôm trying to use a deal during a purchase. Last month it said the order did not go through so I attempted it four more times. When I went into the restaurant they had 5 orders waiting for me. They said the could not refund a mobile order. So I had to go through my credit card company to get the duplicate charges cleared. 

I was out of town two weeks ago and did not have any issues. Interesting that I did not have any ‚Äúdeals‚Äù in my order at that time.

title: Over complicated password
review:
It‚Äôs McDonald‚Äôs, there‚Äôs not really much info to steal especially if you‚Äôre automatically signed in all the time anyway! EXCEPT WHEN THE APP UPDATES!! Then I have to spend so much frustrating time guessing at what password it should be, what email it should be and then hoping when I do the forgot my password it gets sent to the right email and I don‚Äôt do the same password over again cause heaven forbid that happen!! It‚Äôs just very frustrating and I just wanna see what deals there are and this is the fourth time I‚Äôve had to figure out my password in the past 2 1/2 years and I‚Äôm very angry and annoyed!!! 
Other then that great app saves money when you wanna grab something quick

title: Good but can be better
review: I enjoy using many restaurant apps to submit mobile orders but a major flaw of this app is that you cannot have the food made by a particular time or at the time of order. There have been multiple times that I will have to wait til I'm close enough to the location before the order can be requested to be made, and I still end up waiting 15 mins for my order. Kinda defeats the purpose of ordering in advance. I definitly don't use this app as often as others because of this major flaw. I consider it major because I'm pretty sure these types of apps are designed for the purpose of ordering in advance and skipping the line. You don't skip any line with this app.

title: Great when it works
review:
There have been multiple times now where I‚Äôve tried to use the app to order food with a deal coupon and it won‚Äôt work. Ordering without a coupon is fine, but when I add one the app acts like I have no internet connection- even when connected to the WiFi inside McDonald‚Äôs. The main appeal of the app is the exclusive coupons, but without being able to access them, what‚Äôs the point? I find this happens 9/10 times in the past few months. Before that, the app was amazing. The coupons were better deals and it always worked. 

The other fun thing is that the ‚ÄúContact Us‚Äù section freezes whenever I try to use it to report these problems.

title: Local McDonald‚Äôs said it‚Äôs worthless
review:
We ordered $20 worth of food but they said the app doesn‚Äôt work at the store.  Well the charge seemed to go through so I cancelled it.  I‚Äôm guessing they probably have an extra $20 worth of food but don‚Äôt know what they are talking about.  Who knows lol?

An update.  I got a response I guess but I can‚Äôt read it.  There are so many one star reviews I can‚Äôt find it lol.  I did see a pattern to the responses to other reviews.  They actually just make it worse.  Uninstall then reinstall isn‚Äôt helpful folks and to be honest neither is responding with a cookie cutter blurb because people can see you are repeating the same thing over and over.  You‚Äôve already permanently lost a lot of users because you haven‚Äôt been able to report any actual progress fixing what is at this point an obvious problem.
developerResponse: {'id': 6009299, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, Curt! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-11-20T13:41:03Z'}

title: Do not use the mobile app!
review: So I placed a mobile order went directly to McDonald‚Äôs and at 12:00 PM I went to the drive-through to pick up my order and I was told they just served her last customer and that they could not fill my order even though the mobile app excepted my order and confirmed my order before they closed. Why is McDonald‚Äôs excepting orders within 10 minutes of their closing hour? Not to mention I wasted my gas and I wasted my time and now I‚Äôm not a happy camper because I‚Äôm hungry too and I‚Äôm mad! Now I know why people do not use the mobile app in Lebanon Oregon. I‚Äôve used it many of times during the day and I‚Äôve never seen anybody else waiting in the reservation spot except for me. Like I said this is a small town if you want this app to be a success you might want to for fill the orders that have been placed!

title: Stupid broken system
review: Will never use the app again. Nothing bu problems and no one in store can do anything. Ordered McGriddles and the app let me drive to the store and click to pay before telling me that the item is unavailable. Now it‚Äôs stuck in my cart on the app and no matter what I do it will not remove it. I will not pay for them after being deceived like that and now I can never order again because they will not come out of my cart. This needs to be addressed. Terrible way to ruin a good customer and I will now take my daily breakfast needs to Wendy‚Äôs or Hardee‚Äôs. Get it together!

title: Easy to use easy to save $$
review: The app makes it easier to use than even ordering at the speaker! Love the deals that are offered in the app rather than prices on items off the menu. I‚Äôd rather pull into the parking lot and put in my order through the app and take my time than to fumble my words while ordering through the speaker. It‚Äôs easier to concentrate while using this and navigate through the menu instead of using that touch screen inside, which I‚Äôm pretty sure was one of the leading spreads of Covid.

title: Great app, for the most part...
review:
I really love this app! It‚Äôs super easy to put your order in and customize it however you like. 
I do have a few minor issues though... If you put your order in and drive to McDonald‚Äôs with the app still open, sometimes it doesn‚Äôt properly detect that you‚Äôve arrived, so you‚Äôre not able to put your order in, even if you go drive-thru. That‚Äôs not an issue, as long as you close the app.
Also, when you‚Äôre looking at an individual location, it just has one set of hours, and a lot of locations have different lobby and drive-thru hours.
Other than those small issues, I love how simple this app is!
developerResponse: {'id': 4019022, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had! Try turning your Wi-Fi off and switching to Mobile Data when at the store. If that doesn't help, please reach out to our Mobile App team, so we can look into this further https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2018-06-28T21:34:01Z'}

title: Try getting a refund...Won‚Äôt happen!
review:
I purchased a shake via mobile order. When I went inside to pick it up, they told me the shake machine was down (I understand those things can happen to anyone) but I was still charged for the shake. I asked for the manager. She offered me no help getting my refund. She offered me no substitution. She just told me to call the number on the mobile app.
I contacted McDonalds via the written contact in the app but have not heard back from them. That was days ago!  I have spent over an hour now trying to retrieve $2.17.  I may have to go to the state attorney general‚Äôs office to retrieve $2.17 that I have been cheated out of. If I have to, I will. It‚Äôs the principal, not the amount. McDonalds just doesn‚Äôt care if you get ripped off by their stinking mobile app.

title: Shows Promise But Repeatedly Frustrating Experience
review: Is a great idea but execution is poor. I run into issues more than half the time, usually with payments or the order simply not showing up or going through...leaving me stranded when I go to McDonald's and am unable to pick up my order. The worst part is that the McDonald's restaurant locations are never ever able to resolve these issues on the spot by duplicating the order so it feels like a bait and switch situation. Really wish this app can be improved upon, it does show great promise and is game changing if they can get it right and improve the success of each transaction and give restaurants the ability to correct oasis when they present themselves. The negative experiences are however enough to turn me away from using this app and consider going less to McDonald's.

title: Has worked great so far for me (iPhone 12 pro)
review: Looking at a bunch of reviews I‚Äôm seeing a lot of people describing glitches and bugs. However so far I have not had a bad interaction with the app. Useful deals(although they are stagnant for some weeks) and mobile ordering are pretty efficient for skipping the line and getting a deal. One point I‚Äôd like to make for devs is that it seems that some users are getting a buggy app but this is not the case on the latest iPhones, which means you should probably QA with a wide range of devices.

title: Restrictions
review: The app generally works ok sometimes it‚Äôs glitchy and lags which is annoying. The most frustrating part for me is the fact that there are restrictions on how you can redeem your points. It would be nice if you were able to redeem your points several times in one transactions. If you‚Äôve earned your points by spending money somewhere you should be able to use them how you wish. If I want to use all of my points to make a meal then o should be able to. Or they should make it where a meal other than a happy meal is something you can redeem.

title: Great, but points are scam system until they fix it
review: Ordering experience is always pleasant. Love how you can customize your orders just like in the restaurant, and the ability to add condiments to how I want it. Others definitely should learn from McD‚Äôs! But if you want more people to frequently come to the McD‚Äôs by luring them with points system, actually make it usable. Don‚Äôt understand why I always get charged money when I redeemed something with points. Multiple times already this happened. No, I‚Äôm not gonna go to your website and submit app feedback, it just means you guys are not willing to listen to customers. There are enough valuable feedbacks already posted here to always alarm the developers.

title: BEWARE!!!
review: I use apps to order food for any restaurant that has one. McDonalds app is user friendly however I placed an order on the app for a location near my home and when I got there I was told the store was closed so they could update their system. I did NOT receive the food for my family that I ordered. The order total was $35! I wrote an email and was contacted by corporate. Corporate told me the store owner would reach out to me and resolve the issue. I went back and forth between the store manager (owner never called) and corporate for 2 weeks and did NOT receive a refund! This is outrageous compared to other organizations that issue refunds for similar instances. THE BOTTOM LINE, IS DO NOT USE THE APP UNLESS YOU ARE READY TO LOSS ANY AND ALL MONEY YOU SPEND ON IT! This is disgraceful and makes my stomach turn writing this.
developerResponse: {'id': 28936070, 'body': 'oh no! let us address this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-04-02T14:16:04Z'}

title: Clean up your app
review:
The app has gotten better. But it still has a way to go. Someone in a responsible position should USE it and check it out. There are two different drink selection methods, depending on if you go to it from the main menu or if you‚Äôre adding a drink to a combo meal. From the drink menu it‚Äôs well organized, you select the kind of drink then the size. Coming from the combo option you have a huge list of drinks starting with extra small of each drink, small of each, etc. and there seem to be things missing from that list. 
There are other issues as well, where it‚Äôs just clumsy and disorganized. Check it out.
developerResponse: {'id': 20694706, 'body': 'We always want your Mobile Ordering to be awesome, Rick. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.', 'modified': '2021-01-27T21:22:24Z'}

title: Was a great app but now now it constantly logs me out
review: This app was great for about a month. Now, it constantly logs me out after I place an order. Then, I get to the drive thru and have to go through the whole login in process again. This is rather frustrating as you can‚Äôt simply login but have to give your email, then they email what they call a magic link, then it brings you back to app to accept terms. After that, it doesn‚Äôt have your order anymore and you have to place it again. If you don‚Äôt get to the drive thru quick, it will log you out again and you have to go through this headache process all over again. Please fix soon! And yes, I‚Äôve deleted the app and downloaded it again but that doesn‚Äôt fix this issue.
developerResponse: {'id': 24717600, 'body': "We don't want you to be frustrated! Let's fix this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-08-25T17:23:34Z'}

title: Few items earned expiring
review: It‚Äôs bad enough that the rewards expire in a pretty small time frame, but then the app leaves them showing as still good, until you get to the store and try to put it through. That‚Äôs when it tells you that it‚Äôs expired. It‚Äôs almost like McDonald‚Äôs wants you to think the free item is still good so you head to the store, because once you‚Äôre their they know you‚Äôre not going to either have time or the desire to go somewhere else. So they leave it there to get you there and then don‚Äôt allow you to use it. The issue is with the app and the coupons though and are not a reflection on the store I ordered from. They were quick and easy, nice and friendly to earn your companies money that McDonald‚Äôs manipulated me into spending

title: Improved but still has issues
review: This app has made strides but still has some issues to resolve. Needs to be more up-to-date on actual availability at the restaurant, having to make substitutions at the drive though is a problem that leads to errors. Also, an in app way to not issues with an order would be helpful, both for the customer and for McDonald‚Äôs to identify root causes. And the coupon system is sometimes contradictory and can work against itself. Like, I never use my coffee rewards since it locks me out of other options even though one would think those are two different things. Otherwise, has been a smoother experience than in the past.
developerResponse: {'id': 17027757, 'body': "Hi there. We're sorry to hear you're having trouble with the app. To get you back to the deals you love, we‚Äôd like to look into this further. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2020-08-02T16:32:46Z'}

title: Buggy
review:
The most annoying part about the app is that it doesn't recognize when an order has been picked up. It remembers an order placed weeks ago and then throws error messages when trying to place a new order. Restarting the app doesn't help. It's really cool to be able to order in advance and have saved orders, but this app crashes more often & is more infuriating than any other food app I've used. 

Also, the menu layout is awful - good luck ordering a plain water with your meal. Fries aren't even listed as a side unless it's as part of a meal. I *want* to use the app, but often it's just easier to order in person.
developerResponse: {'id': 33416562, 'body': "that's never what we want to hear! tell us the details here so we can look into this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-11-28T21:44:32Z'}

title: App stopped working
review: It was nice ordering online and paying with the app. Now the payment doesn‚Äôt work. I uninstalled and reinstalled and that didn‚Äôt help. Removed payment options and entered them again with no luck. Use cell service or WiFi it doesn‚Äôt matter. Now I go and use the app and it is declined payment and the employees don‚Äôt know how to get the declined order to another screen, whatever that means? So the order takes longer. Better off not using the app at this point. The feedback option doesn‚Äôt make it easy to report an issue asking for app version and iOS version, shouldn‚Äôt it be automatically detected? You close out to get version information and it closes out the report issue and you have to start all over. Nothing convenient about using the app or reporting issues.
developerResponse: {'id': 14302479, 'body': "Hey there, Bill! We're sorry you're having difficulties with your payment. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.", 'modified': '2020-03-28T15:45:18Z'}

title: Bank Card Hacked!!!
review: I would have been the first one to tell everyone to use this app. Especially only having a 30 minute lunch and able to get in and out in 5 minutes. Until one night I received an email thanking me for my order in New York while sitting on my couch in Kentucky. Now I know there is people out there that do horrible things but McDonald‚Äôs didn‚Äôt even care. I thought my card was safe being stored on this app and I was wrong. I emailed them explaining what happening asking them to look into the app to make sure this did not happen to someone else but no response. It has been a month since this happen so I think that is plenty of time for them to inform that they have taken action. Very disappointed have told everyone to stop using app with any other card but a gift card. üò°

title: PITA
review: Flow of app is really good but they don‚Äôt make it clear that you have to physically take the phone to McDonald‚Äôs I.e you can‚Äôt order it and have someone pick it up which makes this thing really kind of useless other than the deals.  Otherwise it takes just as much effort and probably time to order at the restaurant.  I ordered on the app and we were hoping that someone could pick up the food but when they got there it was SOL.  It also kept telling me ‚Äúmy order needed to be reopened‚Äù because something had happened before it was completed.  When you get that message 6 times and you are using Apple Pay you seriously begin to wonder what that means and whether or not you will have a $50 repetitively charged McDs bill at the end of it.
developerResponse: {'id': 6393364, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2018-12-14T22:55:52Z'}

title: Order number automatically disappears
review:
I ordered a $1 large sprite to pick up at the McDonald‚Äôs right across the street from my apartment, but the home page where it showed my order number automatically disappeared and changed to ‚ÄúThanks for visiting!‚Äù while I was walking across the street to pick it up. There was absolutely no way to show the order number anywhere in the app afterward and I didn‚Äôt remember what it is, so I spent a good 10 mins in the restaurant arguing with them who said ‚Äúyou gotta have a number‚Äù and ‚Äúyou gotta pick it up first before ‚Äòchecking it out‚Äô‚Äù

I literally didn‚Äôt do anything while I was walking towards the restaurant and I was literally staring at my phone with the order number screen as it changed to ‚ÄúThanks for visiting!‚Äù

It‚Äôs just a $1 drink for Pete‚Äôs sake. Worst mobile order experience ever
developerResponse: {'id': 6185590, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-11-30T19:04:22Z'}

title: Was great but now it‚Äôs frustrating
review: I‚Äôve had the McDonald‚Äôs app for quite a while now. But over the year it has changed drastically. Majority of the coupons are mobile order exclusives, then when I try to order through the app it‚Äôs incredibly difficult to get exactly what I want. My orders are not even complicated. They‚Äôre basic food items that I can‚Äôt find on the menu through the app. Then when I finally place my nonsense order I don‚Äôt get any sauces so I have to walk back into McDonald‚Äôs and get ketchup or ranch because the person who takes me my food runs off. It‚Äôd be better if all the coupons were available bth mobile order and drive through. And if it would be made simpler to order and customize orders through the mobile app.

title: Let me change my own location
review:
Seems to be having an issue with location today, setting me thousands of miles away from where I live. This is usually fine, when I hit change location it sees where I am. Except for the fact this app deems itself worthy to choose your location for you, on what it thinks you are closest to. So it automatically sets my orders to be a thousand miles away after I change it. Can‚Äôt use that now can I? Very user unfriendly design, giving the illusion of choice.

Ive written a review before on this app, complaining that my last order always reorders itself whenever I open the app, causing issues and attempting to charge me again. This IS STILL an issue, along with the fact my last review seems to not exist.

title: Mostly great.
review: Very frustrating late at night, when all I‚Äôm offered us a breakfast menu, and when I order breakfast items I‚Äôm told they‚Äôre not available at that time. I can‚Äôt order the items that are available that time because they‚Äôre not offered it shows me Egg McMuffin I order egg McMuffin well I go to check out , I‚Äôm told this item is not available at this time of day. I can‚Äôt order the items that are available at that time, because they are not offered surely this isn‚Äôt the first time you‚Äôve heard it

title: Major issue - incorrect cost
review: The last 3 times or so that I have applied a deal (not rewards points) the app has incorrectly charged me.  I wouldn‚Äôt have even noticed had I not had my banking app on the same phone set to send me real-time notifications when charged.  I‚Äôve been over charged on multiple occasions and the onsite staff are t sure how to deal with it. On two occasions they gave me cash back to fix it.  Today they told me I owed them a small amount (less than a dollar) because of the failure.  In that case I had actually been over charged by a couple of dollars but the staff were not willing to make it correct. The reason I use the app is for the deals.  If this issue is not corrected I will choose other fast food restaurants over McDonald‚Äôs.
