title: Love the free stuff
review: I was leery about yet another app on my phone, but this is the only way to go. If you are going to hit up McDonald‚Äôs even once a week with a little one to get a happy meal, may as well get points each time, that actually build up to give you free McDonald‚Äôs. There‚Äôs also daily deals that are pretty good! The only thing that gets you sometimes is what you order on the app might not be available when you get to the restaurant, so they have to give you cash back since your card is charged immediately.

title: I would have given 5 stars
review: This app is okay but the service at restaurants is whole different thing so you can order ahead of time but at night time you have to go through drive thru and had to wait behind all the cars that are ordering right there so it‚Äôs just like go there and order cause ordering ahead is worthless cause of the wait time you have to face they should figure out a way that people who order ahead have a separate line or door entry to pick up the food instead of waiting a long time I myself waited 25 mins even though I ordered like an hour ago ahead of time and was there on time. They should figure out this to make there service better and faster.

title: Aggravating App
review: After my most recent experience, I will not likely use this app again other for the deals I can get through the drive thru. A few days ago, I arrived to the restaurant for curbside and it wouldn‚Äôt let me check in, saying I was not there yet. I had to wait in the drive through and told them I was picking up an app order. When I got to the window, they could see my order, but not put it through, so the poor girl had to take a photo of my order and re-enter it. Thankfully I had brought payment. Then we held up the line while they scrambled to make my order for 6 people. With how short staffed everyone is, this app causes drama not only for customers, but their staff as well.
developerResponse: {'id': 25006107, 'body': "This isn't what we want for our customers! Let's address this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-09-09T14:35:25Z'}

title: Used to work great- what happened???
review: I used to use this app frequently but about a month ago it stopped working as keeps giving error messages saying initialization error occurred, restart the app which I have done several times- I have also deleted and re-downloaded the app to no avail. When I try to login it is always the same error ‚Äúwe are experiencing technical difficulties right now, please try again later‚Äù so, in short, I used to love this app but it hasn‚Äôt worked in over a month. Disappointing :-(
developerResponse: {'id': 20224094, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that. Let us look into that. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-01-06T19:07:34Z'}

title: Glitchy & frustrating
review: The interface is good but it has become increasingly more difficult to order. Orders placed in advance constantly disappear from the ap and need to be re-entered upon arrival. I find myself scrambling to do this as I arrive at the drive thru. And they occasionally go thru on the ap with the restaurant showing no sign of them. For example, I sat at curbside for 20 mins while the restaurant had no record of my order! I‚Äôve also had issues with my local restaurant showing it was closed several hours before it actually was, and not allowing me to order thru the ap. I otherwise like the ap and new rewards program. I hope these issues are corrected so I can adjust my rating.

title: No refund for food they couldn‚Äôt make.
review: I purchased a frappe on the app and waited for it for come curbside. One of the workers came out and told me their frappe machine doesn‚Äôt work and he would just give me a refund. Ok no big deal thanks. Well they must not have been able to figure it out because I was still charged and never received the refund. Sent a message to them and they said if you think I was charged fraudulently to take it up with my credit card company. Not sure what that has to do with my situation. Just wanted a refund. Last time I will use this app or buy food from them.

title: Deals
review: We‚Äôre are all the deals!!! We started using this app a few years ago and it had awesome deals. Like $1 large frys, free McFlurry, a lot of free items with a purchase of a $1 or more. $1 happy meals. Now it‚Äôs not even worth using. We use to eat McDonald‚Äôs once or twice a day( not good anyways) but now I look for the restaurant with the best deals for a family of 5 ( like Burger King, there on it with family meal deals and more!!!) They need to go back to there old ways. It makes sense, bring them in with a free item or (family box deals were awesome )and they end up buying for the whole family.

title: How does this have 4+ stars when it doesn‚Äôt work?
review:
I have nothing but trouble with this app. It won‚Äôt let me add payment methods. I go through all the trouble of typing in all my info only get ‚Äúcard not added‚Äù every single time. There is only one other payment method saved in my account and you‚Äôre allegedly supposed to be able to save up to four. NOPE. I even deleted the one card it had allowed me to add. Again, nope. Didn‚Äôt help and now I can‚Äôt use the app at all because there‚Äôs no way to pay. Additionally I can be sitting in the actual parking lot of the McDonald‚Äôs, at 10am, and the app will decide not to let me order breakfast (‚Äúnot available at this time‚Äù) even though there‚Äôs a full 30 minutes before breakfast ends. 

Deleting this app and going to Burger King. :)

title: Signup login having issues
review:
Keeps saying error when I try to sign in register. This prevents the app from being used at all. Recommend disabling login for usability.

Basically the issue is this - if you try to sign on using Mac ID or Google it says i need to sign up. If I try to register it says a login with my email already exists. If I sign on using FB it says I need to login. And if I try to register it says my login already exists. So it goes around and round. There is not an option for using deals without logging in. This is a big miss.

Also if I try to register a new email, it doesn‚Äôt recognize that I input text into the fields. It says my first name is needed and will not let me submit even though there is text there. You guys really have to do a better job with QA.

title: Would not recommend
review: I used this app as it was intended to place a mobile order with my local McDonalds. Once you pay for your mobile order it takes you to a step where it asks you to confirm that your at the McDonalds. When I clicked yes it said I wasn‚Äôt even there despite literally being in the drive-thru. The cashier had to look up my order number because they could not see my order even though I have my location on on my cell phone, even though I entered in the correct information and then paid for it. The food window workers were very confused because they could not see my order. They made me wait and waiting defeats the purpose of a mobile order. It is supposed to be fast and convenient and it was far from it.

title: This app cost McD millions in lost sales
review:
On at
Least
50 occasions i was unable to order due to app issues telling me everything from deals not available at this time when they were. The app tells me i am hungry am and must wait 59 minutes to place an order for more deals when i never ordered anything previous that day. Somedays it simply wont login. In every instance i did not place an order and went somewhere else to eat. If this is happening to me it is happening to tend of millions of people costing McD 100‚Äôs of millions of dollars in-lost sales. Twice today i tried to order breakfast and then lunch and both times app did not work. So i did mot eat there today. Deleting and reinstalling app does nothing to fix the issue. The developers should be fired or sued by McDonald‚Äôs for hundreds of millions of dollars in lost revenue

title: One huge problem
review:
I‚Äôve been using this app for about two years now. It‚Äôs very useful for avoiding lines... when it works. I‚Äôve lost count over how many times I‚Äôve the app, and the amount of times I‚Äôve been able to get the payment to go through I can probably count on one hand. Without fail I have to wait on line and explain to the cashier that I‚Äôm the mobile order, and the payment‚Äôs not working. 

Skipping at least me spelling out my order every time at the register, and being alerted to deals going on that day, in my opinion saves it from a worse rating, but the fact that an app meant to help you skip lines that forces me to wait on line is really frustrating.

title: Disappointed now
review:
I use to love this app and I don‚Äôt know what happened but now all it says is we are experiencing technical difficulties for over 2 weeks. I‚Äôve deleted and reinstalled. I‚Äôve created a new account and my husbands says the same thing on his phone. How can I place an order or use coupons when I can‚Äôt even sign in???

I have uninstalled and reinstalled numerous times including today and it still after at least a month and it still says, ‚Äúwe are experiencing technical difficulties.‚Äù I cannot sign in. This app is one of the main reasons we got McDonald‚Äôs because of the awesome deals in the app. I still get the crave lol sometimes but I won‚Äôt pay that much for fast food without coupons so they unfortunately have lost a lot of my business because of the apps continues failure.

title: Dirty and poor service
review:
The new owner of both Waterford and halfmoon has ruined both places. In Waterford I had not been given the correct meal in months. I drive through for breakfast quite often durning the school year.  My grandsons bagel sandwich was black the last time!!  The always fix the problem but ...   i just brought my grandchildren to halfmoon (ages 5,6,7,8) and the place is filthy!!  For the past 7 years I ran a playgroup for friends with preschool children.  I have probably come to halfmoon or Clifton park with them over 200 times in the past 5 years.  I only stayed today because I couldn‚Äôt do that to my grandchildren.

The manager at Waterford told me they had to fire the old crew because they had many complaints.  Strange I work for the town of Waterford and have lived there my entire live and never heard a complaint.

title: Rarely a benefit
review: I seem to be having the same problem as others that have written reviews.   I have difficulties getting old orders to reset; I once had a breakfast order in my cart for few months.   That order was finalized for pickup at a store that had yet to open.   But my main gripe is that my food is not ready for pickup when I arrive.   I have even been waiting curbside and watched others proceed through the drive through while I was still waiting.   I tried to complain on the website as was instructed to wait for an email with a link; I clicked the link only to find out it was not valid.   The only reason I gave the app 2 stars is because it does give you access to coupons without out having to waste paper.
developerResponse: {'id': 9158467, 'body': 'Oh no! Most times this can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give us a call, so we can look into this further at 1-877-334-4332.', 'modified': '2019-06-13T21:02:38Z'}

title: Meets Expectations
review:
Have only had 1 technical issue with the app, that being the inability to change billing address on a card. Whenever I try adding it as a new card with new billing address, it ignores it as if it‚Äôs a duplicate entry. Because of this my card is declined every time and I have to hand over my physical card.

Aside from the app itself the deals are disappointing now to say the least. I used to frequent McDonalds several times a week because of the great deals on the mobile app (ex: free x with purchase of $1 or more), but now they are so restricted I have no reason to go out of my way to visit, so I only go about once a month now.
developerResponse: {'id': 7763566, 'body': 'Hi there, friend! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-03-16T18:00:08Z'}

title: Time wasting
review: This review is for the mobile order function. If you want to waste your time, look no further than the McDonald‚Äôs app that you can use to order your meal! If you thought your meal would be ready by the time you got to the restaurant because you ordered from the app, you would be absolutely wrong! They don‚Äôt even receive your order until you pull into the restaurant! McDonald‚Äôs somehow managed to get this completely backwards. They need to take a lesson from the chick-fil-a app, they start to build your order immediately upon receiving word that you are on your way! It would have been faster for me to walk up to the counter at my local McDonald‚Äôs and order my 12 item order than to order through their app. Absolute garbage. The deals you can receive from the app are amazing though

title: Ridiculous app
review: This app has so many problems. The main problem is that it rarely works. ‚ÄúSorry the app is currently unavailable‚Äù is the ‚Äúdeal‚Äù I get more often than not. And when you tell a McDonalds restaurant that you got the notification that day but the app isn‚Äôt working right then while you are ordering, they tell you that they can‚Äôt help because each restaurant is a franchise. For example, on Brown Bag Lunch Day, the app notified me in the morning. After work I picked up my daughter and tried to pull the deal up on the app to show her, nothing. Broken app, for 3 hours while she was in dance, then after dance for 30 mins driving to McDonalds. And finally at the restaurant I‚Äôm told they can‚Äôt do anything about it because ‚Äúthat‚Äôs corporate‚Äù. That is just one example of the many. It‚Äôs false advertising.
developerResponse: {'id': 4297582, 'body': 'Oh no! Most times this can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give us a call, so we can look into this further at 1-877-334-4332.', 'modified': '2018-07-18T20:25:16Z'}

title: Best mobile ordering app, hands down!
review:
Traditionally food apps are clunky and hard to navigate because everyone does it differently. 

McDonald‚Äôs put a lot of time and effort into the process of this app. It‚Äôs intuitive and quick. You can literally stand in line And in the amount of time it took you to stand in line to wait to order you can place 4 orders on the mobile app. I can‚Äôt say enough how easy this app is, especially when comparing it with other restaurants mobile ordering interfaces. Well done McDonald‚Äôs- I‚Äôm lovin‚Äô it!

title: Poor Implementation, Terrible Customer Service
review:
I got double charged and submitted a report through the app.  Three days later I got an email saying they couldn‚Äôt figure out what location I was at, even though I put it on the submission, and to call them.

I tried to reply to the response, but they don‚Äôt allow it and make you call to get your money back. This is clearly endemic, because the very nice employees at the window told me that one customer had been charged twenty times!!!

Besides this double charge incident, this app is really prone to breaking and regularly requires an uninstall/reinstall to keep working. It seems like McDonald‚Äôs in 2022 should be able to figure out an app that actually has basic functionality working, but apparently not yet.

title: Absolutely amazing
review: After working at McDonald‚Äôs and hearing so many good things about the app the only thing I‚Äôve ever had an issue with was going to check out using my rewards and not actually checking out completely and it still taking my rewards away but other than that this app is absolutely reliable I use it every time I order McDonald‚Äôs I don‚Äôt eat McDonald‚Äôs without this app ! Sorry but it‚Äôs cheaper and smarter DOWNLOAD & even If u do chose to delete download whenever you think about going to McDonald‚Äôs (that‚Äôs what I doüò≠)

title: Wish It Was Like Being There
review:
better than most fast food aps, easy to apply rewards/points to online/mobile app orders, good payment options and pickup choices

that being said customized order options are very limited compared to standing in line at the restaurant 

most breakfast items that are offered with sausage can have bacon as a substitute in store but not on the mobile app   I know it‚Äôs a little thing but for folks who dislike McD‚Äôs sausage its a bigger deal and a reason to go to Jack in the Box (sub bacon on all items)
developerResponse: {'id': 29941053, 'body': "we're all about improvement. drop us a line here with as much input as you can on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n", 'modified': '2022-05-24T16:11:01Z'}

title: Nice app!
review: I really love the app and use it a lot! I‚Äôve only had a couple issues. Sometimes my mobile order gets stuck in the cart, which prevents me from placing a new order later. Also, sometimes the McD staff charge me again at the window even though I already paid for the order. The bank automatically refunds the duplicate payment , so not a problem. I chalk this up to staff not understanding how app works, because my mobile app order receipts look different than an in-store receipt, so maybe just some inside training would help this. Other wise, I‚Äôm lovin‚Äô it!
developerResponse: {'id': 31215229, 'body': "we're here to help resolve any issues you may have. hit us up through the link with more info on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n", 'modified': '2022-08-01T15:43:56Z'}

title: 1st time using the app. Not Happy
review: Placed and order for 2 plain cheeseburgers. I customized my order. All the information does not go to the store. I got my order went home and had to go all the way back and into the restaurant because they got my order wrong. The employee said it happens all the time that all the info doesn‚Äôt come threw when we place the order.  It sure if it‚Äôs true. This is the same restaurant I went in and asked for a plain chicken sandwich with cheese only, when I got to my car I checked my order and I got a roll with a piece of cheese only. So they make mistakes all the time. I should of known better. I think I‚Äôll start going to a different town from now on. UNBELIEVABLE.  ABSOLUTELY A TRUE STORY.
developerResponse: {'id': 30930167, 'body': "accuracy is everything! let's talk here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html", 'modified': '2022-07-17T14:01:28Z'}

title: Needs work
review: The richest fast food chain should have an app that works better. Please fix the glitches that came with the last update. I‚Äôve been trying to buy a mobile order with Apple Pay and it keeps saying ‚Äúdone‚Äù but it doesn‚Äôt go through and app crashes. Finally got it to work with credit card, but restaurant thinks I‚Äôm not there (even though my Google and maps app show me there) so I had to go inside to check in. And then I had to wait a while because no one was at the registers. Thinking mobile ordering was faster, but took longer. Please fix!  The app is user friendly besides the glitches.
developerResponse: {'id': 30107485, 'body': "uninstalling and reinstalling the app should fix it. if it doesn't our mobile app team is here via the link to assist you: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-06-01T22:23:52Z'}

title: Almost great
review:
Deals are listed but ‚Äúare not available at this time of day‚Äù - I‚Äôve tried during breakfast, lunch , and dinner and was given the same message.  If a deal is only available at a certain time t it should say so.  If the deal is marked as used (even though never purchased) it should say that.

To reiterate what a previous user posted the clock should reset at 20 hours.  I use the app at most every other day due to the 24 hour bug.  Computers are stupid and do exactly what they‚Äôre told so this is a programming issue.
developerResponse: {'id': 19654515, 'body': "We don't like that one bit. Let's get you back to those deals. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-12-09T19:44:03Z'}

title: Location Issues
review: The one thing I don‚Äôt like about this app is that when I place an order and I want my husband to pick it up on his way home we ALWAYS have problems at the restaurant! There needs to be an option to allow for someone else to pick up the order. He calls me when he gets to the restaurant and I push the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù button and because it‚Äôs gps based it says ‚Äúhmm it looks like you‚Äôre not here.‚Äù Then he has to give my name and they look it up and it‚Äôs not there and then they have to get someone else to find the order. It‚Äôs a nightmare and wastes a lot of time. Make an option to add someone else to pick up. There are so many fast food places out there that have this option and there‚Äôs no problem! Please consider changes!
developerResponse: {'id': 26680758, 'body': "There's always room for improvement. Drop us a line here with as much input as you can on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n", 'modified': '2021-12-07T00:35:27Z'}

title: App won‚Äôt close out prior order
review: I‚Äôve been using the McDonald‚Äôs app for some time now and initially would have given it 5 stars.  But lately (the past ~12 months), the app fails to closed out the prior order.  Because of this, before I start a new order, I have to reopen the prior order, cancel it, and then start a new order.  I thought this was going be a bug that would be fixed quickly but that‚Äôs apparently not the case.  This aside, while the app could ‚Äúflow‚Äù a little better, it offers good deals and I really like ordering in advance on my own time and prepaying.

title: Paid order for nothing
review: Paid through the app for pickup, app crashed and got rid of my order number, basically assuming I already picked it up. Restaurant refuses to give me the food I ordered because I have no order number, even though I showed the receipt AND my bank account that got charged. So here I am with no food, and had to reorder again and pay twice (a little more now because I wasted a deal from the app‚Ä¶). ONE MORE THING: the email I got from that lost order was sent to a restaurant in Indiana!! I don‚Äôt even live near the state of Indiana!! TOTALLY MESSED UP. And I wish I could have my MONEY back!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 25376640, 'body': 'We get how upsetting this is! Please share more details with us here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2021-09-28T16:27:51Z'}

title: Hate it!
review: Downloaded app and loved it! Great coupons, mobile ordering and pickup rocked! Once I was hooked the location I frequent had issues with internet connection, etc. I no longer could pickup mobile order easily, had to use drive-thru, mobile payment quite working. Called support, deleted app and downloaded again, including all forms of payment - still doesn‚Äôt work. Now I can‚Äôt even add a form of payment, super frustrating!  May affect my daily McD breakfast habit to no McD habit. Now that I had the ease of mobile, I‚Äôm not going back to waiting in long drive-thru lines.

title: Do Better
review: Maybe you should set up the app to tell you BEFOREHAND whether it‚Äôs a standalone restaurant or one in a walmart. Thanks to your inability to update closing times and inform me of this I was charged $11 for a meal that I now don't have access too because apparently this Mcdonald‚Äôs has been closed for over an hour yet somehow they were still able to charge my card? Sloppy and frustrating. What if I was a single parent with multiple kids trying to order dinner on my own and I can‚Äôt afford to pay for a replacement??? You have made it absolutely impossible to reach you on Sundays. If i can get mail Sunday morning you can have some people answering phones. You‚Äôre a multimillion dollar corporation not a church.

title: Maybe it will work?
review: I‚Äôve made several purchases with the mobile app and cannot say I‚Äôm thrilled with it. One locations, if you select pick up at drive thru, they don‚Äôt get your order. I was told at that particular location, when you go through the drive thru you have to select ‚Äòcurbside‚Äô for pick up method???why? To date, this issues remains unfixed . Today, placed an order at another location, selected my pick up method ( drive thru), pulled up to the drive thru, have them the pick up number, they couldn‚Äôt locate the order. Waited 15 minutes to get a salad and drink, had four staff members mess around with my phone then finally got the order by selecting pick up method, curbside again. Not a very convenient app for customers or staff, thought  this was supposed to be a time saver, anything but that!
developerResponse: {'id': 11750785, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-11-09T22:41:48Z'}

title: Third and Final time bothering
review:
The first time I used the app, I selected my curbside pickup spot number and watched as people who hadn‚Äôt even gotten to the restaurant yet get through the drive thru and leave with their food. Took twice the time it would have had I just not used the app.
Second time, after multiple attempts (with full signal) the app would not send my order to the restaurant. Had to go inside and read off my order from the app while they rang it up again in store. Again, doubling the amount of time it would have taken without app.
This time, got my order in, food was ready, but even though my card was charged, the store did not have a record of it being paid. So my food got cold whole trying to figure out the discrepancy.

The concept is a great one, but it‚Äôs horrible in practice.
developerResponse: {'id': 10574945, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can assist you with this issue.", 'modified': '2019-09-08T21:15:17Z'}

title: This app is crap
review: We have a very large family and eat at McDonalds way more than we should. So, it‚Äôs difficult for me to go into the store to order and I always feel badly about order a huge order in the drive thru. So, we have used the app quite a bit. At first, it worked pretty well. Then it started saying out payment didn‚Äôt work and we‚Äôd have to try again. So we‚Äôd try again and it still wouldn‚Äôt work. Take a look at my bank account and the funds had been preauthorized off my debit card. We ask the store about it and have been told that they don‚Äôt have anything to do with the app and half of the time it doesn‚Äôt work. They end up issuing a refund for the amounts authorized and then I have to order inside anyway. So, for us, it‚Äôs just quicker to go to the drive through to begin with.

title: Works well, but two glitches...
review:
I have now used the app extensively through its development and find only two glitches. The Order History is hard to find as it is not on the main menu or a submenu. We need that for expensing, etc.

Secondly, stores in the Order History, when I do stumble across it, show a Location by city name, not a specific identifier like F6315. Both should be shown since there are several McDonalds in many cities. McDonald‚Äôs also only identifies the store on refunds by store identifier. If you don‚Äôt add the article identifier to the elusive Order History, please make a lookup table available online.

Keep up the good work!
developerResponse: {'id': 4045340, 'body': "Hello! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2018-07-01T20:36:43Z'}

title: Needs fixing.
review:
I use this app for the deals all the time! I rarely use the mobile order and pay option because it‚Äôs always a hassle. First time I used it, it wasn‚Äôt letting me continue after adding my payment info. So frustrating, I just left. The drive thru line was long at this moment and my little one was sleeping so I couldn‚Äôt go in to order. Second time, was fine. Now this third time the app wasn‚Äôt letting me enter the curbside number I was in. It wasn‚Äôt submitting. I restarted the app. Even uninstalled it and installed again and still wouldn‚Äôt let me. I was waiting in the spot for a good 20 minutes trying to order. The drive thru line was long the whole 20-30 minutes.
My point is that this app needs some fixing in the curbside area.

title: McDonnalds
review: I had your app since it first came out I have never had good success with it unless I left town if I got out of Kenosha I could get what I wanted and the app worked fine I getting Kenosha and I can‚Äôt get it to work I have to sit and wait 5-10 minutes for my offer number comes up so that I can get credit for when I‚Äôm buying most of the time I just have to buy my stuff and go through the line without a number it‚Äôs been very frustrating I actually deleted your app I don‚Äôt want any of your bogus games anymore because nobody gets them nobody understands the app one time I asked somebody inside the store when I went inside to help me with the app and they said they don‚Äôt understand it either so you guys need to do something with your app
developerResponse: {'id': 32823362, 'body': "we're here to help! tell us more here so we can look into this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-27T15:52:04Z'}

title: Looks good but‚Ä¶..
review: I was excited to get the discounts and order easily through app for the drive through. Sounds easy right? Well guess what! You make the order in the app, you get the total, and the email confirmation of your order with the discount price, but then your credit card is charged the full amount! It‚Äôs a trick to make your order more food and then they won‚Äôt refund you and tell you to contact corporate who never respond / help. This app is tricking the customers. It over charges you and you‚Äôll have zero way to get a refund even when you have the proof of the order and the free items in the email. Made me actually stop getting food from the local McDonald‚Äôs because of how annoying it‚Äôs been trying to use this app.

title: Issues in case it‚Äôs helpful
review:
Full screen modal to accept new privacy policy is not being displayed properly. It would try to show then get pushed out by another view. Took at least three tries for it to show. Must be something with the timing of showing that page. 

The label is incorrect on the ‚Äúcomplete your registration page‚Äù. 
Reads ‚Äú ... McDonald's Terms & Conditions
and Privacy Statement‚Äù figured I‚Äôd mention since it‚Äôs probably a quick fix.

There‚Äôs is something off with your images under ‚Äúsandwiches & meals‚Äù. The cells initially get loaded with the wrong image every time the view appears.

The biggest issue is I cannot use the app because I cannot sign in. I am on the sign in page, tapped ‚Äúsign in with google‚Äù, signed in with no issues, and got ‚Äúthat email address already has a McDonald‚Äôs account‚Äù. Is it trying to register the user on sign in?

Idk but I‚Äôm happy to help debug if I can.

title: Horrible App
review: I will never use this app again!  Placed an order with the app on my phone.  Never told when ordering or anywhere else that my phone had to be in the parking lot connected to their WiFi before the order should go through.  My son went to pick the order up after he got off work with the confirmation number given on the order.  Told they could not do anything without my phone which was the reason we had my son pick it up!  Had to replace order and may be double charged but no one could tell me whether that would happen or not.  Took three times longer to get order while messing with this stupid app!  When technology costs you time it isn't worth using!  The idea is to SAVE TIME!  Never again!
developerResponse: {'id': 31876798, 'body': "we don't want to risk giving your order out to just anybody! that's why we ask that your phone be at the store. ", 'modified': '2022-09-06T20:08:59Z'}

title: Atrocious out of date experience
review: The login process still is the same thing. Make us open the app, then put in our email, then open our email, the click a button in the email, get sent to app loading screen which takes forever to load. Ridiculous. How and anything other than fast. I was going to get Mcd‚Äôs today and again ran into waiting for this and said forget it and got pretzels instead. Even worse they expect you to do this in a drive-in?  Why aren‚Äôt there codes to add your receipt order afterwards for points like just about every other company does?  I‚Äôm tired of not getting rewards for my purchases and will continue to only go when I‚Äôm in a rush and just get frustrated with continuing to not get rewards.
developerResponse: {'id': 29176473, 'body': 'we want things to be as easy as possible for you. tell us more about this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2022-04-14T15:58:51Z'}

title: Glitchtastic
review: It‚Äôs fine for ordering food - I wish the local stores (US) were able to process payments through the app? That seems to have been down the last few times I‚Äôve used it. My issue recently is I can‚Äôt change my password - the instructions on finding it in the personal settings section are a dead end. Also, I keep getting an error message when I try to add a credit card to payment methods. Which is ironic, since the app teed that function up for input as soon as I logged in. Have tried several CC and no luck. Otherwise, the interface is pretty good for ordering food, just some bugs.

title: Good app when it worked
review: App used to be great but when the updated it a couple updates ago I was no longer able to log in. I try to sign in with Facebook as I always have but it acts as though I‚Äôm a new user. When I agree to the terms it says you already have an account please log in. It‚Äôs a vicious circle that always ends the same. Unable to log into my account. I emailed and called customer support who was unable to help. They said they would escalate to the IT department but have heard nothing further since. That was approximately 3 weeks ago. Please fix the errors you caused when you updated the app!! App version 6.18.3

title: Should be Convenient but is a Hassle
review: Every time I use the app I have to clear out my previous order before I can order. Even if I‚Äôve asked for a receipt at the window. It‚Äôs annoying and sometimes frustrating. It seems like 60% of the time the cashier in the drive-thru has no idea what to do and looks surprised that I‚Äôm at their window ‚Äîeven when someone confirms my order through the speaker. About 2/3 of the time I have to pull into the space to wait but if I choose Curbside it takes forever and my order always has something wrong.
developerResponse: {'id': 9600516, 'body': 'Hi there! We always expect your service to be stellar. Having our staff trained and knowledgeable about our Mobile App is important to us. Please provide some more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can address this.', 'modified': '2019-07-10T21:56:46Z'}

title: User beware
review:
While the app is easy to use and easy to customize your order, user beware! I have 2 active teenage boys and placed a large order via the app that included 2 large milkshakes. When I went to pick up my order, I was told their ice cream machine was not working, as I was handed my food. Then she just walked away, I stood there till she came back and asked what do we do about the 2 milkshakes that I already paid for. She said ‚ÄúOh, well we don‚Äôt actually have anything to do with the app so you have to contact them for a refund‚Äù 
I contact the app and include the receipt that was emailed to me (yes, every time you use the app they email your receipt instead of being able to access it via the app- strange)
Now this is the kicker 
The response I got from the app was to contact my bank for the refund.
WTH!!!!! Contact my BANK??? This was your problem NOT theirs!!! I am sure USAA would love to hear all about your refund policy.
I have not used the app since and have shared my experience with everyone I know.
I prefer to order via an app and have an app for most places and I have NEVER encountered anything like this!!!
I do have the email to prove the ridiculous response that I got.

title: Gold Standard
review:
This app is the standard by which I rate other fast-food apps. It is well-thought out and has a clean interface without being too spare and Spartan.  The response time these days is pretty decent.

The only three shortcomings, for me, are 1) there is no way to update one‚Äôs email address (so one is forced to create a duplicate account and lose access to previously earned awards), 2) there doesn‚Äôt seem to be a good way to capture prior purchases/receipts when mobile ordering (for tax/business purposes), and 3) for the hotcakes & sausage platter the last time I tried it there didn‚Äôt seem to be a way to specify ‚Äúsubstitute bacon‚Äù for the sausage.

title: Somewhat convenient but sometimes slow
review: While convenient for skipping the drive-thru, you cannot complete the order for the. To start preparing the food until arrival. Today, even though I started the order when I was a 6 minute drive away, I couldn‚Äôt ‚Äúcheck in‚Äù until I arrived. It then took over 10 minutes to get an order of chicken tenders. I appreciate other apps where there is an intermediate step of ‚Äústart preparing my order‚Äù before the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù  button. That way, it would actually save me time. Today it would have been just as fast or faster to wait in the drive thru line. Everyone it that line made it through while I was still waiting.
developerResponse: {'id': 11044532, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out! We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile app that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2019-10-03T18:45:33Z'}

title: Great app-terrible McDonalds location
review: The app works great, but the past few times I have ordered I end up waiting 20+ minutes to get the food even with only a few cars in the line at the Lumberton TX location. If you choose to go through the drive through to pick up your order they will hand you the cold stuff and make you park and wait for your order. Meanwhile everything melts. All of the drive through orders seem to be processing correctly as the cars are moving along so I‚Äôm not sure where the disconnect is with mobile orders. Add the additional time to go back through the drive through line to get the items they missed. It‚Äôs better to bypass the app and order in the drive though at this location-definitely faster.

title: Work Issues
review: I downloaded this app and the OurLounge application after I had been hired, according to my Hiring Manager at location the applications should connect with each other. The only issue is when I try to log in with my email, it won‚Äôt let me. Try to change the password ‚Äúnot available to social customers.‚Äù Meaning it‚Äôs through my Google account. Try to log in with that and instead it swaps it to a ‚ÄúRegister‚Äù instead of a Log In, meaning it always gives me ‚Äúthat account already exists‚Äù instead of properly logging me in. How am I supposed to be able to use these apps together if I cannot log into one, and almost similar issues with OurLounge. I‚Äôm just glad my Schedule isn‚Äôt tied to either of these applications. :/

title: Love the convenience, sometimes slow to get food
review:
The only other food app that I use on a regular basis is the chipotle food app. I love McDonalds app user friendliness and I love the convenience itself. I have noticed that occasionally when I pull in I will see a car in back of the line in the drive thru and during my wait the car i saw in the back, is leaving from the final window well before I get my food. Is the right system in place to ensure mobile ordering customers have priority as well? 

If we compare the two apps I use the most. (Chipotle and McDonald's)

Chipotle I show up when they tell me my food is ready and I receive my food immediately.

McDonald's makes it after I arrive. I assume it's so that the food is always fresh. But we millennials, who are probably the majority of the customers using your app. We want fast and convenient. 

Love the app. Maybe this is the most efficient process. Just thought I would share my experience.

title: It's another app
review: It's a decent app. One thing I will suggest is putting something into the app where we can leave feedback for the store we ordered from. Case in point I just ordered breakfast picked it up in the drive thru. Didn't pay attention to the drink cause it was a dark drink but ended up wrong. Everyone wants $15 an hour to do anything anymore and if that's the case they should be held accountable. If this app had a section to send feedback to the owner of each location they could handle the problems like this and see who keeps doing the mistakes and help with wasted product. I know it's gonna happen from time to time but it seems like it happens more times than it needs to
developerResponse: {'id': 7610176, 'body': "Hello! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2019-03-06T22:55:36Z'}

title: Horrific App in Nashville TN
review: App seldom lets me login. I have to reset password. Seldom able to order online due to various constraints. Offers such as 2 for $5 not listed on app for my store even though it‚Äôs available when I arrive. Many other deals as well. Tried to use the $1 any Sandwich Deal at 4:55PM CST. APP said I had 5 minutes remaining to order as lunch was ending. Yet Terms of the Deal make no reference about time of day to use coupon. There are more restrictions than opportunities to use these Deals. Why even offer something you don‚Äôt intend to give. Why have an APP that is not going to allow a user to Log into consistently. I open your APP with optimism and all but 1 out of over a dozen times have left very frustrated and highly disappointed that a Corp of your Magnitude could fail so miserably at such a simple task!!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 5249021, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-09-26T22:30:12Z'}

title: Lousy Service. BadApp
review:
I‚Äôve used this app 4 times. The first 3 times I had to wait for my food. This time I ordered chicken strips about 15 minutes before I arrived. I arrived at 11:30 and logged in only to be told they don‚Äôt start cooking strips until 12. Then I was offered a refund but they didn‚Äôt know how to do a refund when the payment was from the app. They are giving me two egg McMuffins as a replacement. Don‚Äôt roll out an app when your stores don‚Äôt know how to fulfill orders or you offer food that is not available. 

Also I‚Äôve ordered the chicken strips at the drive thru 3 times only to be told ‚Äúwe‚Äôre out‚Äù or we won‚Äôt be cooking those for an hour‚Äù. Why do you have it on the menu if you can‚Äôt provide it? I don‚Äôt know if the problem is supply chain or management but somebody needs to figure it out and fix it.
developerResponse: {'id': 5004328, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-09-10T19:04:42Z'}

title: Ok application, stores need training
review:
Multiple McDonald‚Äôs don‚Äôt seem to have any idea how to use orders from the application.  At this point in time, I can usually point employees to the correct buttons to push, but I shouldn‚Äôt be doing the training.

This morning was annoying parked in spot, checked in, waited 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 12 minutes, got out and walked in.  I was met half way with my meal order.  Not a good experience.  Complain on the App Store, nah.  I‚Äôll use the Contact Us button.  Click, doesn‚Äôt load McDonalds website.  Navigate back in forth?  I get half the McDonalds website and a spinning loading button.  Hmm, how about some in application feedback directly to the store.

Let‚Äôs be honest this is the future for both consumers and McDonalds.  We want low prices, good food, and fast service.  Nice job getting a stellar app, but you really need more help from the operations group.  The pickup monitor in my McDonalds is also broken.  It has been for about 6 months.

I‚Äôve contacted McDonalds corporate before, but the local franchise owner doesn‚Äôt seem to care.

title: Online ordering
review: I like the online order it‚Äôs easier than trying to figure out what everyone wants while in line. But my only complaint is that I wish it was faster about getting your food sometimes it‚Äôs way slower than going through the line it would be faster if you have some employees doing just online orders to speed things up cause I have toddlers and they don‚Äôt like sitting in their car seats Longer than they have to just something for you to think about

title: Never working right
review:
First of all I am very tech savvy so not issues on my end. I tried everything to get around the glitches that are happening. I keep getting forced to pay high prices when I could be using the app deals. I‚Äôm very upset. 

This app has not been working right for quite sometime now. It used to work just fine until like a year ago. I‚Äôve been constant problems with the log in where it says I already have my email set and when I go to recognize button it just stops at the part where it says do it from my phone which is what I am doing. I need this fixed please. I don‚Äôt want to have to recreate accounts just to have it work one time. Please look into this. I have pics to show if that helps. Thank you.

title: Order never clears
review: To clear the previous order I have to sign out then sign back in, or it stays there and I have to clear each individual item but it‚Äôs under the same order number as the previous order. So my order that I picked up two weeks ago is still in my cart next time I use the app. It should clear once the order is complete (like it used to) but it hasn‚Äôt for months. I have to keep signing out and signing back in just to start a new order. Annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 31537162, 'body': 'we can totally get to the bottom of this. drop us a line with all the details here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-08-18T17:10:15Z'}

title: Rewards Don't Cycle
review: When my boyfriend was in town visiting over Christmas, he introduced me to McDonald's milkshakes. I fell in love with them instantly and for the duration of his stay we frequently used his rewards app for "buy one milkshake get one for only $0.29." About a month after he left, I downloaded the rewards app myself and haven't seen the reward/deal cycle back around since. Fast forward 4 months later and all I see are the same old deals of free fries, or a $0.99 coffee, or a $5 chicken sandwich. So I decided to ask an employee at a store near me about their deals and how often they switch out. She told me they change every week on Monday ... and yet all I see are the same old things. Truly disappointing and I think it's time to delete the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 31537307, 'body': "we're always looking for ways to improve. let's talk more here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n", 'modified': '2022-08-18T17:22:05Z'}

title: Drive thru
review: I pulled in the drive thru and waited for some one to come on the speaker. I watched the other drive they lane and three cars went they. I said hello 3-4 times and no one ever came. So I changed my pick up to curbside and l pulled into #3 curbside spot at 7:28am and waited. I receive my food at 7:34.  Also, I have purchased 4 McCaf√© beverages using my app last week and this week and I haven‚Äôt receive punches for them as of today. This has happen twice before and it is becoming annoying. I removed this app twice. I loaded it again and the same thing is happening. I‚Äôm done with it.

review: I‚Äôll make a mobile order one day and then use the app the next day and it will still have the previous order open. I didn‚Äôt get an item in an order and had to go back through the line and the person at the window asked me if I had proof of purchase because I didn‚Äôt want my receipt knowing the app has this feature but it didn‚Äôt work. I had to pay for the item again‚Ä¶

title: No Deal!!!!
review:
I constantly try to add $1 deals here and there and every time I do, upon checking out it says ‚Äúdeal is no longer available‚Äù lol what? Tried this several times at lunch and always the same outcome. Apps are the way of the world now, fix your system/app/servers to work like they should with ‚ÄúDeals‚Äù ‚Ä¶Do better McDonalds!!!!

*Response* Yes per your email I have deleted and reinstalled the app. I don‚Äôt feel it‚Äôs centralized to just me as it was doing this on my iPhone 11 Pro Max & last week upgraded to the iPhone 13  Pro Max so yes it‚Äôs been reinstalled on my new phone by default, yet still same outcome on any $1,$2 & $3 deals. title: Not bad tbh
review: As far as Absco, I love this app. I will not hardly eat McDonald's food unless there is a deal going on so I love to check this out and see the prices for deals in my rewards. The only thing that I would change would be deals for certain days of the week, more deals, and of course better deals. Since prices have went up at all these restaurants it's really nice to be able to see how much shipping is going to cost before you get there. It's also nice to get rewarded for the money that you spend in there and it makes spending money at McDonald's a little easier

title: little to no complaints
review:
i‚Äôm a broke college student. so imagine my surprise when mcdonald‚Äôs introduced the points system. free food? yes please.

my only issue is that when i initially set up my account with google, it used the name that was associated with my gmail account, which was not my name. about a year or so later, i went back and changed my name in google to my real name, but it never updated in the app. there isn‚Äôt a way to edit your name in personal settings, so i am stuck forever as Titanium_Duck. and it‚Äôs really embarrassing to order curbside because everyone has to see it üòÖ

title: Nightmare
review: I went to the McDonald‚Äôs down the road from my house to get some McNuggets quickly before I went to my second job. I ordered on the app and was the ONLY PERSON in the dining room, well, at first. 4 or 5 different people came in, ordered on the kiosk (because the woman working the front told them to) and just stood there with me. After waiting over 20 minutes, the gentleman that was prepping all the food asked the woman from the front, who was also working the drive-thru window by herself, what the people in the dining room needed and her response was, ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt care,‚Äù and she walked into the back. He then stepped up and at least got me my order. I stood there for about 20-30 minutes waiting for MCNUGGETS. Do you know what cold McNuggets taste like? I didn‚Äôt until today‚Ä¶

title: Service Curbside
review: It‚Äôs 12:30 or so and I pull into the curbside parking spot, entered the number as indicated on the app. After about 8 minutes or so an employee comes to ask me if I had placed an order. After confirming that I had placed and paid for my order with the app, he tells me I should have gone thru the drive thru. WHY? The app didn‚Äôt indicate that. I asked if he needed to know what the order was. He indicated that it was available inside the store. Which leads me ask...why didn‚Äôt he just bring it to me. At this point I‚Äôm not sure if this is an app error or an in-store error. Do they need to know how it all works? To top it off...the fries were awful, and the drink was not a Diet Coke. It‚Äôs not likely that I will visit this location or use the app. McD‚Äôs really let me down. üò¢

title: Absolutely terrible
review: Warning: ordering phone must be present for order to have a chance to show up at store. So, you can‚Äôt have your spouse/friend order for you while you are on your way. What‚Äôs even worse is that the ordering phone will have a confirmation number when you place the order, and a message will appear that says to give that confirmation number to the manager. But, guess what? Your order won‚Äôt even show up, it‚Äôs not searchable at all at the cashier console, presumably unless the ordering phone is near. Why give a confirmation number if it can‚Äôt be searched to pull my order up which they‚Äôve already collected for payment??? So, buyers beware! Looks like from other reviews that people are often charged twice, etc.

title: Errored out and charged my card.
review: Generally I have had a good experience but today it errored out when paying. Said it timed out but I was still charged. Looked at order but then it said one or more items aren‚Äôt available and to remove them so I removed two items and it asked me to pay again, I did. When server came out they said two receipts are here and that they cannot refund since it‚Äôs purchased on the app and I will have to take it up with my bank. I am not happy with how McDonald‚Äôs  cannot even do something as simple as letting their own employees offer a refund to not inconvenience a customer who has been charged for food they won‚Äôt receive. I now have to wait for payment to clear to try and dispute payment. Wasting my time.

title: Good App, Bad Order Delivery
review:
McDonald‚Äôs has not figured out mobile app execution. They are good with an app that allows you to order, but they are so slow in delivery I would not recommend this as a way to order food at McDonald‚Äôs. 

I thought the app was very good at finding a store close by and in ordering what I wanted. I would give very high ratings there. 

Where they fall down is getting you your food. The app says they start the order until you get there and that normally you can get you food in 5 minutes. I have tried a few different stores and they are more than double that to get me my food. When I ask why it took so long, they always say they were busy. The drive thru was backed up. 

Now I don‚Äôt expect to get my food before others that have order in the drive thru, but I don‚Äôt expect cars that arrive well after me to get served before me. Clearly mobile orders are not prioritized. They get the order to you when they feel like it. 

Well I feel like taking my business to other companies. Don‚Äôt use this app to order from McDonald‚Äôs unless you have a lot of extra time. Not a fast food operation.

title: Good most of the time
review: Pretty good most of the time, but what seem to be simple problems prevent me from giving it more stars. Primarily the fact that the app tends to be useless from 10:25-11am! I go to order breakfast then at checkout told items are no longer available at 10:27, fine no big deal. But then after closing at restarting the app multiple times I‚Äôm still only shown the breakfast menu, annoying. Then I was able to locate the very small ‚ÄúChange the menu‚Äù link at the bottom. Why not just change it automatically? ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è That coupled with the steady, consistent decline of ‚Äúdeals‚Äù on the app make it just average now.

title: Solid app. Could use a few improvements
review: Like the overall look, feel and functionality of the app. The biggest reason I order with the app as opposed the store are the deals. While not always the greatest deals I can usually find something That‚Äôll get me to order instead of looking at another fast food restaurants app deals. I do wish however there was some kind of rewards program considering you have to sign up with email anyways. For example spend $100 on app get a free large meal or something like that. Would really put the app over the top for me and make me more likely to use it more.
developerResponse: {'id': 16717246, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out, Dave. Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app.  You're helping us as we continuously work to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App, and we really appreciate it.", 'modified': '2020-07-18T18:34:11Z'}

title: Account hacked
review: After using this app successfully several times, my account was somehow hacked in a state half way across the country, twice by the time I saw the charges. Same location and I called since one charge was within an hour of them being there. You would think they would want to check the footage since everyone is going through drive thru or curbside but they could have cared less. Their loss since I am getting my money back, but after researching this app, several said it does not have a good protection and easily hacked. I deleted my card immediately and took all info off that I could, but why can‚Äôt you delete your own email address to get completely off the app? I just got an email that my app was updated?!?!!? Well I didn‚Äôt so who did? Ridiculous ü§¨

title: #LovingIt
review: It‚Äôs a great app to have when on the run n need to get your food quickly!! Wish they had a few more deals on frappes n breakfast sandwiches it‚Äôs really killing me though almost $4 b.sandwich n $4 drink!! So a couple more coupons in that area then it wouldn‚Äôt be so bad!! But that‚Äôs the way it is I know but other than that everything is great and I would recommend you try it before you knock it you probably will figure out that you like it as well!! So have a wonderful pleasant day people and remember always be kind to everyone and smile no matter what life throws your way!!

title: Coding is messed up big time.
review: This app ALWAYS has problems! I rarely give an app a 1 star rating but this is a joke. They‚Äôve messed up the coding on it some how so you can‚Äôt log in or sign up. It logged me out with this last update and when I try to log In it tries to make me register the account at the end and says can‚Äôt sign up when I try to login because surprise I already register this account but it won‚Äôt let me login in.  And then it just doesn‚Äôt work if I try a new account. I get bugs with an app, every app gets them but this is just rush coding on McDonald‚Äôs part. Test the app before releasing!!! It doesn‚Äôt ever seem like that‚Äôs done with some of the issues that happen on here. And if there are bugs fix them in a reasonable time. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôll be a couple weeks before this gets fixed.

title: Don't make a great app if you don't know how you roll out
review:
The idea of making a great app is to make people visit it, stay there, make them visit again and again; and making it a necessity, a dependability. This was such a great app. 

But a roll out/an upgrade shouldn't cause an existing version unsuable. I'd you didn't intend to make a great app, then I'm sorry, I was pretty dependent on it and suddenly it stopped working and asks me to update the app in the middle of no where.

Imagine Google maps stoped working somewhere in Las Vegas and forces you to update or it wouldn't work. How ridiculous that works be.

title: The ACTUAL best app
review:
People don‚Äôt realize how many deals you can get using the McDonalds app! They change every day and can be based off the store itself but you will save $$$ every visit and your points for free food are automatically tracked!

Only downside is after you place an order and pick it up, the next time you order again you may need to remove the items from your last order in your checkout (as the deal may have expired but the item is still in your checkout tray)!

title: Was good, now it‚Äôs terrible
review: If the app went back to its original types of deals before mobile pay, I would give a 5 star review, but it‚Äôs worthless nowI used this app all the time, I would pull up to the window with my coupons ready, I would purchase what was on the coupon and more. The coupons were what persuaded me to go to McDonald‚Äôs over other places, but now there‚Äôs very few coupons that I can use in-store, and the ones that can be used without mobile order and pay are pretty bad and don‚Äôt serve much purpose. Not everyone has a credit/debit card to use for a McDonald‚Äôs meal. It‚Äôs much more of an inconvenience to the customer over 90% of the time to order and pay through mobile. Overall, the app is useless to me and thousands of other people and I very rarely go to McDonald‚Äôs anymore.

title: Charged wrong
review: Use app at least twice a week never had an issue till today. Ordered in app. Went through drive Thur and when I look at my credit card I noticed I was charged wrong amount ( my credit card sends me text every time a charge is done) the wrong amount was on the paper receipt even though order shows correct amount due in app. Asked for manager and manager said I would need to contact app since I did mobile order and pay. In app fact said to contact store. I called the number on receipt and the person stated store should have made it right. So they are sending a coupon for free meal. However now I don‚Äôt want to use the app again because of this issue if it isn‚Äôt going to charge me correctly!

title: Add Mac Sauce
review:
It‚Äôs 2022 and I still can‚Äôt use the app to add Mac Sauce on my McChicken or triple hamburger (which has to be ordered as a triple cheeseburger no cheese which usually gets made incorrectly no matter what state I‚Äôm in from NH to FL).

Get it together corporate. As a former employee, y‚Äôall can do better. Do y‚Äôall know how much money you could be making by adding that extra 30¬¢ option? F‚Äôreal. Get your PR people and make a commercial I‚Äôm never going to see to let everyone know they can try Mac Sauce on literally everything.

I got a bunch of other ideas that will make you money if you wanna talk business but come correct.

title: Super friendly service
review: Each person throughout my experience was awesome from the first drivethru person who confirmed my order and offered me a receipt, to the 2nd driverthru worker who gave me my coffee and politely asked if I would pull ahead to have my sandwiches brought out, finally the young lady who came out of the establishment to bring me the rest of my order was so friendly asking me how my day was, reflected on how beautiful the whether was and bidded me a good rest of day when walking away. Staff is what all should be at every franchise

They person who did curve side meet me and got po i had called then said I‚Äôm not given you a latge drink then gave me a small fry . I just left and said screw it . And made yhis review . It seems they just rather crap on the app order people. Thinking of deleting the app as it becoming more of a aggravating that a help.

title: Only medium drinks
review:
EDIT 3/8/22: Increasing to a 4-star review since it seems the drink size issue is only when I try to order from my primary location. I can order different drink sizes from other locations. However, the app doesn‚Äôt seem to have up-to-date operating hours & will let me place orders at locations that are closed. 

ORIGINAL: I normally like this app, however, this recent update seems to have gotten rid of the ability to change your drink size, or if the ability‚Äôs still there, is much harder to find. My app is only allowing me to order medium drinks. ‚òπÔ∏è

title: Beware if you need a refund
review: I‚Äôve been using the app for months and its really convenient, but beware if something goes wrong with your order. I ordered a happy meal. Waiting 15 min in the parking lot and when my order didn't come in I went inside. I noticed a happy meal sitting in the prep area. I asked the server if she got my mobile order. She said no. I had to order and pay again. Long story short, they just gave me the happy meal already sitting on the counter. The app says to contact the restaurant, the restaurant phone just rings and rings. I have contacted McDonalds customer service and so far no response. I will be taking this up with my credit card. Not sure if I will use this app again.

review: What kind of food app forces the user to make an account to even use it? McDonald‚Äôs does. There is no way to do anything on the app like ordering food or looking at deals without being forced to create an account u like other apps like dominos or Pizza Hut or Taco Bell or really, can just keep going. Like no other fast food app forces a person to link some kind of account. That‚Äôs trash. Don‚Äôt like being forced to do anything. And the response just implies it‚Äôs so McDonald‚Äôs can personalize the experience just for the user with starting out taking away the decision from the user to use the app or not by creating an account. So if a person doesnt want a personalized experience or tracked ordering or what have you well can‚Äôt not do that with this app.

review:

title: Issue with app
review: Biggest problem I have with the app is it doesn‚Äôt have fountain water as something to select. Always have to have them add it at the window. They‚Äôre always dumbfounded as to why the app doesn‚Äôt allow it. Doesn‚Äôt seem to be any other forum to go to get this added as a feature. Please consider adding this item and I‚Äôll return to rate the app higher. Most of the glitches have been taken care of. This just seems like a huge oversight to not have fountain water as an option.
developerResponse: {'id': 18622941, 'body': "Hi there. We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2020-10-21T16:48:36Z'}

title: App doesn‚Äôt work
review:
Many issues. First I placed an order yesterday and selected curbside pickup. When I arrived I selected the number I was parked in. Waited 20 mins, when inside and ask about my food and was told they never received the order. Try to show them my order but app stated they were having issues. Try to order again and it didnt let me. 
Now today Im trying to order food and I was signed out. Signed in place my order and it asked for my card even though I done it already. So I entered ‚Äúa new card‚Äù same one which is the only one I have. The app states -card couldnt be added- I only owe one card, now I cant place mobile orders anymore. Very upsetting, I dont have time to wait in long lines. Please fix or I have to buy food somewhere else.

title: Frustrating
review: The app is ok and easy to use if you can log in. I‚Äôve gone through 2 accounts due to the same issue. When the app updates it signed me out and then I go to log back in and it prompts me to reregister. If I cancel that screen I can‚Äôt access anything. If I fill out the information it tells me an account with that info always exists. I can‚Äôt keep creating emails to make this work. Even if I did, in would lose any rewards (McCafe).  I tried deleting the app and reinstalling it, but that didn‚Äôt work either. I keep getting asked if I have the app and I tell them I have it they look at me like why didn‚Äôt you use it to order? Because I can‚Äôt log in. So frustrating.

title: Stole my money after not giving my order
review:
DO NOT TRUST THIS APP!! MONEY STOLEN! 
There's several problems with this app, mainly that it will steal your money without giving you any way to get a refund (look it up, there's many cases like mine.) You can order something and will be charged for it despite it not being available. Store says to call corporate, corporate says to call the store. Ugh. Also, Despite choosing your specific location, the app will show deals and items available when there isn't any or it's not honored at that store, and it won't tell you where you can find the item you're looking for. The menu doesn't show all items and the search feature doesn't work.

title: Eh kinda convenient kinda not
review: I use this app almost daily as it‚Äôs the only place open while I‚Äôm at work. The one thing I don‚Äôt like about this app is if you order you can‚Äôt send someone else to pick it up! It won‚Äôt even send the order to the store until you‚Äôre there and it senses that you are. I tried turning my location off and saying that I was there and it still used my location and said it looks like you‚Äôre not here yet. I also have had issues trying to use my free McCaf√© drink. I‚Äôll click on it and it logs me out of the app and most of the time it doesn‚Äôt give it to me and I end up paying full price anyway.

title: Good deals, bad service to pick up
review: This app is easy to use when ordering and you can get deals. However, why would you have to check in and the. Call the store and the store doesn‚Äôt ever answer when you get there. Tonight I‚Äôve seen multiple cars go through the long drive thru and leave before I even got my food which was only (according to the app) supposed to be about 5 minutes. I‚Äôve now been waiting 20 mins and have seen 3 people who have gotten here before me get their orders and leave. Something is definitely wrong here when I have to flag down the runner to help get my order that is by the way not even ready because I‚Äôm still waiting. Very dissatisfied.
developerResponse: {'id': 20692831, 'body': "Sounds like your visit wasn't too quick. Please provide some more info in this link https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/ so we can address this.", 'modified': '2021-01-27T18:51:10Z'}

title: The one things that could have made this perfect
review: Ordered food for my husband to pick up on the way home, to make our lives easier, because that‚Äôs what an app‚Äôs supposed to do, right? He pulls into the curbside space and I check in from my phone at home that he‚Äôs there. Well, guess what? Because he doesn‚Äôt have MY phone, they can‚Äôt complete the order. This, by far, is the dumbest, most inconvenient thing I‚Äôve ever seen. Ordering is easy and the app is laid out well. But this lack of ability to have someone else pick up an order because they don‚Äôt have the phone it was ordered on to process, is downright dumb. Deleted app. Maybe they‚Äôll change this stupid concept in the future.

title: App is broken, has been for months.
review: I have not been able to use this app for months. I cannot login, I continue to get errors saying we are experiencing technical difficulties this has been going on for several months. I have tried to create a new account and I still get the error we are experiencing technical difficulties, I try to login with my regular account same error. I have deleted the app and reinstalled several times and nothing works. It‚Äôs very frustrating, and honestly I have avoided trips to McDonald‚Äôs because I can‚Äôt use the coupons or collect on my drink rewards. Help would be appreciated in fixing this problem. I have contacted support before and it seems you get lost in the loop. If someone could help it would be great.

title: Good app, one change needed
review: I have used the app several times now for curb side pick up, the majority of the time my order comes out quickly and correct, a few times after I have been given my order there will be a item missing. Because the restaurant dining room is closed there isn‚Äôt a great way to tell the restaurant that you are missing an item or something is wrong. I suggest adding an element to the app that allows you to ping or notify the restaurant if something is wrong with your order. Other than that the app has been great.

title: Still has problems...
review:
I used to have this app years ago and decided to give it another go. First of all, logging in and making an account is very difficult as there are crashes and it takes so long to load if it even loads at all. 

Today I ordered my meal ahead of time and requested curbside pick up. I entered my card information and it said there was an error and I followed to apps instructions to restart it. I tried again and again until finally I decided to switch to Apple Pay. Not only was this an inconvenience, I found out a lot of my money was STILL taken out of my account after it kept telling me it failed. 

Don‚Äôt bother with this app, stick to the drive thru. I only wanted to try it to save money with the deals offered but its truly not worth the headache.

title: Waste of time
review: I downloaded the app so that I could place a long order instead of making my husband memorize it all for drive thru. Because I wasn‚Äôt with him I couldn‚Äôt check in that he was there to pick up, since it was only pinging my phone. I told him just to give them our order number and there was no number to call so he had to go inside to give the order. They said even with the number they couldn‚Äôt place it without my phone. So they had him login to my account and when it did that it deleted the entire order. Spent about 45 min trying to ‚Äúsave time‚Äù plus our regular menu options weren‚Äôt on the app like a cheeseburger option for happy meal of a 6 piece option for happy meal. The two cheeseburger combo was also not an option on the app. Super frustrating!

title: Worst exp with a mobile app
review: Ordering went fine. Very easy. Three blocks away I can‚Äôt check in because the says I‚Äôm not close enough. Look for designated parking, there isn‚Äôt any. App asks me what parking spot I‚Äôm in and the thing crashed my phone. The whole thing. Can‚Äôt close it. Can‚Äôt turn it off because screen no longer accepting touch. Two hard resets later I get the stupid thing closed and relaunch so I can just go inside. I‚Äôve got a busted ankle and can barely walk, no mask so now I have to walk inside. Food took another 10-15 minutes and another customer walked in stating they‚Äôve been waiting the same and the employees looked more confused than we were PO‚Äôd. Never again. This app is the worst app I‚Äôve ever used since I got the iPhone 3g at launch. It took my whole ü§¨ phone down with it!!!

title: More associate training / order review option in app.
review:
Only issue I‚Äôve had with app is that the associates don‚Äôt seem to be trained to handle app. 

When I began using it, associates literally wanted to re-ring the order in their register and charge me again even though the app forces me to use Apple Pay. 

Lately, I have been going through the drive-thru. Every single time, I am asked to park and come inside. In most cases, I would prefer to walk inside to avoid the drive thru line, but I would also like to drive-thru. 

Now that -I- finally got this location trained to even recognize the app, it seems I need to train them how to ring me in the drive thru. This is very upsetting. 

Also, there is no ‚Äúin app‚Äù option to review each order. Please add this to order details screen so when there is an issue, it can be communicated; not that complaints work at this location, but it would be nice to start a paper trail so corporate at least knows when issues are happening on a regular basis.

title: Be careful attaching a credit card to this app!!
review: I have been using this app for probably 6 months now and attached a credit card to the app to make mobile order purchases. Everything has been fine, up until today when my account was hacked and someone used my information to make a mobile order in MA (I live in WI, a far cry from the east coast). Thankfully because it was a mobile order I got a receipt emailed to me, but now I have had to call my credit card company to dispute the claim and to deactivate my card. There is also no way to remove a credit card from the app after you have put the information in your account. I am very disappointed in the lack of security the app has and plan to delete the app from all my devices because obviously it can‚Äôt be trusted!
developerResponse: {'id': 12404166, 'body': "Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.\r", 'modified': '2019-12-15T19:54:29Z'}

title: OK app
review: The app itself is working fine for me. The whole reason I got it, however, was to limit my wait time in the restaurant. Unfortunately, the mobile orders are not placed in the order queue for preparing until I am on the premises. Would be great if the order could be placed from wherever,  an estimated arrival time given by the customer, the order worked on and then just picked up. The only part of the ordering process that was circumvented by the app was placing the order with the cashier. Did nothing for wait time. Not exactly what I was looking for with how it is now.
developerResponse: {'id': 5987750, 'body': "Hey, Cathy! Sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2018-11-17T23:53:44Z'}

title: USED to be great... not anymore
review: This app used to be really great. It‚Äôs a waste of time now. They tricked people by giving good coupons at first. They had different coupons all the time and they very frequently had a coupon for three dollars off a purchase of $10 or more. The app has completely changed now. The only coupons that are on there every single day are always for quarter pounders, the stupid Mc Caf√©, a fry or a McGriddle. They NEVER change anymore. Same dumb coupons all the time. A quarter pounder is the only burger you can get a coupon for. Their dollar menu is pretty much nonexistent, which is fine because if food costs a dollar these days, it must not be very good. But the $1, $2, $3 menu is also pretty much nonexistent. So unless you want a quarter pounder everyday of your life, don‚Äôt waste your time.

title: Good app when it it works right.
review: Like title says it‚Äôs good when it works right. Issues that are annoying are that about half the time the previous order doesn‚Äôt clear. This makes it so deals don‚Äôt reset so if I go in and delete previous orders items I can‚Äôt use any deals even the day after I actually used a deal which is well over the 1 hour limit. Also just noticed the ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù feature doesn‚Äôt work at all so the only way to make a comment is through the App Store review which is why I‚Äôm here commenting instead of using the in app comment feature. Currently can‚Äôt make an order because the order I made yesterday won‚Äôt clear yet again.
