title: This app and the store associates aren‚Äôt in sync
review: I went to pick up my order at the drive through, and gave the order number that the app said to give, and the associate said he was unable to help me, he said he didn‚Äôt understand what I was asking for, then asked me if I was an Uber driver, and then told me to just give him the order again. I ended up driving over to curbside and ringing the order in that way. This is intolerable. Simply type in the mobile parking space number so they know which car to take my order to. I don't use the app all that often, but it has been very reliable.   I just wish I could say the same for the McD's staff.  From the moment that I parked there, It took them 10 minutes to get my order out to me.  Do they wait for us to arrive before starting to cook our order?  Seems to defeat the purpose of the app.  This was Oregon, I-5 exit at Riddle.

title: I Wish I Could Use This App
review:
When I first got the McDonald‚Äôs app several months ago I was able to use it, TWICE, and then it stopped working. I have called and spoken to someone at McDonald‚Äôs Customer Support twice who told me it was an APPLE/IPHONE ISSUE and could not be resolved.

On the Apple message board there are many other people in the same situation, all iPhone users, who can‚Äôt access the app. I have tried deleting the app and opening again.

I have the app on 2 Apple devices: my iPhone and my iPad and it won‚Äôt work on either device. When I attempt to log in on the app I receive one of the 2 following error messages:

1. We are experiencing technical difficulties 
2. Initialization critical error

I have a new phone (SE 2020) and don‚Äôt understand why I cannot use the app. While I am not technical and know nothing about coding, what I do know is that Burger King is getting my business.

title: Better but still bad
review:
Power user. Probably every day or at least five times per week. 
Many times orders get hung up. After using it and getting my order, when I open it again the next time, the order that I‚Äôve already gotten is still there.   I then have to delete (‚Äúare you sure?‚Äù) 
 I even had one time where the GPS didn‚Äôt recognize my location and so I pressed ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here‚Äù (multiple times) and I got charged six times for the same order. 

McDonald‚Äôs didn‚Äôt make it right I had to call my credit card company to get it fixed. For a large company their app should be a lot better.

The manager, Dianca, Said that they don‚Äôt train them for situations like this. That was seriously her excuse for not taking care of the customer.

Bravo McDonald‚Äôs

title: Love this App, But...
review: I love McDonald‚Äôs just as much as the next person, and I use this app just about every time I go! I usually use mobile ordering for whenever I‚Äôm at work on my lunch break and makes the process a little quicker. My only current issue is that whenever there‚Äôs a deal that goes unused in my cart and later expires, the app will not remove it. It‚Äôs been kind of an ongoing issue for both me and my boyfriend. I‚Äôd like to think once a deal expires it would delete itself? It‚Äôs not a super huge deal as mobile ordering isn‚Äôt my only option obviously lol, but just as some feedback for the development team! üòÅ

title: Ridiculous
review: I made an order on the app, paid for the food upon arrival.  After sitting in the curbside spot for 25 minutes, I tried calling the store and the The young woman that answered the phone told me that they‚Äôre running behind because nobody showed up for work and that she‚Äôs been there all day and it‚Äôs past time for her to go home and she‚Äôs leaving and she hung up the phone on me. So I walked to the drive-through window and got the attention of the woman working the drive-through and asked her if I could speak to the manager. When the manager came out I told her that after waiting for over 30 minutes for my food I didn‚Äôt want cold food anymore just refund my money and they told me that because I used the app they cannot refund the money. title: Many benefits - please read
review:
You get many useful benefits from this app:

1. You get to wait way longer for food than non app customers. 
2. You get to repeat the items you ordered through the app to the workers many times.
3. You get to explain the you paid through the app and then get the opportunity to come up with creative responses when asked to produce a receipt to prove it in order to get your food. 
4. You get to wait through whole drive thru line and then get the honor of being asked to pull into drive thru spot 1 to wait longer but at least you will not inconvenience the non app customers anymore. 
5. When they bring the food out and items are missing, they will return to the restaurant quickly before you discover and then you are left with the delightful choices of either getting back in the drive thru line or knocking at the locked door to get someone‚Äôs attention. 

As you can see, this app is essential for any fan of McDonalds.

Like a lot that McDonald‚Äôs attempts, their org of restaurants is not prepared to support a mobile app. McDonald‚Äôs is good with ideas but their actual implementation at the customer level is really awful.

title: Worst App Ever
review: Used this App once and will never use it again. I was sitting in the parking lot of a McDonalds on one side of town and at first the App told me there were no McDonalds near me. Really? I‚Äôm literally in the parking lot. So I finally got it work and it suggested 1 McDonalds near me (which is crazy because there were about 6 within 5 miles of me) and the address was the road I was on so I assumed it was the McDonalds I was at since I was sitting in the parking lot of a McDonalds on that road. Well, guess what. Wrong! It suggested a McDonalds for me that was on that same road but on the other side of town about 4 miles from where I was at. I was furious, because I was already pressed for time and I couldn‚Äôt believe it didn‚Äôt suggest the McDonalds which parking lot I was sitting in. Needless to say, never again will I use this App.

Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can further assist you.", 'modified': '2020-05-12T13:32:44Z'}

title: App issues
review: First and foremost the app works on a regular non busy day. I guess that‚Äôs the reason one would never have noticed the time limitations when ordering breakfast. I processed and submitted my breakfast order well before the cut off time. Arrived 10 min before breakfast was over. Random people parked in the curbside pick up so I park in regular parking. By the time I‚Äôm able to go I side it‚Äôs 1102 and I am unable to complete my order because breakfast is over. Why would I submit in the app so it can prepare my order start the process on Apple Pay and then have to redo it all over again when I arrive. Waste of my time. I should have saved the time and ordered inside the store instead of the app and would have been able to get my meal

title: Most times does not work correctly.
review:
Most times does not work correctly.  Store will not have order in their system or app will show error and cannot process payment.   The location near me was renovated and upgraded with the new ordering system about 5 months ago.  Their store ordering and online ordering system will be down, which seems to create long lines in drive thru. I typically try to avoid going inside. Seems to happen most when I‚Äôve gone later in evening, and only the drive thru is open.  At least 4-5 times, and I just leave.  

Frustrating but helps me eat healthier.
developerResponse: {'id': 10332309, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-08-24T21:37:25Z'}

title: Latest update screwed up the app
review: The latest update is awful. I have had nonstop problems since the update. Is it really necessary to have a timeline showing for drive thru orders? Now, even after getting my food and having the payment receipt sent to my email, the order still shows in the cart as being an open order. I have to manually reopen the order and delete each item before i try to order again. Several times when i check in the cashier has no record of receiving the order on their system which then creates more problems. Today it took 10 minutes to resolve. I would recommend reverting back to the prior version of the app. Would also like to see the ability to request light ice similar to some of your competitors apps.

title: Customer service
review: I‚Äôve been stopping at the store in Cle Elum, Wa. For the last few weeks around 10:30pm there is a young man by the name of Daniel that helps me, he‚Äôs always eager to help me and likes to make sure I don‚Äôt have to wait to long for my order. I‚Äôve been to lots of McDonald‚Äôs but have never been treated this important or nice ever. He is always apologetic if my order isn‚Äôt done cause they made it fresh in a timely fashion. I always look forward to stopping there because of him and actually quit going to the store in Ellensburg, Wa be of poor service. It‚Äôs definitely a breath of fresh air!
developerResponse: {'id': 4517475, 'body': "We're so excited to hear that, Dan! Swing by for your faves anytime the craving hits!", 'modified': '2018-08-03T22:16:03Z'}

title: Disgusting Bathrooms and Rude Employees
review:
My wife and I stopped to get gas right off of I-95 on exit 53 in Walterboro, South Carolina. The gas station had a McDonalds which I thought worked out great so we could rest a few minutes and go to the bathroom. 

My wife came out of the restroom and let the cashier know there was no soap in the ladies room and the trash cans were overflowing with feminine napkins that were on the floor. The person replied rudely that someone was already on their way. One of the ladies that was in the bathrooms at the same time spoke up as well and said she heard another person complain about ten minutes ago and they still hadn‚Äôt gotten to the bathrooms. After a few minutes at the counter and listening to several of the employees interacting with the customers, it was evident that my wife‚Äôs negative interaction with the one employee was the norm for this particular day. 

McDonalds is not an affluent restaurant, but it should have employees that treat customers with respect and take care of the business that employs them. We ended up not getting anything from this McDonalds because of the service and the issue with the cleanliness of the ladies bathroom. 

Michael Pentz

I love using the app to login at the physical kiosk at the store. It makes ordering very easy. I jump the line or don‚Äôt have to talk if I don‚Äôt want too. And finally paying is among the easiest experiences I‚Äôve had on my iPhone! Thank you McDonald‚Äôs for having an amazing app up to par with the amazing food you serve me consistently and deliciously. Thank you!!!

title: bait and switch
review: thoroughly annoyed with this app. lots of offers for free fries and free sundaes, Ô£øPay authorizes the correct amount, only to get my receipt from the restaurant that shows that i didn't get anything free. then i get the Ô£øPay notification for the increased, actual amount i paid. then the manager at the store hardly speaks english and acts offended that i want some money back, i showed her the offer on my phone, and her excuse was "they haven't fixed the wi-fi." for the record, i tried to report my issues inside the app, but surprise! that doesn't work either. i can't tap any of the fields to enter my OS version or name/email/etc.

title: Sync the menu and app
review:
1.Love the deals offered! I went out of my way to use the offers the first few weeks I downloaded the app. Normally I would eat there 3-4 times a year. Made it there about every 10 days.
2. Sync the menu and app. I ordered a McRib because it was on the app. Checked in a paid. Then had to get a refund in store bc they don‚Äôt have the product. THAT IS A PROBLEM. 
3. I had used the $1 any sandwich offer on a chicken pico guac. Then updated and now I have to pick from the drop down menu and that sandwich isn‚Äôt in the menu. The offer states ‚Äúany sandwich‚Äù but you must pick from 8 in the mobile order. THAT IS A PROBLEM.

title: Burned food
review: First of all, I was in the non busy drive thru waiting to give my order. 10 minutes go by I drive the the 1st window. Waited another 5 minutes while the young lady is sitting at the register. She then decided to open the window. She took my order reaching for my payment without telling me the charges. I had to ask, how much. I go to the next window. Picked up my order. Left the property. I opened the sandwich box to see the burned fish sandwich. The worker said it must be the oil. I suggested to change the oil and I get a fresh sandwich. While I was waiting, a patron came to the counter complaining about his fish sandwich also. I got the sandwich it was the same dark brown in color. I just gave up at that point. And left the store.  I won‚Äôt be back!

review: Update to app is not working at all and just spent 10 min being embarrassed and told by McDonald‚Äôs management in wasilla Alaska that it was my problem not theirs and that they will not honor any of my rewards points‚Ä¶.. thank u McDonald‚Äôs! title: Terrible interface, very buggy
review: I downloaded this app after my friends and family recommended it because of the deals. Also, the app charged me twice the first time I used it, and the screen was littered with pop ups and an extremely frustrating interface. I could not dispute the incorrect charge easily through the app so I had to do it through my bank. This app is a way for the corporation to dig into your personal data and violate your privacy. McDonald‚Äôs has gotten worse and worse over the years and this app is absolutely disgusting. Just stop eating there. Downloading the app has made me stop eating there.

title: refunds
review: Mcd app takes our money before the food is given. half of the time the restaurant is closed (within their business hours) or doesn‚Äôt have the right food. i ordered curbside pickup before 6:30 and the manager or worker came out saying they weren‚Äôt opening until 7am, after they took my money on the mobile app. i couldn‚Äôt wait that long. i called mcd corporate which was a waste of time because none of the options on the phone tree were to get a refund. i tried getting my money back from the mobile app but none of the topics were get a refund. now i know that if i left you wouldn‚Äôt give me a refund because you most likely would‚Äôve said that it looks like i‚Äôd received the order or whatever.

title: Problems
review:
Recently, I ordered their Surf and Turf deal which is suppose to include free fries and free drink. All the other deals that include something free that I‚Äôve used the free item is automatically included in the order.  Not the Surf and Turf.  They‚Äôve added an extra step, that is hard to find, where you have to order the free items separately. Why? Would a customer use a deal and then not for some inconceivable reason not want the free items included in the deal? Needless to say I didn‚Äôt jump through all the hoops and I didn‚Äôt get either ‚Äúfree‚Äù items ‚Äúincluded?‚Äù In this deal.
Also about a fourth of the time I use the app it has issues charging my credit card and I end up having to go inside so they can run my card. Not very convenient.

review: This was my favorite fast food app until the recent update. Other apps particularly Taco Bell are terrible and log me out and can‚Äôt remember payment cards. I never had problems with the McDonald‚Äôs app. Now the most common completely random issue is it says it can‚Äôt connect to Wi-Fi when my phone is working perfectly well with everything else. Multiple times we have intended to go to McDonald‚Äôs because ordering ahead usually makes them super fast for pick up but we have had Chick-fil-A and other options instead when the McDs app wouldn‚Äôt work.

title: Love‚Äôn it most of the time
review: I really enjoy using the McDonald‚Äôs app, is it is a very efficient way to have food red deer for me on the go. Well it‚Äôs working good, it‚Äôs fast and definitely saves me a lot of money, since I have some pretty good deals most of the time. There are times that the app is goofy, such as during the 10 o‚Äôclock hour even early in that hour in the morning that the system thinks that it‚Äôs lunchtime and you can‚Äôt even order neither. I‚Äôd say that happens about 15% of the time, otherwise it‚Äôs a great app to use.

title: New Rewards Program
review:
I really miss getting a free McCaf√© after purchase of so many. This new application does not provide but only a few options for coffee and there not what I purchase. I purchase the Carmel Macchiato all the time. Could this be an option going forward?

title: Almost there
review: This app almost gets it completely right. But I work in walking distance from a restaurant, and when I order at my desk and walk over, I then have to wait in line because the only options are drive thru or curbside. The app is already location tracking - I should be able to walk in, it knows I‚Äôm there and prompts if it should submit the order, I click yes, and it bills and my order goes up on the screen without waiting in the line. That would be perfect.

title: Decent but glitchy
review:
App works so theres that. Unfortunately the deal system gets pretty annoying. If you select a deal then change your mind on what you want you cannot use a different deal. This happens even if you removed original deal. So now you cant even re add that deal since the lockout begins from when you select a deal instead of when you confirm an order.

App lags behind seasonal items as well, so you are able to order items that don‚Äôt exist or if season just began you might not be able to order certain items from the app you can find in the store.

title: Ordering is now 10x slower
review:
In the last few weeks ordering through the app has become painful and very time consuming. 
The biggest issue is the my previous order from days ago never clears from the cart. And locks up the entire process especially if I am trying to order breakfast and my previous order was a lunch order. 
So now before I can enter my current order I have to delete the each item from the previous order and the coupon that is only good for a different set of hours will not acknowledge the Remove button.

It is very frustrating to constantly have to fight with app while just trying to do business with McDonald‚Äôs.

title: Question
review:
Love using this app. It makes it quick and easy for me to make sure I do not leave anyone‚Äôs order off, party of six here. 

Just wondering if I am missing something here??? I am unable to order a salad through this app. Yes, I have deleted, reinstalled, & signed back in but it does not show salads anywhere. Thought maybe if I searched the salad I wanted it would come up....nope. So when someone in my family wants a salad, I have to place another order when I get to the location. I would really like it if salads would be listed as an option on this mobile app. 
This is why I gave it a 4 out of 5 stars.

title: Hey McD, yr app needs this specific capability it doesn‚Äôt atm..
review:
For McDonalds that allow breakfast all day, even when the store says they do, the app refuses to let me order any breakfast. 

Also, the capability to process order breakfast orders during transitional hours.  As above, even though the store has set hours when they serve some breakfast, some dinner, it won‚Äôt let me place anything breakfast related.

Both are really convenient when traveling/picking up breakfast for multiple people, especially when there‚Äôs custom aspects for every persons individual order.  It certainly beats having to spend extra time at the drive thru, clogging up the line bc you‚Äôre having to reiterate elements or the WHOLE order, and then still getting things lost in translation.. either the order gets delivered wrong, or IF even possible, a return trip.

Skip the ‚Äúwe‚Äôll fix it next time‚Äù credits, the cold meals, the upset customers.. I‚Äôve just went elsewhere than McD altogether for this very reason.

title: Functionally very frustrating
review: The McDonalds app does many things right, but the things it doesn‚Äôt are very frustrating.  First, you cannot even access the Menu if other functions if you aren‚Äôt VERY near a McDonalds restaurant - which means I can‚Äôt even look at the  Deals unless I‚Äôm literally parked in their parking lot. You also can‚Äôt even use the free 6th coffee that you‚Äôve earned along with any other coupons.  I get not allowing two coupons to be used at once, but the earned loyalty McCafe items too?! That I don‚Äôt get.  Too frequent updates also frustrate when you seemingly have to update the app every time when you just want to place an order.  The first two frustrations could be easily addressed, and the third minimized.

title: No car and cant have a family member pick it up.
review: So my mom was already out on the town, and my sister had my car at friend‚Äôs house so i was stuck at home. I asked my mom to pick up my food if i order it on the app, however I didn‚Äôt know that unless my phone was present on the lot my mom couldnt pick up my food for me. I think that is absolute GARBAGE. Ive had multiple problems with this garbage app and the only reason i keep it on my phone is because it‚Äôs convenient when i need to be somewhere quickly and my order is already put in the system to be prepared. Now i have to wait for my mom to get home just soni can get in her car and waster her gas to go all the way back to our nearest mcdonalds just to get the food i couldnt order because MY PHONE WASNT ON THE PREMISES WHICH AGAIN IS ABSOLUTE FREAKING GARBAGE!!!!!

title: Coupons mysteriously disappear
review:
I viewed my coupons then went to McDonalds to order food based on the coupons on the app. 
Then literally while I‚Äôm placing my order I try to pull up my coupons to use that I just viewed on my phone 5 minutes ago but they are gone! Poof only 3 of the 10 coupons are showing now so I can‚Äôt order what I wanted! I leave hungry and mad. It‚Äôs fine if coupons are only good for the one day but disappearing at any moment is just plain stupid. Why should saving $ be like playing a game? Step up and fix this stupid app please!

title: Stores arbitrarily change availability
review:
Literally the only reason I got this app is so I can order food on my way home from work at 3am.  I placed my order, and when I got to the drive through at 330, the girl told me that they were only offering their breakfast menu.  I hate everything on the breakfast menu.  The store and app says full menu until 4am.  If you‚Äôre not going to stand by your posted schedules why bother. 

Congratulations McDonald‚Äôs, you‚Äôre 0-2. Went through the drive through again tonight, and yes I could order burgers, but they were only accepting cash and therefore could not get my mobile order.  And no they would not honor the deals on the app.  Left the drive through empty handed for the second day in a row.  Awesome job.  You could teach a class on how to disappoint customers

title: Don‚Äôt waste your time!
review: I ordered from my app the first time and we picked it up only problem is we had to go into the store which was not that big of a deal but the second time I used the app we went to pick up our order and of course got out of the car again but this time they wanted us to double pay and then call MY Bank and tell them to cancel the double transaction!!!! REALLY.... the lady was so rude and acted like me calling my bank shouldn‚Äôt be a big deal! Granite had I not already paid on the app I would have no problem paying in the store but the fact that the manager knew I already paid and I had my mobile receipt was crazy to pay again and then have to waste my time calling my own bank to refund the money! Well....sad but we won‚Äôt be eating McDonalds anymore!

title: Great concept but lacking on delivery.
review: It‚Äôs apparent that a lot of thought was put into this app but it can be rather difficult to navigate and is not very intuitive.  My biggest problem with The app is when you put your order in it‚Äôs not ready for you at pick up. You still have to wait for the order to be made.  When you put an order in to Starbucks on their app it‚Äôs ready for you at the window. All you have to do is go to the window and they hand it to you. I don‚Äôt understand why McDonald can‚Äôt do the same thing. If I‚Äôve already paid for the food then why not go ahead and have it ready for me when I show up. I just don‚Äôt understand the whole point of ordering ahead if you still have to wait.

title: Disappointed Lately
review: Now that they added the Mobile Order and Pay the options of what is available to use at the Drive-Thru are really limited, and I have never gotten the mobile order and pay to work yet.  It either tells me that my store is closed (when it‚Äôs not), or it allows me to add everything to my order and then says that an error occurs when I tap on payment method.  I would prefer that they remove mobile order and pay, and just allow us to use any of the coupons at the drive-thru window.

title: Breakfast or Lunch
review:
Here it is 8am on Saturday morning. Tried to redeem my points for Sausage Egg McMuffin. App said not available during lunch. App would let me pick a Big Mac, but they aren‚Äôt serving them because it‚Äôs not lunch. This is second time this has happened. App needs to better recognize between Breakfast and Lunch, so accumulated points can be redeemed.
Update, received email from app developer, problem seems to be solved, no issues last couple of weeks. I‚Äôm now satisfied. Changed rating to 5 star. Thanks, app developer.

review: Visiting from the USA and wanted food late. The store that is right by my hotel required me to download the app cause they said it was the only way to order so I did but when I searched for stores near me, it said it was unable to find any stores near my location and suggested I change the location so I literally typed in Vancouver (where I‚Äôm staying) and it STILL said there were no stores which is obviously incorrect. I can literally zoom into the map and see that there is a McDonald‚Äôs right by me but the app just won‚Äôt recognize it. I tried downloading the Canadian app but the App Store said it was not available in my current region. Unbelievable frustrating. Never was able to order food and went to bed hungry

title: App rewards redemption
review:
App works part of the time but doesn‚Äôt work 70% of the time like again to my points balance completely disappeared from my account when my points weren‚Äôt supposed to expire for 3 months but the entire balance disappeared and now I have no deals that I can use unless I order mobile which would be nice to do a mobile order but I don‚Äôt always have a card to purchase with so it would be nice to have a pay in store selection for pickup from McDonald‚Äôs instead of just paying through the app option

Update now all of my deals are Mobile order only now which is completely ridiculous because I don‚Äôt pay with card and there is no option to pay in restaurant upon pickup

title: Won‚Äôt even login
review:
Latest updates apparently do not perform the required login function. User goes through all the steps, but is never logged in. I even went through the process where I was sent an email to login, it still didn‚Äôt work. Stuck on the login screen, can‚Äôt look at ‚Äúdeals‚Äù, order history, account info, etc. Can‚Äôt order. Worthless.
Update, somehow the link on the webpage I arrived at via the email login finally worked, 15 minutes later.  I‚Äôm long-suffering compared to most, when it comes to technology. This app isn‚Äôt going to win people over with bugs like that.

title: Link account on multiple phones
review: The app is nice overall. One thing that would help a lot is to have the ability to place a McDonald‚Äôs order on one phone and use another phone to pickup the order. Currently my husband and I both have the app on our phones and are signed into the same account, but if I place an order on my phone he can‚Äôt pick up or even see the order with his phone. This is really helpful because it helps reduce us from ordering food while driving.

title: Less than one star for horrible customer service
review: If you like being charged for food that you will never receive try using this app you will set up your credit card number and place an order that will be charged to your account and then when you go to pick it up at the restaurant does not have your order and will tell you that it‚Äôs not their problem that the app is serviced by a third-party.  When I tried to place another order because I was hungry it said I can only place one order and that I need to delete my other order first. If I had an order to delete then that means the restaurant should‚Äôve had my food.   If you‚Äôre hungry and want to be frustrated at the same time this app is for you

title: Good, but needs work
review: The app itself is at times very clunky and adds what feel like a lot of unnecessary steps when trying to order. I understand that there are a lot of options, but the way that you have to get to them adds a lot of steps that make the app tedious and not conducive to quick ordering. I have honestly stopped using the app many times and just opted to use the regular drive through missing out on using rewards because it takes too long to order on the app. There needs to be a serious effort to streamline the app. It would also be nice to be able to bundle rewards.

The best way for us to improve on this is by getting all the details we can from you here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2021-12-30T21:13:33Z'}

title: Uber Eats Handoff is Awful
review: The Uber Eats handoff for this application is terrible. It consistently fails to add items to orders or randomly adds new ones (once, I had it add 6 apple fritters, another time, 12 burritos). If you‚Äôre not signed in to Uber Eats, the McDonald‚Äôs app will fail to recognize that you have the app installed at all. And after signing in, it won‚Äôt populate the order you‚Äôve created from the McDonald‚Äôs app (which essentially makes it useless). I‚Äôve also had it open the Uber app and then the food tab doesn‚Äôt work (just pulls up a blank white screen). Overall, for two companies that make as much money as they do, they should have more consistent and easy app handoff. It mostly feels like a half-baked, ineffective collaboration. Very disappointing.
developerResponse: {'id': 25776055, 'body': 'Getting your order right is super important to us. Help us get to the bottom of this by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html ', 'modified': '2021-10-19T17:16:36Z'}

title: Some problems
review: I enjoy the deals and the rewards program on this app. However, lately I have been facing a problem sometimes when I try to use one of the deals. I will pull it up on my phone to use at the register, and a message pops up saying I already used a deal recently so I can‚Äôt use another one for ~55 minutes. My phone had been locked in my pocket until that point so there‚Äôs no way I could have used one that recently. I missed out on a free Big Mac the other day because of this. I‚Äôve now reinstalled the app and am hoping it will start to work better now, but we‚Äôll have to see.

title: They don‚Äôt allow you to input gift cards
review: So I just knew with the new update to the app that they would enable McDonald‚Äôs gift cards but they do not and that makes mobile ordering impossible without a payment method. I have to use my own bank card still, which is not always convenient or possible. Other fast food apps enable this feature so not sure why McDonald‚Äôs one of the most popular fast food restaurants wouldn‚Äôt have this as an option. Also, if you don‚Äôt mobile order you‚Äôre not able to get many of the deals so it would be nice again to be able to use the gift cards.

title: ‚ÄúMy‚Äù McDonald‚Äôs
review:
I love the app, but what I really want to give a ‚Äúshout out‚Äù to is the employees at my local store!

My daughter and I love the employees at our McDonald‚Äôs! We are ‚Äúregulars‚Äù for drinks there (at least twice a day), and they make us feel like family every time‚Ä¶ just the other day I decided not to order my usual drink, and they actually came out to verify that it wasn‚Äôt a mistake‚Äîto make sure we didn‚Äôt forget!

I was a little embarrassed (obviously, we go there A LOT), but very much appreciated that they cared enough about my silly little frapp√© ‚Äúaddiction‚Äù to make sure I didn‚Äôt forget to order it‚Äînot to mention the sound of happiness in their voices when they see my daughter and I EVERY TIME they see us!

We have always had a local McDonald‚Äôs wherever we lived, but never had a ‚Äúmy McDonald‚Äôs‚Äù until we moved here‚Ä¶ THIS is the kind of business I prefer to frequent, and feel blessed to have met the fine people at that establishment. üíó

title: Trash garbage app
review:
Do not download if you were thinking of. Piece of garbage app. I tried signing in with email and put in name and password. Everything was going so great until the foolish app wouldn‚Äôt even let me verify my email account. I tried various times yet nothing. I‚Äôve tried to get into the app with verifying and this piece of trash won‚Äôt let me go any farther.
My mother was complaining about how the app was messed up bad, no organization, hard to get to the deals and etc. 
And now, I have to wait years for this stupid review to get approved because McDonald‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt want the public to know they are morons.  But you see, once you start insulting someone they think that they have a right to not say anything about it. Go burn your company McDonald‚Äôs.

title: User beware!
review: Unlike other online ordering apps, the order on the app generally is cleared out after the completed transaction.  Today, I submitted an order for McNuggets, fries and a medium soft drink prior to arriving at the McDonald‚Äôs.  When I arrived through the drive through, the order on the screen appeared and it was correct.  Stopped at the cashier‚Äôs window, they didn‚Äôt mention anything.  When I went to the pick up window, I was surprised that my order changed replacing everything with a Filetofish meal with large tea and a QPC meal with apple juice.  Tried to confirm my order in the app and found that my order changed without my permission or knowledge.  Was charged for the entire order.  User beware you‚Äôre order my change without your permission.üëé

title: This app cured my Stage IV cancer.
review:
When the nice young lady came out to bring me my food ordered with the McDonald's (C) Mobile App (TM), I felt an instant, unparalleled wave of pleasure. The aroma of our smorgasbord was utterly without compare, and in my 62 years as a Michelin reviewer, I find that even the greatest Michelin 3-Star restaurants could not hope to attain this level of culinary excellence.

My son, who is 47, ordered the Travvy Patty (TM) Happy Meal (TM), and found that his included toy was 200mL of lean. My Stage 4 pancreatic cancer, which had invaded my entire body, was cured immediately upon sight of the concotion. McDonald's (C) is using their power for good, and has finally cured all disease.

God is real, and the McDonald's app is proof.

title: Order altered with charge and no items provided.  Poor in-app support
review:
Issue: Altered order without my consent with pending charge; No items received
Transaction: Credit Card; Dispute not yet initiated as charge is posted as "pending"

I placed a mobile order for a McDouble and a Deluxe Crispy Chicken sandwich.  I proceeded through the drive through and provided my order number.  At the pick up windowI was told that my order "did not go through".  I provided an image of my receipt with the charge to my credit card.  I was told to try submitting my order again.  I reviewed my charge to My card which was not consistent with my order.  I reviewed the McDonald's app and the recent order information states my order was 2 Large Sprites, small fries, and a triple cheeseburger.  I did not place this order for which I was charged.  I did not receive any items.  I messaged McDonalds through the app and have not yet received a reply.  

Once my transaction is finalized, I intend to dispute it.  This app wasted a lot of time, I was charged for an order that I did not make, my actual order was dropped by the system, and I received no food.

title: Really need to take that location thing off
review: In the past, several times, someone will ask for me to pick up food for them and they‚Äôll place the order and when I get there it says the order isn‚Äôt found. Other apps I have used have never had an issue. I give the order number or name and go on and get the food. It‚Äôs been a HUGE inconvenience and HORRIBLE experience with the associates inside saying they can‚Äôt do anything because it doesn‚Äôt show up when the app itself reflects otherwise. Really need to update that.

title: Frustrating
review: I tried using this app at one point but was logged out and since I didn‚Äôt remember my password to login I set it to reset and decided to worry about the email I‚Äôd get later. I‚Äôm trying again and noticed I never received an email. When I try logging in it says ‚Äúemail or password aren‚Äôt correct‚Äù which doesn‚Äôt even let me put in a password just choose a gmail account. Apparently also can‚Äôt reset a social customer account password? It changes from log in to sign up but I can‚Äôt even sign up with a different email account bc it says I have to log in with an existing account. Which as stated when I try to it won‚Äôt work. It‚Äôs disappointing that as a McDonald‚Äôs employee who‚Äôd want to use this with deals and such on a more frequent basis this app is useless.

title: Can‚Äôt order breakfast. Can‚Äôt log in. Seriously guys?
review: Every single time I open the app, it says there was a critical initialization error and to restart the app, even after restarting it multiple times. Every single time I try to log in it says they are experiencing ‚Äútechnical difficulties‚Äù and to try again later. As of this time, it has given me both of these messages three days in a row. There are literally ZERO breakfast items available through the app. They just don‚Äôt show up. You can only order lunch items for some reason. That means if it‚Äôs before 10:30 the app is actually unusable. I don‚Äôt understand how such a massive company can have such a massive oversight. This is beyond frustrating. McDonalds, just why? You seriously can‚Äôt afford to develop an app that works?
developerResponse: {'id': 15104832, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Calvin. We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks.", 'modified': '2020-05-05T14:13:37Z'}

title: Unreliable
review: Nearly every time I place an order, I get to the restaurant only to find they never got it, or they did and I paid on the app and the store says I didn‚Äôt. Also it is crazy that you have to physically have the phone the order is placed on, often times my husband will ask me to place an order from home while he is driving, a confirmation number or the ability to add another person for pick up should be available. The only thing that this app is semi useful for is scanning one of the ‚Äúdeals‚Äù at the restaurant. It‚Äôs so bizarre to me that one of the biggest corporations can‚Äôt make an app that functions properly, I have never had these problems with ANY other food app, so obviously it can be done!

title: Hating my morning coffee
review: Every day for the past five years I go to McDonald‚Äôs for my breakfast especially the coffee a week ago I went to McDonald‚Äôs my coffee was excellent until I got to the last bit of it felt something in my mouth and Ruehle and spit it out and realized there was a flower in my coffee I have not been back to that McDonald‚Äôs sense for coffee in the mornings I was very disgusted I tried to call the store on several occasions and received no answer this is unacceptable to me now I am actually afraid to even have my children eat there before this I would‚Äôve rated McDonald‚Äôs as a five.

title: It works but when it doesn‚Äôt it does so in disappointing fashion
review: The app works most of the time nowadays.  But when it doesn‚Äôt work it just lets you continue to flounder around and struggle not knowing what the issue is.  The payment system also has a flaw.  It doesn‚Äôt update the cards.  When a credit card is renewed the app still does not accept the card and demands that the card gets replaced.  It won‚Äôt just let you enter the same card details and accept it.  It wants an entirely different card which defeats the purpose of a quick in and out thing if you are finding and entering the details of an entirely different card in the restaurant

title: Bad taste
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for a long time. I loved it until i got charged for an order I didn‚Äôt place BC a previous order was still somehow pending and I was near a McDonald‚Äôs. So they just completed this order again (BC i was near the restaurant) and I never checked into that location or anything. I tried to get it resolved but they didn‚Äôt know how to fix it and a manager never called me back. I contacted McDonald‚Äôs on the web and they were just as useless. Told me to dispute the transaction with my bank as fraud. Well I did but it wasn‚Äôt fraud!  It was a glitch in their stupid system and employees who don‚Äôt know how to (or care to) fix it. So they basically got my money for nothing, and now my debit card has been cancelled because of this and I won‚Äôt have one for 7-10 days. So mad.

title: Make sure you look at your email to see how much they charged you.
review:
I had put a mobile order for one number 6 meal with large drink and large fries. It was glitching when I went through the drive through.  By the time I went home and went to my banking app. McDonald‚Äôs ended up taking 34 dollars for just one meal. I called to let them know and they gave me a case number to take to my bank to get my money back. I hate that I have to go to the bank to get my money back. Since I have a son who has autism
And has sensory issues it makes it hard going anywhere as it is. And in order to get my money put back into my card I have to go. But I gave the app a 2 because when I called they had great customer service.

title: Enjoy the app and food, but app needs added feature
review:
My children and I love McDonalds and your app is both user friendly and offers value compared to other fast food competitors,  but your app needs an added component to track and provide the users individualized discounts based on the users regular and frequent purchases. 
Iunderstand McDonald‚Äôs promotes discounts based on promotional items, new menu items, and or items that they believe important to promote at any given time, but it would be a pleasant surprise to receive coupons and discounts for items that my family purchases on a regular basis.

title: Lost my money
review: I was in the restaurant to pick up my order who I made by the MC app. After waiting 10 minutes I went to check the reason for the delay, the attendant told me did not have my order and that I had to pay again, even after showing her the sms receipt and Mc Donald's e-mail receipt. I asked to call the manager, came a lady who said it was not her problem, but the application, that she could do nothing and that if I wanted to stand there like a fool all day, I could, turned and left me alone. I asked to speak to another manager who said he could do nothing, that I had to leave without my money and without my food, that I had to call my bank. And that was my unforgettable Mc Donalds experience, I paid, waited forty minutes, and left without my money and without my food. Love it?

title: Coupons Changed After a Couple Weeks
review: Loved this app at first because they had daily coupons that changed and great incentives on coffee. You could even vote on the deal for the next day! They totally hooked me, and then after about a month of using the app, I did the update and then all the coupons changed. No daily deal and now they exclude iced coffee which was the one coupon I was using all the time! Now the coupons don't change and they're mostly for lunch items. Super disappointed in the app now and have deleted it.

title: Could use improvements
review: The mobile order is pointless.  When I mobile order it is usually because I need the food ready when I get there because I am in a hurry.  I don‚Äôt want to wait until I get there to submit the order and this app forces you to do that.  Also the full menu is not available and the 1,2,3 menu is not available.  UPDATE the developer response:  "Hey, Jamie! Sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!"  Thanks guys I was planning on ordering my food an hour early and then complaining when I got there to pick it up because it‚Äôs ice cold.  Chick-fil-a and Starbucks know how to do mobile ordering right, guess I‚Äôll stick with them üëéüèº
developerResponse: {'id': 8047165, 'body': "Hey, Jamie! Sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2019-04-04T03:58:46Z'}

title: Peglegb
review:
I love the app but sometimes it will tell me that I did not finish with checkout and cannot get the order to clear. I wind up having to remove the app and do the setup again when reloading. Disappointing because I usually have only one or two more specialty drinks to buy before I get a free one. 
Also, it would be nice to not have to be at the restaurant to check out. I sometimes will order for my daughter from work and it would be great if she could go pick it up instead of having to go myself. 
I really do enjoy the short wait time for my order. It makes the process so much easier.

title: Fed up
review:
I have downloaded this app three times and I have yet to be able to order. The first time I ordered and when I got to the drive through window, the cashier stated they did not have my order. She then asked me if I selected the right location so I gave her my phone. Once she saw everything was done correctly, her response was, ‚ÄúMam I don‚Äôt know what to tell you.‚Äù I left. 

The next two tries I can‚Äôt get the order to go through. It always says product not available or when I try to pay it says my email is wrong. 

I‚Äôm done trying this ish!

title: Internal processing errors
review:
One simple, little error when trying to update (wait, delete the card and add a payment method - editing my card‚Äôs expiration date was not an option) ruined the entire mobile order experience.  Using the app was an inconvenience by adding more steps to the process when I had to drive through anyway, give the order number and manually pay - during the lunch rush on July 4th.
No thank you.  I had avoided McDonald‚Äôs for the past four months for other reasons and now I can renew my resolve to not eat here again.
developerResponse: {'id': 4126185, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2018-07-06T18:58:25Z'}

title: Great food and great app
review: The app is well designed, with all options laid out to maximize functionality and ordering speed. The deals and points are well done. The app gets updated regularly, which keeps it glitch free and, well, updated with all the menu items available in store. All around great app and McDonalds is a great place to get great fast food. The only gripe I can make doesn‚Äôt count against the app, but here it is. If you select ‚Äòeat in‚Äô on the app, they usually pack it ‚Äòto go‚Äô in a bag anyway, but it‚Äôs minor.

title: Shame on you....
review: The fact that you are pushing the majority of your deals to mobile ordering only is horrible. I drive Uber and Uber eats and many of the drivers I talk to have the same complaint. Ironically the people who drive Uber eats almost never mobile order from you. This needs to change. I have signatures from over 200 drivers in the San Diego and North County area willing to boycott delivering ANY Mc Donald‚Äôs orders if this continues. The last thing we want to do when we take a break at your establishments is have to mobile order. Yeah we get a complimentary coffee or soft drink off the clock. How about you actually show some appreciation for what we do for you. It‚Äôs bad enough at night when we get stuck for 20 min in a drive through for an order that‚Äôs only gonna pay out 3$ and change.

title: Nutrition not showing as much details
review: I use the app frequently since I‚Äôve had some great deals and try to spend as little as I can going to McDonald‚Äôs since I usually just get a coffee. However I noticed that the app used to allow you to check the saturated fats so I could get a general idea on which ones were lower in it to get for a quick meal. However recently they removed this feature which is annoying since now I don‚Äôt have any idea which is which anymore. No clue why they removed this but they should bring it back.
developerResponse: {'id': 31517620, 'body': 'we aim to make you the best app ever. help us out by sharing more details here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html   \r\n', 'modified': '2022-08-17T19:41:06Z'}

title: Don‚Äôt Get- useless
review: The app works fairly well, but stores screw it up. They treat app users worse than walk in or drive up customers- typically your food takes longer to get. It says lobby is open, when it is closed and you can‚Äôt change or cancel your order and you‚Äôre forced to sit in the long drive thru line even though I would have not chosen to order from the store if that was my only option. And forget the mobile order pick-up spots that can take over 10 minutes, just happened now for 4th time in a week, when they say 5 minutes. Fast food automation is coming and apps like this are the first step in that evolution and if they can‚Äôt get this right, forget the next phase working. USELESS!!
developerResponse: {'id': 30551276, 'body': "we want better for our customers! let's discuss this further at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-06-25T14:52:58Z'}

title: Worthless!
review: The 7.0.2 supposed upgrade is a further downgrade of what used to be a decent app. I have the same login issue that so many other people are complaining about. And, I am so tired of the developers response to go to some stupid webpage and send them more information. If you do that, you are wasting your time. You‚Äôll never get a response. What happened to the good old days when you could talk to a customer service representative? At least if they didn‚Äôt know what they were talking about you knew it immediately. Formally, I ate at McDonald‚Äôs on a relatively frequent basis. Now, not at all. I‚Äôve deleted the app because I hate it, and if I want fast food I‚Äôll use the Burger King or Wendy‚Äôs app. They both work reasonably well.

title: Bugs everywhere!
review:
Downloaded the app this past weekend to give it a try. Quickly noticed a few terrible user experiences that should be addressed.
1. Menu doesn‚Äôt default to current menu for the hour. I had to scroll to the bottom of the page and locate the smallest text to change to the breakfast menu... at 7:45am. 
2. I added a deal to my cart and it said it was only valid until November 12th. Considering I downloaded the app in December, why would it even be showing something from November? Also, if the deal is expired, do you not have any logic built to hide it???

For as large of a corporation as McDonalds is.... this feels like a very rushed, low budget, mobile app.

title: Trouble Ordering
review: I‚Äôve never really had an issue with the app, always worked well, maybe with the drive thru (not knowing how to access the order, but I blame that more on lack of training rather than the app). But lately there are certain items that one isn‚Äôt able to order because it‚Äôs ‚Äúunavailable after midnight‚Äù despite it not being close to midnight. I assumed it was a one time glitch but it‚Äôs been months since it happened and it still remains the same. Not the end of the world just more of a mild annoyance. Overall is a good app

title: Needs glitches fixed ASAP
review:
App doesn‚Äôt work at all now. It signed me out. Won‚Äôt let let log back in. At top of app screen is says Fatal Error, please sign in... it can‚Äôt even locate stores. I try to order not
logged in and it says no McDonald‚Äôs exist in my area..I tried contacting McDonald‚Äôs but to no help at all. Almost 6 months later and no update to fix the bugs. I‚Äôve tried re-installing the app serval dozen times. That doesn‚Äôt work -_-.plus now the app just crashes and closes out when I tap on the icon. I just stopped using the app all together it‚Äôs not worth the hassle at this point. Notified McDonald‚Äôs of issue and they didn‚Äôt seem to want to help. Unless they fix the app soon I say to all DO NOT USE THE APP!! Just go through the drive through!!

title: Works until it doesn‚Äôt. Glitchy
review:
Location management is an issue and the app will take liberties with your order causing issues.  

First of all, you can‚Äôt order food and have someone else pick it up. Ordered food for my dad, but he couldn‚Äôt pick up because my phone had to be there. While that feature may be useful for the average order, it‚Äôs clearly shortsighted on the part of the app developer. There should be a way to override it.

Breakfast last until 11 at our location but 10:29 on the app. By the time I drove down myself to get the food because it was before 11 but after 10:29. So the app ordered the coffee and not the food (on it‚Äôs own without approval to remove the other items). So I had to get back in line anyways to re-order the same things that the app took out of the order ...

All easily avoidable problems that cost me a lot of time and irritation. The app is clearly underdeveloped. That paired with a the staff that clearly is undertrained on how to deal with orders from the app creates a frustrating experience.

title: Absolute garbage.
review: Was in a pinch and needed to order curbside pickup.   First off the app is horribly in efficient to place the order.   I selected ApplePay for the payment method, so I could select which card to use.   When I placed the order it paid with my Apple Cash,  not Apple Pay, with no way to select a different option with in applepay.  So I had an order 1/2 paid for and the app would throw an error saying to select another payment method but showed a blank screen.   And no way out of the payment screen.   After killing the app and going through the cycle a few times I finally figured out that the screen with no words on it wanted me to add another payment method.   Never have I seen such a clunky payment process on an app.

title: Could Be Better
review: I use McD‚Äôs app a great deal when ordering food and too lazy to get out of car.  No doubt the convenience cannot be beat.  However, there are things/services that the app just can‚Äôt provide, such as requesting ketchup for my fries, which already has a customize button but does not have the ketchup option.  Most if not all of my fry orders at the curb come without ketchup. The restaurant staff is not trained to include ketchup unless expressly requested.  That‚Äôs a huge shortcoming of the app.  I will change to a 5-star review when this option is offered.

title: Can‚Äôt pay
review: In general the app is fine but the last four times I have tried it the payment doesn‚Äôt go through when I get to the drive-through. I am positive there is nothing wrong with the cards, I have even tried different payment methods. Same thing. I also still get a receipt from McDonald‚Äôs with my order and amount and everything else from the app. Especially in this age of contactless payments during Covid it‚Äôs really disappointing it‚Äôs so hard to pay without having to handover a card. Or I just can‚Äôt use the app and I have to order it through the drive-through which won‚Äôt let me use any of the special deals on the app

Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can get this looked into for ya. ", 'modified': '2020-12-04T17:20:03Z'}

title: No respect
review: I would give me stars but the town I live in they are rude, very rude, and what really takes the cake is going through the drive through and sitting there for a very long time until they come on the speaker to take your order. Then when you drive up to get your what you have ordered, you are finding yourself turning around to go back and get the food they screwed up on or didn‚Äôt put with your food. I have got to the point that I don‚Äôt even go there no more because of the rudeness, and not getting your order correct. And when you do say something, they always have an excuse it look at you like you are crazy. I‚Äôm done with this
developerResponse: {'id': 19071319, 'body': "No, that won't do at all. Let's get this looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. ", 'modified': '2020-11-12T16:10:21Z'}

title: Glitchy
review:
For the most part the app works well. Several times though it becomes glitchy. I am in the middle of an order and it becomes impossible to add additional items, the app tells me I cannot order at the time of day even though it‚Äôs Noon and I am getting a deal on French fries. Deal says good for drive through but when I get to the window it‚Äôs declined. Store won‚Äôt honor it.  When I try to restart a glitchy attempt, I cannot get a deal any longer as the previous attempt is stuck. 

I have had several good experiences but several negative ones as well. In the end it is always me that has to pay full price when you tease me with deals.
developerResponse: {'id': 19047426, 'body': "That's not awesome to hear. Let's get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2020-11-11T16:57:56Z'}

title: It‚Äôs okay.
review: I‚Äôve had the McDonald‚Äôs app for a while but I‚Äôve just recently started using it. I loved it but now it‚Äôs not that great. I‚Äôve recently placed a order on my phone and my friend went to go pick it up without me so obviously my phone wasn‚Äôt at the restaurant. I hit ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here‚Äù when she arrived. It wouldn‚Äôt let me hit it because my phone wasn‚Äôt at the location and she had to place a whole new order because I couldn‚Äôt check in and they couldn‚Äôt find it even with the order number so she had to pay for it again also. Waste of money!
developerResponse: {'id': 14498369, 'body': "Hey, Ella. Sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store with the same phone that was used to place the order. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you.", 'modified': '2020-04-06T20:18:00Z'}

title: Shameful
review:
Update: My previous review was left a couple of years ago, so I figured they had time to fix the issues. Nope. The interface is a little better, but still cumbersome. Mobile ordering is worthless: you don‚Äôt get your food any faster, and the available food options aren‚Äôt correct. Fool me once...

I am appalled that this app was released in its current state. I have no idea why they put this pile of garbage on the app store. McDonalds should be embarrassed, but more importantly the development team should be ashamed. The design is difficult to use, but the app is barely functional; see  other reviews for the sub-amateur-level bugs people are experiencing. This will be a losing proposition for McDonalds unless they pull this app immediately and get a dev shop who knows what they are doing.
developerResponse: {'id': 14302733, 'body': "Hello there! We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2020-03-28T16:07:10Z'}

title: Lost my Mccafe points!!
review: I love this app because of all the deals. Well I just went to Mcdonalds yesterday and was looking for a coupon to use. Well I couldn't open it because I had to update it first, which I did right then and there. We'll when I opened my coupons, I lost all four of my Mccafe deals and I just needed one more to get my free drink! I couldn't believe it! That's just messed up! Why does the update delete our progress!?!?! Please fix this issue because what's the point of using it if everytime I need to update, it deletes all my purchases!

title: Won‚Äôt even allow you to view entire menu
review: This is the worst fast food app I‚Äôve ever used. Half of your menu isn‚Äôt even on the menu to order. What happened to breakfast? You made the game changing decision to serve a limited-breakfast menu, all day.. but you‚Äôre not allowing your customers to do so unless they physically come to the restaurant to order? That makes no sense. You have to go to the restaurant anyway to pick up your food- why not allow me to place my ENTIRE order versus doing half and half. It takes 6-10 minutes to cook McMuffins or biscuits, depending on which you order- YOU NEED TO HAVE IT ON YOUR APP‚ÄôS MENU TO ORDER IN ADVANCE SINCE YALL TAKE 10 MINUTES TO SERVE WHEN YOU ORDER AT THE LOCATION. üôÑüò° Fix this, it‚Äôs awful. Now, if you don‚Äôt mind I have to go wait on food for ten years at McDonald‚Äôs. Thanks for that.
developerResponse: {'id': 12213749, 'body': "We're really sorry you were disappointed! Can you provide some more info in this link https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/ so we can look into this further.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-12-04T17:35:30Z'}

title: Downhill fast
review: I loved using this app until the last few months or so. There were always deals that I could use or just gather my punches for rewards. The last few months though, I‚Äôve had issues with my deals literally being there when I check at home and gone before I get to the store (about a two minute drive), my punches randomly disappearing, the app not loading at all, just a hot mess. Like every time one thing is fixed another breaks. Like today, I used my app to get an iced coffee for $1 and I had four punches. Now, the deal that I used is gone and all of my punches are missing. I knew I wouldn‚Äôt get a punch because I used the deal but the punches shouldn‚Äôt have disappeared. If this keeps up, I‚Äôm deleting.

title: Expect it to take longer
review:
Inevitably when I order via the app, they don‚Äôt start making the food until I arrive at the window. This means the order typically takes longer than if I had just ordered in the drive through. The mobile pickup spots are pointless.  Whenever I‚Äôve requested that the food be brought there, I wait and wait before finally giving up, going into the store and either discover they didn‚Äôt even know the order was in the system, or the food is just sitting there. 

Was going to give 2 stars because the app WAS relatively intuitive and well developed.  Lately, however, the latest updates have been very glitchy and now Apple Pay appears to have disappeared. How do you have a mobile pay app in 2019 and not have Apple Pay?

title: Love it!
review: I love the McDonald‚Äôs app! I especially like how fast it is to reorder the items I‚Äôve ordered in the past. The app is reliable and doesn‚Äôt crash on me. The only opportunity is in the restaurants sometimes. I‚Äôve been to a few that I‚Äôve used curbside and they never bring it to me. My order ends up just sitting inside. But, that‚Äôs only happened in a couple stores. The vast majority do a good job! I definitely recommend the app! Plus, with all the coupons it helps to save money. I especially love the McCafe buy 5 get one free!! It keeps me going back more often!
developerResponse: {'id': 6778717, 'body': "Hey! It‚Äôs like that feeling you get when you order from the McDonald's App... #likeaboss", 'modified': '2019-01-10T23:48:30Z'}

title: I‚Äôm done
review: Decided to give the app a second chance. Learned my lesson  before to never order from the app but decided to use it for the deals. I clicked on a deal to scan, double checked to make sure it was the right one and then scanned it only for it to be of a completely different deal, one I didn‚Äôt want. No way to unscan the deal and need to wait an hour before scanning a new one. I‚Äôm done.  It seems they had absolutely no concern for costumer experience when they created this app as it seems whenever there‚Äôs an issue or mess up with the app, there‚Äôs no way to easily undo or fix it. When it works it may be nice but if the app someone messes up you‚Äôre screwed and from my last experience when I went through the app customer service, they pretty much don‚Äôt care
developerResponse: {'id': 4413964, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-06-10T02:59:23Z'}

title: Easy to order in App, but the store never has my order
review: I have ordered twice in the app, paid, shown up at the store, and they do not have my order nor can they pull it up via my order number. Then when they manually enter everything, the coupon codes never work and I get charged full price. Walmart and ChickfilA don‚Äôt have any of these issues with their mobile apps, so what‚Äôs the deal, McDonald‚Äôs? They work flawlessly. Your app wastes my time. The only reason I use it is for a coupon deal and that isn‚Äôt working. I‚Äôm ordering ahead with a deal, then I‚Äôm ordering again in person after holding up the line trying to get the employees to find my order, and then I end up paying full price. No thank you.

title: Curbside and in store pick up is SLOW
review:
First off, Bring back SUPER SIZE! 

The app typically works well. The deals seem to be slim going into 2019, though. The Buy one sandwich get one for $1 will be missed. 

McDonald‚Äôs is getting as slow as In n out when it comes to drive-thru and in store service. Even if I check in 100ft away they are SLOW! Expand check in area to perhaps a mile or 1/2 mile. Allow order to be sent to the kitchen immediately so when we arrive there is a higher chance of it being ready. Starbucks, Taco Bell and Jack In The Box allow this. They already do this with Uber Eats orders let us do it, McDonald‚Äôs! 

 In store pick up and curbside place your mobile order with the rest of their dine-in orders. They prioritize drive-thru orders then dine in and curbside and typically do not have the staff to expedite to curbside faster than drive-thru. 

Super Size please! No one is getting any thinner on large fries so let us purchase super size or better yet a bucket of fries! We are all responsible for our own dietary decisions. Perhaps not soda, but fries YES!

title: Good for coupons, bad for ordering
review: I give stars because of free fries and $ off coupons! This part works, but please make menu more like the actual one and also update. I would love to be able to select a location, create an order beforehand at home or somewhere far from McD, then be allowed just click submit when I get close because i don‚Äôt want to be fiddling with the app when arriving at the restaurant. The app seems to freeze when I‚Äôm getting closer to the restaurant because there are dead spots.  Let us create a complete order from a distance‚Äî also will help with those of us taking orders from a group.  This will eliminate connectivity issues at certain locations where there is poor cell signal.
developerResponse: {'id': 4364572, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2018-07-23T23:48:50Z'}

title: Lots of clicks in odd places
review:
It works but you have to get used to the order of things. Place order. Go back to order, etc. 
The deals have been generous and worth using the app. 
Can‚Äôt get a pack of mayo, ketchup etc. (It seems) so you have to go through the drivethru instead of curbside if you want those. 
Curbside delivery can scare the hell out of you when they come up from behind the window and say ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs your order‚Äôl while you‚Äôre surfing the web.  They all need to take a little round walk and head back to the driver from the front of the car.

title: New log in total fail!
review: Loved this app, until this new login. Now every time you have to go to a email verification. Total failure. Today my order was lost when I got to the restaurant for pickup. The developers failed and trying to protect our accounts by not working out a better system. I‚Äôve now gone from heavy user of McDonald‚Äôs, to deleting the app and not going there at all. Even though the deals save money this app decided me to stop eating at McDonald‚Äôs. I will probably lose more weight now.
developerResponse: {'id': 25375889, 'body': "We don't want to lose you, Johny! Let's discuss this further at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-09-28T15:49:46Z'}

title: Terrible
review: I keep hoping that the curbside ordering will get better but at this point I'm not hopeful. I could be wrong but I thought the purpose of it was to make it faster to pick up.  Yesterday I pulled in and set my parking spot number and waited. The email I received about my order said 7:13pm.  I watched as literally dozens of cars came and went from the drive thru window. Finally at the ten minute mark it couldn't take anymore of my teenagers complaining and went in to set what was going on. As soon as I go inside, my order miraculously was ready! Do the employees just not like the added responsibility of having to bring food out for you or something? McDonalds, you have a lot to learn from a certain Atlanta based chicken place when it comes to perfecting the online/curbside experience.

title: Endless loop verifying email
review: I know this app works for a lot of people but for me it is useless. I tried to register and it sent me an email to verify my email address. When I tried to on my iPhone it said ‚ÄúSafari cannot open the page because the address is invalid.‚Äù I then tried using my iPad and when I opened the email the link to press was missing it just said to  activate link from my phone. Then I tried getting a friend to use their device to verify my email and it worked BUT then when I tried to login it said that it was a different device and click the (non existent) link to verify the device and I was on the continuous hamster wheel all over again. Thankfully McDonalds is not the only place in town.

title: Nothing but problems
review: I‚Äôve been kicked out of the app many times and cannot sign back in so I use another email now I can‚Äôt get signed in with that I‚Äôve sent at least eight emails to them about this and never received a response. I‚Äôve lost over 20,000 points because I can‚Äôt sign back in it keeps taking me in a loop telling me to register my device and when I click on it it says the device is already registered and I cannot sign back in it just keeps doing that taking me to the email then taking me to the Internet when it‚Äôs supposed to take me to the app. It won‚Äôt work and then half the time when I pull up to use it somethings wrong and it won‚Äôt work too many problems with this app

title: Apple Pay no longer works in app
review:
I‚Äôve used this app more than I care to admit. Recently, the app will not allow me to use Apple Pay as a method of payment, despite it being an option and despite my using it many times previously. 

Upon selecting ‚Äúpay‚Äù, I‚Äôm given a message that simply says ‚ÄúApple Pay cannot be used with this app, please check app settings‚Äù. 

I have sufficient funds and the card is linked properly (literally nothing has changed in the last year), so I think this is a software problem on their end. That‚Äôs frustrating because I‚Äôm hesitant to give out my banking info if any kind in apps/sites any longer. They are too risk prone to hacking.
developerResponse: {'id': 27105094, 'body': "We don't want you to be frustrated, Ashleigh! Try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn't fix it, reach out to us here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-12-28T16:03:33Z'}

title: Good for ordering ahead but need more features.
review:
It is convenient for ordering ahead however. It really need a refund or feature. Frequently someone gets an order wrong and there is no easy way to resolve it without a lot of hassle. You should be able to select the item in the order and request a refund or credit for the missing item.

McDonald could also then work with a problem restaurant to improve service at that location if there is too many problems.

I would encourage more people to make reviews about it to give a incentive to include such a feature.
developerResponse: {'id': 26921122, 'body': 'We hear ya! When you need a refund return to the store, so they can assist you. Your order should however always be correct. Help us address this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/', 'modified': '2021-12-19T14:29:21Z'}

title: Charges multiple times and never works
review: It has been over a year and sadly this app still never works right. I have given up on paying with the app as I have been charged 5 times in one day. The bank returned 4 charges but who wants to go through that?! The employees are not helpful at all and just say pay again. Which is really dumb. The curbside is never right and many places have perfected this method in a way shorter amount of time. McDonald‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt care either and it shows. They have no interest in what we are saying. This has been this way for over a year! They have lost any possibility of being the name they were before‚Ä¶..it is now fast junk and no thought or care. Where is your heart McDonald‚Äôs???

title: Unable to order or login
review: Unable to login or order for at least a month. I‚Äôve deleted the app and reinstalled. Still unable to login. Place ticket with Apple and McDonald app support. Got an email from McDonald support team. Who had me answer question. About changing my email and etc.... To only get an email telling me that I needed to update my software. But my software is automatically updated. And deleted the app multiple time again. Still unable to login to order. Seriously!!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 20445071, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that. Let us look into that. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-02-10T20:27:22Z'}

title: What just happened?
review:
So I have been using the McDonald‚Äôs app for over a year. The new version is ridiculous. You have to click like 7 buttons to get what you want, that seems really not user friendly but, that‚Äôs besides the point. 

I have been gathering points for a while now and decided today to cash some in for my iced coffee. I think, this should be easy. It wasn‚Äôt. I ordered my coffee and scanned my app, the girl keeps telling me I still owed $2.83. I said it should be covered she says no. 

She then realized that she had pushed the payment key. She fixes it, the app goes through and I have a zero balance on the screen. She says, this has already been used, you owe the money. I‚Äôm like, it‚Äôs on zero. I just used it. You must not have any points. I have over 20k points. 

We go back and forth for a while until the manager had to get involved. The girl literally accused me of trying to scam her.

 I‚Äôm not using the app anymore, I‚Äôll just get my coffee from someone who doesn‚Äôt accuse me of stealing because your app is trash. So insulting.

title: Issues
review:
Every time I go to use it it asks me to sign in or sign up (again). It never keeps me logged in. This can be quite frustrating when I‚Äôm pulling up to the drive thru window and have to wait for internet to load everything, etc. 

Now when I log in with my Facebook again, it says ‚Äúthe app is still in developing mode & I don‚Äôt have access to it. Switch to a registered test user or ask an app manager for permissions‚Äù. Not sure what that means? When I try to log in with Google it says I can‚Äôt because I previously logged in with facebook.

If it weren‚Äôt for these issues I‚Äôd give it a 5 star.

title: Issues with deals coupons not being applied
review:
BE SURE TO CHECK YOUR RECEIPTS FOR CORRECT COUPON USE!!!

For the past 2 weekends, I have used the $7 off $25 coupon. Both times my charges were without the coupon, even though at the time of checkout it shows that it was applied. The restaurant maintains that it isn‚Äôt an issue on their end , and they were not able to fix the problem. Emailed McDonald‚Äôs corporate and was told it was an issue with my internet connection the first time. This past Sunday , the issue happened again. Took screenshots of the checkout screen with the discount applied. Emailed the company at the bottom of the receipt, and still no contact. 
Sad McDonald‚Äôs. Hope this isn‚Äôt a scam to get people to buy more food.

title: Is there any advantage to using the app?
review: I ordered on my app while my husband left to pick it up. Turns out you can pay for it but have to have the phone you ordered with, on the premises, to get McDonald‚Äôs to start preparing the order. I sent my husband a picture of our order confirmation and it was just like he ordered there, meaning he still had to wait like it was ordered that minute instead of 4 minutes ahead.  If you‚Äôre in a hurry, ordering on the app doesn‚Äôt save you any time because they won‚Äôt start your order until the phone the order came from makes it onto the property.  Other than that major flaw, the app is really user-friendly.
developerResponse: {'id': 21043563, 'body': "Hey there.  We're always working on an even better App that you enjoy using. Thanks for helping us out.", 'modified': '2021-02-14T16:50:45Z'}
