title: Customer Service
review: I enjoy the mobile app , plus the additional curb side service which is quick and easy. It is nice that your company created a safe way to serve your customers in this new realm of environment. I like how the customers can have their ordered customized just for them. What would be great to have additional ‚Äúegg white‚Äù options for breakfast added to the app. It is always a plus to service your customers with a smile to show ‚Äúthank you‚Äù for choosing ‚Äúour‚Äù company. So far it has been to good experience, I give a thumbs up.

title: Worst fast food app
review: This is the worst fast food app I‚Äôve probably ever used.  If I‚Äôm creating a mobile order it will just hang forever and never load over half the times I‚Äôve tried it. I tried to use it at 8:30pm once and it would only show me breakfast items and when I tried to use a coupon it told me it ‚Äúwasn‚Äôt available at this time of the day‚Äù because the app thought it was convinced that in was the morning.  One time I opened the app after more than a week since the last use and it immediately showed that I placed an order and to tap when I was at the restaurant even though I had just barely opened the app and hadn‚Äôt placed anything. This is the worst and most buggy food app I think I‚Äôve ever used
developerResponse: {'id': 20559669, 'body': 'We always want your Mobile Ordering to be awesome. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.', 'modified': '2021-01-21T17:25:20Z'}

title: Doesn‚Äôt save modifiers if you ‚Äúmake it a meal‚Äù after customizing
review:
Twice now I have ordered with the app, both times modifiers have not saved. It‚Äôs not easy to peel cheese off a McGriddle, and you can‚Äôt get mustard off a burger. The first time the restaurant kindly fixed the burgers, this time they refused to fix because it didn‚Äôt show modifiers on their end.

EDIT: Decided to give the app one more try. I discovered that if you customize your items BEFORE ‚Äúmaking it a meal‚Äù then it discards your customizations and doesn‚Äôt warn you that‚Äôs been done. Make sure you choose the meal first, THEN  customize your items so you don‚Äôt get treated like a criminal when you pick up your order.
developerResponse: {'id': 19397221, 'body': 'We always want your Mobile Ordering to be awesome. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. ', 'modified': '2020-11-27T17:13:04Z'}

title: Charges sales tax when it shouldn‚Äôt
review:
I only use the app for coupons. I would like to use the ordering part of the app but it makes my order more expensive than if I just order at the restaurant.

I live in Ohio and we do not pay sales tax on food. The exception is soft drinks are taxable. If I add 5 McChicken to bag it correctly shows 5.00. But when you hit pay it‚Äôs added .38 tax. Why would I use the app when I can order it at the restaurant and avoid tax? Ohio is 7.75 tax on soft drinks only. The only tax the app should be doing is 8 cents on your 1 dollar drinks. 

Please consider updating the app so it handles tax for the state we live in.
developerResponse: {'id': 18117072, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-09-26T17:26:04Z'}

title: App Still Doesn‚Äôt Work
review:
I used to use the app for mobile orders all the time so I don‚Äôt know what happened, but the McDonald‚Äôs app hasn‚Äôt worked in months. First, it crashed every time I open it. Now that I‚Äôve updated it to the newest update, the app finally stays open but still says ‚ÄúApplication Initialization critical error occurred. Please restart the app.‚Äù When I try to login (because it doesn‚Äôt stay logged in which is stupid), it doesn‚Äôt let me and says ‚ÄúWe are experiencing technical difficulties right now, please try again later.‚Äù 

TLDR: the update did nothing, these problems have persisted for months now and make the app completely useless. ‚ÄúApp only‚Äù deals (like the BOGO spicy nuggets for today) are literally POINTLESS if the app hasn‚Äôt worked in months and no one has fixed it.

title: Orders Placed By Phone Tracking
review: I placed a mobile order so my girlfriend could pick up on her lunch break. It was the first time I used the app and apparently the order is tracked by the phone it was placed on so the order never went through. She spent her entire lunch break at the restaurant because the manager never acknowledged her inside to help her until she got in line to get attention from the cashier. Then! Had to order at the restaurant because the order number on my phone could not be found. Maybe if you could warn people placing the app order that it will only go through if the phone is tracked in accordance to navigation with the restaurant that will help avoid wasting someone‚Äôs time. OR don‚Äôt provide an order number that says ask for help if you can‚Äôt check in!

Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-06-18T18:14:11Z'}

title: Connectivity issues remain
review: No app available for breakfast.  For lunch we ordered and selected the sandwich deal of the day.  Order was paid for on the app.  Get to drive thru was asked to pay again. Get the order and no deal.  It appears the only way to get attention to this frustrating issue is:  cancel both payments and return the food and drink items.  All of which will be discarded.  Lose lose for everyone.  The very next time, this is exactly what will happen.

title: So frustrated
review:
I‚Äôve tried uninstalling, updating, etc.  the app becomes useless if you have something in you bag that‚Äôs becomes unavailable at that location, even if it‚Äôs a freaking kids toy from a happy meal.  Can‚Äôt just delete the item from your bag either, because it just doesn‚Äôt know what to do.
On top of that if you try to delete and recreate a new account, it complains that you have an account and need to log in as a social user.  Try that though and everything goes to hell.  Maybe it‚Äôs just me because my gmail account is managed by my employer. At this point I can‚Äôt do anything.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review:
Update-dev team contacted me to call them. From what other reviewers have discussed about their experience calling the team. I will not call. From what I can see is that the people that called were met with hostility or a sense of not caring so I‚Äôm not going to waste my time. Just fix the app or find a team that can. 

It lets me add all the items I want then when I go to check out it loads for a little bit then tells me something went wrong. I‚Äôve tried several times to have this app take my money but tells me something went wrong. I tried my Wifi and cellar service. Both have full bars. Even had my wife download the app and try. It won‚Äôt take my money which is the opposite of what I assume companies strive for. Broken app for a multi billion dollar company.
developerResponse: {'id': 12826761, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can assist you with this issue.", 'modified': '2020-01-10T06:29:34Z'}

title: Please allow searching by All-Day Breakfast
review:
I only visit McDonalds because of all day breakfast (usually at night, when a McGriddle naturally tastes at it‚Äôs best), and almost every SoCal (San Diego, specifically) McDonald‚Äôs location has opted to take advantage of the corporate policy change allowing restaurants to serve a limited or no All-Day Breakfast at their individual franchisee‚Äôs locations.

If we could sort on locations currently serving Breakfast, I would be fulfilled in both life and the afterlife. I will drive miles if necessary, but right now I have to manually switch between all nearby and slowly expand the radius as I look for the beloved McGriddles at 7pm.

So please implement this feature, or, better yet, reverse the insanity of allowing franchisees to decide their own breakfast hours and bring back All-Day Breakfast everywhere!
developerResponse: {'id': 11750724, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out, Danny! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app.  You're helping us as we continuously work to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App, and we really appreciate it!", 'modified': '2019-11-09T22:24:18Z'}

title: Pick up method
review:
For the most part the app is user friendly. My only issue with it is the inability to select your pick up option before arriving to the restaurant. 

The app uses geo locational data to ensure you are at the location before the workers start making the food. Which is time consuming that we still have to wait. 

Perhaps start working on the food once the order is paid for and have a portion in the app where you can add the vehicle information of the customer that is picking up the food. 

To make it simpler for the worker that brings the food out have the clients name and the vehicle description on the order receipt IE ‚ÄúChristian-White truck‚Äù

My only issue with using the phone‚Äôs geo location services is, if I wanted to have an order placed and someone else pick it up perhaps on their way to my house, that wouldn‚Äôt be possible. 

Overall I think there just needs to be a little more flexibility when it comes to picking up orders.

The developers just responded to my review with a blanket statement. Not sure how constructive that is or reassuring as a consumer. But if they are not worried about it neither am I. I guess I wasted my time.
developerResponse: {'id': 9426245, 'body': "Hello! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2019-07-01T23:02:50Z'}

title: Frustrating
review: Piece of crap, waste of time. By the time you navigate through everything and order, and hopefully have the correct store, it‚Äôs a freaking miracle if the app connects when you actually arrive at the restaurant! If it doesn‚Äôt connect, your order isn‚Äôt finalized and you‚Äôre screwed. Unfortunately, this CONSTANTLY happens. So even when the app states that your food is being prepared......it isn‚Äôt! The restaurant has no record of the order until you show up and pick your pick-up preference (in store, drive thru or parking spot). Basically, you just wasted all of your time with ordering through the app if it doesn‚Äôt connect once your at the restaurant. I hate it so much that I just drove away and deleted the app. Hoping they build a Burger King near my kids‚Äô house!!!

title: Refuses to believe you‚Äôre not RIGHT next to your favorite store
review: On vacation visiting family in Kentucky. Installed the app to see if I could find a store that still sells the Triple Stack breakfast sandwich. Can‚Äôt finish the setup without picking your favorite location. Won‚Äôt show me any locations other than the two closest to me in Georgetown, KY even though I live in Colorado. Also won‚Äôt let me see the menus of any other locations in the area because, apparently, those two are the only ones I‚Äôm allowed to use until I go elsewhere. Have the app developers not considered that I may want to check the menu of a location near where I WILL be that‚Äôs not necessarily close to where I am at the moment? Or that I might not be in the immediate vicinity of my favorite/most visited location right now? Morons.....
developerResponse: {'id': 8200775, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2019-04-14T18:57:01Z'}

title: Needs work
review:
2 issues:
1st issue: I tried mobile ordering, my husband was picking up the order from the all day breakfast menu at the Tyvola Rd. Charlotte, NC location. The app would not let me complete the order because it said that my location was not close enough to the restaurant. If I am paying for the order, it shouldn‚Äôt matter where my location is. What if my teenager was there starving without money, how would I feed him using the mobile app?
2nd issue: The mobile app let me add hash browns to the order at the Tyvola Rd. location when that location stops selling hash browns at 10:30. The app should not let you add menu items that are not available, especially if it is an item that is never available after a certain time, despite being on the all day menu.
developerResponse: {'id': 6981153, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out, friend! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2019-01-23T19:16:58Z'}

title: Can‚Äôt pay thru app
review:
What‚Äôs the point of putting your credit card info in the app if you‚Äôre not able to pay thru the app if the credit card machine at the location is broken? You need to do better with this app and make the point of sale on the app and not at the location with their broken credit card machine. 

Also, have better notification that the purchase didn‚Äôt go thru. I used Apple Pay, it didn‚Äôt say anything about the transaction not going thru. I pull up to the drive thru thinking everything is fine and I‚Äôm told that I have to pay for my meal, with cash, cause the locations credit card machine is down. üò° Do better.

title: Order not ready for pickup
review: This app falls so short because they don‚Äôt prepare your order until you arrive on site and ‚Äúcheck in.‚Äù  I still had to wait when I got there, McDonald‚Äôs must like it because they don‚Äôt have to pay someone to take my order but it doesn‚Äôt help the customer much. Since no one took my order they also weren‚Äôt looking to bag it up once it was prepared. I saw my sandwich sit for quite a while before anyone realized they should bag it up which is understandable since they hadn‚Äôt taken the order. It didn‚Äôt save me any time at all, I might as well have walked in and given my order to the cashier. It‚Äôs ridiculous that I can order and pay for my meal before I there but they won‚Äôt prepare it and have it ready for me to walk in and pickup with no wait.

title: Can‚Äôt refund money, but charged for items not available!?!?
review:
Absolutely the worst app I've ever used and completely thoughtless in its operation.

Yesterday I placed an order with the app.  When I arrived at the store, I parked in the numbered waiting area and submitted my location number as the app indicates.

After waiting 10 minutes, a McDonalds employee came out to tell me that the item I ordered, a Mac Jr, was sold out and that I would have to order something else.  Why would you ever take an order, and bill me, for something that's not available?  

BTW... I‚Äôm not clear what value the app is if you don‚Äôt start on the order until the guest arrives at the store. I use my Starbucks app daily because my order is ready and waiting when I arrive. Makes the whole McDonalds app kind of pointless.

I didn't want anything else, so I told him to just give me a credit. But to make matters worse, I was informed that there was no way to credit my account.  ARE YOU KIDDING!!! How does a company as large as McDonald's put out an app that can take your money, but cant give you a credit when the item they sold you cant be fulfilled?

Will I ever get money back?

title: Big fix needed
review:
Overall very good app; however‚Ä¶

The point redemption needs to be adjusted so that you can use a redemption in conjunction with a deal.  The purpose of the point system is to encourage buying food.  There is little to no benefit from the point system considering how good the deals are and that you can only use one or the other.  

Fortunately there is a way to circumvent this by doing multiple single-item redemption orders back to back as there is no 1 hour cooldown time on redemptions.  The cooldown only applies to deals.  This is a bit ghetto though.
developerResponse: {'id': 28617768, 'body': "that'd be insane‚Ä¶but we've not put that trick into play yet, Tim! help us find a way to improve these features by replying via the link: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-03-16T23:27:51Z'}

title: Not very convenient
review: When placing order in the app it says the restaurant has my order. If I do curbside it takes forever. The drive through is going faster than me sitting outside the front door for 15 minutes for a simple breakfast sandwich. I had to go knock on the locked door. My food had been ready but no one would bring it out. Wouldn‚Äôt be a big deal if it was 1 time but it has happened numerous time at different locations. Also, if you do use drive thru and they ask if you want to change anything on order like change you‚Äôre drink from med to large in a special.. it jacks the price way up and they can‚Äôt fix it.. out of their hands to override l. Why ask if it‚Äôs going to mess everything up?
developerResponse: {'id': 27926937, 'body': 'we need to be as fast and accurate as we can. help us out by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html \r\n', 'modified': '2022-02-08T18:16:27Z'}

title: Worst fast food app ever!
review: I have been using this app for about a month now and I am very disappointed. The ‚Äúdeals‚Äù never work at the ‚Äúparticipating location‚Äù. It‚Äôs impossiblely hard to just order your meal without it freezing or refusing to add to bag. But I‚Äôm particularly annoyed with the app because on my last (and FINAL) use I finally got through ordering my order, I arrived at McDonald‚Äôs just for them to tell me my order number doesn‚Äôt match. After showing and explaining I have paid and would just like my food, the app decided my transaction contained an overcharge and WITHOUT notifying me reversed the transaction. The super polite worker had to RECHARGE me and because of this I had to wait an extra 15 minutes for my order. This app is a WASTE OF TIME!
developerResponse: {'id': 27609323, 'body': 'we want to look into this, KatieSue. leave a few more details about your order and the location here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html', 'modified': '2022-01-23T17:50:23Z'}

title: Rarely Works Properly
review: This is easily the worst mobile food app I‚Äôve ever used. It often takes 15-30 minutes just to get the app to complete my order, and sometimes it never does. It often tells me deals aren‚Äôt available during breakfast hours even though it‚Äôs evening, or vice versa. I have yet to open the app and make it all the way through my order on the first try. I often click ‚Äúorder more‚Äù or ‚Äúpick payment‚Äù only to be routed back to the exact same screen over and over again. I have tried deleting the app and downloading again. I always try closing the app, restarting my phone, and opening it again. None of these things help. It‚Äôs just an absolute train wreck, unfortunately.

title: Pickles?
review: This is the second day in a row that I got a Crispy Chicken Sandwich. It was supposed to be a Deluxe. The first day it had tons of mayo, a little lettuce, and the chicken patty. Today, the replacement is fine except‚Ä¶NO PICKLES!!! Is the Redford/Fairlawn, VA out of pickles or don‚Äôt they know to put them on? I went inside because the cost of the sandwich had to be refunded and the only language I heard in the kitchen was Spanish. Is this due to students leaving for Christmas break or something else. I have never had the sandwich without pickles and it needs them!

title: The app was working fine until the most recent update
review:
Since updating to the most current version of the app on 07 December 2022, I have been unable to use location services or to place an order. This happens both on my iPhone and my iPad. For location services, the option times out. For the order tab, nothing happens it just shows a blank screen when I select it. 

I hope there is a quick fix to remedy these issues. Thank you.

title: App is devolving
review: So when this app first came out I really enjoyed using it it was fast I could order easily I can customize it was great. But overtime this app has steadily gotten less functional. For example I haven‚Äôt been able to order a sausage biscuit meal in three years. I honestly don‚Äôt get it I know it‚Äôs available because if I order it in the drive-through it comes through just fine so why can‚Äôt I order it on the app. Also why are you putting some customizations in the app but not others. For example if I want to add Mac sauce to a hamburger I can‚Äôt unless I go to the drive-through or into the store.

title: Awful functionality, zero customer support
review:
I have made my order through the all, waited in line, and been told "your payment didn't go through", proceeded to be asked to pay for a total greater than the app total, on over 10 different occasions. The managers never know what to do, and there is absolutely zero customer support for this app. Zero. How can you link our payment cards to your app and not have any support? I won't be going to McDonalds anymore. They've lost me with this garbage.

Edit: In response, Mcdonalds links me to the same website that doesn't offer customer support. Just forms to full out and never get a response. I am giving up. Developers, you can give me a phone number to corporate. Do that.

title: I still have to wait in the drive thru?
review: I don‚Äôt really understand the point. Two times when I‚Äôve tried to use this app, my location settings are on, yet it says I‚Äôm not here to pick up my order. Then, this time it finally recognized me as on location and said I have to pick up in the drivethru. So now I‚Äôm sitting in the same drive thru line I would have if I‚Äôd just ordered here. If drive thru pick up is the only option, that needs to be made clear when ordering. I lost time using the app and trying to figure out what was happening before being told to use the drive thru. There should at least be an option to pull ahead to one of the waiting spots once you‚Äôve told the drive thru attendant you‚Äôre here.

title: Not any faster
review: The good part is you get to see options you did not know existed. The bad is (1) it is hard to impossible to customize sandwiches - like no pickles on a kid‚Äôs burger; and most detrimental (2) it is slower that just waiting in the drive through line. They don‚Äôt start until you show up and it took 11 minutes from when I parked. The whole drive through line had cleared by the time I got my food. Might as well skip the app and just get in line. Clearly not prioritizing app orders.

title: The app isn‚Äôt god awful, but far from great.
review:
I didn‚Äôt use any deals, and it‚Äôs telling me I have to wait an hour because I used a deal. Which is frustrating, because I didn‚Äôt intend on waiting an hour to eat. 

It still acts like I never ordered, when I did. Which only makes the first issue that much more frequent. What‚Äôs the point of the deals/points if it‚Äôs gonna force me into being unable to use them? 

If you‚Äôre ordering while you‚Äôre already there, then it‚Äôs an alright app. You won‚Äôt run into these issues as often, unless you accidentally look into a deal just to see what it‚Äôll cost you first. Then you‚Äôll have to wait there for an hour.

title: Glitch/bug changes orders
review: I‚Äôve used this app for months upon months with little to no issues. Now I‚Äôve encountered a bug or glitch that not only changed my entire order, but the app revised my order history to reflect that altered order. When I mean altered order, I mean completely changed to someone else‚Äôs: I originally ordered nuggets, fries, with a coke and got a mchicken with a McDouble with an orange hi-c. When presented with the altered order I went back to the app to show what I truly ordered, but to my own astonishment the app showed the incorrect order attributed to my account that I ever keyed in in the first place. This is a very bad glitch and I won‚Äôt be using this app anytime soon as a result‚Ä¶.

title: Hate the latest updates
review: The app was previously easier to use when the ‚ÄòDeals‚Äô section was located in the bottom shortcuts. However, in the latest updates now the ‚ÄòDeals‚Äô section is hidden within the ‚ÄòRewards‚Äô section and it‚Äôs towards the bottom (where nobody would know to look). To make things worse, not all restaurants participate in the ‚ÄòRewards‚Äô program. This makes using the app time consuming because now you‚Äôre looking for the (hidden) ‚ÄòDeals‚Äô section, which is pretty annoying. Consider moving the ‚ÄòEarn Points‚Äô inside the ‚ÄòRewards‚Äô section (where it makes actual sense) and move the ‚ÄòDeals‚Äô section back to its own spot- separate from the others. My two cents.

title: Horrible app, hasn‚Äôt worked for over 4 months
review: This app is the worst food app I‚Äôve ever used. It used to work and I would use the deals. Now, whenever I open it it states ‚ÄúApplication Initialization critical error occurred. Please restart the app.‚Äù Restarting, uninstalling and reinstalling, and changing my internet connection don‚Äôt work; already tried many times. My app is always updated as well. Tried contacting customer support and they were zero help when explaining my issue to them.
developerResponse: {'id': 20536074, 'body': "Nope, that's certainly not great. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can get that looked into.\r\n", 'modified': '2021-01-20T19:14:03Z'}

title: If it wasn‚Äôt so buggy I‚Äôd give more stars
review: I love this app and though the deals have gotten a bit less good, I still enjoy it. However I have a problem with the app every few weeks to a couple months where the app will just sign me out and it won‚Äôt let me sign back in or register using another email. I try deleting and redownloading the app to no avail. I try on wifi and data both at home and on the go but I‚Äôm still signed out for weeks at a time. I can‚Äôt use the deals without an account but I can‚Äôt sign in or sign up so until that is fixed I can‚Äôt give this app a higher rating.

title: Good job, better than others
review: McDonald‚Äôs does a good job of proving a good value with frequent offers and making the app easy to use. It suggests the closest McDonald‚Äôs location or you can easily access your favorite locations. There‚Äôs also the ability to change your pickup method, if you get there and there‚Äôs no line in the drive through or if it starts raining suddenly and you‚Äôd rather not make the people walk the food to your car! Other fast food apps don‚Äôt have these features or they‚Äôre hard to use. This app is great.
developerResponse: {'id': 19224687, 'body': "That's the name of the game! Glad you're enjoying the app.", 'modified': '2020-11-19T16:54:40Z'}

title: Glitches
review: Several times certain McDonald‚Äôs restaurants argued with me because I had my order number in the app but their WiFi was not connecting to the app and when I went to pay it wouldn‚Äôt let me which they didn‚Äôt want to give me the mobile order deal. I have Verizon and updated the app so I know it‚Äôs not my phone. I would suggest changing the app so all deals are just deals because this has happened on more then one occasion. Also if the deal is scanned and then the McDonald‚Äôs self order machine isn‚Äôt working the deal is marked as used even though you don‚Äôt follow through check out. Again had TO argue to get the deal. It use to work well but it seems like every time you update more issues happen.
developerResponse: {'id': 20223572, 'body': "We don't like that one bit. Let's get you back to those deals. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2021-01-06T18:29:37Z'}

title: Options for orders...
review:
It is fabulous that additional salt is available when ordering and modifying French Fries but in my opinion being able to select ‚Äòketchup‚Äô as well would be appropriate as well. After some of my orders, ketchup is not included with the French-fries. I feel it is too much to ask a team member that brings the food out for my curbside delivery to return to the restaurant to grab those packages.  A simple modification can be added to the ordering process and it should save those overly helpful and incredibly courteous team members time and safety concerns in every genuine offer they have always made to help accommodate not only me...  but I am sure several of your guests. 

Thank you and i appreciate your looking into my suggestion. 

Bruce
developerResponse: {'id': 19880882, 'body': "Heya, Bruce! We're always working on an even better App that you'll love using. Thanks for helping us out.", 'modified': '2020-12-20T16:24:52Z'}

title: Inoperable, Useless, Waste of Time
review: I‚Äôve had the app for a week and just started my first order with it. I‚Äôve been trying to place an order for the past 37 minutes, but it just repeats itself. The app will not allow the order to complete, and it takes me right back to the beginning to start another order.  The deal ends today, so that‚Äôs probably why they‚Äôre not honoring it.  Thank heavens Chick-fil-A‚Äôs app is wonderful and it‚Äôs next door (or I would have nothing for dinner).  Done with this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 17443822, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-08-23T15:56:24Z'}

title: Overall good
review:
I love the curbside option. I don‚Äôt like that I can‚Äôt add some ketchup for my hash browns. I was able to add ice for my OJ and had other substitute or addition side item options but no ketchup. So this defeats the curbside pick up if I have to go in or through the drive thru to get condiments I want. Also with other apps I have used I can say ‚ÄúI‚Äôm ready to pick up now‚Äù when I‚Äôm about 4 minutes away so it‚Äôs ready as soon as I get there rather than checking in and THEN my order is placed.
Overall I‚Äôm grateful for the option when I have a kid with me and don‚Äôt want to go in but the drive thru line is really long.

title: Phone must be present to complete order
review: Ugh - this is so frustrating. I thought this app would be like the Starbucks app, you place your mobile order, pay for it and then show up to pick up your order (or send someone to pick it up). That‚Äôs a big old NOPE!!! I tried placing the order, sent my husband as he was getting off work to go pick up (it‚Äôs already been a very long day of a very long week so that‚Äôs why he offered to pick up) and not only was my order not there, but they said the phone must be present to order. Seriously? What is the point of placing a mobile order if it doesn‚Äôt allow someone else to pick up for you? Do better MickeyD‚Äôs developers. Get with the program already.
developerResponse: {'id': 16854533, 'body': "Hi there. We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2020-07-24T17:39:29Z'}

title: Really???
review:
People are in a hurry these days. The idea of ordering ahead is so one does not have to wait. The app allows you to get your order together but you cannot actually order until you arrive at the store.  I want to be able to order ahead so I can walk in and my order is ready.  I had to wait 10 minutes for my breakfast. Doesn‚Äôt seem efficient to me. Also...common sense would tell one that if someone orders hot cakes that butter and syrup should automatically come with that order. Nope!  You have to request that under condiments. I didn‚Äôt get either with my order. 
I think I‚Äôm done with McDonalds and their app. Service isn‚Äôt what it used to be especially at the Farmers Branch, TX location. Such a cluster!!
developerResponse: {'id': 13446500, 'body': 'Sorry about your order! To help us improve, please provide the location here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/', 'modified': '2020-02-12T17:11:17Z'}

title: Fails to work most of the time
review: I love the app when it works.  It saves me time.  However, more often than not, something goes wrong and I waste time using it.  For example, today I placed my order, arrived at the restaurant, and indicated that I was here, entered my parking spot number, and then the app told me my payment failed.  I deleted the d payment info and re-entered it three times, making sure each time the info was accurate.  Each time it failed.  Then, after already spending precious time on the app, I was forced to either go through the drive thru (which was wrapped around the building) or go inside (where the lines were long and there was only one cashier).  This app frustrates me more often than not.  Thanks for wasting my time yet again this morning.

title: App reroutes = Very inconvenient
review: I gave it 2 stars because it worked well in the past and all of a sudden in the last few months something has changed and it‚Äôs not good. I haven‚Äôt used it much but today I had it with it. I placed an order at my ‚Äúfavorite location‚Äù to result in the app rerouting me to a different location. I don‚Äôt understand why it does that. In reading some of the reviews it seems a lot of people have experienced this same thing and it‚Äôs clear that NO ONE LIKES THAT. It should be changed. Also, I‚Äôve lost $$$ for times that I‚Äôve submitted the order and it was ‚Äúrerouted‚Äù to another location! I will not use this app until 2 things happen, 1. change the rerouting issue & 2. I get my $$$ back.

title: Stores are not trained in app
review:
Placed an order today, husband went to pick it up, and after waiting in the parking lot for 15 minutes he went in to see what the hold up was.  The employees said it was a Door Dash order, and wouldn‚Äôt give him the order. They placed the order again, charged him again (even though the payment processed through the app when he got to there and pushed the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù button on the app) and the order still got messed up. 
The app itself is great, but if the restaurants are not trained on it, and don‚Äôt realize that someone placed an order, it is pointless. My husband would have had better luck just going through the drive thru. Lessons learned, might as well delete the app.

title: Good idea, needs more flexibility.
review: I like the idea of ordering and paying through an app and saving some time. However, I ordered through the app on my phone today and sent a coworker to pick up the order. I tried to check-in on my phone when she got there and it wouldn‚Äôt let me saying I was too far from the restaurant, but if I actually was there to go ahead and proceed to a crew member with an order number. She did this and they said they couldn‚Äôt pull an order without checking in. She explained she didn‚Äôt have the phone that the order was placed on, but had the order number and he said they can‚Äôt pull it based on the order number. This is the only problem I‚Äôve had with this app so far.

title: Review and opinion
review:
I go to McDonald every day for two pieces of grilled chicken with no salt and it‚Äôs been very helpful to me as I am a senior citizen but disappointed that cost has gone up.
The other thing that I have noticed is that the people who take the money , very polite people  are not allowed to sit down on a stool nor have a mat to stand on , which is so wrong ! And recently learned that they only get  30 minute break if they work a 3 hour or a 8 hour shift and no two 15 minute breaks for the full hour employees. This is very upsetting and find that is makes me feel guilty do business with McDonalds.
Hope that a employer that this will be reviewed and your employees treated with more respect .

title: Love the idea wish they would get it together!
review: So my debit card exp date changed and the app won‚Äôt let me add a new card or pay with my other card on there ! Immediately says can‚Äôt charge pick another but there is no problem with the one card and I can‚Äôt add anything so it froze the order for days . Finally I deleted the whole thing and it deleted the old order but still has pay with card issues! So I had to get it at drive thu which they wouldn‚Äôt take my number until time to pay so they didn‚Äôt make it yet so I had to park and wait ! It took so much longer than regular drive thu it was ridiculous! I love the idea but I will wait a few months before going down that rabbit hole again !

title: Hit and Miss Experience
review:
Using the app to order food while on my lunch break is super convenient because I can skip the line. No one in my area really uses the mobile order so the parking spot are always free, unless some dweeb parks in it. But 1/4 the app crashes and my card isn‚Äôt processed or It will say the item isn‚Äôt severed at the time of Day when it really is like a Big Mac at 3 pm. 

I am going to add my card directly to the app instead of using  Apple Pay and see if that works. 

Also the restaurant WiFi is slow and doesn‚Äôt connect sometimes because it comes on a landing pace first so unless you agree to the terms it doesn‚Äôt work do it won‚Äôt take app orders

title: Great app.. um food ‚Ä¶
review: I like the app the app works great, unfortunately my local restaurant that I just put an order through today is lucky I‚Äôm not allergic to onions my order was supposed to have no onions and extra pickles instead I got barely any pickles and extra onions good thing I‚Äôm not allergic. The people filling our orders through the app at the stores really need to pay attention to the details because if I had been allergic to onions and I had not checked my sandwich that could‚Äôve been a serious lawsuit.

title: Bad!!!
review: I ordered on this app.  I arrived at the store to pickup my order.  The app prompted that your order will be out in 5 minutes.  After 30 minutes of waiting and going through the drive thru to inquire about my order, I was told my order was not in the system.  On top of that, I was told he could not give me a refund because my order could not be found in the system.  Well, something found it because my card was immediately charged for this purchase.  I called the McDonald‚Äôs customer service number for the app and was told that he could not give a refund because different organizations own the stores.  I finally got my money back by returning to the store the next day. Beware of the app!
developerResponse: {'id': 33263712, 'body': "that's not the service we expect for you! try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. if it still won't work, drop us a line with the details here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-11-20T21:29:54Z'}

title: Too many glitches every time I open the app
review: I‚Äôm not one to eat at Mc Donald‚Äôs often, probably once a year if it wasn‚Äôt for the app. However the is app isn‚Äôt even conveniently enough to work properly. I did what I could to update everything but nothing works. It‚Äôs honestly that simple I don‚Äôt feel the need to want to eat there when the app crashes every single time I open it. The food isn‚Äôt amazing it‚Äôs the deals in the app can be captivating. But when it doesn‚Äôt function how it should, my appetite just goes away. Any person who rather save time by using the app will more likely won‚Äôt feel the need to make drive to the restaurant and order through the drive thru the old way. It‚Äôs just a waste of time.

title: Don‚Äôt use delivery
review:
The app works mostly as expected, but definitely don‚Äôt trust it for delivery.   I ordered a delivery order, and the app sent it via Uber Eats. The driver delivered it to the wrong address, our complex office, because he didn‚Äôt feel like taking it to the space# clearly on the order, so he left it at the office front door, right next to the map that showed where to go. 
McDonald‚Äôs directed me to Uber Eats, who first said they would work out a refund, and to re-order it.   After I order it, the operator says he can‚Äôt refund it, so it cost me about $80, for 2 happy meals and a double quarter pounder.   The operator said to contact McDonald‚Äôs again, who again said to contact Uber eats.

Often the restaurant doesn‚Äôt show they were charged - happened last night at spring creek in plano and they charge you again at the window even though you show them your bank is in pending. title: Poor user experience
review: the concept is great to allow to earn rewards & use daily deals. but the app is a disaster. i don‚Äôt understand why our reward‚Äôs number changes every time & right in the middle of the order so i have to repeat my number multiple times or go through the whole process of re-entering my rewards or daily deals. no other reward cards do this! this whole arduous process adds so much more time using the drive through which is ridiculous & people who arrive after me at the other window then get to cut in front of me bc i‚Äôm taking too long. pls improve your user interface & experience or i give up using your app.

title: Time Wasted
review: The app lacks basic functions that ultimately lead to wasted time and aggravation. Users are able to order, pay for, and waste time going to pick-up items that are not available upon arrival. It also allows you to select pick-up options (i.e. curbside and in-store) when those services are being offered. So you drive there, park, wait for your order to be prepared while waiting in the parking lot, then go to the door only to find it locked and learn you now have to get in the back of a 12 car drive-thru line. Oh but your lunch hour in nearly up and you can afford to wait any longer, guess you‚Äôre going hungry today. It‚Äôs an absolutely infuriating and unexceptional level of disfunction.

title: Could be better
review: The app works well enough, for one person. The menu is intuitive and easy to use. The big problem is that the person who orders must be present at the store to finalize the order. There is no option to have one person order and someone else pick it up. This is a major inconvenience to working families who work long days and need one person to pick up what the other orders. Fixing this should be a priority. Another option would to allow one person to send the order to the person who is going to pick it up and then complete the order.

title: ‚ÄúOrder ahead‚Äù lies
review: This app has some great deals for sure! But this is the first ‚Äúorder ahead‚Äù app I‚Äôve used that doesn‚Äôt start making your order UNTIL YOU GET THERE!! The whole point of using apps like this for me is because I‚Äôm always on the go and so I love being able to spend less than a minute at a shop just picking up my order. But instead I had to sit in curbside for more than 10 minutes and then I had to leave before getting my order!! Because I was going to be late otherwise!! There should at least be an option for like ‚Äúmake now‚Äù rather than having to wait until I arrive, it just doesn‚Äôt make sense to me

title: What a waste
review:
It‚Äôs so dumb. I hate it. McDonald‚Äôs is just so terrible. They never have ice cream and neither do put a sign up to let people know or take it off the menu all together. If someone working at McDonald‚Äôs sees this review, I ask that you take these considerations into mind. The last thing I want to mention is that they need more variety of food. Maybe change up the menu sometimes. Add something different to the menu like maybe every month. Also maybe keep the breakfast sandwiches longer than breakfast times. It just makes me so mad. But if McDonald‚Äôs gets going with some awesome new trends and changes, maybe it could become my favorite restaurant. 

               
           Thank you for taking the time to read this,
Sincerely yours.

title: Such a bad app, for so long!
review:
I‚Äôve had it.  I‚Äôm so over this app and McDonalds.  Glad there‚Äôs a lot of other options for a quick bite in my area and without the hassle of either dealing with this app or dealing with poor service at a store.

Finally the issue of having to log in every time seems resolved.  But I‚Äôll take that issue back any day over the new one with the latest update.  I live in Hawaii and apparently they got their clocks wrong because it‚Äôs 8:30 at night and every single deal just says ‚Äúdeal unavailable at this time of day‚Äù... so I guess I should have chicken nuggets or a Big Mac for breakfast?  I‚Äôd try to just order normal without a deal but if I click the icon to just order, I‚Äôm only shown my previous orders, and no amount of tapping or fiddling with the app lets me view the menu at all.  What a waste of my time and energy this app always is.

Forget it.  Burger King is literally across the street and always quicker, tastier, and with better service.... it may cost more but apparently my sanity has a price, and McDonalds has named that price.  I‚Äôm done with you.

Bye Felicia.

title: Just Terrible
review:
I‚Äôve been unable to successfully complete an order with this application twice (the total number of times I‚Äôve tried).

The first time, everything went fine until trying to finalize the order‚ÄîI got an error message that I needed to go to the lobby, despite the app knowing what location I was at (and presumably that the lobby was not open). Going through the drive-thru, the employee couldn‚Äôt access the order and the manager had to get involved. It would have been easier to just use the drive-thru.

In the latest attempt, I added a Crispy Buttermilk Chicken Sandwich successfully to my bag, but looking at the bag before finalizing my order, I see an error message saying the item isn‚Äôt available at this time of day. While I understand that the sandwich isn‚Äôt available ‚Äúafter midnight,‚Äù I would assume 5:57pm is far enough into the day‚Ä¶

Quite honestly I expect a better, less frustrating mobile UX from a company as large as McDonald‚Äôs. It seems like transmitting orders and correctly calculating the time of day for menu items should be core features.

title: Needs a ton of work
review: The app is easy to use sure. But when it comes to ordering it shows varying prices at different locations. How can a McDouble at my closest McDonald‚Äôs cost $1.79 but $1.39 at a location less than 2 miles away in the same city. Curbside is available but be careful ordering close to sunset. Apparently when the sun goes down the employees don‚Äôt come out. I‚Äôve wait over 30 minutes on three separate occasions just to go through the drive thru and get cold food. One time I saw a new me it item I hadn‚Äôt seen before but when I ordered I was told it‚Äôs no longer available. The data in the app is not updated. Bug fixed won‚Äôt do anything fix the data is wrong. The varying prices is the most concerning part. The product is the same yet priced different.

title: This app is horrible
review:
I had to reset my phone which meant I had to reinstall my apps. I tried to login and was told password was wrong. I tried forgot my password but the app keeps telling to me check my internet connection and if error keeps occurring to restart app. I‚Äôve turned my WiFi on and off over and over. I deleted app and installed again. Still can‚Äôt do anything. In the meantime I reinstalled the BK app which works fine. Guess we will be eating there tonight. 

Prior to this failure, I tried mobile ordering in the past. The app billed me $234 and still wouldn‚Äôt place my order. They order then sat like it was waiting for me to pick up even though it wouldn‚Äôt go through. I had to wait 3 days to get the money put back on my bank card. This app is really BAD!

title: How can one store screw up so much
review:
Almost every time we go thru the drive thru our order is scewed up. When we go in it‚Äôs perfect. The girl at the drive thu taking the money is doing a great job. The other end that gives you the order needs to get it together. Incorrect orders, wrong orders, cold burgers, missing food is common. Then if I go back to the store I‚Äôm treated poorly. It‚Äôs only a $3.00 sandwich. However I cannot go back every time to get what I paid for. God help you if you don‚Äôt bring the receipt. And $3.00 times how many times they have made mistakes is adding up. With Burger King across the street. It is now a better option. They have been getting it correct. I am not the only person who is going through this. We are comparing stories. Not good. It use to be better. 
Steven

title: How is this more convenient
review:
For starters... why do the developers not develop the software to be used in landscape mode? I have and iphone and that is fine to use it in portrait there, but it‚Äôs very annoying to have to flip the ipad around, tuck case, and then immediately be asked to finger peck my credentials on the way too small keyboard it offers. 

Further, and more importantly, you order... go to pick it up... it isn‚Äôt ready. It doesn‚Äôt start preparing my 6 person order until I arrive. Then, I have to wait longer than if I‚Äôm in drivethru to get the food. And how is this helping me?

Go back to the drawing board people. Ipads are here to stay and should be considered when developing your software. And McDonalds... your competition is doing a better job than you. Just saying.

title: Few issues lately
review: Lately I‚Äôve been having lots of connection issues with this app. Sometimes it doesn‚Äôt even recognize my location when I‚Äôm on McDonald‚Äôs property. Another issue is that after placing and picking up a mobile order, the app doesn‚Äôt clear my order... so when I order next time I have to first remove each line item from the previous order. One other thing I‚Äôve noticed is that every time I order from my McDonald‚Äôs (only one in town) it shows that it is closed... all hours of the day.

title: Untrained staff or clinch in system
review: I have used the app three tines in Blairsville, Georgia and each time its been an issue. Either they can't find my order number or they ask how I want to pay. The last time I sat at the window for at least 10 minutes while the manager tried to find my order people behind me where getting upset, so I just drive off without my order. They told me to come back the following day and talk to another manager. They acted like I wanted to steal a meal. I never went back.

title: Not working on new phone

I tried to hit contact is in the app and it won‚Äôt let me put in all the info I need to to be able to submit my problem.. it either lets me select a device type OR an operating system.. not both and you have to have both to continue... also will not let me type in my problem anyways.... of course this will happen when I have a free McCafe drink and they end the end of this month..
