title: TERRIBLE App
review: Please don‚Äôt bother downloading this garbage! I would give this negative stars if I could! I used to love this app. But now you can‚Äôt use coupons unless you do mobile orders. However, the app is very buggy and takes forever to set up your order properly.  But when you get there, you have to wait in a long line, wait for them to not find your order, then wait on the order to be made. And to top it off, you get double charged. I‚Äôve tried mobile order a handful of times at different locations. Half the time, they got the order wrong when they finally found it and I had to reorder. McDonald‚Äôs acts like this is a time saver. It‚Äôs just not! Please listen to your customers, McDonald‚Äôs, and bring back in-store coupons or you will continue to lose $$!

title: Pushing for mobile ordering/coupons make the app less useful
review: The app used to be ok for the intended purpose of quickly pulling up coupons before walking up to the register or driving up to the drive-thru window, but ever since they introduced the mobile ordering, coupons are hard to tell apart between mobile and store coupons, and now the bulk of the coupons are mobile only and yet 3 of the 4 restaurants in downtown don‚Äôt take mobile orders, so now the app is close to being useless. They really need to make the coupon page more streamlined so that the mobile ones are separate from the store ones for easier distinguishing. And they need to bring all the franchisees to take mobile orders if they‚Äôre going to push mobile ordering/coupons.

title: Mobile Ordering is Not Effective
review: I have not been able to use the mobile ordering feature because it either doesn‚Äôt work properly, or the staff at my local McDonald‚Äôs does not know how to process mobile orders. Either way, I‚Äôve been made late to work and left hungry because of problems surrounding this app. I‚Äôll put together my order, then go park at McDonald‚Äôs, confirm the order, and then go through the drive-thru and they tell me at the window that the payment is pending. From there, there is no resolution to the issue.

title: Sugar Creek McDonalds is the BEST
review:
My family is always sad when we have to visit other Mcdonald's restaurants because this Fenton MO location is amazing.  Everything is always hot & correct & if for some reason it isn't - they make it right.  Friendliest employees - I have four kids so they know me.  The managers are amazing & personable.  I don't write reviews often but they deserve it - they set a high bar.

I do wish the app had more variety when using points but I still love it- every little bit helps!

title: Good, website won‚Äôt check gift cards...
review: Hello! I just emailed you guys but the website will not check my gift cardsüòû!!! Every time I press the button ‚Äúcheck your balance‚Äù the screen goes dim! When I try to scroll, after a few seconds the screen freezes! This isn‚Äôt to make you guys look bad... maybe it‚Äôs even on my end! But if it isn‚Äôt, then I‚Äôm not sure what to do, if you could please get back to me soon I would appreciate it. Thank you for your time and stay safe.

title: Didn‚Äôt even process my order
review: I thought putting this app on would save me time during my work lunch break. I put the order in and made sure everything was right before I entered everything in. When I arrived and showed the cashier the app they had problems helping and couldn‚Äôt find my order. I didn‚Äôt have my card on me as I was hoping to just do a quick pickup and be back at work, so I just had to leave due to me having wasted so much time trying to get things straightened up and needing to get back to my work. That fact that every time we go through the drive thru we are always being asked to try the app is a bit infuriating since this is what happened when I used it.
developerResponse: {'id': 33504824, 'body': "we're here to help! tell us the details here so we can look into this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-12-02T20:55:06Z'}

title: Glitches in a non existing order
review: Every time i go to use the app it tells me i already have a ‚Äúpre existing order‚Äù when i try to start an order and whenever i go to look at the ‚Äúorder‚Äù it just shows a random amount and my card but no listing of what the ‚Äúorder‚Äù is. So i check my account and thankfully nothing was taken but in order to get rid of the ‚Äúpre existing order‚Äù so i can actually make my order i have to uninstall and reinstall the app. Please fix this. Its been doing it for a couple months now. Apart from that everything else about the app works great.
developerResponse: {'id': 32406685, 'body': "we're here to help! if you're still having the same issue after reinstalling the app, drop us a line here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-05T14:37:40Z'}

title: No point in placing orders early
review:
Your order isn‚Äôt prepared until you check in at the store so there‚Äôs still a wait. Deals and rewards are nice, but it‚Äôs not ready to go if you‚Äôre in a rush. The sonic app lets you choose if you want your order asap so you can order in advance and it be ready by the time you get there and it works out just fine, I don‚Äôt understand why they don‚Äôt have that here. 
If you order before a menu change and aren‚Äôt there to pick it up before the change happens, you won‚Äôt get the food you ordered despite you placing it on time on the app either.
developerResponse: {'id': 31975214, 'body': "we've got our reasons! we just want to make sure that your order is as hot and fresh as possible when you get it. ", 'modified': '2022-09-12T17:35:24Z'}

title: App doesn‚Äôt honor coupons
review: So the past probably 10 times I‚Äôve been to McDonald‚Äôs I‚Äôve used the app. I opt for the 20% off of $2.00 or more and every time it states that I have to pay at site and then my debit card doesn‚Äôt go through in which case I have to use cash or a different card. Or the app pays for a portion and then I have to physically pay for the rest. When this occurs the total I have to pay and the total the app pays for always adds up to the full price without the discount. I‚Äôm getting screwed every time and quite frankly it‚Äôs super annoying. The workers always look at me like I‚Äôm trying to pull a fast one on them and get something for free when I‚Äôm reality I‚Äôm the one getting screwed every time.
developerResponse: {'id': 31149784, 'body': "we're always here to help straighten things out. drop us a line anytime. https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n", 'modified': '2022-07-28T16:54:48Z'}

title: When order went wrongs you have to call store
review:
This app takes your money quickly and yet refund is much too difficult, you have to call the store and most of the time the store simply wont pick up. You‚Äôd much better off with drive through because they don‚Äôt start making until you arrive and sometimes they forgot your mobile order. I easily waited more than 20min until all drive through had cleared and I decided to go into the store and then they at first say they don‚Äôt have the mobile order then says oh they have it‚Ä¶

Also Apple Pay is broken in latest release, freeze every time you try to pay, only option is fork over your credit card.
developerResponse: {'id': 30173578, 'body': 'we never want your mobile app experience to be like this. chat with our mobile app team about ways to improve via the link: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-06-05T21:17:52Z'}

title: Let ME pick the restaurant location, don‚Äôt pick for me
review: I changed the autofilled restaurant location that this stupid app picked because when I stop by McDonald‚Äôs I do it on the way home, I don‚Äôt go out of my way to go to the location closest to where I work. Instead of correctly updating the available deals, the app continued to only show deals available at the location the APP selected, not the location I corrected it to. I was not notified that the deal I selected wasn‚Äôt available at my selected location until I arrived to pick it up. This was a massive waste of time that shouldn‚Äôt have even happened. Stop picking the restaurant based on my location. Let ME pick which location I want to go to. It‚Äôs not that hard.
developerResponse: {'id': 25776083, 'body': "That's not what we like to hear. Get back to our Mobile App team with more details about this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html \r\n", 'modified': '2021-10-19T17:20:52Z'}

title: Needs update
review: I love this app this is how I order all my orders, but my concern is, If a restaurant is close for walk in or close for whatever reason they should let the customer know on the app. The second, if you open a coupon for one item you can‚Äôt change it for another item you have to take it or leave it. Also, they should also let the customer cancel the order once you get to the restaurant, not only before you get to the restaurant, because sometimes is too busy a waist of time, or the employees ignore you
developerResponse: {'id': 25534154, 'body': "We're constantly looking for ways to improve, Gabbie! Let's talk here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-10-06T18:41:51Z'}

title: App is slow, inaccurate, and unstable
review: This app in theory is good but in practice is absolutely terrible. It lags a lot and crashes easily. When I order for curbside pick up it takes several minutes of me driving in circles in the parking lot for it to recognize that I‚Äôm at the store, otherwise if I ask an employee for help with my order then my order doesn‚Äôt even show up for them. The worst part is that it often tells me that my total is different than what was previously displayed after I‚Äôve already paid for my order without letting me edit it before payment. I would not recommend this app to anyone I know and am on the brink of boycotting McDonald‚Äôs for good because this app is so unbelievable.

title: Phone screen off, order gone!
review: Seems great‚Ä¶except I assemble and place an order, then leave for the restaurant. My phone screen shuts off after a minute or two, and when I arrive to pick up my food, the order is nowhere to be found. Gone. Vanished. Can‚Äôt be pulled up from order history or anywhere else I can find. Since it doesn‚Äôt charge you until you check in at the restaurant, at least that‚Äôs not an issue. What IS an issue for me, though, is that I have to sit in the parking lot and recreate the entire order, resubmit it, and then check in and wait. If I have to do that, why bother with the stupid app? Why not just do the drive-thru???

title: Used to be great
review:
Pre-Covid this was one of the best fast food app. Since I‚Äôve repeatedly been charged for orders I never receive because stores that are open are actually closed and today I couldn‚Äôt complete an order at an open restaurant because after arriving the app said they were closed and would not complete the transaction. I don‚Äôt know if restaurants can‚Äôt change their hours or if corporate doesn‚Äôt care that customers expect closed stores to be open when the app says they are but it needs to be fixed. No other fast food app has these problems. 

2 stars because it works for lunch when every restaurant is actually open.

title: Works okay
review: I like the convenience and speed of curbside pickup. Using the app is challenging. I find it hard to just look at a straightforward menu. Too many options. Deals are distracting. I don‚Äôt like the interface of the past orders being collapsed because it‚Äôs hard to ‚Äúquickly reorder‚Äù when I can‚Äôt see everything that was actually in the past order. Worst of all, customization doesn‚Äôt save in favorites! So I add a favorite to my order and have to recustomize. What‚Äôs the point of saving it? The bag and checkout buttons are not prominent enough. The bag icon in the corner blends into all the deal banners. Don‚Äôt you want it to be easy for me to order??
developerResponse: {'id': 18688933, 'body': 'We always want you to have a great experience with the app. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.', 'modified': '2020-10-25T16:28:43Z'}

title: This is the worse experience I‚Äôve ever had with online ordering
review: The app looks great but the part that matters is the checkout. The checkout is awful. I put in my card info and go to the store (easy) and then click I‚Äôm here it ask me how I want to pick up my food I click curbside and put in my number (also easy) and the click finish and pay and nothing little do I know when it says you don‚Äôt have internet connection please restart app and try again it‚Äôs charging me over and over and over again until my card is negative and locked. I had to leave and go to work and then deal with getting the chargers knocked of my card and getting it unlocked all without my coffee that I so despitly needed
developerResponse: {'id': 20839429, 'body': "That's definitely not cool at all, Catherine. Let us look into that for ya. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.\r\n", 'modified': '2021-02-03T17:16:07Z'}

title: Quit working
review: I‚Äôve had the app for over a year. I use to love it! But all of a sudden all my new Deals have stopped showing up all the time and I made sure my app was updated. All of my coffee punches quit showing up. I probably have close to seven coming to me if the app ever decides to give them to me.  I have told the workers at my local McDonalds and they tell me to keep having my coffee thing scanned but I‚Äôm getting tired of it not working. I‚Äôm seriously thinking about just getting my coffee someplace new since I‚Äôm not getting my punches anymore
developerResponse: {'id': 9158902, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-06-13T22:48:02Z'}

title: Ruined breakfast
review: I was signed out when I opened your app. There is no 1 password integration which is fine but you also disabled copy and paste so I had to type my very secure password in. Then after I typed it in, you said this device needed to be verified...... which sent me to my email. I clicked the link and it took me into the app. I had to sign in again! With my very long password and no copy and paste. Get the order placed no problem. Get there, for some reason inside pickup is disabled. Type the curbside spot in. It notifies me that ‚Äúsome items are unavailable‚Äù I see it‚Äôs 10:32 and breakfast is over and all my items are gone. Great experience! Never again. All because some very intelligent person decided that pasting into text fields was a security problem.
developerResponse: {'id': 18331804, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had, Doug. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-10-07T17:24:39Z'}

title: Absolute trash of an app for a corporation this big
review: And yet they still have the audacity to keep pushing something that doesn‚Äôt even work. Always trying to get everyone to download it when I CANT EVEN REGISTER. Waste of time trying to get me to fill up their whole sign up form twice to tell me about technical difficulties. And guess what? You can only register through the app that doesn‚Äôt even work. How about you save some of my time and say registration not working at the moment, try again later instead telling people as they press the submit button. Why even bother running one day deals and promotions while your app doesn‚Äôt even work. FIT IT OR EXTEND IT, hire people to watch the apps performance and bugs or just don‚Äôt push it at all. Truly embarrassing.

title: Somewhat of a time saver
review: I like the fact that you can skip the line and place your order. I like that you can create your order even before you arrive at the store. What I do not like is that you can‚Äôt actually place the order until you are pulling into the parking lot and then they start making your order. It would be great if you could let the restaurant know you are on the way so they could start your order and it would be done when you arrive. It would also be nice if you could scan your receipt for the McCafe punchcard. There have been 2 times the app hasn‚Äôt captured my McCafe purchase, so I missed out on the punches.
developerResponse: {'id': 11081830, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.", 'modified': '2019-10-06T18:09:53Z'}

title: Waste
review: I Placed A Simple Order Of 4 Tenders & Payed With Apple Pay. The M Bounced Around & Then It Said ‚ÄúWe Have Received Your Order‚Äù Then The Screen Turned White & Everything Froze. I Shut It Down & Reopened It & Then It Told Me I ‚ÄúChecked Out Before Completing My Order.‚Äù Because Of The Previous Message I Called The Store To See If They Had It. They Said No & Told Me To Just Come In. I Reordered It Before Driving (same thing happened) I Got To The Store & They Said They Didn‚Äôt Have It. About 3 Minutes Later The Order Popped Up & Then They Told Me It Wasn‚Äôt Paid For. I Was About To Pay In Store But Then It Showed Up As Being Paid. I Used The App To Save Me Time But Because Of The Lag They Hadn‚Äôt Even Dropped The Tenders & I Couldn‚Äôt Wait So Ultimately The App Wasted My Time. That‚Äôs What I Get Though For Even Trying To Eat That I‚Äôm Done With McDonalds.
developerResponse: {'id': 10449797, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-08-31T21:35:57Z'}

title: Poor customer service
review: So I ordered on my app 2 meals for my husband and myself. Pulled in to the drive thru and gave my order number, total came to $12 and some change. When I get to the window they inform me they don‚Äôt have it. I verified that the address was correct. As I‚Äôm sitting at the window I open my online banking to see they pulled almost $5 from my account and I got nothing. So I call the support number on app and am told we are sorry but you will have to dispute the charge with your bank and they send me ONE coupon for a free sandwich. Completely appalled by the lack of customer service given. Then when I open my receipt it shows a completely different order that what I placed. So again I paid for someone else‚Äôs order. Will NEVER use the app again.

title: So many problems
review: The app sounds great but hardly works properly. Sometimes there‚Äôs good deals, but many times it‚Äôs the same crappy deals day after day and you‚Äôll get sick of them. Also sometimes the app glitches and you can‚Äôt find simple menu items like a salad. Also the app has no idea what deals an individual location is currently running. Also today we wanted to use a deal, but the app glitches and said we had just used a deal an hour ago, when we hadn‚Äôt used the app in days! So we were not able to get a deal at all! Needs some work! Also to update, the app just said McDonald‚Äôs was closed and we could not use the app to get our coffee deal! The McDonald‚Äôs had been open for an hour and a half. Still nothing but problems with this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 7869980, 'body': 'We hear ya, Tyler! We suggest uninstalling and reinstalling the app.  If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give our Mobile App team a call at 1-877-334-4332, so we can help you further.', 'modified': '2019-06-30T10:10:16Z'}

title: Great way to compensate for incompetent staff and poor setups
review: Using the app to order your food is exponentially more accurate than ordering verbally in the drive thru or at the counter. Take the low wage human error out of the equation and use this app instead. You will be glad that you did, and you will be lovin‚Äô it. ü§ó Another added bonus is that you don‚Äôt have to hand your thousand dollar phone to a stranger to use Apple Pay in the often poorly designed drive thru credit card machine locations too far to reach from your car.

title: Always a problem
review: I don‚Äôt remember how many times I‚Äôve been giving this app and McDonald‚Äôs the last chance but I finally delete it today. There‚Äôs always a problem! Sometimes my order got screwed with some other orders. Sometimes I got a receipt with things I‚Äôve never ordered. Sometimes, no, every time, my card was not charged through the apps so I had to give them my card at the drive thru. This morning I ordered again and same problem: My order was not paid! I didn‚Äôt bring my card with me so I left without food! I tried to give a feedback in the apps and guess what? The page freezes! It left me with no other choice but delete the app. I know you are a big company and to you my couple bucks is like nothing, but still, good luck.
developerResponse: {'id': 8176376, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-04-11T18:13:41Z'}

title: McD‚Äôs App
review: I like McDonalds but it it by far not my favorite fast food. HOWEVER, it IIS by far the best fast food app out there! It‚Äôs the only one  of it‚Äôs  kind that‚Äôs not afraid to give you fair deals and rewards. I bet I spent over $200 bucks on two other national chains apps and have yet to earn even one reward on one of them and just earned one reward from other that amounted to $1.63. So again, not my favorite but do like there food and there app is why I‚Äôm writing this review right now sitting there parking lot!
developerResponse: {'id': 33242934, 'body': 'deals and rewards are how we share the love!', 'modified': '2022-11-18T17:35:01Z'}

title: Used to work
review: Used to LOVE this app, used to use it 2-3 times a week. Recently, the last 4-5 times I've tried to use the coupon deals, the worker scans it and says the offer isn't valid. They can read the deal and see it's legitamate, but it won't scan. I used to just pay without the deal anyway, but I started getting annoyed and would just cancel the order. Why is this happening?? I've tried different locations (all show up as participating locations) on different days, so I don't think it's a particular McDonald's location. I also had accumulated 2 free espresso drinks on the app from buying McCafe so much, then the app erased both vouchers for them. I hate this app now. Feels like a scam, they lure me in with the app deals and they conveniently don't work when I scan them.

title: fix this for employees sake
review: i‚Äôm 16 and Mcdonalds is my summer job. I can‚Äôt take old people blaming me anymore when their coupons don‚Äôt work!! Just recently, a lady came in and was going to use the $1 sandwich coupon with her order. She went to scan it and it didn‚Äôt connect to the register, so it wouldn‚Äôt work. Instead of being a rational human and not blaming it on me, who had no control over this, she starts yelling at me that the app never works and she‚Äôs fed up with coming here. I wasn‚Äôt about to deal with this, so I called my manager over for them to sort this out. I know it‚Äôs not the apps fault that this woman is rude, but if you could fix connection issues it‚Äôd save so much of my time dealing with nasty customers. Thank you

title: Like it but......
review: So I‚Äôve enjoyed having the deals and have gotten to try a few coffees I would not have normally tried. Very delicious. But we thought we were using the app the proper way and did a mobile order when we were Awful Western Center, Boulevard went inside to get our order and it had been since you are local and most frequently visited McDonald‚Äôs location. Sadly to say it took us an hour to get back into town because of construction and traffic and we ended up having to abandon the order we paid for with a card through the app. That was a bummer

title: What is the point of the curbside pickup?
review: After placing my order and paying for it, I still need to wait in line at the drive through to give them my order number. Then I‚Äôm told by some places to pull up to the first window (still waiting in line) to give them my number and then waiting even longer at the second window for my order, other places say I can drive to the parking spot. So which is it? Either way it‚Äôs still faster to just place the order at the drive through. It seems like there is a lot of confusion. Maybe you should have trained everyone BEFORE rolling out the curbside pickup. And stop giving the good app deals to the mobile orders exclusively! We don‚Äôt want to wait in line.

title: Please fix
review: Love the app ofcourse , as someone who likes to save money and a fan of McDonald‚Äôs i definley use the app weekly. But it‚Äôs getting really frustrating every time my app updates , I‚Äôm logged out and every time i try to log back in with my existing account it does not work. Mind you apple is saving my passwords so it the app that never can seem to remember me or let me log back in. I‚Äôve made over 5 accounts because it happens everyone . Please fix your sign in , now I‚Äôve ran out of emails and can‚Äôt even get back in or reset password for ANY of my accounts . Please fix it‚Äôs really annoying
developerResponse: {'id': 30561177, 'body': 'we would like to take a look into this, Krissy. provide a few more details for our mobile app team here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-06-26T18:30:44Z'}

title: Glitchy, never works right anymore
review:
So many issues with this app. I‚Äôve made a huge order, been charged, but the store says I didn‚Äôt pay. No way to get refunded through the app. I order today and when I get here they tell me to refresh that my order didn‚Äôt go through. For one thing, you cannot refresh. So I close the app and go back in and it shows the ordering process is complete but it is just blank where the order number should be. So after 15 minutes of messing with this breakfast is over and no food. 

Every single time I have tried to use the app in the last couple months there is a problem. There is nowhere to get help for issues in the app and the stores don‚Äôt care. Other apps I use (like bk) let you get help through the app and quickly credit me when there are errors. 

Bottom line is the food here is too expensive without the app. The app doesn‚Äôt work anymore so I am done. I normally spend way too much money here anyway so it‚Äôs probably a good thing. 

How does such a huge company have such a horrible app and service??
developerResponse: {'id': 33244181, 'body': "don't give up on us just yet! try uninstlaling and reinstalling the app, and if that doesn't work, let us know here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-11-18T20:02:55Z'}

title: Charged but never received
review: Waited for my curbside pickup for 1 hour look at my phone, the order is now completed and I have no food. I decided to order a single sandwich this time someone came out I explain what happened assured it would be fixed and waited another hour, nobody shows so I then left without getting my original order. It‚Äôs a good app but you can only use one deal at a time, can‚Äôt use points at the same time and you can‚Äôt even use it if you buy something the store already discounts like when when you buy two McMuffins, I can‚Äôt really control that what do I say give me both at full price so I can get a 50 cent coffee?
developerResponse: {'id': 30148424, 'body': "we're here to make the best app ever for you. help us get there by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n", 'modified': '2022-07-16T06:08:35Z'}

title: DONT TRUST THIS APP WITH YOUR CREDIT CARD INFO!!
review: Placed an order for my husband and stopped by the store to pick it up and the order was gone! Totally disappeared from the app, however under recent orders it showed a different order than what we had ordered IN ANOTHER STATE. Checked my email and sure enough my credit card was charged for somebody else‚Äôs order clear across the country. I just wasted 25 minutes trying to call customer care but they left me on hold, transferred me a couple times and when I finally reached the right department the representative just yelled ‚Äúhuh? What happened??!‚Äù Before sending me directly to the exit survey without even listening to me explain the issue. If I could give them zero stars I would.
developerResponse: {'id': 26850731, 'body': "That's totally disappointing, Rebecca! Let's get that looked into here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-12-15T13:14:20Z'}

title: TERRIBLE, hangry and ticked off
review:
Tried to place a mobile order. I am driving a bus in the winter. I can‚Äôt leave the bus running with kids on it. So I usually place a mobile order well the app keeps telling ‚Äúinternal error restart app‚Äù same problem. I filled out the entire form for SUPPORT and get an error. So, here I am not eating because you can‚Äôt get an app to work. What a freaking joke. Also, it can‚Äôt find some McDonald‚Äôs to order from. Sometimes it tells me items (burgers or chicken sandwiches) aren‚Äôt available. If you‚Äôre going to have an app AND encourage mobile ordering, it better work! Hangry and ticked off.

ALSO, I signed out to sign back In AND I can‚Äôt even sign back in. This is another reason I go to Culver‚Äôs. Freaking so upset!

title: Malfunctioning all the time
review: I‚Äôve only once was successful at using the app. I have it on my phone, but it‚Äôs tough to get logged in. They must think they need the secured a bank. The other times, I can‚Äôt find what I need, or I complete the order and can‚Äôt pay for it. Seems there‚Äôs always ‚Äútechnical difficulties‚Äù. I cannot log in on my iPad ever. I prefer it for its size. I keep getting this email link so that ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt have to use a password‚Äù. I‚Äôve saved my password. If I don‚Äôt need to use it, why was it necessary to have one?  Increasingly frustrating. While on the road, I spent 30 minutes trying to get an order in for the McDonald‚Äôs I knew was up ahead. No luck. Couldn‚Äôt take advantage of the mobile app deals. Grrrr.
developerResponse: {'id': 26589404, 'body': 'We can see how that would be frustrating. Let us look into that for you by getting back to our mobile app team here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2021-12-01T20:06:04Z'}

title: Loved now can‚Äôt use
review: We have loved using this app. But last week it signed us out and won‚Äôt let us back in. It says I signed up with social media so I need to use that account. So I use that account and it tells me ‚Äúsorry that didn‚Äôt work confirm your internet connection ‚Äú my internet connection has no issues. Then it says if issue continues close and reopen app. Well did that including restarts and reloading app. No go. I have like 10,000 points saved to use I can‚Äôt access.

title: What is even the point of a rewards system
review: App does what it‚Äôs supposed to so I guess that‚Äôs cool but McDonald‚Äôs steals your points or your money. Whichever way you want to look at it. You can‚Äôt use your points for more than one thing in a single order but your points also expire by a certain date. It‚Äôs dumb and forces you to waste points or use them on something you don‚Äôt even want to order. Fix this that‚Äôs dumb. Every single other food app including Chik Fil A lets you use as many points as you can in a single order because why???? THEY ARE YOUR POINTS. McDonald‚Äôs is just cheap and money grabbing like always. Anyway app works fine just a useless point system

title: It just works
review:
It‚Äôs a bit tricky to find food items at first, but you can order easily and even customize items.  My wife needs low salt, so we started ordering a quarter pounder with lettuce, tomato and no salt or cheese.   

I like being able to just park and get my food without waiting in the drive thru.  The app uses my location to figure out when I arrive- and once when  I accidentally ordered from the wrong store it just transferred the order when it noticed I had arrived. 

Look.  It‚Äôs not perfect, but it‚Äôs great for my needs.
developerResponse: {'id': 15345594, 'body': "We're so overjoyed to hear how much you like using our app! Thanks for spreading the love. ", 'modified': '2020-05-15T16:22:12Z'}

title: Newport store MA
review: Employee said app only paid .07 and that I still owed 1.00 than management said I was all set. In the first window than second window picking up food they said I owed money I asked to speak to the manger who said I was all set. And she refused to admit that she said that or provide me with her name. I asked for her name as I was asked to pay with an employee as the app did not take per them. So I wanted manger to be aware of the situation at the store level if the app ended up charging me as well as the drive threw employee. Manger was not having it at all. Instead of holding up the drive threw line and possibly having other customers having a bad experience I. Cancel my model order and left. As manager was not willing to resolve issue.

title: Very Poorly Done
review:
This is just stupid. When you try to set up an account, copy/paste is disabled for the password fields. So you can‚Äôt generate a good password with a password manager like PWSafe or 1Password and then paste it in; you have to type the whole bloody thing by hand. 

 Also, they limit your password to 12 characters, that‚Äôs entirely unacceptable. Safari generates 20-character passwords. And nobody in their right mind imposes a maximum length limit on their user‚Äôs passwords. Hello? Equifax? Target? Any awareness at all of the major breaches that have occurred over the past few years? 

 And if you go to the trouble of typing in a decent password, and it‚Äôs too long, you can‚Äôt just backspace from the end to remove the extra characters, because some genius decided that a single backspace should delete everything you just typed in. 

If you want me to use your app, you need to make it a lot less painful to set up an account with a reasonably safe password. I guess I‚Äôll give the Chick-fil-A app a try; maybe they have some interest in selling me food, instead of just annoying me.

title: Broken
review:
I would have given this app 4 stars two weeks ago, but the update last week broke it so that it is now completely unusable. The deal I used on my last visit (which fully processed and was paid for and I picked up) was stuck in my cart. I couldn‚Äôt delete or edit it. So I tried reinstalling the app. When I tried logging in to the newly reinstalled app, I was unable to. When I tried logging in using my email, it told me that email is linked to a social media account. When I tried logging in using any of the available social media apps, it consistently told me that that email has a McDonalds account. 

The four stars would be five if they would make the deals usage more user friendly.

title: Must have specific phone?!?
review:
I have tried twice now to use this app to order something for my daughter to pick up to bring home.   Both times it ended with her having to call me because the order never came through for them to make it.  Plus it says we have to check in upon arrival.
When my daughter gets there, I attempt to check in for her so she can pick up the order, but it won‚Äôt let me because ‚ÄúI‚Äôm too far away‚Äù.  I have taken screen shots of the order number and sent them to her to show them (because that‚Äôs what it says to do) and they won‚Äôt accept it, saying they don‚Äôt have the order so they can‚Äôt make it.  But it charged my card!  I‚Äôm over this app.  Fix your issues.

title: Lot‚Äôs of glitches
review:
Placed an order using one of the daily deal coupons.  Authorized the correct charge for my meal, but upon arriving to pick up my order my credit card was charged a different higher amount.  So much for my free holiday McFlurry. üò†

This isn‚Äôt the first time the app has created problems.  Sometimes the store claims the app isn‚Äôt processing the charge and the store manager requires me to pay directly for the order.  Of course a few minutes later the app charge goes through and I end up being double, or even once triple charged, for the order. 

The app is convenient and minimizes touch points which is great.   But not if I‚Äôm constantly being over charged and the stores can‚Äôt resolve because ‚Äúthe problem is with the app and we can‚Äôt reverse incorrect app charges‚Äù.  

üëéüëé

Update:  did provide feedback via the app.  Was politely told ‚Äúgo away... not a concern for us.‚Äù  Advised I should contact my credit card company to process a chargeback if I was unhappy being over billed.üòï.  Really?  Instead of fixing your app I should repeatedly request chargebacks?

title: Not Impressed
review: Very Clunky Mobile App. This app needs some serious improvement. The team really needs to take a mobile-first approach and study how to create an easy mobile app. There are sooo many barriers to entry and order. It is asked whether signing in or signing up to confirm via email which requires the user to exit the app to check email. The email then takes 3+ mins to arrive - this needs to be NRT if you really need ppl to validate via email. My recommendation would be to skip the email step altogether and find a way to keep ppl in the app. Also the onboarding flow and payment flow don't feel mobile-first and requires a lot of entry from the user. If you want the user to create a profile - allow them to do that after they have placed their order.

title: Not wheelchair friendly...
review:
I tried this app about a year ago and it wouldn‚Äôt work.  It charged me and showed the order on my phone but nothing showed in the stores system.  I had to wait in line, order again, pay a second time and wait for them to credit the first order back.

I thought I‚Äôd give it another try and yet again I wasted my time (and money if they fail to refund it).  It‚Äôs frustrating when the app leaves out key details such as do you go inside, do they come out to you, etc?   It would be easy for them to add those key details so we know what to expect upon arrival.  Hopefully this time it won‚Äôt take them as long to credit my order back since I didn‚Äôt receive it.  :(

title: Pretty strong and usually easy
review: For the most part, I think the mcApp is ahead of the competition on their apps. Especially with incentives to use it (coupons). One missing piece is as simple to fix as it is to say, but enough are not saying it, I guess. There is no way to order ketchup packs or any other condiments or napkins - nothing like walking in the store. I think that‚Äôs keeping me from 5 stars. The employee is usually really good about going back in and getting what I need, but seems so simple to just add it as a feature. In store = in car.

title: McGreat !!!
review:
I ‚ù§Ô∏è the app ! I use it very often for my Frappe rewards, got to love a FREE frappe. I also, use it for my autistic niece who lives her üçü on our drives, the $1.00 large fry is a great savings in my wallet. I sometimes will use a sandwich ‚Äúdeal‚Äù that‚Äôs on the app.

title: Stole my credit card info
review: This is absolutely ridiculous. The security on this app must be extremely weak. I had a fraudulent charge show up a week ago. Someone has a wonderful $18 lunch from McDonald‚Äôs at my expense. I live in Missouri and somehow someone stole my info and was able to order using my credit card in California. I‚Äôve tried to reach out to McDonald‚Äôs in multiple occasions and they continue to ignore me. I did some online research and found this is not anything new. It‚Äôs been happening for two years yet McDonald‚Äôs continues to use the app and ya not fixed the security issues. Don‚Äôt download and if you do, don‚Äôt upload credit card info into it. Otherwise, you may get stuck buying lunch for some bum out in California.

title: What‚Äôs the point?
review: What‚Äôs the point in ordering food via mobile app?  So customers can pull up get their food and virtually no wait time.  You know why there is hardly any wait time?  Because the order was placed ahead of time. What‚Äôs the point if you are not going to start preparing the meal till the customer gets to the store?  Might as well wait in line. It makes no sense ordering ahead only to get there and having to wait as if you just ordered. Take a look at Sonic mobile app ordering system. They have perfected it. You order ahead of time and when you get there you have your order brought to you in a matter of seconds. That‚Äôs the point in ordering food ahead of time.

title: Not satisfied.
review:
Tried it a few times, not worth the hassle. The app isn‚Äôt easy to use. The menus are extensive and it takes a lot longer to key in an order on a small device than it does at the kiosk inside. Also, with app security being a thing lately I‚Äôm hesitant to pay through apps rather than just pay at the kiosk or counter.

I‚Äôve also found on the occasions I‚Äôve used the app that employees didn‚Äôt get the order correct as it was entered and were long gone before I could address it. Leaving me with the choice of going inside and getting in line, or just accepting the mistake which I did twice.

Might try it again someday once app purchasing is a more common way of ordering and gets the same level of service as a live order.

title: It Was fun while it lasted
review: I haven‚Äôt been able to place a mobile order in over a year. Every time I have reached out to app support, it‚Äôs like the person doesn‚Äôt understand the problem. They are asking me exactly which location I experienced bad service when that doesn‚Äôt apply. The actual problem is that any time I try to place a mobile order through the app at any location, the app tells me that McDonald‚Äôs is closed. Each of the McDonald‚Äôs locations are 24 hours and regardless of the time of day, the app tells me the McDonald‚Äôs is closed and to choose another location. I‚Äôve deleted and re-downloaded the app and I‚Äôve tried different accounts. No luck. But when I was able to use the mobile order feature, I enjoyed the app a lot.

title: Disfunctional App

You have an option to give the order number to a member but that function doesn‚Äôt work either because according to the McDonald‚Äôs I ordered from the address I selected is correct but there are two different store numbers associated with the same one address so they could not fulfill my order. review: I used to use the app frequently because I would have $25-$35 orders with customizations and trying to explain that to the cashiers is always a pain. The app made it so easy.  loved when they added the curbside pickup. Recently, it said my card was invalid and to add it again. I tried several times before giving up. I deleted the app and redownloded it. Logged out and back in. Went into settings and removed the card and tried to add it back. It won‚Äôt even let me add it and just gives me an error message. This app went from amazing to completely useless overnight. It‚Äôs now been two weeks and it still won‚Äôt work. I have only spent $10 at McDonald‚Äôs in the last two weeks now as opposed to $100, so I guess I should be thankful lol.

title: Limited app use
review: Very disappointed in the latest update to the deals app that restricts the use of using the app deals only one time within a one hour time frame . You keep raising the prices but the food quality is decreasing , along with the cleanliness of your stores. Most of the staff members appear incompetent. They  can never get an order correct or have the ability to follow safe food handling practices. Sorry McDonalds the value of you food is no longer there and I and my family can have a sit down restaurant meal at Denny‚Äôs or Bob Evens for what it costs to your eat fast food.

title: Walkin is quicker
review:
I placed my order with the app while I was 10 minutes away from the store. I got there and I clicked ‚ÄúI am here‚Äù and chose in store pick up right before I pull into the store and got my order number. I walked in, before another customer did. There was an Uber order person already waiting in store. 
The other customer places the order there and got their order before both myself and Uber order.  The staff at the store didn't bring my order out until they ask, what order are you waiting for?  
The poor uber guy experience was worst. He showed his phone twice to the staff and they don‚Äôt know what to do until the manager helped. 
The app is suppose to speed up the ordering process but the in store process is poorly integrated.

review:
I have been trying to use this app for probably the last year, been successful maybe 3 times. Every other time it has just been a pain.  Can‚Äôt locate a restaurant because ....  can‚Äôt get deals from the restaurant, can‚Äôt order from the restaurant. Some days the dancing fries‚Äù their way of saying I‚Äôm thinking‚Äù are right away, other days the fries are while you‚Äôre ordering, or finding a restaurant.  What they should call this app is the dancing fries because pretty much that‚Äôs all I ever get.  On Wi-Fi on cell service good reception bad reception it doesn‚Äôt matter.  Right this moment I‚Äôm sitting in a McDonalds with full reception at 4g.  And still all I can get to is the dancing fries.  
Worthless app unless you want to spend your day watching the fries dance.

title: Double charged - twice.
review: I was double charged on a mobile order twice in a row. After placing an order and paying for it on the app, I was told my card was declined. I then handed the employee the same card at the window that‚Äôs registered on my app and it went through. My bank statement then had two charges on it for the same price on the same day.  When I called after the first time, the manager refused to refund the transaction. I just went through the drive thru with a mobile order again today and the same thing happened. I was assured by a manager, rather rudely, that it‚Äôs impossible to be double charged but, nonetheless, it happened again. I‚Äôve now deleted the app since I can‚Äôt afford to keep paying twice for the same order.

title: Only as good as the McDonald‚Äôs location
review: I‚Äôve used this app 6 or 7 times now, usually because I‚Äôm either in a hurry or because the drive through is packed. Two of those times (so far) I had to go into the store to get my order (just a Diet Coke btw, so nothing complicated). I waited almost ten minutes each time before going inside. The first time, they said no one knew who was supposed to do curbside. The second time, they just said they were too busy. Tried to use it in the drive thru to pick up my drink and no one knew how to process the order. This was my experience with two different locations. So, while the ordering is easy, if your local McD‚Äôs isn‚Äôt geared up or paying attention, it fails.

title: App is worse than other options, if that is possible
review: McDonald‚Äôs ability to serve quickly is nonexistent, regardless of the location. There must be something inherently flawed in their process; although I don‚Äôt remember it being this bad before. So I figured I would give the app a try hoping that it would be faster and less frustrating. Oh boy was I wrong, it‚Äôs worse! There is nothing more frustrating than watching the people who entered the drive-through long after I parked curbside leave the drive-through before I have  received my food. And not only does it take longer, guaranteed your order will be wrong. And again, it is not location specific, they are all terrible! I have made it a rule of thumb, if I am in a hurry, do not stop at McDonald‚Äôs!

title: Rewards not working
review: The rewards section hasn‚Äôt worked for over a week now. It keeps saying none available for location. My points won‚Äôt load either. title: Can‚Äôt change email
review:
If you ever get locked out your email and have to create a new one, forget about updating your email on the app. Per McDonald‚Äôs customer support 

‚ÄúThank you for taking the time to contact McDonald's. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you encountered when using the Mobile app. We appreciate this opportunity to respond to your concerns.

There is currently no way to change the email address associated with the Mobile app. You will need to register a new account with your new email address and request to delete your old account. If you have any rewards on your old account, please use those first prior to having us delete the account. Once the account is deleted, those rewards will be gone as well. You can then start earning points in your new account once you register and activate the new account.

If you have further issues, please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us. We value you as a customer and hope to serve you soon at the Golden Arches.

Andrea 
McDonald's Mobile Support‚Äù

Your food, App, and customer support are total garbage,,

title: Be aware
review: Be aware when placing orders you will get charged but may not get your food and no refund. I placed my order in the app at the Detroit airport, got charged and received order confirmation in the app. My order never showed up at the restaurant. When I asked McD manager why my order number is not on the screen she casually said ‚ÄúOur system has been down for a week and the app orders are not coming through‚Äù I asked about refund, she said it will be automatically refunded but a week later no refund. I showed my order confirmation and payment in the app and asked if I could still get my food she said absolutely but I would have to pay again to the cashier. I will never use this app again.

title: Good, but with some glitches‚Ä¶
review:
Occasionally I‚Äôm not able to place a mobile order. I‚Äôll try to order a breakfast sandwich meal and it will tell me that the sandwich is unavailable, but I can order it just fine through the speaker box in drive-thru.

Also, sometimes I open the app to find that it pre-ordered a meal that I had purchased on a prior visit, verifiable by the time stamp of the order. I will cancel the order and place a new one. At first I thought this was user error, but I confirmed this was a bug as it happened a few times.

Lastly, Siri Shortcuts just don‚Äôt work for me at all. Every time I try to use Siri to place the order, I and up inside the app with the bouncing fry box loading screen. I have to abort and start over and place the order myself.

On days where it does these things, placing a conventional order seems easier but I do like the rewards points.  Thanks!

title: Order Discrepancy
review: So the App is supposed to tell you when something isn‚Äôt available, right? Well I guess not. I used the mobile app and ordered two shakes. When I went to go pick them up the restaurant informed me that they couldn‚Äôt fulfill the order. That was fine, I understand. But, they told me I had to go through the app for a refund. So, I contacted the app for a refund and they got back to me pretty quick I was happy about that, but low and behold instead of giving me a refund they changed the order contents. So I ordered two shakes and didn‚Äôt receive them but the order now says I RECEIVED a six piece nugget and fries, which I did not receive. So I contacted a second time and guess who hasn‚Äôt gotten back to me.

title: Worst app I have ever tried
review: After calling tech support at least 5 times, no one can seem to get my login corrected, they have even deleted my account, but when I try to log in , it is doing the same thing that was going on before, keeps asking for a GOOGLE account, but when I try to use it, it loops right around to the same problem I had before, is there anyone in TECH SUPPORT that can fix this, I already lost all my points from last account, cannot even start over with new account‚Ä¶BS , after Tech Support was suppose to call me, no one ever did, does not seem that anyone there can fix this problem, this has been going on since last year, I am now in February 12, 2022‚Ä¶.WHAT IS GOING ON??????

title: Good but need some improvements
review:
Very easy to use. Great layout. Love the ability to earn points. Easy navigation and ability to change the order location as needed.
 Improvements needed:  update when machinery is not working. On multiple occasions I‚Äôve ordered a frozen coke to get there and find out the machine is broke. When I have asked to cancel my order, they don‚Äôt seem to be able to. Several times I have paid $.27 for a sauce packet. The other  suggestion would be the ability to add a gift card as a payment option. Seems illogical to not be able to do so.

title: Too many glitches
review: I love the convenience of placing my order; paying electronically then pulling through first thing in the morning. However, too frequently, the staff says the payment has not ‚Äúgone through.‚Äù I see it as ‚Äúpending‚Äù in my bank account. Yet, the staff will not always provide my order; they request my payment which only creates duplicate charges and my bank investigating to refund the second charge. Fix the connections, train the staff. Whatever is causing the issue is a problem. I have an order number and believe my transaction has been completed.

title: Lousy App and Policy
review:
This App tracks ur phone and only allows you with your phone to actually pickup your order.  

Placed an order and paid for it and had my daughter try and pick it up with a screen shot of my order number. They  wouldn‚Äôt give her the order because she didn‚Äôt have my phone with her. The order was all of $11 and change. 

Come on McDonald‚Äôs‚Ä¶Really!  There are so many ways to verify a card/customer. You make anyone who downloads this App jump through a bunch of hoops to activate it and verify your identity and then you refuse to complete an order from a verified customer simply because the phone isn‚Äôt at your the pickup location.  Thanks for nothing‚Ä¶app deleted and account closed.

title: Great App Hampered by Frustrating Login Bugs
review:
I use this app every time I go to McDonald‚Äôs and have redeemed quite a few rewards, but the app daily requires me to log back in. My email address is the same as my Google account so I try that for easier signin. Nope, apparently years ago I logged into McDonalds website with Facebook. So I try logging in with Facebook instead. Nope, there‚Äôs an error when trying to login with Facebook. So I‚Äôm back to using my email address.

And what‚Äôs worse is tomorrow, I‚Äôm just going to have to login again because for whatever reason this app can‚Äôt remember my login for more than 24 hours.

At McDonald‚Äôs, please fix this. I don‚Äôt have this issue with any other fast food companies app.

title: Says store is closed when opened, doesn‚Äôt take my payment!!
review:
App is amazing when it works but when it doesn‚Äôt it‚Äôs terrible!

The McDonald‚Äôs is 24 hours but when I ordered at the store at 7PM to it says it‚Äôs ‚Äúcurrently closed‚Äù, when I‚Äôm In the parking lot and can clearly see a line for drivethru. There‚Äôs a way to force order so I place it anyway and the store can see my order number but when I go to pick up the order the attendant says my order wasn‚Äôt paid even though it says it on my statement and order history that a payment was submitted. 

I end up giving them my card to pay anyway but they end up over charging me on TWO different occasions. App says payment submitted but when I go through drive through they say no payment was submitted but changed me full price for my order because I used an in app coupon which they didn‚Äôt account for. I‚Äôm assuming it has something to do with the store being ‚Äúcurrently closed‚Äù.  

This will definitely be the last time I return to McDonald‚Äôs.

title: Mobil order
review: When making Mobil purchases I received an error message ‚Äúproblem with payment‚Äù come to find out it was posting in my bank 3-4 times and the order never went through for the food. So, I deleted the app and reloaded it and now it won‚Äôt allow me to store a payment method at all! So no more Mobil orders I‚Äôm guessing and the deals that are Mobil are not for in store purchases! I called McDonald‚Äôs and they say there is no problem with the App and someone will look into this. It‚Äôs been several days and I have heard nothing!

title: Wendy‚Äôs is better. McDonalds can afford to pay their employees $15/hr
review: EAT AT WENDYS. Boycott McDonald‚Äôs until they finally pay their employees a living wage of $15/hr (yes, that‚Äôs the same salary I make as a caseworker for foster kids and no, I don‚Äôt care). Stop giving your lazy CEOs and shareholders handouts and make them work for it. In my hometown, McDonalds actually threw their employees a party for selling the most chicken sandwiches üòÇüòÇüòÇ if that‚Äôs not the pizza party meme, idk what is. McDonald‚Äôs, ba da ba ba ba I‚Äôm hating it. Wendy‚Äôs is better anyway. Wendy‚Äôs pays their employees almost 2x what mcdonalds does. Wendy‚Äôs also supports adoption and helps children who are older or who have a harder time getting adopted than other kids. They get a wonderful Wendy‚Äôs worker that helps reach out to families far and wide for the child. WENDY‚ÄôS ‚ô•Ô∏è

title: Ba da bup bup bup, I‚Äôm hating it
review: This app isn‚Äôt very good.  Today was probably the 4th time that I ordered, then went to pick up, & the app wouldn‚Äôt recognize that I was in the parking lot.  And the only reason I even use it is because usually there‚Äôs a $3 off coupon deal available, and I have a few picky kids who always have special requests (plain, ketchup only, etc), and it makes it easier to do it at home, than try to remember who wants what at the drive through.  Then I get there, have to re-order everything at the speaker, and to top it off, I can‚Äôt use the coupon either because it‚Äôs mobile only.  Might as well just pull my nuts out at the drivethru window so McDonald‚Äôs can have a better kick at them.

title: Great in theory‚Ä¶
review: Normally I really like this app but sometimes it‚Äôs not up to date with some locations opening hours so a number of times I‚Äôve placed orders and been charged for items just to arrive at the location that is closed or not serving food. It‚Äôs extremely frustrating and not worth the effort to go through to get my money back when this happens. Hope devs will install some sort of fail-safe to ensure app can only be used during open hours and the menu being served then to stop this from happening. Also a control to ensure money is returned to customers whose orders are not delivered without making us jump through hoops.

title: Have to have the phone with you.
review: We put in our order and my mother went to pick it up.  I did the order on my phone.  When she got their, she text me to let me know that she was in spot number one.  I clicked the button, ‚ÄúI am already here‚Äù.  The app proceeded to let me know that I wasn‚Äôt there and gave me an order number.  I then called the restaurant to give them the order number.  The person on the phone told me that this was not possible and that my phone had to be there.  This doesn‚Äôt make any sense at all.  Chic fa le doesn‚Äôt do this.  No reason that my phone has to be at the restaurant.  They won‚Äôt know anyway. Never using this app again and will just stick with fast food apps that make sense.

title: Terrible
review: McDonald‚Äôs along with Burger King have some of the worst apps created. First, it is not user friendly to those picking up for others. You press you are there, then it reads ‚ÄúHmm. It does not look like you‚Äôre there.‚Äù Well, thank you for noticing and tracking me. There is no option to override that, which frustrates me to no end. Second, you get inconvenienced almost every time you go up to your McDonald‚Äôs because they tell you that they can‚Äôt find your order. Third, it is just not user friendly in the slightest. You‚Äôre better off just ordering when you get there, because you can‚Äôt really order ahead. You technically order once you get near or at the store. Once again, one of the worst apps ever.

title: Hacked!
review: If I could give it 0 stars I would. Someone hacked my account and used my stored card information to make 2 purchases I wasn‚Äôt aware of in a location I was not even close to. I have to be honest, it was alarming opening up my email and seeing 2 McDonald‚Äôs app receipts. But thankfully I got it solved with my bank and caught it 20 minutes right after these hackers used my card because I check my email often. Please fix this! Add 2-factor authentication or some other security feature to make it harder to hack the McDonald‚Äôs app. I love the deals though, but I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll ever use the app ever again after this incident. Truly was alarming and unexpected. Learned my lesson though, took off my card information to a lot of apps and places that I have it stored.

Makes me feel like someone is trying to manipulate me when the reason the app gives for needing location services turned on is to find location-specific deals. I can understand deals changing from store to store, but not changing depending on where I‚Äôm at when placing a mobile order. Being as it won‚Äôt show me deals even after selecting a store to order from? Feels bad-wrong-nope. Deleting the app and ordering from another fast food chain instead.

Did that, and it said ‚Äúsomething went wrong‚Äù and prompted me to reset my Google password!! TOTAL CRAP!! Also, the app frequently can‚Äôt connect to the Internet. title: Good app, when it works...
review: It‚Äôs nice to have the option to order ahead and choose how to pickup my food. App used to work with Apple Pay, but for some reason that‚Äôs no longer and option. Which is extremely disappointing considering the added convenience. I‚Äôve experienced mobile orders being paid for and picked up, yet still showing as pending in the app. I‚Äôve also had an order that I setup to pay for, got sent and received by a location, then the app never allowed me to pay. title: Need to train employees on app usage
review:
I went to a McDonalds, gave my order number, and the young lady had no clue what I was talking about. It took the manager to come and figure it out.  

The app says the order should be ready in 5 minutes once checking in. I went to the Winona MS store, it took 20 minutes to get a sausage biscuit and small frappe. I had to call the store to let them know I had been waiting at the mobile designated parking space. They said a bus had them backed up but the drive thru was moving smoothly.  I was about to call back and ask for a refund, but An employee came out and didn‚Äôt apologize, she just handed me the bag and left.  I had no napkins or jelly for the biscuit. I was traveling and expecting to be somewhere at a certain time, so this put me behind.

review: How come you can‚Äôt order a 6-piece Chicken Nugget Mighty Kids Happy Meal through the app? This is stupid! I love the idea of the app and the time it is supposed to save waiting in an endless drive-thru line and just pulling in to the reserved online order spots to pickup our order, but when I have to hunt through the app to individually order a 6-piece nuggets, small fries and a size small drink and somehow figure out how to buy a happy meal toy( because the regular happy meal only has 4-piece nuggets, tiny extra-small fries and an extra small drink) the time savings is debatable and my aggravation factor is just as high as if I had waited in the drive thru line. title: Good deals but crippling bugs prevent use
review:
Deals are good and the ability to order ahead and have them bring to your car is great, but recent updates have brought crippling bugs to the app. 

I live in a major US city with dozens of locations in the city and surrounding areas. In recent weeks locations started dropping out of the app and now every single location is marked as ‚ÄúClosed‚Äù within the app.  These locations are all open for business, but because the app has them marked as closed 24/7, it defeats the purpose of the app.  There is no longer an ‚ÄòOpen‚Äô McDonald‚Äôs anywhere in the city or surroundings area.

Normal troubleshooting such as reinstalling the app hasn‚Äôt resolved the issue. Built in feedback and contact form are broken. Running on iOS 12.1.3

review: Stopped working months ago. I can never view coupons anymore literally no matter what I do or where I am. Some people have real jobs that they actually care about and can‚Äôt be late for... guess I‚Äôm going across the street to Burger King where they literally have never messed up my order, been rude or taken more than 3 mins to cook my food. McDonald‚Äôs is a money hungry, garbage company that purposely hires garbage employees who provide garbage service at their poorly maintained locations.

I even tried to gain access through Facebook and it tells me I need to sign in and again, they will send me a confirmation email within 10 minutes or check my Spam folder. Well, I have deleted the app because it is not worth the trouble. Need to keep up on customer‚Äôs request especially if help is needed.

title: Internal payment problem

The last two or three times, I‚Äôve been to this same McDonald‚Äôs, after placing my order and parking in the curbside spot I press finish pay but it always says there‚Äôs a problem with the payment and I know it‚Äôs not my card because I‚Äôve ended up going somewhere else to get my food. But what really bugs me is after canceling my order because the app says there‚Äôs a payment error I still get charged!? title: Horrible for customizing
review: If you just use this app for deals it‚Äôs ok. However, if you‚Äôre going to do a mobile order prepare to NY er frustrated. The app does not allow of customizing drinks or orders. I take my drinks with no ice and can‚Äôt even add that on the app. Also, if you‚Äôre ordering ahead of time and hoping that your order will be ready by the time you arrive? Newsflash it won‚Äôt be! So you may as well just wait in the packed drive thru anyway because they don‚Äôt even start making your order until you‚Äôre parked. title: Can‚Äôt add sauces, seriously?
review: My rating would be a lot higher if you could add sauces to your order. You can‚Äôt even add ketchup! I know some stores are getting VERY stingy about giving you even one sauce (BBQ, hot mustard, etc.), but even if you could add where you‚Äôre able to pay for sauce. I think if you get a 10 piece order of chicken nuggets, it lets you add a sauce or two, but if you aren‚Äôt ordering nuggets, nothing‚Äînot even ketchup. You guys need to take a page from Chick-fil-A‚Äôs mobile app on this one. They let you add 2-3 sauces per menu item (i.e if you get a sandwich and fries, you‚Äôre able to add a combination of 4-5 sauces). If I have to go back in to ask for those, or ask the person who brings me my order, that‚Äôs very inefficient (for me and the staff having to take that extra time).

title: Doesn‚Äôt even work
review: I‚Äôve been able to use this app and was enjoying it...but in the past two months, I‚Äôve had so much problems. I ordered 5 McCaf√© drinks and then it‚Äôs not allowing me to get my reward or to get a free McCaf√© with a dollar purchase. It makes me want to delete this app as it no longer works. Like today, I ordered a free McCaf√© drink with $1 purchase. It wasn‚Äôt even found when I went through the drive thru. And I waited like 10-12 minutes for a small drink. People who came after me were able to order and leave before me and all I ended up getting was a small coffee. If there aren‚Äôt some changes soon, I will delete this app as it no longer will have any use to me. If they‚Äôre going to advertise this  app, they NEED to make sure it runs properly.
