title: Great app and ordering system!
review: I have hundreds of apps on my phone and seldom rate them but I‚Äôm compelled to rate the McDonalds app because it‚Äôs so good. I love efficiency and rather than having to wait in line, starting and stopping the car every 30 seconds, I can order from wherever, show up, let them know I‚Äôm here and, like magic, the order is delivered to my car window by a fully-masked friendly McDonalds staff member. Highly recommend if you like efficiency and don‚Äôt like wasting your time!

title: Welp
review:
Was excited at the idea of collecting rewards points and getting access to daily deals in the app. I figured it would be a great download much like the Starbucks app.

Unfortunately this app is pretty different from the Starbucks app in one major way: you need to use location to get anything done. Here I thought I could order for me and my girlfriend could pick it up on her way home from work. Nope! If your phone isn‚Äôt in their parking lot, you can‚Äôt have your food! Doesn‚Äôt matter if you send a screenshot of the order number to the person picking up, it doesn‚Äôt show on their system unless you are physically there. Incredibly idiotic. Probably never using the app again after today.
developerResponse: {'id': 26652720, 'body': "We're always looking for ways to improve, Charlie. Get back to us here with all the details you can on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-12-05T20:57:53Z'}

title: Absolutely zero priority to get food
review: Today for probably the 20th time i had to wait for my order at curbside pickup for over 30 minutes, was 37 minutes from confirming what spot i was in until the order came out, wasn‚Äôt anything special, sausage mcmuffin muffin, a mcgriddle and hotcakes, 4 other people that showed up well after i did got their curbside pickup orders while i waited though, theyust have ordered stuff no one else was ordering so the staff couldn‚Äôt push that off to the drive through window to get their drive through time closer to the quota at the expense of other customers who have been waiting much longer then it took for the drive through to completely cycle throughultiple times.
developerResponse: {'id': 26500278, 'body': 'We need to be as fast and accurate as we can. Help us get better at this by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html \r\n', 'modified': '2021-11-26T18:07:23Z'}

title: App is buggy and confusing to use
review: They need to make this more user friendly and not so confusing or buggy. They make it so complicated to place an order .You place an order and then you have to put down I am here and that would be when they start making your order however it was buggy because when I put down I am here he tells me I have change my location I don‚Äôt want me not be available I order a quarter pounder with fries how can you tell me that it‚Äôs not available in all locations? Also the point of having the app is you want to pre-order and have the order ready for pick up! Wasted half of my lunch time when this is suppose to be fast take out

title: Order Different at Store than in App
review: I tried to use a free mocha frappe coupon with purchase today. I submitted my order of 1 hash brown & 1 mocha frappe with a total of $1.62. I then pull up to the store & check in at the drive thru but am instead charged $4.66. The frappe shows on my order but not the hash browns. The store manager said there was nothing that could be done, that I would have to be okay with paying triple the promised price and receive only half of my order. I showed her my order receipt in the app and my physical receipt and that they were different, but it did not matter. Not only was there a glitch on the app, but the store manager should be able to resolve order issues that arise when the app glitches
developerResponse: {'id': 25624445, 'body': "That's not awesome to hear. Let's get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.\r\n", 'modified': '2021-10-11T23:48:45Z'}

title: Fix this please!
review:
I don‚Äôt know what is up with y‚Äôall! But this is the third day in a row that the app has said I still have an order to pick up.
I pick it up, and don‚Äôt get the points for the money I spend.
Same thing again today I have to go reopen an order that was from yesterday. I was already charged and served for this order but to order through the app I have to reopen this order and add to it if I want to place an order. Thus getting charged and getting my food without getting the points for ‚Äúthe order I placed‚Äù aka the same order over and over again and never getting any new points, not even the points I would receive for this original order!
Thanks for nothing McDonald‚Äôs!

title: App used to work‚Ä¶
review: The app was working fine until recently. I somehow was signed out of the app and when I try it sign in, it continues to try and sign me up! I originally created an account using google and everything was fine. It once signed me out and I was able to log back in but this time I CANNOT. When I try and check deals or place an order, it asks me to sign in every time‚Ä¶ so I try and it wants to sign me up again and then it says threes is already an account, but I can‚Äôt get in!!! So no I can no longer use it to place orders or check deals. WHY??? I deleted and re-downloaded but that doesn‚Äôt work. I don‚Äôt know what else to do.

title: Privacy Infringement
review: I‚Äôve been using the McDs app for a while now and enjoyed the coupons as well as convenience of ordering online. However since the newest iPhone update, unless I give McDonalds permission to track my activity across other apps, I am no longer able to use the app. And I quote ‚Äú Please note that our websites and mobile apps are not designed to respond to ‚Äòdo not track‚Äô request from web browsers.‚Äù This is beyond startling and scary. I have no idea what need McDs could have with any info from any of my other apps and the fact they won‚Äôt allow access to their own apps without you granting them the right to your private information is just plain wrong and bad for business.

title: Location services don‚Äôt work
review: When I tell the app that I‚Äôm at the restaurant it should accept it. Instead, I‚Äôm sitting in the curbside pickup, with location services on, with the app telling me I‚Äôm not there.  I check to make sure location settings are on (they were), go back to the app and now it‚Äôs locked up. Restart the app, still locked, restart the phone, open the app open the order and it‚Äôs locked up, just an image of jumping fries and all buttons grayed out. Won‚Äôt let me say I‚Äôm there to get the order, or cancel the order. Then I realize I have 10 minutes left of my half hour lunch and have to leave for work with no food. Bottom line, when I tell the app I‚Äôm there, it should accept it.

title: Mobile Order Not Always Available
review: I don‚Äôt understand why my local McDonald‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt have my order in their computer when I pull up at the drive thru but when directed to change my order to curbside pickup, it magically shows up. This has happened a couple of times within the past couple of weeks. I then end up parked with other cars also waiting for orders. I‚Äôve been using the app for a very long time and it goes through these buggy periods where the mobile ordering doesn‚Äôt work. I‚Äôve lost out on many deals because my mobile orders didn‚Äôt show up and I have to re-order at the drive thru.
developerResponse: {'id': 4772165, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-11-04T11:41:45Z'}

title: Won‚Äôt Add New Payment Card
review: I use to order through the app every morning for breakfast and miss being able to use it very much. However the app will not allow me to add my new charge card. I sent a help ticket email and was told to call support. After calling support, I was told I would receive an email response back. When I finally heard back the suggestion they gave was incorrect (support told me that I was entering my card information incorrectly, which isn‚Äôt true). You also cannot reply back to support emails, so I‚Äôd have to phone them all over again, but I don‚Äôt have faith that they would help. It s extremely frustrating that I can no longer mobile order from McDonald‚Äôs so I‚Äôve started going to Dunkin and Starbucks instead.

title: Frustrating feature...pick up
review: Unlike all other fast food apps that I have used, this app requires that the device that you used to order the food must be with you when you pick up. I had to drive all the way home to get my iPad on which I‚Äôd placed the order before the restaurant could even look up my order to prepare it. The convenience of ordering on a different device or ordering food for a friend or family member to pick up seems lost on this app. Super disappointed in that. Otherwise, it‚Äôs an easy app to use, just wish I didn‚Äôt have to have the specific phone or device used to place the order.
developerResponse: {'id': 12627022, 'body': "Hello! We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2019-12-28T22:33:28Z'}

title: Love the idea but no longer works
review: Started using the app from the start and all was working great. But a month or so later after release I can‚Äôt get it to work. I‚Äôve attempted to use this app from multiple phones and from other people (Friends/family) for years now and still can‚Äôt login/sign up and when I manage to login I can‚Äôt pay and none of my cards save. Then the one time I managed to get the order to go through and paid. The McDonald‚Äôs I went to said there was no record of my order. I‚Äôm always getting error this and error that. Loved using the app in the beginning when it worked because it meant I was getting what I actually order. Now I have to deal with drive thru employees getting my order wrong half the time.
developerResponse: {'id': 18331865, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-10-07T17:30:03Z'}

title: Worst app of any QSR
review:
Few things developers should know: 
App offloads from iphone if not used for few days. When the app is relaunched, all the credentials in keychain are gone. Everytime I have to create a new account with a new email. This is the worst development ever.
When the app can‚Äôt register new customer using email, why do you have that option? I tried creating/login using email and the jumping fries were jumping for 30 mins. I deleted and reinstalled the app and tried again; fries were jumping again. Is this how features in your app work? I was outside mcdonalds trying to order food and then I moves to other restaurant to order my food. 

This app seriously needs some good architecture and evolution in the way it handles login and credentials in keychain.
developerResponse: {'id': 18202756, 'body': "\rWe're sorry to hear you are having trouble. We'd like to look into this further. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2020-09-30T18:48:08Z'}

title: Untrained employees
review: I don‚Äôt eat McDonald‚Äôs much and will probably even less now. Was on a road trip and craving a McDonald‚Äôs pie. The drive-thru was packed so I ordered the pies through the app. Parked like I was told to. After 10 minutes an employee came out to tell me that they didn‚Äôt do the pies at that location. Though the app was supposed to prevent this issues. Then they told me they could do a refund since it was on the app. The app has no way of doing refunds. Either your app has issues (and it does) or the employees have no idea how to deal with app orders. I‚Äôm suspecting both. From what I‚Äôve read of other reviews y‚Äôall have some very seriously untrained employees. It‚Äôs just five dollars but it‚Äôs my five dollars. Taking it from me and not providing agreed upon goods/service is stealing.

title: Fix payment
review: This app used to work really well for me. Was easy and convenient for me. Have my order ready, park and wait for my order when I get there. However, as of lately I can‚Äôt get my order through because it keeps saying there‚Äôs a payment error. Even when I put in new payment methods, that same message appeared. I went one day and was in my car trying to figure out what was going on for like 10 min. I kept trying to put my order though, put in new payment methods and gave up. Come to find out my first payment cars was charged like 4 times, my second card got charged twice and I was really upset! Spent the next hour on the phone to get the charges taken off because I was never even able to get my food.

title: Senior Suggestion
review: My hubby and I are Ole School Seniors. We do not put our banking info in the cyberspace world if we don‚Äôt have to. We do not use ‚ÄúMobile Order & Pay‚Äù &/or ‚ÄúOnline Ordering.‚Äù BUT we do use the ‚ÄúScan at Restaurant‚Äù Deals. We use it several times a week. MY SUGGESTION: Please make ALL THE ITEMS in the Deals selections BOTH ‚ÄúScan at Restaurant‚Äù -AND- ‚ÄúAdd to Mobile Order.‚Äù Makes no sense to just offer one or the other. Also, please offer more Pancake Breakfast Deals. Thank you for having this App. We‚Äôve shown lots of people, especially seniors this app.

title: Confusion on their deals
review:
I had a deal on my McDonald‚Äôs App that was for 1- triple stack and with it get a free small coffee and hash browns on the screen before discount was $7 something but itemized had the triple stack as $4.5 

Cashier scanned it in the drive thru and then gave me a total that was more than the $4.50...repeated back to me three coffees and hash brown and a triple stack 

I corrected that it was a triple stack (one), a small coffee (one) and a hash brown(one) and reread the deal

She then gave me another total again not the $4.50 I repeated my deal again and she explained the hasbrowns are $1 something

I again stated the deal and got this lovely rate your experience so it went from a 3 star to a 1 Star 

Had to call a manager over to her twice to make corrections...and had to hand over my phone...so cashier saw my 1 Star...

Long story short it took about 5 minutes in freezing temperatures with window down to get my deal...was worst drive thru experience...even surpassed the time the cashier tried to charge me a bag for .10 when Alaska went to no bags for a McMuffin only and I asked for my .10 back and just put the McMuffin in my hand!

title: Works...sometimes...
review:
I have had two instances within a week where the app failed after I checked in. The first time I went inside to find out what the problem was and was told I had to pay inside, although I could see in my banking app that the money had been taken out of my account. I wasn‚Äôt going to pay again and yet couldn‚Äôt get my food. I was told that since they hadn‚Äôt processed the order at the register the money would be refunded eventually. Wrong! Never refunded. 

The same thing happened again a few days later but that time the order was cancelled and I was told I had to place my order again and wait. No, thanks. I went to Wendy‚Äôs. I am done with this app.

title: Very slow and poorly designed.
review:
While I very much appreciate having an application with which to order food and have it delivered curbside, this application is poorly designed. It is extremely slow, but much worse than that is how counterintuitive it all is. 

For example, when you tap on the order button you have to wait a long time until the local menu loads. And then you have to wait for it to load your recent orders, even though that might not be what you want to see. Once you‚Äôre done waiting for that, and you go to favorites, which is where you wanted to go in the first place, you have to wait another five or 10 seconds until that loads.
developerResponse: {'id': 10340049, 'body': 'Oh no! Most times this can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give us a call, so we can look into this further at 1-877-334-4332. \r\n', 'modified': '2019-08-25T20:41:23Z'}

title: Tempting ....just don‚Äôt
review:
I have tried to use the app several times, hoping it would be convenient but I am very disappointed. 

Problems as follows;
     It always wants to route my order to the closest store - not the one I want or is on my way somewhere. When I try to make the correction it wants to default back and ignore my choice. ANNOYING 

      Ordered and checked in at curbside pick up and after waiting far too long was informed by staff that someone else had picked it up in the store. Really. I was sitting in my car and watching door for my order and only saw one group exit with ice creams.  Couldn‚Äôt have been my order.  Also, doesn‚Äôt anyone check before letting PAID FOR orders walk out.  IRRITATING 

    Third strike and I‚Äôm out!  Online ordered and went to pick up in drive thru. All good until I got to window. My app (and credit card alert) showed paid, but not on their end. Only told they have no access/control over the app and I would have to pay again and dispute or get a refund for first.  Hungry kids so I paid.  INFURIATING 

Done, done, DONE!!!!!

And don‚Äôt get me started on the coupons/discounts
developerResponse: {'id': 9345066, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, friend! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-06-25T14:17:05Z'}

title: Unusable
review:
When I went to sign up for an account to order online, it prompted me to click a link sent in an account confirmation email. I went to click it, it prompted me open the app, I click the prompt, and it prompts me to click the confirmation link like I didn‚Äôt just do that. 

I figured it‚Äôs a problem with the mobile UI so I tried to click the confirmation link on my computer and it tells me I need to use my phone to do it. I try again about 9 or 10 more times toggling location access, going into and out of private browser, redownloading, etc. 

Eventually I gave up and just want to delete my account at this point as there‚Äôs no way for me to use it, and I find out there are no account options to delete the account yourself. I decide I‚Äôll even go through the effort of filling out a support ticket to have them fix/delete my account, and then I come to find that the UI for the support is broken as well and there‚Äôs not even a possibility of deleting my unusable account. 

Seriously the most pathetic user accessibility I‚Äôve ever seen for one of the largest mega-corporations in the world.

title: Deals good, but online ordering slower
review: I like the deals that are offered in the app. I decided to do an online order for Breakfast thinking it would be quicker, but it was much slower. Even though I ordered from home, I found out it wouldn‚Äôt be submitted until I arrived at the restaurant. It took 12 minutes from the time I submitted it until I received it. Other fast food restaurants allowed me to submit the order from home when I ordered online knowing that I live less than 10 minutes away. Unless the mobile ordering process changes, I won‚Äôt use it, especially since it requires more work from me and more time.
developerResponse: {'id': 7106926, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-02-28T16:58:33Z'}

title: Hello I known you won‚Äôt agree but it‚Äôs true!
review:
This app help my time being on the line, save my timeline for better time management! Once I ordered, when I got to the restaurant I got called right away! Should had this app long time ago I would had saved years of time wasted! Definitely 5 stars or more thank you for developing this application which was needed long time ago, I am 56 years old guy almost getting to retired soon, as far as my concern, after retirement I will still be using this app until I died! Regards,
Cutedaddy642

title: Not good
review: If I could give it less than one star I would. I was forced to update my app today, and as a result it logged me out of the account. Now, I made the account sometime last year, and forgot the password, so I requested to reset it. It‚Äôs been a full 14+ hours and I haven‚Äôt received a reset link. I requested about 6 or 8 new ones since then, and still haven‚Äôt gotten a reset link. I then made a new account with a different email, and to even use the app you have to first verify your email. And guess what? Yeah, that verification email never came through either. I had no issues before this new update. So forewarning anyone else that either got logged out and forgotten their password, or has to make a new account. It isn‚Äôt going to work for you.

title: Deals not what they were
review: Sadly this app has lost all use to me and will be deleted after this review. Online ordering seems rather pointless since McDonald‚Äôs is fast anyway at taking orders and delivering sub standard food. No, the only thing this app had going for it was the excellent deals. This was a key factor in even eating at McDonald‚Äôs. But the deals are pretty pathetic now with so many rules and stipulations that it is not even worth it. What killed it for me was this morning I wanted to buy a steak, egg, and cheese bagel, one of the most expensive sandwiches. When trying to use the coupon to get a free sausage biscuit, I was told it would not work and that I would need to buy a cheaper sandwich to use the coupon. I mean, punishing me for wanting to spend more money? I am done.
developerResponse: {'id': 6294794, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-12-07T23:04:46Z'}

title: Warning! Payment Not secure
review: I have now had my account used fraudulently twice (fraudulent mobile orders) in the past month and a half. When calling customer service I am told they can‚Äôt issue refunds and I need to dispute the charge with my credit card provider. That results in me getting a whole new card which is a big pain for me. No offer to look into why the app isn‚Äôt secure and how my account got fraudulently used twice. I had to ask for it to be escalated and they will get back to me in ‚Äúmaybe 2 weeks‚Äù. Only suggestion was for me to remove payment info from the app. Well of course that means no mobile order functionality. Warning to all-don‚Äôt use the app unless you are fine with lack of security for any saved payment method.

title: HORRIBLE SERVICE!!!
review:
I HATE that I can‚Äôt see the coupons until I actually get to the store.  Deters me from ordering in the first place!!

And when I order things on the app, mobile pay with my phone, only to get to the location and be told ‚Äúwe are out of ice cream‚Äù?!?!  I was given a DIRTY look... by the MANAGER none the less, when I requested a replacement item for my ALREADY PAID FOR ice cream cone. Yea I know it‚Äôs only $1.50....  but the lady was SOOO rude and looked at me like I was crazy for asking to replace the item since I ALREADY PAID FOR IT.  

If you don‚Äôt have an item, DONT OFFER IT ON THE APP.
developerResponse: {'id': 4515997, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-08-03T16:44:46Z'}

title: You can‚Äôt beat the McD app ‚Äî get specials AND get points for free food
review:
You can‚Äôt earn McD points by ordering in the store. Use your phone: quicker than the kiosks in the store, and no touching required on that germ collector. It‚Äôs flu season: why take a chance?

Besides, curbside pickup is also quick and easy. Bonus: those who bring you your order are always happy employees. I‚Äôve never had one who wasn‚Äôt.

So give the app a try. There is nothing to lose and everything to gain. I love free food!

title: Dear McDonald‚Äôs:
review: I have had this app for about a good 6 months or so. At the beginning it was a 5 star app. I could search through ‚ÄòALL‚Äô of your deals on ‚ÄòANY‚Äô WiFi or my cellular data. The deals were great on the road, until most of the deals became ‚ÄòMOBILE ORDER ONLY‚Äô... might I add... later on I could only see ‚ÄòA FEW‚Äô deals on ‚ÄòANY‚Äô WiFi or my cellular data.. until eventually it would say ‚ÄòNO DEALS RIGHT NOW COME BACK LATER‚Äô and I could only view your deals when connected to a ‚ÄòMCDONALD‚ÄôS‚Äô WiFi. I am very disappointed that the deals can ‚ÄòALL‚Äô be mobile order ‚ÄòAND‚Äô in restaurant order, and that I can‚Äôt view ‚ÄòALL‚Äô your deals anymore without actually driving to McDonald‚Äôs and connecting to your WiFi, just to find out your IcEcReAm machines are DoWn... I guess you don‚Äôt want our money anymore.

title: They only deliver to specific addresses
review: It so annoying that they can deliver to one address and not the other! They can deliver to my neighbor but not me! I don‚Äôt have a license yet so the only way I can get food is getting it delivered if I don‚Äôt want to make something at home, I don‚Äôt understand why my neighbor can get something delivered from the app but not me? And I have a McDonald‚Äôs gift card I can use and I rather use that and not my actual money. Other than that it‚Äôs a good app the pick something up! Then glitches are fixed but it‚Äôs good if you want to pick something up and order.

title: Barely work
review:
The question is when does this app work? It‚Äôs always logged out randomly and when you try to login, it takes me back to the login screen. The time it works, it never work with Apple Pay. It used to work, but stopped couple of month ago. When you use Apple Pay by mistake, it freezes the app and you have to kill it and reopen it. Lots of close windows doesn‚Äôt close. You also have to kill the app. 
Last thing is that it doesn‚Äôt allow you to combine deals with using your reward balance. Those should be 2 different things. I should be able to use a deal and purchase another thing with my rewards, but if consider this combining deals.
developerResponse: {'id': 32623778, 'body': "let's get you logged back in! there is a such thing as too much of a good thing! only 1 deal or reward can be redeemed at a time. try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. if you still have the same issue, drop us a chat here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-17T15:46:19Z'}

title: McD Subtle Scam Tactics
review: Just thought the people should know this clever little scam McDonalds does via the app. As we know breakfast is served until 11 am. The app offers their deal till then as well. But you have to reach the store by 10:30 am to receive that deal. If not, you will pay the full price for the order. The app does not inform you. The app will show the discounted price. If I hadn‚Äôt paid attention to the physical receipt they gave I would have never known about this. Sure it‚Äôs not a large amount they are practically stealing from us by lying (by omission) about the deal they promise, but with the millions of people who use the app this little amount will add up and must not be overlooked. Be aware people and protect yourself.
developerResponse: {'id': 32216297, 'body': 'we can get this looked into further! drop us a line with the specifics here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-09-25T15:09:54Z'}

title: Customize options limited
review: Overall i like this app and the deals on it ive recommended it to people. My problem is some of the customization options are limited. For example: my usual go to for lunch is a two cheeseburger meal but i like to add mac sauce to them this option is not available and even the customize options for the cheeseburger only has about 3 or 4 options. I have decided multiple times to go some where else since the options i wanted to customize my order isnt on here and i dont wanna chance an employee not putting the order in right.
developerResponse: {'id': 31395977, 'body': "we're all about improvement. drop us a line here with as much input as you can on this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n", 'modified': '2022-08-10T23:10:37Z'}

title: Took my points, impossible to get customer service
review: I placed an order on my birthday to use my reward points towards a coffee. The store says they don‚Äôt have coffee (what a surprise their machine was down) and that I can request a refund of my points through the app. There‚Äôs no way to do this in the app so I had to call customer service who said their points system was down so they can‚Äôt refund and I‚Äôd have to call back. The app should make it easier to report issues with an order and/or refund points when an order can‚Äôt be fulfilled. Now I have to call back every day until their points system is back up just to get the points back. Broken system all the way around.
developerResponse: {'id': 31347164, 'body': "oh no, that 's not what we want you to experience! let's get this sorted out. send us a chat here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-08-08T18:58:42Z'}

title: Restaurant workers don‚Äôt know how to use it
review:
Multiple times, app is hung up on a previous order so you can‚Äôt start a new one without logging out and back in. I believe they need to push one more button on their screen when they close the orders.

Workers have twice confirmed the order at the speaker, then removed all of the discounts including rewards offers, and overcharged my account. Never informed until I check the bank app. Getting that fixed becomes a whole hassle.
Other restaurants have errors too. But I send them a note, they refund without the grief, AND usually drop in a future offer or free item to make up for it. McD doesn‚Äôt give any care. Deleting this thing for now.
developerResponse: {'id': 30898932, 'body': 'a quick uninstall and reinstall should fix this. if not we got your back at the link. https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2022-07-14T21:44:31Z'}

title: It‚Äôs great except when it‚Äôs not
review: This app is great except when it‚Äôs not. It works fine most of the time but when it doesn‚Äôt, it‚Äôs embarrassing. The deals are great however the mobile order section has failed me, so user beware. My recommendation is to avoid curbside pickup because the restaurant might never get the order so you will be waiting forever and still get charged for it. Use drive thru or restaurant pick up instead to avoid this frustration. Thanks.

title: App is broken.
review:
Placed my order as usual. Drove to the drive through. Clicked ‚ÄúI‚Äôm already here‚Äù as I usually do. Clicked ‚Äúdrive through‚Äù as I usually do.  And they can‚Äôt find my order. Asked me if I had a receipt at the speaker. Said sure I can show you my bank account app. They wanted a McDonald‚Äôs receipt. Before I got to the window.. Not sure where I would have gotten a receipt before the window. 
I said ok. Cancelled the order, pulled out of the drive through lane, ordered again. Same issue. 
Deleted app. Reinstalled app. Reordered. Same thing. Eventually left 25 minutes later and decided McDonald‚Äôs wins this time. Not going to order at the speaker and double pay what I already ordered in the app with my card on file.
developerResponse: {'id': 15669464, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, Hatrick. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.\r\n", 'modified': '2022-06-04T04:14:10Z'}

title: Good app but no customer service
review: This is a pretty good app. I save money with their daily and weekly specials. I enjoy earning points to get free stuff. However when there is a billing problem there is no customer service. I recently received a receipt via email for a meal purchased in South Dakota. Problem is I have never been to SD. I live in Ohio. I am sure the app triggered the purchase not someone hijacking the account. McDonald‚Äôs tells you to call your credit card company. I even called the McDonald‚Äôs in SD. No way would they help me. This could be a great app but with no customer service I can‚Äôt give it a good rating. I recommend not adding your credit card to this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 27599233, 'body': 'we want to look into this for you. please leave more details in this link: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-01-22T18:46:51Z'}

title: Good overall with one glaring problem for me
review: This app is fairly easy to use. Kudos to McDonalds for allowing Sign In with Apple ID and payment using Apple Pay! The glaring problem is the dependence on my location to release my order and let my food get prepped. I routinely work from home, but my wife works at a doctors office. I regularly order food through various apps and she then picks up on her way home. This saves her the stress of having to order food for the whole family and deal with rush hour traffic. This app would not let us do that and I ended canceling our order. Please fix this!
developerResponse: {'id': 27467837, 'body': 'we want to make the best app we can for you. contact our Mobile App team at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-01-16T15:54:18Z'}

title: What happened to the quarter pounder?
review:
I haven‚Äôt had a quarter pounder in some time, and used to be my favorite sandwich 
Day before yesterday I wanted a quarter pounder and ordered the 2 for 6 and I was sadly disappointed! It used to be the tastiest sandwich ever but it was dry small and unevenly put together. I ate it complaining the whole time. Saying out loud this is the last time! Asking out loud what have they done to the quarter pounder. I wanted to ask for a demo of how they put the sandwich together and ask also had changes been made in the sandwich itself? But I decided against it and said I will never buy one again.
But maybe you can explain what happened? Please help me to understand what happened to my favorite sandwich?Popa Duck

title: Your app will fail if you can‚Äôt order ahead
review:
Honestly if I am going to spend the time and money ordering through an app you may as well make it efficient. If I have to prove my location and have to have my phone physically there for you to process an order, and I can‚Äôt have anybody else pick it up that‚Äôs a problem. The whole point of ordering ahead is that your food will be ready when you arrive. That is what you advertised. That is what you can no longer provide. Overall I rate this app one star because I feel it is entirely in inefficient and has lost its purpose.  

If only one person was responsible for this mess of an app I would have used more‚Ä¶ colorful language in this review.

review: Update:App is very spotty the last few updates and now completely won‚Äôt even pull up any coupons or points to redeem. Every time I try to pull up any coupon, it states that I need to wait so many minutes to redeem. I hadn‚Äôt visited in several days, nor have I clicked on ‚Äúredeem at restaurant‚Äù so I know I‚Äôm not trying to overuse the app. The employee at the window told me that I had to have redeemed a coupon in the last hour and that‚Äôs why it‚Äôs not working when I tried to explain to him that it‚Äôs an actual glitch and didn‚Äôt realize it until I pulled up to paying. He no one else has said anything about it and I haven‚Äôt seen an update addressing this glitch yet.

title: Payment issue
review:
My brothers and i were hungry and i asked my mom if we couod go get McDonalds since its near us and i downloaded the app but my mom said she might not have enough money 
But she said use it and we did and it said pick up and it had a button that said "we are already here" and so i thought it was already paid for so we walked to McDonalds and when we got there i pressed the button it said there was a payment issue and i tried calling my mom but she wouldn't answer and my brother has autism and he's very impatient and he got mad and started to leave so we left. IF THE CREDIT CARD COULDN'T GO THROUGH YOU SHOULD'VE JUST SAID PAYMENT COULDN'T GO THROUGH. IF I KNEW WE DIDN'T HAVE MONEY WE WOULDN'T HAVE WALKED ALL THE WAY OVER THERE AND I FELT BAD THAT I COULDN'T GIVE THEM MCDONALD'S

title: Doesn‚Äôt save time
review:
App feed back doesn‚Äôt seem to work with IPhone. 
McD entire system seems to have become so convoluted my order is frequently wrong and the app seems to only have added to the issue. Attempted to leave feedback through app but mysteriously ‚Äúoops‚Äù something went wrong and it deleted all of my comments. Hopefully someone at McD will see this and make improvements and to that person the ticket printed for the employees to fill my order should clearly list all items and quantities.

title: Unusable
review: The app forces you to log in every time you open it, regardless of how many times you‚Äôve logged in before. If you sign in with email, they don‚Äôt make you create a password, instead they send a link to your email that you have to use. So if you close the app, you‚Äôll have to type in your email again, go find the email with the link again, and go sign in again. If you place an order before you‚Äôre at Mcdonald‚Äôs, & your screen times out, the order is lost. There is no way to get it back, it‚Äôs like it never existed. This is frustrating when the app is supposed to be faster than the drive thru, but ends up taking even more time than that.

title: Doubled my order the first time I used it
review: Was able to construct the order desired; however, when I went to pay for the order there was a problem and that my order ended up getting duplicated. The local restaurant told me they would delete the order; however, later said they can‚Äôt do certain things as it relates to application orders. They ended up recommending I dispute the charge with my bank canceling payment to McDonald‚Äôs. Seems like a lot of work for something that should be a simple correction either locally or through the app. I submitted a complaint through the app, so we‚Äôll see how that works out in terms of resolution.

title: In one word: Horrible!
review: What is the purpose of a mobile app, if it‚Äôs not working mobile and go have to get into the store anyway? Today again, after passing the obnoxious ‚Äúfreezing‚Äù rewards screen and only after reboot the phone I could place an order. But just to watch bouncing French fries between every screen change and a painful 3 minute wait between placing an order and selecting a pick-up option. Still wasn‚Äôt working as I entered the place, still bouncing, local service team could not find or identify the order until another 2 minutes later. In sum: a horrible, sub-standard app experience. Deserves two black stars aka minus. And this should be gold standard for a global food chain?
developerResponse: {'id': 9518666, 'body': "That's not what we like to hear, Wil!  Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2021-07-25T16:35:57Z'}

title: App very unreliable. Please fix!!!
review:
I'm sorry but this has been one of the most frustrating apps I have ever used. 
   After you place the order you have to check in at the restaurant before it completes the order so by the time you get to the restaurant the app usually closes if your phone shuts down and then it loses your order so you have to quickly place the order AGAIN while sitting in drive-through and many times the store can't find your order so you just have to order through the speaker anyway so what's the point of even ordering through the app. 

  Get rid of the stupid check in part so that when you place the order it goes through right away!!!!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 3858922, 'body': 'Oh no, Scott! Most times this can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give us a call, so we can help you further at 1-877-334-4332.', 'modified': '2021-07-22T03:33:01Z'}

title: New Version Causes Issues
review: Honestly, this app is problematic at best sometimes. However the newest release has caused you to be unable to make changes to an item or make things a combo. It even messed up part of a reorder that I had. You also cannot change the size of things in app now. This is also something on a corporate level, but you need to make mobile orders a priority when they come in. You advertise 5 minutes and I on average wait 10-15 minutes during non-rush times for food (usually before I get the alert that they are starting my order).

title: Ridiculous!
review: I cannot order off the app and have my husband pick it up because my phone has to be there to login. You may say that my husband can have the same account on his phone and login, but his GPS does not work on his phone. This is completely ridiculous to not be able to have my spouse pick it up on his way home so that I did not have to leave and pack up the kids. I don‚Äôt eat at McDonald‚Äôs very often anyway, and this is just one more nail in their coffin. If you want to make your app like everybody else‚Äôs so that I can order and send someone to pick it up, then I will reconsider. The employees at that McDonald‚Äôs could not find the mobile order, so something is messed up on your end.
developerResponse: {'id': 20272035, 'body': "Hey there. We're always working on an even better App that you enjoy using. Thanks for helping us out.", 'modified': '2021-01-08T17:06:28Z'}

title: Terrible App Pickup Experience
review: I wanted to pickup my mobile order without sharing my location, apparently this is not possible. When you select I‚Äôm here in the app and the app doesn‚Äôt have your location or thinks you are somewhere else you are presented with a screen that says show your order number to an employee and they will make it for you. Well apparently no one in the McDonalds I went to knows anything about the app and couldn‚Äôt find my order. So when I did eventually share my location it took them 20 mins to make my order. God forbid I wanted to send someone else to pick up my order that would be impossible. I will deleting this app and boycotting McDonald‚Äôs for life!

title: Mc Donald‚Äôs
review: Idk what‚Äôs worse, the Mc Donald‚Äôs app or the service you can most likely expect from MOST of the Mc Donald‚Äôs stores you go to and experience first hand just how bad their employees act. There‚Äôs only a handful of Mc Donald‚Äôs employees that I can say do their job the right way and only a few who make me feel welcome when I go each day for my daily coffee fix.. Corporate Mc Donald‚Äôs seems to offer better deals and/or at the least way better customer service than a franchise Mc Donald‚Äôs. I try to only go to corporate Mc Donald‚Äôs stores for this reason. I just need to get a list of where the corporate ones are to just focus on going to those. Thank you for your time if you‚Äôve read this review. Btw LUKEWARM coffee is not HOT coffee and that‚Äôs what I almost always get when I go to a franchise Mc Donald‚Äôs.

title: Just falls short
review:
There are so many things I love about this app. The single most annoying part is that it won‚Äôt let me place an order and have someone else pick it up. I have to be near the shop to say I‚Äôm here, so whoever I have sent to grab it has to go in and wait in line to give the order number. If I‚Äôm paying for it why does the app get to choose when I want it ready? Sometimes I order for my kids who are near a McDonald‚Äôs and then they have to wait ten minutes instead of it just being ready. It‚Äôs really annoying. 

We should also be able to add mac sauce to things. It should at least be a side order.

title: Ghost Deals
review:
With so much money, I wonder why is your app so spotty? I used to enjoy McDonald‚Äôs, my husband and I ate quite frequently these last couple of months but lately whenever I try to use the application the deals don‚Äôt show up.
I have to delete and reinstall. My husband does the same. It‚Äôs very inconvenient; we work night and the one McDonald‚Äôs we have is cash only after 12 so we‚Äôre forced to order through the app and half of the time we either have to go to the atm to pull out cash which is quite a drive and honestly at that point might as well just drive home instead.
Don‚Äôt fix what‚Äôs not broken. I love you guys but I‚Äôm not going through such hassle just to order a burger.

title: That‚Äôs what I get for trying to be lazy
review: I had to reorder at the restaurant because the order didn‚Äôt go through on the app. I get home to look at my bank statement and I was charged anyway through the app (and I also had to pay at the restaurant). I honestly don‚Äôt even see the point in using the app. They don‚Äôt actually start to make the food until you get there anyway (which I do understand, so it can be fresh), but you can either park and they bring it out to you, go in or pick it up at the drive through, which is no real convenience (it seems). Is the app just to save a few cents on the meal? I know I‚Äôm going to get a refund for one of the charges eventually, but don‚Äôt use the app because it is a pain for the customer and the staff.

title: Can‚Äôt load credit cards and old ones disappeared
review: I have no idea what happened, but suddenly one day my 6 cards were reduced to 2. And now it refuses to add any others (which, I stress, had been IN the app since they created it). If I can‚Äôt use a credit card‚Äîsince it won‚Äôt take a mobile order that you want to pay cash for without a card‚Äîthis app is pointless. There doesn‚Äôt seem to be a ‚Äúhelp‚Äù function, either. When it was working, it was a 5-star app. As it is now, I can‚Äôt give more than 2.

title: Won‚Äôt accept credit cards
review: I had an expired credit card and removed it from McDonalds app. I tried multiple times to put in new credit card and it would not accept it. Tried with another card same issue. This has happened to others when you Google fir resolution unfortunately there isn‚Äôt one. So now the McD app is useless because I can‚Äôt even place an order and pay when I arrive. I won‚Äôt sit in a drive they line so I will just not go. There are plenty of other places to grab a bite it drink k.

title: National cookie day SCAM!
review: The app offer for National Cookie Day is two cookies for only $1. So on national cookie day instead of getting three cookies for a $1 (typical purchase price for the entire state of Wisconsin, to my knowledge,) .... you‚Äôre only going to give me TWO for the same price I would normally pay for THREE???? The problems between your app and the way things are rung up at the register are too numerous to count. And I haven‚Äôt complained up till NOW when you‚Äôre offering me a special sale where I can pay more for less! The cashier told me she was surprised that people are coming in ‚Äúall day long‚Äù to buy 2 cookies for the $1 instead of 3 for a $1. I have no respect for the people who run that app and certainly do not blame the cashiers for the problems that this app has caused.

title: Great for a while
review: I also loved the app when it came out. Really enjoyed the mobile order because my wife likes her order customized and you can do that without the regular mis-communication of ordering from a person. A couple of months ago after a forced(directed by the app that it was no longer valid and had to install new version)reinstall, the app has never worked properly again. Won‚Äôt recognize payment method, can‚Äôt add new method so consequently can‚Äôt mobile order at all. Contacted support 4 times. Escalated to their tech team 3 times. Never have heard back from them. Telling you to contact them because they care and want to solve your problem is a flat out lie and an absolute waste of your time. At this point I‚Äôve given up.

title: Great except if you send someone else to pickup
review: I love being able to customize my menu items! I ran into a problem recently where I forgot that the app uses location services and knows when you are at the restaurant. Someone else went to pick it up, then the order number displayed in app didn‚Äôt match the order number in the email and the staff couldn‚Äôt find the order for a while, which backed up their drive thru.
developerResponse: {'id': 31537144, 'body': 'we aim to make sure your order ends up in your hands only. otherwise, anyone could come up and snag it.\r\n', 'modified': '2022-08-18T17:09:31Z'}

title: Ok
review:
Seems to randomly log me out at inconvenient times like when I get near a McDonalds and not able to log back on while in or near the restaurant. This has happened several times. Yesterday a friend and I were both automatically logged out of the app when we walked into a local McDonalds and neither of us could log back on. We got frustrated and went elsewhere and guess what... once were about half a mile away we both were able to log back on the the app. Strange indeed....
Also... You recently took away the large sandwich for $1 and replaced it with ‚Äúbuy one at reg price and get another for $1. Thanks alot! 
C‚Äômon... You guys losing $$ or something?? Bring back the large sandwich for $1.

title: Worst online ordering app ever
review: If I could give negative stars I would. McDonald‚Äôs really dropped the ball. I‚Äôm in my 20‚Äôs and couldn‚Äôt figure this out, imagine all the people who aren't tech savvy trying to navigate this horribly designed app. Menu and ordering processes are awful. Apparently I can‚Äôt order and have someone who doesn‚Äôt have my phone pick it up. I DO NOT LIKE how it automatically saves your cc information. Not a fan of that. I had to retype things so many times I almost said ‚Äúscrew it id rather starve‚Äù luckily for McDonald‚Äôs they got my money because my kids asked nicely for happy meals. Also why can‚Äôt I order a cheeseburger happy meal or 6 piece nugget meal? You done messed that up too App genius‚Äôs. I am deleting and telling anyone who will listen not do use this app.

title: Mobile ordering
review: I noticed on my credit card bill that I had three separate charges from the same restaurant on the same day totaling $41. I called Visa and challenged the charge which included sending them a letter. I also visited the location and talked to an assistant manager who said she would have the manager call me. I then called McDonalds Customer Service and asked them to investigate. I was concerned that one of the employees had stolen my card number and had used it. I was never called by the manager or customer service, but Visa did remove the charges. I spent a day on visits, calls, and writing a letter to get this corrected. Very poor customer service from McDonalds, and maybe a case of internal fraud. The new update to the app didn‚Äôt work as well as the old either.

title: App works great, McDonald‚Äôs employees are difficult
review: Ordered my order. Husband went to pick up for me, they told him he couldn‚Äôt have my order bc my phone wasn‚Äôt present, although the phone does state if having trouble checking in show the number to employees and they‚Äôll get your order. They told him he had to get in the drive thru and re order and for me to cancel my order. Once he got to the window they asked him if he was picking up THE ONLINE ORDER. Ridiculous !!!!!

title: You must have the phone from which you placed order with you when you pick up order
review: This app does a really good job as long as you have the phone in you possession when picking up the order.   I tried ordering for my son and his family on their way out of town.  When they arrived at the restaurant they had not received the order and could not pull the order number up because the phone was still in my possession.

title: Unreliable.  Intrusive app.
review:
Spent minutes with family to find what everyone wants. Then drove to the restaurant, ‚ÄúI am here.‚Äù  Hangs.  Hangs.  Hangs.  

Desperate, close the app. It tells you not to, while it‚Äôs processing my order, but after several minutes of seeing that, who cares. Try again. Hangs. Hangs. Hangs.  

Repeat.  Hangs. Hangs. Hangs.  

Not wanting to go through manual ordering (defeats the purpose, doesn‚Äôt it?), gave up and drove away.

I understand this kind of technological wonder happens. Except, this happens rather often with McD.  Shame, given the app itself isn‚Äôt half bad.  

And please don‚Äôt force me to give precise location for deals. I wrote about it in the past and the response was it‚Äôs for the ‚Äòbest customer experience.‚Äô  Ha. I will decide that please. You forcing me to give where I live isn‚Äôt for the best experience.  And McD is a cross app tracker.  I disabled it of course but I just don‚Äôt see why the fast food restaurant needs to know what I am browsing. For the best customer experience, I am sure‚Ä¶..
developerResponse: {'id': 30828541, 'body': 'we want to make the best Mobile App we can. help us improve on this by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-07-11T12:16:13Z'}

title: Annoying and Unnecessary
review: App requires location services to function correctly, let me keep them off please when I‚Äôve already selected the location manually this is completely unnecessary. App is very slow, my iphone 7 is older sure but other apps run fast just fine without the constant wait time for pages to load or unfreeze. No option to pay with cash. I would say the categories for food locations are kinda badly designed, like they want you to pick the wrong category so you see some other food pictures to try and entice you to buy more. App sometimes thinks it‚Äôs the wrong time of day and locks you out food items that are actually available.
developerResponse: {'id': 29988053, 'body': 'the only way we can make this the best app possible is by getting all the details we can from you here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2022-05-26T15:45:10Z'}

title: Best restaurant app ever
review: My telephone is littered with various apps from different restaurant companies. The McDonald‚Äôs app is efficient rewards program is excellent and it saves me a lot of time overall. I have used it multiple times and have not had a single problem. The ability to customize and store items is your favorite for most frequent is great. The daily deals and offers you get our well worth downloading the app and signing up. McDonald you get an A+ for this!

title: Financial errors
review:
One thing an app should never do is to cause financial errors. I recently used a deal and my card was charged, but when I picked up the food they said I still owed additional money. The deal was applied when the order was placed and paid for, but was removed when picking up the order. 

Management did not follow through on compensating me and when I attempted to fill out the form to contact you, the form was closed at the point the store location was being requested. There does not appear to be an easy way to have matters such as this to be resolved.
developerResponse: {'id': 28831215, 'body': "we want to address this asap! let's talk here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-03-28T14:56:31Z'}

title: Multiple attempts to invade privacy and track location.
review:
While ordering from the app was convenient I ended up deleting the it within 2 hours because of their reoccurring attempts to change my ‚Äúonly track when using app‚Äù setting to ‚Äútrack all the time‚Äù
I answered this request in the very beginning- I don‚Äôt want to be tracked unless I‚Äôm actively using the app so why was I notified 3 more times by my iOS that they were attempting to adjust this setting?
Thy claim it‚Äôs to ‚Äúidentify the best deals for me‚Äù but I‚Äôm of the belief that setting my region by city or zip is sufficient. There‚Äôs no reason McDonald‚Äôs needs to track my every move (or lack there of.)
developerResponse: {'id': 27997131, 'body': 'we aim to make the best app we can for you. help us get there by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-02-11T19:35:40Z'}

title: Deleted and won‚Äôt use again
review:
The app making the cell phone the order was placed on , be at the store before the food is made or able for pick up is completely stupid. Zero convince for people who are ordering for a group and sending someone to grab it. Dunkin‚Äô Donuts Taco Bell everywhere else just let‚Äôs you place a order and pick it up with a name! I suggest that be changed and the order be placed and made once ordered or choose a time for pickup like every other service does that makes ordering online worth it!
What‚Äôs the point of getting to the restaurant hitting I'm here for them to finally make the food and you end up waiting longer then you would in the drive through.

title: It Stinks!!!
review: The Deals and Rewards are very limited! They don‚Äôt make me feel like I want to return to McDonald‚Äôs. First, there is a time limit before you can choose another Deal even if you choose a Deal by mistake. Second, the Rewards have only a few menu items to choose from especially at the highest level. I also don‚Äôt appreciate the higher prices of the food items either. For example, over $8.00 for a Quarter Pounder with Cheese Deluxe. Come on, I had one the other day and it‚Äôs not worth that price at all!
developerResponse: {'id': 27309521, 'body': 'We aim to make the best app we can for you. Help us get things right by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-01-07T23:07:07Z'}

title: They force us to invade our own privacy to turn off tracking
review: Unbelievable, I can‚Äôt order a stupid burger even though I favorited the specific Mac Donald‚Äôs, without having to turn my location on, because when it says ‚Äúhmm it doesn‚Äôt look like you‚Äôre here yet, turn on location services..‚Äù what‚Äôs the point of having a favorite location if it forces you to give up your privacy every time!!! So freaking dumb, it knows we are here because we specifically click CURBSIDE, which then unless we turn on our location, we can‚Äôt pay for our food even when we have our credit card full of money connected. I think they know this, and that Mac Donald‚Äôs does not respect our privacy.

title: Mobile orders disappear
review:
This would be higher rated if not for two problems:

1. The app is slow on the latest iPhone. Might be the interaction blocking animations.
2. Orders just disappear. I put in a full order, go to the restaurant, open the app again, and the order just isn‚Äôt there. Thankfully, it doesn‚Äôt use up the deal, so I‚Äôm guessing it just never got submitted to their servers. This happens even when I‚Äôve opened no other apps on my phone ‚Äî so it‚Äôs not like iOS has closed it in the background. This problem gives this app one star. So far two out of two mobile orders have done this (unless I order while I‚Äôm already at the store.) this was not a problem several years ago.

title: Won‚Äôt let me block tracking
review: I don‚Äôt use the app very often since it‚Äôs usually easier and faster to just go through the drive through and order, but I would order through the app periodically. Well, I‚Äôve been trying all day, and there seem to be some buggy-type issues. Since updating to the new iOS, apps allow us to opt out of tracking our data, and McDonald‚Äôs wants to at least give the appearance of that option. However, no matter where I tap the screen or how many times I close, delete, and reload the app, it won‚Äôt actually let me opt out of tracking. Apparently, the only way I can order is if I allow McDonald‚Äôs to track and sell my data. No thanks.

title: Love this app
review: I love this app. Makes ordering food easier. I just hope you can add another feature ‚Äî allowing us (customers) to put in a special request before checkouT. ‚ÄúSpecial request/instruction section‚Äù where we can write stuff like‚Äîplease do not put mayo on my burger; please cut the burger into half; please include spoon and fork in the bag; please include a cup of ice water.. i already have this toy, please put in a different one in the happy meal.. these would be very helpful most esp for curbside customers like me ;)
developerResponse: {'id': 4893545, 'body': "Hello! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2020-06-17T22:38:31Z'}

title: Very poor processes.
review: This app does not have any way to correct an issue with an order. You are not ordering from McDonald‚Äôs. The app is placing an order for you with a franchise. If a location is closed unexpectedly or your order is wrong, McDonald‚Äôs will do nothing to fix the problem. You are stuck working with the franchise owner or their staff to take care of the problem. I had one instance were the store was closed, but I was still able to pay when I parked at the mobile order pickup spot. I had another where I received the wrong order. Both times I was unable to secure a refund. All I received was a letter in the mail from the franchise with a coupon for a free entree. This is simply unacceptable.

title: Not very good app
review: Ordering food from this app is kind of useless. I ordered lunch from it and tried to have my wife pick it up since she was in the area but they would not let her pick it up because she didn‚Äôt order it from her phone. I had to be the one to pick it up. Most restaurants allow someone else to pick up an order as long as they have a name of who ordered it or a order number. On top of that McDonald‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt even have the order ready for you when you get there. They say They‚Äôre supposed to start the order once you tell them you have arrived to pick it up. So what‚Äôs the point of using the app if you can do the same process by just ordering from the cashier.

title: Needs another update
review: I love the deals but man this app always has problems. It doesn‚Äôt clear my cart after I pick up and they print me a recipe. Whenever I go to make another order I have to erase everything I already paid for and picked up days ago. With that it won‚Äôt let me remove the deal I had used that now says it‚Äôs no longer available and when I go to make a new order and change it it says only 1 deal at a time... it‚Äôs always been a problem with the remove buttons. Why can‚Äôt you make a clear all, restart, start new order? That would fix all these stupid problems. Seems like a simple solution.

title: Stopped working
review: Used to work great and I enjoyed the ease of being able to order on my phone and save a little money with the deals available on the app. For months now it won‚Äôt let me log in or even create a new account. I‚Äôve restarted the app, restarted my phone, switched internet connections, deleted and reinstalled the app, etc etc. Nothing fixes it. I‚Äôve seen a bunch of people complaining about the same problem and that they contacted the app developer and apple and no one fixes the problem so I‚Äôm not going to waste any more of my time. I‚Äôm also not going to waste any more of my money on McDonald‚Äôs since they don‚Äôt seem to care to fix a problem affecting so many apple users.

title: What is the point?
review:
I genuinely want to understand how this is useful?
The app seems to work pretty well for what it does but I don‚Äôt understand the problem it is solving.

You use the app to order from wherever you are. Then the app doesn‚Äôt place your order until you arrive and confirm you are there. Then they begin making your food.
You might as well just park in the parking lot and place your order. Similar to the car hop model from the 50s or Sonic. 
Nice app. Not sure we actually need it.

Update to developer response. 

I understand the strategy of waiting till you arrive to begin preparing the food. This really does make sense. I suppose the app is an additional vehicle to order your food. The app does not present a solution for anything. I can order in the drive thru or inside and have the same response time as well as hot and ready food. 
This seems like it is just more complexity for the employees as well as possible misunderstandings for customers.
I would love to hear the long term strategy we will see from restaurants using in app ordering.
developerResponse: {'id': 19726143, 'body': "Hey there. Your order isn't finished up and prepared until you check-in at the store. That way it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2020-12-13T23:06:42Z'}

title: Coupon reset
review: If you use a coupon, then cancel the order before paying/getting your food, the app needs to reset so you don‚Äôt have to wait an hour before using a different coupon. I changed my mind when ordering, canceled the order before submitting payment because I wanted to use a different coupon, and it wouldn‚Äôt let me. Even though I didn‚Äôt use the first coupon, it said I had to wait an hour before using another one. There needs to be a reset somehow of an order is canceled before the coupon is actually used.
developerResponse: {'id': 18901895, 'body': "That certainly won't do. Let's get you back to those awesome deals. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. ", 'modified': '2020-11-04T18:29:52Z'}

title: Garbage App
review:
Can‚Äôt order more than one deal every 60 mins which is ridiculous especially when you‚Äôre ordering their everyday deal that‚Äôs offered in store of the 2 for $3.50, 6 piece chicken nuggets for $2 or any of the $1, $2 or $3.50 options. It‚Äôs pathetic! I can understand the app only deal of the large fry for $1 being every 60 mins but stuff that you can order in stores should have no limit for time or quantity. The entire purpose of having an app is to make it easier to order and pay with minimal contact but you make it impossible. Guess I‚Äôll just stick with ordering from the Jack N The Box App as they don‚Äôt have any limits on time or quantity!

McDonalds if you‚Äôre reading this you need to really step it up or get rid of the app!
developerResponse: {'id': 18785758, 'body': "Hi there, Vic. We're always working towards an awesome App that you enjoy using. Thank you for helping us out.", 'modified': '2020-10-29T16:01:40Z'}

title: App is misleading
review: Not sure if this is a bug that needs to be fixed or if it is on purpose but I received a notification on my phone that told me that on Fridays that if I spend at least $1 I will get free medium fries. As a financially struggling college student this is a big deal. Upon arriving at the location and trying to redeem the coupon through the app I was told that the coupon was not available at this time of day. I pulled up to the drive through to ask if they would be able to redeem it for me to which they told me that they could not and that I would have to pay full price. Very disappointing and misleading to have a coupon that cannot be redeemed. (Note: The order was at 9 PM so the issue was not a conflict with breakfast hours.)
developerResponse: {'id': 18548584, 'body': 'Thanks for the heads up. To get you back to the deals you love, we‚Äôd like to look into this further. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!', 'modified': '2020-10-18T16:50:01Z'}

title: Works until it doesn‚Äôt
review:
The app and restaurant integration are phenomenally made, service flows well and the speed is amazing. 

Two issues: 
1 you must bring the phone you ordered with to the store, so no resting and paying but having someone else go grab you the food. When they get there the store won‚Äôt even have the order and they‚Äôll have to order it again at the counter. 

2, my current issue, I‚Äôve had to try uninstalling and reinstalling to figure this one out but yesterday I placed an order at a store that was completely shut down due to renovation; the app didn‚Äôt want to update the pickup location to a new store despite giving me options to do so (the options to do so were, themselves, convoluted a bit). Today, trying to make a quick pick up at my closet store is STILL keeping me at the old rennovated store. ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

If I don‚Äôt add to this review you can assume reinstalling the app fixed the issue.

title: App doesn‚Äôt work
review: I deleted this app right after my first time using it because it just doesn‚Äôt work. I placed a mobile order and came through the drive thru to pick it up. Once I got to the window after about 30 mins of waiting, they said they didn‚Äôt have my order. The app said the order was complete and I showed it to them but they said it just wasn‚Äôt in their system. They told me I could go back around and order normally but I wasn‚Äôt going to wait another 30 mins, plus the only reason I used the app was for the coupons. I just said thank you and left because at that point I had enough of this app. I don‚Äôt blame the employees at the McDonalds, the app is just garbage.

title: Disappointing
review: I‚Äôve only used the app 4-5 times, but I dislike it more each time. I don‚Äôt see how it is much better than waiting in the drive through line, and since an employee has to take their time to bring your order to your car, it probably slows things down for everyone. Today I waited so long at the mobile pick up spot that other customers went in, ate and came out before I had my order. And then later I realized that they overcharged me but there is no way that I‚Äôve found to submit a complaint through the app. The only thing I like about the app is that it keeps track of my McCafe drinks and you don‚Äôt have to order very many to get a free drink.
