title: Terrible app
review:
This is a terrible app.  Order placed to a certain location was sent to another location.  When I went to pick up the order, they could not find my order and I had to pay AGAIN for my order, even though my credit card already got charged for the first order.   When I contacted the other location to cancel the order, they also could not find the order initially, then told me I had to go down to the restaurant to refund my card.  They could not just cancel it over the phone.   This was such an inconvenience for fast food.  I am removing this app and do not recommend it to anyone!!   
I would rate this app with no stars, however it does not allow me to send my review without picking at least one star

title: Great app, silly rules
review:
I use this app on a daily basis to score great deals at my local McDonalds, however, repeatedly things have been happening to my ability to use them.

First, the kiosk will accept a promotion and I will go to counter to pay and they tell me I need to scan my promotion again, that it was rejected. I can‚Äôt pull a promotion back up once used.

Second and last, the free McCaffee should not be counted as a promotion. It is a loyalty item in every store/fast food joint the world over, not a promotion. I have been gifted that free item for loyalty coming to McDonald‚Äôs for my coffee addiction, not as a promotion.

title: Absolute crap
review: This app is awful! I downloaded it with the hope to cut time when ordering. I set up my account, added my order then went to check out and all I get is an error saying I need to fill out all fields. However it doesn‚Äôt tell/ show you what to fill out. I‚Äôve looked all over the app and can‚Äôt find anything that needs filling out. This is suppose to link to my Apple Pay but that‚Äôs false. It doesn‚Äôt let me add any other form of payment, just gives me the same nonsense of fill out all fields. I‚Äôve uninstalled and reinstalled, logged out and in but nothing works. Again, absolutely a waste of space on my phone. I don‚Äôt know why I thought this app would work, I mean heck their ice cream machine is always broken so why not the app too.

title: Payment issues!!!
review:
I really like the app, for allowing me to customize and set up my favorites for reordering. It is great for that; however, the payment portion is an absolute nightmare! I tried to delete one card, and it delayed both. I tried to add 3 different cards, with each try ending with "card not saved"... No explanation. 

This thing with payments unable to be processed has been a major problem. There is nothing wrong with the card, but it won't let me pay. When I go in, they can usually find my order, but then I have to pay and wait. I thought that was the point of the app... Order, pay, and go in and grab your order!

Need to work on the payment part!
developerResponse: {'id': 6889766, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-01-17T19:34:10Z'}

title: Rip off!
review: I was using this app fairly often until I noticed there were EXTRA payments coming out of my bank account! And they were the same or close to the amounts of my orders so it took me awhile to notice. It wasn‚Äôt until I realized there were multiple transactions from McDonald‚Äôs in the same day! I spoke with the manager at the restaurant and they said they would ‚Äúlook into it‚Äù but I never heard from them again. My bank says I have to close my account and open a new one to stop the transaction and dispute the charges. Then IF I can win the money will be credited back to me. That WAY too much BS for a sandwich. Don‚Äôt waste your time with this app, just pay when you get there. Personally I have been boycotting McDonald‚Äôs due to this scam.
developerResponse: {'id': 7531126, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, friend! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-03-01T18:33:40Z'}

title: Charged for passing a different McDonald‚Äôs
review: I don‚Äôt know what happened to be honest. I placed a mobile order at a specific McDonald‚Äôs that I knew was 24 hours and close to my house because it was late and I knew I had to make a stop. On the way there I passed a different McDonalds didn‚Äôt think it should have made a difference. I changed my mind a little later on and canceled the order entirely. I‚Äôve done this before and it wasn‚Äôt an issue. Until I wake up this morning and see I was already charged for simply PASSING the other McDonalds. Didn‚Äôt check in or say how I wanted to pick up. Just charged. Now I don‚Äôt use the app often so I don‚Äôt know if it does this often. But it‚Äôs completely ridiculous. Just silly, no notification or anything just robbery.
developerResponse: {'id': 5763047, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-11-01T16:06:00Z'}

title: Terrible App!!!
review: Usually the app will fail to give the free coffees after purchasing several. Other times it will not locate the McDonald‚Äôs when you‚Äôre sitting in the driveway of the McDonald‚Äôs. Today is latest mishap was placing my order going to McDonald‚Äôs it asked me to pick up or drive-through and I picked drive-through and they have no record of my order. So I had to go inside show that I have an order then I had to prepare the drinks and get napkins etc. myself. The whole point of this app is supposed to save time and That‚Äôs why I chose the drive-through option so it can be done for me because I have limited time. This app need extreme work and I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs helpful at all in fact it hinders people‚Äôs ability to purchase items timely, etc.
developerResponse: {'id': 4878864, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-08-30T22:49:28Z'}

title: Really worthless anymore
review:
Used and loved the app first couple of years- but now I may just delete it. 

The offers are so lame now. Very few deals that you wouldn‚Äôt get at the store anyway. And all of the free items that made me a regular at the location near work are gone. Free fries if I buy a five dollar burger? Wow.

Worst of all is the emphasis on Remote ordering. It saves you almost no time because they won‚Äôt have it ready for you. 

AND the mobile order system is a tech failure. Last three times I‚Äôve tried, error messages popped up saying Failed! Refresh the app. Did. Still failed. Maybe it‚Äôs your wifi connection? No. Today I tried inside a McDonalds with YOUR wifi. Failed.

So the third time was not a charm and they lost $14 in business because after wasting 15 min of my time, starting restarting trying to find an update in the App Store, trying with WIFI, without your wifi and redoing the order. Forget it. 

Update or just give it up. And improve the efficacy of the mobile order procedure to keep up with the other apps that have our food waiting to go when we walk in.
developerResponse: {'id': 4003744, 'body': 'Hi there, Tad! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2018-06-27T21:23:32Z'}

title: Why why why!
review: It seems everyday my McDonald‚Äôs app won‚Äôt work because the restaurant is having trouble with connection and making me pay more money instead of just giving me the deals.  Everything is Mobil pay and go now and the app says my store is closed all the time. Multiple times I don‚Äôt get McCaf√© credits because of this issue. When the app first came out it was great now it‚Äôs not good at all. Today I‚Äôm going to quit going to McDonald‚Äôs all together. I go there ever morning for coffee and breakfast but I‚Äôm going elsewhere.

title: Security issue and didn‚Äôt work on my first tries
review:
First, this app requires you to login and when creating an account or logging in, it is not integrated with the iOS password manager and it does not allow pasting in a password. Furthermore, it is limited to a 12-character password. These are security flaws in my mind as the app may persuade people towards using a less secure short, non-randomized password. 

Second, my first attempt to order something using this app was a failure. I thought I‚Äôd placed my order but when I tapped the button to pick it up as take out, it gave me an error message that the food I ordered was no longer available. This happened twice so I gave up and had to order at the register. So the app was useless in my case.

title: No way to customize order
review:
App is on the right track, but would be much better with the following enhancements:
What if we want to add ice water, ketchup, or communicate something else about our mobile order?  App doesn‚Äôt let you do this, so we‚Äôre seriously considering not using it anymore.
What if I want to use the app to order, yet my wife is driving near the McDonalds, isn‚Äôt using her phone, but will be the one to pick up the order?  The app forces the customer using the app to be physically near the restaurant. As long ad I‚Äôm buying and have a delegate to puck up the order, why should it matter where the app user is?  It‚Äôs no risk to McD‚Äôs.

title: I‚Äôm McLoving it!
review:
The app has made my McDonald‚Äôs experience so much better. My orders have been correct, I get straws, napkins and condiments in my order unlike when I order through the drive-thru where I have to ask for napkins, ketchup, etc. and when I get them instead of the one or two of said condiment I get 10 as of out of anger.

The app is clean, easy to use and I‚Äôm McLoving the deals which makes me want to use the app more and more.  Curbside pick-up is easy through the app.

title: Useless when they mess your order up anyways
review: What‚Äôs the point of ordering through the app when they mess up your order? I‚Äôve done pick up through the drive thru, in the restaurant and ordered through delivery. And almost every order is incorrect. Why have an app when each location can‚Äôt seem to mark an item unavailable so that it can‚Äôt be ordered. It‚Äôs useless if each location can‚Äôt sync to the app for the most accurate hours and item availability. The app isn‚Äôt very user friendly either. Tiny text to click to view more options. Just list them all or have more drop downs. Go figure a multi-billionaire dollar company can‚Äôt invest in proper app development.
developerResponse: {'id': 33545460, 'body': 'we always want you to get what you ordered! please contact us at https://www.McDonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.', 'modified': '2022-12-05T16:12:56Z'}

title: Worthless app
review: Discourage anyone getting this app. I had missing items from my order multiple times recently. The store doesn‚Äôt have any drinks and the app didn‚Äôt say they were out. So each time I ordered thinking this issue was fixed. Brought it to the locations attention and they told me I could get a refund through the app. I can‚Äôt. Contacted McDonald‚Äôs via email and they told me to contact the location I ordered from. As if I didn‚Äôt already do this when I picked up my food. So much easier to file an issue with Uber eats or door dash if food is missing. Emailed McDonald‚Äôs and they will not give me a refund. Waste of time if you think you‚Äôre getting service, let alone good service.

title: Ordering through the app gives the restaurant an excuse to not return your $$$
review:
I‚Äôve ordered through the app a few times and each time I had issues with the restaurant not having what I ordered. Because I ordered through the app they say they have no authority to refund the part of my order I didn‚Äôt receive. They also refuse to substitute anything if your item is out of stock. It‚Äôs ridiculous that they can just keep your money for something they didn‚Äôt give you. 

This has happened at multiple locations multiple times. Just place the order when you get there so they can tell you if they are out of something and you aren‚Äôt stuck paying for it.

title: Mostly great
review: To be honest, because of this app I go to McDonald‚Äôs way more often than I ever have. Great deals and value. The only thing I find annoying is the fact that points cannot be redeemed in the same order as a coupon. I understand not stacking coupons but the points are a separate thing? I would also love a feature that stores all receipts for previous orders because several times now the store didn‚Äôt know my order # and I could not reopen the order to pull it back up??

title: Double orders
review: My daughters and I all love the Deluxe Crispy Chicken sandwich meals. The issue is ordering that same meal with different drinks. If I order 1 meal with a lemonade, then another of the same meal, but with a coke, it always just makes one of those meals a quantity 2 in the cart, even though they are not the same.  This means I am unable to pick up curbside, as one of my drinks will be wrong. Therefore, I have to go to the drive-through and explain to them at the window the issue so I can get the correct drinks. Very frustrating and  time consuming.
developerResponse: {'id': 30932426, 'body': "we don't want you to be frustrated! let's fix this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-07-17T20:00:24Z'}

title: Could need some updates
review:
A couple things:
1. Approximate time for food is always longer than 5 minutes. I know this isn‚Äôt the app‚Äôs fault but Im sure it could gather some statistics to give a more accurate wait time based off the time of day and productivity of a particular location.

2. I wish you could get your order prepared before you arrive. For example, if I‚Äôm 5 minutes away they could get it started so you can wait 5 minutes parked instead of 10. 

3. Why must the phone be present? Chick-fil-A allows you to order from a phone and tell them when you‚Äôre there no matter your location so that someone else can pick it up for you. This would help me since my mom doesn‚Äôt know how to use the app and I could order for her to pick up on the way home from work. 

The app is fine but I think it could use this additions to make it better. If you‚Äôve used the Chick-fil-A app I‚Äôm sure you would agree.
developerResponse: {'id': 28176982, 'body': 'the only way we can make this the best app possible is by getting all the details we can from you here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2022-02-21T17:26:50Z'}

title: Invasive app abuses privacy, not trustworthy.
review: Almost as soon as I downloaded this app I deleted it as there is no way to turn off location tracking or even allow it to function only when needed. Moreover, it forces you to sign up for rewards, so it can analyze your habits and send you more offers so they can make MORE money. News sources like Inc. and others, chronicle this abusive and deceptive behavior. I‚Äôm will no longer support this company as a result and highly encourage others not to as well. They are taking advantage of their customers while making it seem like they are offering a helpful service. This is an unforgivable breach of trust. This predatory practice shouldn‚Äôt be supported by Apple or anyone else.
developerResponse: {'id': 25008707, 'body': 'Because we want to make the best app possible, the permissions are for the best functionality of present and future app features.', 'modified': '2021-09-09T16:53:51Z'}

title: Terrible App
review:
The ‚Äúdeals‚Äù that are on the app are not that great. There are no deals for family bundles only for one french fry or two sandwiches which for a family of 6 it doesn‚Äôt do that much.
   I seem to have problems loading up the app or it kicks me off. I thought maybe it was just me but today I was at a McDonald‚Äôs and the app wasn‚Äôt working again, and again I thought it was just me until the guy behind me was having the exact problem. 
   If you can get the deals to load, not all stores accept the deals. They tell me that there computers are not compatible with the app. 
   For the short of it, the app is a black eye and an embarrassment for McDonald‚Äôs. Go back to the drawing board

title: The is no longer useable
review:
The new rewards program they want to FORCE you into is impossible to get around. Once the splash screen comes up you cant get around it. You can't opt in or out and you cant swipe it away so you can not actually order food.

Good luck because even if you do want to opt in and literally sign your data and life away you CAN'T! The splash screen traps you. My work around has been exploiting a lag in the splash screen by spamming where the order button is. then putting in a saved order as quickly as possible. that will bypass it. But the lag is gone and now I can't order food. BYE McDonnalds my work around is to not purchase any of your products. Go fv‚Ç¨k yoirself & d1e in a f!re.

title: New App
review: Two problems with this app first when you do the contact us it will not allow you to input the app version and without that it will not except any comments. Secondly the app still will not allow you to sub an English muffin for a biscuit on the big breakfast and until it does I cannot use the mobile pay or the kiosk because I have to go to the counter and tell the person working the register I‚Äôve been waiting multiple versions of this app to have that corrected please do it now.

title: Glitches
review:
Please fix your app! It doesn‚Äôt close out orders even after I picked up my order. This creates a problem because it automatically creates an order the next day when I open the app. Then my deal that‚Äôs no longer available gets stuck in my cart. The only way I‚Äôve found to fix this is to delete and reinstall the app. It‚Äôs a headache when I‚Äôm on location trying to order food. It used to be fine until a recent update and now it happens very often. Fix ASAP!

Update:  it‚Äôs broken again!  App still getting stuck with previous order and won‚Äôt delete items or let me order something else.  I have to delete the app and reinstall.  Very annoying!!

title: Does not actually submit your order!
review:
This app does not submit a mobile order until the phone you used to place the order is in the parking lot. What if you don‚Äôt bring your phone? What if your phone dies before you get to the parking lot? What if you‚Äôre in a rush and need the order complete before you get there? What if your phone GPS is inaccurate or malfunctioning?

I wasn‚Äôt able to pick up my order because my phone was having a GPS issue and wouldn‚Äôt identify that I was in the parking lot. I left my money at home since I thought I paid on my phone already so I had to go home and I just canceled my order and got something delivered.

Clever idea but actually very impractical.

title: My App doesn‚Äôt work !!!!!
review: My app hasn‚Äôt been working for more than 4months now. When I initially open the app a error message appears across the top of the screen saying (‚ÄùApplication Initialization Critical Error Occurred. Please Restart The App.‚Äù) At first I thought that maybe the app was down because it was during the beginning of the pandemic, I asked one of the McDonalds employees have she heard anyone complaining about the app not working for them she stated No. Then I thought maybe my phone needed to update, but no that‚Äôs not it either I just did the IOS 14 update & my app still isn‚Äôt working üò©üò§üò°.

title: Idea Great - Execution Flawed
review: The application‚Äôs idea and functionality is fine. It‚Äôs the execution of the plan that is flawed. Typically a person would download the application for the purpose of ordering a meal(s) ahead of time to cut down the wait (even for fast food). But the way this application works is that you place your order and it does nothing - until you arrive. It‚Äôs basically an automated teller. Every time I‚Äôve used the application it was slower than just going through the drive-thru. The first time I used this application, I literally sat in the designated parking spot for 25 minutes and watched everyone come and go while I sat there. It was worse than any other option I could have used.

title: Worst store app
review:
Unlike most store apps McDonalds will not allow all orders that are placed and paid for to be picked up. You cannot place an order and have someone pick it up. If the phone isn‚Äôt there they do not make the order. Doesn‚Äôt matter that it was paid for and you have the confirmation number. 
I use a lot of these apps and this is the only one with this issue. 
Also they don‚Äôt allow you to order all items on the menu or to apply all current deals available. Breakfast is only available in the morning in the app.

Gave them one more shot but app doesn‚Äôt finalize order. So have to wait in really long line after wasting time trying to put in parking space. WORST APP

title: Terrible app, compared to competitors
review:
Yes, this app works. However, it‚Äôs not without issues:

1. GLITCHES: It is incredibly glitchy. I experience glitch issues nearly every time I use it.

2. DOUBLE-CHARGING: I was just double-charged due to app glitches. There is no easy way to report an issue.

3. NO SERVICE FOR ISSUES: Calling the App support phone number is literally torture: it plays a constant loop over and over and over (without pause) of a computer voice recording telling you to ‚Äúplease make sure you have the latest version of the app‚Äù, ‚Äúwe appreciate your patience‚Äù. I have never experienced a more torturous experience while on hold for 15 min. 

4. NO REFUNDS FOR ISSUES: They told me a team is going to have to ‚Äúresearch‚Äù my issued. And then even so, I‚Äôm going to have to dispute the charge with my bank.

5. THEY WANT YOUR ADDRESS: They did offer to mail me some coupons, but haha no. You aren‚Äôt getting my address.

What an absolute hassle for a simple transaction. Please hire some interns to improve your terrible app. I‚Äôll take my business to Starbucks...

title: Worst ordering app
review: Better off going to the window and then making sure to check your meal because you know they always get it wrong. This app won‚Äôt let me sign in, it says my email is not found in the records. So I try to create an account, but it says my email has already been used. Repeat the same situation to try and log in/create accounts with Facebook and Google and Apple. Terrible. Can‚Äôt even view the menu without logging in WHICH IT WONT LET ME DO.

title: Unusable App Packed with Errors and Crashes
review: Dating back to May of this year, the app has given me ‚Äúinitialization‚Äù errors and ‚Äútechnical difficulty‚Äù error banners every single time I‚Äôve attempted to use it. This problem has transcended multiple phones, multiple app versions, multiple iOS versions, both cellular and WiFi, factory resets, and app reinstalls. Monthly I have submitted reports of the problem, outlining in detail the issue. I‚Äôve offered screenshots and everything. Each time the development team has responded by telling me to call them and provide the exact same information I have already provided them. After that (pointless) phone call, I never hear from them again until the next month‚Äôs error report. I‚Äôm lovin‚Äô it.

title: Didn‚Äôt work
review: Tried to use this app to order ahead and send my son to pick up food. The first problem we ran into was that they don‚Äôt start making the food until you ‚Äúcheck in‚Äú, and in order to do that you have to have the phone in hand. So it doesn‚Äôt work to pay and have someone else pick up. Found this out when my son got there. I then drove in and tried to complete the order. While standing in the restaurant, the app told me that I appeared not to be there. Finally got it to recognize me at one point, then it would not accept my Apple Pay. Folks at the restaurant just shrugged and said ‚Äúsorry‚Äù. I am hoping that it didn‚Äôt accidentally go through somewhere and I end up getting charged. I have deleted the app.

review: I use this app far more than I care to admit but recently, I started having problems with it. Then, when when I get to the window, my order shows incomplete payment so my card is swiped again only I‚Äôm charged for the smoothie and my deal is also used. üò≥ This has happened at least twice so I don‚Äôt feel like I‚Äôve been properly rewarded.

title: App ok, but restaurant didn‚Äôt follow through
review: I placed an order through the app with no problem. I showed up at the restaurant only to be told they didn‚Äôt have my order and they couldn‚Äôt do anything because it didn‚Äôt show up in their system. Even after showing the worker the order information and showing him where the money for the order came from my account he still ignored me and kept working. Needless to say, I had to repurchase the food because I didn‚Äôt have time to go anywhere else for breakfast before work. This app is not going to be used again because it‚Äôs obviously not effective and I won‚Äôt be going to that particular location again.

title: Elizabeth Edwards
review: I ordered a McFlurry with fudge topping, the topping was mixed in with the Oreo. The manager would not let me have another one with the fudge as a topping. The customization was for a topping . We also had to go inside and ask for a refund but the manager Elizabeth Edwards refused to give me a refund. After my husband went inside for the 2nd time she agreed to have another one made. We used the app for convenience but this is the 2nd time my order has been turned into a great deal of trouble. Elizabeth, you are very rude and hateful we should have gotten the order fixed the first time we came back. I sincerely hope you find a career that suits you better someday but meanwhile your customer service should be first and foremost .  Thank you for this experience. Michelle

title: It‚Äôs Great when it works
review:
My husband did love the app, he didn‚Äôt have to get out his wallet & depending on the drive line and cashier working window it was fast & convenient. 

For the last 4 months the app will not let us order any muffin items for breakfast, it states that they are currently not available. So we either wait in line and verbally order egg McMuffins or go somewhere else for breakfast. We have our dog in the car with us. 
Really wish this can be fixed. As right now the app is not working at all.

title: Double Payment
review: I initially loved this app and used it all the time. Recently, however, I have had four times in a row where I used the app and paid with my card but then was told I hadn‚Äôt paid at the window. The first 2 times I repaid only to have to come back to the store for a refund when I realized I had been charged twice. The second 2 times I had to fight with the person at the window and show them my bank account had already been charged. I stopped using the app after this.

title: Outright Theft
review:
Today I tried to place an order on the new update but after selecting checkout it just booted me to the home screen with no way to check in an no order number or anything like that. After waiting several minutes for anything to happen I just went to the drive through and placed the order myself. Finally, some 20 minutes later after I had driven home I finally got a notification from my bank that a mobile payment had been processed. Sure enough my statement now shows two separate charges to McDonald‚Äôs and yet the app seems to have no record of me actually placing an order today.

TL;DR - until they put out a fix do not use this app, you won‚Äôt get your food and will get double charged

title: Crashes
review: For over a month now, I‚Äôve had written in red that I cannot use it right now check back later. Well now I get absolutely nothing with the app. I down load  s and redown load and it crashes . My boss just downloaded the app and it does the same thing. Now my sons one is doing the same thing. I really liked this app and was going to McDonald‚Äôs every week. Now I have gone maybe once in a few weeks. Please fix your app or something.

title: Takes money...no food
review: Ordered food the other day along with a dipped cone for my son.  The app took my order (and charged my card) yet when I picked up my food, they said they didn‚Äôt know why I was ‚Äúallowed to order ice cream.  We don‚Äôt even sell ice cream at this location.‚Äù    No refund.  Said I‚Äôd have to go through the app for that.  Sent customer service a message and was told that I should ‚Äúreach out to my bank.‚Äù  No refund.  McDonalds...if you can have my name pop up when I order, you should be able to know what food your restaurant serves.  And you can refund the money right back to my debit card.  Crappy customer service.  Crappy app for offering foods (and charging $) that are unavailable.

title: Deal/Rewards Limit, Quality, and Value
review: It‚Äôs so annoying how you can‚Äôt use more than one deal or reward per transaction. Shows how greedy they are. Most other fast food chains you can. Also, I had an order ready and had to cancel it to change something. But had to wait 15 minutes to reorder because McDonald‚Äôs only allows you to use one deal or reward every 15 minutes‚Äîeven though my order was never processed. I feel like they try to make processes as annoying as possible. Not to mention the prices are getting ridiculous. McDonald‚Äôs quality has decreased exponentially over the years. Makes me question why I continue to patron‚Äîthe convenience perhaps.

title: Overall good But..
review:
So the app is decent enough that I try to only order through the app now. The deals are great. 

The reason for the 3 stars is that you can‚Äôt place your order without physically being at the location.  My job doesn‚Äôt allow everyone to leave the job site on lunch break so we normally send someone to grab the food. I can‚Äôt place my order through the app for pickup and confirm it without being at the store. So how is someone supposed to place an order to be picked up by a friend, relative, wife/husband, co-worker? Fix this issue and I‚Äôll give 5 stars.

title: Difficult and confusing
review: I find this app to be most frustrating. I like the convince of being able to order thru the app and I usually try to take advantage of the daily deals‚Ä¶but‚Ä¶I often encounter glitches which either deny the deal or the location won‚Äôt honor it and I get frustrated and just give up and order live. Additionally I find the payment page not intuitive and hard to navigate.  I hope the developers can rework things to make it easier to use.  I suggest you compare it to the Sonic app which I find much easier to use.  Good luck!

title: Worst app on my phone
review: it‚Äôs the worst app on my phone I don‚Äôt have other apps that are constantly asking me to sign in and sometimes I have pulled into McDonald‚Äôs and I just don‚Äôt have the time to sign in again I have to leave I came over here purposely to do a review because I just looked at my McDonald‚Äôs app to see if anything was offered today and again it asked me to sign in. title: Log In & Device Verification Issues
review: App logged me out when tried to use on June 23, 2021. Multiple unsuccessful attempts to log in via new App Device Verification process & sending link to my email. The email link out from my email to Safari on iPhone was not working. Finally got Device Verification process to work by deleting App entirely from phone, downloading app again from Apple App Store, having a new verification email link sent to email, copy-paste that link into Chrome instead of simply linking out to Safari. Should not have been that hard, please fix!

title: At first awesome, now I want to punch myself in the face
review:
I‚Äôm going to just give up on the mobile app for a while. It‚Äôs more frustrating that convenient. The locations will leave you to die of old age in the parking lot as well. And for the love of god get rid of those janky bakery items. Gas station stuff is better. I don‚Äôt want my stuff heated in the microwave.

5/6/21 update. Still the worst app in the world, this app gives you no way to report issues with your order. If the restaurant leaves you to die in the parking lot well you don‚Äôt have many options. Get out of the car‚Ä¶ call.. we‚Äôll doors are locked and no one answers the phone. Please for the love of god add some way to address this or dump this app

title: Cannot get reward points
review:
This update occurred when I was in Arizona. When I returned to Texas, the app would not allow me to acquire rewards points for my purchases because ‚Äúsorry this restaurant doesn‚Äôt support McDonalds rewards. You can still use deals but you can‚Äôt use rewards and you won‚Äôt earn rewards on this order‚Äù 

It says that at every McDonalds in Texas yet it does allow me to use the McCafe awards that were converted but does not grant me rewards points for any order. How am I to benefit from rewards when I am no longer receiving them. This app is useless other than deals.

title: Issues on iOS with newer devices.
review: I just recently upgraded to an iPhone 12 Pro Max and shortly after the app started crashing and not allowing me to log in. After some research it appears that there are a lot of users who have the newer devices experiencing this same issue. I have uninstalled the app, updated my iOS, and restarted, trying everything I could possible think of to fix this issue but it continues to this day. There are no updates for the app. Other than this issue that has persisted for months now I would rate the app 4-5 stars :/.

title: Drive up service
review:
I always use the curbside pickup. It is easy and convenient.  Everyone is very courteous each and every time. I only wish on the app there was an option for no condiments or silverware or napkins. I as well as many others I‚Äôm sure do not need them. It would save your company a lot of money in the long run, and save on waste also. 
Just a thought for something to add to a future update as an option when ordering. Thank you.

Bloated with now all the ‚Äúfancy‚Äù features, animation that I don‚Äôt care about at all and too much advertising for the featured stuff. I don‚Äôt care that you now offer cinnamon buns. title: Great UI. Payment module iffy
review:
The UI is well laid out and easy to use. It remembers previous orders which is helpful. That is worth three stars. 
However I randomly get payment rejection.  I end up having to go into the store and I use the same card that the app rejected. (More frequently at one particular store, but it has happened in others). Store personnel have ‚Äúno idea how it works,‚Äù including managers. Fix the pay issue and it‚Äôs an awesome app.

title: COVID issues
review:
I ordered through this app for the first time since COVID started. I was able to order like normal and when I got to the restaurant it let me select inside pickup and dine-in options like normal. When I got to the door, it was closed on the inside with a sign saying to use the drive through.

It‚Äôs been the better part of a year since COVID started. Why has the app not been updated to let you know what your pickup/dine-in options are? This totally wrecked my plans and inconvenienced me. Not sure if I‚Äôll use this app again. The only reason I used it before or even went to McDonald‚Äôs was because it was convenient. Please fix this if you want people like me to keep patronizing your business.

title: Great app, but could use a bit of improvement
review: I love the McDonald‚Äôs app! I use it almost every day. My only feedback for improvement would be to have a space where we canType in comments. I like to have your slivered onions rather than your diced onions. There is no way for me to tell anybody that on the app. Your condiment selection does not have all of the possibilities,So I won‚Äôt end up ordering as close as I can, and then when the employee comes out to give me my order I then ask if I can have an order of slivered onions. It‚Äôs a waste of time for him to have to go back for some thing that I could have asked for on the app.

title: This app ruined my order
review: I didn‚Äôt have my card on me so I downloaded the app so I didn't have to go inside to use Apple Pay. I placed my order, a double quarter pounder with only meat and cheese, two McDoubles, and a large coke. I hit ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù and the app told me I wasn‚Äôt at McDonald‚Äôs. I went to the drive through people and they told me to come inside which was exactly what I didn‚Äôt want. But I did and the manager said my order wasn‚Äôt in the system. I pull up the order and the app DELTED my coke and McDouble? And added a 20 piece nugget? And changed the customized double quarter pounder to a regular one?? I didn‚Äôt want to flip on the workers because it wasn‚Äôt their fault so I just took my messed up order and left. Never using the app again and I suggest you don‚Äôt either.

title: Needs major improvement
review: This app needs major updates, every time I try to use it always has some issue. First time I tried it, I wanted to eat some for lunch but it needed me to be in range of the restaurant where it‚Äôs a good ten minute walk and super busy at the time I have lunch so I would‚Äôve gotten my food the same time my lunch would‚Äôve been over. Second time I tried it, I was parked in the spot and it wouldn‚Äôt take my card. I tried adding my card again and no matter what, it kept saying there was issues with my payment when I had more than enough money. Overall the app needs major improvement. For now I‚Äôll stick with other to go apps and drive thrus

title: Pointless.
review:
What is the point of ordering ahead and giving my payment information, if you are not going to start my order until I arrive? As a matter of fact, it wouldn't charge my card until I arrived, but I had to give the payment info while I was creating the order. Once I arrived, breakfast was no longer available (4 minutes past), which is why I was ordering ahead. If I had just left for the restaurant, instead of logging in and ordering, I would have been there in time to get what I wanted...so I left hungry and disappointed. 

2 stars because it looks well laid out and I didn't have any glitches...but still, I'll likely never use it again.

title: Constant updates
review:
I only use this app for the deals, and to earn free McCafe drinks. I go to McD about once a week. It seems there are updates about monthly. It‚Äôs so frustrating to get to the drive through lane, pull up the app to view deals, and then be forced to do an update that doesn‚Äôt load before I have to pay, and also makes me login again! So not only do I NOT get to use a deal, I also can‚Äôt earn credit for a McCafe purchase. 
Enough with the constant updates!  They just aren‚Äôt that important.

title: I‚Äôm lovin‚Äô it!
review: I really enjoy using the mobile app. It makes it fast & easy. One thing I wish could be changed is the location. There are 2 restaurants fairly close to me. However, the one that is slightly farther is faster to get to & I have marked it as a favorite. The app always wants to start with the ‚Äúcloser‚Äù restaurant and then I have to say change & go to the map & after I choose it, have to confirm it twice. I wish the I could just go to favorites, choose it & confirm once. Other than that, it‚Äôs great.

title: Bad timing on updates
review: I‚Äôve experienced several instances where I was in the drive thru line and trying to use my app, but I could not because of updates needed or version no longer valid.   I was highly upset one day when I literally had a coupon open and ready to use and by the time I reached the drive though window to pay, the app decided to not work because it needed to be updated. I ended up paying full price on an order that I made based on what the coupon would have discounted me for.  And the cashier just looked at me like they couldn‚Äôt do anything to honor the coupon at that moment.

title: Rarely functions correctly
review: I have a problem with this app nearly every time I use it. More than a week ago I added a few items to my bag, but when I went to checkout the app crashed. Now every time I load the app those items are still in my bag and when I tap the bag so I can remove them, the app crashes. I had hoped the recent update would fix this and it seemed to, but when I tried to order today I couldn‚Äôt get the menu to load and then I saw that the items had returned to my bag, then the app crashed, of course. I‚Äôm done with it.

title: Choosing a restaurant
review:
I live about half way between 2 McDonald‚Äôs restaurants. I must be a few yards closer geographically to one than the other. It is unintuitive on how to even show the more convenient location. I don‚Äôt want to begin traveling to the slightly farther away but so much quicker to get to one or navigate through a bunch of junk.
Update: had to delete due to never updating location as I travel until too late to use app. It doesn‚Äôt update until I‚Äôm already ordering from cashier?!? Useless

title: Terrible!!!!!
review:
Wouldn‚Äôt have rated as high as I did except they do have an app.   You place an order for available items, go to check out only for it to say items NOT available. Okay, disappointed youchange to find another item; then you realize you cannot remove! The unavailable items!  So left app alone thinking okay it will clear out & can try again another day. Well, nope. Those two items are still in my cart over a week later waiting for me to pay for!
The one time I used the app & placed order, I had to pay at store as app didn‚Äôt work to complete my order and ended up having to place my order at time of arrival!  This app serves no purpose other than to confuse & comp,I ate something that should be simple.

title: Disappointed
review: I am about to delete the app! So tired of the app always having some sort of issues, I can never see the deals. Half of the time I can‚Äôt even use my cafe rewards. Why can‚Äôt we always see the coupons, why do you have to be in proximity to a McDonalds? I am so annoyed. We had 2 kids in tournaments this weekend in 2 different cities and we never could see the deals. We would have gone to McDonalds at least twice but we went elsewhere. Why have an app if you cannot use it?

title: Horrible app
review: Horrible app. Constantly says near by stores are ‚Äúclosed‚Äù at 3pm when it‚Äôs open till 10. Multiple errors when trying to order. Having a saved order like say with Fries, then you log in the next morning it says you can‚Äôt order fries but then doesn‚Äôt let you remove them from the order either? .... It feels like this app was made as a high school project. Coupons also expire and don‚Äôt work on the last hour the stores open. Open till 10 and you want to use a coupon at 9:30? Yeah, it‚Äôs ‚Äúexpired‚Äù. Enjoy a conversation with management and a whole ordeal to save $4. The point of apps is to streamline it. Errors happen but it‚Äôs months and consistently not being changed so it‚Äôs a feature not a bug.

title: Over this app
review: Ive used this app alot however over the last two or so months ive had problems with mobile ordering. Ill get an alert it charged my account however on the app it says problem with payment then gives me a number to go inside to pick it up. When i go inside mcdonalds they tell me they have no orders for me but my account has a withhold for the amount. This happened to me at multiple mcdonalds not just one.  It is very inconvenient when you dont want to wait in line but the app doesnt work and tells you to go inside and they dont have the order also. I use this app to save some time and for the coupons but honestly with the glitches and not being able to mobile order is annoying.

title: Not letting me add credit card
review: I‚Äôve been using the app since the beginning.  When I tried to add a different credit card than then one I was using, it won‚Äôt let me.  It took my old credit card off and says the new one was not added.  I‚Äôve tried this about 50 times on different days hoping that maybe one of these updates will fix it.  The app had great offers, however, the customer service is aweful trying to fix issues.  I‚Äôve had other issues with it as well, such as charging me and my order not going through, and some older devices no longer working with the app.

title: 2 times good service/last time-AWFUL!!
review: Loved being able to order and then pick up at the curb until I ordered the other night at the Greenville North-town McDonalds. The lady came out and asked if I would take crispy chicken instead of grilled. I said no thank you. So I wait 20 MINUTES and finally had to go inside and get my food, myself. I could tell they screwed up and forgot but then NO apology and no thank you!! If I treated someone like that where I work, I‚Äôd have been called on the carpet!! Terrible. Won‚Äôt use it again!

title: Unable to update
review: This app used to work great. Now however it does not work at all. To use it I have to upgrade the app. My iPhone is to old for the update. To use this app I have to get a new cell phone. Not gonna happen just to use this app. I‚Äôm a senior citizen. I think there may be a lot more in my age group who are in this predicament. I think McDonald‚Äôs should consider an alternate app for older phones. It‚Äôs way to expensive for me to continue using this app. Good bye McDonald‚Äôs app!

title: WE NEED SAUCE ON MOBILE ORDER AND PAY!!!!
review: I don‚Äôt know about anyone else but I love to dip my fries in sauce, preferably Sriracha Mac sauce(that they no longer have) or signature sauce but on the mobile order and pay ordering there is no way to get sauce unless you order nuggets or strips but like I said I use them with my fries EVERY TIME!  So I decided to use mobile order and pay and go inside to check in and just pick up my food. They pulled up my order and charged my card they had on file from the app in the store and gave me a receipt. But when i first got there the app seen I was there and charged my card already so because I went inside they charged me again so I literally paid almost $5 for just sauce! No sauce on the menu but random stuff I have never heard of is?! WTH McDonald‚Äôs!!!!

title: I knew all our points would get screwed!!
review: I‚Äôve had the app for about 2 yrs now and my daughter wanted to order for herself and her father. I‚Äôm driving, she‚Äôs copilot. She goes to app and it wants us to sign in which it‚Äôs never asked before. Then it‚Äôs asking to create a new account? WHAT!? Why!? My account is completely gone! My points are GONE!! Everything is GONE!! As if we never spend time or a dime!? I‚Äôve updated the app before and this has never happened before. This really upsets the 2 that love to order from this app. All the points that were racked up to be able to use just for 1 measly reward at a time lame crap. I knew this was all too good to be true and we would get screwed soon.

title: They will steal from you
review:
Twice now we have placed an order on the app. We never got the food so we went in and the managers say they never got the order and that there is nothing they can do. Contact the app and they refer us to the restaurants and don‚Äôt do anything. They have now stolen over $45 from us. THIEVES!!! They won‚Äôt do anything when you contact them, the stores say they are not responsible for the app even though they are also McDonalds. The company never does anything when you contact them!!! Worthless do not use the app they will straight up steal from you!!

Update‚Ä¶ the manager charged us twice for the second order when they were ‚Äúinvestigating the issue‚Äù!!!!!

title: What happen to McDonald‚Äôs
review: The past 2 years have been absolutely terrible with Horrible service due to rude disrespectful employees who talk to their customers with complete disregard. Restaurant has no connection with the app and would rather argue with customers then resolve any misinformation.  Careless to their customers needs.  I would suggest SERIOUS training for the persons running your restaurants into the ground with attitude and  What happen to McDonalds???   Absolutely ridiculous to be quite honest!

title: Can‚Äôt even login
review:
I can‚Äôt login with my account. When I select email login, a window appears saying that an email has been sent to my mailbox. I go to the email in my mailbox and click the login yellow button. A safari window opens that then prompts a message asking if I want to open the mcdonalds app. I hit yes and the app opens but it‚Äôs not logged in. Trying to login again restarts this whole process. 

2 years ago it was a customer rewards program sign up that prevented me from logging in on the app without signing up for the program. I try to use the app again today and I still can‚Äôt login but now because of a different issue. They really really just don‚Äôt care.

title: Worst app
review: This is the worst app for ordering food. To start, it would not accept my email address so had to use alternate email. I should have stopped there.  Went ahead and made an order at a restaurant I was at.  When placing an order you need to enter a payment method.  The app was unable to pick up usual credit card I use, so I had to manually enter the information.  Also took advantage of a ‚Äúdeal‚Äù for free large fries.  A coupon flashed on the screen with instructions to present it at the counter.  After waiting in line to reach the counter, there was no record of my order in my phone or at the restaurant.  The voucher for the free fries was nowhere to be found.  Total waste of time.

title: It‚Äôs a joke
review: So you downloaded the McDonalds app so you could order your food and then pick it up, right?  Wrong. They won‚Äôt start making your food till you get to the location. So you still get to stand in the store and wait or wait in the drive-through or in the online pick up parking spot. Point is, you still get to wait for your food to be made once you‚Äôre in site.  Maybe using  the app saves you 30 seconds?  It‚Äôs also a HUGE app that takes forever to download. I wondered why the giant McDonalds had fewer app downloads than Chikfila and Taco Bell. Now we know. It‚Äôs cause their system for online ordering is NOT good. I used this app once and am now deleting the app! Wrong again Ronald!

title: DO NOT USE! DO NOT USE!
review: This app used to work OK, but now it is a DISASTER! It keeps switching to other locations I don‚Äôt want. Some random message pops up EVERY time I add a food item. It takes FOREVER to load when you click on something. It locks up when you place the order. And to top it all off, when I got to the restaurant and told them I place an order on the app, the order that gets placed is ONE FROM TWO WEEKS AGO! Took them 10 minutes to figure out how to back everything out and I had to re-order at the window anyways. This app is now beyond useless and actively makes your experience ten times worse. Just order at the drive through and save yourself a lot of frustration.

title: Deals
review:
At least once a week the deal will tell me I‚Äôve already used it today; which is not the case. I use a McCafe deal every morning and today plus previous days, it said I‚Äôve already used!!
I used it yesterday at 7:00am & can‚Äôt use it today at 8:00 am?????
Also, my rewards says many items can‚Äôt be purchased during breakfast hours therefore does not allow use - at 3:30 in the afternoon!
For some reason the app is on a different time zone than I am! It‚Äôs a little hard to redeem rewards when the app won‚Äôt let me!
Please fix these problems!

title: Zero stars
review:
I used the App to order and pick up food got points for free food. 
One day I got an e mail telling me I had 3100 points I could get free chicken nuggets. 
Armed with my phone I went to mcDonalds tried to ask what else can I get. Employee stared at me. Ask for help store manager couldn‚Äôt help. I contacted corporate they sent me free food coupons that didn‚Äôt solve the problem. Mid February I got an e-mail that 3100 points expiring. I contacted corporate. After much hold they said they‚Äôd have a computer person contact me. They didn‚Äôt. My points expired March 1. 
I‚Äôm going to delete this app. It doesn‚Äôt work no one at store can help with it and corporate doesn‚Äôt care. It will be along time before I go to McDonalds again.

title: Good app with glitches
review: I have been using the McDonald‚Äôs app since the day it came out. My only problem is that every so often, it goes totally haywire, to the point of having to delete and reinstall.  When I reinstalled it, I lost all of my rewards points (over 7000 points).Today, I couldn‚Äôt order breakfast, because the app froze up. I ended up having to delete it and reinstall it. Still was unable to order through my app today.

title: Literally so many infuriating problems
review: Allows you to purchase pick up at locations that are only open to drive thru. Locations will refuse to give food if you are on bike. There is no way to get money back at all. Anyone who has ever ordered fast food ever knows how stupid this is if you can‚Äôt get a refund for a wrong order. Switched phones and the app refused to recognize my old account, so I lost all my points. And then there‚Äôs the massive annoyance that you have to physically be at the location to order, destroying the purpose of ordering ahead to begin with. The only reason I use this app is so I get food cheaper. Other than that, this app is straight up infuriating to use.

title: Unfriendly App for Coworkers
review: Used your app for the first time today and wasn‚Äôt really impressed. It‚Äôs not designed for people who work and have one coworker picking up lunch, I had to make her get out of her curbside parking space and go inside to pick up my order due to the location tracker not letting me check in because I wasn‚Äôt there. There really needs to be a way to get beyond this. I will stick with ordering from other apps that are able to accommodate me.

title: Spam‚Ä¶ be prepared for spam
review:
This app does work for ordering food. But the developers must have forgot about that and instead just want to serve you ads for stuff you don‚Äôt want. 

Be prepared to fight through 5-10 pages of new and improved rewards programs every time you open the app‚Ä¶. Mandatory advertising complete with new terms you must agree to lest you be forced out of the app. 

I just wanted to order food. Can I buy an ad free version of this app?  FfsüôÑ

title: Ok but needs improvement
review:
As easy as the app is to use I have chosen McDonald‚Äôs competition over them time after time.
Burger King and Taco Bell apps offer to have the food prepared once I select arrived or set a time. I can be headed to the restaurant and my food is being bagged and prepped. McDonald‚Äôs does not start preparing my meal till I am at the location. It uses my location to track where I am at. For someone with a short break having the meal ready to go once I arrive is life saving. 
I haven‚Äôt used my app that much for the simple fact that I have to wait almost 30min to receive my food. 
I recommend you take the idea from your competition.

title: Extremely complicated deals
review:
This app is fine to order with but they have to sort out the ‚Äúdeals‚Äù section. You have to look through a dozen deals and then you have to choose one, and once you choose it you‚Äôre stuck with it and can‚Äôt use any other deals for 60 minutes. What‚Äôs up with that? So you‚Äôre finishing lunch and want a sundae but no deal for that? Wouldn‚Äôt McDonald‚Äôs want to encourage you to order more while sitting in the restaurant?

The deals section needs to be greatly simplified.

title: Could be better
review:
‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù tab is more cumbersome to find than it should be. It should have its own tab and/or be front and center and easier to use. 

The new ‚ÄúRewards‚Äù program‚Ä¶meh. If I use a deal, I can‚Äôt use any of my rewards and vice versa. Wendy‚Äôs will let me use both on the same order. Perhaps you should take a page from their book? Also, the ‚ÄúRewards‚Äù gives limited menu items that I don‚Äôt necessarily want, so what‚Äôs the point of even having them?

Overall, while still a decent app and offering, it could definitely be much better.

title: Good app but inconvenient at times
review: I love how easy it is to place orders and such but it‚Äôs extremely inconvenient that I try to place my order to have a family member pick up and they can‚Äôt because I personally am not near the location with my phone to check in. I sent my husband today and they didn‚Äôt have my order and couldn‚Äôt find my order number because I wasn‚Äôt near the store which is ridiculous. They need to make this more accessible for these kind of situations. Not everyone wants to pay for delivery and has someone who can pick up for them. They need to make this option available üò°

title: Not Reliable
review:
Half of the time this app doesn‚Äôt work. It logs me out and won‚Äôt let me log back in and when they added all day breakfast I can no longer order dinner or lunch. 
Now when it does work, I get to save money with coupons and I have access to the convenience of the mobile pickup spots. These things are very helpful to someone who has to run all over town on a time crunch.
All of that is awesome but with how often this app doesn‚Äôt work, it‚Äôs just easier for me to get food elsewhere for now. If the app gets fixed and it allows me to log back in, I will start eating there again, but for now, it is farewell McDonalds.

title: Great experience
review:
I‚Äôve only used my new app one time, but it‚Äôs GREAT.  I‚Äôm an 82 year old widower, and McDonalds has the BEST FOOD IN TOWN.

I haven‚Äôt used the app yet, but I eat at McDonalds twice a day, since my wife died.  I love the convenience, price and delicious taste.  The connivence of the locations are perfect.  My favorite is a McChicken,  plus lettuce, tomatoes, cheese and onions.  Wow, I also eat my other favorites.  People bring me other foods, but I still want my McDonald meals plus a large cola for only a dollar.  McDonalds is a TRIPLE WOW for this 83 year old.

title: Communication terrible
review: I find it is very easy to order. What is not easy is the communication afterwards. The app says it‚Äôs supposed to take five minutes to bring your food out. When that five minutes comes and goes, the app tells you thank you for ordering with us and after another half hour you still don‚Äôt have your food because possibly the restaurant is busy or they forget about you or the app already told them the food was delivered! Customer needs to be able to communicate on this app wanting to know where their food is.

title: Some parts good, some bad
review:
Ordering is good, the restaurant might not honor drink sizes, my wife wanted a small drink because of the weight, but we were given a large, which was too heavy for her - we ended up dumping most in the parking lot.

The feedback/contact-us section is really bad. You have to pick a store, but the store selector takes you to ordering, I don‚Äôt see how get the store into the feedback page. They also collect way too much PII, to the point that some people might not bother with feedback, which skews the results.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review: I used to use this app to order curbside. One day it just stopped letting me do it. It won‚Äôt let me login using Facebook, even though that‚Äôs what I always used before. I didn‚Äôt do anything on Facebook to change it. It now won‚Äôt let me sign up with Apple or Google either and when I tried to sign up using my email address, it gave me an error message and told me to try again later. It also gives me this message when I open the app ‚ÄúApplication Installation critical error occurred. Please restart the app.‚Äù But no matter how many times I close and reopen the app it doesn‚Äôt work. I even did the most recent update thinking that would change it but it didn‚Äôt.

title: Used to be flawless
review: I‚Äôve been doing the mobile ordering thing for awhile now, with a variety of restaurants including mcd‚Äôs. Some apps are better than others. Early on, any issues with the app were easy to solve, and it worked seemlessly. Now it hasn‚Äôt worked since mid December. Telling me restaurants were closed, and now I can‚Äôt add items to my bag. I‚Äôm begging you to fix this. I have children. Happy meals delivered to my parking space after indecisive beings finally decide what they want sure beats the drive through experience and I suspect the employees working the drive through would rather not have to deal with our shenanigans.
developerResponse: {'id': 21431852, 'body': "\rNope, that's certainly not great. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can get that looked into.", 'modified': '2021-03-03T19:09:00Z'}

title: McMobile
review: I was so excited to get the app because the line at my local McDonald‚Äôs is usually very long. So I figured it would be great to use the app and just walk in and grab my food and go. But I was shocked and confused to find my order wouldn‚Äôt be started until I arrived at the restaurant. If this is changed I will use your app, but for now I will just continue to place my orders at the businesses that do offer ready and waiting orders. I just can‚Äôt waist the time waiting .....
developerResponse: {'id': 20131115, 'body': "Hey there. Your order isn't finished up and prepared until you check-in at the store. That way it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2021-01-02T16:43:53Z'}

title: Loving the savings
review:
I recommend this app to everyone. It has saved me so much money and time, and I love having the ability to customize my family‚Äôs food choices. 

I do have one suggestion. I order the same few things every time I visit, and so have marked my customized favorites within each menu. I‚Äôd love to have a separate place for my favorites to be collected. It would save me so much time when placing an order, as I could go to one menu instead of having to click multiple places.
developerResponse: {'id': 5566878, 'body': 'Thanks for the love, Allysther! Word on the street is, our app is directly responsible for causing happiness. Enjoy!', 'modified': '2018-10-18T23:05:54Z'}

title: Terrible
review: I downloaded the app, placed an order, and went to pick up thinking it would make the trip faster. Instead, when I got there, they waved me through to the food pickup window without ever asking me for my order number, and then asked me if I was DoorDash. I told them I had ordered on the app, and they scolded me for not giving them the order number. When I tried to explain that I had been waved through, they told me to pull up. It ended up taking three times as long as just going through the drive-thru. To top it off only 1 out of 6 employees were wearing masks despite local health rules requiring them to do so. Won‚Äôt be using this app again. Will be calling the health department.

title: Frustrating application needs work to improve.
review: Took multiple attempts to get authentication through Facebook to work. After that it won‚Äôt allow you to do simple orders such as McNuggets unless you want a meal out of 10 piece or smaller. You can see and select these items but can‚Äôt add them to your bag. Won‚Äôt let you order 20 pieces period. Plus you can‚Äôt order two 10 pieces unless you order two full meals. You can‚Äôt just have one ‚Äúmeal‚Äù but with two 10 pieces. The store is closed due to covid so you can‚Äôt do the order inside. Plus the drive through line can be long. Isn‚Äôt this why you‚Äôd want an app to work curbside?

title: I like it
review:
We use this this constantly and for the most part it works great. 
It seems to forget my location every 4th or 5th use and is rough trying to get it to hone in on my local mcd‚Äôs
Had an issue this morning with the breakfast menu:  it loaded up a sort of top five list of breakfast items, and then when I clicked see whole menu, it went back to the beginning. I finally had to manually search for my item. 

I see a lot of people cutting on this app in the reviews, but I don‚Äôt really understand. It works for me most every time.
developerResponse: {'id': 16115354, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-06-20T21:12:45Z'}

title: Amazing deals
review:
The 5 stars are for the amazing offers the App has. I use a deal with every single purchase I make. The App is what brings me to a McDonald's. The only negative is sometimes there are technical difficulties and it doesn't work. Also, employees were not trained on how the app works and did not care to learn but I feel like that is improving.

Edit: looks like people were right. The point was for people to download it and now slowly they are transitioning the mobile pay and go. There haven‚Äôt been new offers and weeks and most of the ones they do have, you must use the mobile pay and go. Disappointed!!

New edit: credit card got hacked! Tons of mobile orders that were not mine! Mobile order is terrible!
developerResponse: {'id': 14031388, 'body': "Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-03-13T16:15:56Z'}

title: Doesn‚Äôt even compare to other fast food apps.
review:
No way to add Arch card balance to our account and pay with Arch card.

Hours are incorrect at locations. Every location is marked as 24/7 in the app, but they are all closed at midnight? Ours only until you are checking out that the app gives any indication of ‚ÄúRestaurant closed. Reopens at 4:30am.‚Äù

The app is just a glitchy web app that won‚Äôt load deals when you need them most‚Äîat the drive thru‚Äîunless you have perfect signal.

Offers are redeemed when you add an item to your order instead of when you check out and use them.

I had something added to my order from earlier, but ‚Äúproducts from different day part menus cannot be ordered at the same time.‚Äù There is no way to remove existing items to get the items I want without backing out of the menu I navigated through, removing the old item, and making my way back to the menu item I was just at. 

Aim to be like the Chick fil A app, because at least they provide a positive customer experience ordering to paying, and from eating to pinching it later on.

title: Scam, you can‚Äôt do anything without singing up
review:
I downloaded the McDonalds app and tried to browse the menu, but it wouldn‚Äôt let me!
I couldn‚Äôt browse the menu or see anything in the app nor do anything in the app, because it wants me to sign up and set up an account and log in to it using my personal information and my email account or with my personal information and any of three social media‚Äôs login info before the app would let me see and do anything!!
I‚Äôm a private person and I want to stay that way, I don‚Äôt see the need to share my personal info just so I can order a Big Mac from my phone!! The one star rating I‚Äôm giving this app is because of it‚Äôs requirements of an account with the app, before I could use the app!!

title: Can't use Apple Pay with app
review: I used to use the app all the time to place my orders since it was faster than placing my order at the restaurant. A couple of weeks ago the app logged me out and would not let me log back in. I had to create a new profile with the same log in information I had used in the past. As I was placing an order and got to check out I noticed that it didn't let me use Apple Pay. The app still does not allow for Apple pay. I know other people that have experienced the same issue. Is someone working on a fix for this? It's very inconvenient. I have not gone to McDonald's since this fiasco happened. I'm not going to add a credit card to my profile when I would be able to use Apple pay.
developerResponse: {'id': 10522059, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-09-04T21:35:33Z'}

title: No refunds after cancelation of the order?
review: Tried it for the first time was really impressed that u could order being close by pick up location and get ur order brought out to you. So i decided to use it again when i was in hurry. So i ordered quarter pounder ant it was about 10:30 it asked me to check in when im closer to find out they dont serve it during breakfast hour. So i got upset  and went in a line and ordered number 2. Went home and checked the app to see my order was still there so i canceled it but 8.95 was charged from my account and even tho i canceled it its been 2 days and it got never refunded. :(
developerResponse: {'id': 9644628, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Monika! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-07-13T22:13:40Z'}

title: Failure to launch
review: I love app and have been using it for quite some time. However, this morning I opened the app and it requires me to login. I never logout. After entering my credentials, I received an error message. At this point I went through the password reset process four times throughout the day with no success, even though I received confirmation emails indicating my password has been updated. This not the first time this has happened. During the infant stages of the app, I encountered this same issue. At that time, I called tech support and they told me to reload the app and I lost my rewards.  I hope today‚Äôs experience is just a blip and an update is forthcoming this evening.
developerResponse: {'id': 9519065, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about your current and previous experience with the McDonald's Mobile App, friend! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-07-05T18:07:51Z'}

title: App works good except for login experience
review:
The app has been getting better and better, which is great. However I just went through the process of switching from a social login to username/password and was very disappointed. When I created my password I could only use 12 characters. It also wouldn‚Äôt let me paste in a password from my clipboard. This makes using a password manager app like 1Password or LastPass very difficult. It will result in people using weak passwords and therefore a lot of hacked accounts.

This is a security issue and McDonalds, as a multi-billion dollar corporation, show know better and do better.

title: Too Many Issues
review:
I like the intent of the app, however there are too many bugs within the use of it.  For example:
I have an order that I already picked up and paid for, but it hasn't been cleared out of the app and I can't figure out how to make it go away.  Also, I'm constantly receiving a message at the top of the app stating that "We are currently experiencing problems with the app, thank you for your patience"; or something like that.  I'm sure you are working hard to iron out all the bugs, but right now the app is not too user friendly.
developerResponse: {'id': 3884723, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Smyrna! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.", 'modified': '2018-06-18T23:44:37Z'}

title: Unable to Add Payment Method
review: I just recently downloaded this app for the convenience of mobile ordering. Everything was perfectly fine until came time to add my payment method. After extensively trying so many times, each time ended with the same error message: card not added. I called the McDonald‚Äôs customer service number and unfortunately the representative didn‚Äôt provide any real solution to immediately resolve this matter. I was genuinely looking forward to actually using this app, but seeing as how that can‚Äôt happen, I will have to place my orders in person. So until this issue is addressed and fixed with the next update, which I am hoping it will be soon, I am rating this app for 1 Star. Very disappointed.

title: What good is it to order or curbside if I‚Äôm going to have to walk in the store
review:
Soooo this is the 2nd time I place an order on the app and I need to get off to be advised of issues with my order.  I guess options on the app are no longer available - such as lemonade as a drink option.  Really no lemonade?!?

The app also allowed me to change the 2nd item of the happy meal - but Not anymore.  You have to stick to apples or yogurt.  I agree with the healthier options but don‚Äôt say in the app you have the option and then your told NO at he restaurant.  

To top it off - Daniel, the guy behind the counter seemed annoyed!  He would cut me off mid sentence and threw me off when her called chicken nuggets = corn nuggets. I had to ask to clarify this as he reported many changes were made to the menu!  Thankfully it was just a play in words.

I did not report this incident to the manager as I believe in telling the person with the problem first in hopes he can OWN IT, take this experience and HOPEFULLY rectify his customer service!!
Sincerely,
Somewhat annoyed with the app and customer services

Calexico, ca McDonalds on Imperial Avenue

title: Food was great! Outside area was filthy. Drive through was littered with trash. There was no wind!
review: Thought I would swing for a breakfast sandwich. No one answered on the drive through speaker. I said ‚ÄúGood morning‚Äù she replied give me a minute. It was silence for a couple minutes. I needed to get to work. Finally she took my order. Drive through was cluttered with McDonald‚Äôs trash. Food was good but a little on the cool side. I will return, I‚Äôve never had this level of service so I‚Äôll say it‚Äôs a fluke. Happy motoring!
developerResponse: {'id': 32072203, 'body': "that's not the kind of service we want for you! let's talk about this more here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html ", 'modified': '2022-09-17T14:52:42Z'}

title: Can't even get pass the sauce
review:
So Everytime when I'm doing mobile order where I have chicken nuggets or tenders I can't select the confirm button on the bottom (iPhone X) for the sauce page. 

Most time employees ask me for payment even when it's a mobile order, perhaps something is wrong with their POS that can't show this or it's confusing. I can see a great push for self service kiosk and mobile orders both of which are great for me but always have some flaw either with the actual kiosk or no table # to take for Dine In. Starbucks mobile order is seemlessly convenient and works nearly all the time worst case is the order didn't register on their end or mistake by their end but they can always quickly make ur order again.

title: Mobile ordering problem
review:
I liked the app initially, but then one upgrade made it stop working - wouldn‚Äôt ever connect.  Finally, next upgrade fixed that, but all ‚Äúspecial deals‚Äù seemed to be only eligible if you used mobile ordering.  So I tried it- placed an order one evening at 10, seemed to go through well, but when I got to the ‚Äúparticipating McDonald‚Äôs‚Äù at 10:15, turns out they had closed at 10!  No info on mobile ordering to indicate this?  Order indicated it was ‚Äúgoing through fine‚Äù?  Seems a massive problem- should you be able to place an order for a location that is closed???

Poorly done, McDonald‚Äôs.

title: Okay when functional, miserable time-stealer otherwise
review: I‚Äôm sitting at a curbside pickup where I wait on food that was ordered via the fickle app. No confirmation number given for drive through, instructed staff would have order at second window, arrived second  window and staff were uninformed. I offered to submit a second order at the curbside‚Ä¶been waiting for ten minutes. All in, a thirty minute ordeal with no food‚Ä¶second time this has happened.
developerResponse: {'id': 24986596, 'body': "That's not cool! Let's get that looked into here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-09-08T17:13:08Z'}

title: Horrible App
review: I use tons of mobile apps for order ahead and this is by far the worst one. It signs me out and someotimes takes days before app even works long enough for me to get signed back in. I HATE that I have to be in the parking lot to pay. I buy food for my kids on plenty of other apps and they just pull through drive thru and pick up when they are out. McDonalds is the only one that doesn‚Äôt allow that unless they are tracking you and you are  there in person. Reward points are crap‚Ä¶I placed order redeemed points and paid only to get to window and be charged for items which should be free. Manager comes out to say the app doesn‚Äôt always work.
developerResponse: {'id': 31974504, 'body': "we're here to help! tell us the details here so we can look into it: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-09-12T16:58:56Z'}

title: I can‚Äôt buy Fountain Drink Water with the App
review:
I like using the app but. 

Fountain Drink Water is something that McDonalds sells that is healthy. Fountain drink packaging is not so bad for the environment. I CAN‚ÄôT BUY FOUNTAIN DRINK WATER WITH THE APP.  I should to be able to buy fountain drink water with the McDonalds App.  

Drinking plastic bottled water is available with the App. Drinking water from a plastic bottle is a health risk. Sorry I don‚Äôt want man boobs or worse.  Plastic bottled water is an environmental disaster for humankind. 

Sugar added fountain drinks are not healthy. Obesity, diabetes, and tooth decayare a few results of a diet rich in sugar added beverages. I know if you are an endocrinologist, dentist, heart surgeon or a drug company executive or investor, you think high fructose corn syrup added beverages are the best thing since sliced bread. I know, sliced bread may be just as bad as sugar added beverages. For sure, sugar added beverages are available for purchase on the app.

McDonalds Corporation has seen to it that app users can not buy fountain drink water with the app. THIS IS TOTALLY WRONG.

title: Fix your app
review: I tried to place an order for breakfast I thought it was like the rest of the restaurant apps where I can place and pay for my order then go pick it up but apparently they don‚Äôt charge till you get there and you have to take your phone in order for them to make sure you get there which is inconvenient because I placed the order and I wasn‚Äôt able to pick it up so I sent my sister but she couldn‚Äôt pick it up because the order could not be made until it knows my phone is there at the location of the restaurant so when I went it was too late I couldn‚Äôt try and pay for the food because it was no longer available
