title: I usually never rate apps‚Ä¶ but this is bad
review:
Part 1)
First off, there is no way for the store to refund‚Ä¶ I ordered in the parking lot and they came out and said ‚Ä¶ sorry. They can‚Äôt complete the order because they are closing early for an employee birsthday party. What??? When I used the app it said to contact the store for refund.
Part 2)
Christmas day, it stated all the McDonalds are open‚Ä¶ so I ordered‚Ä¶ and wow‚Ä¶ they are all closed‚Ä¶ I went to a few just to make sure its not me. Really? You can‚Äôt update holiday store hous on you own app? Don‚Äôt accept the ‚ÄúTheir are franchises‚Äù‚Ä¶ if you were Subway maybe‚Ä¶ but Subway is even better app experience.

I used to worked at McDonalds for 3 years. Its unfortunate that a company with so many resources and desire to add tech to their company is just a mess with a simple app. 

Replace the head of your app team and place ideas and techinal issues with an Industrial Engineer to work thru them.

These guys should just buy the back end from starbucks and lay thier front end over it. 

The app is not worth keeping on your phone.

title: Okay app, very cumbersome sign-in
review: Okay with the app - it‚Äôs got okay deals, my local McDonalds participates, etc.  The part of the app that I can‚Äôt stand is the overly complicated sign-in. If you don‚Äôt want to link the app to Google or Facebook (which I don‚Äôt), you have to get a link sent to your email (which you have to type in every. Single. Time), and then do a follow back to the app. Assuming the link works, which can be a bit problematic sometimes. Why can‚Äôt I sign on like most other apps? Even my financial apps don‚Äôt require this and let me sign on like a normal person - why McDonald‚Äôs?
developerResponse: {'id': 25911674, 'body': 'We want your Mobile ordering to be as easy going as possible. Get back to our team with as much info as you can on this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html \r\n', 'modified': '2021-10-26T19:46:46Z'}

title: Need availability for somebody else to pick up order!
review: My husband and I are sick with Covid so my son went into town to get groceries and I ordered through the app so that he could bring dinner home. However, since he did not have my phone with him he was unable to pick up the order. Even though the app tells you you can let a crew member know and provide an order number, they were unable to honor this. My son went up to the store as well as I called. No one was able to assist with getting our order processed and available for pick up. Super disappointing since this is an option for other food apps!

title: You NEED it
review:
This is definitely my favorite fast food app I‚Äôve had. I only downloaded it because a friend of like said you can get a $1 coupon for any iced coffee/coffee drink. At first I thought that coupon was a one time use but it‚Äôs ALWAYS there and I‚Äôve used it so much to buy my $1 large caramel iced coffee. 
They also always have a buy one get one free of many different things. I haven‚Äôt paid full price for McDonald‚Äôs In years and the iced coffee coupon is the best thing ever.

title: This is the worst fast food App by far.. So Sad
review:
Scrap this app and start over. It deserves - 5 stars. I have been unable to use the app to order because an expired coupon is unable to be removed from the cart. So I had to uninstall the app and tried to reinstall it but I was still in the cart. I logged out and logged back in and it was finally gone. But along with the coupon it took my 8,000 + points I had accumulated. 

I am unable to put the app back on a home screen. What a train wreck of an app..

title: Rip-off App
review:
I call this the Rip-Off App.  Everything on the App is significantly more expensive than if I simply order normally and pay normally in person.  This is true at both the McDonalds Restaurants that are nearest to me.  Additionally, the app fails at key moments, such as when I am attempting to receive an order that I had already placed and paid for.

I have also noticed that the ‚Äúdeals‚Äù are not really deals.  The app also often fails to credit me for coffee orders placed.  The coffee, I should add, is around 60 percent more expensive when purchasing through the McDonalds App.  

IMHO, McDonalds needs to be investigated, fined and made to pay restitution for misleading the public and its astonishing display of deception.

title: This app is handy for when you are on the move. Great discounts and rewards also.
review:
Handy App but could use a ‚ÄòDelete/Cancel Order‚Äô option. 
It took a while to figure out that I had to delete each individual item in a pending/saved order to cancel it. 
It would also be nice to be able to view and mark your ‚ÄòFavorites‚Äô outside of the ‚ÄòOrder‚Äô screen. 
I do like the discounts and ability to customize my items and meals and save them for future ordering.
developerResponse: {'id': 13471281, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app.  You're helping us as we continuously work to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App, and we really appreciate it!", 'modified': '2020-02-13T16:50:26Z'}

title: Convenient for McDonald‚Äôs, not the customer
review: We used this app for the first time today. What a joke; got there, drive thru didn‚Äôt have our order, then when they were able to pull it up couldn‚Äôt process my order. When we finally got our food it was wrong and had to wait again; about 15 mins later people were leaving the line and staring at us. How embarrassing. The only point of this app is so that McDonald‚Äôs can keep track of what you get to market to you better. Otherwise, it makes no sense. Once you order and pay you have to go to the drive thru and tell them your order number anyway so they can start making it. It saves no time, and caused us way more problems than convenience.
developerResponse: {'id': 19417025, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that. Let us look into that. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. ", 'modified': '2020-11-29T17:36:38Z'}

title: Turned Husband Away With Mobile Order Number
review: This is by far the worst experience I‚Äôve had with a restaurant app. I‚Äôm the one handling all the school stuff for our kids during this whole COVID-19 pandemic..and frankly, I get tired of being in the kitchen. Tonight I asked my husband to pick up dinner when he got off. I downloaded this app and placed the order for him to get. For years, any time he‚Äòs picking up Starbucks or any other to-go order I place the order and he gets it. Except for here. He got there and they said he needed the phone that we placed the order with. After he told them that I placed it, they said he‚Äôd have to go home to retrieve it. Definitely not the app to use for larger, busy families. I opted to cancel. And delete this pathetic app.
developerResponse: {'id': 15877232, 'body': "Hey, Jennifer. Sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store with the phone that was used to place the order. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you.", 'modified': '2020-06-09T13:41:22Z'}

title: Kinda Annoying
review: Not a bad app if you‚Äôre into getting the latest money-saving offers on McDonald‚Äôs food. However, I‚Äôm always required to sign in whenever I try to open the app, which wasn‚Äôt always like that. Not sure what happened with this app but in the past, I never had to re-enter my name and password whenever I wanted to use it. I was at the McDonald‚Äôs today, opened the app to glance the latest offers, discovered I was signed out, and out of frustration, just closed the app without ordering food because I‚Äôm sick of always having to sign in with my name and password. I mean, It gets tedious after awhile.

title: Been using the app for months every day. Had an issue with not being able to process my order

review: We purchased two Coke‚Äôs on the way to the Airport in Atlanta. We paid for our order and chose to pickup inside. Once inside we found out the soft drinks were out of order. The manager said ‚Äújust get a refund through the app‚Äù. Obviously the manager didn‚Äôt understand the app and we didn‚Äôt have time to stick around to train her on their own app. This wasn‚Äôt the first time this has happened but I have no way of giving feedback outside of this.

title: App ok. Curbside pickup horrible
review: App works great. Wish there is an option to leave a review at the McDonald‚Äôs location for when I‚Äôm doing a mobile order. Literally had to wait 30 minutes curbside before I had to go through the drive thru cause apparently they were too lazy to walk out with my order. My order was apparently already made, bagged and cleared from there side yet they didn‚Äôt want to walk it out. Lobby wasn‚Äôt even busy. How do I know this? It was empty and when I went through the drive thru the worker just handed me my order. I mean what‚Äôs the point of giving me the option of curbside if they can‚Äôt do it.

title: Unless they revert back to 2018 marketing, don‚Äôt waste your time
review: This app was 5 stars for me last year. It offered a variety of options on many menu items. This year they‚Äôve stripped it of any value. There is only the option to track a McCaf√© purchase and a random drink/fry deal...oh and the deal of the day which is basically the same deal every day because you have the same options to choose from. Extremely disappointed and I will delete the app if it continues.

title: Problems with Deals & Rewards
review:
**Edit: problem with the rewards is now resolved so I‚Äôm updating this. Great app, convenient and loads of great deals. 

I‚Äôve been getting a message when I try to get my Rewards and Deals; ‚ÄúNo matching deals at this time based on your current location. Please check again soon.‚Äù I get this even when I‚Äôm at the restaurant, location services on. :-( So disappointing. I have lots of rewards I can‚Äôt access.

title: Payment method can‚Äôt be Deleted
review:
I wrote several months ago about how you were unable to delete a stored credit/debit card info that‚Äôs stored on this app and this app still doesn‚Äôt allow you to make changes to debit/credit cards you have on file.  

If you want to update a card that is saved on the app (expiration date or change in billing address), you must COMPLETELY DELETE the app, reinstall, and CREATE A NEW ACCOUNT.  If not your old payment card will still be saved and you will get an error when trying to pay.  There is no way to change a saved card, only to create a new account.   A little scary to think you can‚Äôt delete a debit card off this app is you enter it in your kids phone or if you lose yours

title: Always an issue
review: I always have an issue with the app. PLENTY of times, I‚Äôve placed an order on the app and when I get to restaurant, I‚Äôm told they don‚Äôt have it so I can either get something else or call customer service to get a refund! I want what I ordered and paid for! This is unacceptable! Today, I placed an order, it was sent to the wrong location, then when I tried to correct the location, the app wouldn‚Äôt let me telling me that an item I wanted wasn‚Äôt available, but when I went to the location, they told me it was available and a customer told me the app wasn‚Äôt working. So now I‚Äôm out of my money and food because it wouldn‚Äôt correct the location and I am no where near the location where my order was sent!!!

title: Useless
review:
The app is pointless if you want to use it to order ahead so that your food is ready when you arrive because it won‚Äôt register to the restaurant to start cooking your order until you ‚Äúcheck in‚Äù and the app won‚Äôt let you check in until your gps shows to the app that your at the store.

Edited in response to developer: I understand the purpose of the ‚Äúcheck in‚Äù feature, but the point you‚Äôre missing is that it‚Äôs a waste of time if I can‚Äôt check in until I‚Äôm at the restaurant. I still have to sit around waiting for the food to be prepared. An order ahead feature is meant to cut that wait time‚Äîespecially if ordering during peak hours. That‚Äôs a concept this app fails to take into consideration.

title: 1212 gun hill, Bronx NY mobile order pickup
review: This location has a manager that doesn‚Äôt know how to manage in situations where as the McDonalds mobile app glitches. I ordered using a deal, when I got to the drive thru window the manager said, my order wasn‚Äôt there possibility due to a glitch and that I would have to reorder. And that I would have to call my bank to reverse the transaction. When I reordered I let the manager know I used a coupon on the mobile app and he said there‚Äôs nothing he could do about honoring that deal. So I drove off. I don‚Äôt understand why this mobile app doesn‚Äôt have 24 hour customer service and why these franchise‚Äôs employee managers that don‚Äôt know how to accommodate customers in the instance when inconvenience arises.

title: Mobile app needs work
review: Mr McDonald‚Äôs.  You need to find a way to adjust your mobile order availability when things don‚Äôt go as planned. I went to a 24x7 McDonald‚Äôs for breakfast to be greeted by a sign that said opens at 615.  ???   Ok. Something is up.  No problem.  It happens.  But if the mobile order app was updated I would have known to stay clear.  Instead it became a point of frustration.  Not a life changing event lol but something you can get better at.  Thanks.

title: Almost unusable
review: I installed the app and signed in maybe a year ago. Fine. Yesterday I tried to use it and I had been signed out, and now every time I boot up the app it asks me to sign in, even after I‚Äôve successfully signed in previously. I‚Äôm using the sign-in with email feature, which requires you to open a link in an email. Half the time when I request the email link it won‚Äôt even send. Also can‚Äôt use any of the alternative sign-in options because they use the same email as the sign-in with email feature. I don‚Äôt know why this thing doesn‚Äôt just require a password for the sign-in with email feature. This whole thing is a nightmare.

review: I have over a half dozen orders where the mobile order bill will be one price, then at the drive through I am over charged on my credit card. Never lower, always higher over charge. It carried on for so long I just needed to drive way so the line didn‚Äôt get too long for other‚Ä¶.so in that case I lost rewards points and it was just plan awkward. Not sure if this is worth the aggravation‚Ä¶just order the traditional way maybe?

title: Options just aren‚Äôt there.
review: You can‚Äôt add cheese to a happy meal hamburger. You can‚Äôt choose it OR customize it. That‚Äôs ridiculous. It‚Äôs all in the facade of health. It‚Äôs McDonald‚Äôs. Ridiculous.

title: Deals?!
review: I ordered a deal with my meal and it worked great.  The next time I ordered, the deal if that day would not go through because there was already a deal in my order.  (The one from previous order). I could not get it to go away.  I asked an employee about it and she suggested I delete the app and re install it.  I did, and it worked.   Now I‚Äôm tried to order and it didn‚Äôt delete my last order.  So I deleted the app again and am in the process of re installing it.  If I have to delete the app and reinstall it every time, I will not be using it.

review: The app functions as designed I guess. But often times the way I use these fast food apps is to place an order for the family, pay for it and have my son pick it up. McDonalds is having none of that. I can‚Äôt tell the app I‚Äôm here to pickup the food because my phone is not near the location I ordered. Why is this even a concern? No other fast food joints do this. Even go through the drive through and give them the name and order number and the employees will tell you, ‚ÄúSorry, we can‚Äôt release that order without the phone being here‚Äù.  As if the phone ordered the meal not the human!

review:
App is frustrating to use. It regularly shows a bunch of coupons, which look appealing. Once you‚Äôve selected a coupon and scan it at the store though, the store device reports that that coupon doesn‚Äôt appear to exist. Proceeding on the store kiosk often leads to it suddenly logging you out, or taking your order but not assigning points to your account.

It almost seems like a gimmick to trick you into the store. It works if you want to use just the kiosk, or don‚Äôt want any meal deals or coupons, but otherwise honestly save yourself the frustration and order at the counter.

 Or there‚Äôs the issue of it being 6pm and it only lets me order breakfast items and vice versa.

title: So much work needed
review: I‚Äôve had so many issues with this app. A company this large should have an app that functions. I originally signed up with Facebook. Big mistake because for months at a time the app will refuse to let me sign in with Facebook, but it also refuses to let me sign in through email because I didn‚Äôt originally sign up that way. So I created a new account, that I have to log into every single day via an emailed link. How about Face ID or a remember me option so that I‚Äôm not waiting on an email to log in every morning just so I can get my coffee?

title: McDonalds newest app update
review: McDonalds ‚Äúscrewed the pooch‚Äù on its latest update FORCING you into its ‚Äúadvertising‚Äù and ‚Äúrewards‚Äù program.  You can no longer use the app unless you sign up for their ‚Äúrewards‚Äù program which sends you ‚Äútargeted‚Äù emails and texts based on your purchases.  I just want to use the app, not get sucked into getting dozens of texts and emails every week from McDonalds.  I specifically turned OFF emailing and notifications because I was getting between 5 and 6 notifications EVERY DAY ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èü§¨!  And now, since you can‚Äôt use the app WITHOUT ‚Äúnotifications‚Äù, I deleted it.  Get back to me when you STOP FORCING people to accept emails and notifications in order to use the app!

title: Crap shoot at best
review:
When it works, it‚Äôs great.  Most of the time coupons will show up, sometimes it won‚Äôt.  Times you pay for Frappe and scan barcode to get credit for purchase ( buy 5, get 1 free) and you hear ding when scan but credit never appears.  You show management and they tell you it takes a few minutes to show up and there is nothing they can do.

Also trying to contact app developers is impossible from iPhone.  It freezes every time

title: Deals, pick up orders but SO MANY FLAWS
review: Let‚Äôs be real people 2021 has been just as rough as 2020. Sure McDonald‚Äôs gives you the option to order a pick up/curbside or drive-through order and you can use their deals on that.... but the fact that you can‚Äôt place an and have someone else pick it up is the worst excuse I‚Äôve ever heard. The phone needs to physically be there in order to get your order. This is some beyond mind blowing!!!! Every other app or restaurant/company offers the option to put the order, please someone else‚Äôs name in it or place the order and it goes through. Maybe one day you‚Äôll catch up McDonald‚Äôs.

review:
About 2 yrs ago the app stopped working - aggravating, as I met my 5 McCaf√© orders in order to receive my free drink.  Anyway, I have deleted and re-downloaded the app dozens of times only to receive an immediate, ‚ÄúWe are having technical difficulties. Please try again later‚Äù, message. title: No Use if I Can‚Äôt Log In!!!
review:
I used to LOVE this app, I used it almost daily. Now, for the past few months, I‚Äôve been unable to do anything. At least now I can get past the ‚ÄúInitialization Errors‚Äù to actually open the app (couldn‚Äôt do even that for a month plus), but now I get that same message and I can not get past the Login Screen to proceed further. 

I have spoken with the ‚ÄúSupport Team‚Äù many times, Too Many Times. All I get is that ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre working on the issue‚Äù and it is a ‚ÄúKnown Problem‚Äù for some IPhone users. Seriously....a ‚ÄúKnown Problem‚Äù and you cannot fix it after this long? I realize I‚Äôm but one small dissatisfied customer, but seriously....this needs to be addressed!

title: Needs Improved
review: I have tried to use this app a handful of times and always struggled with the payment process and the lack of it going through. What is really frustrating is when I use the app is that the order doesn‚Äôt get placed until I arrive. I use the app the place a big order so it‚Äôs correct and I don‚Äôt have to wait when I get there. However, when I arrive the app says to process and pay (it never showed that until I arrived). I entered the billing info and hit process on the other side of town but it doesn‚Äôt process like you would think. The employees are then scrambling to get the order done while I wait and neither of us are happy.

title: Hate! Hate! Hate this Apo!
review:
I had planned to give it at least a four star until the new update. Several major deficits to this app. 
1. It will restart itself right before I get to the window and I‚Äôm not the only one in my family to have it happening to. 
2. If I don‚Äôt give the app continues ‚Äúalways‚Äù access to my location it won‚Äôt alway me to do anything on the app. I thought it was just me but when I drove up to the window the young man told me to turn my location to always and that seems to help other customers. Yeah No. I allow it to get my location when in use so that should be suffice. 
3. It seems to always be updated which is annoying when your in the drive-throu and can‚Äôt download it. 
Disappointing!

title: Losing Functionality
review: The app was great when first released. But I am encountering increasing instances of poor functionality. Orders are not being sent to the store and receive error messages. When I go inside the store I am often told that the mobile app is not working at the store. I don‚Äôt know if franchise owners are lying and shutting off the mobile app feature or they are really encountering technical problems. My other frustration is that it appears that mobile orders are not being sequenced into the order flow. Mobile orders are filled in the least priority and often wait longer than if ordered at the counter. I truly believe the McDonalds franchise owners are resistant to the app and providing a poor experience and service.
developerResponse: {'id': 12135012, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can assist you with this issue.\n\n", 'modified': '2019-11-30T16:44:08Z'}

title: Need to be able to start order when placed.
review:
Pros: app is easy navigate and apply deals. Auto tracks coffee punch card and supports Apple Pay. WiFi extenders installed so that you have full WiFi in the parking lot when using the app for mobile order pickups. 

Con: order will not be submitted until you arrive at the location. For me, this defeats the purpose of having a mobile app for pickup. I want to put the order in while I‚Äôm at work and have the food ready when I arrive so I can run in pickup and leave (e.g. Starbucks). I don‚Äôt want to sit in the parking lot or wait inside for the order to be submitted and made.

title: I mean I like it, but‚Ä¶
review: In the few times I've used the app, it seems great. You can basically order from your phone and go pick it up in the way you desire & it makes getting in and out quicker. I love that especially when I'm on a time crunch for work. I will say though that I have been logged out of the app automatically and even though I have a password manager, I can't seamlessly log back in. Maybe I'm just being a big baby but I would like it if you'd work with Dashlane or any other password manager. Thanks for reading in advance!

title: Practically unusable
review:
I‚Äôve been using the app for a while, and lately it‚Äôs just terrible. It‚Äôs slow and unresponsive and crashes a lot. It all started when you added the thing to vote on tomorrow‚Äôs deal. I open the app and that‚Äôs the first thing I see, and if I tap on it to vote, half the time it takes almost a minute to bring that function up, and the other half of the time it just crashes the app! And when it does work, it takes me right back to the screen I started with before freezing again and then crashing.

If, and that‚Äôs a big if, but if I can get the app to respond, it starts loading the local menu before, you guessed it, freezing and crashing again.

title: Deals are awful now
review: I never used this app for anything but the amazing coupons, which got me into a McDs for something other than breakfast for the first time in years, and regularly. Sadly they have gone severely downhill both in quality of coupons and value. Gone are the days of getting free sides with a sandwich purchase. Now they have public voting on deals to offer, none of which really save you much. Competition is fierce for fast food joints around my job and unless they go back to their old deals, McDs is dead last. The Wendy‚Äôs app offers way better coupons in comparison‚Äîmainly because they took customer feedback into account. Hoping McDs does the same.

title: This app is garbage
review: This is my first time using it and it will be the last. I ordered our food to be picked up but then once we get near the restaurant, the app automatically told the restaurant we were here to pick up our food and closed our order. Didn't even give me the option to choose how to pick it up. Then when I sent my husband inside to get it, they argued with us that we never paid for it even though we were literally showing them our actual bank statement saying that we did. Then we had to reorder everything and they STILL didn't get it right. This app is so bad that it turned me off to any kind of fast food pick up app there is. Waste of time, just order in the drive thru like a peasant.
developerResponse: {'id': 5987720, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Tiffa! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-11-17T23:43:49Z'}

title: Stole my money don't Mobil order
review: I used to love McDonald's, but now I won't go back. I used the app on a road trip to order my family's food ahead of time. When we arrived the restaurant lobby was closed. So we went through drive thru. The store was out of items I had ordered. They said to just pay at the window and the mobile order, the girl hadn't even received, would be cancelled. The cashier took my phone and did something. Ends up I was charged for the meals ordered on the app and paid at the window for what we got. Two different McDonald's stores I've asked to help with this haven't and the app won't let me reach customer service. That portion of my app won't work at all! Guess it's an hour on the phone for my money back. Ugh!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 5948485, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-11-15T00:07:42Z'}

title: Only use this app if you want slow service
review:
This app is fine... you can enter your order at your convenience and be sure to customize it the way you want. 
BUT it will not put your order through unless you are on property and it will put your order in the counter service queue rather than the drive through queue, which means it gets a lower priority. So you will sit while 15 cars go through drive through and get their food even if your order went through right when you drove on the lot. I see no point in ordering this way; it is way slower than drive through. 

Also no way to ask for side sauces, salt pepper that I could find unless you order nuggets. And I still had to ask for them anyway.
developerResponse: {'id': 4211139, 'body': 'Hi there! We always expect your service to be stellar. Having our staff trained and knowledgeable about our Mobile App is important to us. Please provide some more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can address this.', 'modified': '2018-07-12T21:14:48Z'}

title: Orders get stuck too often
review: Uninstall and reinstall should not be required to fix a stranded order. Several times a month I‚Äôm forced to uninstall and reinstall the app because for some unknown reason after I pick up my order it fails to clear from the app. No way to cancel or to say I already picked it up. When I try to place a new order it says one is already in progress, but it‚Äôs not. Provide a way to say an order was picked up or have an order time out after two hours just like if I never picked it up. Get me out of this loop.
developerResponse: {'id': 32592435, 'body': "it's very unusual that it would keep happening. we'll need some additional details to look into it, they can be sent here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-15T21:32:17Z'}

title: Horrific app and a SCAM
review: I had used the app over Uber eats directly a few times because they give you rewards points. Went to order a sandwich with the rewards points and they just didn‚Äôt send the food. Contacted Uber and they said only McDonald‚Äôs can help me. contacted McDonald‚Äôs and they said only Uber can help me (clearly not even fully reading my message) Finally got someone who pointed me to a phone number on McDonald‚Äôs where they then told me ‚Äústinks to be you. We won‚Äôt do anything because the points have no cash value‚Äù because of this I won‚Äôt be buying food from McDonald‚Äôs any longer. There is no situation where McDonald‚Äôs is my only option so I just won‚Äôt be selecting it any further.

title: I didn‚Äôt want to give them 1 star.
review: This app is absolutely horrible. So many times I have gone through the drive thru and told that my purchase did not go through the app purchase but once I look at my bank transactions there are 2 purchases for the same same thing on the same day at the same time. So I‚Äôm double paying for items. Also, the app can‚Äôt figure out that I‚Äôve already paid for what‚Äôs in my ‚Äúbag‚Äù and when I go to order it wants to put my previous order in my bag again. Another issue is I have so many points but can‚Äôt use any of them for a simple large Coke. McDonald‚Äôs could learn a thing or more than a thousand things from Chick-fil-A.
developerResponse: {'id': 31752807, 'body': 'that sounds like something we want to get fixed! tell us more here so we can look into this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-08-30T20:56:00Z'}

title: Terrible app, Terrible customer service
review: Unable to log in since most recent update. When trying to log in, I get an email with a link that doesn‚Äôt work. It just takes me back to the app to log in again. Endless time wasting loop. In the meantime, my earned points are expiring and I am unable to place a mobile order. Calling customer service is pointless as I have been told the same thing each time, but no resolve. Then I am transferred to do a survey on the call just to hear the survey greeting followed by ‚ÄúTransfer Failed‚Äù. It is unfortunate that McDonald‚Äôs does not seem to care about the issue as I have seen many of these same complaints in other reviews.

title: The anger this app has given me
review: You order on the app. Go through the drive thru and give your order number and think everything is peachy and then once you get your food half your order isn‚Äôt there. They just deleted it from your order and don‚Äôt tell you. Why would I drive all that way if my main sandwiches weren‚Äôt available!!! I‚Äôd go to a different location. This has happened to me three times now. And when you say anything to the employee they don‚Äôt know anything because to them it looks like your whole order is there. If a location doesn‚Äôt have an item, all other food apps take that option off the menu. Do better.
developerResponse: {'id': 31313353, 'body': "you should always receive your complete order! let's talk about this matter further here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html ", 'modified': '2022-08-06T17:42:05Z'}

title: So far soo good!
review:
Of course it depends the Mc Donalds you chose to pick up.. Some will say they dont have certain items you‚Äôve already paid for on the app and try to low ball you with something cheaper. But I recently change the location and others are deff more kinder and professional..
  I love it.

 Plus you get freebies. Every time you purchase you get free points added for another time.. love it.. You can redeem your freebies without purchases.
developerResponse: {'id': 31150361, 'body': "our service needs to be the best around. let's talk more here. https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html\r\n", 'modified': '2022-07-28T17:46:45Z'}

title: Doesn‚Äôt allow to log in or create new user.
review: I created account based on FB account. Now it says that user or password are wrong. Tried to create a new one with Apple user. I provide first and last name and the app keeps asking for my last name. I try to create account based on my mail, which is the one I have for FB, so it says I already have an account with FB. Doesn‚Äôt allow to use ‚Äúforgot password‚Äù. Did somebody test this awful app???
developerResponse: {'id': 18548506, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had, Rodrigo. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-10-18T16:36:00Z'}

title: Diane H
review:
I used this app almost daily in the past. For the last month or so I have been disappointed about the lack of variety on weekly deals. Except for the occasional daily deal the weekly deals do not upgrade at the start of a new week. The deals are the same every week now. I have tried reinstalling the app but they are the same deals week after week. Is this going to be a permanent change?

I have a recurring problem using my rewards points. The lunch & dinner items say ‚Äúnot available during breakfast‚Äù even though it is 2pm in the afternoon. I have to uninstall & reinstall the app every time.
developerResponse: {'id': 29892354, 'body': "we totally understand the disappointment! let's talk more about this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-05-22T18:39:20Z'}

title: Aggravating glitch
review:
Overall I think the app is great. Problem I have is that rewards don‚Äôt always update to the right time of day. To use rewards often I have to delete and reload the app so they will show available. Breakfast items often say not available for breakfast, lunch dinner items do the same, not available fir lunch, dinner. Just closing and opening the app doesn‚Äôt reset it. Have to delete and install. Like I said, aggravating.

I lost your response to get back to you on the issue. I have a screen shot of the issue of interested.
developerResponse: {'id': 29214054, 'body': 'we get how upsetting this is, Dan! please share more details with us here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-05-19T04:33:20Z'}

title: Nice app, needs more capability
review: McDonald‚Äôs was the early leader on great deals in an app. They‚Äôve definitely fallen behind. The deals now are average at best, the rewards program is one of the worst in the industry with expiring points at all different times based on when you earned them and not on last purchase like other restaurants. As with many of the best food apps there‚Äôs very limited capability to customize your sandwich; some things you can add or some you cannot. The Christmas deals are good for a change, and I hope that leads into an improvement in the app in 2022.
developerResponse: {'id': 26980548, 'body': 'The only way we can make this the best app possible is by getting all the details we can from you here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2021-12-22T04:02:35Z'}

title: Poor quality for such a large company
review:
The app doesn‚Äôt always clear out the order. Often I‚Äôll go back a week later from last order and the order I picked up and paid for is still in my cart and I have to reactivate the order to delete it. 
Second issue that‚Äôs VERY annoying; you have an option for half sweet/unsweet tea on both tea options. When I choose it the store can‚Äôt see it so I never get a half cut tea. It doesn‚Äôt show on their side. Don‚Äôt have the option if you aren‚Äôt going to accommodate it on the stores side!! But better yet, fit the issue because a lot of people want half cut tea!!!!

title: It has become trash
review:
I was "suggested" to download this app in a campaign in mainland China in late 2020 or early 2021. Took it 2 months to honor its App Store description of having English. Whatever, better late than never, I guess.

But recently (early September 2021) it started doing something completely unacceptable: it's changing the restaurant for the pick-up during the ordering, with one case where it changed it after the payment was completed.

This is unacceptable because nobody can divert to going to a different district to pick up an order. To make things even worse, every time this happens, the restaurant I actually want to get the order from is not showing up anymore. If there is a problem with the restaurant, cancel the the order! Or at least show a message telling the user that the restaurant chosen is not available.

And to finish the circus... Getting a refund involves sending screenshots of the failed order on WeChat and waiting hours or days for the refund to go through.

This app is now simply unusable.

title: App review
review: I have had the app for some time but haven‚Äôt used it. When I recently tried to use it, it said I couldn‚Äôt because it wouldn‚Äôt recognize me. I called and was told that someone would delete all of my information so I could download the app again and start over. I tried again recently on a new download but received the same message. I called today and was told that they had deleted my information but I would have to have a new email address to allow sign in. I don‚Äôt have another email address. The app is NOT friendly. I‚Äôm disappointed because I have grandsons who like you so I shop often. Not able to enjoy the deals and rewards.

title: Fix the glitches
review: Why do you have to keep signing in just to use your rewards or earn rewards but you don‚Äôt have to sign in to place an order and it‚Äôs having a goofy thing to sign in you have to keep putting your email and then you have to go to your email to be able to open it or it‚Äôs not even using the password that I set up keeps saying do you want to use the password that McDonald‚Äôs used for you last time and it‚Äôs a number but it still makes you sign in a different way using your email address or whatever form you signed up originally. The whole process is ridiculous why is it not just letting you stayed signed in ?

title: Used to have great deal and work well‚Ä¶
review: You guys used to have great deals, now it‚Äôs the same 5 revolving coupons instead of two for deals how about 2 bucks off a combo? Some people work erratic hours and don‚Äôt be if it from 2 for deals or 2 dollars off ten, why should I be punished because I‚Äôm too busy to have another person to share a deal with? Huge oversight in my opinion. Plus the app has gotten harder to navigate, and the up adds for your own food that come up when I‚Äôm tryin to use the app is a major pain especially if pulling up to the store and trying too use a coupon at check out.

title: Decent deals, easy to use... NO ARCH CARDS?
review: It‚Äôs not a bad app and has plenty of pretty decent money saving deals (although prices have increased just like everywhere)! Besides the occasional glitch, the most frustrating part is that McDonald‚Äôs is possibly the only fast food app that doesn‚Äôt allow you to pay with a gift card. Arch Cards are ‚Äúconveniently reloadable‚Äù... but you have to order and pay in person which defeats the whole purpose of the app. If you order with the app, you have to pay ahead with a credit or debit card. Get with the program McDonald‚Äôs!

title: Almost Good
review: App worked fine-Except to submit a deal. Then I would get location is closed-literally while in drive-up talking to an employee. Menu item not available and order never submitted to location.  Regular ordering worked great until my card expired and had to update to the new card-which was CONSTANTLY rejected so I could not order anything using the app. I‚Äôve had to completely uninstall the app and create a whole new account for my card to hopefully be accepted. I will try one more time before I completely give up on McDonald‚Äôs only because I like your coffee but this headache is not worth it.

title: Order not received
review: I placed my order and paid upon arrival, entered my curbside pickup space number and waited and waited and waited.....I went inside and asked the employees to cancel the order and refund purchase to my card. My card was not credited and I took my problem to customer service. Customer service was super nice but nothing was achieved as promised. No follow up by anyone. Capital One suggested working it out with the retailer. I called the store and spoke with the area manager. They have no record of my order and did nothing, but their very sorry. I have my receipt from the app but no refund. I hope there‚Äôs less bugs in the store!

title: Very unhappy with this.
review: Very unhappy about my experience with this app and the restaurant I ordered from. I ordered (and paid for!) dinner for myself, my husband, and our three children, and had my husband stop to pick up our order on his way home from work. The order would not be filled, because MY phone had to be at the restaurant for the order to even be acknowledged. I sent him a screenshot of the order confirmation, staff there was less than helpful and still refused to prepare food. A complete headache for my husband that was absolutely unnecessary. Take the mandatory location services off so a family member can pick up orders, please. Maybe I‚Äôll edit my review and add more stars.

title: Eh, ok if u dont mind paying twice
review:
The app itself is fine, but at least half of the time, it takes my money and then when i get there the employees have never gotten my order even though my credit card has already completed the transaction. More often than not its an argument at the counter even though i have proof or i have to give up and pay again.

Dont even think about using it at the drive through either. They don't communicate with the front cashier who actually has the order. This goes for all mcdonalds.
developerResponse: {'id': 21024114, 'body': "We're not happy with that. Let us get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-02-12T16:28:57Z'}

title: Slick app but deals clunky and have to share location
review: Competitor apps let me enter my location or nearest restaurant to access deals and info, why do I have to share my location in this app? The intrusive requirement to share my location is enough for me to remove this app. Deals are also confusing to use. Otherwise the ordering interface is fine. I Also don‚Äôt like that I have to arrive at the restaurant before you‚Äôll process my mobile order, this saves me no time, I may as well go up to the counter and order. I hope you‚Äôll fix these issues, then I‚Äôll consider using this app again.
developerResponse: {'id': 20140800, 'body': 'Hello there. Because we want to make the best app possible, the permissions are for the best functionality of present and future app features.', 'modified': '2021-01-03T16:19:52Z'}

title: Hasn‚Äôt worked for MONTHS!
review: I used to get coffee every morning before work and used the app to keep track of them for the free McCaf√©. IT HASN‚ÄôT WORKED FOR MONTHS!!! It signed me out, and when I try to sign back in, I get an error that the app is having technical difficulties and try again later. I finally quit going to McDonald‚Äôs and now go to Starbucks instead. After reading these reviews, seeing others complain about the same thing for months and the fact that it‚Äôs still not working, it‚Äôs apparent you don‚Äôt really care. I wish I could give zero stars, because that‚Äôs what this app really deserves. You keep asking reviewers for more information after they literally tell you everything they know. Figure it out.
developerResponse: {'id': 19200162, 'body': "That's not awesome to hear. Let's get that looked into. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2020-11-18T19:14:23Z'}

title: Bad service with incomplete order
review: I placed an order on this app... was told I had to do curbside pickup. I notified I was there and watched the entire drive thru line go by. ‚Ä¢While waiting I even saw two vehicles directed to wait and both those vehicles received their food before me and left. ‚Ä¢They also did not complete my order because they left out my McFlurry. ‚Ä¢AND I called the restaurant twice and they will not pick up the phone nor can I leave a message because the mailbox is full.  I would suggest you either go to the drive thru or use a food delivering app like DoorDash or Uber Eats. It at least allows you to notify someone and the time to place an order and actually get your food at home would take less time.
developerResponse: {'id': 18785630, 'body': "That's not awesome at all. To help us improve, please provide the location here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/.", 'modified': '2020-10-29T15:56:15Z'}

title: Deals and coupons
review: The app is easy to use unlike most restaurant apps. The customization is simple and overall it‚Äôs easy. However like some other people have mentioned I have also had problems with the deals and coupons. Today for example I went to redeem my free McCaf√© drink and the app crashed. Because the location has its dining room closed due to COVID I completely loss the deal. This has also occurred when redeeming other deals as well. But overall it‚Äôs good.

title: Critical app issues
review: I‚Äôve had this app for a long time. When I upgraded my iPhone from a 10 to the 11 I transferred all of my apps. A few days later I went to place an order and the app had a banner alert saying critical app failure please restart the app. So I did. And when it reloaded the same message came up. I restarted it a few more times to no avail so I decided to delete and reinstall the app. However the same issue persisted. The app won‚Äôt locate any stores anywhere. Nor will it allow me to log in. I‚Äôve looked at a few different forums and it appears this happens with iPhones across generations.

title: Second time they have lost my mobile order
review: This is the second time my mobile order has been lost. It always happens during busy times and always happens when I select drive thru (I was just informed by the very apologetic employee that they gave my order to someone in front of me). So I think the problem is when you go through the drive-thru. I will plan on selecting curbside in the future to avoid this.

title: UPDATE: Glitches fixed Doesn‚Äôt work
review:
UPDATE: the app seems to work well regardless of my location. Previous glitches and issues seem to be fixed. The app experience has largely improved. Rewards and daily deals are deeeeecent too. 
 
(If you read that in Bubbles voice you‚Äôre living life right) 

The app simply doesn‚Äôt work so many bugs and glitches. Have never been able to successfully place an order. No known rewards or benefits to using this app. Don‚Äôt waste your time or your phone space with this worthless download.

title: Wonderful App!!!
review: We have been using the app for several years now. It works flawlessly and its indispensable for me and my husband.  We are lovin‚Äô it! My husband really enjoys the ability to order a Senior Coffee almost every morning using the App.  Please note that he told me that Senior size no longer appears on McCafe selection.  Is this an error?  Should it still be an option?  He is still able to order Senior Coffee at the Drive-Thru but that defeats benefit of the App.
developerResponse: {'id': 15243927, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this. We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks.", 'modified': '2020-05-11T14:24:58Z'}

title: Payment Problems
review: I was a frequent user of the app, having four teenagers.  However it started rejecting my payment methods. Now it will accept none of my payment methods. I have deleted the cards and re-entered them without any improvement. In addition to that issue today it would not even let me add a payment method. If it were not for this issue I would read it five stars, but since I can no longer use it, it drops to a 1.

title: Only worth downloading for a month
review: It used to be a five star app, and had the best coupons for any restaurant app. After about a month those coupons disappeared. Burger King always has large sandwiches for $.99 all the time on there app. Plus the same coupons as Mickey Dees, but BK has buy one get one free WHOPPERS and three dollar double whoppers every day. this app is buy one get one for a dollar?! Updating review I guess they didn‚Äôt like my last review because they signed me out of the app, and I am no longer able to sign in from my email. They say they do not recognize it. If I try to start a new account they say I already have an email associated with McDonald‚Äôs. The runaround‚Ä¶
developerResponse: {'id': 9761919, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-07-20T22:00:41Z'}

title: App does not provide coupons
review:
This is the worst app. Every time I try to use it there is a problem and your managers don‚Äôt make it any better because they can‚Äôt seem to honor the coupon that‚Äôs right there.

Tonight is the second time I‚Äôve gotten a notice saying I‚Äôve used the deal  then be told to come back sometime later. Tonight it was 30 minutes. I have not used this app in over a week. Maybe you might want to lift that time restriction. It‚Äôs maddening, waste my time and I‚Äôm forced to take my business elsewhere. The last time this happened I was in at the window to pay and I ended up paying full price for my order. They didn‚Äôt give me a coupon I‚Äôm sorry or anything. Please fix this app. Now you are - stars.
developerResponse: {'id': 4110066, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-06-13T09:02:05Z'}

title: Love the app but, needs one feature
review: Hey McDonald‚Äôs lovers. This app is amazing from deals to saving favorite items. Also Apple Pay is a win. This is the best thing in fast food. The only thing missing in this app is being able to add Mac sauce!! I can do it at the restaurant but not in the mobile app. I just ask this to be an option when customizing different foods. I love Mac sauce on the mcChicken or even just their other hamburgers without the extra bread. Thank you!
developerResponse: {'id': 28832826, 'body': "there's always room to improve. let's talk more here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html\r\n", 'modified': '2022-03-28T15:54:31Z'}

title: Love the idea but need ppl trained properly tho
review:
I placed my order at 12:50. I picked curbside pickup 4. Waited til 1:15 and still nothing. Went inside and asked what‚Äôs going on. Apparently, they gave my food away to someone else. Please please please. If you‚Äôre going to give us this service (which is actually pretty brilliant) then properly train your people. They shouldn‚Äôt just give out food randomly to anyone who said they had ordered. Or check the dang screen. I was sitting in pickup curbside 4. If the workers are not going to be trained correctly, then please take that option out. Me waiting 30 minutes for McDonald‚Äôs food should not be an option. 

Also, if you‚Äôre going to make a huge mistake like that, comp the meal or apologies. I got neither. Awful.

title: Ridiculous
review:
Ordered food and confirmed I was at the location only to be told my order didn‚Äôt confirm payment through though on the app as well as my bank statement saying otherwise, therefore the workers refused to give me what I paid for. Now I have to call corporate in the morning and start whatever painfully annoying process it‚Äôll be. Last time I bother using this app and probably going to McDonald‚Äôs. 

Update: I Called the next day and was told my money would return to my account within 24 hours. I have waited three days, but still have yet to see the money back on my account. Will be calling again today, I did however get a call telling me I would be getting a gift card in 7 business days or so.
developerResponse: {'id': 3344574, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can assist you with these issues.", 'modified': '2018-05-06T10:07:43Z'}

title: NEVER COMPLETES ORDER!
review: Why does this app never complete orders through the drive-thru? I‚Äôll order and pay on the app .. am OFTEN asked to pull ahead even though I PRE-ORDERED, and then the app NEVER completes the order. So .. next time I go in to order .. that order is there telling me I I need to pay for my order, again .. even though I have emails saying I payed. It‚Äôs not quicker. It‚Äôs not easier. Only reason I use it is the rewards and unless some something improves I won‚Äôt be using it anymore. App orders should be done first, otherwise what is the point in doing it that way? ??

title: Great but could be better!
review: I love the curbside ordering, but the system is a pain. You order ahead of time, but they don‚Äôt start prepping your order until you actually arrive, and then it‚Äôs a 5-10 min wait. Most places that do curbside service charge the card when you originally place the order, and it‚Äôs ready by the time you arrive. If it‚Äôs cold because you took too long to get there or whatever, that‚Äôs on you‚Ä¶
developerResponse: {'id': 27681177, 'body': 'we aim to make the best app we can for you. help us get there by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-01-26T17:55:43Z'}

title: Glitchy, requires location for too much
review:
When the app works it‚Äôs pretty fantastic. 

Unfortunately, it requires location access for everything - including just reviewing order history. With location enabled, it still pushes to a new order over any function and it takes extra work to just get to the screen I wanted. 

Additionally, I have been charged for orders that weren‚Äôt mine, and finally I uninstalled the app when I opened it to order and it just started adding several items to my order as I was watching the cart. I deleted them all and uninstalled the app at that point. (The not-mine orders and the random add happened on the same day.)
developerResponse: {'id': 27929363, 'body': 'we want to take a look into this. chat with our mobile app team about this by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-02-08T20:57:37Z'}

title: Let me login with a password!
review:
McDonald‚Äôs is a great franchise, and I‚Äôve been eating from there as long as I can remember, probably like a lot of us. I haven‚Äôt had many issues in my tenure of eating there, it really any.

However, this app causes more than a little frustration. For one, let me log in without having to go use my email that doesn‚Äôt make it easier at all and I promise nobody is trying to hack into my McDonald‚Äôs... Second, I‚Äôve made orders and gotten to the restaurant to find ive been logged out of the app and it says I have no recent orders. 

I love y‚Äôall but that really holds me back from coming back as much as I‚Äôd like to.
developerResponse: {'id': 26041981, 'body': 'We want to make the best app we can for you, Sky. Contact our Mobile App team at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2021-11-02T18:25:16Z'}

title: Almost useless.
review: I‚Äôm not sure what the purpose of the app is, particularly the order-ahead features, considering I typically have to call to finish my curbside pickup order and/or argue with the rep at the drive-thru that I placed the order to begin with. I thought it was just bc of my location, but after traveling I‚Äôve realized it is not. This time when I ordered, the person told me the orders don‚Äôt even come up ‚Äî so had I not called after 15mins of waiting, I would‚Äôve never gotten my food. Please fix this issue. You can easily move into the 21st century with everyone else ‚Äî Wendy‚Äôs, CFA, etc. You just need a better system.
developerResponse: {'id': 24741375, 'body': "We want better for our customers! Let's discuss this further at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-08-26T18:16:44Z'}

title: Horrible App and Service
review: Restaurant did not prepare order although my wife gave them the order number.  I placed on my Mobile App and sent my wife the order number. She gave it to them at drive up and they told her to drive to next window. She sat in line over 11 minutes to be told the order would not be filled because my cell phone was not present.  This is ridiculous.  They told her she had to drive back around to place a new order and wait in line again.  This is horrible service.  This has never happened to us with any other restaurant or store app.  Chik Fil A would have never turned away a mom trying to feed her family.  Shame on you McDonalds.
developerResponse: {'id': 24986500, 'body': "We get how upsetting this is! Let's talk more here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2021-09-08T17:07:06Z'}

title: Can not do customizations for drinks or food
review: This app needs to have better options for customizing drink and food orders there should be place to write in specific things for example light ice for drinks and be able to request Mac sauce to be put on burgers or extra crispy fries. Just to name a few. I have to call the restaurant to request this things to be done before I can pick up and it is very annoying for me and for the restaurant to be able to answer the phone to make sure an order is correct when it can be done through the app. Other apps have this feature I don‚Äôt understand why yours does not!

title: Unauthorized charges!
review:
Do Not Download or Use This App! 
Two times in a row, Friday and Monday, I attempted to order a cup of coffee which cost $1.68.  Both times, the manager at the pickup location told me the order did not go through, and I had to pay cash.  Both times, I was charged a different, larger amount for an order at a different location, in Pennsylvania and Michigan (I live in Hawai‚Äôi).  McDonalds has no way to cancel or refund an erroneous charge made thru the app, so I will have to dispute it through my credit card company.  I will be deleting the app after I resolve these charges.  I also don‚Äôt plan to patronize McDonalds again due to their lack of responsiveness to customer billing issues.

title: App needs fixed
review:
I had been using this app for about a month or two. And then went to use it one day and it would let me. It kept telling me to restart the app, so I deleted and reinstalled it and still I couldn‚Äôt use it. Finally, I just uninstalled it. I just thought I‚Äôd give it another try and still, I‚Äôm unable to use the app. At the top it pops up that ‚ÄúApplication Initialization critical error occurred, please restart app.‚Äù I have done what it‚Äôs asked multiple times, and still it says the same there and won‚Äôt let me login. 

Is anyone else having this problem or had this problem and fixed it??
developerResponse: {'id': 20984543, 'body': "That doesn't sound too good. Please contact our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so they can help you solve any issues you're having with the McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2021-02-10T21:25:36Z'}

title: Useless...
review:
What is the purpose of being able to order ahead for pick-up if they don‚Äôt even start preparing the order until you check in at the!? If I‚Äôm going to have to sit outside and wait for somebody to prepare it and walk it out to me it would save me hassle and time to just drive through the drive thru and just place an order.

Also... who‚Äôs bright idea was it to make it so that you can only pick up the order if you have the phone in hand that the order was placed on!?Literally ever other fast food app or pick-up app I have ever used will allow you to pick-up with the order number or allow you to designate an alternate pick-up person.

title: Terrible
review:
For months now, I haven‚Äôt been able to even open the app without it crashing. Now, I‚Äôve finally been able to open the app, but can‚Äôt login or create a new account. It just keeps telling me that there are technical difficulties. I have deleted and redownloaded the app so many times and I just can‚Äôt get it work. Something is broken on your end and needs fixed. I haven‚Äôt gone to McDonald‚Äôs since the app has been broken, since the app has been the only reason that I choose to go to McDonald‚Äôs (for the good deals). It makes no sense why nothing has been fixed for months now. 

Update: STILL cannot use the app because it won‚Äôt work. I don‚Äôt get how this is not fixed by now. It‚Äôs ridiculous.
developerResponse: {'id': 18250203, 'body': "We're sorry to hear you are having trouble. We'd like to look into this further. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2020-12-02T21:41:47Z'}

title: Poor store management
review:
Store under staffed during quite busy dinner rush, customers having very long waits for their order to be served. This store especially has become less than desirable since the store ownership changed recently. Long waits for service and then for the order itself are common here.

Plus, it looks like the new owner is scrimping on order technology and maintenance. Screens are down or functions fail or equipment like ice cream dispenser fails. Very poor example, not what is expected form McDonalds.
developerResponse: {'id': 4618056, 'body': 'We‚Äôre sorry to hear about this. Can you provide some more info here?  https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html', 'modified': '2018-08-11T17:11:28Z'}

title: Annoying!
review: Even though I have a certain store marked as my favorite it still tries to make me go to another one (its inside of Walmart). Also, if I order chicken nuggets from the Walmart store they‚Äôre $5.00, but if I order them from my favorite, they are $5.50. So now I‚Äôm paying MORE because I‚Äôm going to my favorite?? I‚Äôm almost to the point where I‚Äôm going to drop the McDonalds App and start going to Wendy‚Äôs instead. Also, I like the small dehydrated onions and there‚Äôs no where for me to ask for these on a quarter pounder instead of the slivered onions. So frustrating!
developerResponse: {'id': 18679755, 'body': "That's not a great experience with Mobile Order & Pay. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-10-24T16:04:46Z'}

title: Ok but can‚Äôt order the same items as in store
review: I prefer to use the app to order, especially as dining rooms are closed right now. My kids many times will get a cheeseburger kids meal. That item specifically isn‚Äôt offered on the app, or at least at my locations. At first no big deal, I just added cheese to a hamburger meal. Now that is no longer an option either and there isn‚Äôt a way to customize an item outside of the set items the app allows. The McDonalds I go to does have cheeseburger kids meals as an option when I go through the drive thru though so now the app is essentially useless to me unless the kids change up their order.

title: App isn‚Äôt working
review:
For two weeks now, my app cannot log in. It says there are technical issues, and I need to restart the app. I have closed it and reopened it, as well as deleted the app and Downloaded it again. Nothing is working. This is frustrating as I have not been able to use my app for 2 weeks. 

Also, when the app does work, it shows certain items as available when they are not at my local McDonald‚Äôs. For example, fruitopia (a beverage) is not offered at my local store. And it‚Äôs odd that I can‚Äôt get a cheeseburger happy meal, only a hamburger meal add cheese or a 4 piece jugger happy meal add 2 nuggets.
developerResponse: {'id': 16717138, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-07-18T18:16:09Z'}

title: Great when it works
review:
The application will suddenly shutdown randomly or just freeze up and hang during the checkout process (when arriving at the destination). Restarting the app ends up still stuck in the same place with my order in limbo as traffic backs up behind me. 
The other irritating problem is that it won‚Äôt let me create an order and then go back to check or change the location. When I go back to verify that it picked the closest location (which doesn‚Äôt always happen) I have to rebuild the order. Other than these annoyances, it‚Äôs great when it works.

title: Has some malfunctions
review: This app would be perfect and convenient if it worked correctly. Whenever I order from the app, there always seems to be something  wrong with the order. And then whenever the cooks get the order wrong I always have to wait in the car for 10-20 minutes. Unless you enjoy getting the wrong order and having to wait in your car for a while, this isn‚Äôt the app for you. But the staff does offer complimentary breakfast sandwiches or hash browns when the order gets mixed up which means I get it all the time. This all started when I started using the McDonald‚Äôs app.
developerResponse: {'id': 14787936, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Amya. We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks.", 'modified': '2020-04-20T13:56:28Z'}

title: I like the deals.
review:
There are usually coupons for just about anything; free bogo sandwiches for breakfast or later and coffee punch cards for buy 5 get one. I find the punch cards are not reliable. I scan the QR but it doesn't always show on the card. Coffee is only $1 so I don't care much but if I was counting more expensive drinks it would make a difference.

There is supposed be a deal to get a virtual card punched for 5 coffees and then one free.  Frequently it does not punch the card. It is never clear when the kiosk will accept the scan.  I have bought at least 3 coffees which were not tallied.

I called the mobile app help line and she couldn‚Äôt help me with the problem.
developerResponse: {'id': 12142834, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had. We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-12-02T20:37:21Z'}

title: Great App, but not for all locations
review: I like the overall concept of the app and it‚Äôs convenience, but there is one bad apple (location) that ruins this for all... the 4500 block of 34th Street South in St. Petersburg, FL. This place is absolutely awful when it comes to using this app. I would have given 2 stars, but the food is not compromised by the exceptionally poor customer service. I pre-ordered, pulled into the #1 spot and watched more than 5 vehicles leave before I got my order who arrived after me! I had to walk inside to get my order that was just sitting on the counter. This location will cause me to start going to BK!

title: I‚Äôm lovin‚Äô it!!!
review:
I love the fact that you can order through your app and everything is paid and you can pick it up curbside. They bring it right out to you. The only thing I wish that would change is the amount of sauce you can get with nuggets or chicken because even if it only comes with two, sometimes you want to extra cup and there‚Äôs no feature to do that

Everybody has been super friendly also when they bring up the meal to you. 

Great job Mickey‚Äôs!!!!! I‚Äôm Lovin‚Äô it!

title: Training or better integration needed
review: Hard to say if the problem is with the app or the staff at the restaurant, but we‚Äôve tried to use the mobile ordering 4 times and 4 times we‚Äôve had to go inside because it didn‚Äôt work as advertised.  A couple of the times, it wouldn‚Äôt let us check in from the mobile parking spot.  Another time it wouldn‚Äôt accept the credit card payment even though we verified it had been entered correctly.  Another time, everything seemed to work, but the staff didn‚Äôt make the order even though when we went inside after a ridiculous amount of time, the order was up on their screen.  They didn‚Äôt know where it came from or what to do with it.

title: Mobile order is faulty
review: I love the coupons on the app that I can scan in and the tracking of coffee orders.  However, the mobile order function is garbage.   I ordered two different times and both times the app said to head to the McDonalds, but once I got there there was no record of my order.  I opened my app and I could see both the order number and order submission time stamp, but the items I ordered were still in my shopping cart area and it said that I exited before completing my order.  How is that possible after submitting a credit card and getting a successful order message?  It‚Äôs possible because the programming is terrible.

title: Crashes often and super glitchy
review: I have tried on many occasions to use the app to preorder food in an effort to save time going through drive thru. Every time there‚Äôs a different issue that causes the app to fail. Once, the order went through but the store didn‚Äôt receive it. Another time the order wouldn‚Äôt complete due to an issue with the system at a different store. The latest few times, the app has crashed when I try to add items to the bag. Ironically, even when trying to contact tech support through the app, the drop downs and message field won‚Äôt work so I can‚Äôt type a support request. I‚Äôm on an iPhone X running the latest OS version. Hope it gets fixed, but for now it‚Äôs not worth the headache.
developerResponse: {'id': 3845115, 'body': 'Oh no, Tammy! Most times this can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give us a call, so we can look into this further at 1-877-334-4332.', 'modified': '2018-06-14T21:34:05Z'}

title: This is a kiosk not a mobile ordering app
review:
You can‚Äôt expect a business man to spend 10-20 minutes waiting on the order he placed 10 minutes ago. The process is I order my food online (Panera, Starbucks, etc....) I pick the store I want to get it from on the map then I go there and pick it up. 

McDonald‚Äôs try‚Äôs to pass theirs off as a mobile order but it‚Äôs just a glorified geofences kiosk you‚Äôre no batter waiting in line because your order doesn‚Äôt actually show up to be cooked until you get there inside the place. By then I could have just left and ordered my food in line. Same wait time. For a multi-billion dollar industry you sure cut corners on this one. 

Get with the times or lose my lunch money to your competitors.

title: Problems with points can be fixed by logging off and back in again.
review: I just did it now. If you have any problems displaying points or rewards. This was a problem I had with my Apple IPhone 12 Pro. Anyone else please do the following. Log out and then sign back in again. It will update the point system. This happened to me after IOS16 was installed. Hope this information helps people.

title: Useless and frustrating app
review: Last night we left McD‚Äôs parking lot without placing an order because we couldn‚Äôt using the app. At first, I had to sign out and close the app before I could start a new order (it thought an order from weeks earlier was still active). After additional repeated attempts, I was never able to access my ‚Äúbag‚Äù to complete the order and pay. And it wasn‚Äôt the first time I‚Äôve experienced similar issues with the app. On top of the app problems, it isn‚Äôt uncommon to find employees at McD locations who don‚Äôt know how to manage mobile orders. I won‚Äôt be wasting any more time with the app, and possibly with McD after finishing this review.
developerResponse: {'id': 33374282, 'body': "that's never what we want to hear! tell us the details so we can look into this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-11-25T22:14:43Z'}

title: Ugh bugs bugs bugs
review: My original app quit working so I deleted it and reloaded the new app, unfortunately the app now won‚Äôt even let me log in, it keeps making me re-register but then says I‚Äôm not entering a valid email address.  Have been trying for days to get back in but always the same error massage ‚Äúenter a valid email address‚Äù. On top of all that I‚Äôve lost all my rewards points too.  Guess no more McDonald‚Äôs for us.

title: Not able to for payment
review: I had been able to use this app for payment over several months, and enjoyed that feature. Unfortunately, the app has stopped processing payment for me. I‚Äôve done the reloading of the app and the credit cards, but nothing seems to work and the response I got from the McDonald‚Äôs site was canned: it was apparent that the person responding had not even read my email carefully.

title: Glitchy and messy
review: The app is kinda hard to use. It lets your Oder food when the restraunt isn‚Äôt taking mobile orders, it keeps your orders on the app days after you pick them up so you have to reopen the order, manually cancel each item, then open a new order before you can even start ordering and the feedback submission button doesn‚Äôt even work. You can press it a thousand times and nothing happens. I guess they handle complaints by just not allowing them to be sent in the first place? Even if you are able to get an email from the store, they won‚Äôt respond at all. Pretty disappointing for a company that is as large as McDonald‚Äôs.

title: Older Versions So Much Easier Sign-In!!!
review:
I HATE THIS NEW VERSION OF THE APP!
Every *@#*% time I try to use it, I am put through the STUPIDEST ‚Äúverification‚Äù of my identity In order to just sign in and order!  Really!
The ‚ÄúAlternative Log In Options‚Äù APPEAR TO DATA-MINE my social media accounts - sign in with:  ‚ÄúGoogle, Facebook, Apple‚Äù.
Just STOP IT McDonalds!!!!!

Now I must go to an email ‚Äúlink‚Äù, wait for email to arrive, (oh yeah, the Wifi at this McDonalds doesn‚Äôt work quite right - so go to settings and turn off WiFi so only LTE supplies data) now my emails s  l  o  w  l  y download - wait for it - OH HERE‚ÄôS A LINK TO YET ANOTHER SITE!  R U KIDDING!

What non-existent ‚Äúproblem‚Äù are you trying to solve?

I‚Äôm at the point that it‚Äôs NOT WORTH IT to try to use your mobile app....  You can have my ‚ÄúReward points‚Äù!  Screw it!

There are SOOOO many other restaurants in my area.
developerResponse: {'id': 25775442, 'body': 'We want your Mobile ordering to be quick and convenient. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. \r\n', 'modified': '2021-10-19T16:28:45Z'}

title: Work on pick up details
review:
Havent been able to actually get curbside pickup yet. The app will never recognize that I am at restaurant. And yes, I have location setting on.  I get as far as trying to choose my pickup method and am informed that I am not as restaurant yet. I have to either go inside or through drive-thru, so what‚Äôs the point.

I also suspect that when this happens it is possibly because none of the crew have actually accepted the order in the system. I just waited 15 minutes inside to pick up my order.  Uber might have been faster.
