title: Was a good app, until it stopped working
review: This app will no longer work for me anymore. It‚Äôs laden with error messages everytime I try to login or order. Uninstalling and reinstalling the app did not work either. I‚Äôm very disappointed in it, and have stopped going to McDonald‚Äôs because I can no longer access the special discounts. I will start going again if I can get the app to work again, but I don‚Äôt see that ever happening.

title: New version of app
review:
Beware if you travel out of state you may have your app changed to a version that has not even been released for consumer use. Once it has been changed you no long accrue your free Moca frappes or get credit for your purchases. I Called the customer support line for the app and all she told me, sorry there is no fix and you can not revert back to the old version. But the new app will be released some time this year!!!!  Well that‚Äôs good news. Dose not help out now. None of the McDonald‚Äôs we went to in state or out of state didn‚Äôt even know about the app. No customer service. Big Corp. VS the little customer. 

Until SOMETIME later this year I guess.  Well see.

title: Not worth the trouble
review: Downloaded this today so I could pick up some fast food while running errands. After adding payment method during checkout, it sent me back to the main page, and prompted me to ‚Äúreopen‚Äù my order in order to actually submit it.  After I finally did submit the order, it kept giving me an error and told me to show the order to someone behind the counter. After 10 minutes, the store never received it. Had to cancel the order and place it at the counter, so having the app was useless. Maybe it works sometimes, but it‚Äôs not worth the trouble to me.

title: Awesome app with a glitch on deals
review: Awesome app and I preferred to go to McDonald‚Äôs after started using the app. Great deals through this but it has glitches because sometimes it keeps holding some old information and will not allow to use a deal, even if I used a deal days back. Also even after the order has been picked up, it shows as if the order is still active. I usually just cancel it to remove.
developerResponse: {'id': 21043618, 'body': "Let's get you back to those deals, Sam. Try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn't help, please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2021-02-14T16:58:59Z'}

title: Best mobile ordering app I've used.
review: This app has everything I can think of that I need. I love that I can customize my order including NO BUN. Why haven't other chains figured this out? Since I discovered this I've been buying much more often than I previously had. Curbside pickup? Yes please! Skip the line in the drive-thru and put it in park. In a few minutes a masked person is standing at your car with your food. Can it get any better?
developerResponse: {'id': 20897587, 'body': 'this is music to my ears üòé üëä ', 'modified': '2021-02-06T17:17:40Z'}

title: Coffee machine doesn‚Äôt ever work
review: It seems like every other mornin The coffee machine is broken I went this morning ordered in advance and went to park in space 3 waited for over 15 min watched car after car go thru drive thru I understand that she might have been alone or busy but she should have once I got there came out between cars and brought me my order I finally had to leave it made me late for work they do this all the time I hate this McDonald others do not do this
developerResponse: {'id': 15904685, 'body': 'Hi there. It sounds like this visit wasn‚Äôt quite up to speed. Please provide some more info in this link https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/ so we can address this. Thanks!', 'modified': '2020-06-10T15:22:25Z'}

title: App does not communicate with store
review: I placed a mobile order from home, went to the store and entered my curbside pick up space once in the parking lot.  I waited 15 minutes before going into the store to find they never received the order.  I sent this feedback through, and received an email response blaming my internet connection though I was on WiFi at home and data from the parking lot.  I also received a credit card charge and an email receipt.  This defeats the purpose of the app.  Also, the menu is poorly organized, and the order number doesn‚Äôt show up in the app, which I learned at the store when trying to find it to show them.

title: Broken
review: App does not work on ios14; iPhone 11 max. It says to check my internet connection when looking for a McDonald‚Äôs. As soon as the app is opened it gives an error stating to close and reopen. I have even deleted the app twice and reinstalled it. Then you still don‚Äôt offer security on the credit/debt cards. My account was hacked and you never contacted me to tell me. An order was placed and paid for in a completely different state. Luckily I got the email receipt and was able to hit card my card immediately. Then you would not refund the money, the bank had to and it‚Äôs not the bank‚Äôs fault you don‚Äôt have proper security controls in your app for the payment section. That‚Äôs kind of shady. Get it together.
developerResponse: {'id': 18623707, 'body': 'We want to get you connect to the app. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.\r\n', 'modified': '2020-10-21T17:36:46Z'}

title: Issues every single time
review: We‚Äôve used this app 3 times and we‚Äôve had issues each time. The first time we went curbside and it took 20 minutes for our food to get there. The second time we decided to go through the drive thru since they seem to be moving faster, and they asked us to park in the reserve area to wait for our order, which too 15 minutes. We tried to give the app another try and this was the worst. We went thru the drive thru and when we clicked on the app that we‚Äôre there it said we weren‚Äôt. The error message said to show it to an associate. A manager looked at it and can‚Äôt figure out how to get our orders in. It even had the order number on the app! So frustrated.

Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-08-09T18:46:31Z'}

title: Other developers take note!
review:
This app is so well designed and thought out. 
The menus and methods of ordering and customizing your order as well as looking at the latest deals is perfect! As a result of this app and the mobile ordering, I eat at McDonald's much more frequently then I did before. 
Also, just a quick shout-out to the staff at all of the McDonald's restaurants: you guys are pros! I have always found the staff at all of my McDonald's restaurants to be very friendly and very fast at delivering your food!
developerResponse: {'id': 5981245, 'body': "We couldn't agree more! In fact, we think the McDonald's Mobile App is the best thing that could have happened to your phone!", 'modified': '2018-11-16T23:57:06Z'}

title: Worst App Ever!
review:
Unable to change email address so tried to make a new account. Nope. Tried new email address and the app told me it already exists. Tried forgot password. Nope. Said the email address does not exist. Tried to login using Facebook. Nope. Screw it.... don‚Äôt need the headache. I‚Äôll use the other burger apps. No problem changing email address on one other.

Update: they told me to uninstall which I did multiple times already. Then install McDonalds global app. Did that. Won‚Äôt work in the USA. Made me install the same crap app. And guess what happened? Same. Bye McDonald‚Äôs. If we can‚Äôt change our email address then forget it it‚Äôs really not a problem to visit the others who had no problems letting me change my email.

title: Unable to look up order, unable to pick up food for others
review: I sent my boyfriend to get kids meals for my kids when they were home sick. Rather than texting him the order and having him try to enter it while driving, I ordered and expected that he could pick it up. Unfortunately this app fully relies on location services to actually send the order. So even though I clicked the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù button when he arrived, the location never received my order and couldn‚Äôt look it up. The guy working the register relied on my screen shot to re enter my order, got everything wrong. And now who knows if I‚Äôll be charged for it? Annoying! Come on McDonald‚Äôs, put some more thought into this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 13610217, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, Linzy! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-02-20T16:25:59Z'}

title: Below average
review: I thought this would be helpful in avoiding drive thru time but it is not. The app is presented as a way to order ahead, but that is not the case. I was on the road in front of McDonalds but the app rejected my order, with the message that I was not at the restaurant yet. There is no difference between ordering at the drive thru and ordering with the app. The wait time is the same. Also, the app does not even give descriptions of the food, so user must know what is included in each meal! Ridiculous. I may have tried meals if I knew what they included. Also, the ordering process is not quick. There are too many steps. This app is like a 90s internet  nightmare.
developerResponse: {'id': 12135036, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had, Scott! We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2019-11-30T16:47:44Z'}

title: Horrific User Experience
review: Tried a mobile order and have never been treated more poorly.  I was told to park in dedicated parking spots, but the lot with those spots was closed and no signage what to do.  After checking in and completing to charge me, the staff came out to tell me they don‚Äôt have what they just sold me.  I was told to cancel the order in the app, which is impossible after they completed charging me.  We inquiring where they claimed to cancel theY shrugged it off.  Go call corporate.  So I was out of my money and received no food :-(  After wasting 30 min back and forth and being ignored it took involving a local police officer to get a manager to try to mitigate.  The user experience is horrific and I will never user MacDonals again.

title: Crashing with iOS 13??
review:
The app has been working fine, but, since yesterday, it‚Äôs crashing and closing every time you open it up!?  NOT MY FAVORITE!

UPDATE:  After the 5th day of crashes, and updates to the latest iOS (still not working), my wife suggested that I just uninstall and reinstall the app.  That WORKED!  I‚Äôm not sure what was initially wrong, but, with the reload, I‚Äôm back in business!  
Now, if they could just ‚Äúfix‚Äù that 60-minute timer (only one coupon per hour!), so we can feed the whole family in one visit...!
developerResponse: {'id': 11045914, 'body': 'Oh no, Jim! Most times this can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give us a call, so we can look into this further at 1-877-334-4332. ', 'modified': '2019-10-06T02:05:55Z'}

title: Smooth app but ordering take fewer steps
review: I love the app, a I am really enjoying only that for my case when I open it is to order from the menu. This make take fewer more steps, I wish I could be right up front and first thing you see is Start your order, specially when I‚Äôm in a hurry I wan to order and see my favs right there easy to pick. However, I have to applaud this app well designed and very smooth to operate and still super user friendly. Congratulations on this app. Thumbs up.

title: Needs built in survey
review:
I love this app and have been eating more McDonalds because of the deals.  One thing that would really make sense to to incorporate a survey to take after your visit.  Similiar to the survey offers you find on receipts.  Grading the food quality, cleanliness of location, service of employees, etc.

Another idea has to do with customizing your order.  I wanted to order two sausage egg mcfuffin without the bread (muffins) but it wouldn‚Äôt let me.  I felt that could be improved.

Overall, it is a great app and really the first fast food app that I have used.
developerResponse: {'id': 5887518, 'body': "Hello! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2018-11-10T23:34:23Z'}

title: Needs Store Cooperation
review: This has some good coupons and worthwhile. It‚Äôs easy to use. However like every other retail app, it won‚Äôt really work until the zombie employees are replaced by robots. By the way, is the 2 for $4 McMuffin only if you get the rubbery ham instead of sausage ? And if I Apple Pay on the way and then arrive to find that the location was out of a product I purchased then am I just supposed to ‚Äúeat it‚Äù which is actually to say Not Eat and not get refunded ? I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs a rare occurrence...

title: DO NOT USE THIS APP
review: If you‚Äôre thinking, hey this will be a convenient way to place an order, this app is not for you! If you select a location for your order you assume that‚Äôs where it goes right? NOPE! If you get to the location listed on your receipt and try to give them your order number they will tell you there‚Äôs no way for them to locate it. If you call customer service to figure out how to get a refund, they will tell you to wait a couple days and contact your bank because they are completely incompetent and don‚Äôt understand even basic customer service. Let‚Äôs be honest, no one goes to McDonald‚Äôs expecting Chick-fil-a food quality or customer service but you do expect the bare minimum. YOU WON‚ÄôT FIND THAT HERE!

title: Deals offered do not work
review: I love the deals offered on the app, but they never work. It shows that they are participating restaurants, but I am unable to use them on a mobile order or scan them in the restaurant. The employees and managers agree that their systems do not communicate the deals. They have to do a manual discount. It is awkward and embarrassing to attempt to use the deals, so I gave up on it 6 months ago. Tried it again today without success. McDonalds needs to get this fixed.

title: The time saver
review: I love this app because it saves time at the ordering station.  Just drive up give your number to the person on the other side of the speaker.  Drive-through no questions asked. you don‚Äôt have to wait for credit card approval. You don‚Äôt have to wait for the person to be making change and not having enough change in the drawer and having to open more coins.

title: Great app... when it works üòí
review:
I first downloaded the app last year because a McDonald‚Äôs just opened a store across the street from my subdivision.  Back then it worked great!  Lots of great coupons and the app seemed flawless.  However, in the last few months, it‚Äôs been very buggy.  While I don‚Äôt have problems with my store seeing a mobile order like others reported (thank goodness), I find the following to be really buggy:

‚Ä¢ Deals sometimes don‚Äôt load.  Have to logout and back into the app for it to load.
‚Ä¢ Not ALL the deals load.  Same remedy above works.
‚Ä¢ Mobile ordering often says my store is closed... when it‚Äôs not.  Usually have to reboot my iPhone for it to work.  Happened on my 7+ and on now on my X.
‚Ä¢ Mobile ordering items reports the store doesn‚Äôt have, but if I go in and order they have it.

Honestly if the bugs are squashed, this app/service has great potential.

title: Started out great but...
review: This was a 5 star app when I first downloaded it a few months ago - awesome weekly deals. Now the deals aren't very good, have too many exceptions in the fine print, and almost every deal results in a "not valid at this location" error for every location in my area, despite saying they are participating restaurants.  The mobile order and curbside pickup has been a great convenience while recovering from a medical condition. (Be sure to check in on the app after placing your order, otherwise you won't get your order.) Overall, what started out great is becoming a disappointing waste of time. Using it less and less.

title: Negative Review - App Is Terrible
review: Stupid app glitches all the time. When I order it glitches the most. Currently at a McDonald‚Äôs and ordering the old school way because this app canceled my online order. When I clicked re-open order I got a loading screen for 5 minutes. When I canceled the unresponsive app and opened it back up it crashed. Tried 10+ more times and app wouldn‚Äôt open, just crashed every time. I‚Äôm a competent person too. This is so frustrating. And tbh the app has been this faulty for over a year and I‚Äôm finally at the point where I need to write a review about it. This is a negative review. Please use it as feedback and fix your app, McDonald‚Äôs.

title: App is broken
review: Just like the previous reviews from the last year, the app is still broken. It works for the first couple months just fine. Then you start to build up rewards and get ready to redeem your points. Then for whatever reason the app no longer lets you login and says that there has been a critical error. Not going to bother even trying to deal with the corporate IT people after seeing how useless they are in all of the other reviews. Sad but unfortunately the app is broken, and there‚Äôs nothing the users and customers can do about it. Don‚Äôt let it frustrate you, as it is happening to all users it seems like.

title: Took my money and didn‚Äôt get my order
review: Second time I ordered through the McDonald‚Äôs app was yesterday at 10:31 pm. I worked 3rd shift at circle k expecting my order to come because the app took my money and said it was picked up and will be at the store 10:56 pm. Then at 11:25 pm I got a text saying ‚Äú Hi Vivian. Unfortunately, your order from McDonald's has been canceled. Please check the McDonald's app or website for additional details.‚Äù  I was very upset because my order was 40 piece nuggets and a free large Carmel frappe off of my points. Which is 4500 points for. Didn‚Äôt even get my points back for it. But thankfully, Taco Bell and my DoorDash driver came in clutch. I‚Äôm disappointed in McDonalds. I want a refund.

title: Vienna McDonald‚Äôs Is The Best
review:
Went to Vienna WV McDonald‚Äôs last Wednesday. It was the cleanest, most like home dining experience ever. They took fast food to the next level. 
I usually eat closer to home, but missed my turn. Drove down the road 2-3 miles and stopped at the Vienna McDonald‚Äôs. It was definitely worth the drive. 
I told the manager how nice and homelike their store was. She thanked me. Then the owner came out and thanked us too. 
We will definitely drive the extra 2-3 miles to dine there again.

title: Needs updates
review:
1. The location history needs to be prompted before you order to make sure the McDonald‚Äôs is correct.
2. The app holds on to old orders and forces you to cancel them before starting a new one. 
3. Finding items to order is very cumbersome and the app can be hard to navigate- see Chick-fil-A for better experience.
4. Many times the app doesn‚Äôt know if an item is out of stock at a specific restaurant.
5. I would rather have better deals like $1 premium sandwiches or frappes than okay deals plus the points reward system.

title: I love this app
review: Unlike other fast food apps, McDonalds actually gives us a reason to use their app. The deals are great and it runs really smoothly. The only issues I‚Äôve run into with this app are due to restaurant errors. The app itself works great. The employees at the McDonald‚Äôs across the street from my work do a great job. I typically put in my order and click ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù as I walk to their store. The food is always ready within minutes.

title: Needs work
review:
Still needs work with its customization.  Still near impossible to customize certain sandwiches, both breakfast and lunch menus.  Also, how difficult is it to add an option to order a small, medium, or large water?  You just cant do it from this app, making it impossible to make a mobile order to pick up at one of their parking spot pick up points.  Also, once the order is placed, you can‚Äôt order it at the drive thru.  You have to get all the up to the pick up window and ask them for it, which slows down the whole process.  Kinda backwards.  

Keep tryin, guys.

title: Stuck on last mobile order
review: The app functionality has improved over time but I still have issues with my mobile orders closing out after picking up the order at restaurant. Seems a step is missing when restaurant closes the order on their end or maybe the app user has to close it which does not make sense since no other restaurant app I have seen requires for the user to close the order on their end. When I reopen the app to place a new order it‚Äôs still stuck on the last order showing pending pick-up. It would be great if you can fix this.

title: Charges my card a higher amount
review: On several occasions, McDonald‚Äôs has charged my card the standard price for items when I‚Äôm redeeming deals and the app tells me a discounted price. I look carefully at the checkout page before placing the order, but then when I get the order confirmation email or see the charge on my card, it is way more than the amount it said it was charging. Oh and I‚Äôm not talking about sales tax differences when picking up at a location other than the one on the order. For me, the $.99 coffee deal becomes $2.09, because it didn‚Äôt apply my deal. Happened a while ago several times, and it happened again yesterday.

title: Glitches still there‚Ä¶Useless dinosaur app‚Ä¶
review: The app does not work anymore for me at all. I will not sugar coat anything, it is useless at this point. It still logs you out each and every time you attempt to use it. Mysteriously, every time I am close to a McDonalds, and try to open the app to use my rewards, it doesn‚Äôt work, until, I am away from the location. Useless piece of sh@t. You‚Äôll have to go in to their locations physically, which still is a nightmare to get through inside. Uninstalled yet this time for good. All the money this company makes from the customer and it cannot get an app to consistently work? Yeah, everyone uninstall this unless garbage immediately!

Try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn't help, please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2021-12-11T11:17:00Z'}

title: Works great, until it doesn‚Äôt anymore
review: Title says what I‚Äôm writing, the app is great, convenient, and better deals than you can get from face value menu prices since the quality of food and service never got any better and the prices went up for everything being the same. I understand inflation so I am a fan of using the app if I want McDonald‚Äôs. A lot of glitches I‚Äôve noticed in the functionality even with updates it still is bugged out. If it was smoothly running 5 stars more trouble than not most of the time though.

title: McDonald‚Äôs app does not work
review: Totally worthless app. Have only been able to get it to work one time and that was because I pulled it up at home before we got to the restaurant. The app will either tell you to keep hitting refresh or tell you that you have already used the coupon (even though the coupon had never been used.  In the restaurant we are not able to pull up anything usually!  So, we have missed out on several points because of these issues. Also, the feedback area inside the app doesn‚Äôt work either. I filled out all the info and then it kept telling me to search the app and nothing works or comes up!  Fed up!

title: Scam
review: I lost all of my points, I had enough to last me for awhile but the apps server got switched over to a new one and I lost all of those points now I have an issue with every single time I try to use the app in store or in the drive through the app kicks me out and I have to resign in but when I do all of my points are gone. The only way I am able to use the points for even the basic one dollar fries I have to order it online before I even get to the restaurant and that‚Äôs usually a waste since the store usually has a habit of ‚Äúnever getting that order‚Äù when I don‚Äôt pay online. They need to fix a lot of the issues before I redownload.

title: Not a time saver if picking up
review: I like the idea of ordering in advance. But they won‚Äôt start preparing your meal until you are at the store (and the app tracks how close you are so no cheating). You may as well wait in line. This was frustrating as my first and only time using the app, I had hoped it would save time. It did not and I had to leave before our family‚Äôs order came up because the wait was quite long and we had a ferry to catch. And no way to cancel the order from what I can tell. Wasted $25 on a meal we didn‚Äôt have time to wait for (we were another 10 minutes out).

title: Refunds
review: This app works great. However the inability to process refunds in stores or through the app makes no sense. Several times at the least 5 I haven‚Äôt gotten a refund for drinks when the McCafe machine was down. With the latest being my purchase on 6/1/21. The store says they‚Äôre not responsible and the app refers your complaints to the store. This is a reason I won‚Äôt use the app or eat at McDonalds until it‚Äôs resolved. I work hard for my money and well this franchise is worth way more that me financially.

title: Needs More Order Customization
review: The app worked well and ordering is easy. My overall experience with it isn‚Äôt too bad. The biggest issue I do have is with the order customization options. Your only options are to keep or remove the specific ingredients for the menu item. This is an issue for people with allergies, including sesame seeds. I could choose to remove the sesame seed bun but not replace it with a regular bun. If the app would allow for more option when customizing an order, it would be a big improvement.

title: Just do the drive thru!!
review: So I was in a hurry today and decided to order and pay in advance in hopes of saving some time. I was hoping to just pick up my daughter‚Äôs happy meal and go. Yeah, that didn‚Äôt happen. In fact, they filled my order LAST as I stood there and waited for them to fill the drive through and dining room orders- even the people that ordered after I arrived. And all I ordered was a HAPPY MEAL! SERIOUSLY! From the time I ordered and paid, it took them 40 minutes to make a happy meal!!! Don‚Äôt waste the extra time using the app to order. And btw, it‚Äôs not any more contact less than the drive thru. In fact it‚Äôs worse because you‚Äôre inside waiting in line with people.

title: Can‚Äôt even sign up for an account
review: Tried to use the app off and on for awhile now. Unfortunately the app will not allow me to create an account. Every time I open it up my hope of creating an account is smashed. Deleting and reinstalling does not work. Guess there are better apps/places out there that can be used to curb my fast food cravings. In my opinion, don‚Äôt bother installing this because it‚Äôs not worth the time.

title: Worst app that never improves
review: This app rarely works and it‚Äôs always that the store sees the order but they are never given that the payment was cleared. I ended up with my AMEX charged 12 times and they still couldn‚Äôt see the order was paid! Worse, McDonald‚Äôs apparently doesn‚Äôt care and no improvements over two months. We stopped going because we can‚Äôt get food without the store demanding we come inside in a pandemic.
developerResponse: {'id': 20006867, 'body': "Sounds like you've had some difficulties with your payment, Vickie. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can get this looked into for ya. ", 'modified': '2020-12-26T19:52:53Z'}

title: Doesn‚Äôt work. Restaurant not recognizing order
review: I checked out on the app, went to the restaurant as instructed and checked in but it says I couldn‚Äôt check in because I wasn‚Äôt in the store even though I‚Äôm literally standing inside.  Then the staff said my order wasn‚Äôt in the system. They tried but could not find a record of it. I checked to make sure it‚Äôs the right location. This app doesn‚Äôt work. Don‚Äôt place order on it. Just go directly to the store. I don‚Äôt even eat McDonald‚Äôs often and when I do, of course the app doesn‚Äôt work. What‚Äôs the point of even creating this app when you can‚Äôt even place orders on it??? So much for conveniency. It‚Äôs the 21st. Keep up!

title: initialization critical error on iPhone
review: Had the app for a few months and was working fine. Then one day, the app asked me to log back in. I enter all my login info, but it does nothing. I‚Äôve deleted and reinstalled the app so many times, and still the app does not let me log back in. I‚Äôve also tried to make a new account, but does not work. I can navigate to some pages in the app, but when I want to place an order, search deals, or find location, the app takes me back to the login page. it‚Äôs been like for over a month now. Getting real frustrated. I‚Äôve read online, that I am not the only one having these issues. Wish they‚Äôd fix it!
developerResponse: {'id': 20693512, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that, Rachael. Let us look into that. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-01-27T19:42:49Z'}

title: McCafe points
review: Overall it‚Äôs a great app always helps with savings. Works at most McDonald‚Äôs, but lately I‚Äôve been having alot of trouble with my McCafe rewards and it not applying my point to the buy five get one free. I‚Äôve also experienced trouble with using my free McCafe points with it not wanting to take and is hoping that this issue will be resolved. Sincerely a loyal customer,And healthcare worker which by the way thank you so much for the free meals during this pandemic.
developerResponse: {'id': 18129513, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this. We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please share more details with our Mobile App team at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html. Thanks!", 'modified': '2020-09-27T21:13:32Z'}

title: Useless App.
review:
I‚Äôm so disappointed that it‚Äôs been MONTHS since McDonald fix their app. I‚Äôm not the only one experiencing this log in issue. Yet, nothing is being done about it. Countless of reviews saying they are having issues using the app and all the dev is doing is asking them to provide more information? How do we know what issue YOUR app is dealing with? 

I genuinely prefer Mcdonald‚Äôs over any other fast food and earlier this year (prior to Covid) it was working perfectly fine. It might be the updates but it completely disabled the function of this app. Either way, this app is just useless. Don‚Äôt waste your time trying to even log in. The second you open the app, there‚Äôs a banner saying there‚Äôs an error.

title: Can't order unless location services are working
review: When I order fast food through apps I am usually at home and a family member drives to pick it up. Every other fast food app allows me to manually check in and override the location check so that I can order at home and a family member can mention my name at the drive through and pick it up. Some food apps don't even require location at all. I did not know this was not possible in the McDonald's app, the app says instead I have to physically be at the restaurant with the phone and location services turned on to verify. App does not accommodate all situations in which someone would be using and ordering through the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 18483543, 'body': "Hello, Matt. We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2020-10-14T18:07:51Z'}

title: Job well done :-D
review:
My mom and I were gonna get lunch from McDonald‚Äôs & instead of going through drive-through I decided to try the app and after placing my order and typing in the number of the curbside we‚Äôll be waiting at & it said that our order will be ready in 5 minutes. After 5 minutes the employee brought out our food & drinks and of course we had to wear our face coverings before we receive our food & drinks and I must say this McDonald‚Äôs app is amazing!
 :-)
developerResponse: {'id': 17583767, 'body': "We're so glad to hear you had such a great experience with us. Swing by for your faves anytime the craving hits!", 'modified': '2020-08-30T16:14:51Z'}

title: Order is never received when ordering through the app
review: I have ordered through the app numerous times. I like the contactless order process but EVERY time I come to McDonalds, it says I am not at that location and will not pull up my order. I have gone through the drive thru, I have gone INSIDE the restaurants and it still does not register that I am at the McDonald‚Äôs location. Service is not the issue as I have great mobile service. I do not understand why this happens every time I order!! It takes literally 10 minutes of me rebooting my app and restarting my phone for the order to appear!! I am finding out that using the app, it takes 4-5 times longer than if I was to order at the window.

title: Needs update
review: Tried to place a large order for gathering with many children. Used my phone for the order since I was paying and had another family member try to pick up the order but they couldn‚Äôt because they didn‚Äôt have my phone. Don‚Äôt understand why they needed to have my phone for the order pick up if already paid for. I tried to give them the order number and the restaurant location wouldn‚Äôt process it.
developerResponse: {'id': 8358886, 'body': 'Hi there! While we understand your experience should be a flawless one, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We will make sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate team. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-04-24T22:28:29Z'}

title: Sorry to rant
review: I placed a mobile order thinking I was going to pick it up in the location next to my home. double checked the address after ordering it, the app told me my order was in a location 11 minutes from me at a location  I was not familiar with. I decided I would just drive to that other location and not make a fuss about it. When I got to the location the parking lot had potholes everywhere as I tried to pull into the drive-through area I dodged one pothole but hit another. it cracked my tire so badly it immediately went flat. I have to wait 90 minutes for roadside assistance, I can‚Äôt even get my order as I sit outside in the parking lot . Only the drive-through window is only open. üò≠

title: No refunds
review: Decent app for the corona times but beware you can‚Äôt get refunds for items you order that the store is out of.  I placed a mobile order at the McDonalds in Bay Minette AL and was then told they were out of hamburgers.   I left with nothing and assumed my order would be cancelled but later saw the $15 charge on my credit card for the order I never got.  I first tried to cancel/contest the order through the app but there was no option for that and then called the store manager who said they can‚Äôt cancel orders or credit back funds for orders placed through the app.  Would have been nice if they‚Äôd told me that while I was there  as I would have at least gotten our fries, drinks, and happy meal items that I paid for.
developerResponse: {'id': 16255358, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-06-27T21:22:00Z'}

title: Double Charged
review: I used the mobile app to place an order and pay for my order using Apple Pay. When I arrived at the McDonalds to pick up my order, they said the app did not show paid and required me to pay again. I showed the manager the Apple Pay transaction and was assured all would be corrected automatically if I was doubled charged.  A few days later, however, both charges cleared my bank. After calling the local McDonalds and the corporate customer service line, I still had to dispute the charge with my bank.  The local restaurant also charged me a higher price than the app because it did not honor the coupon I used in the app.  This app produced a very disappointing consumer experience.
developerResponse: {'id': 12627025, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-12-28T22:34:33Z'}

title: I‚Äôm seriously done with McDonald‚Äôs.
review: What‚Äôs the point in having an app that doesn‚Äôt work? Every time I place an order, drive to the McDonald‚Äôs and try to use the curbside it tells me there‚Äôs an issue and to try again. So every time I try again it just says the same thing until eventually it says there‚Äôs a problem with the payment method. Then I try to enter in a new payment method and it won‚Äôt let me, giving me the same ‚Äòsorry there‚Äôs an issue, please try again‚Äô message. It charged my card the amount but won‚Äôt let me use any of the options to pick it up without giving me the error message and telling me to enter a new payment method.

title: Unauthorized charges
review:
Last night going through my emails I noticed two receipts from McDonald‚Äôs in New York (I‚Äôm in Dallas), apparently my account was hacked. I immediately changed my password and locked my credit card. I tried to delete the credit cards on the app but could not. Today after calling in we figured out you can swipe left on each card to remove. Developers should make this clear under ‚Äúpayments‚Äù. 
Customer service made no offer to delete/void or refund fraudulent charges that were still showing as ‚Äúpending‚Äù on my credit card. I was told to call my bank. 
Be aware, at least in my case, the app isn‚Äôt secure and if unauthorized charges are made expect an apology but no refund...
developerResponse: {'id': 8398500, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay, friend! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-04-26T17:42:47Z'}

title: A person not happy with the app
review: Why can‚Äôt you use a paper coupon on the app...and the deals aren‚Äôt single people friendly....most are BOGO... one person can‚Äôt eat 2 sandwiches ....I would like to see more deals for money off a single item... I hope the new app is a improvement...I had a lot of mishaps in the past like charging me twice for an order, changing location from the one I put in to pick up... order not being right ...just to mention a few...

title: Nope
review:
Had the app on my iPhone XR. Went to use the app and it said I needed to update it in order to keep using it. Updated the app and now when I try to open it, it immediately closes. App is totally useless now.

Update, I was told to delete and reinstall the app. I did. It will not allow me to use the app unless I turn on notifications. If I select do not allow, it takes me right back to the ‚Äúturn on notifications‚Äù screen every time. I shouldn‚Äôt have to turn on notifications to use the app. Deleting for the second time.

Another update, this time I DID elect to get notifications. App still takes me back to ‚Äúturn on notifications‚Äù screen even though they‚Äôre already turned on! SO FRUSTRATING.
developerResponse: {'id': 7737697, 'body': 'Oh no, Carla! Most times this can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give us a call, so we can look into this further at 1-877-334-4332.', 'modified': '2019-04-16T12:19:39Z'}

title: Not using this anymore.
review: So I made a purchase on Friday morning and the app once I got close to the McDonald‚Äôs I buy from I had to chose my pick up options. But when I tried to it kept telling me that there was something wrong with the connection. Mind you I had already paid for it. When I got there I showed the cashier the purchase and what the application was saying and she insisted that it didn‚Äôt go through so I would have to reorder and pay there. Well I did only to find out later on that I was right and I had paid for my order twice. Once in the app and another at the McDonald‚Äôs. Yeah I‚Äôve had too many issues. I‚Äôm not longer using this again or buying from McDonald‚Äôs again. Strike three! I‚Äôm out!

title: App is completely unusable
review: I had been using this app for quite a while and the newest update has made the app completely unusable. It puts you into an endless log on loop. Attempt to log on with Facebook, as I did before and instead of logging me on it takes me to a registration page and tells me that the email address has already been used on an account. I didn‚Äôt select Register, I selected Log In. Facebook then says I‚Äôve logged into the app before and I select Continue. It again takes me to a page where the only button is Register and gives me the message about the email already being used. Tried deleting the app and reinstalling and get the exact same response.

title: Best McD‚Äôs
review: The Butler Rd. McDonald staff go out of their way to make my day the best. They have often taken those extra steps that shows excellent customer service. One time, for example, I ordered a Diet Coke from curbside. When Viola came out, she saw it was me. I always order a lemon in  my Diet Coke. She went right back in the building without me requesting she do so and brought out my drink‚Äîwith a lemon. I really could go on and on about those type of examples I have experienced. They are not just another fast food place.
developerResponse: {'id': 6170243, 'body': "That's great to hear, Cami! Thanks for the feedback.", 'modified': '2018-11-30T00:00:45Z'}

title: Awesome Experience
review: The person Who took my order was so friendly after I ordered two drinks and when I asked for three cookies he said great choice. I just thought that was so nice to hear. I asked his name and he said Alex. The gentleman that was at the backWindow had such a great smile on his face And was also very friendly. It was nice to see that for me since I have had a long day. They experience tonight when I went through at 5:30 PM was amazing.  Thank you to all who work at the McDonald‚Äôs on 169 in Mankato Minnesota
developerResponse: {'id': 4517521, 'body': "We must be hearing the same tune, because that's music to our ears! Swing by for your faves anytime the craving hits!", 'modified': '2018-08-03T22:23:48Z'}

title: Can‚Äôt add payment
review: I‚Äôve had many issues with this app, but most of the time after multiple attempts I can get it to respond. Not this time. I‚Äôve just updated the app. I tried to order and noticed my old credit card was saved. I tried to save the new one. It won‚Äôt take it. I went in the store & paid for the order with that card, so the card is good. I got a manager to help, and she couldn‚Äôt get it to work either. She suggested deleting the app and then downloading it again. Tried that too, and the card still won‚Äôt add. I tried saving another card and it won‚Äôt save that one either. A couple of times it crashed during all this. I really enjoy mobile ordering, but this isn‚Äôt worth it.
developerResponse: {'id': 5760081, 'body': "Oh no! We're sorry you're having troubles adding a new payment method! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so they can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-11-01T13:32:54Z'}

title: Okay but annoying
review: I have used the coupons on this app a few times and i love it. The only thing is that you can‚Äôt view the coupons unless you are already at a restaurant. It‚Äôs a pain to have to check to see what the coupons are while you‚Äôre in the drive thru. I have tried to get around this by clicking on locations and then a mcdonalds near me and i see 2 of the deals at this location, but when i click on All Deals, nothing is there. I would be encouraged to use the app more if i could see the available coupons without having to be there.

title: Make All Stores Honor the Deals
review:
The app is slow compared to ordering at the counter. Sometimes the pay function works; sometimes it doesn‚Äôt. Sometimes it recognizes your location; sometimes it thinks you‚Äôre at the last store. 
The only reason to use the app right now is to get the deals, so when you get to a store, bring up the deal you want, and only then are notified that ‚Äúthis deal is not supported at this location‚Äù, it‚Äôs a big disappointment. 
If you can‚Äôt make a location support the deals, at least put a notice up front saying ‚ÄúNo Deals‚Äù so I can make a decision whether to go elsewhere before getting out of my car.

title: Punch card
review:
I love the convenience. Generally the app works pretty well but a big problem is that the coffee punches don‚Äôt always credit correctly if I purchase more than one. For example I purchase 4 and it records 2 punches. Or one time I purchased 5 iced coffees and it recorded one punch. That time I did contact help and they fixed it but I don‚Äôt want to call every time. 
Anyway, great concept especially since I‚Äôm addicted to sugar free iced vanilla coffees, just need to fix the quantity punch card issues. Thank you
developerResponse: {'id': 3788151, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this, Janet! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-06-10T22:39:27Z'}

title: Problem -  food customization and condiments
review:
Works well in general but is very frustrating because I can‚Äôt go to the mobile order curbside when I need extra condiments or extra salt or pepper things like that there is no where in the app to type that, from what I can see.

also, in the store kiosk, it allows you to choose light lettuce, but in the app it‚Äôs lettuce or no lettuce, so if you‚Äôre wondering why I leave a little pile of lettuce next to the mobile order curbside, that is why:)
developerResponse: {'id': 3775780, 'body': "Hello! Our goal is to make sure our customers enjoy using our app and your feedback will help us understand how we can improve it for our customers. We are continuously working to improve our McDonald's Global Mobile App.", 'modified': '2018-06-08T20:50:25Z'}

title: Kudos devs
review:
The App works exactly as it should, making a profile and ordering and paying. The app rarely ever crashes and the GUI is set up to be as convenient and easy to use as possible. Finding a store is done for you though you can choose and the app ends up giving you more information than the store from the road. 
McDonald‚Äôs devs have made a genuinely better product than for example Starbucks or Wendy‚Äôs

title: Can‚Äôt report missing items
review: We all know that McDonalds has a hard time getting your drive-thru order right for some reason. There needs to be a place in the app to report missing or incorrect items. Instead, I‚Äôm supposed to call the store and hope I get through to the someone? Then what, I have to drive back down there to rectify the situation? I should be able to get credited for these missing items in the app. If you‚Äôre willing to take my money in the app, then you should be able to refund it back to me in the app when I don‚Äôt receive what I paid for. This seems very intentional to exclude this feature from the app.

title: The app is good but the service
review: So fast to order anything easy to pay options. But I wish the service could be the same. It takes about 20 minutes to get your food, and besides no napkins, straws or ketchup. When I asked for them, they seem to get mad. Personnel need to have better attitude,  may be an app attitude, positive and fast.  When picking up on drive through you pay and they send you to park on the side because they are so slow and un efficient that takes 20 minutes to give you your fast food hamburgers.
developerResponse: {'id': 32624007, 'body': "that's not the service we expect for you! send us a chat here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html ", 'modified': '2022-10-18T01:15:16Z'}

title: Order doesn‚Äôt gets delivered
review: Ordered through the app for curbside pickup, kept waiting for 20 minutes and then called to be told the order will be there, waited another 15 minutes and called back to be told they don‚Äôt have staff and was asked to come in drive through queue now. The store was locked and had to spend another 20 minutes to pick the order from the drive through queue.
developerResponse: {'id': 30603786, 'body': "we want better for our customers! let's discuss this further at: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-06-28T14:43:45Z'}

title: No cash kinda wack
review: How come I can‚Äôt use cash I can only use my card to accumulate points? Super lame because I normally always have cash but when I use cash I don‚Äôt get the points. Super lame. Plus half the time when I have money on my card the cashier says the form of payment doesn‚Äôt work -_- (& no it‚Äôs not because I don‚Äôt have enough funds to pay for the balance) so I wish they would update or change it. I miss out on tons of points‚Ä¶freebies keep ppl coming back don‚Äôt chya know?

title: It‚Äôs okay when it works
review: It would be an easy four stars if only it knew what time it is.  On numerous times I've had to delete then reload the app because it would tell me that the "big mac" was not available at breakfast time, and it was 6:05PM!  The same would happen in the morning.  Deleting the app and reloading has been the only solution.  Chic-fil-a is the five star benchmark to get to.  Good luck, but you have a ways to go!

title: Logs me out
review: I love this app I really do but every month or so it logs me out and this month it has logged me out and won't let me back in. Every time I try logging in it says that it's not registered on my phone and I need to click the link in my email. Thats fine. However, whenever I click the link, it sends me to a page that just tells me, again, that I need to click the link in my email. It doesn't offer any other link or way to get back in on my account. I have rewards points that are about to expire that I would like to be able to claim. Please fix this problem.

title: Glitch on app. Incompetent employees
review:
I attempted to order through the mobile app and it said there was a problem on their end and to go to the counter to complete my order. 

I go to the counter and the employee tells me that their system is down. So I couldn‚Äôt get my order and pay for it at the register. So I basically couldn‚Äôt receive the deals I ordered through the mobile app. 

I ended up not ordering anything. Probably for the best anyway. McDonald‚Äôs is bad for you. Deleting this app.

title: Isn‚Äôt reliable
review: Most days it tells me ‚Äú There is an issue with your order. Please speak with a crew member in the lobby to complete your order.‚Äù Not very convenient when I am going though the drive-thru! I have ZERO plans to go inside! Also, when I attempt to use ‚Äúreward points‚Äù I get charged for my *free* item because the app is NOT RELIABLE! If it could just actually WORK on a regular basis that would be nice! I would prefer to skip McDonalds all together because it‚Äôs too much hassle but I have teenagers who buy their own food‚Ä¶. Too bad they don‚Äôt drive! Come on McDonalds. Fix your app or kill it! App version 7.1.2
developerResponse: {'id': 28719359, 'body': 'reliability is a must. kick a few more details our way through the link: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-03-22T14:14:29Z'}

title: Time zones
review: Sooooo am I the only one who opens the McDonald‚Äôs app in the evening and it‚Äôs only showing breakfast items and deals being available and vice versa?? Originally I thought it was because the app needed to be updated but even after the updates it happens. I see that you all access our location, so why does this happen so often? I‚Äôm literally unable to use this app like I want to because of this issue. That means rewards and deals that I‚Äôm constantly unable to use which causes me to go else where to spend my money.

title: Quality
review: The app seems to work ok at local franchise but the quality of the food I get has declined significantly since I started using this.  My fries are always cold and stale; the McNuggets are usually dry, cold and taste like cardboard. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs because the food is free or if there is simply no quality control by staff.  I was going 2-3 times a week after initially installing. Yesterday I went for the first time in more than 30 days and food was even worse than my last visit. I now limit my purchase to the $1 beverage.  Everything else is a waste of money because it‚Äôs cold, dry, stale, tasteless and disappointing.
developerResponse: {'id': 27995367, 'body': 'fresh and hot are absolute musts with us. get back to us in more detail here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html\r\n', 'modified': '2022-02-11T17:09:04Z'}

title: Too many glitches.
review: I really want to give this app a better rating, because I use it so often and it‚Äôs better than most other fast food mobile apps. But this app crashes constantly, never seems to update or refresh even if I close the app, sign out or even uninstall/reinstall. I get very short breaks at work and I rely on this app to order what I want in just a few moments, yet I would say I run into issues probably half the time. The worst glitch is trying to start a new order but the app thinks you still haven‚Äôt picked up your previous order. PLEASE fix the glitches.
developerResponse: {'id': 27599044, 'body': 'we want to look into this. leave a few details with our mobile app team here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-01-22T18:08:35Z'}

title: Only getting worse
review:
Update: this rewards screen has me locked out of the app and will because I don‚Äôt want to sign up for rewards to view your menu. This has literally stopped me all from ordering at McDonalds for the last two months. Don‚Äôt force your users into things. Truly awful. I think you all should be ashamed of the crap you let into this app. 

Original: The app is only getting worse. I literally can‚Äôt even order food using it because it keeps thinking there are open orders. It also regularly just is bad or tracks me when it doesn‚Äôt need to... truly awful experience and it was the opposite six months ago.

title: Customer service isn‚Äôt good
review: Be careful when ordering on the app because if you don‚Äôt get part of your order no refund is available, you must dispute the charge with your bank. For example, I ordered a spicy chicken sandwich along with fries and a drink. When I got the order I only had fries and a drink. The cashier said they were out of spicy chicken so I said a regular one would be fine. The manager said they couldn‚Äôt substitute anything and that she couldn‚Äôt give me a refund, I‚Äôd have to take care of it myself. There is no way to get a refund on the app, so you have to involve your bank. I had to order a regular chicken sandwich and pay again. Terrible customer service.

title: Butabumbumbum
review: Deals are good months ago they were better but just like anything more people use this worse the deals get. Like a McChicken $1 what kinda deal is that. Now buy 20nuggets get 2 fries free when they first came out with it pick any size well who is going to get a small of corse your going to get large fries now it‚Äôs either 2 small or 2 medium fries. But still good save 4 bucks. So put some better deal Ronald McDonald LOL but kids love it so I love it

title: Worst app out there
review: When this app came out, it was great. But they keep making improvements to it that actually make the app worse to use, in its current state, I would give it negative stars if that was possible. Under the current app it no longer uses passwords to sign you in, to make it easier on the user, it sends you an email to login. Once you click the email, it sends you back to the page to put your email in, which it sends you another email, and the circle goes on an on. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE McDonald‚Äôs, let me just put my password in, you are not making things easier, you are making them worse, just bring back passwords!!!

title: Good deals
review: Great deals where I am. Almost any sandwich is $1 everyday through September except signature crafted. I am not sure what that other person was talking about in one of the last reviews where you can‚Äôt see the coupons when you are not at the restaurant because I have always been able to see them wherever I am with my phone. Maybe they don‚Äôt have location services turned on and the app is only working when they are at McDonald‚Äôs with McDonald‚Äôs Wi-Fi
developerResponse: {'id': 4140954, 'body': "We're so excited you feel that way, Bruce! Thanks for exploring our awesome app!", 'modified': '2018-07-08T20:58:41Z'}

title: Boo! Boo McDonald‚Äôs, Boo!!!
review:
I give this app one star because it completely failed me. I downloaded the app because I was late for work and was trying to save some time. I figured like Starbucks, if I ordered 10 mins ahead it should be done or close to by the time I got there.

NOPE.

Not only was it not ready, they didn‚Äôt even get my order until I walked in the door.

Boo! I was later to work because I had to wait 5 mins for my sandwich which should have been done already. Bad implementation, poor description. I was late no thanks to you and your freshness. 

Ps, nobody eats your cheap food because it‚Äôs fresh, they eat it because it is cheap, fast, and convenient. Your food is the most unhealthy thing I allow myself to eat and it‚Äôs purely out of convenience. McDonald‚Äôs is not my first choice, EVER, in anything. Stop trying to be Applebee‚Äôs and go back to giving me my cheap, artery-clogging chemical-soaked cancer burger. I don‚Äôt pay your high school dropouts to fail at making a gourmet burger. If I want gourmet burgers I‚Äôll make it myself.

title: Don‚Äôt know why I even bother
review: This app is pure trash. It sits on my phone and I haven‚Äôt used it in years because it won‚Äôt allow me. I keep it on my phone hoping that it fixes itself and I can again use it one day. The app is always saying ‚Äútechnical difficulties‚Äù if it even allows me to open it and navigate it at all. Usually it shuts itself off before I have a chance to do anything. It won‚Äôt allow me to log in. I would use this app all the time if I could, I used to use it all the time. One day it just stopped working completely. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling it and that did not work. I just want to be able to use the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 21295657, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that, Thomas. Let us look into that. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-02-25T17:14:40Z'}

title: New rewards points
review: Great app. A few glitches occasionally. My only issue is with the new rewards points you‚Äùearn‚Äù with every dollar you spend. The issue is you can‚Äôt use your rewards points if you select a deal. My wife and four children buy a lot of food from McDonald‚Äôs and to me if I ‚Äúearn‚Äù a reward it should be in addition to any other purchases or allow multiple rewards to be redeemed for being a loyal paying customer. After all I ‚Äúearned‚Äù the points.
developerResponse: {'id': 21043477, 'body': "Heya, Shad. We're always working on an even better App that you enjoy using. Thanks for helping us out.\r\n", 'modified': '2021-02-14T16:42:47Z'}

title: No size choice? No way to customize what is on something?
review: Since I‚Äôve been using this app it‚Äôs gotten worse. When I first got the app I had issues with the inability to order ahead unlike with other fast food apps, but as of recently I have realized that you 1. can not customize what‚Äôs on a sandwich anymore and 2. If you‚Äôre not ordering a meal you can‚Äôt change the size of the fries or the size of the drink you want. This app was created during COVID to help reduce strain on the drive-thru‚Äôs but now it‚Äôs more aggravating to use then to sit in the drive-thru or to just go into the lobby and order.

title: Charged multiple times for same order is one of a few problems
review: McDonald‚Äôs on E Sherman Blvd, Muskegon, MI charged me multiple times for the same order I never got my receipt emailed to me like I usually always have even when they messed up every order the last few times I‚Äôve ordered from their location.. when I tried talking to the ‚Äúmanager‚Äù to resolve my  issues with order the manager seemed clueless and wasn‚Äôt at all any help nor did anything to help how do I get a refund for the charges for the same order that I only had received once and wasn‚Äôt even correct.. I would really appreciate help with refund and getting my receipt I asked for but never received paper receipt or email receipt
developerResponse: {'id': 18901075, 'body': 'We always want you to have great Mobile Order & Pay experience. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.', 'modified': '2020-11-05T21:00:44Z'}

title: Need notes
review: This may be on here and just not somewhere I have found it, but there needs to be an area to add notes to your order. One time no spots were open so I had to park next to it and had no way of letting the staff know. Another time we had a trailer and couldn‚Äôt fit in a spot and I had no way of letting them know and they wouldn‚Äôt carry it out because I didn‚Äôt see anyone in the spot, so I had to go in the store and get it. Which is no big deal, but it kind of defeats the purpose. Other than that I‚Äôm loving this app!

title: Limits!
review: Love my app... what I don‚Äôt love is how they only limit you to use it once a day... even for different orders.  Example... one day I used my usual deal; then after running a couple of errands a family member asked me to pick them up some breakfast and drop it off to them at work... of coarse I wanted to help them out, so I went back to my McDonald‚Äôs and tried to use a completely different deal and it was refused! What the heck... if your giving you business and still spending money (might add the second time was LOTS more money) why not reward your customers with being able to use.
developerResponse: {'id': 15052082, 'body': "Hello there! We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2020-05-02T20:35:31Z'}

title: Waste of time
review: I ordered and did curb pickup and when I got there it tells you to click the button and let them know what number your at well it said there closed and told me to go to a Different location .. they was open and they had a very long line and I had to go through the drive through and when I tell them they say I can‚Äôt find your order!! And to pull over and wait !! Only to have to wait for a while ... nothing fast about using the app would of been better off ordering from the menu when I arrived I would of had my meal faster and everything!! Not worth doing this... will not recommend anyone to do this just order when you get there much faster
developerResponse: {'id': 14868665, 'body': "We're sorry about your experience with Mobile Order & Pay! Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-04-23T16:04:32Z'}

title: What a ripoff.
review: I was told last week that McDonalds was having a breakfast special of 2 McGriddles or two McMuffins for $4. I went there today and placed an order for 6 McMuffins and 4 McGriddles and the bill came to around $40. I questioned the cost and I was told that it had been several months since that special was good. That‚Äôs BS because I got stuff under that ‚Äúspecial‚Äù price within the last 2 weeks. I know individual stores are owned be different people, but me as a consumer driving down the road don‚Äôt see a sign that says ‚Äúthis McDonalds is owned by Joe Schmo‚Äù and he doesn‚Äôt abide by other stores prices. This crap is very upsetting. Do it system wide or don‚Äôt do it at all.
developerResponse: {'id': 11153959, 'body': "We're really sorry you were disappointed! Can you provide some more info in this link https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/ so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-10-09T18:15:08Z'}

title: Login
review: This is the worst app ever, I made my account yesterday and it works perfectly fine on safari but I can‚Äôt or don‚Äôt know how to order my food on it, so I go to the McDonald‚Äôs app I just downloaded and the app keeps telling me that my login isn‚Äôt correct when I have save my password on my phone, so I go back to safari sign off and then sign back in with save my password, and then I go back to the McDonald‚Äôs app just to see that it still won‚Äôt allow me to sign into my account, so I decided to use login with google and finally that works but I can‚Äôt see the deals on the app, can‚Äôt pay for my food, and whenever I try to fill in my information i can‚Äôt because it says ‚Äúsome fields are missing!!!!!!‚Äù
developerResponse: {'id': 9600696, 'body': "Hello! To get you back to the deals you love, we suggest uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn't resolve the issue, please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2019-07-10T22:39:28Z'}

title: Why is the pick up so arduous????
review: I want to give this app more stars, but the pitfalls involved with ordering and picking up are so unclear and unreasonable.  My wife is 9 months pregnant and she ordered over the app for me to pick up.  Little did we know, she can‚Äôt request pick up without her phone present.  WHY?  Is that such an outlandish expectation that friends might order and have others pick up in store?  Also, where‚Äôs the downside for McDonald‚Äôs?  People...won‚Äôt pick up food?  Who cares?  You got their money.  I just wasted a half hour on something that‚Äôs supposed to be convenient.  At least Dunkin gets it.

title: You would think McDonalds would have a decent app
review:
I don‚Äôt use the app very often but when I have with my roommate, we notice problems / things to be improved.  
- You can only submit your order when you‚Äôre close by, doesnt this defeat the whole purpose of the app??? I would like the food READY when I arrive at the restaurant, not have to wait an additional 10-15 min. 
- The promotions they offer in store are not all featured on the app. Sometimes we just have to order in McDonalds in order to get the deal we want.
- Sometimes the app just doesn‚Äôt work and restarts for no reason. And we have to input our order all over again because the items are no longer in our cart.
developerResponse: {'id': 7432285, 'body': "Hey! Sorry you weren't satisfied with your Mobile Ordering experience. Your order isn't completed and prepared until you check-in at the store. This ensures it‚Äôs hot and fresh for you!", 'modified': '2019-02-23T23:33:49Z'}

title: It‚Äôs ok
review: The app itself is ok when it works, however lately when I try paying with Apple Pay it gives an error when I get into the store and select my pickup option and I then have to wait in line to pay which kind of defeats the purpose. Then when I go to the feedback section of the app the form doesn‚Äôt respond (drop downs don‚Äôt work text areas can‚Äôt be selected to type in) making that feedback section completely useless.  I would also like the ability to add Big Mac sauce to other burgers such as the McDouble, other than that when the app works it is pretty nice.

title: Debit card denied and availability
review:
I don‚Äôt know if I am the only one having trouble with this but my debit cards always get denied when I try to use the online ordering which are in good standing and sometimes when I order online it will say it‚Äôs out of a certain item but it really isn‚Äôt. 
Also some items are not available on the app such as a side order of eggs at breakfast and senior coffee. 
The coupons work great though.  Too bad they quit giving discounts on purchases over $10. 
Now I noticed I have pending charges on my bank statement just hanging in limbo from previous pickup orders.
developerResponse: {'id': 5749622, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-11-10T15:47:36Z'}

title: Paid for food on app, restaurant refused to give me food.
review:
I ordered food from the BWI airport southwest terminal location through the app. I paid for the order through the app and the charges posted (not pending but hard posted to my bank account). 

I asked the lady where my order was and she said she never received the order. I showed her my app and my order. She said she didn‚Äôt get anything on her end. I said well I was charged and mobile ordered through the app. She said the pending charges would ‚Äúfall off‚Äù because she didn‚Äôt ‚Äúhit the button‚Äù on her end. 

I filed a ticket through the app and they told me the charges would fall off as well. I was not convinced and here I am a week later and the charges heard posted and the restaurant refused to give me my food unless I paid for them at the register. I didn‚Äôt pay again and left hungry and was charged. I have had luck with the app working twice before but since this was the third time using it only and it didn‚Äôt work AND scammed me out of $12 I give it 1 star. I‚Äôd give it zero if I could. 

Terrible.
developerResponse: {'id': 4898484, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about this,  Steven! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2018-09-01T17:32:55Z'}

title: I‚Äôm lovin it
review:
There are a few quirks like some struggle with the app overriding the McDonald location you pick on the map.  I‚Äôve placed my order after picking the location I wanted only to find out at checkout it picked the closer one to your location, in spite of not choosing that one.  
It used to have better deals but hey, I will at least use the 2 dollar off one (used to be 3 bucks) if I am with someone .  The rest usually don‚Äôt match my hankering or order size so they could up the deal/coupon game a wee bit and I might even use it more.

title: App is ok for coupons but mobile pay is a joke
review: DONT USE MOBILE PAY! It may just be our location in Henderson (Stephanie and Marks), but the mobile pay wasn‚Äôt worth using. We checked in and entered our pick up space number. Then after waiting and watching ALL the drive thru cars come and go I went in and all of our food and sundaes were sitting in the counter....just waiting there. I asked if it was my order and they began to act like they didn‚Äôt know it should‚Äôve come out. Apparently the order came across like I was coming in to pick it up. Beware!!! Food will be cold and cold items melted!!!
