title: The app that keeps on giving!
review:
I'm loving the app. It has great deals and the mobile ordering option is a godsend. In a long line...make that mobile order and park at curbside pickup. LOL. You can create your order early so you just have to go. The drive thru works well as well. The more you use it the mobile ordering, the more deals you have. I've had BOGO on sandwiches, any sandwich for $1, earned free McCafe products...a lot of deals. It also gives you a calorie count for your whole order.

I'm lovin it!

title: Frustrating App
review: Right now I can‚Äôt complete a new Mobile App deal because A previous order didn‚Äôt clear, so a message says I'm not eligible for a deal cuz I‚Äôve already got one in the cart!  Also, my phone frequently can‚Äôt access the app as I approach the restaurant and try to do a mobile order‚Äîthis may be a problem with my phone and not the app.  Also, with the buy 5 get 1 free coffee, the app sometimes loses count and starts over without crediting me for a free coffee‚Äîoverall, the most frustrating app I have ever used.  PS ‚ÄîI had to wait a long time at the drive thru payment window for the guy ahead of me to leave‚ÄîI was told that there was a problem involving his mobile app, and that this happens frequently.

title: Mobile order
review: This app use to be my favorite app to use. Not only did it save money, but it was also very convenient because I could use it in the drive-thru. But now, with all of the coupons (except for maybe two, if that) being for mobile order only, this app has become irrelevant. I promise you that you are losing hundreds of customers by enforcing that they use mobile ordering to save money. I only hope that you guys read this, as well as the other comments that are saying the same thing, and take action. Change the app to where there are an equal amount of coupons that could be used inside or in the drive-thru, as well as an equal amount for mobile ordering.

title: Very good app
review: I'm not a fan of McDonald's, but the app is so convenient  and makes me order more from McDonald's because it is quick and easy to get the meal; the problem is drive-thru pick-up; I can‚Äôt submit the order and send someone to the location and put the parking number; it doesn‚Äôt allow me because of place, even when I turn the area off, that is annoying, overall best app in the food industry

title: Poor performance - slow to load + too many clicks
review: The app is useful because of the deals and points, hence the 2 stars. However, the performance is very bad. It takes 10+ seconds to load each page while on stable, high speed networks. Combine the slow page load with the large number of clicks required to find, add and customize items to add to the order and also to checkout, the ordering process can take 5-6 minutes for a burger and soda. The app needs to be streamlined. It should load faster and there should be fewer clicks required to place an order
developerResponse: {'id': 33436550, 'body': "we're here to assist you, Aviva! try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. if it still won't work, send us a message here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-11-29T17:03:21Z'}

title: Location access is obnoxious
review: Desperately needs to update to give you a way to bypass the location access for the app. If I order on the app, but someone else is picking it up, it doesn‚Äôt give you an option to bypass where your location is - or to say I‚Äôm already here and have it freaking work. It‚Äôs super annoying and inconvenient to use the app, and then the person picking up the order has to go park somewhere else - not the curbside delivery space, and go inside. And the restaurant closest to us has the inside dining option closed still! Defeats the whole purpose. Update please!

title: Order Not Ready
review: This app is not so bad to use but the main drawback is the fact that McDonalds has decided that they will not begin preparing the order until you arrive at the location for pickup‚Ä¶so once you arrive you must wait there behind all the other orders at their curbside pickup.. this kind of defeats the whole purpose of curbside pickup.. I just want to come get my food and go.. not wait here while you prep the food.. such a waste of time. They need to allow the patron to pay and then allow pickup as soon as they arrive within a reasonable amount of time for the restaurant to prepare the food.
developerResponse: {'id': 33048928, 'body': 'we want you to enjoy your meal, so we start prepping your order at check in, that way it will be fresh and hot when you get it. ', 'modified': '2022-11-08T18:31:39Z'}

title: Customizing Condiments!?!
review: The app is great but the thing I would like to suggest is to be able to modify the ketchup and mustard option when customizing our sandwiches. It‚Äôs inconvenient to the customer if they have an allergy to say mustard and want to remove it when ordering but can‚Äôt. Some people would probably like to add extra ketchup or mustard but can‚Äôt do that through the app. They have to place the order through the app then tell the cashier they need to adjust the order and sometimes the cashier will get rude with them about it
developerResponse: {'id': 32911290, 'body': 'we strive to make the best app around, Heather! drop us a chat here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-11-01T14:47:48Z'}

title: Awesome app
review: I enjoy the convenience of this app and the wait time it cuts out of the equation. But also enjoy the free items I received e from using this app. Whereas before I never earned anything and would just get in line like everyone else. Do yourself a favor by cutting out wait time and earning free items that you will receive from the use of this app. This app was and is totally worth using and continues to pay off daily.

title: Nice.  With a few bugs.
review:
A major bug is that it doesn‚Äôt clear your previous order. You order something on Tuesday and pick it up. You want to order on Wednesday and the Tuesday order is sometimes still in your basket. You have to go and manually remove the Tuesday items. 

There are also times when what is advertised is not in the app or when an item in the app is not at the restaurant. 

Overall, probably the best ‚Äúfast food‚Äù app out there.
developerResponse: {'id': 32540373, 'body': "we're here to help, Randall! try uninstalling and reinstalling the app, and if that doesn't work, let us know more here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-10-12T21:21:56Z'}

title: Poor app performance
review: I try to use the app when I go to McDonald‚Äôs, so about once a month or so. Every time I try to use the app, I have to sign back in. I have used my Apple account to create an account and sign in in the past, but it seldom recognizes it and I have to go through the email link to log back in. IF that works, which it sometimes doesn‚Äôt and I have to wait 3 minutes to get a new link, then it takes several minutes to sign in. It‚Äôs faster and easier to either go in or go through the drive thru, or actually make dinner at home, than it is to use the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 32284924, 'body': "we can totally help with this! try to uninstall and reinstall the app. if you still can't log in, hit us up with the details here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-09-28T16:07:23Z'}

title: Location tracking privacy concerns
review: I like deals from McD‚Äôs app but Location tracking is bothering me a lot lately. When I‚Äôm using the app, location tracking is on to find restaurant nearby which I‚Äôm ok with it. But this app will still tracking you after food is ordered. I noticed blue dot on the top left corner, Im looking which app is still using GPS and found that it was from McD‚Äôs app. And I can‚Äôt turn it off, so I have to use app switcher then slide up to shut down the app. Every time I used McD‚Äôs app and it will tracking me after food is offered. So I have to shut down the app every time I‚Äôm done with app.
developerResponse: {'id': 27905617, 'body': 'we aim to make the best app we can for you. help us get there by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-02-07T21:58:10Z'}

title: Got a $25 charge for a small coffee!!
review: Picked up a small coffee yesterday, ordered through the app and got charged for stuff that weren‚Äôt there on our order. And when I called to report, I was advised to work with the bank and reverse the transaction. Have a case # but that is for the technical team to look into the bug!! I have decided not to use the app till I find enough references from people I know on the accuracy with the app.

title: Email link won‚Äôt load
review:
Usually I like the app.  Like the deals.  Like the opportunity to get free food.  Usually it works fine.  However:

First ‚Äî if I forget to ‚Äúcomplete‚Äù my online order, it will not let me complete the order the next time I use it, which means I cannot make another order.  The only alternative is to delete the app and start over.  

Second ‚Äî as a result of having to delete the app, it‚Äôs making me go to my email to avoid having to enter my password.  I know my password.  Just give me an option to enter it!

Third ‚Äî so ok I‚Äôll jump through your hoop.  BUT ‚Äî i press the link in the email and get a message that the page ‚Äúwill not load, try again later‚Äù.  I‚Äôve been trying ‚Äúlater‚Äù for 3 days now.  

Too bad.  Each day I don‚Äôt have the app is another day I‚Äôm not buying food from McDonald‚Äôs!!

title: Double Charged Multiple Times
review: I can get over that the app is not user-friendly when you‚Äôre trying to make an order but it becomes an acceptable when you get to the window and they tell you that you have to pay because the mobile app did not show you as paying. So you pay, with your credit card or cash and then you get an email saying that you‚Äôve been debited for the same purchase. This is happened THREE times to me so far. There‚Äôs no free French Fry reward worth all of this hassle! One of the managers of the 2 restaurants I go to came out and told me that for his store none of his staff has been trained on the app from Corporate.

title: Not McLovin‚Äô It
review: I‚Äôve tried this app a grand total of three times and have had nothing but trouble. The first time I tried to use it I kept getting messages stating that I had to confirm my account in email, even though I had done that at least four times. I deleted and reinstalled. Further issues continue such as not allowing me to check in unless I am physically in the building; forced to sign up for rewards; no warning that food items I ordered are not available until after I show up to pick up the order.  I find no benefit to this app at all and will just go back to ordering directly at the store.   Download at your own peril.

title: Best App On This Store
review: The McDonald‚Äôs app is hands down the best app I have and ever will download. The insane daily deals that are handed out for practically free have saved me hundreds if not thousands of dollars within the last year. Buying food for my family of 6 has been tough this last year, but the McDonald‚Äôs app giving me a free large fry with the purchase of one dollar or more has saved my children from near starvation countless times. Thank you.

title: Good unless traveling
review:
I like the app but not usable if traveling on the interstate. Somewhere along the way they eliminated the ‚Äúsearch here‚Äù button on the map presumably in favor of an active update based on location. Unfortunately that means the locations shown have already been passed or too close to prepare for. I fail to understand why both a button and active location could not exist concurrently.

Oh app support link does actually allow you to submit comments

title: Can't login!!!!
review: I've had this app for months now and I'm an employee too but I'm getting ready to delete this app because it will randomly sign me out and it's really inconvenient when I'm in my car and have to stop to log in again. It signed me out yesterday (maybe earlier but I noticed yesterday) and it wouldn't let me login! And it still won't even after coming home to perfectly working wifi!!! It's really making ne mad because its doing this out of nowhere! I still would recommend this app to friends, don't get me wrong, but it's just SUPER ANNOYING when every single time I use it, I have to login AGAIN and then be unable to all together üòíüò°

title: Poor development
review:
The app has gone from one of the best to one of the worst. Problems I have:
-Doesn‚Äôt recognize some items during their specified time of day. When I order a sausage burrito during breakfast hours it says that item is not available during this time of day. 
-Also on the sausage burrito, my wife prefers it without cheese. Customizing used to be easy. Now it doesn‚Äôt accept the customization request in the app. 
-Doesn‚Äôt allow creating an order for a future menu. If it‚Äôs before 10:30am the app won‚Äôt allow me to create a future order from the daytime menu.
-Difficult to switch sections of the menu. It defaults to the daytime menu and is hard to find where you switch to the breakfast menu. 
-The ‚Äúfavorites‚Äù indicate that a saved customization is recognized, but when ola Int the item in the bag the saved customization is lost. 

I have deleted and reloaded the app on my device. These glitches are programming flaws.
developerResponse: {'id': 20862562, 'body': 'We always want your Mobile Ordering to be awesome. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.', 'modified': '2021-02-04T17:02:15Z'}

title: Pathetic
review: This app is way more trouble than it‚Äôs worth.  I open the app at 7:30am my time, and it won‚Äôt let me order breakfast.  So I log out, and then I can‚Äôt log back in.  I try to reset my password, and it won‚Äôt send me the required email.  It just says ‚ÄúSomething went wrong‚Äù.  I have somewhere to be, and if this is McDonalds idea of ‚ÄúBreakfast On The Go‚Äù, then I must say that I am not impressed.  Fix your app, or I will take my business elsewhere.
developerResponse: {'id': 18902759, 'body': "That's not too great at all. Let's look into this for ya. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2020-11-04T19:41:43Z'}

title: A Waste of Time
review: This app continuously refuses to allow me to proceed with obtaining the deals which state that you must be registered.  How can you do so when this app constantly claims to have technical difficulties and has the audacity to tell you to try again at some future time as if you have nothing else to do?  It constantly tells falsehoods about the location of McDonald‚Äôs restaurants, stating that none are close to the location I‚Äôm in .  There‚Äôs one just down the street.  It will switch back and forth from login to register.    When you do get to the login page, it will not permit you to login.  It simply is NOT worth the aggravation and waste of time!
developerResponse: {'id': 20015605, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that. Let us look into that. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-12-27T16:18:47Z'}

title: Love the Ap Hate the Glitches
review:
Love that ease of the ap and usually don‚Äôt have issues with orders other than limited customization.. absolutely fed up with the payment issues and error messages! I have the same issues as others with it charging me an showing pending in my account but getting either an error message on my ap about location or internet connection or sometimes even payment even with a pending transaction and plenty of money in the account! 
PLEASE FIX issues!! I try an use the ap almost daily for coffee and it‚Äôs very frustrating!!
developerResponse: {'id': 19559712, 'body': "Sounds like you've had some difficulties with your payment, Jessica. title: Now almost non existent coupon deals vs what was there a year ago
review: Coupon deals on the app are so bad now a days.  Gone is the free fry Fridays.  The $1 and $2 sandwich offers.  Or the blanket open buy 1 get 1 free coupon offerings of chicken sandwiches and breakfast sandwiches.  You don‚Äôt even get the good coupons in the mail anymore.  However ALL the competitors still offer the good coupons on their apps and via coupons in the mail.  Clearly McDs no longer wants to be competitive in this area.

review: I have seen a few others complain about the app and I‚Äôm sorry that I have to join them. For a little over a week I haven‚Äôt been able to use the app because of an error. It tells me to restart the app but that does nothing. I have even re-downloaded it but still nothing. title: Really? Could be so much better.
review:
For such a huge company, the app stinks. Not only are the menus screwy (no all day breakfast? No salads? Half of the sides and goodies missing...), but the app has randomly switched locations on me mid-order more than once forcing me to drive to the next town over. So much for saving time.
Besides, and maybe it‚Äôs just my area, but it‚Äôs SO much faster to just go through the drive through! Using the app, we have had to wait for 20 minutes or more after arrival, the food was cold, and the order is wrong almost every time (this is at several different area locations). At least in the drive through my food is hot! 
I get that I have a large family (8 people), and we have big orders. The app would be convenient if it worked and actually showed the menu for the store I have selected. Would that be so hard, McD‚Äôs? 
Maybe a few less pop-up effects and useless data-glomming images, and a more streamlined and effective interface would have been the way to go.
Just sayin‚Äô. 
I‚Äôm losing the app. It‚Äôs useless to me.

title: Needs a lot of improvements
review:
My review is based on how limited and not-user friendly this app is designed. 
1) you have to give access to your location.  If you don‚Äôt, it will say to contact an employee once you get there. All they will do is help you tuen on that setting once you get there. 
2) You cannot order food and send someone (family) to pick it up. They require the phone it was ordered from and location services turned on.   
3) they don‚Äôt start making your food until you check in.  What‚Äôs the point of ordering if you are waiting in the parking lot?  Might as well go in the drive thru 
Out of all the mobile pickup app this one is the worst. I won‚Äôt be using it.

title: Customization Fails
review:
I have customized items saved as favorites, which would be convenient if it worked. When I select one of these items and tap the button to add it to my order, the customization vanishes. The app is useful for bypassing the drive-through, but this glitch cost it two stars.
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî-
Update: I followed up to report the problem as instructed by McDonalds, but they have still not fixed it. Any customization to a favorited item may or may not appear if you add it to your order.

There is now a new problem. My local store has decided they don‚Äôt want to bring orders out to my car. I placed an order tonight, receiving confirmation they received it and knew I was waiting in Slot #3. After waiting 20 minutes, I got out and walked to the drive-through window to ask what was causing the delay.

They were apparently waiting for me to do this. They had my order ready and waiting at the window. As soon as I walked up, they handed my order to me without a word. They richly deserve the reduction of my rating down to 1 star.

Only use the app for the deals, not the convenience, as it‚Äôs less convenient to use the app then just going in to order.  I assume the opposite of what they originally intended?  If they would fix the glitches and get their franchiseees on board this could be a success. As it is now, it‚Äôs slightly better than nothing.

title: Poor information!
review: Went to the store, they didn‚Äôt have my order ready, gave me the wrong order, I left realized had to go back through drive-through because it was later at night which the app doesn‚Äôt tell you they won‚Äôt let you pick up curbside.  Wasted more gas waiting in a long line at McDonald‚Äôs. Everyone was just really confused because the app gave bad information.  Had to wait an additional 20 minutes for food to be made and couldn‚Äôt get certain food because of the later time and the bad info on the app.  Maybe if you‚Äôre going to use the app called McDonald‚Äôs first if you‚Äôre not familiar with their schedules and see if what you‚Äôre going to order is available.

title: Buggy and creepy
review: Keeps asking for my location even after I refuse multiple times (and after I chose which McDonalds to order from). Where I am (my home address) is none of their business, especially with all the privacy policy fine print. Does not have a way to order 2 egg mc muffin meal (overcharges). Shows annoying popups to upsell me things I don‚Äôt want. It seems likely they are storing our passwords in plain text (password requirement forbids length over 12 characters) - bad security practice! Joke‚Äôs on the users - binding arbitration clause and other ToS clauses let them legally get away with this if/when a data breach happens. Also it‚Äôs annoying that users can‚Äôt simply order from the website.

title: Issues
review: We used this app quite often but lately, the ‚Äòdeals‚Äô links take forever to show up by the time I get to drive-thru I just pay regular price to not hold up line. We tried using Mobile Pay for office breakfast this morning, it deducted $60 from my account 8 times, thankfully automatically refunded each time, when we went in the staff and managers casually told us ‚Äúyea mobile pay has been having issues‚Äù. Will skip using app for now.

title: 1st to Worst food App
review:
When this app first launched it was simply the best app with incredible deals. Yes the app had connectivity issues but truly they were few and far between. Great promotions with local pro and college teams. But now the app is a major disappointment with few quality deals. Another fast food chain did the same with their app and now it‚Äôs no longer available. 

Mobile ordering on the app is a disappointment in that in doesn‚Äôt actually save time. They orders are not ready when you arrive. I‚Äôve waited longer in the order pickup stall than it took for a family member to run inside and order and come out. Definitely don‚Äôt confuse them by going through the drive-thru lane.

title: Pre-ordering offers no benefits
review: The APP needs to much more user-friendly. The idea of pre-ordering with the app is for the meal to be ready when the customer arrives, not for them to start preparing it upon arrival! What‚Äôs the benefit then?  Today, I had to edit for 10 mi items for a simple coffee and sausage McMuffin. I might as well have gone through the drive-through. If McD wants to be more competitive, then the app needs to mirror Starbucks which calculates arrival time and has the goods ready for pick up.

title: Too many tech issues
review: I try to use this app often and there are often problems. Most of the problems are with the stores system.  I have sat in the numbered pickup area for 20 minutes to finally have to go inside to find they don‚Äôt have the order on their system. I have placed orders also to show up at the store then try to put in my pickup preference and receive a message saying there is a problem on your end and to try later. What? I am at the store, there is no later. Then it is impossible to empty the basket or complete the order. These are only 2 examples. There are too many tech issues that need fixing.

title: I‚Äôm lovin‚Äô it.
review: Mobile ordering is convenient, has great coupons, and has always worked flawlessly for me. I was super impressed that my problem didn‚Äôt even become a problem. I used this app to order at least 3 times a week and will continue to do so.

title: Very easy to use
review: This app is great. One of the worst things about McDonald‚Äôs is this new dual lane drive-through line that they have. I guess somebody thought that it was going to help with the congestion but from my experience it is only added to it. I now do all my orders with the mobile app, I select what I want, order, and I pull up to the store and then I enter what mobile curbside parking spot I‚Äôm at. I don‚Äôt have to do anything but sit and wait in my air-conditioned car. What an age to be alive this app is great.

title: Ordering Md‚Äôs online
review:
My family and I absolutely love ordering online ! From the time it takes us to order online, and get there, then put the number in it‚Äôs never more than 10 min! I mean the drive 
Thru has been completely wrapped around several times as I pull in get my order and pull out within 5 min! I can‚Äôt believe how fast it is!
Never have I gotten my food so fast ‚Äúthank-you for curbside delivery ‚Äú!

title: It‚Äôs improved but is missing a key feature
review:
When I first got this app, there were no rewards. McDonald‚Äôs has added that, but for some bizarre reason you can‚Äôt use a McDonald‚Äôs gift card as payment in the app. I learned this the hard way when I purchased a gift card to load into the app. I mean, it‚Äôs 2022. Why *wouldn‚Äôt* you be able to pay in the app with the gift card?

Aside from this, it‚Äôs really a solid app that has made great strides since it was first introduced.

I gave up and McDonald‚Äôs lost a huge sale. Nothing allows me to sign into the app. It‚Äôs like all attempts automatically bring up the connection error or internal error. About ready to toss the app in frustration. The app was updated aug 26 and does not show any more updates needed.

review:
This app works best if your store is well-managed. But when the store is poorly managed (as my local McDs is), you run into issues. You pull into curbside just to get an error message that forces you to go in (which you didn‚Äôt want to do) only to be met with employees who don‚Äôt understand what is going on and after 10 minutes it‚Äôs finally revealed that something on your order isn‚Äôt available. title: Fix this app!!!
review: I work In a McDonald‚Äôs restaurant as managment. Codes are commonly invalid even though I watch the customer pull them up. title: Don‚Äôt add your card on the app

title: Works great until you‚Äôre in line at McDonald‚Äôs
review: I already have enough social anxiety. I don‚Äôt need to go into a panic attack while I‚Äôm trying to explain to the cashier that I normally have great cell service and that I have no idea why the app is going so slow. Meanwhile, I can feel the line behind me getting longer, and I start to feel hot from the attempting to burn holes in the back of my head with their stares for slowing down the line. It‚Äôs to the point where I honestly feel like McDonald‚Äôs puts some sort of signal jammer above their stores in an attempt to frustrate people into just paying full price.
developerResponse: {'id': 27329121, 'body': "uninstalling and reinstalling the app should do the trick. leave a few more details here if it doesn't help: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-01-09T20:51:34Z'}

title: Disappointing‚Ä¶
review:
First, an app that requires you to be at the restaurant to order doesn‚Äôt really save you any time. You still have to sit and wait as your order is in queue.
Second, the location service required me to not just be at the restaurant but inside‚Ä¶ so much for contactless ordering and delivery to the vehicle.
Third, I selected 2 (quantity) when ordering but somewhere between that point and placing the order, it only registered 1. With no time to reorder after waiting around for the first order to be completed, I had to leave without enough food.
I should have just used the drive through. This app is inferior, when it should be superior.
developerResponse: {'id': 27901349, 'body': 'the only way we can make this the best app possible is by getting all the details we can from you here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2022-02-07T16:58:40Z'}

title: Deal limitations make this useless.
review:
The fact deals can‚Äôt be combined really limits any usefulness the app has since regular specials aren‚Äôt any less of a value than what‚Äôs offered in the app and the app isn‚Äôt even required for those.

Not only that, but special offers can‚Äôt even be used with bonus points which makes the points useless as well: you‚Äôd save just as much forgoing the points and just using a deal/coupon instead.

I honestly used to go to McDonalds once or twice a week and since installing the app have only gone about once in the past few months so if anything it‚Äôs discouraged me from giving them any business.
developerResponse: {'id': 27318848, 'body': 'hi there. leave a few more details with our mobile app team on how we can improve here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html', 'modified': '2022-01-08T21:46:04Z'}

title: Love the app, but‚Ä¶
review: Since I switched from an iPhone 8+ to an iPhone 13 yesterday, the app is glitching when it asks for a restaurant location.  It will show the correct restaurant location, and when I choose it, the fries jump up and down forever and then it gives an error with something about checking my Internet connection.  I‚Äôve tried deleting and reinstalling the app, but no joy.  I‚Äôd hate to lose my 8,300+ points.

title: Love the app but Uber eats doesn‚Äôt work
review: I always use my app for pickup today I just tried for delivery and Uber eats won‚Äôt work on Safari copied and pasted on google and same thing Ubers website doesn‚Äôt work it says error. They should let you choose who delivers your food. Other than that I love the app I beat the line all the time and easy other than delivery part. And the rewards come in handy especially with kids

title: Worst app ever! It‚Äôs just so stupid!
review: If multiple people in my house sign into the same account and if I place a mobile order somebody else can‚Äôt take their phone signed into the same account to McDonald‚Äôs to pick up the order it must be my phone which is just so dumb!!! Also the sign in process is just disgustingly bad on iOS. There‚Äôs a glitch going on with Safari where it won‚Äôt register new devices you have to choose Google Chrome as your default browser on iOS! I can‚Äôt even begin to tell you how sad this app is compared to every other fast food app I‚Äôve tried! Burger King doesn‚Äôt do anything right except do a better app than McDonald‚Äôs!!!

title: Staying logged in is impossible with current version
review: Every time I close the app I get a screen to accept the terms and conditions, which I press accept then the app takes me to the main screen with a message saying that something went wrong with accepting the terms and I have been logged out. Then I have to log in again. Something is obviously broken and needs fixed.

title: A couple of suggestions from mom
review: This is very good. I only wish you were able to go ahead and pay for the order and they have it ready before arriving. But you have to wait then once you arrive show how to pick up then finish order and pay. Also, we order happy meals and there is not one on the app for the cheeseburger happy meal and you are not able to add chato the original hamburger happy meal.

title: Scam
review: Ive been a long time McDonalds user especially on the app since the pandemic. SEVERAL times I‚Äôve ordered through the app and when I got the the ordering window they would say something on my order was out of stock or a machine was not in service. So they are like sorry, but thats not the part that is really messed up. Whats messed up is I cancel my order on the app and a few days go by and I end up being charged for not getting my order. What the heck is up with that. If I was a millionaire I probably wouldn‚Äôt care, but Im not and need that money for food.  Who can resolve this problem of taking my money and not getting what I ordered to begin with?

title: Not friendly
review: So if you are ordering for say your husband to pick up he needs your phone. Otherwise I‚Äôd say you are sick because you have a headache from spending all day with the kids at the pool and just order McDonald‚Äôs for supper for him to pick up on the way home from work he can‚Äôt do it. Has to be your phone so you have to get dressed and drive across town and now sit and wait in the reserved spot while you passed your husband entering the neighborhood. I should have cooked those grilled cheese sandwiches. Definitely was not worth it. He even downloaded ap and logged into my account didn‚Äôt work.

title: every morning at 9am - broken
review: So I have no idea why every day at 9am if I try to use the app it will not load data in the app. I have tried over a month and still have the same issues. Tried on different devices. Tried with different internet sources, cellular on phone, my jetpack with a different provider, cable company account free wifi, etc... all back to back when having issues. No dice! There is no simple way to submit an issue or contact anyone about it. You have to go thru like 50 pieces of info to submit one online feedback with is such a PITA!! McD... hire a UI/UX guy and some decent software MANUAL QA guys because you automation is not catching bugs.

title: Buggy and unreliable
review: Setting aside the fact that it takes longer to get curbside than the slowest drive thru in fast food, the app is buggy and unreliable. Once I‚Äôve cruelly ordered something, the app works fine for one tap reordering. But it never lets me order anything new. The add to bag button rarely works and I usually end up going thru the drive thru for less hassle amd frustration. This app has a long way to go.

title: Horrible mobile/curbside order wait time
review: It doesn‚Äôt matter if I‚Äôm in Lagrange (where I am today) or any other location that I‚Äôve tried in the Metro Atlanta area, it takes 20 plus minutes for your order to be delivered 9 times out of 10. This is horrible customer service. I could‚Äôve waited in the drive thru line and received faster service! Why not block orders within the app from being placed off you‚Äôre understaffed. Of course the ice cream machine is down as well.üòîüòî

title: No deals
review: The app is screwed up yet again. It tells me I need to share my location in order to see my local deals, which was shared before. When I go to settings to share my location the McDonald‚Äôs app is not an option. When I click on the link that you provided me to go update my settings, location is not one of the options that I can turn on. This is not the first time this is happened. This is not the second time this is happened. Every time you log me out for no good reason, I can‚Äôt access any deals. There‚Äôs no point in having the app if you‚Äôre not going to provide a promotion. If you don‚Äôt want my money just say so.

title: A few glitches
review: Over all I love the McDonald‚Äôs app. Being an elderly single man I‚Äôll eat out a lot. The app makes it so simple for me to make my order at the house and drive to the store and get it. Every once in a while however it screws up and it might be 1 o‚Äôclock in the afternoon when I come to get a sandwichEnd it will say that it is not available at this time and moon show me only the breakfast menu. Other than that it‚Äôs a spot on app
developerResponse: {'id': 20091672, 'body': 'Thanks for the heads up about this, Phil. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.', 'modified': '2020-12-30T17:35:25Z'}

title: Trash
review: I go to McDonald‚Äôs daily! Something 2 or 3 times even because it‚Äôs close to home. This app has cost the chain a loyal customer. Complain and you get some pointless email and no follow up. I‚Äôve been double and triple charge through the app and the store will say it didn‚Äôt go through on our end and want you to let them swipe your card again. Show management that it‚Äôs hit your account and they responded with that says pending so it hasn‚Äôt posted. Well I disagree! If it‚Äôs pending more than once and my balance reflects the change then it has posted my friends. I even have the e receipt from McDonald‚Äôs showing the payment. Done with y‚Äôall Doug84

title: When the app works
review: When the app works it‚Äôs great. However when you do a mobile order show up at the restaurant pull up the app and it‚Äôs listing your order as a past order there‚Äôs no one you can call to correct the problem. I just waited 20 minutes in the McDonald‚Äôs parking lot waiting for an order that the restaurant said they never received yet I have the paid receipt to my email from the mobile app. Since it wasn‚Äôt the restaurant the process the payment there‚Äôs no refund. There‚Äôs nowhere on the app to get help with that situation. Extremely frustrated. No food and no refund.
developerResponse: {'id': 20536553, 'body': "Sounds like your visit wasn't too quick. Please provide some more info in this link https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html/ so we can address this.", 'modified': '2021-01-20T19:46:09Z'}

title: Wasted trip
review: Sent my son to pick up our order. I told him to let me know when he arrived and I would check in. Apparently my phone has to be on their WiFi. I spoke to an employee and explained that I was paying through the app, and he was just picking it up. She said they don‚Äôt have any control over the app and this happens all the time. Long story short. Unless YOU are going to pick up your order, don‚Äôt use this.
developerResponse: {'id': 13505994, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out! We're continuously working towards an improved McDonald's Mobile App that our customers enjoy using. Thank you for helping us reach that goal by voicing your concerns.", 'modified': '2020-02-15T18:42:45Z'}

title: New device
review:
When I go to log in, it tells me that it appears that I‚Äôm on a new device and instructs me to confirm in email.  That is good.  The fact that I‚Äôve confirmed a dozen times, reloaded the app four times, and given it 48 hours to self correct... and still get that error is not good.

From what I see of the app, I really don‚Äôt see much use for it.  The only plus is curbside pickup... and that will only jump me up in the queue by a couple of cars in even the biggest rush times.  

The fact that I can‚Äôt even order online without making it delivery is also a fail.  The whole concept could use a thorough review and the app should get a thorough debugging.

title: Disputing an order is a pain
review: The app is mostly great and I use deals often. My problem came when I was able to apply a deal and pay for items that the store didn't have available. I was told they couldn't refund  my money and I would have to do it via the app. Only problem is, there is no option to dispute orders on the app. You have to email or call customer service only for them to tell you that you have to call your bank/credit card company to block the pending charge. Long story short I let this large corporation keep my money.

title: Once easy to use, now Cannot get half items ordered
review: I have used mobile ordering since it‚Äôs onset. I placed my orders, pulled in and then drove away happy. The last 5 orders, I submitted the order, paid, parked only to see the app say ‚Äúitems not available at this time‚Äù. First time I thought it was because it was so close to end of breakfast but next 3, I had to reorder items in drive thru... what a waste. There are 7 of us and I already have problems with employees not ordering what I ask for but My orders are almost always shorted an item or two so I have to go in, so why waste my time and money. Have been going elsewhere for breakfast. Honestly, FED UP!
developerResponse: {'id': 16440072, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-07-06T16:23:20Z'}

title: Horrible and unreliable
review:
McDonald‚Äôs has one of the worse apps. You never know when it‚Äôs going to work, I‚Äôll get an error message or update message or log in but it‚Äôs the wrong password when it‚Äôs the correct password.
Then they started where you can only use one special an hour!!! Really. You‚Äôre a burger joint. Be real about this!!! A couple of kids OFL not want to spend $20 on nuggets and or happy meals because I can only use one special. 
The drive up and wait is ridiculous. Put my space number in and there has been a few times where the drive thru and walk in went faster then my supposed ‚Äúquick app‚Äù order!
Mickey D‚Äôs you should take note from Jack in the Box app or even Chik fil A!

title: A 2 trying to be 5
review:
As much as I want to love this app, the development of this app makes it hard to. 

1. The location restrictions. When in a hurry, ordering in advance is key in today‚Äôs world. And what‚Äôs the point of order via the app if you still have to wait to be within a certain proximity of the store to place your order and still have to wait! 

2. The customization is still pretty basic. Some burgers won‚Äôt allow you add basic items such as lettuce. 

3. Menus and Deals sync is another headache. There have been times I‚Äôve gone to locations and the app will only allow breakfast although lunch/dinner is being offered. Or deal that you add to an order but at check discover it‚Äôs not available at the location. 

4. Specialty items not offered on the app but splashed all over the stores menu and windows. 

5. Recent up requires me to log in every time I want to place an order... No Face ID login or remember me option. Just a constant annoying manual log in.

title: Review
review:
Very good experience with the app.  I attribute this to the McDonald‚Äôs that I go to regularly.   Anyone that I asked about it help me and showed me what to do. My biggest problem was that it was really easy and I felt that I was looking for steps that I didn‚Äôt have to take. There have been a few little glitches but I have learned to check my order before I leave and if something isn‚Äôt right I get it corrected right away. But overall it is really excellent. Good work

Bill Gronke

title: Credit card updates are not available!!
review:
I have enjoyed the convenience of using this app -until it became time to update my credit card expiration date.  I have found NO WAY to update my card information in the app. I‚Äôve tried deleting my card & re-entering the new info. But later when I would try to use it, the app would give me an invalid card message.  I would check for the updates that I put in only to find that it had defaulted back to the original, outdated information!!
I‚Äôve even tried deleting the app for a few weeks & reinstalling it. But it always defaults to the outdated card info.   THIS APP IS USELESS!!  I‚Äôm giving it 1 star only because I cannot give it ZERO STARS.

title: Double chargedüôÅ
review: When I was trying to pay on the app it kept saying the payment was declined. Turns out I was charged 3 times with it still saying declined so I went inside to pay and get my food. When I looked at my bank I had been charged four times and refunded twice. I tried to get my money back from the restaurant but they said it had to come from the app. So the app actually caught the mistake and refunded me but it didn‚Äôt show up in the store that it had been paid so we paid again. Also why did I keep getting a declined message when the payment went through? I was told by the store manager the app would pay me back in 72 hours. It was a $39 order so we will see.

title: Worst app
review: Waste of time. When I got to the location I couldn‚Äôt check in. The employees kept telling me that I just had to keep closing the app and keep clicking check in. Then I proceeded to let them know that my coworkers also placed an order and I was told that I couldn‚Äôt pick it up because my coworkers  needed to have their phones there also so that they can all check in. We all decided to downloaded this app because it makes it a lot easier for us when we are at work. We all order and someone picks it up. But I guess you can‚Äôt do this here. Seriously drove all the way there to be told no. So we cancelled all 5 orders and took our money somewhere else. Definitely deleting this app.

title: Update screwed it up
review:
App was great, much better than their competitors, until 5 weeks ago, an update caused me to re-enter credit card info. App Hasn‚Äôt worked correctly since.

I‚Äôve had tech support reach out to ‚Äúhelp‚Äù me with the app.  The offered no help.  Only suggested I uninstall and reinstall.  None of my Credit cards work in this app. 

 When it was working it was super easy to order my regular beverage order, walk in, grab from counter and go.  Was never helpful with drive thru drive was just as slow with the app.

title: Completely usable
review:
I downloaded the app to order a meal and the app was unusable. I'm so mad that I'm actually writing a review because basic QA obviously was not done
if you don't turn on notifications you go into a infinite bootloop
 after I gave up and decided to accept notifications I couldn't even purchase my mean because it said a field was missing. I assumed something was wrong with the payment information so I went to that setting to check and it gave them same error before I even selected anything. It couldn't enter my payment info at all and it wouldn't let me use Apple pay.
I finally gave up, uninstalled the app, and went somewhere else.
This app is bad. Like honestly just bad

title: Great app with a small flaw
review: This app is great, good deals most of the week and clear and clean menu design, easy to understand customization options although it could be be more in depth with options. Like changing the type of egg on a breakfast sandwich instead of just the option for no egg. Placing an order is simple but the app will keep the order at the pick up option after you have gotten your order. Not a huge deal since you can force close the app and it‚Äôll resolve its self but it is very strange.

title: deleted my 1‚≠êÔ∏è heres another
review: they delete reviews they don‚Äôt like, itunes is complicit in this. i exposed a HUGE flaw in the way the app works, and they sent a condescending email and pulled my review. FIX YOUR APP, not your poor review scores. Dishonesty is no way to run a business. if you lie about whats in the app whats next lying about whats in the food ? taco bell was already busted. basically the error in the software is that once you select an offer it locks out all other offers, this has since been adjusted to a ‚Äúsofter‚Äù version of the discount offer lock out. this app used to be good, now its essentially a digital punch card. give your employees full health insurance, and enough money to live on. thanks McD‚Äôs your app is still trash.

title: Need to be able to delete old payment methods
review: I love using this app and mobile ordering but it doesn‚Äôt allow me to delete expired payment methods and now it won‚Äôt allow me to add a new payment method. So until this is fixed I can‚Äôt pay through the app anymore. It still sends my orders but then the payment is declined and I have to give them another card at the window. I tried to report this through the contact function in the app and discovered that doesn‚Äôt work at all. I‚Äôm using it on an iPhone.

title: No variety
review: I used to be a frequent user of the app. Had some great deals and random items. Now I feel it‚Äôs always the same things. A lot of times during breakfast time there are no deals at all, everything seems to be for lunch or dinner. Could use specials on kids meals or products like salads or oatmeal. Just a more random variety. I have not used the app hardly at all the past couple months. A lot of app issues with connectivity as well. I figured if I was paying full prices and not finding the deals, I have been finding myself just going to other restaurants.

title: What cluster‚Ä¶
review: McDonald‚Äôs app is a good intentioned app gone wrong. All the  right ideas implemented poorly ‚Äîsetting up restaurants for failure.  When you couple the limitations of their crappy programming with the limitations of the failures of late stage capitalism and understaffed restaurants, it just makes for a recipe for disaster.  Epic fail!  One Fry out of Five. Do not recommend ‚Äî yeah I‚Äôll stick with the drive-through and wait in line ‚Äî at least that way I‚Äôm preserving someone‚Äôs job.
developerResponse: {'id': 30148875, 'body': 'we aim to make the best app we can for you. help us get there by replying here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html    \r\n', 'modified': '2022-06-03T16:19:21Z'}

title: Do not recommend
review: I downloaded this thinking it would make my life easier. Went to my local McDonald‚Äôs to try it out. After 20 minutes of waiting in the parking lot, watching a ton of people go through the drive through quickly, the app told me my order had been completed, like I already got it. I didn‚Äôt. It ended up taking me and my boyfriend to go inside and see what was happening. Apparently the location never got our order from the app. And the employees didn‚Äôt apologize or anything. Which isn‚Äôt the app‚Äôs fault but come on McDonald‚Äôs. Took us like 40 minutes total to get our food. I deleted the app the same day. You had one job McDonald‚Äôs app. One. Job. If I could give zero stars I would.

title: It works, sometimes?
review: Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn‚Äôt. It never works like it should. I open it and it states that there‚Äôs new terms and conditions, I hit accept and nothing. It just sits there ‚Äúloading‚Äù. I‚Äôve tried over WiFi at home and at work, as well as LTE. About 70% of the time I have this problem. If it does open up and I manage to place an order, I always have to log back in and the top of the screen says ‚Äúyou have been logged out due to an error, please log back in‚Äù. However most of the time the app does not work. I thought it was my old phone, but then I got a new phone and it still doesn‚Äôt work. My wife has also been having similar issues with her‚Äôs.

title: McDonalds needs training
review:
Brand new app for McDonalds and they are still working out a few kinks, it will probably get better in time.

One problem they have is training.  I once ordered a soda through the app, skipping a long line.  The app worked perfectly but I watched as my order was deleted off the screen and never filled.  Once I saw this happen I called the crew member that did this and asked why he would delete my order without filling it.  Apparently, McDonalds hasn't properly trained their crew yet about online ordering and they are still figuring it out.

Also, if you are making your order before getting to the store, the app will not allow you to place the order until you arrive.

I arrived at one store prepared for my order and was surprised to find out that one McDonalds didn't even have staff to manage the register and was pushing everyone to their kiosk to order, that didn't go well at all either.
developerResponse: {'id': 3426830, 'body': 'Hi there! We always expect your service to be stellar. Having our staff trained and knowledgeable about our Mobile App is important to us. Please provide some more info at 877-334-4332, so we can assist you further.', 'modified': '2018-05-10T22:17:55Z'}

title: 207 s memorial store refuses to make order
review:
Saves no time at this McDonald‚Äôs twice I have used twice haven‚Äôt gotten my order b cause manager refuses to handle app purchase first , usually use app to pre order and pay because I only get a 15 minute break twice now have paid for items never having time to receive them because manager refuses to help online orders before any walk up customer...
Tried using it again over past two months so far I am at close to 12 dollars of mo ru just given to McDonald‚Äôs : sounds like not much but then consider that‚Äôs like 3 orders ... no refund no orders order 20 minutes before my break at work order always for some reaso. Doesn‚Äôt process but I am always billed

title: Hate mobile app
review:
The only deals any more is on a mobile app.. I do not use mobile ordering, so I‚Äôm S.o.l. ... I loved the app when it first came out I used it a minimum of 5-6 times a week now I haven‚Äôt even been to McDonald‚Äôs in 2 1/2 months. Bring back deals for us regular people that don‚Äôt use mobile ordering !! I realize that‚Äôs where a lot of the money is.. to draw in busy people, but us retirees with grandchild, feel left out.. not worthy enough to ‚Äòbother‚Äô with by offering us deals... it‚Äôs sad to say, that this the way of the world, cast aside the minority‚Äôs (non-mobile app users), for the ‚Äòtoo busy‚Äô too wait in line or enter the store people!! 
My business goes where the deals are... and it is not at McDonald‚Äôs anymore!!!

title: A bit confusing
review:
On two occasions I placed an order and the apps says, ‚ÄúOk, we got your order!‚Äù. I entered the card . It goes to ‚ÄúI‚Äôm Already Here‚Äù. I thought that the order was placed, little did I know placing the order was two screens later. Since I was placing a breakfast order at 10:15, by the time I got there and figured out what happened ‚Äúone or more items not available at this time‚Äù!
Place order should come before already here & pick up inside or curbside.

title: It hardly works
review: To be honest, I think that the app is fine, but the restaurants are the problem.  Today is the fourth time in a row that I wasn‚Äôt able to use it.  It either errors, the restaurant claims they never got the order, but yet I get charged.  Today when I checked in, it said they were having problems and I needed to go inside to show my number.  Hard to do when the lobby is closed.  When I went through the drive thru and told them, I was told I needed to come back when the lobby is open.  Forgot to mention it was not even 6 pm yet.  Very disappointed since they deals are great, you just never get to use them.
developerResponse: {'id': 30398068, 'body': 'our service should always be on point. tell us more about this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/restaurant-feedback.html \r\n', 'modified': '2022-06-16T16:49:36Z'}

title: Time lost trying to navigate this awful app
review:
Apparently the McDonald‚Äôs app allowed me to register twice. Now I can only access the new account and cannot access my previous account that has favorites, payment methods, and lots of rewards points!
I see no way to delete the second account and I have received no help by trying to guess the correct question to get an answer, ridiculous!
developerResponse: {'id': 27520102, 'body': 'we want things to be as easy as possible for you. tell us more about this here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2022-03-24T17:52:07Z'}

title: Deals/Rewards
review:
The deals/Rewards section apparently only works when it wants to. Again I tried to use the coffee deal and it didn‚Äôt work.  

I originally liked the concept of online ordering because I have to special order my sandwiches.  I thought since it was there on the screen exactly how I wanted my food prepared, that they would get it right. However it seems that‚Äôs not the case. The food is still prepared incorrectly and depending on what they screwed up my order goes in the trash when I get home and try to eat it.  Or it‚Äôs just cold, or extremely over cooked dried out and again not eatable. 

Also have had issues where I placed the order. Bank was billed and  I‚Äôve had to reorder and pay again when I get to the restaurant because they didn‚Äôt receive the order.  

Granted not all of my issues are totally app related, but more restaurant staff. However it still makes it not worth it to use the app
developerResponse: {'id': 28428492, 'body': "that's not awesome to hear, Kirk! let's get that looked into here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html", 'modified': '2022-03-07T15:12:04Z'}

title: McD‚Äôs app
review: I love the app and how convenient it makes things. However, there needs to be some attention given to the payment part of it. Some people have more than one specific card they use and every single time I‚Äôve tried to put more on there it won‚Äôt save it. Says you‚Äôre suppose to be able to have up to 4 cards I think, but it won‚Äôt accept it! Can someone please look into that?!

title: Issue with payment
review: I have been experiencing issue on mobile payment on app order not going through and even at the drive-through, I was told ALL my credit cards, not one, not two, at least three, we're all declined for the same transaction.  I was told to pay using cash. Magically, after I paid cash, the app payment went through and I got charged for the same order. I had to stop in the store and explain the whole thing and get refunded. I felt I was treated like a criminal when I was double charged. This happened to me at least three if not more during the last two weeks. I used to love this app, now I hate it.
developerResponse: {'id': 27400426, 'body': "we're here to help you out. hit our mobile app team up through the link, so we can get to the bottom of this: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n", 'modified': '2022-01-12T14:28:59Z'}

title: One small problem‚Ä¶
review:
You pull up, you tap out your order, you park in curbside pick up #3 and 3-5 min later a store associate is at my window apologizing that the shake machine is down or the frappe I ordered cannot be made. Now what?!
I‚Äôm expected to accept some other beverage option of which none are either desirable to me or anywhere near the cost of a ‚ÄúLarge Mocha Frappe with a shot of Espresso‚Äù - delicious btw, you gotta try one!
Here‚Äôs the kicker the store has no method of removing and/or refunding an item ordered through the mobile app! That‚Äôs the claim any way.

title: Mobile Order Debauchery
review:
Unfortunately I created an order ahead of time and arrived at location for a curbside pickup already knowing the drive thru was going to be heavily delayed. When I attempted to submit my parking number the app removed my order telling me it was unable to complete and that I would have to go inside for an associate assistance. 

I was unable to do this because I was alone with a child in the car. I proceeded to leave without being able to receive my purchase. 

I decided to attempt to place an order at a more local store as I was traveling back a distance to my home residence. The app proceeded to deny me the use of any other deals as it was maintaining that I had too recently used a deal in a purchase already. Except my ‚Äúorder‚Äù was not recorded in the app for me to make edits and reuse elsewhere.  

I‚Äôm highly dissatisfied that a technical error has both further delayed my time and disallowed me to get a minimal discount in order to purchase food from this establishment.

title: Don‚Äôt Download!
review: Who doesn‚Äôt like McD every once in a while? I used to be one of those people that would go get a bacon McDouble with medium fries and coke every other month.  Since I downloaded the app I have like been going there 3-4 times a week.  Those awesome deals is how they get you!  Before I spent my money elsewhere but with these deals I‚Äôm hook and McD is benefiting from the new costumer.  Might as well talk to HR and set up direct deposit to McD now.  Thanks a lot!

title: App is great/ Wait for food is not so great
review:
Ordering through the app is quick and easy but waiting for your food is not quick....at all. We waited 20 minutes for our food. I even went to the drive thru to see if I could get my foos that way but they said I  had to get it at curbside. It would‚Äôve been quicker if I just ordered at  the drive-thru. 
The app offers great deals which I‚Äôd love to take advantage of, but at my own risk.

title: Mobile ordering disfunction
review: Normally I‚Äôd never do this but I‚Äôm hoping it will get back to headquarters and they change this but it is beyond ridiculous that when placing an order on the app for pick up it doesn‚Äôt even get sent or processed to the store until you arrive and press the I‚Äôm here button! Why would I or anyone want to use the app for ordering ahead if  im gonna have to wait for My order to be made?! Please change that. Also if my spouse is already out and about why can‚Äôt they be able to pick it up why does it have to wait for me specifically to be there . Just doesn‚Äôt make sense and is very inconvenient.

title: Glitches
review:
Love that I get to use my rewards and gain free items! 

With that being said I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs a glitch on my end or what but every time I go to order lunch or dinner it tells me that the particular item is not available during breakfast time. Remind you I am not trying to order these items until after breakfast! So the only time I can redeem my points is during breakfast! So please fix this particular issue.

Other than that the app is amazing to order from no waiting periods and no long lines which I love!

title: App is not user friendly
review: Such a difficult app to order on. I seriously wonder if the designers who made this app have ever tried to order for a group of four people. You shouldn‚Äôt have to click ‚Äúmore‚Äù to view more options. You should also have to not have to make a new item just because you want cheese on it, cheese should be a topping. There is also no clear difference between making something plain and adding or subtracting toppings. You also can‚Äôt add ketchup anything and you you know the workers will not give you any. Ordering on the kiosk in the store is not much easier it‚Äôs the exact same user interface.

title: Mediocre at Best
review: This app only works when it wants to. The last straw was when I placed my order on the mobile app during a large rush in the drive thru (only open during the time I went) and basically wasted my time since my order didn‚Äôt go through. I was told at the second window basically oh well it didn‚Äôt go through in a rude manner by a manager saying I did it wrong. While in fact, it‚Äôs just the app being buggy not me. I was upset to say the least and proceeded to go to another restaurant to get food instead. At least their app works wayyy better than McDonald‚Äôs.

title: App Doesn‚Äôt Work
review: This App is the worst. The main reason I have the app is for the Coffee punches. I literally go to McDonald‚Äôs everyday for coffee and the app never counts the punches. I‚Äôve even called corporate who said to uninstall and reinstall the app the restart my phone for the fix. Nope that didn‚Äôt I have receipts for all my last four coffee purchases and nothing. I‚Äôm about to start getting my coffee from Chick-fil-A because not only does the app work but if you miss a punch from the app they give you a copy of the receipt to scan on the app at a later time, perfect for me! McDonald‚Äôs should give you a barcode to scan on your receipt if you ever have problems at the store.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work. Never has worked.
review: If I could give zero stars, I would.  I have tried off and on for over a year and a half to use this app and it doesn‚Äôt not work on iPhones.  The app downloads and then when you try to open it, it just flashes on for a second and then shuts down. I can‚Äôt believe McDonalds can‚Äôt find developers that can address these glitches.  There are a lot of iPhone users out there and you are missing a big chunk of the market by not having an app that will function for iPhone users.  A quick Google search shows I am not the only person with this problem. Get your act together McDonalds!

title: Keeps asking me to login when I tap ‚Äú view all deals‚Äù !
review: Very frustrating. I originally download the App about 2 years ago and it worked okay.  I recently got another iPhone and All of my other apps work fine but this one keeps asking me to login again as I move around in it.  My husband has always had this problem with his app..and deleted it. Now I understand why.  So frustrating to use .
developerResponse: {'id': 14868074, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had! We‚Äôd love to help you with a solution. Please give our McDonald's Mobile App team a call at 877-334-4332, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-04-23T15:36:17Z'}

title: Unusable
review: I‚Äôve downloaded almost all the food apps out there and the McDonalds one is the most frustrating to use.  First, just logging in is a challenge - I‚Äôve watched those fries jump up and down for 10 minutes before giving up.  Then, in the off chance it does log in and I‚Äôm able to place the order - the credit card always (ALWAYS) has an issue.  I have not successfully placed and paid for an order in months - I have had to talk to a manager in the store each time.  Total garbage.  Makes me feel that McDonalds, a multi billion dollar company, doesn‚Äôt know how to provide a good app (like Dunkin‚Äô or Wendy‚Äôs) and simply doesn‚Äôt care.

title: One of the worst food apps
review:
I have never had as many issues with any app as I‚Äôve had with this one. It constantly logs me out, then I‚Äôm unable to log back in for weeks, until a new update comes out. Their customer service is non-existent in regards to the app, and individual stores. In addition, you can use a deal, and then, for whatever‚Äôs reason, the restaurant won‚Äôt accept it so your order won‚Äôt go through, you then can‚Äôt use another deal because you have to wait 24hours, EVEN THOUGH you never made your purchase. The 24hour rule should be changed to once a day, resetting at midnight, this way can could use it for dinner and breakfast, for example. 

Fix your app or don‚Äôt have one!

title: Not working
review: I used to love this app worked amazingly all the time awesome deals. Than all of a sudden everyone I go to log in it just keeps saying ‚Äúwe‚Äôre experiencing technical difficulties‚Äù & now it no longer works for me. Now I now what your thinking just give it a day or two. But it‚Äôs been like this for about two months. I forgot ab the app while I was waiting for it to work it just dawned on me now after deleting app I re download it to see if it works but nope still nothing...I don‚Äôt get why I thought maybe the email but nope I‚Äôve tried 2 different emails. I just wanna deal on the frys :( can someone please tell me why this is happening

title: Winning me back
review: I‚Äôve had trouble in the past with this app and unresolved issues which has made me stop using it and stop buying in general since I was upset. Way to go McDonald‚Äôs you‚Äôre doing good so far ü§óü§ûüèΩüëçüèΩ

title: Why does my phone have to be at the location??
review: Tried to do a order off the app for my first time...ordering was a breeze love the ordering setup on the app. My husband who had my car and card went to the store for me to pick it up and he couldn‚Äôt pick it up as my PHONE wasn‚Äôt at the store!?!?! We tried giving them the order number and the lady said she had no online orders in the computer and that I would have to come up there with my phone and not give them the order #???. I Don‚Äôt get online ordering if you can‚Äôt online order especially if your social distancing and having someone pick up your order?

title: Paid for order, but not processed by restaurant
review:
The app let me order and pay for the food via credit card, but after checking in at the restaurant they said they had no record of my order.  They told me to contact app customer support and did not give me the food paid for using the app.  Paying for food, waiting for food, but not receiving food is bad.

No, I do not want to call Customer Service to wait 15 minutes to speak with someone to try to get a refund of 6 dollars that shouldn‚Äôt have been charged.  

However, I did, and the representative said that I had to work with my credit card company because they do not process refunds.  What a complete waste of time...

title: Slow and cumbersome
review: The app is incredibly slow on Wi-Fi and especially on cellular. I FINALLY had the opportunity to wait through the app to try placing a mobile order. After almost 10 minutes, I placed my order and parked at the mobile pickup spot. Much to my dismay, the app was stuck on needing Wi-Fi. The app would not allow me to do anything else but click ‚Äúretry‚Äù to reconnect to my now non existent Wi-Fi signal. After clicking several times, I went inside McDonalds since their Wi-Fi signal didn‚Äôt not extend to the parking lot. Once inside, I connected to Wi-Fi to show the cashier my order. I will give this one more chance (I will order using cellular data and not WI-FI) before I give up completely.

title: This App is Great
review: I have used this App often under the ‚ÄòDeals‚Äô section. First the value of the deals that McDonalds offers is consistently outstanding. Further, the app is simple to use and has always worked without fail when I pull up to the window to have it scanned. I had strayed away from eating at McDonalds much over the years, but this app, because of the deals it offers and its functionality has brought me back....regularly. Thank You McDonalds!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 4787361, 'body': "Hey! We're diggin‚Äô your enthusiasm for our app! Swing by for your faves anytime the craving hits!", 'modified': '2018-08-23T21:56:08Z'}

title: Took longer and order was still missing item
review: First time using the app. Placed my order and went to location. Pulled into curbside parking and app said there was an issue with the order. So, I had to go inside. What benefit is the app, if I have to go inside anyway? I went inside and had to wait for my order. No other customers were inside, so they weren‚Äôt busy. No one explained to me why I had to go inside the location. I watched 2 cars go through the drive thru while I waited. Drive thru would have been faster. I was given my bags of food, I checked and I was missing an item. I was eventually given all my food but I definitely saw no benefits from using the app. It was a waste of time.

title: It‚Äôs great..as a menu
review: Well this isn‚Äôt really the apps fault just my own stupidity for thinking I could use this app then pay cash at curbside assistance. I really just don‚Äôt like having my money on a card, make my money so vulnerable to online thieves, tho I understand why they make you use cards. So you can‚Äôt drive off and all that jazz. But at least it can help me with the waiting in line with people behind me anxiety because I can just put all the things I want into my ‚Äúbag‚Äù and then read the list off at the drive thru.

title: Store needs app training
review: Our location has had the parking signs up for close to a year now for ‚Äúmobile orders‚Äù and I had just not used the app. Today I decide to give it a try. Apparently the store needs to be trained on handling app orders. I drove up and entered the spot number in the app and waited...and waited....and waited...and after 5 minutes I called the store and they apparently have no idea there is an order pending üò£. The lady ask me what I ordered (she had to get something to write it down ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è) and said she would bring it out but it‚Äôs obvious that NO ONE at this location has any idea about mobile app ordering üò†. title: Make Sure to Double Check the Location
review:
This is probably my fault, but I placed the order at the McDonalds closest to my house so I could pick it up on my way home from work. 

However, I must not have seen the change, when I arrived at the McDonalds close to my house and paid for the order it switched to the location closest to my work. 

I asked if there was anyway I could transfer or cancel the order, and unfortunately I had to call my bank to cancel a measly $5.50 charge. 

Like I said this is probably my own stupidity, but I didn‚Äôt expect the location of the McDonalds I was ordering at to switch based on my location I was ordering at. 

I thought the whole point was to be able to order and pick up at a different location. Not order at the McDonalds closest to me. If I wanted to order at the McDonalds closest to me, I would just go there and order normally. 

A bit of a rant over a minor inconvenience. Using a mobile app should be convenient - not the opposite.

title: Online ordering doesn‚Äôt work.
review:
I‚Äôm not one to shirk new ways to make life easier. But I tried to order on your app (with great WiFi coverage) and the app refuses to show me a menu or anything from any of the stores around me that are listed as supporting mobile ordering. 

The app responded intelligently and said something happened, switch to WiFi or restart the app. So I made sure WiFi was working and restarted the app. Same problem. 

I‚Äôm not a fan of being blamed for app issues and I don‚Äôt have patience to be a beta tester - when this goes live it should work flawlessly every time or it isn‚Äôt ready for the public. If the app can‚Äôt function - program the app to admit you fouled up so I can move on.

title: Could use some work
review:
The app is OK, I like the customization options and the menu set up, but when it comes to communicating with the stores, not good, at all. 
I‚Äôve had two instances now, at two different McDonald‚Äôs, where they never got my order and, that seems to be a communications issue, so I would appreciate it if corporate would address this, and work out the bugs, so to speak.
Also, the app tells me my order be ready in 5 minutes, but I‚Äôve been waiting for 10. I have a much easier time using the Taco Bell mobile app, so I think I‚Äôll just go there instead.

title: Whyyyyyyyyy
review: Hey if you are reading this I just want to say that I love this app. This app notify me for great deals. However there  is one problem that bugs me. I don‚Äôt have a credit card and in this app you need to pay with a credit card. Since I don‚Äôt have a credit card I need to actually go to McDonald‚Äôs and buy the food with cash. But the rest of the app is good. McDonald‚Äôs if you are reading this I would like you to give us an option to pay with cash and I will give you a five star rating. Thanks for reading and bless you.

title: LOVE THE APP
review:
I can‚Äôt even begin to describe how thankful and convenient this app has helped make my life! I‚Äôm constantly moving, and rushed, and having this has helped alleviate some of the burden it can be going to McDonald‚Äôs! I‚Äôve used this app so many times, I‚Äôm already getting free stuff! I wish there was a better rewards program. Hopefully soon! 

But I do wish that when ordering nuggets, it gives you the option to add additional sauces. I don‚Äôt care if I have to pay the extra for the sauce, but it‚Äôs frustrating that I don‚Äôt even have a option to make that decision. 

Please address that, give the customer MORE BUYING POWER! 

Some of us don‚Äôt mind paying more, for what we want, I understand it‚Äôs a business, but how can you gain, if you don‚Äôt even give us the opportunity. 

Outside of that, this is awesome! 

Thanks!

review: The deals they have are always awesome but about a month or two I haven‚Äôt been able to get to anything it always saying it loading and after 5 min‚Äôs or so still the same thing! I deleted the app and download it again so let‚Äôs see if this changes anything..But beside the app acting up I would of gave 5 stares instead of three but after the same thing after longer then a month I can only give it three stars
