title: Just a little bite
review: This app is so great when all I need is just a little bite there it is a chicken sandwich a cheeseburger or a french fry I‚Äôm trying to figure out how I got this probably because I order meals but I just think this is wonderful just a free anything it‚Äôs kind of like you‚Äôre saying thank you to me for supporting McDonald‚Äôs thank you very much I think this app is really great especially if one doesn‚Äôt have any money.  Thanks McDonalds

title: Why can‚Äôt I give 0 stars.
review:
This app is crap. Whoever is the contractor should be fired, the Starbucks app developer hired and paid extra to expedite an app. Waiting to place the order until I get there is the first MISTAKE. That is the worst concept in the history of apps. The 2nd problem is that the stores have no clue how to use it. They fight with it every time. My mobile order and pay order of a McDouble, fries and a drink took nearly 15 minutes. My my, how efficient. 

The orders don‚Äôt clear from the app all the time. I‚Äôve had to reload it twice because it still has items in the cart. It prompts me to reopen the order, and then says an error occurred, try again later. 

This app is so bad, I would expect the executive team member (Exec VP) to lose his or her job. It‚Äôs just that much of a disgrace. Time to scrap it, get your $300 back from the VP‚Äôs kid who coded the app, find the Starbucks app developer $10M and have a real app. 

Why do I keep using it?  The coupons!  But they‚Äôre barely enough. Still thinking about dumping it until you revamp it from ground zero.

title: Needs Restaurant Rejection Feature
review: For the most part the app works well. It does not clear out your previous order, so it‚Äôs always telling you to pick it up when you open the app next. But what this app REALLY needs is the ability to perma ban certain restaurants. I don‚Äôt care the McDonald‚Äôs in the mall is half a mile closer than the restaurant I always visit. I don‚Äôt want to walk through an entire mall just to buy food. Why has no one thought to fix this yet???

title: Reward system.
review: Reward system and ease of ordering is why I downloaded the app. No problems with the app performing well, I can overlook the  underwhelming way the items are organized throughout the app, HOWEVER!!, the reward system is awful!! You can only get 1 item per order no matter how many points you have and are extremely restricted in what u can spend ur points are!! Are u kidding me? Please take a look at the Starbucks reward system and learn a little, no restrictions but the points you have. This whole reward system you guys have needs to be scrapped completely!!

title: Worst Rewards Program Ever
review:
I have never used an app with a worse rewards program. 

I have a leave family and have quickly accumulated ten of thousands of rewards points. Ok so far. Note I‚Äôm thinking let me get my family a free meal. NOPE!  You can only redeem points for a single item per order. What?!  Are you kidding?  I will never get through my points. Ever. Rusts the point of them. If I can‚Äôt use them. 

Then I thought, okay let‚Äôs send multiple orders and I‚Äôll pick them up. Nope, not any more. Once an order is in, you can‚Äôt put in another order until the first one is picked up. 

With the Chick-fil-A app, I can order what I want and it offers to let me redeem points for any or all of the items in my order!  Now that‚Äôs customer loyalty and services!  

I wish I never went to McDonald‚Äôs in the first place!

It is fairly easy to order though. Doesn‚Äôt make up for the bad taste in my mouth left by their rewards program!
developerResponse: {'id': 32366569, 'body': "it's possible to have too much of a good thing, EH! that's why we limit rewards to one redemption per order. ", 'modified': '2022-10-03T18:59:20Z'}

title: Yeah, it‚Äôs good‚Ä¶
review:
But! It‚Äôs time to shake up the breakfast lineup. The McGriddles were a nice addition, but the buns are sooooooo small. What about a breakfast salad? Pieces of pastrami (ham?) onion, croutons, egg round, balsamic dressing. Or like Italy or France? A nice croissant (not like BK‚Äôs crappy fake one), or a pasticcino. Spain has its tomato toast. What about a shakshuka bowl? Tomato sauce with a egg nestled in it. Bulgarian banitsa? Chilaquiles or arepas? How about a little English/Irish with link sausage? And baked beans (for those cutting potatoes out of their diet). Crepes with fruit? Fruit & soft cheese? Something fresco?
You guys are clever. I know you can do it!

title: McDonald‚Äôs Rating
review: This app is probably the best app I‚Äôve come across compared to the majority of any fast food app. HOWEVER, there‚Äôs TWO things that stood out to me. 1) Not having the ability to change deals on the app when needed and 2) not having the ability to get any points for purchases that aren‚Äôt purchased or used through the app. Overall, I‚Äôm giving this 3 stars for not having something so simple that could save lots of time and hassle. A million dollar company should be able to figure this out‚Ä¶

title: Phone must be with pick up
review: This is a really bad assumption of the developers that the person ordering and paying is the same as the person picking it up. The app says it won‚Äôt start making your order until you arrive, then when you tell it you‚Äôre there (aka your pick up person is there), it knows you‚Äôre not (thanks to location). If you turn location off, it requires you turn it back on. And for some reason the screen that tells you it knows you‚Äôre not at the restaurant has more typed on it, but you cant scroll down. So this is NOT working for me. I couldn‚Äôt place the order at all.
developerResponse: {'id': 28043428, 'body': 'your input is the best way for us to improve. get back to us with as much info as you can here: https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html  \r\n', 'modified': '2022-02-14T17:24:07Z'}

title: App used to be good before Rewards program
review: The app way much more stable before the Rewards program. They‚Äôre basically forcing people to sign up. If you don‚Äôt want to sign up you have to hit a button on the app before it goes to forces the user to the Rewards page where you aren‚Äôt given an option to opt out. I‚Äôve had orders cancel without warning while waiting curbside and I‚Äôve had orders say it‚Äôs been completed when I‚Äôve still been waiting curbside and the restaurant had no record of my order even though I‚Äôve been charged already. I‚Äôll be uninstalling the app and just using drive thru from here on out.

title: McDonald's needs modern developers - this app is BROKEN!
review:
McDonalds - HELP!  Hire some developers who know what the heck they're doing - ASAP!

This used to be  great app, but now it's unusable.  Why?  Closed orders never close.  You can't place a new order, because the old order from 3 days ago is still open.  Yes, the one you paid for and picked up.  The one that's closed.  

But on the McDonald's app, old orders never close.  They hang around like ghosts of breakfasts past, and the only way to exorcise them is to uninstall the app.  McDonalds technical support is useless - after reading you some boilerplate, they say the exact same thing: remove the app and reinstall.

Yes, you heard that right: closing the app?  No help. Restarting your iPhone?  Doesn't do a thing.  The only way to clear out a completed order is to reinstall the app, completely.  This is a terrible situation, because it now makes the app unusable, since it now only works one time per order.  Yes, the app is now disposable because it's so broken.

title: Thanks for this app
review: I‚Äôm lovin it! The first few times it took forever to set up and I was sad people would pull up after me while I was messing with the app and get through first but now that I have it all set up I pull up and LAUGH at the people in the huge drive thru line at lunch while I just park and they bring out my order way before everyone else AND I am getting way better deals than at the window.

title: Gives you the run-around
review:
App baits you with a deal, you choose it, app then tells you ‚Äúthis offer is not available at this time‚Äù, an attempt to switch you into paying more or ordering something else. IF THE DEAL IS NOT AVAILABLE, DO NOT SHOW IT!

App often thinks you still haven‚Äôt picked up a previous order, forcing you to ‚Äúcancel‚Äù the fulfilled order before you can create a new order.

App gives the choice of going inside to ‚Äútake away‚Äù your order when you actually cannot do this.  While you can go inside heroic hamburger operations such as Whataburger, you cannot do this at a lot of McDonald‚Äôs.  IF I CANNOT GO INSIDE TO ‚ÄúTAKE AWAY‚Äù THE ORDER, DO NOT OFFER THE OPTION.

title: Great app üçî
review:
During COVID, I like how I can use the app to order, and then pick up the order inside, without having to touch dirty money. 

I placed my first order today, using the app. Even though I clicked on the deal of the day, it didn‚Äôt add it to my order. Thankfully, the girl inside honored the deal. I really like how all the prices are listed clearly, and the daily deals are really good. Hopefully the deals stay. That is the best part about the app.

title: Double charges
review: The ap charged me 3 times. The restaurant knew it would and said they could not refund it. They gave me a number to call. I called McDonalds and they blamed the error on my phone. Then they collect information so their tech department could fix their software (not my fault it did not work). Then the agent read something claiming McDonalds wants their customers to have confidence using their ap and then said they have no way to refund me even though they knew I was overcharged. They said do a fraud claim which I have but will take 6-8 weeks before I get my money back. Do not use! If it takes the wrong amount they will do nothing to fix it.

title: Sorry app is terrible
review: I went In My cart to edit my order and it wouldn‚Äôt allow me to delete or edit, I went into the store for assistance from the manager amd she would not honor the app deals and told me to delete and reput the app in my phone which I did.  I tried again and still same problem.  It was quicker to order through the drive thru line which I did and could not get any discounts or deals from the app. This is kit the first time I had issues.
developerResponse: {'id': 21144725, 'body': 'We always want your Mobile Ordering to be awesome, Concetta. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.', 'modified': '2021-02-18T16:36:10Z'}

title: Has never worked correctly
review:
I‚Äôve attempted to use this app twice.  The first time, I placed an order and when I got to the location and attempted to notify the staff, I received what appeared to be a security error, and had to go in to place my order in person.

The second time, I placed a breakfast order prior to breakfast ending.  I arrived and parked in a mobile order spot.  The app said I wasn‚Äôt at the restaurant yet.  I had to go into the store for the app to recognize I was there.  Then the app subsequently said the breakfast items were no longer available.  I just left and went elsewhere.
developerResponse: {'id': 20841112, 'body': "We certainly don't like to hear that. Let us look into that. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html.", 'modified': '2021-02-03T19:17:30Z'}

title: Doesn‚Äôt always work
review:
This app is better than all of the medium tier fast food apps (Dunkin‚Äô Donuts, Jack-in-the-Box, Pizza Hut, etc), but it falls below the top tier apps, such as Starbucks or Chick-fil-A.

The issue is not with the design or the ease-of-use, which I would rank it has number one. Rather the app is buggy about one out of 20 times. For reasons unknown, once in a while I will open the app and it will tell me that I just used a deal when I didn‚Äôt use one. And of course, I have to wait 15 minutes for it to reset. It‚Äôs not a big enough problem for me to skip my son‚Äôs hashbrowns order (it‚Äôs only $1.80 difference), but it just makes the app on reliable.

title: App malfunctions
review: Ever since I downloaded the app, there have been so many email functions. For example I cannot login or sign up at all, it will not locate any nearby stores even with my location turned on in my settings. I try to hit any button in the app, and it just says error. I have downloaded and reinstalled the app four times now, and it‚Äôs very frustrating because I tend to order ahead at any restaurant that I eat at. The app not working has cost me to eat elsewhere because I don‚Äôt want to have to stand in a long line of people during Covid. I would rather be able to order my food ahead of time and pick it up and go.

title: Serious app and brand disappointment
review:
Seriously disappointed at the major flaws McDonald‚Äôs app has. This in turn really makes me disappointed and upset at the brand itself. 

The app cannot do simple things like restrict you, let alone tell you, if you make an order at a location just to find out the store is closed when you physically drive there. Another incident happened where the app is trigger happy to take your order just to get to the location physically and the store tells you they can‚Äôt make that menu item. 

Seriously hire some competent developers and store managers McDonald‚Äôs. Taking my business and services elsewhere.

title: Third times a charm‚Äî NOPE
review: Have tried this app for the third time. Each time was a fail. Couldn‚Äôt find a McDonald‚Äôs at which I was sitting in the lot of. Then tried again weeks later, had login issues but made the order. However, when got home it wasn‚Äôt my order. But I guess that‚Äôs my fault for not checking before leaving. Now, today app took my money but no order to be found at the store. They ask me for an order number, but it can‚Äôt be found in the app. The app just shows that an order has been completed. For a multi million dollar, multi national company you think they could get this right. Everyone else does.

title: I‚Äôm lovin‚Äô it
review: Curb side order is the best way for people to save time especially for those who values time. You can place your order on the way to the restaurant through the app which is for me even easier to order than in store and I always have my selected favourites on top so I can just click and check out. I just have to park my car at the designated spot for curb side pickup and food comes out to me in 5mins max.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review: I had this app for a long time and it worked fine and then i tried to use it in October after not using it for a while and it had signed me out. I tried logging back in but everytime i do it says ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre having technical difficulties‚Äù. i even tried to make a new account and it says ‚Äúunable to complete registration, please login in with existing account‚Äù... so i haven‚Äôt been able to use the app in months. i even deleted the app and reinstalled several times and still doesn‚Äôt work. extremely annoying bc i can‚Äôt even place mobile orders. i just started going to other fast food restaurants like wendys.

title: Can‚Äôt change email address
review: Although the app is pretty good, you can‚Äôt change your email address, you have to call the 800 number, then wait 7-10 business days, checking the app that whole time to see if you are registered. Then if not, you can start all over w the registration process. During the intervening time, you will be getting emails at the old address, seems like this could be streamlined/easier to do like w most apps

title: Can no longer use app
review: I‚Äôve had the McDonald‚Äôs app for years and love the ease of ordering and customizing my order. But the past two months I haven‚Äôt been able to use the app. First it wouldn‚Äôt let me sign into my account or even make a new one. So I deleted it and redownloaded it thinking it would fix the problem. Now the app won‚Äôt even open. It keeps crashing. I‚Äôve waited several weeks just hoping it was a bug and an update would fix it. That has yet to happen. I would really like my problem to be fixed so I can go back to enjoying McDonald‚Äôs
developerResponse: {'id': 17847959, 'body': "We're sorry about the difficulties you've had, Becca. Please provide our Mobile App team with more info at https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/contact-us/mobile-app-questions.html, so we can look into this further.", 'modified': '2020-09-13T16:37:22Z'}

title: Didn‚Äôt know my phone had to physically be there
review: I don‚Äôt know if they would‚Äôve gotten the order right but ordering was fast and easy. However I sent a screenshot of order number to my brother who was going to pick it up for me and he was told they couldn‚Äôt process the order with that order number from his phone only from mine. Had to cancel mobile order which had a $3 off coupon with it and reorder in person. App should have option for someone else to pick up order.

title: Takes FOREVER to load.
review: Every single time I login on my phone, via gmail, it‚Äôs seriously ridiculous how long and how many tries it takes me to actually log in. It‚Äôll load over and over and over and over and sometimes it‚Äôll actually work. My login info is correct. It‚Äôs not my internet connection because I always try other apps to see if they‚Äôre working and I‚Äôll also turn WiFi off and use data, but nope. My app is always updated. When I try to order food I‚Äôm hungry and not in the mood to play games just to get my food. You can‚Äôt use deals unless you‚Äôre logged in. I‚Äôm just tired of dealing with this.

title: Works 50% or less of the time
review:
I‚Äôve been using the app for over 2 yrs now and it works 50% or less whenever I use it to order. 

1) Either the restaurant can‚Äôt find my mobile order #, so they have to manually ring me up which doesn‚Äôt apply any deals you have in the app  2) All the options at that restaurant aren‚Äôt  available to order using the app 3) You order on the app and the items aren‚Äôt available so now they have to substitute the item for something else...they can‚Äôt refund you.

I would think McDonald‚Äôs would have a better/user friendly app given its resources. Always a hit or miss with this app.

title: Faster going through drive through
review: App works great and I had no issues ordering. The only thing I didn‚Äôt like which will deter me from using this again unless they change it, is that the food isn‚Äôt prepared until you arrive and check in. The reason why I order online is so that my order will be ready upon arrival so I can pick it up and go. Going through the drive through is faster or takes the same amount of time. If you don‚Äôt mind waiting this app gets the job done!

title: I have to agree
review: I have to agree with most of the users saying it used to be better, I used to never have issues with ordering. Now sometimes I can add stuff to my cart but never actually see what I ordered or finished the process of ordering I get stuck on what might as well be an infinite loading screen of fries jumping at me. The old deals I used to use every time I ordered now I feel as if there‚Äôs only ever something in there once in a while that I want to use. Not that it actually means anything when I can‚Äôt complete the order because my bag won‚Äôt load.
developerResponse: {'id': 11698619, 'body': 'Thanks for reaching out! Most times this can be fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If that doesn‚Äôt resolve your issue, give us a call, so we can look into this further at 1-877-334-4332. ', 'modified': '2019-11-06T22:33:10Z'}

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review: I downloaded the app about a month and a half ago since I found myself there more frequent than before and missing out on deals. I noticed that when I first downloaded it, I clicked on deals after I set up my account info and it kept giving me a error messages about internet connection is out try again later. Again only when I clicked on deals. Here we are now in July, and still the same error messages. I have uninstalled the app 3x and reinstalled and the same thing happens. I even changed to a different McDonald‚Äôs location thinking maybe that particular store I chose before was equipped for the app. I don‚Äôt what‚Äôs going on at this point.
